Kahn-e Magar (Persian كهن مگار, bụkwa Romanized dị ka Kahn-ee Magār; nke a makwaara dị ka Kahmagār, Kahmgar, Kāmāgār, na Kāmgār) bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Zaboli Rural District, na Central District nke Mehrestan County, Sistan na Baluchestan Province, nke obodo Iran
Na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na ya bụ ihe di 915, n'ime ezinụlọ 215
Àtụ Mehrestan County
Kamil Tolon (1912 - 1978) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Turkey na onye nrụpụta ọrụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum na 1935, a họpụtara ya onye na-ahụ maka PTT
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ha na Fahri Batıca, ha mepere ụlọ ahịa
N'ime ụlọ ahịa a, ha mepụtara igwe nhicha mbụ na Turkey
Mgbe nke a gasị, nwa klas ya Adnan Menderes tụrụ aro ka Kamil Tolon mepụta moto eletriki
Mgbe e mechara, ọ wuru ụgbọ ala eletrik mbụ na Turkey
Kamilou Daouda (a muru 29 Disemba 1987) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke na-egwu egwu maka egwuregwu Coton Sports
Nzọụkwụ mbụ ya ebe dị na Akokana FC, ụlọ egwuregwu amateur na Niger
Ọ nwere afọ 2 dị ezigbo mma tupu ọ kwaga Coton Sport de Garoua, otu ndị otu ọkwa kachasị elu na Elite One nke Cameroon
Daouda bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, ebe akpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2012
Akara na rịzọlt depụtara na mbụ ọnụọgụ goolu NigerNdepụta goolu mba ụwa Kamilou Daouda nyere
Mbongno (Bungnu), nke ejikwa Kamkam were mara bụ asụsụ nke ndị Mambiloid nke ala Naijiria, amaghi ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ a na Cameroon
Kamla Abou Zekry (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 8, 1974) bụ onye Egypt na-eduzi ihe nkiri telivishọn nke duziri ihe nkiri na usoro TV a ma ama dịka Bent Esmaha Zaat, Segn El Nisaa, na Wahed Sefr
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa na nke mba, nke gụnyere Cairo International Film Festival, Dubai International Film Festival
E gosikwara ihe nkiri ya na Cannes Film Festival
A mụrụ Abou Zekry na Cairo, Egypt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na High Cinema Institute, wee malite ọrụ ihe nkiri ya site na isoro Nadel Galal rụkọọ ọrụ na 131 Ashghal na 1993
ÑSekry na onye edemede Mariam Naoom arụkọwo ọrụ na ọtụtụ usoro TV
A Girl Named Zat (2013) bụ mgbanwe nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Sonallah Ibrahim nke 1992 Zaat
Ụlọ Mkpọrọ ụmụ nwanyị (2014), nke dabeere na egwuregwu nke Fathia al-Assal, gbara ya na Ụlọ Mkpịsị Qanater
Abou Zekry zaghachiri ngwa ngwa na Jenụwarị 25 Revolution
18 Days bụ mmekorita ya na Mariam Abou Auf, ebe God's Creation sochiri akụkọ nke nwa agbọghọ na-ere tii n'okporo ámá nke sonyeere mgbanwe ahụ
A Day for Women bụ ihe nkiri mmeghe na Cairo Film Festival n'oge oyi 2016
Kamogelo Mphela (amụrụ na Nọvemba ka ubochi gabra iri abuo na iteghete n'afo 1999), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Kamo Mphela, bụ onye na-agba egwu na onye na-agụ egwu na South Africa
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'ịntanetị mgbe o tinyere vidiyo nke ịgba egwú ya na akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya
A mụrụ Kamo Mphela na Soweto, South Africa ma too na Emdeni, Soweto
Ọ gụrụ Media na Boston Media House

Mmasị ya maka ịgba egwú malitere mgbe ọ dị obere, mgbe ọ sonyeere nna ya onye na-arụ ọrụ na YFM na ihe omume ebe ọ ga-eme n'elu ikpo okwu na ịgba egwú nke mechara mee ka ọ nwekwuo ihe ngosi site na ihe ngosi
O mechara bụrụ onye a ma ama site na itinye vidiyo na Instagram ebe ọ gosipụtara nkà ịgba egwú ya
Tupu ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ịgba egwú ya, ọ nwara ime ihe nkiri ma nweta ohere ịbụ onye ọzọ na TV ncha Isibaya, mana o mechara ghọta na ọ bụghị maka ya wee malite ime ihe dị ka onye na-agba egwú na gigs
Nkà ịgba egwú ya mechara nweta aha 'Queen of Amapiano'
N'afọ 2019, ọ bịnyere aka na Major League Music wee wepụta Ep ya akpọrọ, Twentee n'okpuru akara ahụ

O weputara egwu dika Suka Emabozen na Menemene ma soro onye na-agụ egwu South Africa Busiswa rụkọọ ọrụ na otu Sbwl ma gosipụta na otu MFR Soulz Amanikiniki nke nọ n'ọnọdụ # 1 na Good Hope FM's SA House Music Top 10 Chart
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ma soro ndị egwu obodo dịka Nadia Nakai na Killer Kau rụọ ọrụ

E gosipụtara ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwu na egwu amapiano dịka Sukendleleni na Labantwana Ama Uber Ewezuga amapiano, ọ na-agba egwú na ụdị egwu ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu na South Africa gụnyere Gqom, kwaito na pantsula
Kamo (Ma, Nyii Ma) bụ otu n'ime asụsụ nke Savanna dị na obodo Gombe Steeti, na ọwụwa anyanwụ ￼￼Naịjirịa￼￼
Na mbụ ndị na asụ asụsụ a bibu na Kamo Hill, mana a gbahapụrụ ya ka ndị na asụsụ a ji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbadaa na ndida n'oge narị afọ nke iri abụọ (20)
Kamounia (Arabic ), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpoputa ya ka Kamouneya, bụ anụ ehi na imeju a na-esi na cumin
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nri Sudanese na nri Tunisia
A na-ejikwa nwa atụrụ mee ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe bụ isi, a na-ejikarịkwa ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ
A na-enye ya mgbe ụfọdụ na ma ọ bụ n'elu osikapa e siri esi
Ihe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa nwere ike ịgụnye broth, galik, mmanụ oliv na parsley

Anayo Modestus Onyekwere (amụrụ nwoke'a na ụbọchị mbụ nke Mach n'afọ 1962 na Mbaise, Imo State, Nigeria ) Anayo, onye nke amara amara dịka Kanayo O Kanayo bụ onye Nigeria na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2006, ọ meriri ma nweta nturu ugo nke kacha mma n’egwuregwu Africa Movie Academy Award
Kanayo malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1992 mgbe oso mee ihe nkiri Living in Bondage
Kanayo emeela ihe nkiri karịrị otu narị
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya United Nations ma nwee ọkwa na aha MFR

Kanayo tinyere Kenneth Nnebue (onye mepụta ihe nkiri Living in Bondage ), Olu Jacobs, Enoch Adeboye, Queen Elizabeth na Fela Kuti so na ndị ndị gọọmentị Naijirịa kwanyere ùgwù na afọ 2014 n'oge ememme narị afọ

Kansụl Nnyocha Ọrụ Ugbo nke Naijiria (Agricultural Research Council of Nigeria) (ARCN) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị Naijiria na-ahazi ma na-enyocha nyocha ọrụ ugbo iji mụbaa mmepụta ugbo maka mmepe akụ na ụba
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-azụkwa ndị ọrụ ugbo
N'afọ 2021, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ meghere Redio na telivishọn ọrụ ugbo iji gbasaa ozi nye ndị ọrụ ugbo n'ụzọ dị irè karịa

Onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Kansụl ahụ, Prọfesọ Garba Hamidu Sharubutu, na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa na Board of Trustees nke African Agricultural Technology Foundation, otu nzukọ na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite atụmanya nchekwa nri na kọntinent ahụ site na ngwa teknụzụ ọrụ ugbo na inye nkwado ndị ọrụ ugbo n'okpuru Sahara Africa iji nweta ngwa ọrụ na ihe onwunwe nke ga-enye ha ohere asọmpi dị mkpa na ahịa ọrụ ugbo nke narị afọ nke agba 21
Kansụl Obodo Lagos bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo nke e guzobere na 1917
Na mbido, ọ na-ekwu maka nsogbu ahụike na ịdị ọcha nke obodo na mmejuputa ọnụego ụlọ mmiri
N'afọ 1950, iwu ọhụrụ nke gọọmentị ime obodo mepụtara kansụl onye isi obodo nke nwere ndị kansụl ịrị abụọ na anọ a họpụtara ahọpụta, usoro a dịgidere ruo n'afọ 1953
N'afọ 1963, a maara kansụl obodo ahụ dị ka Kansụl Obodo Lagos
Kansụl Obodo Lagos malitere mgbe e weputara iwu obodo 1917 nke na-ahọpụta akụkụ nke Lagos Island, Iddo, Apapa, na Ebute Metta dị ka obodo Lagos nke kansụl obodo ga-achịkwa

Mgbe ewepụtara ya, kansụl ahụ weghaara ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụike na nke obodo, a na-enyekwa ya ọrụ ịchịkwa ma nye ikikere gbasara ahịa ọha na eze, ahịa mmanya, na ụgbọala, na mgbakwunye, inye ọnụego ụlọ mmiri, na iwu nchịkwa anụmanụ bịara n'okpuru ikike nke kansụl ọhụrụ ahụ
Na mbido, kansụl ahụ họpụtara ndị otu ruo 1919, mgbe mgbanwe nhazi kwadebere ụzọ maka nhọpụta nke ndị otu atọ, onye ọ bụla na-anọchite anya ngalaba ha, ebe ndị otu ndị ọzọ bụ ndị gọvanọ họpụtara
N'afọ 1923, e guzobere Nigerian National Democratic Party n'akụkụ ụfọdụ iji gosipụta ndị na-azọ ọkwa afọ ise ọ bụla na Kansụl Iwu na afọ atọ ọ bụla na Lagos Town Council
N'afọ 1941, mgbanwe nchịkwa nyere kansụl ikike ịkwụ ụtụ isi
E mere mgbanwe nhazi na 1950 mgbe ewepụtara Iwu Gọọmentị Obodo Lagos nke ịrị na asaa, mgbanwe ndị ahụ gụnyere ịmepụta ndị otu a họpụtara ahọpụta niile na iwebata ọkwa onye isi obodo Lagos
Iwu ọhụrụ ahụ mere nkwado maka ndị otu kansụl ịrị abụọ na anọ a họpụtara ahọpụta nke ndị ikom na ndị inyom dị afọ iri abụọ na otu ma ọ bụ karịa họpụtara

N'agbata afọ 1950 na 1952, ndị otu 'Demo' duziri kansụl ahụ, nke a makwaara dị ka Nigerian National Democratic Party, otu ngalaba nke NCNC, pati ahụ họọrọ Ibiyinka Olorunimbe dị ka onye isi obodo Lagos mbụ na Mbonu Ojike dị ka osote onye isi obodo

Otú ọ dị, ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị egwu, enwere nsogbu nke ụgwọ ọrụ kwesịrị ekwesị maka onye isi obodo na mgbe iwu Mcpherson tinyere akụkụ nke Lagos n'okpuru ikike nke gọọmentị mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, mgbe ahụ ọtụtụ ndị otu Action Group na-edu, e tiri iwu mpaghara na-ekwu na mkpebi ndị isi nke kansụl ahụ mere dị mkpa ka Lieutenant Governor kwado ya

Otú ọ dị, kansụl ahụ mezuru ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ iwu ya, kwadokwara atụmatụ imezigharị obodo gụnyere mmepe nke ala na Surulere, mkpochapụ ogige na Lagos Island na atụmatụ maka mmemme agụmakwụkwọ n'efu na Oke Suna
N'afọ 1953, e wepụrụ ọkwa onye isi obodo ma nye ohere maka ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala dị na Lagos ka ọ nọchite anya ya na kansụl ahụ
Oba nke Lagos, e mere ya onye isi oche kansụl
N'afọ 1954, Action Group nwere ọtụtụ ndị otu na kansụl ahụ ma na-achịkwa kansụl ruo mgbe a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Lagos City Council

Kansụl Ukwu na-ahụ Maka Ọnọdụ Ihu igwe (French Haut Conseil pour le Climat ) bụ kansụl na-achị onwé ya na Gọọmentị nke France nke Emmanuel Macron mara ọkwa n'afọ 2018 ma mepụta n'ubochi irí na ano n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019
Ebumnuche kansụl ahụ bụ ịza ajụjụ màkà iwu ihu igwe nke mba ahụ, ma mepụta akụkọ banyéré ọganihu nke France na nkwekọrịta ihu igwe ya
E guzobere nzukọ ahụ iche site na National Council for Ecological Transition nke e guzobere iji mepụta òtù mkparịta ụka ọha na eze na-emeghachi omume na otu, dị ka òtù Yellow vests
Ónyé isi oche nke kansụl ahụ ugbu a bụ Corinne Le Quéré na kansụl gụnyere ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị ọkachamara 13 na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Kọmitii na-ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe na UK sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nkè kansụl ahụ
Ọrụ bụ isi nkè Kansụl Ụkwụ na ihu igwe bụ inye ndụmọdụ na aro nye gọọmentị France na iwu na atụmatụ mgbanwe ihu igwe, gụnyere mmejuputa nkwekọrịta Paris
A na-enye kansụl ahụ ọrụ iji nyochaa ịdị irè nké iwu na omume gọọmentị n'ibelata gas na-ekpo ọkụ na ime mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ nwèrè nka n'akụkụ atọ
Kansụl ahụ na-ebipụta akụkọ kwa afọ nke na-enyocha ọganihu France na izute ebumnuche ihu igwe ya ma nye aro màkà ihe omume n'ọdịnihu
Afọ ise ọ bụla, ọ na-enye akụkọ banyéré usoro mbelata gas na-ekpo ọkụ na France, nkè a na-enyocha n'onwe ya afọ ise ọ bụla

N'ime akụkọ a, kọmitii ahụ na-enyocha ma usoro a zuru ezu n'ihe gbásárá nkwekọrịta ihu igwe nke France na nkwekọrịta ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke Paris, nkwekọrịta Europe na nkwekọ maka nnọpụiche carbon n'afọ 2050, ka ọ na-eburu n'uche nkwado akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke mgbanwe ahụ yana nsogbụ nke ọbụbụeze
Kansụl Ukwu na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe na ihu igwe na-etinye ákà na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na agụmakwụkwọ, na-eme ka a mara mkpa ọ dị ịnagide mgbanwe ihu igwe na mkpa ọ dị ime ihe ngwa ngwa
Kansas bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika

Ihe gbasara Kansk (Russian) ma ọ bụ ihe gbasara ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma Kansk (Russian) bụ ikpe mpụ na-aga n'ihu na obodo Kansk nke Russia ébé obu na n'ime afọ June 2020 ndị ọrụ FSB jidere ụmụ nwoke atọ dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe ha na-etinye akwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị ndị ọchịchị boro ebubo na ha bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eyi egwu anarchist
Otu n'ime ihe akaebe dị na ikpe ahụ bụ omume ụmụ okorobịa ahụ na egwuregwu vidio Minecraft, ebe ha wuru ụlọ FSB nke ha na-afụ na egwuregwu ahụ
Otu nzukọ na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na Russia, Memorial, gosipụtara ikpe ahụ megide ndị Kansk atọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma dị ka mkpagbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Ná mmalite ọnwa June n'afọ 2020, n'ime mbà Kansk nke Russia Siberian, ụmụ nwoke atọ dị afọ iri na anọ na-etinye mpempe akwụkwọ mkpesa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-akpọ maka nnwere onwe nke nwa akwụkwọ mgbakọ na mwepụ nke Moscow State University PhD na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị anarchist Azat Miftakhov
Ha debere ụfọdụ n'ime mpempe akwụkwọ ndị ahụ na mgbidi mpụga nke ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa gọọmentị etiti
FSB chọtara ụmụ nwoke ahụ ma jide ha na ọnwa June 6, 2020
Mgbe e jidere ụmụ nwoke ahụ na mbụ na ubochi isii n'ọnwa June, ndị ọrụ FSB weghaara ekwentị ha, gbaa ha ajụjụ obere oge ma hapụ ha ka ha laa
Mgbe ha nyochachara ekwentị ụmụ nwoke ahụ nke ọma ma chọpụta ọtụtụ ihe 'na-adịghị mma' na ihe FSB n'ebe ahụ, FSB kpọrọ ụmụ nwoke ahụ n'echi ya ma gbaa ha ajụjụ ọnụ ogologo oge

Kọmitii nyocha nke Russia meghere ikpe mpụ megide ụmụ nwoke atọ ahụ e boro ebubo ọzụzụ maka ọrụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na ebumnuche nke ịgbanwe 'ọnọdụ dị ugbu a na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Russian Federation'
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, e buliri ebubo mpụ ahụ iji hazie otu ndị na-eyi ọha egwu
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Russia katọrọ ikpe ụmụ nwoke ahụ dị ka obi ọjọọ na oke
Otu saịtị mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi, Bazaio, gbara akụkọ miri emi banyere ikpe 'ọdụm Kansk
Otú ụmụ akwụkwọ Siberian dị afọ iri na anọ si tinye mpempe akwụkwọ na ụlọ FSB wee bụrụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu

Akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbasa ozi Novaya Gazeta gbara ọtụtụ akụkọ na-akatọ njikwa gọọmentị banyere ọnọdụ banyere ikpe ụmụ akwụkwọ Kansk ma jiri ikpe ahụ tụnyere ọgwụgwọ ụmụaka n'oge Stalin's Great Purge n'ime n'afọ1930s

Otu akụkọ nke Novaya Gazeta mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na ihe akaebe ndị ọchịchị kpughere na mgbasa ozi na-akwado gọọmentị dị ka e jidere na ikpe Kansk sitere n'ezie site na ikpe dị iche, nke e mere ka ọha na eze mara ọtụtụ ọnwa gara aga
Ebe mgbasa ozi Graniru gosipụtara ikpe ébé FSB na emegide ụmụ okorobịa Kansk atọ dị ka 'fabricated'
A kọwara nkwupụta mbụ nke Mikhailenko na Andreyev na akụkọ nke otu RFE / RL nke Russia dị ka ewepụtara 'n'okpuru nrụgide na iyi egwu'
N'ime ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na Russia, Memorial, depụtara ikpe ahụ megide ndị ntorobịa Kansk atọ dị ka mkpagbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Kanta Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị na Argungu, Naijiria, nke dị nso na nnukwu ahịa
E wuru ya n'afọ 1831, aha ụlọ ahụ bụ Muhammed Kanta, onye hiwere Alaeze Kebbi n'afọ 1515
Ọ bụ Yakubu Nabame, onye bụbu Emir nke Kebbi, wuru ya, ma jee ozi dị ka obí eze Emir ruo afọ 1942 mgbe ndị Britain wuru obí ọchịchị ọhụrụ n'oge ọchịchị Muhammed Sani
Mgbe ụlọ ahụ tọgbọ chakoo, n'ọnwa Julaị 1, afọ 1958, ọ meghere dị ka ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, na-enye nghọta banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Kebbi Steeti

E kewara ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ n'ime kọmpat iri na otu ma nwee nchịkọta ngwá agha a ma ama, nke gụnyere ọtụmọkpọ, ube, mma agha, osisi, nkume, ụta na akụ́, égbè obodo na ọbụna ịgbà na-egosipụta
Kantha nke a na-akpọkwa kanta, na qanta, bụ ụdị ọrụ ịchọ mma na Bangladesh na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke India, ọkachasị na steeti India nke West Bengal, Tripura na Odisha
Na Odisha ndị mere n'oge ochie, a na-etinye saris ochie n'elu ibe ha ma jiri aka dụkọta ha iji mee obere ihe ndina nke uwà maka ndị kasị
A na-ejikarị nke a eme ihe n'elu ihe ndina ma ọ bụ kama ihe ndina
'Kantha saris' bụ omenala ụmụ nwanyị na mpaghara Bengal

N'ụbọchị ndị a, a na-etinye ihe ịchọ mma, nke a maara karịa ndị mmadụ n'ihe nke ọma dị ka 'kantha stitched', na sari, kurta (ma ọ bụ panjabi) na churidar na ọtụtụ uwe ndị ọzọ ma na-ewu ewu ụlọ nzukọ alaeze nke ga eweta ụwa họrọ site na iji Tinye na ụgbọ ịnyịnya agha n'ihi uru mara mma ha na njirimara aka ha
A na-ejikwa eriri Kantha eme akwa dị mfe, nke a na-akpọkarị nakshi kantha
Ụmụ nwanyị na Bengal na-ejikarị saris ochie na ákwà ma tinye ha kantha ịkwa akwa iji mee akwa akwa dị mfe, tụba, ma ọ bụ gbasaa, karịsịa maka ụmụaka
Kantha na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị njem nleta na-eleta mpaghara Bengal nke mpaghara India
Kantha bụ ụdị ịchọ mma nke ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo na-emekarị
A na-eji dhotis na saris dị nro eme ụdị ọdịnala nke Kantha, na-eji eriri na-agba ọsọ dị mfe n'akụkụ
Dabere na ojiji nke ngwaahịa a rụchara, a maara ha dị ka Lepkantha ma ọ bụ Sujni Kantha
Ákwà a chọrọ mma nwere ọtụtụ ihe gụnyere akwa, mkpuchi maka enyo, igbe, na ohiri isi
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, a na-ekpuchi ákwà ahụ dum na eriri na-agba ọsọ, na-eji ihe osise mara mma nke okooko osisi, ụmụ anụmanụ nnụnụ na ọdịdị geometric, yana isiokwu sitere na ihe omume kwa ụbọchị
Ịtinye n'elu ákwà ahụ na-enye ya mmetụta na-agbaji ntakịrị, nke na-agbagharị agbaji
A na-etinye kantha nke oge a n'ọtụtụ uwe dị ka sarees, dupatta, uwe elu maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị, ihe ndina na ákwà ndị ọzọ, nke a na-ejikarị ogho na silk
Ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ aka nke oge a nke Kantha na-agụnye ụdị mmepụta dị mgbagwoju anya
Àtụ EmbroideryÀtụ Bengali clothingÀtụ Culture of West Bengal
Kantilal Jivan Shah, nke a maara dị ka Kanti (1922 ruo Ọktoba 22 afọ 2010) ka e kwuru na ọ bụ onye kachasị dee banyere Seychellois

[nkọwa dị mkpa] A kọwara ya dị ka Renaissance Man, ọ bụ onye guru, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọkachamara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye na-ahụ maka nkwụ, onye na-esi nri, onye na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na onye nwere ọgụgụ isi
E gosipụtara ya na ihe karịrị otu narị akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin na mmemme redio na telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa nke ụfọdụ ndị nwere mmetụta zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka Queen Elizabeth II na Mother Teresa nye Ian Fleming, onye kere James Bond
Nke ikpeazụ gosipụtara Jivan dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na akwụkwọ akụkọ Bond ikpeazụ ya
O mekwara ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Omar Sharif

Jivan na-azụ ahịa mbupụ na mbubata nke nna ya guzobere na 1895, mana a maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke gburugburu ebe obibi na njem nlegharị anya na dị ka onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịnala
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nke òtù dị iche iche dịka Alliance Francaise, Chamber of Commerce and Industry na Seychelles Environment Trust Fund
E tinyere ya na UN Environmental Program Global 500 Roll of Honour ma Royal Norwegian Academy of Sciences and Letters kwanyekwara ya ùgwù
Kantilal tinyere aka na ngafe nke iwu nke nyere aka ịmepụta Ste
Anne Marine National Park na Port Launay Marine National Park
O nyekwara aka n'itinye iwu na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka Iwu Nchedo nke Shells; Nchedo Anụmanụ na Nnụnụ; Nchịkwa nke àkwá nnụnụ; Nchedo nke Turtles; na Seychelles Marine Mammal Sanctuary
Jivan nwụrụ na Ọktoba 22 n'afọ 2010 na Victoria Hospital, Mahe, Seychelles mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asaa ma nwee nwa nwoke na nwa nwa
Kantosi, nke a makwara dị ka Yare (Yarsi), bụ asụsụ Gur nke obodo Ghana
Kanu ma ọ bụ KANU nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Kanufi (Anib) bụ asụsụ Plateau nke Naijiria￼￼
Kanuri (/kəˈnuːri/) bụ asụsụ na-aga n'ihu na-asụ na Naijiria, Niger, Chad na Cameroon, yana obere ndị na-erughị eru na ndịda Libya na ndị bi na Sudan

At the turn of the 21st century, its two main dialects, Manga Kanuri and Yerwa Kanuri (also called Beriberi, which its speakers consider to be pejorative), were spoken by 9,700,000 people in Central Africa
It belongs to the Western Saharan subphylum of Nilo-Saharan
Kanuri is the language associated with the Kanem and Bornu empires that dominated the Lake Chad region for a thousand years
Usoro okwu bụ isi nke ahịrịokwu Kanuri bụ isiokwu
Ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'otu oge nwere postpositions na post-nominal modifiers dịka ọmụmaatụ, 'pot Bintu' ga-egosipụta dị ka nje Bintu-be, 'pot Vintu-of'
Kanuri nwere ụda atọ elu, ala, na ọdịda
Ọ nwere usoro dị ukwuu nke consonantal lenition; dịka ọmụmaatụ, sa- 'ha' + -buma 'eri' → za-wuna 'ha riri'
Dị ka omenala, ọ bụ asụsụ a na-asụ n'ógbè ahụ, ojiji ya adaala n'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ mbụ na-asụrụ Hausa ma ọ bụ Arabic dị ka asụsụ nke abụọ
[citation needed]
A na-asụ Kanuri karịsịa na ala dị ala nke Chad Basin, na ndị na-ekwu okwu na Cameroon, Chad, Niger, Nigeria, Sudan na Libya
Ethnologue kewara Kanuri n'ime asụsụ ndị a, ebe ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ (dịka
Cyffer 1998) na-ewere ha dị ka olumba nke otu asụsụ
Ndị agbụrụ Kanuri na-asụ atọ mbụ ma chee ha dị ka olumba nke asụsụ ha
A maara ụdị dị iche iche e gosipụtara na narị afọ nke iri na asaa dị ka Old Kanembu
N'ihe gbasara ịgụgharị na nkọwa okpukpe, a ka na-eji ihe sitere na nke a eme ihe nke ukwuu, nke a na-akpọ Tarjumo
E dere Kanuri site na iji edemede Ajami Arabic, ọkachasị n'okpukpe ma ọ bụ n'ụlọ ikpe, ruo ma ọ dịkarịa ala narị afọ anọ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a na-edekwa ya mgbe ụfọdụ na mkpụrụedemede Latin gbanwere
E mepụtara Oziọma Jọn nke e bipụtara na 1965 n'asụsụ Roman na Arabic
Otu orthography romanized (nke a maara dị ka Standard Kanuri Orthography na Naịjirịa) bụ nke Kanuri Research Unit na Kanuri Language Board mepụtara
Nkọwa ya, dabere na olumba nke Maiduguri, bụ nke Kọmitii Orthography nke Kanuri Language Board, n'okpuru Onye isi oche Abba Sadiq, Waziri nke Borno
Ọ kwadoro ya n'ụzọ iwu site na Kanuri Language Board na Maiduguri, Nigeria, na 1975

Ndị Kanuri
Ndị Kanuri (Kanouri, Kanowri, Yerwa, Bare Bari na ọtụtụ aha ndị ọzọ) bụ agbụrụ Afrịka bi n'ala ndị bụbu Kanem na Bornu Empires na Niger, Nigeria, Sudan, Libya na Cameroon
Ndị a na-akpọkarị Kanuri gụnyere ọtụtụ subgroups na dialect groups, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-akọwa dị ka ndị dị iche na Kanuri
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-achọpụta mmalite ha na usoro ndị na-achị alaeze Kanem-Bornu nke oge ochie, na steeti ma ọ bụ mpaghara ndị ahịa ya
N'adịghị ka ndị agbata obi Toubou ma ọ bụ Zaghawa na-azụ anụ, ndị otu Kanuri anọwo na-anọkarị otu ebe, na-arụ ọrụ ugbo, na-egbu azụ na mba Chad Basin, ma na-azụ ahịa na nhazi nnu
Ndị Kanuri gụnyere ọtụtụ subgroups, ma jiri aha dị iche iche mara na mpaghara ụfọdụ

Asụsụ Kanuri bụ asụsụ bụ isi nke Alaeze Ukwu Bornu ma ka bụ asụsụ bụ nnukwu na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ Nigeria na n'ebe ndịda Cameroon, mana na Chad ọ bụ naanị ndị na-asụ ya n'obodo ukwu
Ndị kasị ukwuu bi na Kanuri bi n'akụkụ ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria, ebe ememe Emirate nke Bornu na-achọpụta ụmụ sitere na alaeze Kanem-Bornu, nke e guzobere tupu 1000 OA
Ihe dị ka nde mmadụ atọ na-asụ asụsụ Kanuri bi na Naịjirịa, na-agụnyeghị ihe dị ka mmadụ 200,000 na-asụrụ asụsụ Manga ma ọ bụ Mangari
Ndị Nga nọ na Bauchi Steeti na-achọpụta mmalite ha na ndị Kanuri diaspora
N'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger, ebe ha mejupụtara ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi na ya, a na-akpọkarị ndị Kanuri Bare Bari (aha Hausa)

Ndị Kanuri 400,000 (puku narị anọ) bi na Niger gụnyere Manga ma ọ bụ Mangari subgroup, nke dị ihe dị ka 100,000 ( otu narị puku) na afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na asaa (1997) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Zinder, ndị na-ewere onwe ha dị ka ndị dị iche na Bare Bari

Ihe dị ka puku iri anọ (40,000) na afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na asatọ (1998) ndị otu Tumari, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Kanembu na Niger, bụ ndị Kanuri dị iche iche bi na mpaghara N'guigmi, ma dị iche na ndị Kanembu nke Chad

Na Kaour escarpment oasis nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger, ndị Kanuri kewara n'ime obere ìgwè Bla Bla, nke dị ihe dị ka iri puku abụọ (20,000) na afọ puku puku abụọ na atọ (2003), ma bụrụkwa agbụrụ kachasị na nnu mgbasa ìgwè na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa nke Bilma
Kanuri na-asụ ụdị Kanuri, otu n'ime asụsụ Nilo-Sahara
Nkewa gụnyere asụsụ Manga, Tumari, na Bilma nke Central Kanuri na asụsụ Kanembu dị iche iche
N'ikwekọ n'omenala okpukpe na ọdịnala nke steeti Kanem-Bornu, ndị Kanuri bụ ndị Sunni Muslim
Na Chad, ndị na-asụ asụsụ Kanembu na-eme ka onwe ha dị iche na nnukwu agbụrụ Kanuri
Kanembu dị na Lac Prefecture na ndịda Kanem Prefecture
Ọ bụ ezie na Kanuri bụ asụsụ bụ isi nke Alaeze Ukwu Bornu, na Chad, ndị na-asụ Kanuri na-ejedebe na ndị na-ekwu okwu ole na ole n'ime obodo
Kanuri ka bụ asụsụ bụ isi na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa na n'ebe ndịda Kameroon
Na mbido afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri asatọ (1980), ndị Kanembu mejupụtara akụkụ kachasị ukwuu nke ndị bi na Lac Prefecture, mana ụfọdụ Kanembu bikwa na Chari-Baguirmi Prefecture
Ozugbo ha bụ ndị isi agbụrụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Kanem-Borno, nke ókèala ha n'otu oge gụnyere ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na ndịda Libya, ndị Kanembu na-ejigide njikọ gafere ókèala Chad
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mmekọrịta ezinụlọ na azụmahịa na-ejikọta ha na Kanuri nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
N'ime Chad, ọtụtụ Kanembu nke Lac na Kanem prefectures na-ejikọta na Alifa nke Mao, gọvanọ nke mpaghara ahụ n'oge precolonial

Na mbụ, ndị Kanuri bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị Nilo-Saharan na Central South Sahara, na-amalite mgbasawanye ha n'ógbè Lake Chad na ngwụcha narị afọ nke asaa, ma na-amịkọrọ ma ndị Nilo na-Sahara na ndị Chadic (Afro-Asiatic) na-asụ
Dị ka ọdịnala Kanuri si kwuo, Sef, nwa Dhu Ifazan nke Yemen, rutere Kanem na narị afọ nke itoolu wee jikọta ndị bi na ya n'ime usoro Sayfawa
Otú ọ dị, omenala a nwere ike ịbụ ihe sitere na mmetụta ndị Alakụba mechara, na-egosipụta njikọ ya na mmalite ndị Arab ha n'oge ndị Alakụb
Ihe akaebe nke ọdịdị steeti ụmụ amaala na mpaghara Lake Chad malitere n'ihe dị ka narị puku asatọ (800) BCE na Zilum
Ojiji nke ilu pụtara ìhè n'okpukpe Kanuri nke Islam ebe a na-eji ha enyere aka na nghọta nke ihe na-eme na ịkụzi ihe ihe ihe ndị pụtara
Ọ bụ ndị agadi nwoke maara ihe mepụtara ilu ndị a na echiche dabere na ọnọdụ na ihe mmụta a na-anwa ịkụziri
Ilu na-ekwukarị ihe ndị a na-ahụ na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Otú ọ dị, a na-eji ihe ndị e ji mee ihe n' ilu ahụ n'ụzọ ga-eme ka ha na-akụzi àgwà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nkwenkwe ma ọ bụ ahụmịhe
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-ewu ilu gburugburu omume ndị dị mkpa nke a na-eme na ndụ kwa ụbọchị, mana eme ka ọ dị mfe ịhụ ma tinye ya n'ọrụ na ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, ndị siri ike karị
Enwere ike iji ilu Kanuri mee ihe dị ka ụzọ iji menye ndị mmadụ egwu ma ọ bụ dọọ ndị mmadụ aka ná ntị banyere omume nzuzu ma ọ bụ ihe dị ize ndụ, mana ọ pụkwara ịbụ ihe dị mfe ma na-agba ume
Mgbe ọdịda nke Alaeze Ukwu Bornu na Scramble for Africa na narị afọ nke 19th senchury, e kewara Kanuri n'okpuru ọchịchị nke Alaeze Ukwuu Britain, France na Germany
N'agbanyeghị mfu nke steeti Kanuri, Shehu nke Bornu na-aga n'ihu dị ka onye isi nke Bornu Emirate
Steeti Kanuri / Kanembu a na-achịkwa ememe nke ndị Kanuri nke dị na Maiduguri, Borno Steeti, Naịjirịa mana nde Kanuri 4 na mba ndị agbata obi kwetara
Shehu ('Sheikh') nke Bornu na-enweta ikike ya site na steeti e guzobere tupu 1000 OA, Alaeze Ukwu Kanem-Bornu
Usoro ọchịchị dị ugbu a, usoro al-Kanemi, sitere na Muhammad al-Amin al-Kanomi na mmalite narị afọ nke 19, na-ewepụ usoro Sayfawa nke chịrị site na 1300 OA
Shehu nke iri na itoolu, Mustafa Ibn Umar El-Kanemi, nwụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2009, Abubakar Ibn Umar Garbai El-Kanomi nọchiri ya

Na Na Naịjirịa, ndị isi Kanuri a ma ama mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị gụnyere ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kashim Ibrahim, Ibrahim Imam, Zannah Bukar Dipcharima, Shettima Ali Monguno, Abba Habib, Muhammad Ngileruma, Baba Gana Kingibe, onye bụbu onye isi GNPP Waziri Ibrahim, onye bụzi onye ọchịchị ndị agha, Sani Abacha, na onye bụbu Onye isi ala Bashir Tofa
Na Niger, ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kanuri gụnyere onye bụbu praịm minista nke Niger Mamane Oumarou, na onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Niger, Mamadou Tandja
Otu obere òtù mba Kanuri nke Naijiria pụtara na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri ise gawa (1950s) , nke dị na Bornu

Ụfọdụ ndị 'Pan-Kanuri' na-akwado mba kwuru na mpaghara nke 532,460 uare kilota (205,580 sq mi) maka ókèala nke ihe ha kpọrọ 'Greater Kanowra', gụnyere Lac na Kanem Prefectures nke oge a na Chad, Far North Region na Cameroon, Yobe na Borno steeti na Nigeria na Diffa na Zinder Regions na Niger na darfur na Sudan

N'afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri ịse na anọ (1954) , e guzobere Borno Youth Movement (BYM) ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara ruo na njedebe nke ọchịchị, ọ bụ ezie na ọ kwụsịrị na nnwere onwe
Àtụ Ethnic groups in NigerÀtụ Ethnic groups in Nigeria
Kanyé Omari West (ha muru ya na afo 8 Juun 1977) bu onye Amerika na Kwu egwu nke rap
O na bu kwa abu
O wefutara egwu ime The College Dropout na afo 2004
Egwu nor na The College Dropout bu egwu nke madu shi mara ya oma
O wefutara kwa nnokolata abu ndi ozo, nke o kporo Late Registration na afo 2005, Graduation na afo 2007, ye nwefuta nnokolata abu nke ato, 808s & Heartbreak na afo 2008
O ne ji oru ya bu GOOD music i weputa abubu ndi ozo nor na ya
O bu onye kere, na onye were GOOD music
Ihe ozo madu shi ma Kanye West bu 'Dropout Bear', o bu ihe eguregu nor na ihu nnokolata abu ya ato, na egwu ndi ozo na enyoyo nke egwu o were
Kanya Viljoen (amụrụ na 29 Septemba 1994), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi na odee
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn Afgrond na Die Sentrum
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke duziri ihe nkiri RAAK na Like Hamlet
A mụrụ Viljoen na 29 Septemba 1994 na South Africa
N'afọ 2017, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere BA
(Hons) Degree na Theatre and Performance na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT)
O mechara nweta MA ya na ime ihe nkiri site n'otu mahadum ahụ

N'oge ndụ ya na UCT, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu nke ụmụ akwụkwọ dịka; Lied van die Boeings (2015), I Want to Live in Woolworths (2016), Lied van Die Boeings, As You Like It, Murdering Agatha Christie (2016)
Maka ọrụ Masters ikpeazụ ya na 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na All of It, Everything, Now, Together nke Francesco Nassimbeni duziri
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ malitekwara ọrụ egwu ya, ebe ọ sonyeere otu egwu 'Huey Huey'
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu egwu jazz 'Vivace Music'
N'afọ 2017, o dere ma duzie egwuregwu RAAK, nke malitere na Free State Arts Festival
E mechara họpụta egwuregwu ahụ dị ka Best Production nke emume ahụ
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ meriri South African Theatre Magazine's Best Emerging Director Award
Mgbe ahụ na 2018, ọ duziri egwuregwu Like Hamlet rụrụ na Theatre Arts Admin Collective
Mgbe ahụ, o dere edemede ahụ, Mank, ebe e nyere Kanya bursary onye edemede maka edemede a
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri kykNET Afgrond ma rụọ ọrụ 'Leora van Niekerk'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ sonyeere SABC2 telenovela Die Sentrum ma rụọ ọrụ 'Sanette'
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi The Moment of Dying N'afọ 2021, o dere ma duzie obere ịhụnanya, Ekstasis na ihe nkiri Om teen treine te skre
Kaoutar Farkoussi (amụrụ na 19 ọnwa Machị, na afọ 1996) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ

N'okporo ụzọ ahụ, ọ meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 na afọ 2017 Jeux de la Francophonie, mechie nke isii na afọ 2017 Islamic Solidarity Games, wee merie nrite ọla edo na afọ 2018 Mediterranean Games
N'èzí egwu ahụ, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ngwakọta relay na afọ 2019 World Cross Country Championships
Oge kachasị mma ya na mita 5000 bụ nkeji 15 4873, nke o nwetara na ọnwa Julai, na afo 2018 na Rabat
Àtụ Footer Mediterranean Champions 3000m Women
Kaouthar Bachraoui ( Arabic ) bụ onye mgbasa ozi Tunisia
A mụrụ ya na nna ya bụ onye Tunisia na nne ya bụ onye Italy
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na TV mba Tunisia
Ọ sonyeere MBC ma gosipụta mmemme As-Sahra Al-Maftouha (The Open Soirée)
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Al Jazeera ebe ọ gosipụtara ihe ngosi okwu Ishrakat (Reflections) ruo afọ abụọ
O mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ihi na onye isi nchịkwa ya n'oge ahụ bụ Mohammed Jasim Al-Ali wedara ya ala
O mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke Al-Arabiya ebe ọ gosipụtara mmemme kwa izu Manarat (Beacons)
Bachraoui kwụsịrị obere ahụmịhe ya na Al-Arabiya wee sonye na Arab Thought Foundation
Ihe omume Igwe onyonyo nke Kouthar Bachraoui bụ omenala
O nwere echiche mba ndị Arab
Ọ lụrụ otu ugboro ma gbaa alụkwaghịm, ma nwee nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Youssef
Kaouthar bụ ihe nkiri nke 2014 banyere Kaouthar Bachraoui
Kaouther Ben Hania (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Tunisia
Beauty and the Dogs (2017), ihe nkiri ya a ma ama, bu nke ahọpụtara dị ka ntinye Tunisian maka Best Foreign Language Film na 91st Academy Awards
A họpụtara ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2020 The Man Who Sold His Skin maka Best International Feature Film na 93rd Academy Awards
A mụrụ Kaouther Ben Hania na Sidi Bouzid
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ecole des Arts et du Cinéma (EDAC) na Tunisia, mgbe ahụ ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Na La Fémis na Sorbonne na Paris
Kapama Game Reserve (tọrọ ntọala 1993) bụ hectare 13,000 nwere ihe nchekwa okike nkeonwe na mpaghara Limpopo nke South Africa
Ọ bụ “Johann Roode” tọrọ ntọala ya, onye zụtara ala ahụ maka ịzụ ehi na mbụ mana ọ ghọtara na ọ dị mkpa ka a na-edobe ihe ndị dị n'ime ime obodo
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere ịmalite mpaghara ahụ dị ka mpaghara njem nlegharị anya na ebe nchekwa ahụ ka bụ nke ezinụlọ Roode ugbu a
Kapka Georgieva (mgbe e mesịrị Panayotova, Bulgarian Капка Георгиева, mgbe e mesịrị Панайотова, amụrụ na 30 Septemba 1951) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
N'afọ 1976, ọ bụ coxswain nke ụgbọ mmiri Bulgarian nke meriri ọlaọcha na ihe omume coxed anọ
Kapya bụ asụsụ Plateau a na-asụ na obodo Kapya, Takum LGA, Taraba State, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Àtụ Platoid languages
A mụrụ ya na Culpeper, Virginia, ébé a mụrụ ya n'ugbo ezinụlọ, Shepherd gosipụtara mmasị na nka n'oge na-adịghị ányá, na-enweta agbamume site n'aka ndị mụrụ ya

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Philadelphia School of Art na 1926; Art Students League of New York na 1950; Mahadum Fordham na 1960; École des Beaux-Arts, Fontainelbleau site na 1962 ruo 1964; na Mahadum Arizona State site na 1979 ruo 1980
A na-anọchite ányá ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe
Karabo bụ aha enyere na ndịda Africa ma nwee ike na-ezo aka
Karabo Dhlamini (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara Mamelodi Sundowns FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ
Dhlamini nọchitere anya South Africa na 2018 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
O gbara egwuregwu ogo sịnịọ mbụ ya N'abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Jenụwarị 2019 na mmeri enyi na enyi 1–2 nye ndị Netherlands
Àtụ South Africa squad 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup
Karabo Lerato Khakhau bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Free State Provincial Legislature maka Democratic Alliance kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu n'oge a họpụtara ya, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Khakhau bụbu onye isi oche nke kansụl nnọchiteanya ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Cape Town
Khakhau si Welkom na Free State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Welkom-Gimnasium
O nwere nzere bachelọ na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum obodo Cape Town
Khakhau sonyeere Democratic Alliance na afy 2016
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afo 2017, òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ DA meriri ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime oche itoolu n'ime iri na ise na kansụl nnọchiteanya ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Cape Town
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke SRC n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara nke e mere na 8 Mee na afọ 2019, a họpụtara Khakhau na Free State Provincial Legislature ka nkwado pati ahụ na mpaghara ahụ na-eto
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
N'ihi ya, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta, ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị nanị afọ iri abụọ na otu mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ
Karabo Mathang-Tshabuse (amụrụ n'afọ 1987/88) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye na-ahụ maka bọọlụ
N'afọ 2009, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ South Africa nke FIFA kwadoro
N'afọ 2007, ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ njikwa egwuregwu Pmanagement
A mụrụ Mathang-Tshabuse na Orlando East, Soweto, South Africa Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe akụ na ụba maka obodo Johannesburg
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Mathang-Tshabuse biri n'ụlọ atọ pụọ na Jomo Sono
Ọ gara egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ma soro di ya ugbu a bụ Josy na Nonhlanhla Nkosi, bụ ndị mechara bụrụ onye njikwa ahịa nke Kaizer Chiefs, na-agakarị egwuregwu bọọlụ
Mathang-Tshabuse kpebiri ịkwụsị ịgba bọọlụ n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mathang-Tshabuse nwere nzere bachelọ na mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand (Wits), na 2014, ọ malitere nzere iwu na Wits
Mathang-Tshabuse nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ọ bụzi onye ọka iwu na-arụ ọrụ nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke South Africa
N'afọ 2007, Mathang mepere ụlọ ọrụ njikwa egwuregwu ya bụ Pmanagement, ya na di ya ugbu a Josy na Nonhlanhla Nkosi, onye njikwa ahịa nke Kaizer Chiefs
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji chọpụta ndị na-agba bọọlụ maka ndị nwere talent ịgba bọọlụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ya achọpụtala ndị egwuregwu gụnyere Amanda Dlamini, Tendai Ndoro, na Ronald Kampamba
Nkosi hapụrụ Pmanagement n'afọ 2012
Ka ọ na-etinye akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ, ọ ghaghị ịkwụ ụgwọ otu nde rand nke mkpuchi ụgwọ na South African Football Association (SAFA), site na iji ego ụlọ ọrụ ya nwetara
N'afọ 2009, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, Mathang ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ na South Africa nke FIFA na SAFA kwadoro
Ọ dara ule nke onye na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ugboro abụọ
N'afọ 2015, Mathang-Tshabuse guzobere Association of Accredited Agents, iji gbalịa idozi nsogbu nke ndị ọrụ bọọlụ na-enweghị ikikere na bọọlụ South Africa
Dị ka onye na-ahụ maka bọọlụ, Mathang-Tshabuse anọchitela anya Justin Shonga, ma soro Thembinkosi Lorch rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2013, edepụtara Mathang-Tshabuse na Mail&Guardian young South Africans (2013)
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke nke Glamour Women of the Year Award - Business Category
Mathang-Tshabuse tinyere aka n'okwu ikpe n'ihe gbasara mwepu akara nke kpebiri ihe ga-esi na 2020–21 National First Division pụta
Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu nke Sekhukhune United, bụ ndị e nyere akara atọ nke ọma, ma merie asọmpi ahụ n'ihi ya
Karabo Poppy Moletsane (amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise na South Africa, ónyé na-emepụta ihe osise, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri n'okporo ámá
A mụrụ Poppy na Vereeniging
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nà Open Window Institute nà Pretoria mà nwee nzèrè na Visual Communication
Poppy arụwo ọrụ màkà Wall Street Journal, Google, Coca-Cola, na Nike, gụnyere imepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ LeBron James na-eyi
O mepụtara ihe osise màkà usoro Afrịka mbụ na Netflix, Queen Sono, na When They See Us
Ya na RICH MNISI rụkọtara ọrụ na nchịkọta uwe unisex, nke a na-akpọ Running Errands, na 2020
A na-etinye mural Utah Jazz ya na Salt Lake City, Utah
N'afọ 2021, Wikipedia nyèrè ya ọrụ, ya na Jasmina El Bouamraoui, ịmepụta akara otu narị na otu màkà ncheta afọ irí abụọ nké Wikipedia
A na-egosipụta ihe osise ya dị ka ihe owuwu ọbọdọ gafee Johannesburg, ma gosipụta na Times Square, na vidiyo egwu, na Soweto Towers
E depụtara ya na ndepụta Forbes n'okpuru irí àtó n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe na 2019
Ihe osise ya nkè 2019 màkà Nike meriri BASA Beyond Border Partnership Award
N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya Ónyé Okike nke Afọ site n'etiti 10 na 5
Karai-Karai (Francophonic spelling Karekare, Kerrikerri, Ajami كاراي-كاراي) bụ asụsụ a na-asụ na West Africa, nke kachasị pụta ìhè na mpaghara North East Naịjirịa
Atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ Karai-Karai dị n'agbata nde 1,500,000 na 1,800,000, nke ndị agbụrụ Karai-Krai na-asụ
Ọ bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke a na-asụkarị na Naịjirịa na obodo ndị dị na Bauchi State, Yobe State, Gombe State na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirị
Ọtụtụ okwu Karai-Karai nwere otu mmalite na asụsụ Northwest Semitic nke Hibru na Arabic
Asụsụ Karai-Karai nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Ngamo na Bole (nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa) nke a na-ewere dị ka ndị sitere na asụsụ Karai-Karaï

A na-ekewa Karai-Karai n'etiti asụsụ Bole-Tangale, tinyere Bure, Deno, Gero, Geruma, Galambu, Giiwo, Kubi, Maaka, Kiwe, Daza, Pali, Ngamo, Bole na Tangale dịpụrụ adịpụ mejupụtara otu asụsụ BoleTangale n'ime alaka West Chadic nke ezinụlọ Chadic

Na Naịjirịa nke oge a, a na-eme atụmatụ na e nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ na-asụ asụsụ mbụ na nke abụọ nke Karai-Karai n'ime Naịjirị, ọ bụ asụsụ nke abụọ a na-asụ n'ọtụtụ ebe na North eastearn Naịjirịa
N'okpuru ebe a bụ ndepụta zuru oke nke aha asụsụ Bole Tangale, ndị mmadụ, na ebe sitere na Blench (2019)
Ọ bụ obere ìgwè nke asụsụ Karai-Karai bụ
Standard Karai-Karai malitere na 1950s, mgbe Northern Region Literary Agency (NORLA) rụrụ ọrụ n'akwụkwọ Ndar Ma Karatu nke bụ mbipụta mbụ na Karai-Karaay nke Gaskiya Corporation bipụtara
Asụsụ Karang (a na-akpọkwa Mbum East ma ọ bụ Lakka) bụ asụsụ Mbum nke Cameroon na Chad
Enwere ndị na-asụ Karang 27,000 - 32,000 na Cameroon, gụnyere 7,000 ndị na-asụ olumba Sakpu (SIL 1991), na ndị na-asụ 10,000-15,000 nke olumba Nzakmbay (SIL 1998)
A na-asụ Karang na obodo Touboro na Tcholliré na ngalaba Mayo-Rey, Northern Region yana Chad
Ọ na Pana nwere njikọ chiri anya
Egosiri nasalisation na cedilla a̧, ȩ, i̧, o̧, ɔ̧, u̧
Naanị ụda dị elu, e ji olu dị egwu gosi ya á, é, í, ó, ɔ́, ú; a pụrụ ijikọta ya na nasalisation á̧, ȩ́, í̧, ó̧, ú̧￼
Ndepụta nke nrụgharị Proto-Lakka (Wiktionary)
Àtụ Adamawa languages
Kare language nwere ike ibu
Àtụ Dab
Kare (Kãrɛ̃, Kareng; autonym nzáà kã́rĩ́, where nzáà = 'mouth') bụ asụsụ ndịda Mbum nke Central African Republic, nke ndị Kare na-asụ n'ugwu ugwu Ouham-Pendé prefecture gburugburu Bocaranga
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 97,000 nọ ná mba ahụ na-asụ ya, na puku ndị ọzọ na-asụkwa ya na Cameroon
A na-eche na ọnụnọ asụsụ ahụ dị na nsọtụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ezinụlọ Mbum na-egosipụta mmalite nke narị afọ nke 19 site na Plateau Adamawa, na-agbanarị mwakpo ndị Fulani
Ethnologue 17 na-akọwa na Kare nwere nghọta na Mbum kwesịrị ekwesị
Agbanyeghị, asụsụ ndị nwere njikọ chiri anya na nke ọ bụla anaghị akọpụta na ha nwere nghọta
Ethnologue depụtara Tale (Tali) dị ka olumba, mana Blench (2004) na-ahapụ ya enweghị nkewa n'ime asụsụ Mbum
Ethnologue depụtakwara Kali dị ka otu okwu; Blench depụtara asụsụ Kali na ngalaba dị iche iche nke asụsụ Mbum
Kare nwere consonantal fonim ndia
O nwere fonim udaume ndia
Enwere ọdịiche nke Uda elu di n'etiti ụda dị elu na nke dị ala (dịka imaatu sá 'kwuru' vs
sà 'achị ọchị'), na ụda ụda dị n'etiti nke a na-ejighị n'aka
Naanị okwu monosyllabic nwere ike inwe ụda na-arị elu ma ọ bụ na-ada
Usoro okwu bụ isi nke Kare bụ isiokwu-okwu-ihe, imaatu kɛ́ húrù (3SG na-eri manioc) 'ọ riri manioc'
A na-edozi negation site na iji okwu ikpeazụ nke ahịrịokwu yá 'ọ bụghị'; mgbe a na-agbagha ya, a na-eji tí dochie anya copula yè 'bụ (n'ebe) ' na copula ɓá 'bụ (nke ya na) '

A na-emepụta aha okwu site n'ibuli ụda nke ikpeazụ ma tinye nsonaazụ -Cà, ebe C = l ma ọ bụ r mgbe ụdaume ọnụ gasịrị, n mgbe ụdaume imi gasịrị, burukwa ihe efu mgbe ụdaume gasịrị fà 'deny' > fárà 'denial', sɛ̀l 'untie' > sɛ́là 'untie'
Kare enweghị okike ụtọ asụsụ
Ndị nnọchiaha ya bụ ndị a
Enwere ike ịgbakwunye hánà 'onye ọ bụla ọzọ, onye ọzọ'

E nwere klas mechiri emechi nke udi okwu na anaghi agbanwe agbanwe (dịka fé 'ọhụrụ', sɛ́nń 'ọbara'), nke na-ebute aha ahụ ụzọ ma ọ pụkwara ịgbaso ya iji gosipụta àgwà na-adịgide adịgide, ma ọ bụ enwere ike iji ya mee ihe dị ka aha n'onwe ha
Ndị na-ekpebi (hánà 'onye ọzọ', kɛ́ 'nke a', ố́́í 'nke a, snoẁɔ́ 'nke ahụ', nɛ̄ 'nke ahụ') na-eso aha , ma na-esote akara dị n'ọtụtụ rì nzù kɛ́ rí pí (onye DEF PL kwa) 'ndị mmadụ'
Onuogugu na ọnụọgụ na-abịa na njedebe, na-agbaso akara (nhọrọ) ọtụtụ nzù ndíɓí 'ndị ise' (onye ise), nzù rì sérè 'ndị abụọ' (onye PL abụọ)

A na-emepụta mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa kpọmkwem site na juxtaposition, eg sã̀ũ̀ lìà (akụkọ mgbọrọgwụ) 'ihe ndabere nke akụkọ ahụ'; mkpụrụ ndụ ihe Nketa nyocha na-eji ihe ʔà, eg vùn ʔà bá (ụlọ GEN nna) 'ụlọ nna'
A na-emepụta ahịrịokwu ndị metụtara ya na ngosipụta na-esote (ọ bụghị mgbe niile ozugbo) site na akara nke onye ikwu ɗá, eg nzù ố́í ɗá rí mí léóɗá (onye a REL na-ezu m ụnyaahụ) 'onye zuru m ụnyahụ'
Adpositions niile nke di na Kare na-ebute mgbakwunye ha
E nwere anọ isi (dị ọcha) prepositions kà 'with (instrumental)', té 'with (comitative)', ʔá 'in', báŋ 'like', eg kɛ́ ɡí té bá nɛ̄ (3SG na-abịa na nna 3SGPOSS) 'ya na nna ya bịara'
N'akụkụ ndị a, e nwere ọtụtụ postpositions nke abụọ nke doro anya sitere na aha (nke na-abụkarị akụkụ ahụ), eg tûl 'isi' > túl 'n'elu'
Àtụ Adamawa languagesÀtụ Languages of Cameroon
Karefa bụ aha Afrịka enyere na aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Karen Mahmoud (Arabic) (March 16, 1922 - Jenụwarị 15, 1995), nke a makwaara dịka 'Melodious Knight', bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Egypt
Ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama n'ụwa ndị Arab
A mụrụ Karem na Machị 16, 1922 n'obodo Damanhur, el-Buhayrah Governorate, n'ebe ugwu Egypt kilota 60 (37 mi) site na Alexandria
Dịka nwatakịrị, Karem sonyeere nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Mohammed n'ịbụ abụ okpukpe, si otú a zụlite nkà ya maka ịbụ abụ Arabic na nkwupụta ziri ezi na ọzụzụ phonetic
Ọbụna n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ndị nkuzi Karem kwuru na olu ya siri ike ma mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ọ maara abụ siri ike nke Sayed Darwish na Mohammed Abdel Wahab
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nwata, a nabatara Karem mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị na Institute of Arabic Music na Cairo
Karem bụ onye nkuzi nke ụfọdụ ndị egwu Egypt, gụnyere Fouad Mahfouz, Darwish el-Hariri, Sheikh Badawi, onye na-ede egwu Safar Ali, na onye na-egwu egwu Hassan Gharib
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ nwetara akara kachasị elu, na ọdịiche a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ
Karem Mahmoud gara n'ihu bụrụ kpakpando ma dịka onye na-agụ egwu ma dịka Onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Karem nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 15, 1995, na ngalaba nlekọta siri ike nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Saint Mary na London
Okwu ikpeazụ ya bụ maka dọkịta na-awa ya ahụ, tupu ịwa ahụ 'Biko chekwaba eriri olu m n'oge ịwa ahụ'
Nwunye ya na ụmụ abụọ bụ ndi na-eri ya ekpe
Karen E
Frey bụ onye American Earth scientist na Clark University onye ọkachamara na polar science, mgbanwe ihu igwe, permafrost hydrology, na mgbanwe mmiri na ice
Frey na-amụkwa mgbanwe na biogeochemistry nke osimiri, estuaries, na oké osimiri na mpaghara polar

Frey gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke nzere Bachelor of Science na Geological Sciences na Mahadum Cornell n'afọ 1998 tupu ọ banye na Mahadim California, Los Angeles iji mezue nzere Master ya na Geography n'afọ 2000
Mgbe ahụ, Frey nwetara PhD ya na Geography ọkachamara na sayensị arctic na biogeochemistry na Mahadum California, Los Angeles n'afọ 2005
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị PhD ya, Frey sonyeere ngalaba na The College of William and Mary n'afọ 2006 dị ka onye enyemaka prọfesọ nleta nke kụziri GIS na klas sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ 2007, Frey sonyeere ngalaba na Graduate School of Geography na Mahadum Clark dị ka osote prọfesọ
Frey bụ onye ndu ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọmụmụ, gụnyere Woodwell Polaris Project, National Science Foundation Distributed Biological Observatory, na NASA ICESCAPE project

N'afọ 2005, Frey na ndị ọrụ ibe ya bipụtara akwụkwọ dị mkpa, nke a na-akpọ Amplified carbon release from large West Siberian peatlands by 2100 na Geophysical Research Letters, nke kọrọ simulations nke ụdị ihu igwe maka narị afọ na-esote ma buru amụma na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ okpukpu abụọ na-agbasawanye mmụba nke carbon na iyi na mmiri na-aga n'Oké Osimiri Arctic
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ a na Discovery Channel na Earth Magazine
Frey bụ osote onye isi oche nke Marine Working Group nke International Arctic Science Committee
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Sayensị Arctic nke mba ụwa nke na-ekpebi onye na-anata onyinye ahụ kwa afọ
Karen Hampton bụ onye America na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo nke na-emepụta ọrụ nka nkè e bu n'obi ịkwụnye na mgbidi, na 'ihe osise a na-eyi' gụnyere akwa na jaket

Hampton na-emepụta ákwà nkè ya site na iji usoro imepụta ihe dị ichè íchè nke gụnyere batik (stamping na stampụ ọla kọpa), rozome, silk-screening, mbipụta ihuenyo, discharging na over dyeing, na felting
Ọ na-emepụta ákwà site na iji usoro ọnwụ 'snow' ma na-emepụta ihe osise dijitalụ / nke a na-egbuke egbuke
Na mgbakwunye na akwa akwa, Hampton na-eji usoro ịkwa akwa dịgasị ichè íchè iji mepụta ihe mkpuchi mgbidi, dị ka Korean pojagi patchwork
Hampton bụ ónyé Indiana Artisan, aha nsọpụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị omenkà na-anọchite anya steeti nyèrè
Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu Studio Art Quilt Associates, Surface Design Association, na International Quilt Association
Malite mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, Hampton mụtara ma na-arụ ọrụ ịkwa akwa na ịchọ mma n'ụlọ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gàrà Laney College otu afọ
Ọ ga-emesị nweta akara ugo mmụta na nka na anthropology na New College of California
Hampton gàrà n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe mgbè ọ na-amụta ónyé na-akpa ákwà na ónyé na-akwa ákwà Ida Grae, ma mesịa mechaa mechaa MFA ya na UC Davis
Hampton na-arụ ọrụ na ngwakọta nke mgbasa ozi akwa, nke kachasị pụta ìhè na-akpa, na-acha, na-achọ mma, na imewe elu, yana ibipụta site na iji ihe oyiyi echekwara
Ihe odide ya na-ekwukarị banyéré akụkọ ihe mere eme nke America na Africa America, dịka nzaghachi nye echiche ya na 'e chefuru akụkọ ihe méré ányá nke ndị ohu nwanyị na mmepụta akwa America mbụ'

Kemgbe ọ matara Flora, nna nna Hampton nke a tọhapụrụ n'ohu na ngwụcha afọ 1700 ma mesịa ghọọ ónyé nwe ala, o webatara akụkọ ezinụlọ n'ime nka ya, na mgbakwunye na ahụmịhe ndụ ya gụnyere ịgba bọs afọ ofufo dị ka nwatakịrị
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ nka ya, Hampton na-emepụta nyocha ndị ọkà mmụta banyéré akụkọ ihe méré eme nke mmepụta akwa site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị Africa America n'oge ịgba ohu
Hampton egosila ihe ngosi onwé onye na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Honolulu Museum of Art, Ruth and Elmer Wellin Museum of Art
Karen Harrison (16 Nọvemba 1960 - Mee 2011) bụ nwanyị mbụ na Britain a họpụtara dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, n'oge ahụ ọ bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na onye na-eme mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Karen Harrison, nwa nwanyị nke onye ọrụ mbubata, na Glasgow ma zụlite ya na London, na-aga St
Michael's Convent Grammar School, Finchley

Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, na-arụ ọrụ na Marquee Club nke London n'oge uto nke punk rock tupu ọ banye na British Rail na 1977 na ebumnuche nke ịmalite mmụta dị ka 'Secondman' nke, n'oge ahụ, bụ nzọụkwụ mbụ ịghọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Mgbalị Harrison na-agba ịghọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè malitere ozugbo mgbe ọ pụtara maka mkparịta ụka ya na ndị ọrụ British Rail, bụ ndị chere na onye ọhụrụ ha ga-abụ nwoke
Mgbe ha zutere Harrison ma chọpụta mmekọahụ ya, ha gbalịrị ịkwapụ ya n'ọrụ na ụkwụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ma gaa n'ọrụ odeakwụkwọ
Otú ọ dị, ọ jụrụ ka a chụpụ ya ma sie ọnwụ na ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè

Malite na Old Oak Common depot (nke Great Western Railway nwere ugbu a ma mesịa kwaga na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè London Paddington), ọ gafere na Marylebone depot (akụkụ nke Chiltern Railways ugbu a) mgbe afọ 10 gasịrị
E nwere ọtụtụ mmegide na ọnụnọ ya na ụkwụ ụkwụ site n'aka ndị njikwa na ndị ọrụ ibe ya, bụ ndị na-adịghị anabata ọnụnọ nwanyị n'ụwa nwoke ha
Afọ iri nke iyi egwu na-aga n'ihu - ma okwu ma nke anụ ahụ - belatara mgbe a kpọfere ya na Marylebone depot
Harrison kọwara ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ya dị ka 'Afọ iri nke hel, afọ iri nke eluigwe
Ọ na-esiri gị ike mgbe ị bụ naanị onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ma nnukwu ịkpọasị a na-emetụta gị
Nye ọtụtụ ndị ikom, abụ m ilu n'ime ọdọ mmiri ahụ
Kwa ụbọchị m na-abanye n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ m ga-anọ na-eme onwe m, mana na-eme ka ọ bụghị
Enweghị m ike ikwe ka ha mepụta ebe ndị a na-agaghị aga m; nke ahụ ga-eme ka ihe nlereanya ma anyị enweghị ike inwe nke ahụ, anyị nwere ike? Ọ gaara abụ mmalite nke njedebe'
Ha rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu, gọzie ha'
Mgbe ọ kwagara n'ụlọ nkwakọba ihe Marylebone, ọ gara n'ihu ngwa ngwa n'etiti ndị otu ọrụ ya, ebe ọ sonyeere ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, ASLEF, n'ụbọchị mbụ ya n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè

Harrison ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa dị iche iche na ASLEF, na-agwụ na 1995 mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ọkwa kachasị elu onye otu nkịtị nwere ike ịnwe na-eduzi nzukọ ASLEF kwa afọ (The Annual Assembly of Delegates) n'oge ọ bụ onye ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otú ọ dị, ọrịa meningitis kwụsịrị ọrụ ịkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ya ka ekwuputara na ọ gaghị enwe ike ịkwọ ụgbọ oloko

[citation needed] N'ịbụ onye nọ na ndepụta ojii nke ọrụ Economic League n'oge ahụ, nhọrọ ọrụ ya n'ọdịnihu dị oke obere, [citation mkpa] mana ọ nwere ike ịchọta ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ oge niile maka otu ọrụ UNISON
Ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ị nọchite anya ndị otu Union na ụlọ ikpe ọrụ, karịa ijide onwe ya megide ndị ọka iwu ọkachamara
Obi ụtọ ya bụ na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ 'funahụrụ' ụlọ ikpe
Nke a nyere ya mmasị n'iwu nke kpaliri ya ịmalite ọmụmụ iwu dị ka nwa akwụkwọ tozuru oke
Harrison ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ tozuru oke na Mahadum Oxford (Harris Manchester College), ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na-amụ maka nzere na iwu
O nwere oge ọ kọwara mmetụta nke mgbanwe a n'etiti afọ ndụ, na-akọwa, 'Ahụla m ịmụ ihe siri ike, na-esiri m ike
Mana ọ dị mfe karịa ịnya ụgbọ oloko maka ndụ
O siri ike inwe nrụgide nke ukwuu banyere ule mgbe ị nwere ihe ndị dị ka ọdịda brek na-eru nso na mgbaàmà uhie, karịsịa mgbe ị nwere ike ịhụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ọzọ na-agafe n'ihu gị
A ka na-agụsi m agụụ ike imekọ ihe ọnụ nke ndị enyi m na ASLEF
Ana m echefu ha nke ukwuu
Ndị mmadụ nọ na kọleji m bụ ndị kacha nso m nwere na mmụọ ochie ahụ ma ha ji akpa ochie dị ka m nwee nnukwu stoicism
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Harrison nwere atụmatụ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka iwu ọrụ na ikike mmadụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Mee 2011 tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ya
E mere emume olili ozu ya na ụlọ ekpere kọleji, na eulogy nke onye nkuzi ya bụ Louise Gullifer nyere
Na Jenụwarị 2023, a kpughere ihe osise na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Euston na-eme emume Harrison
Ọ bụ Avanti West Coast nyere ya iwu dị ka akụkụ nke mkpọsa onye ọrụ maka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ ise nke ndị ọhụrụ ka ha bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị
Nwanne ya nwanyị kwuru na ọ nwere olileanya na Harrison ga-anọgide na-akpali ụmụ nwanyị ịtụle ịkwọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Karen Ann King-Aribisala (amuru na Guyana ) bu onye Naijiria na- ede akwukwo, na ode akwukwo nkenke
Ọ bụ nnukwu ọka mmụta Prọfesọ nke asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na International School Ibadan, St
George's British International School, Italy (ebe ọ zitere ọdịnihu di ya; Femi Aribisala), na London Academy of Dramatic Arts

Nchịkọta akụkọ ya, nwunye anyị na akụkọ ndị ọzọ nwetara ihe nrite Commonwealth Writers' Prize, nke afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri iteolu na otu (1991), Akwụkwọ mbụ kacha mma na Afrịka (Best First Book Africa), na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya The Hangman's Game nwetara mmeri na Akwụkwọ kacha mma Afrịka, (Best Book Africa) na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ
O nwetakwara onyinye sitere na aka ndị Ford Foundation, British Council, Goethe Institute, na James Michener Foundation

Karen Lewis (née Jennings; July 20, 1953 - February 7, 2021) bụ onye nkuzi America na onye isi ọrụ nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Chicago Teachers Union (CTU), nkewa Chicago nke American Federation of Teachers, site na 2010 ruo 2014
Ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 20 tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ndị nkuzi, ọ bụ onye nkuzi kemịkalụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
A mụrụ Karen Jennings na July 20, 1953 na South Side nke Chicago n'ezinụlọ ndị nkuzi
Ọ gara Kenwood High School, mana ọ hapụrụ mgbe ọ gachara afọ mbụ ya iji gaa Mount Holyoke College
Lewis kwuru na Mount Holyoke 'kụziri [ya] ka ị nwere ike ime ihe ọ bụla [] iji jiri uche gị mee ihe nke ọma [] iji gosipụta onwe gị'
Ọ gara Dartmouth College na 1972, mgbe Dartmouth ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ Ivy League ikpeazụ ịghọ co-educational, ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị Africa-America na klas nke 1974
Otú ọ dị, o kwuru na Dartmouth 'ọ doro anya na a chọghị ụmụ nwanyị' ma kpọọ mahadum ahụ 'ahụmahụ ọjọọ nye m, mana o mere ka m sie ike'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na sociology na egwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ lụrụ Arnold Glenn wee kwaga Oklahoma; di na nwunye ahụ mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
O mechara nweta nzere Master of Arts na ọmụmụ obodo dị n'ime obodo na Mahadum Northeastern Illinois
Ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 20, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi kemịkal, malite dị ka onye nnọchi anya tupu e were ya n'ọrụ oge niile na Sullivan High School

O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Lane Tech College Prep High School na King College Prep, ma kwuo na ọ 'na-atụle ihe ịga nke ọma m dị ka onye nkuzi site na mmetụ na ngwụcha afọ, site na mkparịta ụka ya na ụmụaka na-ekwu, 'Echeghị m banyere ya n'ụzọ ahụ N'afọ 2001, ọ lụrụ John Lewis, onye bụkwa onye nkuzi Chicago, di na nwunye ahụ biri na Bronzeville
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Chicago Teachers Union na 1988
Na mbido, ọ masịghị njikọ ahụ, na echiche ya bụ na 'ha achọghị ime nke ka mma'
Lewis kwuru na ihe mere nke kpaliri ya ịrụ ọrụ siri ike na njikọ ahụ mere mgbe ọ na-eje ozi na kansụl ụlọ akwụkwọ ma hụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na-eji ọnọdụ ahụ eme ihe iji rite uru na ndị enyi ya
N'afọ 2010, Lewis, na-agba ọsọ na Caucus of Rank and File Educators (CORE), nwetara ikike n'elu CTU site na mmeri pasent 60 nke votu na ntuli aka nke abụọ
CORE mere mkpọsa na-eme ihe ike ma kwado nguzo siri ike megide nnwere onwe ụlọ akwụkwọ

CORE boro United Progressive Caucus (UPC) nke nọ n'ọkwa ebubo na ha na-adabere na ọdịmma ụlọ ọrụ, na-emechi ndị na-emegide ya n'ime njikọ ahụ, na imekọ ihe ọnụ na obodo ahụ iji gbochie njikọ aka na ụlọ akwụkwọ
CORE mere ihe ngwa ngwa iji mee ka ọ dị iche na UPC, kwughachi nkwado ya, ma malite mkpọsa iji chebe agụmakwụkwọ ọha
Ndị ndu ọhụrụ ahụ belatara ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ otu ma jiri ego ahụ gbasaa mgbasa ozi
CORE nọchitere anya otu nnukwu ndị na-emegide na mgbakọ AFT nke afọ 2012, ma mee ihe ịrịba ama iji mee mkpesa maka Race to the Top n'oge okwu nke osote onye isi ala Joe Biden

Ọtụtụ ndị nkuzi Chicago enweghị obi ụtọ na gọọmentị ime obodo na 2012, ma kwuo na onye isi obodo Chicago Rahm Emanuel, onye a họpụtara otu afọ gara aga, enwetaghị mmụba ụgwọ ọrụ pasent anọ nke obodo ahụ kwere nkwa
Na mbido Septemba 2012, Lewis duziri CTU na ọgbaghara ụbọchị asaa, nke bụ ọgbaghara mbụ nke ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Chicago n'ime afọ 25
N'ịbụ ndị nwere mmeri, ndị otu ahụ mere ka usoro nyocha ndị nkuzi dị nro, gbochie ịmalite ịkwụ ụgwọ uru, ma hụ na nchebe maka ndị nkuzi ochie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a kwụsịrị
A họpụtara Lewis ọzọ dị ka onye isi oche CTU maka afọ atọ nke abụọ n'afọ 2013, na mkpesa yiri nke ahụ ma dị obere mere n'afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, Lewis guzobere kọmitii nyocha iji tụlee ịzọ ọkwa onye isi obodo Chicago n'afọ 2015
Na ntuli aka sitere n'otu ọnwa ahụ, Lewis meriri Emanuel 45-36 na asọmpi ntuli aka
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, kọmitii nyocha ya mara ọkwa na ọ gaghị agba ọsọ, na-ekwu maka nsogbu ahụike
Kama nke ahụ, Lewis kwadoro Jesús 'Chuy' García na ntuli aka ahụ
Lewis kwụsịrị ọrụ dịka onye isi oche CTU na 2014 ma were Jesse Sharkey dochie ya
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'òtù ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu na 2018, na-ekwu maka nchegbu ahụike
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, onye isi obodo Chicago bụ Rahm Emanuel, onye iro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ogologo oge, toro Lewis, ma o kwuru na ha 'zurulitela iji nwee mmasị n'ebe ibe ha nọ dị ka ndị enyi'
N'afọ 1993, Lewis, onye bụbu onye Lutheran, ghọrọ onye Juu
Ọ gwara Chicago Jewish News na 2013 na ọ na-eyi ihe olu nke Star of David kwa ụbọchị
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ na-asụ French, Italian, na Latin, ma na-akpọ ọjà na piano
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, a kpọgara Lewis n'ụlọ ọgwụ maka 'ọrịa siri ike'
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, otu isi iyi kwupụtara na a chọpụtara na Lewis nwere glioblastoma, ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ
Na Febụwarị 7, 2021, Lewis nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 67
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, CTU wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekwu 'Karen abụghị naanị onye duziri òtù anyị
Karen bụ òtù anyị

Ọ kpọọrọ onye ọ bụla isi, ma nye ike ọtụtụ iri puku ndị nkuzi Chicago Teachers Union ndị gbasoro nduzi ya, na ndị na-ebi ndụ site na ụkpụrụ ya ruo taa, 'na njikọ ahụ gwara The New York Times na ọ 'na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị na-eju gị anya, ma ọ nwere ike ile ndị iro kachasị ike nke agụmakwụkwọ ọha na eze anya ma jiri ike a na-adịghị ahụkebe na ọrụ a haziri ahazi'
Ọ natara otuto site n'aka Emanuel, onye isi obodo Lori Lightfoot na onye omeiwu US Bernie Sanders
Àtụ Portal bar
Karen Press (amụrụ ya na 1956) bụ onye South Africa na-ede uri na onye ntụgharị okwu
Amụrụ ya na Cape Town, ma biri na Sea Point

Press bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ oge niile na onye nchịkọta akụkọ, ebe o bipụtala mkpokọta iri nke abụ, edemede ihe nkiri, akụkọ mkpirisi, yana akwụkwọ nkuzi na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ na ngalaba sayensị, mgbakọ na mwepụ, Bekee na akụnụba
Ọ tugharịkwara abụ uri sitere na Afrikaans, bụ nke Antjie Krog rụrụ nke ọma
N'afọ 1987, o mebere akwụkwọ mkpokọta mkpokọta Buchu
Antjie Krog kọwara uri ya na The Museum of Working Life dị ka 'ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi na-adọrọ adọrọ nke e wuru na ụda siri ike nke Press na ọgụgụ isi uri'
Ndị nta akụkọ nwetara ihe nrite nke ndị ntụgharị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2015 South African Literary Awards maka ntụgharị asụsụ Mede-wete na Synapse nke Antjie Krog
Karen Ching-Yee Seto bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala, ime obodo na igbanwe ala, na Frederick C
Hixon Prọfesọ nke Geography na Urbanisation Sayensị na Mahadum Yale
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na mmepe obodo na nkwado, na imata satellite dịpụrụ adịpụ
Site n'afọ 2014 ruo 2020, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ sayensị Global Environmental Change

Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ahọpụta na US National Academy of Sciences (NAS), Connecticut Academy of Science and Engineering (CASE), American Academy of Arts and Sciences, Council on Foreign Relations, na onye otu American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) dị na obodo Amerika
A mụrụ Seto na Hong Kong ma ezinụlọ ya kwaga US mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gara Pomona Catholic High School na Mahadum California, Santa Barbara (UCSB), ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Boston maka nzere masta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, na njikwa akụ na gburugburu ebe obibi, nzere doctorate na geography wee sote, ebe ya na Robert C
Kaufmann na Curtis E
Woodcock rụkọrọ ọrụ
Nnyocha edemede ya nyochara mgbasawanye ala obodo na mmetụta na ala ugbo nke dị na Pearl River Delta nke dị na obodo China
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na ijikọta data mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ihe oyiyi satellite iji mụọ uto obodo site na iji nyocha usoro oge
E nyere Seto ihe nrite NASA New Investigator Program na Earth Science n'afọ 2000 na National Science Foundation CAREER Award na 2004

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ngalaba na Mahadum Stanford n'afọ 2000, ebe ọ nwere nhọpụta jikọrọ aka na Institute maka International Studies na Woods Institute for the Environment Seto na-eme nnyocha banyere mgbanwe ala sitere na mmadụ, na-aghọta usoro nke ime obodo ma na-enyocha mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke mgbanwe na ojiji ala
Ọrụ mbụ tụlere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mmepe akụ na ụba, ime obodo na iji ala eme ihe na obodo ndị a bụ China na Vietnam

Ọ duziri Ecosystem Management Tools maka nchịkwa Commission on Ecosystem nke International Union maka Conservation of Nature (IUCN) site na afọ 2002 ruo 2008 ma soro bụrụ onye isi oche nke International Project on Urbanisation na Global Environmental Change site na afọ 2005 ruo 2016
N'afọ 2008, Seto sonyere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Yale nke ngalaba Forestry na Environment Studies
A họpụtara Seto ka ọ bụrụ Associate Dean for Research and Director of Doctoral Studies na Yale School of Forestry & Environmental Studies na 2014 na Frederick C
Hixon Professor of Geography and Urbanisation Science na 2017
Ọ bụ onye na-ahazi onye edemede maka akụkọ ihu igwe UN abụọ
Mgbe ala ọma jijiji bibiri mpaghara dị na Nepal na 2015, a kpaliri Seto ịchọpụta otú mmepe obodo na-agbanwe agbanwe si emetụta ihe ize ndụ na mpaghara ahụ
Ọ duziri ọrụ NASA nke na-ele anya na njikọ dị n'etiti uto obodo ukwu, adịghị ike na ọdachi ndị na-emere onwe ha
Ọ mụọla 'njikọ zoro ezo' n'etiti ime obodo na usoro nri
Seto chọpụtara na uto nke obodo ukwu n'ụwa niile nwere ike iwepụ mpaghara dị mkpa nke ala ugbo, na-ebu amụma na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030 otu mpaghara dị ka New Jersey nwere ike ịla n'iyi

O jirila ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi satellite mụọ mmepe obodo, gụnyere site na Defense Meteorological Satellite Program (DMSP) Operational Linescan System (OLS), Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite (VIIRS) na Landsat
Seto dezigharịrị nchịkọta akwụkwọ maka Proceedings nke National Academy nke Sciences onke dị na United States of America (PNAS) na mmepe obodo na nkwado, na-enyocha mmetụta nke nnukwu mmepe obodo

Na mbipụta pụrụ iche nke PNAS, Seto chọpụtara isiokwu atọ, isiokwu bụ ndị e deputara, ha bụ, nkwado nke ime obodo dị ọtụtụ akụkụ, na ngwọta ndị e mere maka otu akụkụ (ahụike ọha na eze, ihe dị ndụ ụdị dị iche iche) nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe mmetụta dị mma, ime obodo nwere ike isi ike na enwere mkpa dị ukwuu ịmepụta usoro dị ukwuu iji nyochaa usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Akpọọla Seto maka usoro jikọtara ọnụ maka nkwado zuru ụwa ọnụ karịa ọrụ ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, o gosipụtara na atụmatụ obodo dị mma na iwu njem dị irè nwere ike belata ojiji ike site na 25% n'obodo dị iche iche na gburugburu ụwa
Nke Ọ chọpụtara na obodo ndị dị na mba ndị na-emepe emepe mere ka 86% nke mbelata ike, n'ihi na ha nwere ike ịmepụta atụmatụ iji kwalite njem dị mkpirikpi
Ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya bú Yale Eli Fenichel, e nyere Seto ihe nrite nke a na-akpọ Resources for the Future Award na 2018 iji tụọ uru nke ngwaahịa data satellite ma mee map nke ime obodo di na Himalaya
Ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ Seto natara gụnyere
Karen Villeda (amụrụ ya na afọ 1985) bo bu onye odee, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ Mexico
A mụrụ Villeda na Tlaxcala, Mexico na afọ 1985
Ọ malitere ide ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ 9, wee bipụta abụ mbụ ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ edemede mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
O bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 18, ma mụọ International Affairs na Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education
Mmasị ya na uri na njikọ ya na akụrụngwa teknụzụ dị iche iche malitere site na LABO Laboratory of cyberpoetry (wwwlabocommx)
Asụgharịla abụ ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, gụnyere Arabic, Bekee, French, German na Portuguese
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ede uri bụ akụkụ nke Archive of Hispanic Literature on Tape of the Library of Congress (2015) na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede Mexico ole na ole na ebe nchekwa
Akụkụ nke ọrụ dijitalụ ya dị na mpịakọta nke atọ nke mkpokọta akwụkwọ eletrọnịkị nke Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Este País
Na 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye ọdịda ọdịda nke International Writing Programme (IWP) na Mahadum nke Iowa, wee họrọ ya dị ka IWP Outreach Fellow
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya POETronicA gụnyere ọrụ na-agụnye hypertext, visuals, na vidiyo
Ya na Denise Audirac na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mepụta ọrụ 2014 POETuitéame, nke na-agụnye ma na-emegharị ọdịnaya site na Twitter

N'afọ 2016, Rachel Rose nke The Fiddlehead dere 'ihe odide ya na-egosi na ọ bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụaka, karịsịa ụmụaka ndị hapụrụ Mexico ma kwaga n'ebe ugwu, na US, na-ebute ọdachi nke asụsụ, mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mpaghara obodo na ha

Na nyochaa Visegrado maka Okwu na-enweghị Borders, Charlotte Whittle na-ede, sị, 'Villeda na-ezere ihe ọ bụla, na-ezigara anyị akwụkwọ ozi akwụkwọ ozi nke ihe ndị a na-ahụ anya dị oke egwu ka ọ na-awagharị n'ókèala ọ họọrọ, na-ebu ibu nke ụlọ n'ime akpa ya
Villeda's “micro-essays” mebere ederede ngwakọ n'ezie nke bụ akwụkwọ ndetu njem ozugbo, nkatọ agụmagụ na uri prose”

Daniel Escandell Montiel na-ede na Literatura Mexicana, ' POETronicA bụ ọrụ weebụ nke na-ejikọta ihe okike uri nke Villeda nke na-agafe akwụkwọ na, n'ime ya, POETuitéame bụ oge mgbanwe nke na-emepe ụzọ nke onye edemede na-ede uri nke nwa amaala, n'ụzọ megidere ya
ruo na ederede ndị bu ụzọ, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, dabere na ma ọ bụ sitere na nchịkọta uri ọdịnala ọdịnala (ya bụ, e bipụtara), nke onye odee sitere na Tlaxcala

Ọ bụrụ na a kọwara Villeda na profaịlụ dị ka nke dị na Encyclopedia of Literature na Mexico dị ka 'onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe' (2011), o doro anya na POETuitéame abụrụla ihe dị mkpa iji kwalite ibu mba ụwa dị ka onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ
Karen Zoid (amụrụ dị ka Karen Louise Greeff n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1978) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-akpọ ụbọ,onye na-achịkọta egwu na onye na-eme ihe ngosi
Ọrụ ya n'asụsụ Bekee na Afrikaans enwetawo otuto dị egwu, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị isi obodo akpọwokwa ya 'Queen of Rock' nke South Africa
Ndị hụrụ ya n'anya maka ihe ọ na eme n'ozuzu, ndị ntorobịa South Africa na ndị nta akụkọ ka na-akpọkwa 'Zoid Generation'
Ndị otu Zoid ugbu a bụ Henry Steel Jnr (guitar), Schalk van der Merwe (bass guitar) na Jonno Sweetman (drums)
A makwaara onye na-agụ egwu ahụ maka ịkwado usoro telivishọn kykNet Republiek van Zoid Afrika ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ikpe na The Voice SA
A mụrụ ya na Brussels site n'aka onye nnọchi anya mba South Africa, Zoid tolitere na Belgium tupu ọ kwaga Johannesburg
N'ebe a, ọ gara National School of the Arts tupu ọ gaa gụọ gbasara ihe nkiri na AFDA
N'afọ 2001, ọ hapụrụ mahadum iji Tinye uche na nlekwasị anya na egwu
EMI wepụtara abọm mbụ nke Zoid, 'Poles Apart', n'ọnwa June afọ 2001

'Afrikaners is Plesierig', abụ e gosipụtara na abọm ahụ enwetala ọnọdụ dị egwu na South Africa, na-abanye na lexicon obodo ma ndepụta ya dị ka otu n'ime egwu otu narị kachasị mma na South Africa site na Sunday Times EMI wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya, 'Chasing the Sun', n'ọnwa June afọ 2003 na nke atọ ya, 'Media', n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2005
E wepụtara abọm nke anọ ya, 'Postmodern World', n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2007 mgbe ọ hapụrụ EMI wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nke Just Music na mbido afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2009, Sony wepụtara 'Ultimate Zoid', abọm diski abụọ jikọtara egwu sitere na abọm ya gara aga na egwu ọhụrụ atọ, na ndekọ ndụ
Sony wepụtara 'Terms and Conditions' n'afọ 2010
E wepụtara 'Zoid Afrika' na 2012, site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke Zoid, bụ Karen Zoid Productions
E tinyela egwu sitere na abọm Zoid na ntụrụndụ ọdịyo nke ụgbọelu mba ụwa na-aga ma sikwa South Africa
O dekwara egwu nke telivishọn, ya na egwu abụọ ya gosipụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 2006 bụ'Number 10'

N'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, o meriter ihe nrite SAMA dị ka onye n'ime ihe omu Naanị ya bụ Best Female Solo Artist Karen Zoid gosiputara nka egwu ya na mmeghe nke ndị isi ala bụ Thabo Mbeki n'afọ 2004 na Jacob Zuma n'afọ 2009
Ya na ndị otu ya mekwara egwu na emume nweta gbasara ọrịa mminwu nke Nelson Mandela afọ 2005 akpọrọ Nelson Mandela 46664 HIV / AIDS benefit concert in 2005, na ememe otu narị afọ ke ANC n'afọ 2012
Ya na ndị otu ya emeela ọtụtụ egwu na London,nye ọkachasị ndị na-ege ntị na South Africa
N'afọ 2006, ha rụrụ na London, Canada na Dubai (na Dubai Desert Rhythm Festival)
N'afọ 2010, Karen Zoid pụtara na ihe nkiri Franz Marx, Susanna van Biljon O dekwara egwu isiokwu nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Republiek van Zoid Afrika, ihe ngosi okwu abalị nke Zoid kwadoro,nke malitere na kykNET n'onwa Julaị afọ 2014
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2016, Zoid bụ onye ọka ikpe na ebe ọzọ nke asọmpi abụ The Voice
N'afọ 2004, Zoid lụrụ onye bụbu onye otu egwu Don Reineke, onye ya na ya mụrụ nwa nwoke n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2007
Di na nwunye ahụ mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2010
Karim Abdel Aziz (Arabic ) (a mụrụ na Cairo, Egypt, August 17, 1975) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ nwa onye nkuzi Mohammad Abdul Aziz na nwa nwanne onye nduzi ihe nkiri Omar Abdel Aziz
A mụrụ Karim Abdel Aziz n'abalị 17 nke ọnwa August, afọ 1975, na Agouza, Giza
Abdel Aziz bụ onye nduzi nwere nnukwu ihe nketa na ihe nkiri Egypt zụlitere, ebe ọ bụ nwa nnukwu onye nduzi Mohamed Abd El Aziz
Nke a bụ ịzụlite nka mere ka ọ họrọ ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya ebe ọ maara ọdịdị nke azụmahịa ahụ
Abdel Aziz gụrụ akwụkwọ na French School Collège De La Salle na Cairo ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ya
Abdel Aziz sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke ihe nkiri n'afọ 1994, iji malite ndụ dị iche kemgbe ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nduzi n'afọ 1997 ma rụọ ọrụ dịka osote onye nduzi maka obere oge ebe mmetụta nke ịnọ n'ihu igwefoto kama ịnọ n'azụ ya nwara ya
Nke a bụ mgbe o kpebiri ịgbanwe ime ihe nkiri kama iduzi, ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ohere ya na onye nduzi Sherif Arafa na-eme ihe nkiri nke mbụ ya

Mgbe ahụ mgbe Samira Ahmed họọrọ Abdel Aziz maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri TV 'Emraa mn zaman el hob' ọ bụ ezigbo mmalite ya dị ka ezigbo onye na-ese ihe nwere ezigbo nkà na nnukwu ọchị na ọ na-enweta ọtụtụ onyinye ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ọrụ ya n'ihu Mona Zaki na Hala Shiha na Ahmed Helmy na 'Leeh khalletny ahebbak'
