Karim Bare (amụrụ ya n'October 28, 1983) bụ onye Nijeri
ia bụbu onye na-egwu mmiri, onye ọkachamara na sprint freestyle events
Bare ruru eru maka 100m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2000 na Sydney, site n'inweta ebe Universality site na FINA n'enwetaghị oge ntinye
O sonyere na okpomọkụ mbụ a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ megide ndị ọzọ na-egwu mmiri Farkhod Oripov nke obodo Tajikistan na Eric Moussambani nke Equatorial Guinea
Tupu asọmpi ahụ amalite, Bare banyere n'ime ọdọ mmiri ahụ, ya na Obidoro tupu na-akụ égbè ahụ, ma mesịa bụrụ ndị a chụpụrụ maka mmalite na-ezighị ezi, bịa-ahapụ Moussambani dị ka nwoke ikpeazụ guzoro
Karim Diaa Eddine bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Cairo
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America nke Cairo, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nduzi na France ruo afọ atọ
Onye nduzi Karim Diaa El Din nwụrụ

Karim El-Khebir (nke e nwekwara ike isupe ka Karim El-Khebyr; amụrụ ya na 4 Mee 1974 na Niger ) bụ onye Nigerien lara ezumike nká na-agba bọọlụ nke na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke NDC Angers reserves na obodo ya
El-Khebir malitere ọrụ ya na Valenciennes n'afọ ndị 1990
N'afọ 1999, ọ bịanyere aka na ASOA Valence na French Ligue 2, ebe ọ pụtara ihe karịrị ugboro iri abụọ na isii ma nye ihe karịrị goolu efu
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbara bọọlụ na klọb Irish St Patrick's Athletic na klọb French Sainte-Geneviève Sports tupu ọ laa ezumike nká
Karim Ahmed Kassem (Arabic , Kareem Ahmad Qassem, Egyptian Arabic , nke a na-akpọkwa Karim Assem; a mụrụ na 8 Ọktoba 1986) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Karim na 8th nke October 1986 na Cairo, Egypt
Ọ bụ onye Alakụba n'onwe ya ọ bụ ezie na o nwere ọtụtụ okpukpe na-azụlite na-eme ememe ezumike ndị Juu, Ndị Kraịst na ndị Alakụba niile dịka nwatakịrị
Nne ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye Juu na nna ya bụ onye Alakụba ma sitere na nketa okwukwe Alakụba na nke Ndị Kraịst
Nna nna ya bụ onye Alakụba na nne nne ya bụ Onye Kraịst
Nna nna ya bụ onye Juu na-emegide ndị Zionist nke jụrụ ịkwaga Israel, na-ekwere na Zionism bụ òtù 'ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'
Nna nna ya bụ onye ama ama n'Ijipt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America dị na Cairo, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri ma mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu mahadum
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ atọ na Egyptian Arabic (nke a na-akpọkwa Standard Arabic), French na Bekee
Achọpụtara ya n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, o nwere ọganihu ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri ọgwụ ọjọọ Awqat Faragh nke pụtara 'Oge dị mma'
Kassem na onye ọrụ ibe ya Amr Abed esorola mee ihe nkiri atọ n'ime ihe nkiri ya
Lassina Abdoul Karim Konaté (amụrụ ya na 20 Mee 1987), nke a maara dị ka Karim Lancina, bụ onye Nijeria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu ma ọ bụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti ma ọ bụ dịka onye na-azụ aka ekpe
Na 29 Machị 2013, Lancina hapụrụ Cotonsport Garoua site na Cameroon wee bịanye aka na Bulgaria A Grupa side PFC Lokomotiv Sofia
Lancina bụkwa onye otu mba Niger na-eme egwuregwu nke iri ise otu goolu
A kpọrọ ya na 2012 na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations
Karim Oumarou (bu onye amụrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 1985) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger n'oge 2010 FIFA World Cup qualification, na-enye goolu nke ya megide Benin
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị Sahel SC ugbu a nke na-egwu na Niger Premier League
A maara ya dị ka onye na-agbachitere ọtụtụ ihe, na-enwe ike ịbanye n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla n'ofe azụ 4, yana ịbụ winger bara uru
Karima Mokhtar (a mụrụ Attyat Mohamed Al Badry; 16 Jenụwarị 1934 na 12 Jenụwarụ 2017) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọrụ ya gafere ihe karịrị afọ iri ise
A mụrụ Karima na Asyut, o wee gụsịa akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na nka ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Nour Al-Demerdash, ha bụkwa nne na nna nke onye na-egosi telivishọn Moataz Al-Demertash
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ihe ngosi redio Baba Sharou, ma gaa n'ihu na ihe ngosi radio ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya were ihe karịrị afọ iri ise
A na-akpọ ya 'onye nne' na ihe nkiri Ijipt, na-emekarị 'nne' na ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi telivishọn, dịka na The Kids Have Grown Up na The Grandson
Karima Souid, amụrụ n'April 4, 1971, na Lyon, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia, onye otu Social Democratic Path
A mụrụ ya n'April 4, 1971, na 3rd arrondissement nke Lyon, o nwere BA na Philosophy na Letters, ma na-agbaso ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na njem nleta
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem azụmahịa na ihe omume

Mgbe mgbanwe ọchịchị nke Tunisia nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Democratic Forum for Labour and Liberties (Ettakatol) na Febụwarị ma họpụta ya na 23 Ọktoba 2011 na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Tunisia dị ka onye nnọchi anya nke Mpaghara nke Abụọ nke France
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nyocha maka nkwurịta okwu, ozi, na mmekọrịta mgbasa ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
N'ihi nke a, ọ bụ onye otu Bureau of the Assembly na nke Conference of Presidents
Na Febụwarị 5, 2013, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Ettakatol wee bụrụ onye nweere onwe ya, si otú a hapụ njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Troika
Na Machị 23, ọ sonyeere Social Democratic Path nke a maara dị ka al-Massar
N'afọ 2014, ọ hapụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kpamkpam ma soro ezinụlọ ya biri na Lyon
N'afọ 2014, e nyere ya akara knight nke Tunisian Order of Merit
Karimou bụ aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Karin Kortje-Aspeling (onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye mmeri oge nke atọ nke Idols na South Africa
Mgbe a kpọpụtachara onye mmeri n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2005, M-Net wepụtara ndekọ mpụtara nke ntuli aka nke mmadụ iri na abụọ kachasị elu
N'oge ọnụ ọgụgụ izu ọ bụla, Karin nwetara votu kachasị ma si otú a bụrụ onye asọmpi kachasị ewu ewu n'oge Idol III dum
Karin nwetara pacenti Votu iri isii na ise nke vootu ikpeazụ

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe o meriri oge nke atọ nke Idols, South Africa, Karin wepụtara obere abọm atọ site na Record Label nke Sony BMG nke gosipụtara egwu mmeri ya 'I'm So Ready' na Christmas carol 'Joy to the World' ma gụkọo egwu John Legend kụrụ bụ'Ordinary People' nke o gosiputarakwara n'oge ihe ngosi ìhè
E wepụtara obere abọm ahụ otu izu ka Karin meriri n' asọmpi ìhè ahụ ma egwu izizi ya 'I'm So Ready' bu nke akpọrọ n'ikuku ugboro ugboro na ụlọ ọrụ redio na mba niile
N'onwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2006 Karin malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm izizi ya Kortje ọ chọrọ ka abụ ndị ahụ nwee ozi mkpali mmụọ

E wepụtara abọm ahụ site na nnukwu Record Label nke Sony BMG n'abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2006 nke akpọrọ 'Forever and a Day' abọm ahụ nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nyocha na egwu akpọrọ 'Forever and a Day' nke bụ egwu mbụ nke LP natara otuto dị ukwuu
Abọm ahụ mechara gbagoo karịa orure ahịa ruru Gold Status na South Africa na-ere ihe karịrị puku iri abụọ

Abọm ahụ nwere egwu redio anọ n'ozuzu 'Forever and a Day' 'I'm So Ready' 'Never Never Never' 'If I Can't Have You' Karin zutere onye bụbu onye isi ala South Africa, Nelson Mandela obere oge o meriri Idols South Africa oge atọ
N'afọ 2006, Karin ritere ihe nrite You Magazine You Spectacular maka 'News Maker of the Year'
Kemgbe ahụ, Karin enwetala ihụ mkpuchi nke ọtụtụ magazin nke gụnyere Sarie, Huisgenoot na You magazin
Ma mechaa Karin wee kwụsịtụ iputa ìhè
Karin lụrụ Shaundore Aspeling n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 2009 n'obodo ya bụ Grabouw
Gift Gwe, onye na-esote na Idols oge nke atọ, gosiputara ihe ngosi egwu n'ụbọchị agbamakwụkwọ karin
News Maker of the Year
Won
Best Musical Production Karin Kortje 'Die Hele Storie'
Nomination
Karin malitere njikọ ọhụrụ ya na ndị njikwa ọhụrụ n'afọ 2009 na-ewepụta otu egwu ọhụrụ bụ 'Love in the First Degree' n'onwe ya
Egwu ahụ gbagoro n'ogo Chaati na-aga kpọmkwem na ọnụ ọgụgụ mbụ na Good Hope FM na Heart 1049 FM's SA TOP 10 Charts
Egwu a nọrọ ọtụtụ izu ma karịa nke atụrụanya site n'idebe ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ka ke mbụ n'ọtụtụ izu n'usoro chaatị abụọ ahụ
E gosikwara 'Love in the First Degree' na abọm DJ Keith
Karin dekwara egwu Krismas 'Hark The Angels' na abọm Krismas Good Hope FM nke ewepụtara N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009
N'afọ 2011, Karin wepụtara egwu ozioma nke mbụ bu tonaanị ya nke akpọrọ 'Discovering' e wepụtara ya n'ụdị CD
Karin gosiputara otu egwu a na South African comedian Soli Philander's ihe ngosi onyonyo bụ'Taxi vision' Live

N'afọ 2011 Karin Kortje pụtara na egwu 'This Is My Life' na-akọ akụkọ ndụ ya, tupu, n'oge na mgbe Idols gasịrị, ya na onye mmeri nke oge nke anọ nke Idols South Africa bu Jody Williams (ọgụ egwu Afrikaans )
Ihe ngosi ahụ ka emere n'oge nke abụọ
Oge a ọ gosipụtara Karin na nwanne nwoke tọrọ Emo Adams bụ Loukmaan Adams
otu n'ime ọrụ Karin kachasị echefu echefu bụ ime na Sydney Australia na 2012
Karin sonyekwara Judy Boucher na Divas show n'afọ 2012
N'afọ 2013, Karin were akụkọ ndụ ya gaa ABSA KKNK n'oge a ọ bụ ihe ngosi otu nwanyị 'Die Held Store' ma ọ bụ na asụsụ Afrikaans
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwetara nhọpụta onyinye ABSA Kana
Karin laghachiri na ABSA KKNK n'afọ 2014 n'oge a na-eme ihe nkiri na ọgbọ TOP 40

Karin bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mmeghe tinyere LeAnne Dlamini na Belinda Davids na ihe ngosi 'Divas 2014' nke gosipụtara International R&B GRAMMY AWARD nhọpụta TAMIA N'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014 na Grand Arena Grand West Cape Town
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ so na njem obodo atọ nke Tamia na South Africa (Cape Town, Johannesburg na Port Elizabeth)
Karin Schimke (amụrụ ya na 1968) bụ onye odee South Africa
O nwetala ihe nrite maka uri ya na ntụgharị asụsụ ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ
A mụrụ Karin Schimke n'afọ 1968 na Pretoria, South Africa site na nna German na nne Afrikaans
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Clapham na Queenswood tupu ọ gaa mụọ asụsụ na Mahadum Pretoria

O nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate na nta akụkọ sitere na Mahadum Stellenbosch wee malite ọrụ ide ya n'afọ 1991, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ozi na-asụ asụsụ abụọ na Die Eikestadnuus, akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo na-enweta ihe nrite na Stellenbosch
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka The Argus n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na The Star na Johannesburg mana ọ nọrọla ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na Cape Town
Schimke rụrụ ọrụ na ụfọdụ akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha ukwuu na South Africa gụnyere The Argus, The Star na The Cape Times, dị ka onye nta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, tupu ya agawa onwe ya na 2000
Ọ laghachiri na The Cape Times afọ ise dị ka onye na-edezi ibe akwụkwọ nweere onwe ya site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2015
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akụkọ ọchị maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Femina, yana maka Parent24

Na 2006, Schimke kwadoro akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma, Fabulously 40 na karịa na-abata n'ike gị ma nabata mgbanwe, ya na Margie Orford na akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya, Akwụkwọ Karen nke Iwu (NB Publishers) ya na onye edemede na-atọ ọchị bụ Karen
Jeynes, ka ewepụtara na Septemba 2020
Nchịkọta abụ mbụ nke Schimke, Bare & Breaking ( Akwụkwọ Modjaji ), ka ebipụtara n'afọ 2012
Nchịkọta ahụ meriri Ingrid Jonker Prize n'afọ 2014
Mpịakọta nke abụọ ya, Navigate
( Modjaji Books ), e bipụtara n'afọ 2017
O meela uri nke ya na Woordfees, Badilisha Poetry X-Change, na Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefee na uri-on-the-road na Bremen, Germany, na pọdkastị dị iche iche na ajụjụ ọnYụ redio

Ebipụtala ọrụ ya na New Coin, New Contrast, Stanzas na Carapace wee gosipụta ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Paris Lit Up, The Atlanta Review, Mslexia, yana nchịkọta uri sitere na South Africa nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ German, nke a na-akpọ Ankunft
eines weiteren Tages, nke Afrika Wunderhorn bipụtara

N'afọ 2019, Schimke, ya na Leon de Kock, meriri ihe nrite nke afọ 2019 Sol Plaatje Translation Award maka Flame in the Snow, ntụgharị bekee nke Vlam in die Sneeu, mkpokọta akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya edere n'afọ 1960 n'etiti onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ André Brink na onye na-ede uri Ingrid Jonker
Ọ na-atụgharịkarị ọrụ nke onye ode akwụkwọ egwu Afrịka ama ama bụ Irma Venter
Schimke deziri Open ( Oshun, Struik, 2008) nchịkọta edemede mkparị ụmụ nwanyị sitere n'aka ụfọdụ ndị ode akwụkwọ nwanyị kacha elu South Africa
Ọ deziela ọrụ ndị odee South Africa ama ama dị ka Martin Steyn, Chanette Paul, Dov Fedler na Bronwyn Davids
Schimke bụ onye nchịkwa na-ede akwụkwọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ mmepe, onye mmepụta ihe na onye ndụmọdụ
'Anyị niile nwere mwute' Ajụjụ ọnụ Robert A
Hamblin
Maverick kwa ụbọchị June 2021

Karin van der Laag (amụrụ na 2 Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1971), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa na onye na-eduzi ndi nkiri A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama The Story of an African Farm, Cape Town na Hoodlum & Son

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi na-eme ihe nkiri yana onye ọka ikpe, onye nkuzi na onye nduzi maka National Eistedfod Association, The South African National Community Theatre Association (SANCTA) na Talent Africa
A mụrụ ya na 2 Ọgọstụ 1971 na South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Drama na Bekee na Mahadum nke Cape Town ma mesịa nweta Diploma nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Speech na Drama
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri telivishọn ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwatakịrị na mmepụta SABC Christmas They Came from Afar
N'afọ 1998, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Maggie Webster' na ihe nkiri a ma ama Isidingo
Ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ iri na abụọ
N'afọ 2011, ọ meriri SAFTA Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Soap maka ọrụ a
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-eduzi ndị na-eme ihe nkiri maka soapie site na 2000 ruo 2010
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri telivishọn Zero Tolerance, Going Up, Hard Copy, Justice for All, na Sorted
N'afọ 2015, o mere nke mbụ na mba ụwa na ọrụ 'Gail Ferreira' na obere ihe nkiri telivishọn Cape Town
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri The Three Investigators na Wild at Heart
Ewezuga telivishọn, ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa The Story of an African Farm, Les Deux Mondes, Hoodlum and Son, Hey Boy and God is African
Ọ bụ onye na-enweta ihe nrite Casting Director
O meriri ihe nrite FNB National Vita maka Best Performance site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ na-atọ ọchị
E mechara họpụta ya maka onyinye FNB Vita ọzọ maka arụmọrụ kachasị mma na Musical Theater
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ meriri ma FNB Vita Award na Fleur du Cap award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkàikpe na asọmpi eziokwu The Final Cut nke gosipụtara na SABC3
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye edemede na onye nlekọta edemede na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Karitas Karisimbi (amụrụ 26 Mee na afọ 1974) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri redio nke Uganda, onye na-egosi telivishọn na onye na-emepụta ihe ngosi TV
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Next Media Services
Karisimbi mere ọmụmụ Journalism na Nairobi na ọmụmụ ozi teknụzụ na United Kingdom
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na WBS TV na-akwado ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Time Magazine
Kariya ma ọ bụ Vinahə (Vìnà__), bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic nke a na-asụ n'otu ụyọkọ obodo dị nso na ebe nchọpụta ihe ochie nke Kariya Wuro na Ganjuwa LGA, Bauchi State, Naịjirịa
Amaara agbụrụ ahụ dị ka Wììhə́
Ndị Wiihə nwere omenala bara ọgaranya ma dị mgbagwoju anya nke gụnyere masquerades dị iche iche, ememe ibi úgwù a maara dị ka sár, kalenda omenala, na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ndị na asụ asụsụ a bi na obodo abụọ dị na Kariya Gyada na Tulu
E nwekwara ndị na-ekwu okwu n'obodo nta ndị dị nso nke Sabon Kariya na Sabon Tulu
Ebe obibi nke Dutsen Giwa nwere ndị na-asụ Vinahə, mana ọ bụzi ndị na-ekwu okwu Hausa
Karl Brillant Toko Ekambi (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 14 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu Ligue 1 Olympique Lyonnais na ndị otu mba Cameroon bọọlụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Paris FC na Championnat National na Sochaux na Ligue 2 tupu ọ banye Angers na Ligue 1
Mgbe ọnwa iri na asatọ gasịrị na Villarreal na La Liga nke Spain, ọ laghachiri na France na Lyon
A mụrụ ya na France, Toko Ekambi mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba Cameroon na 2015
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ahụ na asọmpi akpọrọ Africa Cup of Nations na 2017, 2019 na 2021, merie asọmpi 2017
A mụrụ ya na Paris, Toko Ekambi malitere ọrụ ya na Paris FC na Championnat National nke atọ
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2014, ebe ọ bụ onye nke atọ kachasị nye goolu iri na atọ, ọ gafere Sochaux

O mere Ligue 2 mbụ ya n'ụbọchị mmeghe nke oge 2014-15 megide Orléans, dị ka onye nnọchi anya Thomas Guerbert na nkeji iri ise na asaa na mmeri ụlọ 1–0 Ọ kwụsịrị oge mbụ ya dị ka onye nke anọ kachasị nye goolu na goolu iri na anọ
Na ọnwa June 2016, Toko Ekambi sonyeere Angers maka otu nde euro, na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ
O nyere goolu ugboro asaa na oge Ligue 1 mbụ ya, gụnyere abụọ na mmeri 3–0 n'ụlọ Bastia na 26 Febụwarị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Brighton & Hove Albion, nke a kwalitere ọhụrụ na Premier League, a kọrọ na ọ gbara mbọ maka ya, na-enye nde € 8 tinyere nde € 1 na ego ndị Angers
Ọ malitere oge ahụ n'ụdị dị mma, na-enye goolu itoolu na egwuregwu iri na asatọ Ligue 1 na ọkara mbụ nke oge ahụ, na-adọta mmasị England maka ọrụ ya na windo mbugharị nke Jenụwarị
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2018, a kọrọ ọzọ na Brighton gbara mbọ maka ya, nke Angers jụrụ

N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị, Toko Ekambi nyere goolu abụọ n'ọkara nke abụọ, gụnyere onye meriri na nkeji nke iri asatọ na itoolu, iji nyere ndị Angers aka ịpụ na mpaghara relegation na mmeri 2–1 n'ebe ndị otu Lille nọ
O ji goolu iri na asaa mechie oge 2017–18 Ligue 1, nke itoolu n'ime ndị kachasị nye goolu na league
O meriri Prix Marc-Vivien Foé maka onye Afrịka kacha mma na otu egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ bụ onye Kamerun mbụ ritere ihe nrite a nke aha ya bụ Marc-Vivien Foé, onye nwụrụ na-agbara mba ahụ bọọlụ n'afọ 2003
Na 25 Eprel 2017, onye nnọchi anya Toko Ekambi nyere goolu na mmeri 2–0 n'ụlọ Guingamp na Coupe de France ọkara ikpeazụ
N'egwuregwu ikpeazụ mbụ nke Angers kemgbe 1957 na 27 Mee, ọ gbara egwuregwu niile nke mmeri 1-0 nke Paris Saint-Germain
Na June 2018, Toko Ekambi bịanyere aka na Villarreal na La Liga nke Spain, maka ihe ruru nde € 20
A bịanyere aka na ya iji dochie Cédric Bakambu, onye hapụrụ Chinese Super League na Jenụwarị
O nyere goolu iri na oge egwuregwu mbụ ya, gụnyere abụọ na mmeri 3–1 n'ụlọ Rayo Vallecano na 17 Machị

N'iji goolu ise nke ọ bụla, Toko Ekambi na Ángel nke Getafe bụ ndị kachasị enye goolu na 2018-19 Copa del Rey Nke a gụnyere anọ na mmeri 8–0 (11-3 nchịkọta) n'ụlọ Almería na ụkwụ nke abụọ 32 ikpeazụ, sochiri ihe mgbaru ọsọ na ogbo ọzọ megide Espanyol, onye kpochapụrụ ndị otu ya
Toko Ekambi bụ onye ewepụtara dịka La Liga Player of the Month maka Ọktoba 2019, na ihe mgbaru ọsọ atọ gụnyere abụọ na mmeri 4–1 megide Alavés na 25 Ọktoba
Na 20 Jenụwarị 2020, Toko Ekambi laghachiri Ligue 1, na mgbazinye ego na Lyon maka oge fọdụrụnụ
Na 2 June, ọ kwagara na mbugharị na-adịgide adịgide na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ, maka ego nke € 115 nde
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2020 Coupe de la Ligue Final na 31 Julaị, egwuregwu ikpeazụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asọmpi ahụ
Na dị ka onye nnọchi anya Memphis Depay na nkeji iri asatọ, o nyere goolu na penariti ahụ mgbe ha gbachara goolu, mana ndị otu ya meriri PSG
Site na goolu iri na anọ n'afọ 2020–21, Toko Ekambi bụ onye nke itoolu kachasị nye goolu na Ligue 1
Toko Ekambi mere egwuregwu izizi ya maka Cameroon na 6 June 2015 na mmeri enyi na enyi 3–2 megide Burkina Faso na Colombes, France, dị ka onye nnọchi anya Justin Mengolo na nkeji iri isii na isii
O nyere goolu mbụ ya na 3 Septemba n'afọ sochirinụ na mmeri 2–0 n'ụlọ Gambia na 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualification
Onye njikwa Hugo Broos kpọrọ ya maka asọmpi ikpeazụ na Gabon, nke ndị otu ahụ meriri
Na ụbọchị 28 Machị 2017, Toko Ekambi nyere goolu ma chụpụ ya na mmeri enyi na enyi 2-1 nke Guinea na Brussels
Na June, Broos họpụtara ya maka 2017 Confederations Cup na Russia
Ọ gakwara 2019 Africa Cup of Nations na Egypt
Na 2021 Africa Cup of Nations n'ala ụlọ na mbido afọ sochirinụ, Toko Ekambi nyere goolu ugboro abụọ na mmeri 4–1 nke otu meriri Ethiopia, na goolu mmeghe nke mmeri 2–1 megide Comoros na 16 ikpeazụ
Na 29 Jenụwarị, o nyere goolu abụọ ahụ megide Gambia na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Na 29 Machị 2022, o nyere goolu na nkeji nke anọ nke oge agbakwunyere na njedebe nke oge mgbakwunye megide Algeria iji ziga Cameroon na 2022 FIFA World Cup

Karlien van Jaarsveld (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na asụsụ Afrikaans
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, bụ As the Curtain Falls, n'afọ 2010
N'oge gara aga, ọ bụ onye otu egwu rock, ọ bụzi onye na-agu egwu onwe nke n'eritela ọtụtụ ihe nrite na South Africa
A mụrụ Karlien van Jaarsveld n'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1985, na Paarl, South Africa, nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Nwanne ya nwoke, Bobby van Jaarsveld, bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu ma ọ malitere iso ya na-eme ihe n'afọ 2005 dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na onye na-abụ abụ
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke bụrụ abụ abụọ na abọm mbụ ya
Van Jaarsveld guzobere otu egwu rock, Revolution (Revolusie), n'afọ 2006 ma bụrụ onye isi abụ ya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2008, ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ iji malite ọrụ n'onwe ya
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, As the Curtain Falls, n'afọ 2010
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya, Jakkals Trou Met Wolf Se Vrou (Jackal Marries Wolf's Wife), n'afọ 2011
Ahịa nke abọm ahụ ruru ọkwa platinum na South Africa
N'afọ ahụ, ọ meriri Huisgenoot Tempo Award maka egwu Afrikaans, dị ka Best Newcomer
N'afọ 2012 ọ ritere ihe nrite atọ na Ghoema Music Awards, maka Female Artist of the Year, Pop Record of the Year
N'afọ 2014 ọ meriri South African Music Award maka album Pop kacha mma na Afrikaans
N'ịga n'ihu na ime ihe nkiri, Van Jaarsveld pụtara na ihe nkiri Afrikaans Platteland tinyere Steve Hofmeyr, Bok van Blerk, na Lianie May
N'afọ 2015 ọ meriri mmeri oge nke asatọ nke South African version nke Strictly Come Dancing, ya na onye mmekọ ya, Devon Snell
N'afọ 2014 ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri telivishọn, Binnelanders, n'afọ 2015 ọ pụtara dị ka Cinderella na ihe nkiri
Van Jaarsveld lụrụ onye bụbu onye egwuregwu rugby nke Springbok na Blue Bull, Derick Hougaard
Ha mụrụ ụmụ ejima na ngwụcha afọ 2013
Mgbe ha gbara alụkwaghịm , ọ lụrụ Joe Breytenbach, onye bụkwabu onye egwuregwu rugby

O nwere akụkụ anọ, nke naanị nke kachasị ukwuu na-emeghe maka ọha na eze ugbu a

A na-aghọta okwu Karnak dịka naanị mpaghara Amun-Re, n'ihi na nke a bụ naanị akụkụ ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa na-ahụAkụkụ atọ ndị ọzọ, Precinct of Mut, Precinct of Montu, na Temple nke Amenhotep IV, bụ nke e mechiri emechi ka ọ bụrụ ọha
E nwekwara obere ụlọ nsọ na ebe nsọ ole na ole jikọtara Mpaghara Mut, Mpaghara Amun-Re, na Temple Luxor
Mpaghara nke Mut bụ nke oge ochie, a raara ya nye ụwa na chi okike, mana e weghachighị ya
Hatshepsut bibiri ụlọ nsọ mbụ ahụ ma weghachite ya, ọ bụ ezie na Fero ọzọ wuru gburugburu ya iji gbanwee anya ma ọ bụ ntụziaka nke ebe nsọ ahụ
O nwere ike ịbụ na e buuru ọtụtụ akụkụ ya maka iji ya mee ihe n'ụlọ ndị ọzọ
There is an unfinished pillar in an out-of-the-way location that indicates how it would have been finished
Final carving was executed after the drums were put in place so that it was not damaged while being placed
Several experiments moving megaliths with ancient technology were made at other locations – some of which are amongst the largest monoliths in the world
N'afọ 2009, UC malitere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ a raara nye nrụzigharị dijitalụ nke Karnak complex na ihe ndị ọzọ
The first drawing of Karnak is found in Paul Lucas' travel account of 1704, (Voyage du Sieur Paul Lucas au Levant)
It is rather inaccurate, and can be quite confusing to modern eyes
Lucas travelled in Egypt during 1699–1703

The drawing shows a mixture of the Precinct of Amun-Re and the Precinct of Montu, based on a complex confined by the three huge Ptolemaic gateways of Ptolemy III Euergetes / Ptolemy IV Philopator, and the massive 113 m long, 43 m high and 15 m thick, First Pylon of the Precinct of Amun-Re
Nke a bụ nke kachasị n'ime ogige ụlọ nsọ ahụ, ma raara onwe ya nye Amun-chi ukwu nke Theban Triad
E nwere ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe oyiyi, Gụnyere onyonyo Pinedjem I nke dị mita 105 (34) n'ogologo
Nkume ájá maka Ụlọ Nsọ a, gụnyere ogidi nile, E bufere ya na Gebel Silsila, 100 kilomita (161 ) n'ebe ndịda n'osimiri Naịl
O nwekwara otu n'ime obelisks kachasị ukwuu, nke dị tọn 328 n'arọ ma guzo mita 29 (95 ) n'ogologo
Karnataka State Pollution Control Board (KSPCB) bụ ụlọ ọrụ iwu kwadoro màkà ịchịkwa mmetọ na steeti India nke Karnataka
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-achịkwa ikuku, mmiri na mmetọ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi
E guzobere Board ahụ na mbụ dị ka Karnataka State Pollution Control Board màkà mgbochi na nchịkwa nkè mmetọ mmiri n'afọ 1974 dị ka ngalaba anọ nke Iwu Mmiri (mgbochi na Nchịkwa nke mmegide), afọ 1974
A gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Karnataka State Pollution Control Board n'afọ 1985 mgbè ewepụtara Air (Prevention & Control of Pollution) Act n'afọ 1981
Na mbụ, e nyèrè ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iwu naanị iji mezuo Iwu Mmiri

N'ikpeazụ, e nyèrè ya ikike ịmanye iwu Cess Act (Prevention & Control of Pollution) Cess Act, 1977; Water (Prevention and Control of Pollition) Cesse Rules, afọ 1978; na usoro iwu na ọkwa ndị e mèrè n'okpuru Iwu Nchedo Gbụrụ-gbúrụ Ébé Obibi, 1986
Isi ụlọ ọrụ KSPCB dị na Bangalore
KSPCB nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara irí anọ na anọ, nwere ọ dịkarịa ala otu ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara ọ bụla nke Karnataka
Karo (nke a na-akpọkwa Cherre, Kere, Kerre) bụ asụsụ South Omotic nke a na-asụ na Debub (South) Omo Zone nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, na People's Region na Ethiopia

A na-akọwa Karo dị ka onye nwere njikọ chiri anya na onye agbata obi ya, Hamer-Banna, nke nwere ọdịdị okwu nke pasenti iri asatọ na otu, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka olumba Hamer site na Blench (2006), mana dị ka asụsụ dị iche nke sitere na ezinụlọ Hamer-Karo na Glottolog
Ndị Karo, ndị bi nso n'akụkụ ala Osimiri Omo, na-eji ihe osise mara mma, isi isi dị mgbagwoju anya na akara ahụ iji gosipụta ịma mma na mkpa n'ime obodo
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ puku abụọ na narị anọ na-eji asụsụ Karo
Na pasentị nke okwu ndị bụ isi nke asụsụ iri na anọ Omotic na iri na atọ ndị ọzọ, Karo nwetara iri na abụọ na Male, itoolu na Chara, iri na abụọ na Basketo, iri na abụọ na Wolaytta, iri na anọ
na Kulliri 10 na Daciri na anọ 14 na Dorziri 14 anọ na na Oydise, 5 na Kacamiri na na Koyriri 10 na Gidichiri 14 anọ na na Zaysiri 14 anọ na na Zergulla
N'adịghị ka ndị na-enye aka kachasị ike na asụsụ abụọ na-ekerịta ụdị asụsụ dị ka Inyangatom, Central Koma na Langa, Disoha, na Ingassana, Karo enyeghị aka ọ bụla

Karol Rathaus (Karl Leonhard Bruno Rathaus; kwa Leonhard Bruno; 16 Septemba 1895 - 21 Nọvemba 1954) bụ onye Germany-Austria na-ede egwu ndị Juu nke kwagara na United States site na Berlin, Paris, na London, na-agbanahụ ịrị elu nke Nazism na Germany
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Ukraine nke Ternopil (akụkụ nke Austria-Hungary na 1895), Rathaus malitere ide egwu mgbe ọ dị obere, malite ọmụmụ ya na 1913/1914 na Academy of Performing Arts and Music na Vienna
Ọrụ agha kwụsịrị ọmụmụ ya n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ kachasị amasị Franz Schreker, Rathaus sooro ya gaa Academy of Music na Berlin, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ egwu na ihe osise
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Rathaus nabatara ọnọdụ nke onye nkuzi nke ihe osise na echiche egwu na Mahadum Berlin nke Arts
Rathaus biri na Berlin site na 1922 ruo 1932, n'oge ahụ, ihe ndị mbụ o dere mere ka ihe dị egwu ma nwee nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
After his 1930 opera fremde Erde
Rathaus created film music and was among the artiscally outstanding film
Composer's in Germany before 1933he wrote the music for three films by Fyodor otsep
In 1933 he went to Paris and lived in London from 1934 to 1938 before he finally settled in New York
N'afọ 1940, ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke ihe osise na Queens College
N'ọnọdụ a, o nwetara ùgwù na ewu ewu
Na mgbakwunye, ọ nwekwara ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye na-ede egwu, na-ede ọtụtụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 59 na mpaghara Flushing nke Queens nke New York City
Ihe odide aka, ọrụ ndị e bipụtara, na akwụkwọ ozi sitere na Rathaus dị maka nyocha na Queens College Special Collections and Archives
Ihe ndị o dere gụnyere ọtụtụ ọrụ ngwá egwu symphonies, ọrụ ndị egwú, serenades, sonatas na ballets
Ọ hụrụ ihe ndị o dere n'ọdịnala nke Richard Strauss, Gustav Mahler, Igor Stravinsky na onye nkuzi ya Franz Schreker
Na Nazi Germany, e kewara ihe ndị o dere dị ka 'nkà na-emebi emebi' ma nye ya mmachibido iwu
A na-ewere ya ugbu a dị ka otu n'ime ọtụtụ nnukwu 'ndị na-ede egwu na mba ọzọ'
Rathaus lụrụ Gerta ma mụọ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Bernt
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, a na-eme ihe nkiri banyere Rathaus nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya

Kasaloo Kyanga (May 20, 1957 September 9, 2011) bụ onye egwu Congo, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na onye na-ede egwu
Ihe egwu Kyanga, gụnyere egwu egwu 'Masafa Marefu', nke ya na Tancut Almasi Orchestra dere, na-aga n'ihu na-abụ ndị egwu
Egwú ndị ọzọ ọ na-agụnye 'Nimemkaribisha Nyoka', 'Butinini', 'Kashasha', na 'Kambwembwe'
A mụrụ ya na ejima ya, Kyanga Songa, na Mee 20, 1957
Kyanga na Songa so ndị otu Tangut rụọ ọrụ
Ndị bịara hụ ụdị Fimbo Lugoda na Kinyekinye Kisonzo Tisa Kumi Mangala
Kyanga, onye a maara maka olu ya, si na Democratic Republic of Congo (Zaire n'oge ahụ) bịa Tanzania na 1980
Kyanga malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Orchestra Matimila Band, nke Remmy Ongala duziri
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama gụnyere, 'Almasi', 'Bishada', 'Natoa Onyo', na 'Usia'
Kyanga sokwa onye egwu Congo Skassy Kasambula rụkọọ ọrụ
Kyanga, Kasambula, na Semhando gara Tomatoma, Kyanga dekwara 'Mwanaidi'

O mechara sonyere nwanne ya nwoke Songa dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na Orchestra Marquis Original Kyanga na Songa ghọrọ ndị a ma ama na egwu dịka 'Karubandika', 'Sofia', 'Clara', 'Hasira Hasara', 'Ni Wewe Pekee', na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nwetara otuto n'ụwa niile
Kyanga na Songa mechara hapụ Orchestra Marquis wee soro Tancut Almasi Orchestra rụọ ọrụ na Iringa
Egwú ndị ọzọ gụnyere, 'Masafa Marefu', 'Pili Wangu', 'Tutasele', 'Kiwele', na 'Jane Butinini' (nwunye Kyanga), mere ka ha bụrụ ndị a ma ama
HụButinini, onye bụbu kpakpando netball, bụ nwanne nwanyị Duncan Butini, onye bụzi onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Railways si Morogoro
HA mara ọkwa ọnwụ Kyanga n'isi ụtụtụ nke Septemba 9, 2011
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsị pleural
Onye egwu ochie Kikumbi Mwanza Mpango Mwema, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Eze Kiki, kwupụtara ọnwụ Kyanga
Kasirye bụ aha nna nke ndi Ugandan
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Kassaly Daouda (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eche goolu maka klọb Naijiria Katsina United
A mụrụ ya na Dosso, Niger, Daouda malitere ọrụ ya na Olympic FC de Niamey, a họpụtakwara ya maka ndị ntorobịa mba n'afọ 1996, wee rịgoro na ndị otu mba zuru ezu n'afọ 1998
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2002 ọ nwetara akara mbụ ya, ọ bụkwa onye na-agbachitere ndị na-agba ọsọ na Niger kemgbe ahụ
N'ịgbanwe ka ọ bụrụ onye na-edebe goolu maka Olympic FC zuru ezu, akụkụ Daouda bụ onye mmeri league mba, mgbe ahụ ndị na-esote n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 2001, Daouda sonyeere ndị otu Niamey na-asọmpi Sahel SC, dịka onye mbụ ha gara n'ihu merie asọmpi mba atọ na iko mba abụọ

Ọ kwagara na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ klọb Cameroon Cotonsport Garoua n'afọ 2006 wee gbaa bọọlụ n'afọ 2007 CAF Champions League N'azụ ihe ịga nke ọma ya na Cotonsport, a họpụtara Daouda dị ka onye egwuregwu bọọlụ kacha mma nke afọ na Niger n'afọ 2008
Na 4 Febụwarị 2009, ọ si na Cotonsport Garoua kwaga Rapid Bucharest na mgbazinye ego, na oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2009 laghachiri na Cotonspor Garoua
Na Septemba 2012, Daouda bịnyere aka na klọb egwuregwu South African Premier Soccer League Chippa United
Ọ nọgidere na-abụ onye na-amalite ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger n'oge ha ruru eru maka 2012 African Cup of Nations, na asọmpi ahụ n'onwe ya, yana nke afọ 2013 African Cup of Nation
Na Disemba 2018, Daouda bịnyere aka na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Njikọ ndị ọkachamara bọọlụ na Naịjirịa Katsina United
'Kasena (ma ọ bụ Kasem) bụ asụsụ nke agbụrụ Kassena ma bụrụ asụsụ Gur a na-asụ na mpaghara Upper East nke ugwu Ghana ya na obodo Burkina Faso

Kassim Basma (amụrụ na 1960 na Koidu Town, Sierra Leone) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Sierra Leone ọtụtụ nde na onye nke abụọ na-ebupụ diamond sitere na Sierra Leone, na-aza ihe dịka 38% nke mbupụ diamond gọọmentị Sierra Leone niile
A mụrụ Basma na Kono District na Eastern Sierra Leone
A mụrụ ya n’ezinụlọ ndị Lebanọn si n’obodo Ain Bel nke dị n’ebe ndịda Lebanọn
Ọ bụ onye ezinụlọ Basma, otu n’ime ezinaụlọ ndị kasị ochie sitere na ndị Lebanọn na Sierra Leone
Kassoum bụ aha enyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Katogo bụ nri ụtụtụ ọdịnala na mba Uganda
A na-enye ya na erimeri n'ọtụtụ mpaghara nke Uganda ma kọwaa ya dị ka ngwakọta nke ọtụtụ ngwa nri ihe ndị mejupụtara ya
Ihe ndị bụ isi e ji eri nri ahụ bụ matooke na ofe (anụ ehi, ghee, offal, agwa)
Katogo sitere na Buganda na ọdịda ndida Anyanwụ mba Uganda, ebe a na-ele ya anya na mbụ dị ka nri ndị dara ogbenye
Enweghị usoro oge ziri ezi banyere mgbe ndị Uganda malitere isi katogo, mana ọ bụrụhaala na matooke anọwo, katogo dịkwa
Baganda bịara na nri katogo nke bụ ngwakọta nke offal na matooke
Katogo bụ na mbụ ngwakọta nke akpụ e gburu egbu na agwa
Nke a bụ nri ndị dara ogbenye
Ndị nọ n'ọkwa dị elu, webatara matooke iji dochie akpụ na nsụgharị katogo ndị ọzọ wetara offals na ofe ọhụrụ ndị ọzọ
Mmasị nke iri katogo gbasara ngwa ngwa na Uganda niile ma ruo ugbu a enwere ọtụtụ ọdịiche nke nri a
Ọ bụ nri a na-ahụkarị n'etiti obodo ndị na-asụ asụsụ Bantu na ọtụtụ obodo ndị dị n'obodo ukwu nke Uganda
Ọ dị ugbu a n'ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ebe ana akpọ ọbia, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka nri ụtụtụ
E nwere usoro nri dị iche iche maka nri a mana nke kachasị ewu ewu bụ nke matooke bụ isi nri na ofe bụ offal a maara dị ka byenda na mba Uganda
Okwu nri maka byenda (offal) bụ tripe na sweetbreads nke bụ ihe dị n'ime afọ, thymus gland na pancreas n'otu n'otu
A na-esi matooke a na-agbucha agbucha (unere na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ) na ofe byenda (offals) ruo mgbe matooke dị njikere
A na-ejikarị akwụkwọ nri ana mmiri mkpụrụ osisi esi nri Katogo
A na-eme usoro isi nri site n'ịkpọ ofe (offal, anụ ehi, ahụekere a gwakọtara agwakọta ma ọ bụ agwa) nke a na-eme ka ọ sie ma mesịa sie ya ruo mgbe oge ruru
A na-awụnyezi ofe ahụ n'elu matoke a pịrị apị ma hapụ ya ka ọ sie ruo mgbe matooke dị njikere
Katogo na-ewe obere oge na na nkwadebe na osisi ya ma taa ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-eji nkụ ma ọ bụ icheku ọkụ dị ka ihe eji esi nri a

Ụdị dị iche iche nke nri a gụnyere ihe oriri (matooke, poteto Irish, akpụ ma ọ bụ poteto na-atọ ụtọ) nke a na-esi n'otu ite na ofe (anụ ehi, offal, agwa, peas, groundnuts ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ)
Katagum bụ obodo, ọchịchị ime obodo na obodo omenaala na steeti Bauchi nke ugwu Naijiria
Obodo a dị n'akụkụ ugwu ugwu Jama'are, nke dị n'akụkụ mmiri Hadejia
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi na ya bụ ndị Alakụba, tinyere ndị Fulani na ebo Kanuri
Ihe ndị bụ isi a na-emepụta n'ubi na-agụnye ahụekere (mkpụrụ ala), sorghum, millet, osikapa (karịsịa na fadamas nke osimiri, ma ọ bụ 'idei mmiri'), cowpeas, owu, indigo, na chịngọm arabic
Anụ ụlọ gụnyere ịnyịnya, ehi, ewu, atụrụ, ịnyịnya ibu na ọtụtụ anụ ọkụkọ
N'ime etiti-ọgwụgwụ 1820s, Bornu weghaara ọtụtụ mpaghara ahụ n'aka ndị Fulani, na-amanye ndị Katagum ịkwapụ na 1826
Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, ndị agha ebo Kanuri ha, meriri 90 mi west south-west na Fake site na njikọta ọnụ
Nchikota nke Yakubu, eze Bauchi, na Dan Kauwa, Emir Katagum (amir) na-edu, ya na ala-eze di na ndida
Laghachiri n'aka ndị Fulani, alaeze Katagum nwere ọganihu ruo n'afọ 1850, mgbe agha ha na Amir Buhari nke Hadejia dị nso belatara ha nke ukwuu
Katalọgụ (akwa akwa) bụ ụdị akwa akwa French-Canadian, nke a na-ejikwa eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka blanket, nke malitere na France, ikekwe nke mmetụta Norman, ma mesịa mepụta na Quebec
A na-akpọ ya aha otu Sieur de Catalan, onye biri na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara ewu ewu na ụwa ọhụrụ na mbido ruo n'etiti narị afọ nke itoolu

Na mbụ Nile dị ka onye isi oche, ọ na-ewu ewu na Quebec ebe akwa ọhụrụ dị obere, ịkpa akwa bụ omenala a na-ahụ na Madawaska obodo, New Brunswick, na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke New England dị ka Aroostook obodo,, Maine, ma mesịa pụta na Ontario
A na-ejikarị akwa ogho na ngwakọta nke akwa na iberibe uwe na tapestries, belata ya n'ime eriri ma tụgharịa ya tupu a kpụọ ya n'ụdị
A na-ejikarị ogho ma ọ bụ ajị anụ eme ihe ndị a, ákwà ndị dị n'oge ahụ, ma bụrụkwa omenala nke akara
Àtụ Rugs and carpets
Katchou (aha Ali Nasri) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu nke amụrụ na Eprel 15, 1963 na Batna
Ọ bụrụ abụ na Chaoui
O bipụtara ma ọ dịkarịa ala abọm asatọ, a na-ewere ndị a dị ka ndị a ma ama
Abọm Hey Demi gụnyere aha egwu ndị a
Abọm Ana Wach Edani gụnyere utu aha
Ọ nwụrụ na August 12, 2009 n'etiti Ain Touta na Batna n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ
Kate Victoria Teiba Abbam, onye amụrụ ma kpọọ Ewura Ekua Badoe (1934–2016) bụ onye nta akụkọ Ghana, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye ndụmọdụ gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe obodo
Abbam wepụtara magazin ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nke Ghana, Obaa Sima (The Ideal Woman), n'afọ 1971

A mụrụ Awura Ekuwa Badoe n'abali iri abụo na anọ n'onwa Ọktoba afọ 1934 na Cape Coast E nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ Ndị otu Kraịst, ma kpọgharịa ya Kate Victoria, na Saint Monica's Convent, Cape Coast, Mmofraturo School na Kumasi, A
Zion School na Cape Coast na Wesley Girls' High School na Cape Coast
O ritere uru agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke gọọmentị Ghana iji gụọ maka nzere na Home Science na Queen Elizabeth College na London
Ọ gụrụ General Science na Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon Ọ lụrụ Emmanuel Atta Abbam n'afọ 1964
Site na 1964 ruo 1969 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Food Research Institute, na-enyocha nri na ngwaahịa si na nri
Kate Abbam wepụtara Obaa Sima dị ka magazin kwa ọnwa n'afọ 1971
Aha ahụ, ka o mechara kọwaa n'ajụjụ ọnụ, na-nrụtụ aka na 'nwanyị na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma na-enyere obodo ya aka
a na-akpọ ụmụ nwanyị 'obaa sima' mgbe ha kwuru onwe ha site na mbọ ha - ọ bụ ngosipụta nke nwanyị ọdịnala
' Abbam bụ onye nwere ihe nke onwe, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye isi na-enye aka na magazin ahụ
Dị ka ihe atụ, e dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Beloved Twin n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1971-2
Na Julaị 1972, di Abbam nwụrụ, ma hapụrụ ya obere ụmụaka
O dere banyere mmeso ana emeso ya dị ka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ anwụ, nke ezinụlọ di ya chụpụrụ, na Obaa Sima
N'afọ 1975, e nyere ya onyinye nke United Nations iji gaa Nzukọ Ụwa nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Mexico City, na-enyocha ebe ụmụ nwanyị Ghana nọ na mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 1993, e mere ya Ezenwanyi bụ Queenmother nke Anona Clan na Ekumfi Eyisam na mpaghara etiti, na-eme ya Nana Assanwa Ewudziwa Gyampaafor II
Ọ nwụrụ na Mee 2016
Nwa nwanne ya nwanyị bụ onye edemede Adwoa Badoe
Kate Addo (amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1972) bụ onye nta akụkọ Ghana, onye mgbasa ozi n,ihu oha na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ọha na eze nke nzuko omeiwu nke Ghana
Kate addo bu nwa William Schovel Addo na Juliana Ahimah Aryee, ha abụọ bu ndị Greater Accra Region na Ghana
Ọ gara Ebenezer Senior High School n'afọ 1985, nweta asambodo ọkwa nkịtị n'afọ 1990
Ọ gara Accra High School maka asambodo ọkwa ya n'afọ 1992
Ọ garanihu ịgụ akwụkwọ na Ghana Institute of Journalism n'afọ 1996 ebe ọ nwetara diplọma nke Journalism, na 2003, na Mahadum nke Leeds, ọ nwetara MA na International Communication

N'afọ 2010, ọ nwetakwara Master of Public Administration (MPA) na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration, na 2016, nzere LLB na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration
Kate Addo lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Duo Concept Foundation, nke na-akwado ụmụaka sitere na obodo ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Kate Henshaw, ónyé ámàkwàrà dị́ka Kate Henshaw-Nuttall ámụ̀rụ̀ na 19 Julaị 1971, bụ nwááfō Naịjirịa na- eme ihe nkiri
N'áfọ̀ 2008 ó rìtèrè íhé ńríté Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye kacha gbaa mbó ígósìpụ̀tà ákpárámàgwà ánà-èlégárá ányá n'éjìjé 'stronger than pain'
Á mụ̀rụ̀ Henshaw na Cross River State, ọ́ bụ ñwá mbụ́ n’ime ụ́mụ̀ ànọ́

Kà ọ́ gụ̀chàrà akwụ́kwọ́ praịmarị na sekọ́ndị̀rị̀ na Lagos na Calabar, Naịjirịa, ọ nọ̀rọ̀ ọ́tụ̀ áfọ̀ na Mahadum Calabar na- àgú ákwụ́kwọ́ mmụ̀tá maka ezi ọ̀gwụ́gwọ́, m̀gbè émèsìrì,ò were gbákwàsá úkwū na Medical Microbiology na School of Medical Lab Science ,LUTH (Lagos University Teaching Hospital) na légōs
Henshaw rụ̀rụ̀ ọ́rụ́ na ụ́lọ̀ọ́gwụ̀ jénàra nke steeti Bauchi
Tupu ọ̀ bànyé ị́mī ihe ńkírí, Henshaw rụ̀rụ̀ ọ́rụ́ dịka mmádụ̀ ímààtụ̀, na-ègósìpụ̀tá n'ọ̀tụ́tụ́ àzụ́máhị́á nke gúnyéré ḿbípụ̀tá na ị́gbásàrà ndị shield deodrant ózí na televishonu
N'áfọ̀ 1993, Henshaw gàrà ḿnwàlé màkà ónyé ǹdú na íhé nkírí Sun sets ma nwétá ọ́rụ́ aNke a bụ mbídó ya na ñnúkwú ihe nkírí Nollyood
Henshaw èsówàpụ̀tányélá n'íhé kárị́rị́ éjìjé ìrí ànọ́ na ìsé
N’áfọ̀ 2008, ó nwètàrà íhé ńrítá Africa Movie Academy Award màkà ngósìpụ̀tà ézígbò ákpárámàgwà nlégárá ányā n'éjìjé'stronger than pain'
Á họ́pụ̀tàrà ya dịka nwanyị káchá mà bụ́rù ónyé ákpárámàgwà éjìjé ya pụ̀tàrà ìhè kárịá na 'African Movie Academy Award na 2018', na íhé ńkírí 'Roti'
ọ́ bụ̀zì “ The face of Onga ”
Henshaw bụ onye ọka íkpé na Naịjirịa Got Talent
Kate Garry Hudson (Amụrụ n'April 19, 1979) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na nwanyị ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye natara otuto dị iche iche, gụnyere Golden Globe Award, Critics' Choice Movie Award na Satellite Award, yana nhọpụta maka Academy Award, BAFTA Award, na Screen Actors Guild Awards abụọ
Hudson mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Desert Blue nke afọ 1998, nke sochiri ọrụ nkwado na 200 Cigarettes (1999), Dr
T & the Women, na Gossip (Ha abụọ n'afọ 2000)
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na mba ụwa site n'ihe ngosi ya nke Penny Lane na Cameron Crowe's Almost Famous (2000), nke o ritere Golden Globe maka Best Supporting Actress ma nata nhọpụta Oscar n'otu ụdị ahụ

N'ime afọ 2000, Hudson gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya, dị ka Alex & Emma, How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (ha abụọ 2003), You, Me and Dupree (2006), Fool's Gold, My Best Friend's Girl (Ha abụọ 2008), na Bride Wars (2009)
Na telivishọn, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke Cassandra July na usoro ihe nkiri Glee (2012 ruo ụbọchị 13]
Hudson bụ onye guzobere akara ahụike na mmemme ndị otu Fabletics, nke TechStyle Fashion Group na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 2016, Hudson wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Pretty Happy Healthy Ways to Love Your Body
Nke a sochiri n'afọ 2017 site na Pretty Fun Creating and Celebrating a Lifetime of Tradition
Katharine Jane Hudson (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na agụmakwụkwọ nke Britain bu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament (CND) na onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Left Unity
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke CND site na-afo 2003 ruo 2010 ma bụrụ onye ọrụ nke Stop the War Coalition kemgbe 2002
Ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Social and Policy Studies na London South Bank University site na Septemba 2003 ruo 2010 ma ugbu a ọ bụrụ onye na-eme nchọpụta nleta

Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Contemporary Politics, na-eje ozi na kọmitii nchịkọta akụkọ nke Debatte Journal of Contemporary Central and Eastern Europe ma bụrụ onye otu Board nke Barry Amiel na Norman Melburn Trust

Ọ bụkwa onye otu Editorial Board nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ nke aka ekpe, Transform, nke e hiwere n'oge owuwe ihe ubi 2017, ma jikokwa ya na European transform!network, ntọala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke European Left Party
Hudson bukwa onye otu Communist Party nke Britain ruo n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2012, ọ sonyeere Respect Party na-esote mmeri Bradford West nke pati ahụ

A họpụtara Hudson dị ka onye na-asọpụrụ maka ntuli aka Manchester Central nke afọ 2012 mana o mechara kwụsị iji mee mkpesa na 'okwu ndị a na-anabataghị na ndị a na'agbanyeghi banyere ọdịdị ndina n'ókè ' nke naanị onye omeiwu nke pati ahụ, George Galloway mere
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ọrụ dịka onye otu Respect na 15 Ọktoba 2012
Na March 2013, ọ sonyeere onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ken Loach na Gilbert Achcar, Prọfesọ nke Ọmụmụ Mmepe na School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), Mahadum London, na oku maka otu ọhụrụ aka ekpe
Hudson edeela na ihe karịrị 2,000 nyere nkwado ha maka mkpọsa ahụ n'ime ụbọchị atọ nke mmalite ya
Mgbasa ozi ahụ guzobere otu Left Unity na Nọvemba 2013, a họpụtakwara Hudson ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mba nke nzukọ ahụ na nnọkọ iwu mbụ ya na 29 March 2014
N'ịbụ onye na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ mba ruo afọ atọ, oge kachasị mma, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke pati ahụ na March 2017
N'afọ ndị 1990, Kate Hudson zutere ma lụọ Redmond O'Neill, (1954ī2009) onye na-eme ihe na Socialist Action na onye ndụmọdụ Ken Livingstone
N'afọ 2012, Hudson lụrụ Andrew Burgin, onye ọrụ nke Stop the War Coalition na odeakwụkwọ nke otu mba na-emegide mgbochi, Coalition of Resistance
Hudson na-arụkwa ọrụ na Greek Solidarity Campaign na Venezuela Solidarity

Catherine McLean nke a maara dị ka Kate McLean ma mesịa bụrụ Kate Beaton (6 Jenụwarị 1879 - 21 Ọktoba 1960) bụ onye otu ndị ahịa Britain na onye ndụmọdụ na Glasgow Ọ duru National Federation of Women Workers (NFWW) na ọtụtụ esemokwu gụnyere ndị ọrụ netwọk ọnwa isii na-egbu na Kilbirnie na 1913
A mụrụ McLean na Glasgow na 1879

Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii ọ gara akwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ Ọ malitere mkpakọrịta ya na ihe ndị na-akpata socialist mgbe ọ sonyere na Njikọ Ndị Ọrụ Ụmụ nwanyị N'afọ sochirinụ ọ nọ na National Federation of Women Workers (NFWW) Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya ha na Glasgow Trades Council dị mkpa
N'afọ 1911 ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii mbụ gara Scottish Trades Union Congress na Dundee dị ka ndị nnọchiteanya (karịa ndị nwunye)
[citation needed] Ọ sonyeere STUC ruo n'afọ 1914 mgbe ọ lụrụ di

Ndị ọrụ eriri owu nke Neilston gburu na 25 Mee 1910 na McLean na Esther Dick debanyere ndị na-eti ihe ngwa ngwa na NFWW Mgbasa ahụ toro ka ndị na-ewe ọrụ na-achọghị ịgwa ndị NFWW okwu na ka ọ na-erule June ọ bụ mkpọchi-apụ na narị narị ndị ọhụrụ (na-egbu egbu) NFWW Ọgbụgba ọrụ a dị mkpa n'ihi na ọ bụ nke mbụ ndị ọrụ ahụ hapụrụ ndị ọrụ nna na-arụrụ ọrụ gaa n'otu iji kwado ha

O tinyere aka ọzọ mgbe NFWW kwadoro iku 1911 na Vale of Leven dyeworks na United Turkey Red Company Nke a bụ nnukwu esemokwu maka ụlọ ọrụ Alexandria a na enwere ụfọdụ ime ihe ike Ndị NFWW na-arụsi ọrụ ike ebe ahụ mana ha dọtara ọtụtụ ndị otu ọzọ Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị, ha nwere ndị otu 600 na ka ọ na-erule February 1911 enwere 2,000 Amụma NFWW bụ ịgbalị ka ndị otu ọhụrụ a banye n'otu ndị dị adị ebe a ga-anabata ha Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu ndị a kwere ka NFWW tinye nrụgide na National Amalgamated Society of Dyers, Bleachers, Finishers na Kindred Trade na ndị inyom nabatara dị ka ndị òtù
Ọ bụkwa onye ndú na 1913 networkers' strike na Kilbirnie nke e kwekọrịtara na nzukọ NFWW na ngwụcha MachịE doziri esemokwu ndị na-ahụ maka netwọk na 2 Septemba 1913

McLean kwuru okwu mmechi wee kwuo na ọ bụ ndị otu ahụ ka mma maka ụgwọ ọrụ na ọnọdụ ọrụnke a kwadoro na nzukọ NFWW na ngwụcha March Ọ dịgidere site na Eprel ruo Septemba 1913 ma ọ bụ ọrụ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị kacha ogologo edekọ n'oge ahụ Ọgba aghara ahụ nwere nkwado obodo na n'ọnwa Mee enwere nzukọ na Kilbirnie ebe ndị na-akwado 10,000 bịara NFWW nabatara nlebara anya na McLean debanyere ndị otu ọhụrụ 200 na ụlọ ọrụ dynamite Nobel dị nso na Ardeer, North Ayrshire Edoziri esemokwu ndị netwọk ahụ na 2 Septemba 1913
McLean kwuru okwu mmechi ahụ wee kwuo na ọ bụ otu ahụ kwalitere ụgwọ ọrụ na ọnọdụ ọrụ
Ọ lụrụ na 1914 ma ọ bụ dịka Kate Beaton ka a họpụtara ya n'enweghị mmegide maka ngalaba Hutchisontown dịka onye kansụl Glasgow Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwá ahụ ruo 1949 mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ahụ
McLean nwụrụ na afọ 1960 na obodo Glasgow
Kate Normington bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-ede egwu na South Africa

Normington bu ụzọ bụrụ onye ama ama na mba na-egwu Sister Mary Amnesia na mmepụta Alhambra Theatre nke Nunsense n'afọ 1987, ma gosipụta na West End na South Africa, yana na ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke obodo na nke mba ụwa
Normington tolitere na Johannesburg, South Africa ma gaa Pretoria Girls' High School na Marist Brothers Observatory (Sacred Heart College)
Ọ gụrụ Speech na Drama na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1987

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dịka onye na-agụ egwú cabaret na Piaf na Johannesburg (n'akụkụ Didi Kriel), ọrụ ọkachamara mbụ Normington rụrụ bụ na Tarts, nke Kevin Feather, na La Parisienne Theatre na Johannesburg

Nke a sochiri ọrụ ọganihu ya na-arụ na Sister Mary Amnesia na mmepụta Tobie Cronje nke Nunsense na Alhambra Theatre n'afọ 1987, nke nwetara Normington Fleur du Cap Award mbụ ya maka Best Actress in a Musical

Ọ sochiri ihe ịga nke ọma a na Trilogy nke '87 na Durban Playhouse, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ atọ dịka Joanna na Sweeney Todd, Niki na Sweet Charity, ma gosikwa na Candide, na okirikiri nke a na-eme ihe atọ ahụ n'otu ụbọchị, otu n'otu
N'afọ 1989, a họpụtara Normington dịka Guinevere na mmepụta nke State Theatre nke Camelot, nke Gaynor Young na-amụchaghị

Mmepụta ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama mgbe, na-anọchi Normington na Disemba, Young dara n'elu oghere na-enweghị nchebe mgbe ọ nọ n'elu nkwago, na-ada n'elu okpukpu ise n'okpuru ma na-abanye n'ọnọdụ coma ruo izu ise

N'ime ngwụcha '80s na mmalite '90s, Normington nọ n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na-aga nke ọma na nke dị elu na South Africa, gụnyere igwu Josephine na Romance Romance, Eliza na My Fair Lady n'afọ 1990, na Janet na The Rocky Horror Show n'afọ 1993; na-apụta na A Touch of Webber
Nri Osikapa, ihe ngosi mbụ nke Richard Loring, n'afọ 1991; na igwu Sheila na mmepụta nke Janice Honeyman nke Hair, otu n'ime ndị mbụ na South Africa mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, na Civic Theatre n'afọ 1994
N'afọ 1993, Normington gara England iji chụsoo ọrụ ya na mba ụwa
Ọrụ mbụ ya na London bụ na mmepụta West End nke Sunset Boulevard na mbido mbụ ya n'afọ 1993, nke gosipụtara Patti LuPone dịka Norma Desmond, nke Normington na-amụ ọrụ Betty Schaefer
Mgbe o zutere nsogbu paspọtụ, a manyere ya ịlaghachi n'ụlọ South Africa, na-apụta na Tell Me On A Sunday n'afọ 1994, tupu ya enwee ike ịlaghachi England

Mgbe ọ laghachiri, Normington laghachiri na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Sunset Boulevard na Adelphi Theatre, na-amụ Betty Buckley, Elaine Paige, na Petula Clark maka ọrụ Norma Desmond, na-apụta na ọrụ ahụ n'otu oge

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Sunset Boulevard, Normington pụtara na mmepụta mpaghara nke Aspects of Love na Hampshire n'afọ 1996, na-egwu Rose Vibert, wee kpọọ Baker's Wife na Into the Woods na Leicester n'afọ 1997
N'afọ 1998, Normington laghachiri West End dịka Grace Farrell na mweghachi nke Annie na Victoria Palace, na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ gara njem na Febụwarị 1999
Ọ gara njem na ihe ngosi ahụ ruo ihe karịrị otu afọ ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na Oxford n'afọ 2000, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ laghachiri South Africa
Normington apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'oge ọrụ ya, malite na 1991's The Sheltering Desert, ebe ọ pụtara ya na Gavin Hood na Rupert Graves, nke Brendan Pollecutt's Hey Boy sochiri n'afọ 2003
Ọ pụtakwara na mkpirikpi sitere na NFVN, nke akpọrọ The Last Doorman, yana ime ihe nkiri na Angus Buchan's Ordinary People n'afọ 2006
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Normington pụtara na ihe nkiri Netflix The Last Days of American Crime, nke Edgar Ramirez gosipụtara
Normington enwekwara ọrụ telivishọn dị ogologo ma dịgasị iche iche, na-apụta n'ọtụtụ mmemme South Africa a ma ama, dịka Scandal, Shado's, Hard Copy, 7de Laan, The Lab, Backstage, na The Res

Ọ natara nhọpụta SAFTA maka ọrụ ya na Tim Greene's Those Who Can't n'afọ 2017, ma kpọọ Pam Henshaw na SABC 3's High Rollers N'afọ 2017, ọ nwetara otuto dị egwu maka mpụta ya na Julia Anastosopoulos's Tali's Wedding Diary, dịka Michelle, nne onye isi
Normington pụtakwara na ihe omume atọ nke MNet's Still Breathing n'akụkụ Siv Ngesi, Michael Richard, na Dorothy Ann Gould
Normington ewepụtakwala abọm abụọ, Mother's Daughter - nke o dere egwu isii - na ndekọ nke Tell Me On a Sunday, ihe mbụ nke Andrew Lloyd Webber's Song and Dance

Ọ meriri nrite ọla edo na asọmpi West Africa na 2001, nrite ọla ọcha na 2003 All-Africa Games, Ọ gwụchara n'ọkwa ise na asọmpi 2006 Africa ma nwetakwa nrite ọla ọcha na mgbagharị 4 × 400 mita na ebe ahụ

Ọ kụziri dị ka onye nkuzi enyemaka na Metuh Secondary School Onitsha na afọ 1980 rue na afọ 1981 tupu ọ banye na College of Education, Nsugbe (nke bụzi Nwafor-Orizu College of Education)

E mere ya Kọmishọna, Ministri nke Mmụta site na afọ 2014 rue na afọ 2018, Anambra Steeti ma ghọọ Kọmishọna nke Mmụta Isi site na afọ 2014 ruo ugbu a n'otu Steeti ahụ

Katherine Maree Otten, nke a na-akpọkarị Kate Otten, (amụrụ na 28 Machị 1964, Durban) bụ onye South African na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ọdịnala South Africa ya
A mụrụ ya na Durban, Kate Otten gara Roedean School na Johannesburg, nke ọ banyere na 1981
Ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, wee gụsịa akwụkwọ na 1987
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ, Otten guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya n'afọ 1989 na Johannesburg, mgbe otu afọ gachara

O mepụtara ọbá akwụkwọ obodo, mmepe mmiri na Tzaneen, ụlọ ọgwụgwọ nka na Soweto na oghere ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụlọ mkpọrọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Constitution Hill nke natara otuto site na South African Institute of Architects (SAIA)
Kate enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke gụnyere SAIA Award nke Merit House Staude na 1998 na Mbokodo Awards Architecture and Creative Design na 2013
Kate Florence Spurrell (March 1886 - c1968) bụ onye otu ọrụ aka na Britain na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A Amụrụ na Devonport, Devon, England, Spurrell ghọrọ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Plymouth wee sonye na Liberal Party na National Union of Teachers (NUT)
A họpụtara ya ịbụ onye isi nke NUT, wee jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche ya na 1922
ILP jikọtara ya na Labour Party, na na ntuli aka izugbe nke 1924, Spurrell guzoro na Totnes maka Labour, mana were naanị 61% nke votu ahụ
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1929, mgbe ọ mụbara òkè vootu ya ruo 129%
N'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya na ILP's National Administrative Council (NAC), na-anọchite anya South West England
Maka ntuli aka izugbe nke 1931, ndị Camborne Constituency Labour Party họpụtara Spurrell dị ka onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi ha
Ndị ILP kwadoro ya, mana onye isi mba Labour Party jụrụ ịkwado ya
N'agbanyeghị nke a, o were 245% nke votu na ebe atọ siri ike
O guzoro ọzọ na ntuli aka izugbe nke 1935, mana n'oge a megidere onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party, wee were naanị 19% nke votu ahụ
Spurrell tụfuru oche ya na ILP's NAC na 1938, mana ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nnọkọ ahụ n'ime 1950s

Kate Yeo (amụrụ n'afọ 2001) bụ onye na-eme ngagharị iwe maka ihu igwe na Singapore
N'afọ 2018, Kate malitere mkpọsa BYO Bottle SG iji kwado megide plastik a na-eji otu ugboro eme ihe na Singapore
Omume a arụwo ọrụ na ụlọ mmanya pụkụ abụọ na ịrị atọ na otu ma rute ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ pụkụ ịrị
O nwetakwara ihe nrite nke abụọ na Goi Peace Foundation International Essay Contest for Young People maka edemede ya akpọrọ 'Agha megide mmetọ plastik'
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahazi We The Planet climate strikes maka Earth Day 2020
Mgbe ahụ, o guzobere Re-Earth Initiative, otu NGO nke ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi na mba ụwa na-agba mbọ ime ka onye ọ bụla nwee ike ịnweta usoro ihu igwe
O nyekwara aka ịhazi Virtual Youth Environment Assembly, nke UN
Environmental Programme haziri

Kate ekwuola okwu nke ọma banyere mkpa ọ dị itinye ndị ntorobịa ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia n'ime mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'oge ọrịa a, Kate malitere atụmatụ iji kwado ndị na-ere ahịa na Singapore

Katharina Kohse-Höinghaus (amụrụ na 18 Disemba 1951) bụ onye Germani na-emepụta kemịkal
Kohse-Höinghaus gụrụ Chemistry na Mahadum Ruhr Bochum site na afo 1970 ruo na afo 1975
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctorate ya na Mahadum Ruhr Bochum na 1978 na ebe obibi ya na Machịum Stuttgart na 1992
Kemgbe afọ 1994, ọ bụ prọfesọ maka kemịkalụ anụ ahụ na Mahadum Bielefeld
O guzobere otu n'ime ụlọ nyocha mbụ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ

Katherine Davis Chapman Tillman (February 19, 1870 - November 29, 1923) bụ onye edemede America
A mụrụ Katherine Davis Chapman na Mound City, Illinois, nwa nwanyị nke Laura na Charles Chapman
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Yankton, South Dakota mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri na abụọ; nna ya zụlitere nkịta na-achụ nta na Yankton
Ọ gara Mahadum Steeti nke Kentucky (nke a na-akpọ Simmons College of Kentucky) na Mahadum Wilberforce
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Chapman malitere ide uri na ide akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Uri mbụ ya, 'Memory', pụtara na 1888, na The Christian Recorder
N'afọ ahụ, o bipụtara usoro isiokwu na The Christian Recorder na American Baptist nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama

Ọ bụkwa onye nyere aka na mbiputa magazin, Our Women and Children na Indianapolis Freeman Ọ na-edekwa akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, uri, edemede, na egwuregwu, ma na-enyekwa aka ugboro ugboro na magazin okpukpe dịka A
Church Review nke mba ahụ kesara
O dere ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme, Thirty Years of Freedom (1902) na Fifty Years of Freedom (afọ 1910)
E bipụtara akwụkwọ uri ya, Recitations, na 1902
Isiokwu ya na-abụkarị ozi na-akwalite, ọkachasị maka ụmụ agbọghọ ojii, dịka na agbamume a sitere na 'Afro-American Women and their Work' (1895)

A na-ebo anyị ebubo na anyị bụ ndị isi na-adịghị mma; ugbu a, ọ bụrụ na anyị nwere ike igosi na site na obi na ụbụrụ a zụlitere, anyị nwere ike ime otu ihe ahụ nke ụmụnne anyị nwanyị mara mma nke agbụrụ Caucasian rụzuru, ihe mere, anyị agbaghaala ụgha ahụ
Dị ka nwunye onye ụkọchukwu, ọ biri na steeti dị iche iche, kụzie, ma soro ìgwè ụmụ nwanyị chọọchị na òtù ndị ozi ala ọzọ rụọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nke National Association of Colored Women's Clubs na 1910s
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, a họpụtara Katherine D
Tillman ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi mgbasa ozi maka National Association of Negro Women's Clubs, iji mee ka ọrụ agha nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America, na Red Cross ma ọ bụ na ikike ndị ọzọ pụta ìhè
Kate Chapman lụrụ Rev
George M
Tillman na 1894
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị, Dorothy
Tillman dara ọrịa ma nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe ọ na-aga Nzukọ nke asatọ nke Women's Parent Mite Missionary Society nke African Methodist Episcopal Church, nke e mere na Brooklyn n'October 3 , 1923
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị ekele (November 29) na 1923
N'afọ 1960 na 1970 e nwere Katherine D
Tillman Missionary Society na Betel A
Church na Leavenworth, Kansas, aha ya bụ ncheta ya
Katherine Obiang bụ onye Cameroon - Naijiria onye na- eme ihe nkiri onye na emepụta Ihe n'ikuku na onye ngosi TV
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eweta ihe onyonyo maka Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) na AM Express ya na Nigeria Info 993fm
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Katherine malitere ime ihe nkiri ma mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Nollywood na usoro TV
O gosipụtara na ihe nkiri 2017, The Women wee nweta 2017 Best of Nollywood Awards maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma n'akụkụ Kate Henshaw na Omoni Oboli
O gosiputana n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na fim ndị dị ka Lekki Wives, We dont Live here Anymore na Journey to Self n'etiti ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Katherine na Mee 17
Nna ya si Cameroun ebe nne ya si Naijiria
Katherine Obiang lụrụ Who Wants to be a Millionnaire (Nigerian ihe egwuregwu) onye nnabata Frank Edoho
Ha abụọ lụrụ we nnọọ afọ 7 nwere ụmụ atọ, ha kewapụrụ na 2011 alụmdi na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị na 2013 n'ihi iwe ọjọọ Frank Edoho na ime ihe ike n'ụlọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Frank gọrọ n'ihu ọha na ọ dịghị eti nwunye ya mbụ (Katherine Obiang) ihe na Twitter mgbe onye ọrụ boro ya ebubo ime ihe ike n'ụlọ
Frank gara n'ihu na atụmatụ alụmdi na nwunye ọhụrụ ya na onye ọlụlụ ọhụrụ, Sandra Onyenucheya, ha lụrụ na 2014
Katherine bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emere ọha ihe nkiri, onye na-ekwuokwu na-ikuku, na onye na-egosi ihe na TV
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eweta ihe onyonyo maka Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) na AM Express (ihe ngosi ụtụtụ) na Naijiria Info 993FM
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri 2012, Journey to Self, nke Tope Oshin duziri
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood na usoro TV
Kate Adebola Okikiolu (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye Britain na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ndị na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche na-arụ yana ọrụ ya na ụmụaka nó n'ime obodo
A mụrụ Okikiolu na 1965 na England
Nna ya bụ George Olatokunbo Okikiolu, onye na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na Naijịrịa ma ama na onye na-ede mgbakọ na mwepụta ojii kachasị ebipụta na ndekọ
Nne ya bụ onye Britain bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Okikiolu nwetara nzere BA
na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Cambridge n'afọ 1987
N'afọ 1991, ọ nwetara PhD
ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum California na Los Angeles, maka edemede ya The Analogue of the Strong Szego Limit Theorem on the Torus and the 3-Sphere
Dabere na ọrụ PhD ya, Okikiolu doziri conjecture nke Peter Wilcox Jones banyere mbipụta na-aga n'ihu nke nsogbu onye na-ere ahịa na-agagharị agagharị
na akwụkwọ ya Characterization of subsets of rectifiable curves in Rn
Okikiolu bụ onye nkuzi ma mesịa bụrụ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Princeton site na 1993 ruo 1995
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nleta na Massachusetts Institute of Technology wee sonye na ngalaba na-Mahadum California na San Diego na 1995
N'afọ 2011 ọ̀ sonyeere Ngalaba mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Johns Hopkins

Ọ bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na nzukọ 1996 nke Association of Women in Mathematics Ọ̀ kwukwara okwu Claytor-Woodard na nzukọ 2002 nke National Association of Mathematicians, otu nzukọ maka ndị African-American mathematicians
N'afọ 1997, Okikiolu meriri Sloan Research Fellowship, na-aghọ onye isi ojii mbụ natara mkpakọrịta a

N'afọ 1997, e nyekwara ya ihe nrite Presidential Early Career Award maka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia maka nyocha mgbakọ na mwepụ ya na mmepe nke usoro mgbakọ na mwepụta maka ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ime obodo
A na-enye naanị ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia 60 onyinye a kwa afọ ma nwee ihe nrite nke $ 500,000
Kathleen Annie Lansdell (afọ 1888 Durban rụọ úbọchị àtó n'ọnwa Eprel 1967 Pietermaritzburg), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa
Ọ zụrụ nà Government Art School na Durban nakwa nà Royal College of Art na South Kensington
Ọ malitere ọrụ na Natal Herbarium, nke dị n'ala nke Durban Botanic Gardens, n'ihe dị ka afọ 1915, na-anọchi Millicent Franks onye hapụrụ na Nọvemba 1914
O tinyere aka n'ịkwadebe ihe osise maka Mpịakọta nke asaa nke John Medley Wood's Natal Plants, mpịakọta na-ezughị ezu ma ghara ibipụta ya n'ihi ọnwụ ya n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1915
Ụfọdụ n'ime efere ndị ahụ na-acha mmiri ma ka na-anọdụ na Natal Herbarium
Mgbe 1917 gasịrị, ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ ógè ya na Division of Botany and Plant Pathology na Pretoria, ọrụ ya n'ebe ahụ bụ akụkụ dị ukwuu nke mkpali màkà mbipụta nke Flowering Plants of South Africa
O mepụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ bụrụ ibu nkè efere màkà mpịakọta mbụ e bipụtara, na mpịakọ irí àtó nà isé nke afọ 1962 raara ya nye
Mgbè ọ làrà ezumike nká, ọ gàrà bírí na Durban ma gaa n'ihu na-ese ihe osise Natal, ọbá akwụkwọ Killie Campbell natara akwụkwọ irí asaá na isii nke ihe osise ya na 1962

Kathleen Deery de Phelps, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Kathy Phelps (Sydney, 22 Nọvemba 1908 - Caracas, Venezuela, 21 Ọgọst 2001) bụ onye Australia a mụrụ Venezuelan na-eme nchọpụta, onye na-anakọta na onye na-echekwa ihe
A mụrụ ya na Sydney nye Arthur Deery na Agnes Thorne
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị elu na United States
N'afọ 1940, ọ bịara Venezuela wee ghọọ nwa amaala Venezuela n'afọ 1941 site n'alụmdi na nwunye ya na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nnụnụ na onye ọchụnta ego William H
Phelps Jr
Ya na di ya sonyere n'ọtụtụ njem iji nyochaa ụmụ anụmanụ na osisi nke Venezuela
Ya na Carmen de Phister, hiwere Association of Girl Scouts of Venezuela (AGSV) n'ụbọchị 26 Juun n'afọ 1958
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Red Cross nke Venezuela
O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ dabere na ahụmịhe ya
Ọ chịkwara Phelps Collection, nke a na-ewere dị ka nchịkọta nnụnụ kachasị ukwuu na Latin America, nke nwere ihe karịrị nnụnụ 80,000 na ábụ́bà, 1,000 echekwara na mmanya na ọkpụkpụ 1,500
Ọ natara nzere doctorate na Mahadum Yacambú dị na Barquisimeto
Ọ lụrụ Robert Bottome, ma mụọ ụmụ abụọ site na ya, Robert Bottoma Deery na Peter Bottome Deery
Ọ lụrụ William H
Phelps Jr
n'ụbọchị 4 Febrụwarị n'afọ 1941

FtKathleen Innes (15 Jenụwarị 1883 na 27 Machị 1967) bụ onye Quaker nke Britain, onye nkuzi, onye edemede na onye na-ahụ maka udo, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke isi ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa maka Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) site n' afọ 1937 ruo n'afọ 1946
A mụrụ Kathleen Elizabeth Royds na ụbọchị iri na ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1883 na Reading, Berkshire, England na Sarah Anne (née Spicer) na William Alexander Slater Royds
Ezinụlọ ya bụ Quakers na nna ya bụ dọkịta
Nna ya, Reverend Thomas Royds, bụ onye nnọchi anya nke nna nna ya, Thomas Royds nke Greenhill, onye nwetara akụ na ụba ya site na ụlọ ọrụ owuwe ihe ubi Lancashire
N'afọ 1895, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara St Mary Bourne, obodo dị na Hampshire nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ Roman na Saxon, nke kpaliri mmasị ya na-eto eto n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Nne ya, Sarah, tinyere aka na ọrụ nke ụka na ụmụnne ya isii niile na-aga ozi mahadum
Dị ka nwa nwanyị Royds nwere ọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ, na-agụrụ akwụkwọ, na mahadum, ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya
Royds malitere ịkụzi na Wycombe House School na Brondesbury n'afọ 1910

N'ịchọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ nke ya ma bụrụ onye a machibidoro inweta akara ugo mmụta n'ihi mmachi Cambridge na ụmụ nwanyị, ọ debanyere aha na Cresham College iji kwadebe maka ule nke Mahadum London

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị semester anọ, nke William Henry Hudson lekọtara, ọ nwetara diplọma chancellor na akwụkwọ site na Mahadum London ma dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu na klas ya natara ma Gilchrist Medal na Churton Collins Memorial Prize
N'afọ 1911, o bipụtara akụkọ ndụ na nyocha dị oke egwu nke Samuel Taylor Coleridge, Coleridge na His Poetry
N'afọ sochirinụ, o bipụtara ọgwụgwọ yiri nke Elizabeth Barrett Browning, Elizabeth Barrett, Elizabeth Barettett Browning & Her, onye na-enyere ya aka maka ọrụ Henry Hudson, onye nkuzi ya aka

Mgbe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ ma na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, Royds gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe ya na 1912, mgbe ọ nwesịrị ule awa iri atọ na isii na akwụkwọ na asụsụ Bekee na German, ọ nwetara nzere BA ya na klas nke abụọ na asụsụ nke oge a
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Royds malitere ịkụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị dị na Andover, Hampstead, Hendon, na Highfield, yana Jersey Ladies College
N'afọ 1914, mgbe ọ nọ ezumike na Germany, Agha Ụwa Mbụ malitere ma o siri ike gbapụ n'azụ ndị iro site na Denmark iji laghachi England na ọkwa ya na Wycombe School
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke kọrọ nkọwa nke njem ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya
N'afọ 1915, Royds hapụrụ ọrụ nkuzi ya iji nyere aka n'iwepụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Serbia

Ya na ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo si n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụ nwanyị Scotland maka ọrụ mba ọzọ (SWH) na-aga Salonika, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka iwu; Otú ọ dị, a kpọgara ya ngwa ngwa n'ọkwa onye ụkọchukwu n'ihi nkà ya na French na German
Ọ mụkwara asụsụ Serbian, bụrụ ihe dị oké mkpa na otu ya n'ihi ikike ya nwere ọtụtụ asụsụ, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-aga n'etiti ya na ndị ọrụ SWH na Serbian Relief Fund (SRF)
Na ngwụcha afọ 1916, Royds kpebiri ịghara ịbanye na SWH
Kama nke ahụ, ya na SRF mere nkwekọrịta kpọmkwem ma zigara ya n'otu obere ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Ucciani, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1917
O dere banyere ahụmịhe ya n'ịkwaga ndị Serbia na Corsica n'otu edemede, Ya na ndị Serbia nọ na Corsica nke e bipụtara na mbụ na The Contemporary ma bipụtaghachi ya na Maclean's Magazine na Canada
Ọrụ enyemaka ọzọ ọ sonyere na ya bụ nchịkọta nke ara rọba maka inye nwa ọhụrụ nri ka a ga-eziga na Germany
Maka ọrụ enyemaka ya, e nyere ya Order of St
Sava site na Serbia
Mgbe ọ laghachiri England, Royds nwetara ọrụ na Birmingham, mana ọ nọrọ naanị ruo na Mee 1918 mgbe a na-enye ya ọrụ oge niile na London
N'ihi ọrịa nna ya na ọnwụ na-esote, ọ pụghị iso ndị British Relief gaa Serbia

Agha ahụ mere ka ọ banye na pacifism, Royds sonyeere Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) na League of Union Union (LNU) Ọ sonyeere ọnwa ole na ole na ole nke Union Union Union Union
N'afọ 1921, Royds lụrụ George Alexander Innes, onye ọrụ enyemaka ibe ya ọ zutere na Salonika
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị na 1922, di na nwunye ahụ kwagara Lewes na Sussex, ebe George rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mmekọ na ụlọ ọrụ injinia
Innes gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka odeakwụkwọ London nke WIPF, mana nzukọ ahụ mere ya onye otu bọọdụ iji gbochie ya ịla n'iyi, na-achọ njem kwa ọnwa na London
N'afọ 1924, mgbe mmekọrịta ya kwụsịrị, di na nwunye ahụ laghachiri London
N'afọ 1920, Innes na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịkwalite udo, na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ezo aka maka Njikọ Mba, na Board nke London isi nke WILPF, na dị ka ode odeakwụkwọ nke Society of Friends's Peace Committee
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ebipụta ọrụ, ọ bụ site na Njikọ Ọrụ nke Njikọ Ụwa (1926), N'ihu na mmalite nke Njikọta Mba (192 na-akwado ya, gụnyere N'Onye Ọrụ (1926), N (W
N'afọ 1927, a họpụtara Innes ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisi oche nke London WILPF ma nọgide na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo n'afọ, 1934,
mgbe ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche
N'otu oge ahụ, site na 1926 ruo 1936, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Kọmitii Udo nke Society of Friends
N'afọ 1937, ọ nọchiri Cornelia Ramondt-Hirschmann dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi oche atọ jikọtara aka nke mba ụwa WILPF wee rụọ ọrụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ya na Gertrude Baer na Clara Ragazaker

Nnyocha ndị ahụ bụ nke akwụkwọ nke na-ekwu maka isiokwu mba ụwa na òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, gụnyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke udo na òtù nhọpụta; akụkọ ndụ nke Gandhi, Florence Nightingale, Alfred Nobel na ndị ọzọ; na akụkọ njem, dị ka Through the Caucasus to the Volga nke Fridtjof Nansen
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ gara England niile na-ekwu okwu na-enye nkuzi na-agbaso omume ụmụ nwanyị niile nwere ike ikwere na-agbasi mbọ ike ime ka ndụ
N'iburu n'uche oge ahụ, echiche ndị na-emegide nkewa nke Innes bụ ihe siri ike, mana ọ kwadoro ikike ndị Afrịka nwere 'n'ụzọ ezi uche' ịchị onwe ha

O bipụtara Peacemaking in Africa (1932), nke kwuru maka onye nke atọ na-enweghị mmasị iji nyere aka idozi esemokwu ma gosipụta na ihe a na-akpọ 'mba ndị mepere emepe' nyere ndị Afrịka ngwá agha, nke mere ka ha lụọ agha
N'oge Blitz, Innes laghachiri Hampshire ma na-arụ ọrụ na London WILPF site n'ụlọ ya
Ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ide akụkọ ihe mere eme,
Innes nwụrụ na 27 Machị 1967 site na ọrịa kansa eriri afọ na Andover, Hampshire, England
A nọgidere na-ebipụtaghachi ụfọdụ n'ime nkatọ edemede ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na Hampshire n'ime afọ 1980
