Bernardo malitere ime ihe na 2003, pụtara dị ka Cielo na-eto eto na ABS-CBN Ọ Pụrụ Ịbụ Gị
Na 2006, ọ rutere ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro TV Super Ingo na-egwu Maya, mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye isi
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche na ihe ngosi ABS-CBN ndị ọzọ dị ka Krystala na Vietnam Rose tupu ọ daa ebe na-adịgide adịgide na ihe nkiri Kiddie hit Goin 'Bulilit
Na 2010, Bernardo nwetara ọrụ dị egwu, nke mbụ bụ Victoria na-eto eto na ABS-CBN's Magkaribal na Jenny na-eto eto na GMA's Loveless Love
Ọ dabara na, ha abụọ ewepụtara na June 28, 2010
Ọrụ ọganihu Bernardo bụ ya dị ka Mara David/Mara Del Valle na mmegharị ihe nkiri telivishọn 1992 Mara Clara ya na onye otu ya na enyi ya kacha mma bụ Julia Montes
Kemgbe mmalite ya, usoro ihe onyonyo a ka bụ onye ndu na-agbanwe agbanwe na ọkwa izizi
N'ịkwado ihe ịga nke ọma ya, a họpụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na 2011 Banff World Media Festival 's 'Telenovelas & Soap Operas' Atiya ma gosi ọdịnihu Bernardo dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama
Mgbe primetime teleserye kwụsịrị, Bernardo malitere ịpụta n'ehihie Sunday na-egosi na- eto eto
Mmekọrịta ya na Julia Montes, ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara kpakpando ndị ọzọ na-abịa ABS-CBN dị ka Kiray Celis, Diego Loyzaga na Daniel Padilla
Na ihe nkiri ahụ, Bernardo rụrụ ọrụ nke Ella dị afọ 15 bụ onye ya na nne ya nanị ya na-azụ ụmụ bi
Ihe ngosi a gosipụtara nke ọma, n'ogo na ọnụọgụ 2 n'ozuzu ya na ngọngọ ehihie nke ihie onyonyo primetime
Ọrụ ihe nkiri Bernardo malitere na 2004 na ihe nkiri Gagamboy
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ nanị na 2011 mgbe ya, ya na Mara Clara co-star Julia Montes, nwetara ọrụ ndu na fim Way Back Home
N'otu afọ ahụ, Bernardo gụnyere na Regal Film's Metro Manila Film Festival ntinye Shake, Rattle & Roll 13
Bernardo weghaara ụdị egwu site na ikụnye otu n'ime ọrụ ndị isi nke akụkọ nke abụọ nke ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Parola
Ọrụ ya nwetara nyocha dị mma
Na ntụle maka ClickTheCitycom, Philbert Dy toro omume Bernardo “Arụmọrụ dị egwu sitere na Kathryn Bernardo jikọtara ha niile
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ otu n'ime ihe kacha mma si na Shake Rattle and Roll pụta'
Bernardo gbara egwu na Princess na m, usoro ihe nkiri ịhụnanya / ihe nkiri royalty-themed, na-esote ihe ịga nke ọma na- eto eto

Site na nkedo nke Daniel Padilla gbara n'akụkụ dị ka Gino Dela Rosa, Enrique Gil dị ka Prince Jao na Bernardo dị ka Mikay/Princess Areeyah, teleserye na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe kachasị mma, bụ ihe ngosi Philippine mbụ a ga-agba na Bhutan
Ewezuga Padilla na Gil dị ka ndị isi Bernardo na ihe nkiri ahụ, Pilipinas Got Talent Season 3 onye bụbu onye asọmpi Khalil Ramos na-akpọ Mikay hụrụ n'anya na ezigbo enyi Kiko
Ndị omekome ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Gretchen Barretto na Albert Martinez sonyeere nkedo nke kpakpando
Ihe ngosi a nwetara ọkwa na nlebanya na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya dị ka ihe ngosi mbụ mbụ na Septemba 2012, na-emepekwu ọnụ ụzọ maka ọrụ na-egbuke egbuke nke Bernardo

N'August 2013, ya na Daniel Padilla na-akpọsa usoro telivishọn ọzọ Ga-ekweta na nke Bernardo na-egwu Chichay Tampipi, nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ụma nke na-ejikọta ya na enyi ya bụ nwata bụ Joaquin Manansala (Padilla) mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gasịrị; Chichay dara maka nwa okoro ahụ bara ọgaranya n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche akụ na ụba ha na ndụ ezinụlọ ha, na-ezute ihe mgbochi siri ike nke na-anwale ịhụnanya ha
Got to believe bụkwa ihe egwu egwu na telivishọn mbụ, na-achịkọta pasenti 386 na ọkwa n'oge mgbasa ozi ikpeazụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ wee tinye na Nke 2 na ndepụta ọkwa TV nke Kantar Media nke mba
Bernardo bụ onye mbụ na naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri Filipina nke mebiri akara ₱ nde 800 maka ihe nkiri abụọ
Otu bụ na 2018 maka The Hows of Anyị na nke ọzọ bụ Ndewo, Love, Goodbye for 2019
Bernardo ugbu a na-ejide ihe nkiri Filipino kachasị elu nke oge niile maka ihe nkiri Ndewo, Lovehụnanya, Goodbye
Ọ ghọkwara ihe nkiri Filipino kacha enweta ego na Middle East, Australia, na North America
Ndewo, Lovehụnanya, Goodbye mebiri ndekọ igbe igbe nke ihe nkiri Filipino ọ bụla

She won 'Best Actress' awards at the 35th PMPC Star Awards for Movies and Entertainment Editors' Choice Awards for Movies, or The EDDY'S 2019 for her outstanding portrayal as George in The Hows of Us'
E nyekwara Bernardo ihe nrite “Box Office Queen” maka ihe nkiri blockbuster Barcelona A Love Untold na 48th Guillermo Mendoza Box Office Awards
Na 2020, ọ meriri dị ka 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma' na Gawad Pasado, yana Judy Ann Santos-Agoncillo
wee merie 'Film Acting Awardee' na Gawad Tanglaw, 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ' na Aral Parangal Awards, 'Best Actress' na Village Pipol Awards

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a họpụtara ya maka 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma' na Film Academy of the Philippines, Gawad Urian, na Filipino Academy of Movie Arts and Sciences (FAMAS), ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara ugbu a na 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ' na PMPC Star Awards maka ihe nkiri
na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nhọpụta grandslam n'ime otu anọ na-enye onyinye onyinye na Philippines
Kathryn Kuhlman (May 9, 1907 - Febụwarị 20, 1976) bụ onye mgbasa ozi America ama ama maka imerube ememe dị iche iche maka ọgwụgwọ ndị ọria
A mụrụ Kathryn Johanna Kuhlman na nso Concordia, Missouri, nye nne na nna German- American, Joseph Adolph Kuhlman na Emma Walkenhorst
Ọtụtụ afọ ka ọ nwesịrị ahụmahụ ime mmụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ malitere ime njem ya na nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye na ọgọ ya nwoke na Idaho
Mgbe e mesịrị, Ndị Ụka Evangelical chiri ya echichi
Kuhlman zutere Burroughs Waltrip, onye na-ezisa ozi ọma na Texas onye dị afọ asatọ wee tọọ ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ gara na Denver, Waltrip gbara nwunye ya alụkwaghịm, hapụ ezinụlọ ya ma kwaga Mason City, Iowa, bụ ebe ọ malitere ụlọ ụka nke a na-akpọ Radio Chapel
Kuhlman na enyi ya na onye na-akpọ ụbọ Helen Gulliford batara n'ime obodo iji nyere ya aka inweta ego maka ozi ya
Ọ bụ obere oge ka ha bịarutere ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Burroughs na Kuhlman pụtara ìhè n'anya ọha
Burroughs na Kuhlman kpebiri ịlụ onwe ha

Ka ya na ụfọdụ ndị enyi ya na-ekwurịta okwu ahụ, Kuhlman kwuru na ya apụghị 'ịchọta uche Chineke n'okwu ahụ' Ndị enyi ndị a na ndị ọzọ gbara ya ume ka ọ ghara ịgabiga na alụmdi na nwunye ahụ, ma Kuhlman kwadoro ya nye onwe ya na ndị ọzọ site n'ikwere na nwunye Waltrip hapụrụ ya, ọ bụghị Waltrip rapuru nwunye ya
N'ọnwa October 18, 1938, ọ lụrụ 'Mista,' na nzuzo dịka ọ masịrị ịkpọ Waltrip, na Mason City
Agbamakwụkwọ ahụ enyeghị ya udo ọhụrụ banyere njikọ ha, otú ọ dị
Di na nwunye ahụ enweghị ụmụ ha mutara
Banyere alụmdi na nwunye ya, na mkparịta ụka ya na Denver Post mere na 1952, Kuhlman kwuru, sị, 'O boro ebubo - n'ụzọ ziri ezi - na m jụrụ ibinyere ya
Ahụbeghịkwa m ya n'ime afọ asatọ' Burroughs Waltrip gbara ya alụkwaghịm na 1948

N'ọtụtụ oge n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, o kwupụtara mmetụta nke mwute maka akụkụ ya n'ihe mgbu nke nbipu nke alụmdi na nwunye gara aga nke Waltrip kpatara, na-ekwu maka obi mgbawa ụmụaka dị ka ihe na-enye ya nsogbu
O kwuru na ọ bụ naanị ihe kacha kwaa mmakwaara ná ndụ ya, bụ́ nke na-esote nrara nye mmekọrịta ịhụnanya ya na Jizọs
N'afọ 1955, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ, a chọpụtara na Kuhlman nwere nsogbu obi
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu na-enweghi ezumike na-agakarị United States na gburugburu ụwa, na-enwe nzukọ nke na-ewe awa abụọ we ruo awa isii, bụ́ ndị na-adịghi akwusị n'oge
“Ije ozi telivishọn n'onwe ya chọrọ ihe karịrị dollar puku iri atọ ($30,000) kwa izu
Ịkwụsị, ọbụna ibelata, ga-apụta na ọ na-amalite ịda
Otú ahụ ka ọ dịkwa n’ọrụ ebube ndị ahụ
Ka ihe mgbu dị n'obi ya na-eto eto ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara idi ya, kama imerube ememe ole na ole, ọ mụbara ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ'
Kuhlman gara ọtụtụ njem na United States na n'ọtụtụ mba ndị ọzọ na-emerube emume 'mkpọsa ọgwụgwọ' n'etiti 1940s na 1970s
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ozi ọgwụgwọ a kacha mara amara n'ụwa
Kuhlman nwere mmemme TV kwa izu na 1960 na 1970 nke a na-akpọ I Believe In Miracles nke ezisara na mba
O nwekwara ozi nkuzi sitere na Akwụkwọ Nsọ nke were nkeji iri atọ na mba niile ma na-egosipụtakwa akụkụ ụfọdụ sitere n'emume ọgwụgwọ ya (ma egwu ma ozi)
E hiwere ntọala ya na 1954, nakwa alaka nke Canada na 1970
N'ime oge ndụ ya, ọ kwadoro otu Jesus Movement ma nata nkwado site n'aka ndị isi ya, nke gụnyere David Wilkerson na Chuck Smith
Site na 1970 ọ kwagara Los Angeles, na-eduzi ọrụ ọgwụgwọ maka ọtụtụ puku mmadụ, a na-ejikarị ya tụnyere Aimee Semple MacPherson
A bịara mara ya nke ọma maka 'onyinye ọgwụgwọ' ya n'agbanyeghị, dị ka ọ na-ekwukarị, na-enweghị ọzụzụ nkà mmụta okpukpe
Ya na onye ọsụ ụzọ Christian telivishọn Pat Robertson buru enyi wee mee ngosi na Christian Broadcasting Network (CBN) yana mmemme nke netwọkụ The 700 Club

N'afọ 1975, Paul Bartholomew, onye nchịkwa nke ya, gbara Kuhlman akwụkwọ, onye kwuru na ọ na-ezobere otu nde dollar na ọla nakwa otu nde dollar na nkà mara mma ma gbaa ya akwụkwọ maka narị puku anọ na iri atọ na narị dọllar maka imebi nkwekọrịta
Mmadụ abụọ ya na ya na-akpabu boro ya ebubo na ọ na-atụpụ ego nakwa na ọ na-ewepụ ihe ndekọ n’ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, bụ́ nke ọ gọrọ agọ ma kwuo na ihe ndekọ ahụ abụghị nke nzuzo
Dị ka Kuhlman si kwuo, a kwụsịrị ikpe ahụ tupu e kpee ya ikpe
Ihe dị ka nde mmadụ abụọ kwuru na a gwọrọ ha na nzukọ ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'ịgbaso mkpakọrịta nke e mere n'afọ 1967 na Philadelphia, Dr
William A
Nolen mere nchọpụta nke mmadụ iri abụo na atọ bụ ndị kwuru na a gwọọla ha n'otu n'ime ememe ozi ọma ya
Nlebanya ogologo oge nke Nolen mere kwubiri na enweghị ọgwụgwọ n'ọnọdụ ndị ahụ

Otu nwanyị nke ekwuru na a gwọọla ya site na ọrịa kansa ọkpụkpụ azụ, onye tụpụrụ ihe nkwado ya wee gbaba n'ọgbọ ahụ n'iwu Kuhlman ka e kwụrụ na ọkpụkpụ azụ ya dara n'echi ya o wee nwụọ mgbe ọnwa anọ gachara
Ntụle Nolen banyere Kulhman batara maka nkatọ sitere n'aka ndị kwere ekwe
Lawrence Althouse, dibia bekee, kwuru na Nolen gara nani otu n'ime eme nke Kuhlman nakwa na o sosoghi ndi nile kwuru na a gwọrọ ha n'ebe ahu
Richard Casdorph wepụtara akwụkwọ ihe àmà na-akwado ọgwụgwọ ọrụ ebube nke Kuhlman
Hendrik van der Breggen, bụ́ prọfesọ nkà ihe ọmụma onye na-eso ụzọ nke Kraịst, rụrụ ụka na-akwado nkwupụta ahụ
Onye edemede bụ Craig Keener kwubiri, sị “Ọ dịghị onye na-ekwu na a gwọọla mmadụ niile, ma ọ siri ike ịrụ ụka na mgbake dị ịrịba ama mere, nke doro anya na njikọ ya na ekpere

Mmadụ nwere ike jikọta ndị a na okwukwe Kathryn Kuhlman ma ọ bụ nke ndị na-arịọ arịrịọ, ma ọ bụ, dị ka ọ dị na ụfọdụ nkuzi Kuhlman, na ọ dịghị onye nwere okwukwe; ma ihe àmà na-egosi na a gwọrọ ụfọdụ ndị, ọbụna n’ụzọ pụrụ iche”
Dọkịnta Richard Owellen, onye so na ngalaba nyocha ọrịa kansa nke ụlọọgwụ Johns Hopkins bụ onye pụtara ugboro ugboro n'ememe Miss Kuhlman, gbara ama maka ọgwụgwọ dị iche iche o kwuru na ya nyochara
Na Julaị 1975 dọkịta ya chọpụtara na o nwere obere nsogbụ nke obi; na Nọvemba o nwere nlọghachi azụ
N'ihi ya, Kuhlman nwere ịwa obi na Tulsa, Oklahoma nke mere ka ọ nwụọ na February 20, 1976
A kọrọ na akụkọ ndụ ya na n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ, a hụrụ ìhè na-egbuke egbuke na-ekpuchi ahụ ya nke na-adịghi ndụ
E liri Kathryn Kuhlman n'ebe a na-eli ozu nke Forest Lawn Memorial Park na Glendale, California
Ihe ncheta maka nsọpụrụ ya dị na ogige ntụrụndụ obodo dị na Concordia, Missouri, obodo dị na etiti Missouri na Interstate Highway 70
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ọ ga- eduga n'esemokwu
Ọ hapụrụ puku narị abụọ na iri isii na asaa, narị dollar ise, nnukwu ala ya, nye ndị ezinaụlọ atọ na ndị ọrụ iri abụọ
E nyere ndị ọrụ iri na itoolu ndị ọzọ ihe nrịbama dị nta

Dị ka Independent Press-Telegram si kwuo, ndị ọrụ ya nwere nkụda mmụọ na 'ọ hapụghị ọtụtụ ala ya nye ntọala dịka o mere n'iwu o meburu n'afọ 1974 gara aga' Kathryn Kuhlman Foundation gara n'ihu, mana n'ihi enweghị ego, a kwụsịrị mgbasa ozi redio ya na mba niile na 1982
N'ikpeazụ, ntọala ahụ mechiri ọnụ ụzọ ya n'April 2016
Ọtụtụ ndị kwere ekwe na-akwado Kuhlman dị ka ihe dị mkpa bu ụzọ n'okpukpe nke dị ugbu a
O metụtara okwukwe ndị na-agwọ ọrịa Benny Hinn na Billy Burke
Hinn nakweere ụfọdụ usoro ya wee dee akwụkwọ gbasara Kuhlman, n'agbanyeghị na ọ hụtụbeghị ma ọ bụ gwa ya okwu
N'agbanyeghi nke a, Billy Burke zutere ya wee nye ya ndụmọdụ, ebe ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ọgwụgwọ ọrụ ebube n'ozi ya dịka nwata nwoke
N'afọ 1981, David Byrne na Brian Eno tụlere otu n'ime okwuchukwu Kuhlman maka egwu emepụtara n'oge nnọkọ maka usoro egwu ha mekọrọ ọnụ nke a kpọrọ My Life in the Bush of Ghosts
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ikpochapụ ikike nke olu Kuhlman site na ala ya, egwu ahụ rụgharịrị iji jiri ọdịyo sitere na exorcism na-amaghị ama, na-ewepụta ụdị a gbanwere dị ka ' Mmụọ Jezebel '
A ga-emesị tinye ụdị Kuhlman na ihe emume nke e mere na 1992 nke akpọrọ 'Into the Spirit Womb'
Kathryn Smith bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, onye nlekọta, na ónyé nchọpụta
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọrụ curatorial, nyocha ndị ọkà mmụta, na omume ụlọ ọrụ, ebe nka ya na-emetụta ejighị n'aka, ihe ize ndụ, na nnwale
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town na Stellenbosch
E gosipụtara ma chịkọta ọrụ ya na South Africa na ébé ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi dị elu na Ngalaba Visual Arts na Mahadum Stellenbosch na onye isi nke mmemme Fine Arts Studio Practice
Ọ lara ezumike na 2012/2013 iji gụọ màkà MSc (Forensic Art) na Mahadum Dundee
A mụrụ Smith na Durban, South Africa na 1975
N'afọ 1997, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand(Wits) na Bachelor na Fine Arts na Printmaking
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na 1999 ọ natara Masters ya na ọdịiche na Printmaking, kwa site na Mahadum Wits
O sonyere na ebe óbíbí ndị na-ese ihe na United States, Canada, Europe, na South Africa
Ọ na-ebi ugbu a na Dundee, Scotland, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Centre for Anatomy and Human Identification, ọkachamara na nka forensic, n'okpuru atụmatụ Chevening Award
Smith na-ele obibi akwụkwọ anya dị ka ikike nke imepụtaghachi ma kwughachi ihe oyiyi, na-eche 'nke ọ dị ka ụdị aghụghọ dara ada; dàrà n'ihi na ọ nweghị 'nke mbụ' n'ezie iji malite'
Ọ na-akọwa ọrụ ya dị ka 'onye na-ese mpụ na muse', ma bụrụkwa nke na-enweghị isi na nke na-adịghị mma
Omume ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme nchọpụta akụkọ ihe méré eme mere ka ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyéré usoro nyocha na nghọta
Mmasị ya na forensic pathology na psychology na-eduga na ọrụ mgbasa ozi ngwakọta nke bụ nka na nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
[citation needed]
Kathryn 'Kathy' Keeton (February 17, 1939 - September 19, 1997) bụ onye na-ebipụta magazin America ya na onye ọlụlụ ya, ma mesịa di ya, onye na-ebipụta Penthouse Bob Guccione
A mụrụ ya na South Africa ma zụlite ya n'ugbo, Keeton malitere ịgba egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwata iji mee ka ụkwụ nke polio metụtara sikwuo ike
O ritere agụmakwụkwọ na Sadler's Wells Ballet na London, mana ọ hapụrụ mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asatọ iji rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị
Ọ pụtara na obere akụkụ na ihe nkiri anọ nke Britain Carlton-Browne of the FO
(1959) (dị ka onye na-agba egwu na tebụl), Expresso Bongo (1959), Too Hot to Handle (1960), na The Spy Who Came in from the Cold (1965) (dị ka onye na-agba egwu)
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ, ọ bụ ihe The Associated Press kpọrọ 'otu n'ime ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu na Europe'
Ọ zutere Bob Guccione na afọ 1965 ma ha nọgidere na-anọkọ ọnụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha alụghị di ruo 1988
N'ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta ya, aha ya bụ Onye isi oche / Onye isi ọrụ nke General Media Communications, Inc
Ọ tọrọ ntọala magazin Viva (1973), Omni (1978), na Longevity (1989)
O dekwara akwụkwọ abụọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Woman of Tomorrow (1986) na Longevity The Science of Staying Young (1992)
Ọ bụ onye mkpesa na ikpe dị ịrịba ama nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States nke Keeton v
Hustler Magazine, Inc
Mgbe nyochachara ya na ọrịa ara ara, Keeton ji hydrazine sulfate gwọọ onwe ya, mgbe ọ gụchara gbasara ya na Penthouse, otu n'ime akwụkwọ nke ya
O kwuru na ya ewepụla onwe ya ma ọ bụ mebie ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ etuto ahụ niile wee gbatịa ndụ ya ọtụtụ afọ, mgbe ndị dọkịta gbasịrị ya amụma mmalite dị egwu nke naanị izu isii ga-adị ndụ
Keeton nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu site na ịwa ahụ maka mgbochi eriri afọ, ọ dị afọ 58, na New York City
E liri Keeton na 'The Willows' (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Locusts on Hudson) na Staatsburg, New York, ụlọ obodo ya na di ya

Katidral bụ ụka nke nwere katidra (Latin maka 'oche') nke bishọp, si otu a na-eje ozi dị ka ụlọ ụka etiti nke dayọsis, ọgbakọ, ma ọ bụ episcopate Ụka ndị nwere ọrụ nke 'katidral' na-abụkarị ndị a kapịrị ọnụ maka ụka Ndị Kraịst nwere ndị isi n'ọgbakọ, dịka Katọlik, Eastern Orthodox, Anglican, na ụfọdụ ụka Lutheran Ụlọ ụka ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke katidral pụtara na mbụ na Italy, Gaul, Spain, na North Africa na narị afọ nke anọ, ma katidral aghọghị ihe zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ime Chọọchị Katọlik nke Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ ruo narị afọ nke 12, bụ nke oge ahụ ha zụlitere ụdị ụkpụrụ ụlọ usoro ụlọ ọrụ, na njirimara iwu dị iche na ụlọ ụka parish, ụka monastic, na ebe obibi ndị bishọp Katidral dị mkpa na ndị isi karịa ụka n'ihi na ọ bụ katidral ka bishọp na-achị ebe ahụ n'okpuru ikike nchịkwa ya
Àtụ Infobox church
Katidral ụka nke Kraịst Marina, Lagos bụ katidral Anglican na Lagos Agwaetiti, Lagos, Naijiria
A tọrọ ntọala maka ụlọ katidral mbụ na iri abụo na itoolu Maachị n'afọ otu puku narị asatọ na iri isii na asaa ma guzobe katidral ahụ n'afọ otu puku narị asatọ na iri isii na itoolu
Ihe owuwu nke ụlọ dị ugbu a na atụmatụ nke onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Bagan Benjamin malitere na otu Nọvemba otu puku narị itoolu na iri abụo na anọ
Ọ bụ onye isi ala Wales (nke mechara bụrụ Eze Edward nke Asatọ) tọrọ ntọala ya na iri abụo na otu Eprel n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu na iri abụo na ise
A rụchara ya n'afo otu puku narị itoolu na iri anọ na isii
N'afọ otu puku narị itoolu na iri asaa na isii, a sụgharịrị ihe onwunwe nke Nsọpụrụ DọkịtaSamuel Ajayi Crowther, onye bụbu ohu Yoruba nke ghọrọ bishọp Afrịka mbụ na ụlọ ụka Anglican, na katidral
E nwere cenotaph e guzobere dị ka ihe ncheta ya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka katidral ụka nke Kraịst Marina, ọ bụkwa katidral Anglican kachasị ochie na ụlọ ụka nke Naijiria

N'oge dị iche iche n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, katidral ahụ bụ oche nke achịbishọp nke mpaghara Odia anyanwụ Afrịka, oche nke achịpishọp na onye isi nke Naijiria niile na oche nke achịkishọp of the ụka mpaghara nke Lagos
Ọ bụ ugbu a oche nke Bishọp nke Lagos
Ọ bụ Oberlinger Orgelbau, Germany, wuru ọkpọkọ ahụ n'akụkụ aka nri nke ebe ịchụàjà ahụ nwere ihu abụọ - otu na-ele anya n'ebe ịchụàjà na nke abụọ na-eleba anya n'akụkụ nri
Otu n'ime ngalaba, Antiphonal, dị na ogwe aka n'elu ọnụ ụzọ mbata nke ụka ahụ
Na mbido narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu, ụlọ ọrụ Bekee bụ Harrison na Harrison mezigharịrị ngwá ọrụ ahụ dum (ma wughachi njikwa); ọ nwere nkwụsị iri isii na anọ na ntuziaka anọ na boodu pedal
Ọ bụ ọkpọkọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa
N'afọ otu puku narị itoolu na iri isii na itoolu, onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ, Yakubu Gowon lụrụ Nnenna Victoria Zakari, n'ememe nke Seth Irunsewe Kale duziri na Katidral

Katie Eder (amụrụ n'afọ 1999 maọbu 2000) bụ onye America na-eme ihe ike na onye ọchụnta ego mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke tọrọ ntọala ma duzie ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na 50 Miles More, Kids Tales, na The Future Coalition, nke ikpeazụ ebe ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa ugbu a
Na Disemba 2019, a kpọrọ Eder otu n'ime Forbes 30 under 30 na Iwu
A mụrụ Eder ma zụlite ya na Milwaukee, Wisconsin
Katie gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Shorewood High School na 2018 wee malite na Mahadum Stanford n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 2020
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ ise

Mgbe Katie dị afọ iri na atọ, o guzobere otu na-anaghị achọ uru nke a kpọrọ Kids Tales, iji weta ọmụmụ ihe edemede, nke ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-akụzi, nye ụmụaka na-enweghị ike ịnweta ahụmahụ ederede n'èzí ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'oge ọmụmụ ihe Kids Tales, ụmụaka na-ede akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke e bipụtara na anthology, ezigbo akwụkwọ
Ụmụaka narị iri na ise na mba itoolu esonyewo na ọmụmụ ihe Kids Tales
Kids Tales etinyela ihe karịrị ndị nkuzi narị anọ na-eto eto ma bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ịrị itoolu

Mgbe ihe omume March For Our Lives nke afọ 2018 kwụsịrị na March 24, Katie na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ si n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya haziri njem kilomita 50 site na Madison, WI gaa Janesville, WI, obodo nke onye bụbu onye isi oche US nke House Paul Ryan, iji kpọọ ya maka ọrụ ya na igbochi na ili iwu égbè

Njem 50 Miles More a na-eduga Katie na ndị otu ya ịmalite mkpọsa mba niile a na-akpọ #50more na #50 steeti iji maa steeti ịrị anọ na itoolu ndị ọzọ aka ime ngaghari mailu ịrị ise gaa n'obodo ma ọ bụ n'ọfịs nke otu n'ime ndị ọrụ NRA kwadoro iji chọọ ka ha mee ihe iji kwụsị ime ihe ike égbè
Mailu ịrị ịse ozomere mailu ịrị ise ije na Massachusetts n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2018

Mailu ịrị ise ọzọ mepụtara atụmatụ ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi na-eme ntụli aka na mba niile na-elekwasị anya na ndị a na-eme ngagharị ọhụrụ iji mee ka ha gaa na ntuli aka iji mee ka ọ gaa na ntuzi aka iji mee ntuli aka na ntuliaka iji mee ka a na ntuli ọnụ na ntuli Aka na ntuli

Katie duuru maịlu ịrị ise ọzọ gaa jikọọ aka na òtù ndị ntorobịa ndị ọzọ na-eduzi gafee mba ahụ iji guzobe Future Coalition, netwọk mba na obodo maka ndị na-eto eto na òtù ndị na-edu ndị ntorobịa na ebumnuche nke ime ka ọdịnihu bụrụ ebe ka mma, dị nchebe, na nke ziri ezi maka onye ọ bụla
The Future Coalition na-ejikọ òtù ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi na ndị isi ndị ntorobịa gafee United States iji kesaa ihe onwunwe na echiche
The Future Coalition malitere na Septemba 2018 na mkpọsa ntuli aka Walkout to Vote
Ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ narị ise gafee mba ahụ hapụrụ klas wee gaa ntuli aka
Katie Heaney bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ BuzzFeed, onye edemede ukwu maka The Cut, na odee
Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere Never Have I Ever, Dear Emma, Would You Rather?, Girl Crushed, na The Year I Stopped Trying
Akwụkwọ mbụ Heaney dere mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na BuzzFeed, bụ Never Have I Ever My Life (So Far) Without a Date, nke e bipụtara na 2014
Akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ na-akọ akụkọ ndụ ya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise ma na-akọ otú o si ghara inwe, tupu oge ahụ, enyi nwoke
N'afọ 2016, e bipụtara mmelite Heaney nke Jane Austen's Emma
N'afọ 2018, Heaney bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta nke abụọ, Would You Rather? A Memoir of Growing Up and Coming Out
Would You Rather? na-ekwu maka ụzọ Heaney si pụta ma ghọta onwe ya
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ YA mbụ ya, Girl Crushed, n'afọ 2020
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ YA nke abụọ ya, The Year I Stopped Trying, na 2021
A mụrụ Heaney ma zụlite ya na St
Paul na Shoreview, Minnesota
Ọ pụtara dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ n'afọ 2015
Tụpụ afọ 2018, Heaney lụrụ Lydia
Ọ bi na New York ugbu a
Katie Quinn Lowes (amụrụ n'abali iri abụo na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1982 ) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke Amerika na onye ntuziaka ihe nkiri ọgbọ

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Quinn Perkins na usoro ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ABC Scandal (2012 – 2018) na ngosipụta ya dị ka Rachel DeLoache Williams na usoro ihe nkiri Netflix Inventing Anna (2022)7
A mụrụ Lowes na Queens, New York City o wee tolite na Port Washington, New York
Nna ya bụ onye Katọlik Irish, ebe nne ya bụ onye Juu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tisch School of Arts nke Mahadum New York jiri BFA na ime ihe nkiri
E deputara ya dịka onye otu sonyeere n'ihe nkiri bụ Four Saints in Mexico
Na 2004, Lowes wetere ọrụ ihuenyo mbụ ya na usoro FX Rescue Me ma mesịa mekọrịta ihe megidere Marcia Gay Harden na onye na-anya ụgbọ elu Showtime, Hate
Lowes mechara bụrụ onye ọbịa na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke usoro telivishọn, gụnyere The Sopranos, Without a Trace, NCIS, Ghost Whisperer, Castle, Leverage, and The Closer
Na 2008, o gosiputarakwara megide Laurie Metcalf na usoro ihe nkiri ejije CW dị mkpụmkpụ, Easy Money
Na mgbakwunye na arụmọrụ telivishọn ya, Lowes pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mmefu ego dị ala, gụnyere The Job (2009), Bear (2010) na Café (2011)
A maara Lowes nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Quinn Perkins, onye bụbu Lindsay Dwyer, na usoro ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ABC Scandal nke Shonda Rhimes mepụtara
Tupu Scandal, Lowes nwere ọrụ ndị ọbịa na Shonda Rhimes ' Grey's Anatomy and Private Practice
Tupu ọ banye n'ọrụ breakout ya na ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nanny maka nwa e kuchiri Connie Britton
Na ntinye aka di ya, Adam Shapiro, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ IAMA Theatre Company nke dị na Los Angeles, na onye na-akwado obodo i Black Box theater nke Southern California
N'ọnwa Jụlaị 2018, Lowes mere mpụta mbụ ya nke Broadway, ya na di ya Shapiro, na mmepụta Broadway nke Waitress
Ha nọgidere na mmepụta ruo abali asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba afo 2018

N'abalị iri na anọ N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, CBS kwuputara na Lowes ga-eme egwuregwu megide Pete Holmes na sitcom nke lekwasịrị anya na ndụ nke onye ọrụ ụgbọ ala tụgharịri bụrụ-ọkachamara bowler Tom Smallwood
Usoro a nwere nsere foto nke mpụta etiti oge maka oge onyonyo afọ 2021–22
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ ọnwa Nọvemba , CBS mara ọkwa sitcom ka edegharịrị aha ya bụ How We Roll , wee nata usoro oge mbụ emezighariri nke akụkụ iri na otu
Na Disemba 10, 2021, CBS kwupụtara usoro a ga-ebido N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Maachị 31, afọ 2022
Lowes gosiputara dị ka Rachel DeLoache Williams na Shonda Rimes' Inventing Anna, ihe nkiri Netflix ewepụtara na Febrụwarị afọ 2022
Lowes bi na Los Angeles ya na di ya, ome ihe nkiri bụ Adam Shapiro
Shapiro gosiputara dị ka enyi nwoke ya na ihe omume Scandal
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2017, o kwupụtara na ya na di ya na-atụ anya nwa mbụ ha, nwoke
Ọ mara ọkwa ọmụmụ nwa ha nwoke, Albee Shapiro, n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2017
N'onwa Julaị 2020, ọ mara ọkwa na ya na di ya na-atụ anya nwa ha nke abụọ na Nọvemba
Lowes mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị Vera Shapiro na Nọvemba 22, 2020
Meyer playing for Stanford
Katie Meyer
Kathryn Diane Meyer (January 20, 2000 - Maachị 1, 2022) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ America bụ onye gbara bọọlụ dịka onye na- eche nche maka otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Stanford Cardinal nke Mahadum Stanford
Amụrụ Meyer na Burbank, California, wee tolite na Newbury Park, California, ya na nne na nna ya Steven na Gina Meyer
Meyer bụ nwa n'etiti ya na nwanne Samantha tọrọ ya, na nwanne Siena nke obere
Na 2015, e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Soccer Superstar na Nickelodeon
Meyer gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Newbury Park maka afọ atọ mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, tupu ọ gafere na Century Academy maka afọ agadi ya
N'oge ya na Newbury Park High School, ọ bụkwa onye ọkpọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ varsity maka oge abụọ
Na mgbakwunye na otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, ọ gbara maka otu klọb Real So Cal na Eagles Soccer Club, yana otu mba ụmụ agbọghọ U16
Na Ọktoba 10, 2015, Meyer gbara mbọ ịgba bọọlụ kọleji maka Kadịnal Stanford
Ọ malitere na Mahadum Stanford na 2018, ebe ọ na-agbaso akara mmụta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na obere nwa na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ na-acha uhie uhie n'ime afọ ọhụrụ ya, wee kpọọ otu egwuregwu oge mbụ ya na 2019
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị oke egwu na asọmpi iko kọleji 2019 megide Mahadum North Carolina
Ọ bụ onye isi otu na oge 2020 na 2021
Ahụrụ Meyer nwụrụ anwụ n'ime ọnụ ụlọ ebe obibi ya na Crothers Hall, ụlọ obibi dị na ogige Stanford, na Maachị 1, 2022
Mgbe a jụrụ ya banyere ọnọdụ gbara ọnwụ ya gburugburu, nne Meyer kwuru na ya enwetala ozi email gbasara ịdọ aka ná ntị, na 'Ọ na-enweta akwụkwọ ozi ruo ọnwa ole na ole
Akwụkwọ ozi a bụ ụdị akwụkwọ ozi ikpeazụ na a ga-enwe ikpe ma ọ bụ ụdị ihe ọ bụla

Nke a bụ naanị ihe anyị nwere ike ime nke kpalitere ihe' Dee Mostofi, Stanford Assistant osote onye isi ala, kwuru na 'Anyị [ndị na-ahụ maka Mahadum Stanford] enweghị ike ịkesa ozi gbasara ihe gbasara ịdọ aka ná ntị ụmụ akwụkwọ nzuzo'
Nkwupụta sitere na Santa Clara County na Machị 3, 2022, kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ahụ kpebiri na ọnwụ ahụ bụ ' onwe ya kpatara onwe ya ', na-enweghị 'enweghị ihe ngosi nke egwuregwu rụrụ arụ'
Amụrụ Katrina Amy Alexandra Alexis Infield na Brighton, East Sussex, na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ England, Ọnụahịa bụ naanị nwa Ray na Amy Infield ( née Charlier)
Nna ] hapụrụ ezinụlọ mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, na 1988 nne ya lụrụ onye na-ewu ụlọ Paul Price, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara aha nna ya
O nwere nwanne nne nke okenye aha ya bụ Daniel na nwanne nwanyị nke obere aha ya bụ Sophie
Ọ bụ onye Italian, Spanish, Bekee na onye Juu
Nne nne Price bụ onye Juu, mana ọ naghị eji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe
Ọnụ ego gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Blatchington Mill na Hove na East Sussex
O mere nke ọma na egwuregwu, igwu mmiri maka Sussex na asọmpi mpaghara
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ zụlitekwara mmasị maka ịnyịnya na ịnya ịnyịnya
Ọ malitere ịme ihe ngosi mgbe ọ bụ nwata, na 13 ọ kpụrụ maka eriri uwe
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 17, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Katie Price
N'atụmatụ enyi ya, Price nwere foto ndị ọkachamara wee kpebie ịchụso ọrụ ịmebe
E zigara foto ndị a na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na London, na 1996 ọ pụtara, a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ka 'Jordan', na Peeji nke 3 na akwụkwọ akụkọ Britain The Sun
Dịka Jordan, a ma ama Price maka ara nwere ike ịwa ahụ
Na 20, o nwere nke mbụ n'usoro ịwa ahụ na-akwalite ara, na-amụba 32B eke ya na 32FF

Ọnụahịa na-apụtakwa mgbe niile na Daily Star, FHM, mbipụta Britain nke Playboy, Nuts, Maxim, Loaded, Vogue na Esquire ma na-agbakwa ọsọ dị ka onye na-akwado Stretford na Urmston n'oge ntuli aka n'ozuzu UK 2001, na-anata 713 votes
18% nke ntuli aka emere
Na 2002, ọ pụtara na September cover nke American mbipụta nke Playboy magazin
Na Jenụwarị 2022 ọnụ ahịa sonyeere OnlyFans, mana welitere naanị £150 site na otu n'ime ọkwa ya, n'agbanyeghị na-arịọ ndị na-eso ụzọ ka ha debanye aha maka ọrụ ndenye aha
Na Julaị 2010, Price wepụtara ' Free to Love Again ', otu na-abụghị album
Banyere ntọhapụ ahụ, ọ kọwara, sị “Abụghị m onye ọbụ abụ, nke a bụ nanị ihe m na-eme maka ntụrụndụ
Ọ dịghị ka m na-echegbu onwe m maka ịnweta ọkwa chaatị ma ọ bụ nọmba mbụ, nke a bụ naanị maka ntụrụndụ
Ma ndị mmadụ masịrị ya ma ọ bụ na ha achọghị, m na-eme ya'
Ọnụ ahịa dị na 100 ndị na-ede akwụkwọ kacha ere nke afọ iri maka ire akwụkwọ n'etiti 2000 na 2009, yana ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ahịa nde atọ
Rebecca Farnworth dere akwụkwọ ọnụ ahịa ghost
Ọ wepụtara akụkọ akụkọ ndụ mbụ ya, ịbụ Jordan, na Mee 2004
Ahịa mere njem nbinye aka akwụkwọ ụbọchị iri nke nyere aka ịkwalite ya n'ọkwa mbụ na Nielsen BookScan hardback sales chart na ire 97,090 n'ime otu afọ, na ihe karịrị 1,000,000 dị ka nke January 2007
] E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya nke abụọ, A Whole New World na Jenụwarị 2006
Ọ ruru ọnụọgụ abụọ na ngalaba hardback izugbe wee ree 198,105 mbipụta site na 1 Eprel 2006
Akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ nke Price, Crystal, banyere mgbalị nwa agbọghọ na-eme ịghọ onye na-agụ egwú, rere 159,407 n'ime ọnwa atọ mbụ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na June 2007
Na July 2008, Price wepụtara ya nke atọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, Angel Uncovered
Na Julaị 2009, Price wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Sapphire nke bụ ọnụọgụ 1 na eserese akụkọ ifo hardback maka izu anọ na-esochi ma ree 42,215 n'ime izu abụọ mbụ ya na UK naanị
Price wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke ise, Paradaịs, na Julaị 2010
N'afọ 2014, o wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ nke iri ya, Mee Ka Ọchịchọ M Mezuo
Price mụrụ nwa mbụ ya, nwa nwoke Harvey, na Brighton na Mee 2002
Nna Harvey bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ lara ezumike nka Dwight Yorke
Achọpụtara Harvey ka ọ kpuru ìsì, ya na dysplasia septo-optic, nke na-eme ka mmepe akwara optic bụrụ ihe a na-atụghị anya ya
A chọpụtakwara ya na ụdị autistic spectrum yana nwee ọrịa Prader-Willi
Na July 2009, Price malitere ịlụ MMA fighter na omee Alex Reid
Ha lụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 2010 na emume nzuzo na ụlọ ụka dị na Wynn Hotel na Las Vegas
Ha mechakwara gọzie otu ha n'otu ụka dị na UK; emume a mere ihe onyonyo maka ihe onyonyo onyonyo
Na Jenụwarị 2011, Reid na Price kewapụrụ na ịgba alụkwaghịm ha kwụsịrị na March 2012
Akwụkwọ iri na anọ mbụ nke Price bụ Rebecca Farnworth dere ghost

Àtụ S-end
Rees meriri aha Miss Nevada USA 2007 na izizi mbụ ya na asọmpi steeti emere na Las Vegas na Ọktoba 8, n'afo 2006
Ọ bụ Lauren Scyphers na-apụ apụ kpuchiri ya okpueze
'nwanne ya nwanyị', Miss Nevada Teen USA 2007, bụ Danielle Hashimoto

Na Disemba 20, n'afọ 2006, e boro Rees ebubo na-egosipụta omume rụrụ arụ na ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị nke Florida, afọ atọ tupu mgbe ọ na-anọghị na kọleji, e mere ọtụtụ foto nke Rees, isusu ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ọnụ, na ịme omume mmekọahụ ka ewepụtara ndị mgbasa ozi

Nke a sochiri mkparị metụtara Miss USA 2006 Tara Conner, nke akụkọ akụkọ kwuru na Conner na-aṅụ mmanya na-erubeghị afọ okwesiri iru, na-eji ọgwụ iwu na-akwadoghị na foto nke ya na-asusu Miss Teen USA ọnụ; E zigara Conner na rehab ma kwe ka ọ nọgide na-enwe aha ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2006, ndị Miss Universe Organization wepụrụ Rees okpueze ya site na nkwado nke onye so nwe asọmupi
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Tswana
A maara Danke maka oke ọrụ ya na- na soap opera nke South Africa, Backstage, Generations , Gomora na Isidingo
A mụrụ Danke na 7 Nọvemba 1978 na North West, ebe ọ nọrọ na nwata na ebe dị ka Mafikeng, Ga-Rankuwa, Mabopane, na Potchefstroom
Katlego nọ na-eme ihe nkiri tupu ọ banye na telivishọn

Ọ nwetara BA nke gbasara ime ihe nkiri na ime ihe omume na Mahadum Cape Town na 2001 ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ihe ngosi ngwa na ihe nkiri dị ka Beyond the Veil, The House of Kalumba, The Town that was mad, Crimes of the Heart King Lear, Miss Tertiary feel , Occupational Therapy project, yana ihe omume Opera nke Macbeth
Site na 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na etv 's Backstage
Ọ pụtara na Generations site na 2006, na-enweta ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma site na South Africa Film and Television Awards
Ọ pụtakwara na mgbasa ozi nke Vanish, Clover, na Honda
Ọ gụchara diploma na Ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ gbasara njikọta bụ Management Studies na 2010, tinyerekwara ụlọ akwụkwọ Wits Business
N'afọ 2015, ọ nwetara nkwekọrịta na-aga aga nke onye nnọchi anya nke ngwaahịa gbasara ihe ụmụaka n'eyi nke Mba ụwa nke ndị Philips Avent
Na 2006 na 2011, a họpụtara ya ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu narị nke ndi FHM kacha chapụ achapụ n'anya n'ụwa
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite dị egwu nke YOU ihe nkiri ọkacha mmasị
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye Obi ọjọọ ma bụrụ onye ji isi ihe nkiri onyonyo kacha mma na Duku-Duku awọd nke 2004, yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 2009 na ihe nkiri South Africa na ihe nkiri TV
Na 2016, na-esochi ọpụpụ ya n'ihe nkiri Generations, Danke malitere ịrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na South Africa soap opera bụ, Isidingo
Na ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ na-egosi agwa dị ka Kgothalo
Isidingo kwụsịrị ihe omume afọ iri abụọ na otu ya n'ọnwa Maachị abalị iri na abụọ na 2020
Tupu nkwubi okwu nkwusị Isidingo, a mara ọkwa na Danke ga-arụ ọrụ n'ihe nkiri Gomora , telenova South Africa ọhụrụ na satelaite dijitalụ na ọwa ntụrụndụ Mzansi Magic
N'afọ 2010, Katlego nwetara ihe nrite kacha mma na ihe nkiri South Africa na ihe nrite TV (SAFTAS) maka agwa ya dị ka 'Dineo Mashaba' na Generations
Katlego Moswane Maboe (amụrụ ya na 29 Ọktoba 1986) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV nke South Afrika, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na onye ndekọ ego
E nyere ya ihe nrite Best TV Presenter na ihe nrite nke ihe nkiri na onyonyo nke South Afrika n'afọ 2015 na 2016
A makwaara ya maka ịnabata ihe ngosi okwu ụtụtụ Expresso na SABC 3 kemgbe e bidoro ya n'afọ 2010
A mụrụ Maboe na Itsoseng, obodo dị nso na Lichtenburg, ma zụlite ya na obodo Ikageng, nso Potchefstroom
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu North West Children's Choir n'afọ 1998 mgbe ọ na-aga Potchefstroom Central School
Maboe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Potchefstroom High School for Boys n'afọ 2004, wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Chartered Accounting na Mahadum North-West n'afọ 2017
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum North-West, otu cappella a maara dị ka Flip a Coin gwara Maboe ka ọ sonyere ha mgbe a dọtara uche ha n'olu abụ ya
Ha jisiri ike wepụta abọm nke ọnụ dị atọ, na Maboe na beatboxing na olu

O mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na 2009 na usoro magazin ndụ Afrikaans DEKAT Ọ malitere ịhazi usoro magazin 50/50 na SABC 2 tupu ọ nabata Expresso na SABC 3 mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ malitere n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2010
Maboe anabatala oge nke abụọ nke Strictly Come Dancing South Africa
Ọ kwadokwara South African Film and Television Awards na 2016 ya na Minnie Dlamini, n'afọ 2017 ya na Thando Thabethe
Maboe kwadoro oge nke asatọ na nke itoolu nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Tropika Island of Treasure, nke o dekwara ma mee abụ isiokwu maka ya
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Maboe dị ka onye nnọchi anya HOPE Cape Town Goodwill
Ọrụ enyemaka ya gụnyere ọrụ ndị na-elekwasị anya n'inye ahụike na agụmakwụkwọ na Cape Town
Ya na dọkịta Michael Mol gbara ọsọ Cape Town Cycle Tour n'afọ 2011 na 2013, iji nweta ego maka ọrụ ebere
Maboe na-asụ asụsụ atọ ma na-asọpụta Afrikaans, Bekee na Setswana nke ọma
Site n'afọ 2018 ruo 2020, ya na nwunye ya, Monique Muller, na nwa ya nwoke Phoenix Katlego Maboe biri na Johannesburg
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, a kpughere na Maboe ghọgburu Muller ma bute ya ọrịa STD nke kpatara nsogbu na ọmụmụ ya
N'ihi mkpesa ọha na eze na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta n'ihi nke a, a chụpụrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn ya
N'ọnwa Septemba 2021, Katlego gbara nwunye ya na ndị SAFTA akwụkwọ maka nkwụjo nke àgwà ya na imebi ọrụ ya
Katlego Suzan Phala (amụrụ c
1992) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Limpopo Provincial Legislature maka Democratic Alliance
A họpụtara Phala ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mpaghara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ na Mee afọ 2014
N'ihi ya, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị omeiwu nke Provincial a họpụtara na mba niile na ntuli aka nke afọ ahụ
A họpụtala Phala ọzọ na ntuli aka nke Mee 2019
A mụrụ Phala na 1992 na Mankweng na mpụga Polokwane Ọ bụ nne ya, Violet Phala zụlitere ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mountain View High School n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2014, Phala kwupụtara na ọ na-amụ maka nzere na njikwa mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Mahadum South Africa
Phala sonyeere Democratic Alliance na June 2012 wee guzobe alaka otu na Mankweng
Maka ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, e debere Phala na nke atọ na ndepụta nke otu maka ndị omeiwu Limpopo Provincial Legislature
A họpụtara ya dịka DA meriri oche atọ
Nhọrọ ya mere akụkọ ihe mere eme ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị naanị afọ 22 n'oge ahụ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị omeiwu mpaghara a họpụtara na mba niile na ntuli aka nke afọ ahụ
A họpụtara Phala ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ na Mee 2019
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 22 Mee 2019
Katonda bụ aha a na-eji akọwa chi kachasị elu na okpukpe ọdịnala nke ndị Baganda, ndị n'ozuzu ha bi na Uganda nke oge a
A na-ewere Katonda dịka nna na onye ndú nke pantheon Baganda, nke a maara n'ozuzu ya dịka balubaale (sing
lubaale)
Dịka ọtụtụ Nnukwu chị Afrịka ndị ọzọ, E weeere Katonda ka chị bịtere aka nke bi n'anyanwụ -nke nọchitere eluigwe- ọ naghị enwecha ikike imetụtta ụwa
Kama, a na-enwe mmetụta ike ya site na omume nke balubaale
N'agbanyeghị etinyela aka ya n'ihe gbasara ụwa, Katonda na-apụta ihe n'ụwa ọzọ ma na-ekpe ụmụ mmadụ ikpe
Katsina-Ala bụ Obodo Gọọmentị (LGA) nke Benue Steeti, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Katsina-Ala ebe okporo ụzọ awara awara A344 malitere
Ọ bụkwa ebe a na-ahụ ihe mgbe ochie dị mkpa ebe a chọtara ihe ndị e ji mara ọdịbendị nke obodo Nok
LGA nke Katsina-Ala nwere mpaghara nke 2,402 km2 (927 SQ mi) na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke 224,718 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Ebe etiti obodo ahụ bụ ebe otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa dị, Government College Katsina-Ala, nke e guzobere na 1914, ma mepụta ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama na ndị Naịjiria
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 980
Obodo ahụ, nke dị n'akụkụ Osimiri Katsina Ala, isi mmiri nke Osimiri Benue, bụ ndị Tiv, Hausas na fulanis
Asụsụ nkwurịta okwu bụ isi na Katsina Ala bụ Tiv
A chọtara ihe oyiyi Terracotta na Katsina Ala n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ha na-agụnye ihe ngosi nke isi mmadụ, na ụfọdụ anụmanụ, na akụkụ nke ihe oyiyi buru ibu
Ihe oyiyi ndị ahụ yiri ndị ọzọ a hụrụ na Nok, ihe dị ka kilomita narị abụọ na itoolu n'ebe ugwu, a na-eche na ọ bụ ndị otu ọdịbendị ahụ mere ya
O yikarịrị ka ihe oyiyi mmadụ na-anọchite anya ndị nna nna ma ọ bụ mmụọ
Dị ka Bernard Fagg, onye ọkà mmụta ihe ochie nke mere nnyocha dị ukwuu n'ime ọdịbendị Nok, si kwuo, ọrụ ndị dị na Katsina Ala bụ ụdị dị iche iche
Ihe oyiyi sitere na Taruga na Samun Dukiya yiri, mana ha nwere ọdịiche dị iche iche
Ọrụ ígwè malitere n'ebe ahụ na narị afọ nke anọ BC, obere oge karịa ọrụ ígwè na Taruga
A chọpụtakwala beads tin a gbazere agbaze n'ebe ahụ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha nwere ike ịbụ ihe yiri mkpokoro ego ayọrọ

Katung Aduwak (amụrụ na Maachị 21, 1980) bụ onye mmeri nke mbipụta mbụ nke Big Brother Nigeria reality TV show nke e gosipụtara n'etiti Maachị 5 na Jụn 4, 2006
Ọ si Zonkwa, Kaduna Steeti, Naịjirịa ma bụrụ onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi yana onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Political Science

Ọ bụbu onye mgbasa ozi na Harvard Africa Business School Forum ma jee ozi ruo ọtụtụ afọ dị ka Senior Channel Manager na MTV Base, Senior Creative Director na VIACOM International na Executive Director na Chocolate City
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke One O Eight Media na African Partner maka Campfire Media ugbu a
A kpọrọ Aduwak dị afọ iri abụọ na isii onye mmeri nke ihe omume ahụ nke Michelle Dede na Olisa Adibua kwadoro, oge mbụ na Jụn 4, 2006 na ihe nrite nke $ 100,000
Afọ iri na otu ka e mesịrị, o kpughere na isi ihe ịga nke ọma na ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ya, na ịbụ onwe ya ma bụrụkwa onye atụmatụ
Ihe ga-abụ ihe nkiri izizi nke Aduwak bụ Heaven's Hell E debere ụbọchị ntọhapụ n'ezie maka Jenụwarị 23, 2015
Otú ọ dị, ewepụtaghị ihe nkiri ahụ ruo na Mee 10, 2019
One O Eight Media gbara ihe nkiri a n'afọ 2012, ya na BGL na Hashtag Media House na-arụkọ ọrụ ma gosipụta ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu Naịjirịa bụ Waje
N'afọ 2020, Aduwak obere ihe nkiri na-ekpughe esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị Afrịka Amerịka na ndị mba ofesi, nke akpọrọ Not Supposed to be Here
Aduwak lụrụ Raven Taylor-Aduwak ma nwee nwa nwoke
Katy Léna N'diaye (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Senegalese-French, nke a maara nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ya gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe osise n'Africa
A mụrụ ya na Senegal, N'diaye tolitere na Europe
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nke oge a na Paris, wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka TV5 Monde na RTBF, ma biri na Brussels
Ihe ndekọ N'diaye Traces ː nke Elvis Mitchell gosipụtara na New York Times dị ka 'nke a na-ahụ anya na nke na-enweghị isi' lekwasịrị anya na ihe osise mural nke ụmụ nwanyị Kassena na Burkina Faso
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, ụmụ nwanyị atọ meworo agadi na-akọwa ihe dị n'ihe osise ndị na-ekpuchi ụlọ ndị na-acha ọbara ọbara nye Anetina, nwa agbọghọ na-alụbeghị di
Na-echere ụmụ nwoke dekọrọ ụmụ nwanyị atọ tọrọ ya na-ekwu okwu ka ha na-ese ihe na mgbidi obodo na Oualata, obodo mara mma na nsọtụ Ọzara Sahara na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Mauritania

Kawira Mwirichia (nwụrụ n'afọ 2020) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nlekọta si Kenya nke bi na Osimiri Athi Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche nke a maara n'ụwa niile maka kangas ya yana ihe osise ọdịnala dị ka eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A mụrụ Kawira Mwirichia n'afọ 1986
Ọ biri na Athi River, Kenya
Ọ nwụrụ, e wee lie ya na Nọvemba 2020
Ọ natara nzere bachelọ nke injinia obodo na Mahadum nke Nairobi (Ọgọst 2007)
Site na Astraea Commslab, Mwirichia gara ọmụmụ maka ọrụ LGBTQI n'ịntanetị
Ọzụzụ nka ya sitere na ihe osise na web design na Institute of Advanced Technology nakwa na Nairobi Institute of Business Studies

Kawira Mwirichia bu n'uche ịmepụta Kangas maka mba otu narị na iri itoolu na isii niile nke ụwa Nhazi nke Kanga ọ bụla sitere na mkpali nke oge akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ na ọgụ ha maka ikike LGBT
Ka ọ na-erule 2017, iri atọ na asaa n'ime mba ịrị ise na asaa dị n'Afrịka na-ewere omume nwoke idina nwoke dika mpụ
Kangas bụ akwa owuwe ihe ubi ọdịnala nke East Africa na okwu Swahili na ha

Otu n'ime ihe éjị ndị Kangas eme bụ akụkụ nke emume agbamakwụkwọ, ebe a na-etinye ya n'ala iji nabata nwanyị ahụ a na-alụ ọhụrụ ma kpọrọ ya gaa agbamakwụkwọ ahụ, ma ọ bụ nata ma mee emume di na nwunye ahụ
'Na Nairobi, Kenya, e nwere ihe osise abụọ dị iche iche,' onye na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe ike Kawira Mwirichia kọwara

'E nwere ihe a na-akpọ ahịa Masai nke na-adabere na ọrụ aka ọdịnala na omenala agbụrụ, e nwekwara ihe osise nke oge a, nke 'ndị na-anwale ụzọ ndị ọzọ nke ngosiputa' To Revolutionary Type Love, na-emepụta mkparịta ụka n'etiti ụwa abụọ a, ka ọ na-eji akwa ọdịnala mepụta nka nke oge a
A na-egosi ihe ngosi ahụ na ọrụ sitere n'aka ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ
Akwụkwọ agba agba nwere ibe iri nke ọnọdụ Lesbian KamaSutra nke Kawira Mwirichia
Kawtar Boulaid (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba 1989) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-ahụ maka marathon
O sonyere na asọmpi marathon ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics
Kawther El Bardi (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Septemba 4, 1971) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Kay Brown (1932-2012) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe na ónyé édémédé bipụtara
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ e nyèrè ónyé otu Weusi Artist Collective, nke dị na Harlem n'oge 1960s na 1970s
E hiwere Weusi Collective, nke akpọrọ aha ya n'ihi okwu Swahili màkà ọchịchịrị, n'afọ 1965, nke ndị ikom mejupụtara kpamkpam
Eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ bụ naanị nwanyị so n'òtù a kpaliri ya ịchọ ụzọ isi nọchite anya ndị Black na-ese ihe
A nabatara ya n'ọtụtụ ebe dị ka otu n'ime ndị guzobere otu ndị na-ese ihe nkírí nke Where We At Black na New York City
A na-eto ọrụ Brown maka ịnọchite anya nsogbu ndị metụtara ndị Black ụwa site na nchịkọta mgbasa ozi ya na mbipụta ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ Brown na ngosi 'We Wanted a Revolution' na Brooklyn Museum
Brown jikọtara ya na ónyé na-ese ihe Dindga McCannon wee guzobe 'Where We At' Black Women Artists, Inc
() n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 1971
Isiokwu ndị a na-ekpuchi site na ngosipụta nka n'ime nzukọ a bụ ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya dị ka mmekọrịta nwanyị / nwoke ojii, ọdịnala Africa, na ezinụlọ ojii dị ka otu
Brown dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ na-eto eto, Willy's Summer Dream, nke e bipụtara na 1989
Brown bụkwa ónyé dere akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ekwu màkà ya bụ Willyz Summer Dream, nke sitere na ndụ naanị nwa ya nwoke
A makwaara nwa ya nwoke n'otu akụkụ dị ka ihe na-akpali ya maka Black Mother na Male Child
Brown bụ ónyé ọrụ na Medgar Evers College na osote prọfesọ na Anne Arundel Community College site na 1989 ruo 1990
Ihe ndekọ kwụ ọtọ màkà Kay Brown dị na Evans-Tibbs Collection nke National Gallery of Art Library
A na-etinye onyinyo ya na ihe ngosi 1972 Some Living American Women Artists nkè Mary Beth Edelson
Kay Brown bụ onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-ahụ maka ngosipụta nke akụkọ Black ọ hụrụ n'onwe ya
Brown jikwa nnukwu collages mee ihe iji nyere aka kwupụta atụmatụ ya
E nweela isiokwu ụfọdụ ebe a kpọtụrụ ya aha
Dị ka Mutual Art si kwuo, e gosipụtara Kay Brown na isiokwu maka AnOther, na ArtDaily (Dị ka MutualArt si kwuo)
Ọzọkwa, dị ka Mutual Art si kwuo, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, edemede ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Women Artists of Colour in the Spotlight of Wiki Edit-A-Thon dere maka H A P P E N I N G
Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, nke enwere ike ịchọta n'ọtụtụ gallery na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie
Kay Carberry, CBE (amụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1950) bụ onye bụbu osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke British Trades Union Congress (TUC)

Carberry gụrụ akwụkwọ na Royal Naval School Tal-Handaq na Malta, mgbe ahụ na Mahadum Sussex Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi afọ atọ, wee bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na National Union of Teachers (NUT), ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ dịka onye nyocha Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na TUC na 1978, na na 1988 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi mbụ nke Ngalaba ikike nhata Na 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ohere ohere nke Assistant General Secretary nke TUC
Carberry enweela ọtụtụ ọkwa ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye kọmishọna na Equality and Human Rights Commission, na Equal Opportunities Commission

Ọ bụ onye kọmishọna nke Low Pay Commission, onye otu Transport for London, onye nlekọta nke People's History Museum, onye nduzi nke TU Fund Managers, onye ọzọ so na The Takeover Panel na onye nsọpụrụ nke St Hugh's College Oxford
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara Carberry ka ọ bụrụ CBE
Ọ lara ezumike nká na TUC na 2016

Onyeàmà Kay Chiromo (December 24, 1951), bụ onye Malawi na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi nka
A mụrụ ya na Makoka Village, TA
Chigaru, Blantyre District
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị omenkà kachasị nwee nkà na ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na Malawi
Ihe ọ na-ese bụ ihe osise mmanụ mana ọ na-emekwa ihe osise akwụkwọ ma mee ihe ngosi vidiyo

Dị ka onye ọkà mmụta nka, Chiromo gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị na-ese osisi Malawi Akamitondo na Jibu Sani na KuNgoni Centre of Culture & Art, ọrụ nke onye ụkọchukwu Canada bụ Claude Boucher Chisale guzobere bụ onye kụzikwaara nka
Ọ natara nzere Master's na Fine Arts na Pratt Institute, kọleji nka onwe onye na New York City, n'afọ 1986
Chiromo gara n'ihu na-akụzi na Mahadum Malawi
Ọ rịgooro ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi dị elu na onye isi nke ngalaba nka dị mma na Ngalaba Fine and Performing Arts na Chancellor College
Chiromo akpaliwo ndị na-ese ihe gburugburu ụwa gụnyere David McCurry onye gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ya mgbe ọ nọ na Malawi
A na-eji ákwà, ájá ma ọ bụ nkume rụọ ihe osise mmanụ Chiromo mgbe ụfọdụ iji mepụta mmetụta miri emi na mmetụta atọ
O kwuru n'otu oge na, 'Ndị Afrịka na-egosipụta (onwe ha) nke ọma na nka atọ
Ọ na-ejikarị ụdị ákwà dị iche iche na-apụ n'ahụ ákwà rectangular ọdịnala
Ihe osise Chiromo ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na mba ụwa n'afọ ndị afọ 1980
E gosipụtara ha na gallery na ngosi na United States, Zambia, England, Canada na South Africa
Kay Chiromo nwụrụ na afọ 1994, mana enwere ike ịhụ ihe nketa nka ya na Malawi dum
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ nchịkọta nke ọrụ ya nke UNESCO kwadoro ma bipụta ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
E nwekwara asọmpi akwụkwọ mba kwa afọ, 'Kay Chiromo Literary Competition' nke akpọrọ aha ya site na afo 1995 ruo na afọ 1999

E bipụtara edemede ndị nwetara ihe nrite site na nchịkọta a n'akwụkwọ ndị dị ka 'Wildlife and Environmental Essays ihenrite nke onye meriri na ide ihie site na Isompi nke Kay Chiromo na afọ 1995-1999' Chiromo nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na afọ 1994
Kayla, ma ọ bụ Kayliñña (Ge'ez ካይላ kāylā, maka ndị mmadụ, Ge'ez Каይልኛ kāylññā, Kayla, Amharic, na Tigrinya maka asụsụ) bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Agaw abụọ nke otu ndị Beta Israel (Ethiopian Jews) na asụbu
Ọ bụ olumba nke Qimant
A na-ejikwa aha Kayla mee ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka okwu mkpuchi maka asụsụ abụọ Beta Israel
A maara ya naanị site na ihe edeturu na-ebipụtaghị nke Jacques Faitlovitch dere na mkpụrụedemede Ge'ez, nke David Appleyard mụrụ na nso nso a
Ọ bụ Beta Israel na-echekwa ya taa
Kaylah Oniwo bụ onye redio Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ejije, onye na-ede blọogụ na onye ngosi
A maara ya ama maka ịkwado 'The Road Show' na 'CATWALK WITH KAYLAH' na Cool FM Nigeria
A mụrụ Kaylah na Naịjirịa na 22 Jenụwarị
Nna ya bụ onye ọchịagha ndị agha mmiri ebe nne ya bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji
O nwere nzere na Banking na Finance na Mahadum Bowen O nwere asambodo site na Lufodo Academy of Performing Arts (LAPA) na ime ihe nkiri, Stage, Dance na Drama
Kaylah Oniwo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ dijitalụ, ma mesịa na 2005 rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ ahịa uwe
Ọ kwadoro 'Campus Square', 'Youth Scene' na ụfọdụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ maka Redio Unity Naijiria FM
Ọ sonyeere Cool FM n'afọ 2010
Na Cool FM ọ na-akwado 'The Road Show', nke na-amalite n'elekere atọ nke ehihie ruo elekere asaa nke ehihie
Ọ na-akwadokwa ihe ngosi nke ya, 'CATWALK WITH KAYLAH', nke na-ekwu maka ejiji
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi Kaylah kwadoro gụnyere
Kaylah bụ onye nnọchi anya akara maka akara ịma mma Makari
E gosipụtara ya na ụmụ nwanyị isii ndị ọzọ na mkpọsa 'The power of 7' site na akara ọla Bland2Glam
Ememme Kayo-Kayo bụ mmemme okpukperechi na omenala obodo kwa afọ nke ụmụ Oba Kosoko na-eme maka ọbịbịa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Eze Kosoko na Epe n'afọ 1851
Kayo-Kayo nke akwụkwọ edemede pụtara 'iri ihe na-eju afọ' bụ nke ndị Epe nke Lagos Steeti mara
A na-eme ememme a n'ọnwa mbụ nke kalenda islam maka ncheta 'Yaom-al Ashura' ụbọchị iri nke Muharram na kalenda Alakụba, nke bụ ihe dị ka otu ọnwa ka emechara ememme Muslim nke Eid-El-Kabir

Ememme Kayo-Kayo etoola ka ọ bụrụ ikpo okwu kwesịrị ekwesị iji kwalite, kwalite na ịkwalite akụ na ụba obodo, iji kparịta nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba nke ndị obodo na nke kachasị mkpa, ịgbasa omenala omenala did iche iche ha
N'afọ 1851, Eze Kosoko ji mmadụ Otu puku na nari use bịarutere ito ntọala ndị Eko-Epe
Nke a butere mmemme kayo-kayo ọdịnala a na-eme kwa afọ nke a na-eme iji cheta mbata ya
A na-emekwa mmemme ahụ kemgbe ahụ, iji ṅomie ka Eze Kosoko siri bịa Epe
Emume nke afọ 2016 bụ aka na-achị Lagos steeti bụ Gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode, bụ onye kwupụtara mmeghe ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
Ọzọkwa, mmemme kayo-kayo nke afọ 2017 bụ onye bụbu Gọvanọ Lagos steeti nakwa kọmishọna na-ahụ maka nhazi anụ ahụ na steeti Legọs bụ Biola Anifowoshe gara
N'afọ 2018, ihe karịrị ụmụ amaala 50,000 na ndị na-abụghị ụmụ amaala tụrụ anya isonye na mmemme ahụ, edekọtara ihe karịrị ụlọ mbikọ iri abụọ dị na Epe n'oge ememme ahụ
The 2018 kayo-kayo festival hosted former Governor of Lagos State, Governor Akinwunmi Ambode, Otunba Gani Adams, the Aare Oona Kakanfo of Yoruba; Dr
Abiola Dosunmu, Erelu nke Lagos, ndị eze ọdịnala na steeti ahụ yana ndị egwu egwu gụnyere Malaika, Queen Salawa Abeni na Sugar Boy

Mbipụta nke 2019 nke ememme ahụ gbadoro ụkwụ ma lekwasị anya na ọdịmma akụ na ụba obodo site na itinye ego bara uru na ngalaba ndị ntorobịa, ewezuga ụkpụrụ omenala na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na-eme ememe kwa afọ
Ha malitere usoro mmụta iji kwado nchụso agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị 35

Adeyemi Ikuforiji, onye bụbu Ọkà Okwu, Ụlọ Nzukọ Omeiwu Lagos State nọ na mbipụta 2019 ebe ọ gwara ụmụafọ Epe ka ha kpee ekpere maka Mr Ambode nwetara mmeri nke All Progressives Congress 'tiketi na ntuli aka gọvanọ ozugbo
Ọzọkwa, onye ama ama Fuji na-abụ, Wasiu Alabi Pasuma chụpụrụ ihe ntụrụndụ nke mmemme kayo-kayo 2019
N'agbanyeghị ajọ ọrịa COVID-19 na-efe efe, obodo Epe oge ochie ka na-eme ememme ọdịnala ya nke Kayo na nrube isi na ụkpụrụ nchekwa COVID-19
Ememme Kayo-Kayo bụ mmemme na-ewe izu, nke nwere akụkụ atọ

Akụkụ okpukperechi nke chọrọ iji kalịnda 1st Hijra kpọsaa afọ ọhụrụ Alakụba, akụkụ omenala nke na-echeta ọdịda Eze Kosoko na Epe na nke ikpeazụ, akụkụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze bụ maka ime mmemme mmekọrịta ọha na eze site n'ime na ikesa nri dị ukwuu nye mmadụ niile
Ememme a nwere ọtụtụ mmemme nke gụnyere ihe ngosi ihe ngosi ejiji, mmata na nyocha, ihe ngosi omenala, ngosipụta nke nri Epe kacha mma na ngagharị ndị ntorobịa
Iji gosi omenala ha nke ọma, ha na-aga n'ụgbọ mmiri iji mee ka Eze Kosoko si bịa Epe na 1851

N'afọ 2018, a na-eleta ọtụtụ saịtị n'oge ememme ahụ, n'ime saịtị ndị a gara bụ ụlọ nke Divisional Officers (ndị isi colonial), saịtị ọzọ bụ ebe mgbapụ na ụgbọ mmiri nke Eze Kosoko na 1851, bụ ebe enwetara Etufu (ọwa ọdịnala) nọ
ọkụ wee pụọ ruo oge nke ụbọchị asaa
Ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke ememme 2019 ka e ji ụgbọ mmiri na-anọchi anya ụgbọ mmiri nke nọchiri anya ụgbọ mmiri na Satọde
Ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ememme a na-amalite site na ekpere Juma'at, na-esochi ọgbakọ nta akụkọ
Ụbọchị abụọ na-egosi nleta eze na Olu-Epe nke Epe Kingdom n'ụtụtụ ma emesịa na mgbede, a na-ahụ abalị Tahjud na ụlọ alakụba Epe nke mbụ
Ọrụ Jummat pụrụ iche na-ewerekwa ụbọchị atọ na ụlọ alakụba Epe nke mbụ
Ụbọchị nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ nke dị na Satọde nwere ihe omume atọ

Nke mbụ bụ ekpere Kayo-Kayo a na-eme kwa afọ na Obí Olu-Epe nke Alaeze Epe, nke abụọ a na-eme bụ ngosi ngosi na mmemme Epe Kayo-Kayo na mmemme n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Epe, nke ikpeazụ bụ ihe na-amụba Etufu site n'aka ndị Etufu
Olu-Epe of Epe Kingdom
Olukayode 'Kayode' Ajulo bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria, onye na-ekpe ikpe na onye na-akwado ikike obodo
Ọ bụ onye otu nke Chartered Institute of Arbitrators
Ọ bụ Diocesan Registrar of the Anglican Communion, Church of Nigeria
A mụrụ Ajulo na Christiana Monisola O
Ajulo O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Iwu na Mahadum Jos n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 2001, ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa n'afọ 2000, a kpọrọ ya na Nigerian Bar
O nwetara nzere masta nke iwu n'afọ 2006 na Mahadum Jos
Ajulo bu onye nkuzi na Adekunle Ajasin University, Akungba-Akoko, Ondo State na Egalitarian Basic Studies Institute, Kumasi, Ghana
N'afọ 2013, Gọvanọ nke Ondo Steeti họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Radiovision Corporation
Ajulo bụ nwa akwụkwọ PhD na School of Law na Middlesex University London
Ajulo bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye otu Labour Party maka oche sineti FCT nke emere n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel 2011
N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, a kọrọ na ndị ikom bu ngwá agha tọọrọ Ajulo
Nke a mere ka ndị ọrụ Abuja nke ndị Nigeria Labour Congress na-edu kwụsị ntuli aka ahụ

N'okwu nke ndị isi nke Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) Abuja council, a gwara ndị ọrụ niile na ndị mmekọ n'ókèala ahụ ka ha kwụsị ntuli aka nke Nzukọ mba awa iri na isii tupu ntuli aka na mba ahụ n'ihi ịtọrọ Kayode Ajulo
Ajulo lụrụ di ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ
A mụrụ Navy Captain Kayode Olofin-moyin na Ilawe-Ekiti, Ekiti State, n'abali iri na-atọ nke ọnwa Mee, afo 1950
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementarị, ọ debanyere aha na Annunciation Catholic School, Ikere-Ekiti n'afo 1965
Ọ gụsịrị n'afo 1969 ma nweta Asambodo ụlọ Akwụkwọ ndị di na ọdida Anyanwụ Africa na ụdị di iche
Anabatara ya na Nigerian Defence Academy n'afo 1971 dị ka cadet wee mecha ihe agum akwụkwọ ya nke ọma n'ọnwa Disemba afo 1972 e wee duo ya n'iyi ọrụ nke ndị agha mmiri nke Naijiria
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, n'usoro ngwa ngwa, ọ gara maka ọzụzụ ndị ọzọ di n'ihu
Oteghi aka Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nchekwa Naijiria n'ọnwa Disemba 1972, mgbe ọ malitere agum akwụkwọ nke Midshipman onboard NNS OBUMA (nke a na-akpọbu NNS NIGERIA)
Ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba1973

Otu onye ọrụ nke enwere ike ịkọwa akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ ya maka ihe ọmụma dị ka onye n'anaghị eriju eriju, Navy Captain Olofin-Moyin gara Command and Staff College, Jaji nke nwere nnukwu nkwanyere ugwu n'afo 1985, O gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afo 1986
O mechara gaa National War College, Abuja, n’agbata afọ 1997 na 1998
Navy Captain Olofin-Moyin riri na-ọkwa na ọrụ ọ họọrọ

Site na Cadet n'afo 1972, e buliri ya banye na-ọkwa Midshipman n'afo 1973; Sub-Lieutenant (1973 - 1977); Lieutenant (1977 - 1981); Ọchịagha Lieutenant (1981 - 1988); Ọchịagha (1988 - 1994) na Navy Captain (1994)

Ụfodụ nhọpụta ya di ka Ọchịagha bụ, Onye isi ọrụ nchịkwa, NNS HADEJIA (Patrol Boat), (1978 - 1979); Onye isi ọrụ nchịkwa, NNS RUWAN YARO (Cadets Training Ship), (1984 - 1985); Onye isi ọrụ nchịkwa, NNS ENYIMIRI (A Corvette on ECOMOG Operation), Liberia, (1992 - 1993) na Onye isi ọrụ nchịkwa, Naval Air Station, (1996 - 1997)

Navy Captain Olofin-Moyin nwekwara nhọpụta ndị ọrụ dịka Staff Officer (Operation), Western Naval Command (1986 - 1988); Isi ọchịagha, Nigerian Naval College, Onura, Port Hacourt (1990 - 1992); Onye isi ndị agha Naval, ECOMOG, Liberia (1994 - 1995) na Onye Isi Ọrụ, Isi Ụlọ ọrụ ndị Navy, Lagos (1995 - 1996)

A họpụtara Navy Captain Kayode Olofin-Moyin ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi nchịkwa ndị agha nke Ogun State, Naijiria site n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1998 ruo Mee 1999 n’oge ọchịchị mgbanwe nke General Abdulsalami Abubakar, na nyefe ike Ọchịchị gọvanọ nye onye a họpụtara bụ Olusegun Osoba na mbido nke Republic nke anọ na Naijiria
O wuru ụlọ obibi ndi gọvanọ ọhụụ maka steeti Ogun, e meghere ya n'abali iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel 1999 tupu oge inyefe gọvanọ ndị nkịtị ike Ọchịchị
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2002 ọkụ gbara ma mebisia ụlọ ya dị na Victoria Island, Lagos
Kayondo bụ aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Kaysha (A mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye na-agụ egwu / onye na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe si na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Congo bụ Édouard Mokolo Wa Mpombo
A mụrụ ya na Kinshasa mana ya na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara France mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
A kpọrọ egwu mbụ Kaysha, nke jiri ihe nlele sitere na French West Indian band Kassav's Oulé, 'Bounce Baby'
Otu nke abụọ nke Kaysha bụ 'Telephone', site na album ya I'm Ready
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gbanwere ụdị ya niile iji dekọọ abọm obodo a na-akpọ Worldwidechico na duo ya na Wu-Tang Clan's Killah Priest
Otu n'ime egwu ya kachasị ukwuu bụ egwu Afrịka zuru ụwa ọnụ 'On dit quoi', site na abọm ya It's All Love, nke e wepụtara na akara nke ya Sushiraw n`afọ 2003
Ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya kachasị ukwuu bụ 'Love de toi', 'One Love', 'Question my heart', 'Fiona', 'Musiquarian' na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Kaysha bụkwa onye na-emepụta egwu
O mepụtara egwu maka Passi, Solaar, Jacob Desvarieux, Soumia, Elizio, Ludo, Vanda May, Aycee Jordanu na ndị ọzọ

O mepụtara nnukwu egwu maka ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ dịka 'Deeper' & 'Rebound Chick' maka Nelson Freitas, 'M hụrụ ya n'anya' maka Abege, 'Kpuchie anya gị' maka Djodje, 'Ceu' & 'Love again' maka C4 Pedro, na ọtụtụ egwu ndị ọzọ
O ritere ihe nrite Kora maka onye omenkà Africa kacha mma n'afọ 2000
O meriri ihe nrite Kora maka onye omenkà Africa kacha mma nke Diaspora n`afọ 2004 na n`afọ 2005

Ọ nọbu na otu Hip Hop abụọ a na-akpọ Kc Presh Ọ bụ onye Amaputu na Uli na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ime obodo Ihiala na Anambra Steeti Naịjirịa
O nwere nkwekọrịta ndekọ ugbu a na Five Star Music
Ya na Del B rụkọrọ ọrụ, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke a maara maka imepụta egwu 'Limpopo'
Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke okenye nke E-money
Kcee na onye ọrụ ibe ya na enyi ya hajie gbara egwu dị ka duo ruo afọ iri na abụọ
Ha zutere na ukwe ụka, ha nọ na ukwe ọnụ ruo mgbe ha abụọ banyere maka ihe ngosi Star Quest TV ọnụ wee merie ihe ngosi ahụ
Ọrụ ha ọnụ dị ka ndị mmekọ egwu nyere ha abụọ nkwanye ùgwù ole na ole ruo n'afọ 2011 mgbe ha kewara, ha abụọ na-achụ ọrụ nke ha iche
Kcee wepụtara 'Sweet Mary J' nke bụ egwu mbụ ya na afọ 2020
Cédric Matéta Nkomi (amụrụ na Creil, Oise, France n`ọnwa 30 Jenụwarị 1992) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu KeBlack bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-agụ egwu nke France nke sitere na Congo
Ọ bịanyere aka na akara Bomayé Musik
Keblack gosipụtara mmasị n'egwú mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ onye a ma ama na-eti egwu, ya mere a gbara Nkomi ume ịchụso agụmakwụkwọ egwu
Otu MGS kacha emetụta ya
Youssoupha na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ya Bomayé Musik (akụkụ nke Universal Music) bịanyere aka na ya na ntọhapụ ya 'J'ai déconné', nke ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu n`afọ 2015
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na diamond 'Bazardée' nke nwetara nde mmadụ 180 na YouTube
N'ịbụ onye ihe ịga nke ọma ya kpaliri, ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ọhụrụ, abọm Premier étage, nke e wepụtara n`ụbọchị 27 Jenụwarị 2017

Hakizimana Yussuf (amụrụ na 30 June 1990) nke a maara dị ka Kebby Boy bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke pop, rap na afrobeats, nke a bịanyere aka na IBN Music France ugbu a
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Sina Lawama', abụ na-agwakọta ụdị pop na ụdị afro pop
A mụrụ Kebby Boy na mpaghara Rumonge, Burundi, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
Kebby dere abụ akpọrọ Tonya nke Roméo onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri kirimba haziri na 2007
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya site na idekọ egwu na studio, wee wepụta egwu mbụ ya aha ya bụ Chozi Langu na 2008
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Islam na Burundi ma nwee diplọma mba
Mgbe a tọha pụrụ otu egwu ya bụ Wanyama Pori, e nyere ya onye nduzi nke akara ahụ
Na 10 Jenụwarị 2016, ọ bịanyere aka na akara Light Entertainment Company nke o ji dekọọ egwu dịka My Dodo, Sina Lawama wdg
na ụlọ ọrụ Wasafi Records nke onye egwu egwu Tanzanian Diamond Platnumz
Kébé bụ aha nna nke ndi West Africa nke nwere ike ịpụta ndia
Kebedech Tekleab (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye Etiopia na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, na onye na-ede uri
Tekleab gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Fine Arts na Addis Ababa, ebe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ ike na mmegide ụmụ akwụkwọ n'oge mgbanwe ahụ na ngwụcha afọ 1970
N'ịgbapụ Ethiopia, ọ banyere n'agha mba ahụ na Somalia, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ogige ọrụ mmanye ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri
A tọhapụrụ ya n'afọ 1989 o wee kwaga isonyere ezinụlọ ya na United States, ebe ọ natara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts n'afọ 1992 na Master of Fine Arts n'afọ 1995 na Mahadum Howard
O mepụtara usoro ọrụ ntaramahụhụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ edemede ya 'Humanity In Descent Visual Images Of Human Suffering'
Tekleab akụziela na SCAD Savannah College of Art and Design na Savannah, Georgia, na Mahadum Howard, na Washington, DC
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na The City University of New York, na New York City
N'afọ 2001, Tekleab na Alexander Boghossian rụkọrọ ọrụ na kọmitii a na-akpọ Nexus for the Wall of Representation na Embassy of Ethiopia na Washington, DC
Ọrụ ahụ bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ aluminum (365 x 1585 cm) nke a na-etinye na mgbidi granite nke ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya ahụ

Nexus gụnyere ihe ịchọ mma, ụkpụrụ na akara sitere na ọdịnala okpukpe ndị Etiopia nke gụnyere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, okpukpe ndị Juu, Alakụba na omume ime mmụọ ndị ọzọ nke ụmụ amaala na-agụnye akwụkwọ mpịakọta ihe atụ na ụdị ndị na-anọchite anya ngwá egwu, ngwá ọrụ bara uru, na osisi na anụmanụ mpaghara
Akebu ma ọ bụ Kebu (nke a na-akpọkwa Kabu; na asụsụ French) bụ otu n'ime asụsụ ugwu Ghana Tibet nke ndị Akebu nke ndịda Togo na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana na-asụ
Ọ bụ asụsụ ụda olu nwere klas aha
Akebu nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Animere
N'afọ 2002, e nwere ihe dị ka ndị ọkà okwu 56,400, nke dị na mpaghara Akébou nke Plateau Region nke obodo Togo

Kedjenou (nke a makwaara dị ka Kedjenou poulet na Kedjenou de Poulet) bụ nri na-esi ísì ụtọ nke ukwu!! a na-esi nwayọ sie na canari (pot terra-cotta) n'elu ọkụ ma ọ bụ coal ma jiri ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ guinea hen na akwụkwọ nri kwadebe ya
Ọ bụ nri ọdịnala na nke a ma ama nke nri ndi mba Côte d'Ivoire
Ụzọ e si akwadebe nri ahụ dịgasị iche
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eji obere ma ọ bụ enweghị mmiri agbakwunyere na nkwadebe ya, na-enye ohere ka anụ ahụ sie na juices nke ya, nke na-eme ka anụ ahụ dị nro ma na-etinye ụtọ nke ihe ndị mejupụtara ya
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-esi nri ahụ n'ime akwụkwọ unere a na-ekpuchi ekpuchi ma mechie ya nke a na-etinye n'okpuru coal ọkụ
Na Côte d'Ivoire, a na-ejikarị Attiéké, nri dị n'akụkụ nke e ji cassava e siri esi mee

ItKefee Obareki Don Momoh (Febụwarị 5, 1980 ruo Jun 12, 2014), onye eji Kefee mara site n'aha egwu ya, bụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na-abụ abụ ozioma ma na-edekwa abụ
Amụrụ ya na Sapele, Delta na abalị ise n'ọnwa Febrụwarị , 1980 na ezinụlọ Andrew Obareki ndị bụbu dikin n’ụlọ ụka nke nne na nna onye bụburu di ya bu Alec Godwin hibere
Kefee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na University of Benin na nzere nchịkwa azụmahịa
Mgbe ọ n'etolite ihe dịka afọ iri na ụma, ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike abịa n'ihe ụka ọkacha ịbụ abụ ukwe
Ka mkpali ya n’egwú nọ na-ebuwanye ibu, ọ malitere ichepụta na idepụta abụ
N’afọ 2000, o wepụtara otu ọba egwu akpọrọ “Trip” nke ahụ sụụrụ ya ụzọ ná ngwago egwu Naịjirịa dịka onye na-ahụ abụ ozioma
N'afọ 2003, ọ bịanyere aka na ihe omume ntụrụndụ Alec, akara ndekọ nke onye bụbu onye isi otu abụ guzobere ma ọ wee wepụta afere egwu studio mbụ ya bụ Branama obere oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Efere egwu Branama mere ka ọ chawapụta dị ka onye n'eti egwu Oziọma tinyere ọ̀zụ́zụ́ na ahịa mba na nke mba ụwaErere Branama casset itoolu n'ime izu atọ na ihe karịrị CD / VCDs nde abụọ n'otu ọnwa
Nke a bụụrụ ya mmalite ọganiihu n'ọrụ ya dịka ọgụ abụ oziọma nke Naijiria
'Branama' na 'Kokoroko'bụ egwu ọgụ abụ a laarala mmụọ ama ama
E nyere ya International Young Ambassador for Peace Award na 2009
Kefee meriri na nturu ugo isi nke 2010 maka mmeko kacha mma ya na Timaya maka 'Kokoroko'
Kefee lụrụ di na nwunye ugboro abụọ
Ọ lụrụ Alec Godwin afọ atọ ruo 2008
Ọ lụrụ onye nhazi mkparitakụka redio Teddy Esosa Don-Momoh na abalị atọ n'ime onwa macachị 2013 na Sapele, Delta steeti
Agbanyeghị na asịrị na ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya bụ prị-kplampsia, Kefee Obareki Don Momoh nwụrụ na ngwụcha ngụgụ na ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Los Angeles, California na June 12, 2014
Ọ nọ na coma ruo ụbọchị iri na ise
E liri ya na Fraịde Julaị 11, 2014 n’obodo ya Okpara Inland, Ethiope East Local Government Area nke Delta State, Nigeria
Na 11 Jula 2014, Isaiah Ogedegbe dere abu iji too ndu Kefee
Na 29 Septemba 2022, Isaiah Ogedegbe dere abu ozo gbasara Kefee
Egwu só ọnwụ ya

Keffi bụ obodo dị na Nasarawa Steeti, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Keffi
Keffi dị kilomita iri ise site na Abuja
Nasarawa Steeti University dị na Keffi nọ ọdụ okporo ụzọ Keffi-Akwanga
O nwere mpaghara 138 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ihe dika abụọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị iteghete na iri isii na otu
Obodo Keffi tọrọ ntọala n'ihe dị ka afọ puku narị asatọ na abụọ site n'aka onye ọchịagha ndị Fulani bụ Abdu Zanga bụ onye were ọkwa nke emir
Obere ọchịchị ya dị n'okpuru ala eze Zaria bụ nke ọ ga-eji na-atụ ụtụ ndị ohu kwa afọ
N'afọ 1902, Keffi bụ ebe ihe mere nke mere ndị Briten ji wakpo Northern Naijiria, mgbe ahụ 'magaji' onye nnọchiteanya nke Zaria sultan gburu onye uweojii Biriteni
Mgbe Magaji nwetara ebe mgbaba na Kano, nke a bụ ihe mgbakwasị ụkwụ mere Lugard ji wakpo caliphate ugwu

Kenny Aladefa (amuru 19 Disemba 1974) bu onye egwuregwu Naijiria agba egwu na ogige nke gbagoro na ihe mgbochi 400 mita na 1996 Summer Olympics wee nweta nrite ọla ọcha na ọla nchara n'egwuregwu All-Africa na 1995 na 1999
Nke kacha mma nkeonwe ihe mgbochi 110 mita - 1358 sekọnd,
kacha mma nkeonwe ihe mgbochi 400 mita- 4960 sekọnd
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Southern California wee nweta akara ugo nkà mmụta sayensị bayoloji
Ọ gbara asọmpi n'ọsọ asọmpi Grand Prix
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ọgwụ nke St
Matthew's University nke dị na Cayman Islands wee gụchaa na 2005 na nzere Dọkịta nke Ọgwụ
Kehinde Bankole (amuru 27 Maachị 1985) bu onye N'ime ihe nkiri nwanyị Naijiria, ihe nlere na onye nnabata ihe onyonyo
O mere egwuregwu mpụta mbụ ya na asọmpi ịma mma Miss Commonwealth Nigeria nke afọ 2003, wee gaa n'ihu na 2004 Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria ihe ngosi (MBGN)
O nwetara nturu ugo mkpughe nke afọ na 2009 Best of Nollywood Awards, afọ abụọ ka ihe ngosi ihuenyo mbụ ya gasịrị n'ime Wale Adenuga 's Super
A mụrụ Kehinde Bankole na steeti Ogun bu ru nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii nke onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Babatunde Bankole na Titilayo Bankole, bụ odeakwụkwọ nhazi
O nwere nwanne ejima, Taiwo, onye na-emekwa ihe mgbe ụfọdụ
Kehinde Bankole gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọTunwase Nursery na Primary , na Ikeja
Kehinde Bankole gụrụ Mass Communication na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo mana ọ were ezumike iji tinyekwuo uche n'ọrụ ịde ngosi ya na 2004
Ọ gbakwara egbe na Most Beautiful Girl na Nigeria mana o nweghi ike itinye ndepụta ise kacha
Mgbe nkwekọrịta nke Genevieve Nnaji gwụchara dịka onye nnọchi anya Lux, Kehinde Bankole a họpụtara ya na Sylvia Udeogu na Olaide Olaogun ka ha bụrụ ihu ọhụrụ nke Lux na 2007
Kehinde Bankole mere ihe ngosi mpụta mbụ ya n'oge ọchịchị ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Lux na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Super story Everything it Takes, Playing the Character Caro
O meela ihe n'ihe nkiri Wale Adenuga ndị ọzọ dị ka Papa Ajasco na This Life
Na Onyonyo ọrụ ya kachasị ama dị ka nwunye Kiki Obi na Desperate Housewives Africa, Usoro Amerika nke Naijiria mehariri
Kehinde Bankole na-anabata mkparịta ụka ụbọchị ehihie gụnyere 'Soul Sisters' na 'African kitchen'
