Lady Kehinde Kamson, KJW, (amụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ n'onwa Ọgọst 1961 na Lagos, Nigeria ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ndu ọchụnta ego, na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ na ngalaba nri ngwa ngwa na onye isi azụmaahịa ụmụ nwanyị pụtara ìhè na Naịjirịa

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Sweet Sensation Confectionery Limited - otu n'ime ụdị kachasị ike na ụlọ ọrụ nri ngwa ngwa na Nigeria nke ọ malitere site na ụlọ azụ azụ na obere ụlọ nchebe gbanwere nke nwere nanị ìgwè na eji ahụ oyi abụọ na-eji
ngwa ihe mkpofu ndị ọzọ emezigharịrị, ka ha hapụsịrị ọrụ ịgbakọ ego na-enye nnukwu ego

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-ekwu na ha gbanwere echiche asọmpi nke ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Quick Service na Nigeria si otú ahụ na-eduga na ọganihu mbara igwe a hụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afo ndị iri iteghete na afọ iri mbụ nke 2000s
Nne na nna Kehinde Kamson bụ ndị nkuzi
Nna ya, Adeleke Beniah Adelaja, bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ama ama nke Church Missionary Society Grammar School (CMS Grammar School) - ụlọ akwụkwọ grammar kacha ochie na Nigeria
Beniah bụ onye ụmụ akwụkwọ ya kpọrọ ya nke ọma dị ka 'Oga', 'Onye isi' ma ọ bụ 'Canon Adelaja', zụrụ ọtụtụ puku ụmụ akwụkwọ ma kụziere ha ihe, ọtụtụ n'ime ha gara n'ihu n'ọkwa ọchịchị na Nigeria
Nne Kehinde, Omoba Adebayo Evangelin Adelaja bụ onye nwe nwanyị nke Eva Adelaja Secondary School - ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos, Nigeria
Ewezuga ịbụ onye nkuzi, ọ bụkwa nwanyị na-azụ ahịa oge nile
Ọ bụ nwanyị pụrụiche, onye, ya na nna Kehinde, nyere ya ntọala ọ chọrọ iji nweta ohere n'inwe ezigbo ndụ
Kamson mụrụ ejima na ụbọchị iri na anọ n' onwa Ọgọst 1961
Ejima ndị a bụ onye ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụaka isii
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara ya dị na International Women's Society Nursery School dị na Lagos ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya bụ University of Lagos Staff School
Kehinde na eme ka nwoke mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ihe niile wee malite na ụmụ nwoke asatọ
Otu n'ime ụmụnne Eva Adelaja bụ ndị na-abịa mgbe niile iji soro ezinụlọ Kehinde mee ekeresimesi na Ista nwere ụmụ nwoke asatọ
Mgbe ọ bụla nna Kehinde na-eje ozi na mpụga Legọs, ndị mụrụ ya na-eziga ya na ejima ya n'ụlọ nwanne nna ya, ọ ga-ahụkwa na ya nwere ụmụ nwoke itoolu dịka ndị egwuregwu
Ọ dịghị egwuregwu ụmụ nwoke itoolu na otu nwa agbọghọ emeghị, site n'itinye osisi ruo n'ịwụ elu ruo n'ịgba bọọlụ
Ndị a tụgharịrị n'ọrụ ọ rụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya - St Anne's School, Ibadan, Nigeria - ebe ọ nọ na mwụ elu elu na tenis
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na n'ikpeazụ West Africa n'ịchọ iru eru maka egwuregwu Africa niile
O nwere ihe nrite ọla edo maka ịgba tenis maka West Africa mana o ruteghị ya n'egwuregwu Africa niile
O mere A-Levels na Queens College dị na Lagos wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Accounting na Mahadum Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lagos Business School

Kehinde Kamson malitere Sweet Sensation - azụmahịa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ngwa ngwa - na 1994 site na obere ụlọ ndị nche dị na Ilupeju, Lagos ka ọ nọrọ ihe dị ka afọ iri na-azụ ahịa n'obere ọnụ ahịa site na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala ezinụlọ ya

Azụmahịa a etoola ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime azụmaahịa kacha aga nke ọma nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Quick Service na Nigeria nwere ihe karịrị iri abụọ na ise n'ofe obodo ahụ, ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ pukur abụọ na ihe karịrị iri isii ụdị nri a na-enye kwa ụbọchị
Njem ọchụnta ego ya malitere mgbe ọ hụrụ ka ọ na-aga nke ọma n'azụmahịa otu mgbe
Nne ya rere ihe niile a pụrụ ichetụ n'echiche wee gaa njem gburugburu ụwa ịchọ ahịa ahịa kacha mma na ngwaahịa ọ na-ebuga Nigeria ire
Mkpebi ahụ nne ya nọ mgbe ọ na-azụ ahịa ya, kụrụ mkpụrụ nke azụmaahịa na Kehinde Kamson
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwụ ụgwọ ego mgbe ọ na-azụ ụmụ obere ezinụlọ ya
Ọ lụọla nwaanyị, malitekwa ịmụ ụmụ n’oge
Ọ chọpụtara na ya enweghị ike ịnagide ijikwa ezinụlọ ya ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ iteghete ruo ise, ya mere ọ kwụsịrị ma tụgharịa uche n'ihe ọ ga-eme
Nke ahụ bụ oge o kpebiri ịmalite azụmahịa nri ya nke mechara bụrụ Sweet Sensation
Ụzọ Kehinde Kamson si bịa azụmahịa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ngwa ngwa bụ ijikọta ụdị nri mpaghara na nke mba ụwa ka ọ na-emepụta ntụziaka ọhụrụ mgbe niile

Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-atọ ụtọ ga-enwe ụdị nri nke gụnyere Sukiyaki, Genève Peppersoup (GPS, Grillo Fish, Farmers pottage, Indiana Rice, Soul Food, Yamboree, Swag Chicken, Chickito na ndị na-emekarị dị ka Meat Pie, Chicken Pie, Puff Chicken, Scotch Egg, osikapa e ghere eghe, osikapa Jollof, aki oyibo na osikapa na ụdị ofe dị iche iche
Kehinde Vaughan (amụrụ na 19 Disemba afọ 1961) bụ nwaafọ Naijirịa n'agba ọsọ
O sonyeere na mita 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 1980 Summer Olympics

Kehinde Wiley (amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 28, afọ 1977) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe osise nke bi na New York City, onye a maara maka eserese ya nke ndị isi ojii, na-ezo aka ugboro ugboro na ọrụ nke eserese Old Master
E nyere ya ọrụ n'afọ 2017 ka ọ see ihe osise nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Barack Obama maka Smithsonian National Portrait Gallery, nke nwere ihe osise nke ndị isi ala Amerịka niile gara aga

Columbus Museum of Art, nke kwadoro ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na 2007, na-akọwa ọrụ ya dị ka ndị a 'Wiley enwetawo otuto n'oge na-adịbeghị anya maka ihe osise dike ya nke na-ekwu maka onyinyo na ọnọdụ nke ụmụ okorobịa ndị Afrịka na Amerịka na ọdịbendị nke oge a
E tinyere Wiley na Time magazine's mmadụ 100 kachasị nwe ike ịmetụta ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Wiley na Los Angeles, California
Nna ya, Isaiah D
Obot, bụ Yoruba, si Naijiria, nne ya, Freddie Mae Wiley, bụ onye Afrịka
Wiley nwere ejima nwoke
Mgbe Wiley bụ nwata, nne ya chọrọ ka ya na nwanne ya nwoke pụọ n'okporo ámá wee kwado mmasị ha na nka ma debanye aha ha na klas nka mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, a họpụtara Wiley na nwanne ya nwoke na ụmụaka iri anọ na asatọ ndị ọzọ ka ha nọrọ obere oge na ụlọ akwụkwọ nchekwa nka na Russia, na mpụga St
Petersburg
Ọ bụ ebe a ka Wiley zụlitere mmasị ya maka ihe osise
Wiley kwuru na nwanne ya nwoke dị mma n'ihe osise karịa ya na nke a mepụtara echiche asọmpi n'etiti ha
Ha abụọ ga-asọmpi ịhụ onye nwere ike ịmegharị ihe oyiyi kachasị mma
Ọ gara n'ihu na klas ndị ọzọ na US ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Los Angeles County High School for the Arts
Nne ha zụlitere ejima ahụ; ozugbo nna ha, onye bịara US dị ka nwa akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ laghachiri Naijiria, na-ahapụ Freddie ka ọ zụlite ụmụ isii nke di na nwunye ahụ
Wiley ekwuola na ezinụlọ ya lanarịrị na nyocha ọdịmma na obere ego nke nne ya nwetara 'ụlọ ahịa' - nke nwere akụkụ ụzọ n'akụkụ ụzọ n'èzí ụlọ ha
Wiley gara Naijiria mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ izute nna ya ma chọpụta mgbọrọgwụ ezinụlọ ya n'ebe ahụ

Wiley nwetara BFA ya na San Francisco Art Institute na 1999 na MFA ya na Mahadum Yale, School of Art na 2001; tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-ese ihe na Studio Museum na Harlem, [ya] nke Wiley mechara kwuo na-ese ihe [ya] bụ taa
[ọ] bụ taa
[ Jeffrey Deitch, onye na-ere ihe osise na onye nlekọta, nyere Wiley ihe ngosi mbụ ya Deitch nọchitere anya ya maka afọ iri sochirinụ
Wiley ekwuola na onye na-ese ihe bụ Kerry James Marshall nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ

Keira Hewatch, ( /k m r ə H m w ɒ tʃ / ; amuru na onwa Novemba 8, 1985) bu onye omere, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye ode akwukwo, mara amara maka oru ya dika 'Keche' na ihe nkiri; Two Brides and a Baby, nakwa ọrụ ya dị ka 'Peace Nwosu' na usoro ihe onyonyo a; Lekki Wives Hewatch nwetara ihe nrite Besy of Nollywood (BON) maka 'Best Breakout Performance' na 2011 wee họpụta ya ugboro abụọ maka Golden Icon Academy Awards (GIAMA)
A mụrụ Hewatch na Calabar, Cross River State
Nne ya, Elizabeth Hewatch, bụ onye nkuzi nwere ndị uwe ojii, onye zụrụ Keira bu nne ya, nna ya bu onye ozioma na ala ọzọ
E bugara nne ya na Minna, Niger State ka ọ kụzie na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị uwe ojii wee kpọrọ Keira dị afọ iri na otu ka ya na ya sọrọ
Ezinụlọ Hewatch kwagara Ghana na 2005, ebe e debara aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ nchịkwa ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ iji mụọ Travel na Tourism na Hospitality Management
N'afọ 2006, na-emecha ule asambodo ya, Hewatch kpebiri ịchụso mmasị ya maka ime ihe nkiri
Ọ nọrọ afọ ọzọ na Ghana na-agbalị ịbanye n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ n'efu, n'ihi na ọtụtụ ọrụ gụnyere ịsụ olumba obodo
N'afọ 2007, ọ laghachiri Naijiria, ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-achụso mmasị ya maka ime ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye yiri onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ibe ya, Mercy Johnson ; akọwara ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ha abụọ yiri
Oge ezumike mbụ Hewatch bịara na usoro onyonyo Cross Roads nke Emeka Ossai mere
Na 2010 ọ gosiputara dị ka onye ndu, ya na Desmomd Elliot, na nke mbụ mana ekpebiri akụkọ ifo ihe nkiri sayensị , Kajola, nke Niyi Akinmolayan duziri
Anabataghị ihe nkiri a nke ọma na sinima Naijiria
N'afọ 2011, ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ gosiputa ka 'Keche', onye isi ọrụ, na Two Brides and a Baby ya na OC Ukeje, Stella Damasus-Aboderin, Chelsea Eze na Okey Uzoeshi
Hewatch na-akọwapụta na mmasi ime ihe nkiri sitere na ụmụaka nke The Sound of Music mkpaliri mmụọ mgbe ọ kiririiri ya nke moge be ọ dị afọ 5
Na 2012 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọhụrụ kachasị mma na 2012 maka Golden Icon Academy Awards (GIAMA)
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na otu ndi ọrụ ebere; 'Tge Wings of Love Foundation', nke lekwasịrị anya n'inyere ụmụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ aka, ụmụ ogbenye na ndị nwata ka ha na wepụ n'okporo ụzọ ma wulite ndụ ha
Iri ise Kate

Keith Eric Joubert (afọ 1948 rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2013) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-echekwa ihe na South Africa, na nwanne nwoke nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri anụ ọhịa na onye na'echekwa ihe Dereck Joubert
A na-eji afọ ndị Joubert a mụrụ na Germiston na-agagharị n'etiti ọbọdọ ndị na-egwupụta ihe n'elu ala na-agbaso nna ya, ónyé bụ ónyé na-enyocha ihe n'ebe a na-egwe ihe
Ọ gàrà ihe na-erughị ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na otu, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke kwalitere ọgba aghara n'ụlọ ma mepụta àgwà siri ike, nke siri ike
Njem ezinụlọ ya na-eme mgbè niile na Kruger National Park kpaliri ịhụnanya na-adịgide adịgide màkà ụwa okike

Ọ gụrụ Industrial Design na Johannesburg School of Art n'etiti afọ 1963 na 1967, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese akwụkwọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na'ikpeazụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, na-emepe ụdị eserese nke mechara mee ka ọrụ ya màrà, ma ghọọ ọkachamara na 1970
Ndị ezinụlọ Keith na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye na-ahụ n'anya ma dị njikere mgbè niile inyere ndị ọzọ aka ma tinye ha n'ihu hime
Joubert nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ya na bushveld, n'ikpeazụ hapụ ndụ ọbọdọ kpamkpam, ma na-arụ ọrụ site na ụlọ ọrụ na Selati Game Reserve

Mgbè niile na-aga, Joubert nyochara Southern Africa, na-ama Namibia, n'ebe ugwu Ivory Coast na Cameroon, Mozambique, East Africa, Botswana, na Okavango Basin ebe o nwèrè ụlọ ụgbọ mmiri na ogige studio na Osimiri Linyanti
A na-ahụ ọrụ Joubert n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na nkè onwe n'ụwa niile
N'ikwere na ihe onwunwe ya mere ka ndụ ya sie ike, ọ kwenyere na ụgbọala ya nwere ụkwụ anọ, ụlọikwuu, na àkwà ogige
Nwunye ya, Val, hapụrụ ya
Keith Duncan Mallett (amụrụ n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto, ónyé na-ete ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Isiokwu ya sitere na ihe atụ ruo na ndụ na ihe omimi
E gosipụtara ọrụ Mallett n'ụwa niile ma gosipụta ya na ụlọ ọrụ na nke onwé

O nwetakwala ihe ịga nke ọma dị ukwuu na ọtụtụ mbipụta mbipụta a na-ere ere, e nyekwara ya ọrụ ịmepụta mbipụta mbipụtara nke gọọmentị na-echeta ncheta afọ iri ise nke ọganihu Jackie Robinson n'ime nnukwu egwuregwu baseball
A mụrụ Mallett na Roaring Spring, Pennsylvania
Nna ya bụ Boyd Mallett bụ ónyé agha nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ma bụrụ onye injinia na onye na-ahụ maka eletrik nke nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe ọ dị afọ irí atọ na atọ
Mallett dị afọ isii n'oge nna ya nwụrụ
Nne ya, Dorothy Williams zụlitere Keith, ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ Jason na Ronald Mallett, na nwanne ya nwanyị Eve, naanị ya
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Mallet malitere ise ihe dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ
Keith gụrụ ihe osise na Art Students League na Hunter College na New York City
Ógè abụọ ọ nọrọ na kọleji mere ka ndị prọfesọ ya gbaa ya ume ịrụ ọrụ ọkachamara ma nweta ọkwa na-arụ ọrụ màkà ọtụtụ n'ime ndị prọfọfesọ
Mgbè ọ nọ na New York, Mallett malitere ịrụ ọrụ màkà ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-ese ihe ndekọ màkà Virgin Records na ịmepụta T-shirts màkà ọtụtụ ìgwè egwu a ma ama
N'afọ 1980, ọ kwagara Los Angeles iji gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nka ya
Na Los Angeles, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ màkà Jam Power Records wee malite igosi ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ gallery
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ kwagara Los Angeles, ọ kwagara San Diego ịrụ ọrụ na Front Line Graphics
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere ilekwasị anya n'ise ihe osise mara mma na nka ndị Africa America
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma zuru ụwa ọnụ nke 'Generations', Mallett malitere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya Keith Mallett Studio Inc
Ndepụta ụfọdụ nke ndị ahịa Keith na-agụnye Random House, Lenox China, Franklin Mint, New York Graphic Society, Springs Industries, Icon Shoes na Canadian Art Prints
kachasị amasị ya bụ etching
[citation needed]

E gosipụtakwara nka ya n'akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Charlotte Watson Sherman's Sister Fire, Jonah Winter's How Jelly Roll Morton Invented Jazz, na Ray Anthony Shepard's Runaway The Daring Escape of Ona Judge, ma gosipụta ya na mkpuchi Chicken Soup maka African American Soul na Chicken Supp maka African American Woman's Soul
Mallett na nwunye ya Dianne bi na San Diego ugbu a
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Christopher, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Yale
Keith Eric Martin (September 22, 1966 March 25, 2022) bụ ónyé America R&B na-agụ egwu na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A maara ya nkè ọma màkà ide na ịbụ abụ ịhụnanya
Martin bụ nwa nwoke nké abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ gere ntị na Jackson 5, Prince na mmepụta nke Jimmy Jam na Terry Lewis, na Stevie Wonder
Egwú jazz na gospel nwekwara mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ
Martin malitere ịkpọ piano, bass guitar, drum na ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ malitere ide egwu mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
Martin bụ ike n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ na ngwụcha afọ 1980, na-etolite na ezigbo ndị enyi Johnny Gill na Stacy Lattisaw na bassist Oteil Burbridge na Kenny Lattimore
Ọ bụ onye otu, Masquerade, nké gụnyere ejima, Art na Scott Powell, Sharif Walters na D'Extra Wiley, ónyé mechara bụrụ ónyé otu Jack R&B ọhụrụ nke afọ 1990 II D Extreme
Na Machị 25, 2022, a hụrụ Martin nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya na Quezon City, Philippines, mgbè ndị agbata obi dọrọ ónyé njikwa condominium aka na ntị
A chọpụtabeghị kpọmkwem ụbọchị ọnwụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na akụkọ kwuru na Martin anwụọla otu izu tupu a chọta ya
Ógè ikpeazụ ọ pụtara n'ihu ọha bụ na agbamakwụkwọ Daryl Ong na Dea Formilleza na Machị 12
Ọ dị afọ 55
E kpebiri na ọnwụ ya bụ ọrịa obi siri ike kpatara ya
Keith Pollard (/ˈpɑːlərd/; amụrụ na Jenụwarị 20, 1950) bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ ọchị

N'ịbụ onye sitere na mpaghara Detroit, a maara Pollard nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'otu oge na ihe nkiri Marvel Comics nke gụnyere The Amazing Spider-Man, Fantastic Four, na Thor na ngwụsị afọ 1970 - mmalite afọ 1980
Keith Pollard mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 1974 na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka Master of Kung Fu, Deadly Hands of Kung Fu, Astonishing Tales, na Black Goliath
N'etiti afọ ndị 1970 ọ dọpụtakwara mkpuchi mbụ maka ụfọdụ n'ime utu aha kwa izu na akara Marvel UK
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile nke The Amazing Spider-Man site na mbipụta #186 (Nov
1978) ruo mbipụta #205 (June 1980) ma dee ihe nkwado na The Amazing Spider-Man Annual #15 (1981)
Ya na onye edemede Marv Wolfman, Pollard webatara Black Cat na The Amazing Spider-Man #194 (July 1979)
Wolfman na Pollard bụ ndị otu keputara Fantastic Four #200 (Nov
1978) na The Amazing Spider-Man #200 (Jan
Pollard bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile nke mbipụta Thor #286-320
Na 1982, Pollard kwagara DC Comics ebe o sere akụkụ nke Wonder Woman #300 (Feb
1983) wee malite usoro Vigilante na Marv Wolfman
Ya na Elliot S
Maggin kere Kristin Wells version nke Superwoman na DC Comics Presents Annual #2 (1983)
Pollard na Stan Lee mepụtara akwụkwọ ọgụgụ Silver Surfer The Enslavers graphic novel na 1990
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1990, ọ sere profaịlụ njirimara niile maka Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Master Edition
Pollard hapụrụ ihe ọchị na 1996, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-apụta mgbe ụfọdụ na mgbakọ akwụkwọ ọchị
Keith Sweat (amụrụ na Julaị 22, 1961) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé mmepụta ndekọ, na ónyé mbụ na egwu ọhụrụ jack swing
A maara ya maka nchịkọta egwu ya gụnyere 'I Want Her', 'Make It Last Forever', 'I'll Give All My Love to You', 'Meke You Sweat', 'Get Up on It', 'Twisted' na 'Nobody'
O weputara abọm 13 n'onwe ya (2 dị ka akụkụ nke R&B supergroup LSG) ma chọpụta otu Silk na Kut Klose
A mụrụ Keith Sweat na Harlem, New York City, nke Juanita Thompson, ónyé na-edozi ntutu, na Charles Sweat, ónyé na'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Juanita zụlitere ụmụ ha ise naanị ya mgbè Charles Sweat nwụsịrị na 1973
Sweat malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka ónyé otu egwu Harlem a na-akpọ Jamilah na 1975
Site n'enyemaka nke Jamilah, Sweat nwèrè ike imezi ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú site n'ịrụ ọrụ na mpaghara niile dị na New York, New Jersey na Connecticut
Ọ bụ onye bassist Larry Peoples, ónyé guitarist Michael Samuels, na ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ Walter Bradley malitere otu ahụ
Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị otu ahụ na 1984 iji malite ọrụ n'onwe ya, ọ bụrụ abụ na klọb abalị na New York City ma nweta ohere idekọ màkà akara onwe ya, Stadium Records

Sweat dekọrọ naanị egwu abụọ maka Stadium, 'Lucky Seven', na 'My Mind Is Made Up', nke bụ nke atọ na nke anọ ha wepụtara, mana na ntọhapụ mbụ nke Stadium, a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ónyé edemede na ónyé na-emepụta 'You Are the One for Me', ndekọ ikpeazụ nke otu GQ mere
Otu n'ime ndị otu GQ bụ nwanne nna ya, Keith 'Sabu' Crier
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2002, Keith Sweat wepụtara abọm nke asatọ ya, Rebirth
Otu 'One on One' ruru No
75 na Billboard Hot 100 na No

44 na Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks chartAbọm ya nke afọ 2008 Just Me gụnyere egwu, 'Love U Better (nke Keyshia Cole gosipụtara) Sweat bịanyere aka na Kedar Records ugbu a ma wepụta abọm studio nké irí ya akpọrọ Ridin' Solo na June 22, 2010
Otu egwu a na-ebute ụzọ site na abọm ahụ bụ 'Test Drive' ma gosipụta ónyé ibe ya bụ Joe
Kemgbe afọ 2007, Sweat abụwo ónyé na-elekọta mmemme redio nke mba niile dabere na usoro mmiri ozuzo dị jụụ
The Keith Sweat Hotel (nke a maara dị ka The Quiet Storm na Keith Sweat na WBLS na New York City) na-agbakọta site na Premiere Radio Networks

Sweat bụkwa ónyé na-elekọta ihe ngosi redio nke mba a na-akpọ The Sweat Hotel, nkè m mepụtara ma kesaa na ụlọ ọrụ redio ndị okenye na-eto eto na-etolite na US site na Premiere Networks, ónyé enyemaka nke iHeartMedia, Inc
Site na 1992 rụo 2002, Sweat lụrụ The Real Housewives of Atlanta kpakpando Lisa Wu Hartwell
Ya na ya nwèrè ụmụ nwoke abụọ, amụrụ na 1995 na 1998
O nwekwara ụmụ nwanyị atọ, otu ya na Tracy J
O nwekwara nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Joshua
Kejok bụ onye dike n'akụkọ ifo n'okpukpe ọdịnala nke ndị Dinka, ndị bi na Sudan ugbu a
Kejok bụ nwoke nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ ebube
A mụrụ ya nye nne Dinka, ọ bụ ezie na amụrụ ya site n'ime nke mmụọ nsọ
Kejok nwere nwanne nwoke aha ya bụ Menyang, ọ bụ ezie na a maghị ma ha nwere otu nna
A na-ekwu na a mụrụ Kejok n'afọ 1700
Nne ya, Quay, tụụrụ ime Kejok na mberede mgbe ọ gara ọdọ mmiri na Korather, nso Shambe
A na-ejikọta ọdọ mmiri a na nna nna nke Dinka, Desheik
N'oge ahụ, Quay lụrụ Cheng, onye otu Akorbil nke Dinka
Quay mụrụ Kejok mgbe ọ dị ime ụbọchị ole na ole
Dịka ndị dike ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ, Kejok ghọrọ nwoke toro eto n'ime ọnwa ole na ole ma nwee ike ịrụ ọrụ ebube
O nwere ike ịgwọ ndị kpuru ìsì ma mepụta mmiri naanị site na iji nkwụ ya kụọ ala
Kejok nwere nwanne nwoke aha ya bụ Menyang
Ọ na-enwere ikike Kejok anyaụfụ ma bo ya ebubo amoosu
N'ikpeazụ, esemokwu malitere n'ihi ebubo Menyang
Kejok chọrọ idebe udo, ya mere ọ hapụrụ ndị Dinka
Okwu ikpeazụ ya bụ na ọ ga-alaghachikwuru nna ya, Chineke, ma ọ ga-alaghachikwute n'ihu ndị Dinka n'ọdịnihu
Kekefia bụ nri dị n'akụkụ nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, nri ahụ na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị mmadụ nọ na steeti Bayelsa
Plantain bụ isi ihe eji eme nri a, ndị ọzọ gụnyere ose, alibasa, anyiya na-esi ísì ụtọ, mmanụ nkwụ na nnu
A na-enye Kekefia na ofe nwere anụ ma ọ bụ azụ

Kelechi Amadi-Obi (amụrụ na Disemba 29, 1969) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebipụta Mania Magazine Ọrụ ya na foto na nka ọhụụ emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na mba ụwa nke gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa gụnyere Snap Judgment New Position in contemporary African Photography, International center of photography New York (2006) A kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto ama ama ama na Naịjirịa bụ ndị nyere aka tinye foto Naịjirịa na map ụwa
Vogue na-akpọ ya 'ike dị ukwuu na ọnọdụ okike na Naịjirịa'
A mụrụ ya na Owerri, Imo Steeti n'ezinụlọ Justice Sylvester Amadi-Obi, onye ọka ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu, na Oriakụ Theresa Amadi-Obi, onye mmụta, Amadi-Obi bụ nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ asaa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Library Avenue, Umuahia, Abia Steeti, wee gaa Gọọmentị College Umuahia maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya bụ na Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta iwu ya n'afọ 1992 ma kpọọ ya na Nigerian Bar n'afọ 1994
Mgbe ọ nọ na campus, ọ rụrụ obere ụlọ ọrụ nke ọ kpọrọ De-Zulu

Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ bịara nwekwuo mmasị na nka nke foto ma mesịa, mgbe ọ gbasịrị ọtụtụ afọ, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere otu na-ese foto na Naijiria Depth of Field, nke nwere dịka otu n'ime ndị otu ya, TY Bello onye ga-aga n'ihu ịbụ onye na-ese foto na onye egwu
Amadi-Obi n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Onebello, magazin ejiji, mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe mere o ji tụfuo iwu maka foto, kwuru na nhọrọ ahụ abụghị n'etiti foto na iwu, kama n'etiti foto na nka
O kwuru na ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe site na nwata
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Lagos Photo Festival, Didi Museum, Rele Art Gallery, na ebe ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke ịgba foto ejiji na ịma mma maka magazin True Love, magazin South Africa nwere nnukwu ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na Nigeria nke gara n'ihu inwe mbipụta West Africa nke a na-akpọ True Love West Africa, Amadi-Obi malitere magazin ejiji ya nke ọ kpọrọ Style Mania magazine

Magazin a na-egosipụtakarị na mkpuchi ya ndị Omenkà Naijiria na na ụdị okike dị ka Tiwa Savage, P-Square, Omotola Jalade Ekeinde, Stephanie Okereke, TY Bello, Agbani Darego, Bassey Ikpi, Mo' Cheddah n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ndị Amadi-Obi weghaara
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2016, n'oge foto maka onye na-ese egwu hip hop Jidenna na Broad Street, Lagos, Amadi-Obi chọpụtara Bukola, onye na-ere pillows n'okporo ámá Lagos
O gosipụtara mmasị ozugbo n'ebe ọ nọ dị ka onye nwere ike ịme ihe nlereanya ma hazie ịgba égbè na studio ya
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ ọtụtụ foto ndị mara mma nke gbasara Naịjirịa, na-eme ka onye na-erebu pọdkastị bụrụ onye nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'otu ntabi anya na ịme ihe ngosi
Kelechi Emeteole (1951 ruo 21 Jụn 2017) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mba Naịjirịa na 1976 African Cup of Nations nke e mere na Etiopia
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke otu dị iche iche dị ka Heartland FC, Enugu Rangers, El-Kanemi Warriors FC na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ osimiri nke mba
Emeteole gbara bọọlụ iri na asaa maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa wee gbaa goolu anọ site na 1975 ruo 1977
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 1976 African Cup of Nations ebe Naịjirịa meriri ọla nchara
A na-akpọkarị ya 'Caterpillar' maka 'ụdị nchebe siri ike'
Emeteole bụ osote onye nkuzi nke otu Super Eagles na onye isi nchịkwa nke Heartland FC, Enugu Rangers, El-Kanemi Warriors FC na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ osimiri nke mba
Ọ zụrụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ osimiri, nke a maara dị ka Super Sand Eagles site na 2007 ruo 2009
Mgbe ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke Iwuanyanwu Nationale (nke a na-akpọ Heartland FC ugbu a) na afọ 2009, otu ahụ ruru CAF Champions League finals
N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, ìgwè mmadụ iwe wakporo Emeteole, onye bụ onye nkuzi nke otu Enugu Rangers n'oge ahụ, mgbe ha meriri egwuregwu
A chụrụ ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mee 2015 ebe ọ nọ na-elekọta ọnwa atọ
El-Kanemi Warriors nke Maiduguri were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi n'ọnwa Ọgọọst afọ 2015
Emeteole kọrọ na ọ tụfuru olu mgbe egwuregwu ikpeazụ dị n'etiti El Kanemi Warriors na Heartland Football Club nke Owerri na Disemba 2015
Ọ na-eche nsogbu yiri nke ahụ ihu tupu mgbe ahụ
Na Jenụwarị 2016 Federal Medical Centre, Owerri mere biopsy mana chọpụtara na ọ bụ ọrịa
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa akpịrị n'ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi nke Mahadum Lagos
Maka ọgwụgwọ ya na India, a kọrọ na ọ chọrọ US $ 11,000

Ọ natara enyemaka ego site na Nigeria Soccer Federation-United States of America (NSF-USA), Imo Foundation, Super Eagles defender Kenneth Omeruo, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugonna Ozurigbo maka ọgwụgwọ ya
Emeteole nọ na India maka ịwa ahụ mana ọ nwụrụ na 21 Jụn 2017 n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na New Delhi mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii mgbe ọ ka na-agwọ ọrịa
Ọ malitere na nsogbu iku ume ma nwunye ya Lolo Emeteole hapụrụ ya
Kelechi Zeal Iheanacho (bu onye amụrụ na 12 Julaị 1981) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Ọ nọrọkarị ọrụ ya na Poland ebe ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Nigeria na Hungary
Wisła Kraków
Kelechi Promise Nwanaga (a mụrụ ya 24 Disemba 1997) bu onye igba ube Naijiria
Dị ka onye na-eto eto, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 2015 African Junior Championship

Ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi 2015 nke Africa, gụchara nke anọ na asọmpi Africa 2016, nke isii na asọmpi Commonwealth 2018, meriri nrite ọla edo na asọmpi 2018 nke Africa ma gbachitere ihe nrite ọla edo ya na asọmpi Africa 2019
Nke kacha mma nkeonwe Nwanaga bụ mita 5815, nwetara na Julaị 2017 na Ozoro, na-esetịpụ ndekọ ọhụrụ Naijiria
Kelechi Nwaneri (amụrụ n'afọ 1994) bụ onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ ya na Lagos
Kelechi na-emepụta nka dabere na ihe omume na-eme na gburugburu ebe obibi ya
Ọrụ ya na-ezo aka na Igbo iconography
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Agricultural Extension na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka n'afọ 2015, ma merie asọmpi 2018 Spanish Embassy kwa afọ Visual Art Competition na Abuja, Nigeria
N'afọ 2020, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na ebe obibi maka AKKA PROJECT na Venice, Italy
Ngosipụta o mere naanị ya
2021 Myths Kristin Hjellegjerde Berlin
“2020Modern marks” Ebony/curated Cape Town, South Africa
Kelis Jones (aha nna ya bụ Rogers, amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa ọgọstụ, 1979), amaara ya ka Kelis bụ onye na agụ na onye n'ede egwu si Amerikạ

O ritakwara ihe nrite Brit ma nweta kwa mkpokọta nke ugboro abụọ nke Ihe mme mme Grammy￼￼Amaara ya maka njikota egwu nke atọ ya ọ kpọrọ TastyE weputara Tasty na afọ 2003 na bụ egwu Kelis pụtara ihe; o rèrè gáfè nde abụo na uwa
Ndi madu nyere ya áká maka nka
Njikota edemede nka nwèkwàrà egwu nke ya gbalili ha kporo 'Milkshake', o dàrà na nti madu, nor ngahù
Kelia é rélé njikota egwu rúrú nde atọ
Kelley Elizabeth Johnson (amụrụ na Mee 6, n'afọ 1993) bụ onye nọọsụ America, onye na-ahụ maka TV na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma
Na mgbakwunye na ịbụ Chief Nurse Advocate, ọ bụkwa nwa akwụkwọ doctoral, onye isi okwu na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere mba
E kpuwere Kelly Johnson okpueze Miss Colorado na afo 2015 ma tinye onye nke abụọ na Miss America 2016
Johnson mechara merie Miss California USA 2018
O tinyere n'ime mmadụ iri kachasị elu na Miss USA 2018
A mụrụ Johnson na Fort Collins, Colorado, ma nọrọ na nwata ya na Windsor, Colorado
Nne ya bụ Julie Johnson Haffner na nna nna ya bụ Gene Haffner
Johnson nwekwara ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ulo akwụkwọ Fossil Ridge High School na Fort Collins n'afọ 2010
Johnson gara Mahadum Colorado Mesa site na 2010 ruo 2012
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na n'afọ 2015 na Mahadum Grand View ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nọọsụ ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke klas nọọsụ ya
Johnson bụ onye nọọsụ e debara aha ya
Na Machị 30, n'afọ 2014, mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Grand View dị na Des Moines, Iowa, Johnson meriri Miss Liberty 2014

Ọ sọrọ mpi dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ iri na ise na asọmpi Miss Iowa nke afọ 2014 n'elu ikpo okwu nke 'Raising Awareness About the Importance of Early Cancer Detection' na piano na-egwu dị ka talent ya
Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ n'elu iri maka aha steeti niile
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, mgbe ọ laghachiri azo na steeti ya, e nyere Johnson okpueze nke nyere ya ohere ịga n'ihu na agba ọzọ na asọmpi ahụ
Ọ banyere asọmpi steeti na Denver's Ellie Caulkins Opera House na June 2015 dị ka otu n'ime ndị ruru eru iri abụọ na isii
Ikike asọmpi Johnson bụ okwu nke metụtara ahụmịhe ya na onye ọrịa ọ zutere ọrịa Alzheimer
Nkwupụta ya bụ 'The Health Initiative PLUS Prevent, Live, Uncover, Study'
Johnson meriri asọmupi ahụ na Satọdee, June 20, 2015, mgbe ọ natara okpueze ya site n'aka onye na-apụ apụ Miss Colorado Stacey Cook
Dị ka Miss Colorado, ọrụ ya gụnyere ịpụta n'ihu ọha na Colorado
Johnson bụ onye nnọchi anya Colorado na asọmupi Miss America 2016 na Atlantic City, New Jersey, na Septemba 2015
Na ngwụcha telivishọn na Septemba 13, n'afọ 2015, o mere okwu mbụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke onye ọrịa ọ zutere dị ka nọọsụ n'oge akụkụ talent nke asọmpi ahụ
N'akụkụ ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, a jụrụ ya nwanyị kwesịrị ịpụta na ụgwọ dollar iri wee zaa 'Ellen DeGeneres'
Nkwupụta onwe onye nke Johnson bụ 'The Health Initiative PLUS'
A kpọrọ ya onye nke abụọ na Betty Cantrell, Miss Georgia 2015, ma nye ya ihe nrite agụmakwụkwọ $ 20,000

Na Septemba 14, n'afọ 2015 nke The View, ndị na-akwado Joy Behar na Michelle Collins na-achị Johnson ọchị, onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha, maka okwu Miss America ya nke o yi uwe nọọsụ na stethoscope mgbe ọ na-ekwu maka ọrụ ya
Okwu ha kpalitere mmegide na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze, ọkachasị site n'aka ndị nọọsụ, ụfọdụ ndị mgbasa ozi wepụrụ mgbasa ozi ha na ihe ngosi ahụ

Na Septemba 17, n'afọ 2015, Johnson pụtara na The Ellen DeGeneres Show iji kwurịta ajụjụ na azịza ya n'elu ikpo okwu, na-atụ aro na DeGeneres kwesịrị ịnọ na ụgwọ dollar iri na mkpebi ya ịme otu okwu banyere nọọsụ maka talent ya
Mgbe a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ, Johnson natara $ 10,000 site n'aka Shutterfly iji nyere aka kwụọ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ ya maka ụlọ akwụkwọ nọọsụ anesthetist
Na Disemba 3, n'afọ 2017, e chiri Johnson okpueze Miss California USA 2018 mgbe ọ nọchitere anya Redondo Beach na asọmupi ahụ site n'aka onye na-apụ apụ India Williams
Ọ nọchitere anya California na Miss USA 2018 ma tinye ya na iri kachasị elu
Erica Dann nọchiri ya na njedebe nke ọchịchị ya
Kelly Lloyd (a mụrụ n'afọ 1977 na Indianapolis ) bụ onye nlereanya America, onye ndụmọdụ, onye ọka iwu, na onye bụbu eze nwanyị mara mma nke sọrọ mpi na Miss Teen USA, Miss USA na Miss America
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii sọrọ mpi na asọmupi atọ a, a makwaara ya dị ka onye mmeri Triple Crown
Aha mbụ Lloyd nwetara bụ Miss Indiana Teen USA 1993
Ọ nọchitere anya steeti ya na asọmupi Miss Teen USA 1993 nke a na-agbasa site na Biloxi, Mississippi na August 10, n'afo 1993 wee bụrụ onye nke mbụ
Charlotte Lopez nke Vermont meriri asọmpi ahụ
Lloyd ritekwara ihe nrite Most Beautiful Eyes
Lloyd malitere ịsọ mpi na usoro Miss America na 1996 mgbe o meriri Miss Central Indiana
Mgbalị mbụ ya iji merie asọmpi Miss Indiana mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nke abụọ
N'afọ 1997, ọ bụ onye mbụ gbara ọsọ na Miss Indiana USA 1998 (nke Nicole Llewellyn meriri)
N'afọ 1998, a kpọrọ Lloyd Miss Ball State, ọ nọkwa na onye nke abụọ na Miss Indiana, ma nọchite anya steeti ya na asọmpi National Sweetheart ebe ọ nọkwa na onye nke abụọ
N'afọ 1999, o meriri na Miss North Central Indiana ma sọọ mpi maka Miss Indiana, nke o meriri na June 12, n'afọ 1999
Lloyd meriri Albert J
Lloyd nwere ụkwara ume ọkụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ebumnuche ikpo okwu ya bụ imeziwanye ndụ ndị nwere ọrịa ahụ

Na Nọvemba 18, n'afọ 2001, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ itoolu mgbe ọ hapụsịrị aha Miss Indiana Teen USA, Lloyd meriri na 2002 Miss Indiana USA Ọ gara n'ihu ịsọ mpi na Miss USA 2002, nke e mere na steeti ya na Gary, Indiana, ebe ọ gbara onye nke abụọ na Shauntay Hinton nke District of Columbia
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị okpueze ya, Lloyd malitere azụmahịa ndụmọdụ nke ya nke a na-akpọ 'Triple Crown Consulting'
Mgbe ọ nwetechara Juris Doctor ya na Indiana University School of Law na Bloomington, a nabatara Lloyd na Indiana Bar na 2006
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye nlereanya na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ya na Midwest niile ma enwere ike ịhụ ya na mgbasa ozi maka Gatorade, Safe Auto, Centennial Wireless, na HH
Gregg, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Lloyd rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke Indiana Operations maka Sanders & Associates, Inc, nke mepụtara Miss Indiana USA na Miss Indiana Teen USA
Ugbu a ọ lụrụ di, ọ bi na Greenwood, Indiana, ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu ụlọ ọrụ maka Ahụike Mahadum Indiana
Kelvin Doe (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1996, na Freetown, Sierra Leone), nke a makwaara dị ka DJ Focus, bụ onye injinia Sierra Leone
A maara ya maka ịkụziri onwe ya injinia mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ ma wuo ụlọ ọrụ redio nke ya na Sierra Leone, ebe ọ na-egwu egwu ma na-agbasa ozi n'okpuru aha 'DJ Focus'
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ na asọmpi GMin's Innovate Salone idea, nke Doe wuru generator site na ọla
Doe ga-eji iberibe eletriki a tụfuru atụfu mgbe niile iji wuo transmitter, generators, na batrị
N'ihi ihe ọ rụzuru, ọ natara akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù na United States ma mesịa bụrụ onye kacha nta isonye na 'Visiting Practitioner's Program' na MIT
Doe mechara bụrụ onye na-ekwu okwu na TEDxTeen ma kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ injinia na Harvard College
Na Mee 2013, Doe bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọrụ anyanwụ $ 100,000 na onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ dị elu nke Canada Sierra WiFi
O nweela ohere izute ndị isi dị iche iche nke ụwa gụnyere onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ mba US bụ Hillary Clinton, na onye isi ala Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo
O nwekwara ike ịgwa ndị na-eto eto na Afrịka okwu n'elu ikpo okwu dị iche iche
N'afọ 2016, Kelvin Doe ghọrọ onye otu Board nke Emergency USA, otu nzukọ nwere ọrụ inye nlekọta ahụike na ịwa ahụ n'efu nye ndị agha na ịda ogbenye metụtara
Doe ugbu a nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ya K-Doe Tech, Inc, ebe ọ na-emepụta ma na-ere ngwá electronic ndị ahịa
RadicalMedia dere ihe ndị ọ rụzuru ma gosipụta ya na ọwa YouTube ụlọ ọrụ ha
Mgbe vidiyo ahụ gbasara, CNN, NBC News, na The Huffington Post weghaara akụkọ ahụ
Taa, Doe bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù [dịka onye?] ndị na-eto eto na-emepụta ihe n'Afrịka

Kelvin Ngozi Ikeduba (amụrụ na 21 Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri nke meriri n'afọ 2014 maka ihe nrite maka Best Cross Over Actor na Yoruba Movie Academy Awards (YMAA) ma bụrụkwa onye a maara nke ọma maka ọdịiche ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria dị ka egosila ya na fim Nollywood ebe a na-ejikarị asụsụ Bekee eme ihe na mmepụta ha ma gosikwa ya na ihe nkiri Yoruba dị iche iche na Yoruva naanị na-ekwu okwu nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nke Naijiria mepụtara

Ikeduba ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ nwa afọ Delta Steeti, a mụrụ ya na Ebute-Meta na Lagos Steeti mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naijiria nke ndị na-asụ Yoruba nke Naijeria na-ejikarị ma si n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ isii, ụmụ nwoke abụọ, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, nne, na nna nke ọ bụ nwa mbụ
A zụlitere Ikeduba site n'oge ọ dị obere ruo mgbe ọ toro na steeti Lagos, kpọmkwem na Olokodana Street na Ebute-Metta

Ikeduba nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na steeti Lagos mana n'ịchọ inweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum ọ kwagara n'obodo Benin, mpaghara ndịda nke Naịjirịa ebe ọ tinyere akwụkwọ maka ịgụ na Mahadum Benin iji mụọ Economics
A nabatara Ikeduba ma mesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na nzere BSc
na Economics
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Vanguard, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria, Ikeduba kwuru na ọ malitere na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria n'afọ 2000

Ọ kọwara ọrụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria dị ka ihe ndabara ebe ọ bụ na ọ chọrọ iso enyi ya gaa nyocha maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mana mgbe ọ ruru ebe ha na-aga, o kpebiri ịnwale ya ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ya ka a kpọrọ ya ma nye ya ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ikedubaʹs ikike ịghọta na ikwurịta okwu n'asụsụ atọ kachasị na Naịjirịa bụ ihe dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya, ọ kwetara eziokwu a ma kwuo okwu n'ihu ọha banyere ya

Ikeduba malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'asụsụ Bekee naanị ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjịrịa nke a maara dị ka Nollywood mana o mechara gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe mere eme Yoruba na Naijiria site n'enyemaka nke Femi Ogedengbe onye mere ka ọ mata Saheed Balogun onye nyere ya ọrụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Yoruba ọ na-emepụta nke akpọrọ Omo Alhaja

A na-ewere Ikeduba n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria dị ka onye 'nwa okorobịa ọjọọ' n'ihi ọdịdị ya, ya mere n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri niile ọ gosipụtara, ọ bụ onye na-emegide ya mgbe niile ma ọ bụ dịka mgbasa ozi Naijiria na-ekwu ya
Ikeduba na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ n'ihi na ọ nwere ike ịsụ asụsụ Yoruba, asụsụ Hausa asụsụ Igbo yana asụsụ Bekee, nke bụ asụsụ nkwurịta okwu na Naịjirịa
Kelvin Katey Carboo (10 Machị 2000) bụ onye Ghana na-egwu volleyball n'ụsọ osimiri
Na Jenụwarị 2020, o sonyere na CAVB Iko Kọntinental nke emere na Accra na Essilfie dị ka onye mmekọ ya ma ha nọ n'ọnọdụ 1st
Kelwyn Sole (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1951) bụkwa onye na-ede uri na agụmakwụkwọ na South Afrika
Sole gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na nsọpụrụ na Bekee n’imeMahadum nke Witwatersrand ma na-esote nke ahụ, Mahadum London nke East and African Studies nyere ya nzere MA
Kemafo Nonyerem 'Kema' Chikwe bụ onye bụbu Minista Naịjirịa nke Federal Aviation
Ọ na-ejide ọkwa nke National Women Leader nke pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria PDP ugbu a
Chikwe malitere akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ ise n'Aba na nke bụ Abia State ugbu a
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na French na Advanced Teachers' College, Owerri
Ọ gakwara Queen's College nke City mahadum nke New York ebe ọ nwetara nzere na French
O nwetara nzere doctorate na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka, na agụmakwụkwọ
Chikwe ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ redio, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, Prime Time Limited, ndị na-ebipụtara magazin Ash
O bipụtara akwụkwọ atọ, dezie ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ma nye aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ

Keme Nzerem bụ Nigerian British journalist na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ a kpọrọ Channel 4 News kemgbe afọ 2001
Ọrụ ya bụ igụpụta akụkọ mere eme di iche iche nakwa ikwu ka osi mee
Nzerem guru Geography na University of Sussex Ọ mechara nwetakwa nzere nke postgraduate site na-ịgụ maka Broadcast journalism

Tupu ọ gaa rụọ n'ụlọ ọrụ Channel 4news, Ọ rụrụ dika odee ndi Comic ReliefỌ rụọla ọrụ na Channel 4's ma bụrụkwa onye nta akụkọ na Washington, yỌ kwadokwara ma gosipụta ihe ndi di iche iche dika egwuregwu na More4 News
N'afọ 2002,I onyChannel e na-emepụta egwuregwu, yana onye na-ekerịta ọwa Channel 4, na-ewetakwa mmemme nwanne ya, More4 News
Na 2002, o dere banyere ahụmịhe ya banyere ịga ụlọ ọrụ na-akpụ akpụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ, Richard Reid
N'afọ 2008, Nzerem nwetara onyinye ozi mba ofesi Royal Television Society maka akụkọ maka usuu ndị agha America nke Iraq 2007
Kemezung (Dumbo, Dumbu, Dzumbo, Kumaju) bụ asụsụ Southern Bantoid (Eastern Beboid) nke Cameroon
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, ọ bụ 85% lex yiri Bebe
Àtụ Beboid languages

Oluwakemi Adekoya (amuru na ọnwa 16 Jenuarị na afọ 1993 na Lagos ) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu na- eme egwuregwu na-asọ mpi maka Bahrain
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe mgbochi 400 mita ma nwee ihe kacha mma nke 5459 nkeonwe - ndekọ Bahraini
Na Jenụwarị 2019, a kọrọ na Adekoya nwalere ihe dị mma maka stanozolol steroid n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na nnwale asọmpi na Nọvemba 2018 wee kwụsịtụrụ ya nwa oge
E wepụrụkwa nsonaazụ ya niile enwetara mgbe 24 Ọgọstụ 2018 gasịrị
Oluwakemi Adekoya guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye mgbanaka n'ọkwa mba na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011 wee tinye nke ise n'asọmpi Naijiria
N'afọ 2012, ọ kwalitere ike ya ruo 5716 sekọnd iji tinye nke abụọ na Confederation of African Athletics meeting na Warri
Na afọ ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ na ule Olympic nke Naijiria, mana o nweghi ụkpụrụ ntozu zuru oke
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ asọmpi World Junior Championship na 2012 mana ọ bụghị asọmpi
Na afọ 2013, Kemi setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma n'onwe ya nke 5530 sekọnd, na-agba ọsọ ruo Muizat Ajoke Odumosu, onye isi ihe mgbochi Naijiria, ma tinyekwa 400 mita kacha mma nke 5257 sekọnd
Ihe mgbochi ya kacha họọrọ ya n'ime ndị egwuregwu iri atọ kachasị ọsọ n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ
Ọsọ mbụ Adekoya nke afọ 2014 gosipụtara nnukwu mgbanwe maka ọrụ ya
Na-eme mpụta mbụ ya na sekit Njikọ Njikọ, ọ meriri ndị 400 niile m ihe mgbochi ubi na mmeri ịtụnanya
Oge ya nke 5459 sekọnd bụ nke na-eduga n'ụwa, yana ndekọ mba Bahraini - ọ gbanwere obodo ya na steeti ọgaranya mmanụ na mbido afọ wee gosipụta ọkọlọtọ na-ekwu 'I ♥ Bahrain' mgbe mmeri ya gasịrị

Ntugharị a amabeghị maka Solomon Ogba, onye isi otu Athletics Federation of Nigeria, bụ onye nọ na asọmpi ahụ na Doha wee degara International Association of Athletics Federations akwụkwọ mkpesa, na-ekwu na njem ya bụ nke enweghị usoro
Agbanyeghị, ebe ọ bụ na Adekoya edebeghị aha ya na gọọmentị mba ahụ, mba ahụ enweghị ike igbochi mmegharị ahụ

Ndị ọrụ Naijiria na ndị mgbasa ozi kwuru na nke a dị ka ihe atụ nke mba Africa na-efunahụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu n'ụlọ ha na mba ndị na-abụghị ndị Africa bara ọgaranya (ndị Nigeria sprinters Samuel Francis na Femi Ogunode abụọ kwagara Qatar )

Na Satọde, 13 Ọgọst 2016 na ụbọchị 9 nke Rio 2016 Olympic Games na Brazil, Kemi gbara ọsọ kacha mma nke 5072 iji pụta nke abụọ n'azụ Phyllis Francis nke America bụ onye gbara 5058 sekọnd ebe ahụ site na iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ 3
Na Jenụwarị 2019, a kọrọ na Adekoya nwalere ihe dị mma maka stanozolol steroid n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na nnwale asọmpi na Nọvemba 2018 wee kwụsịtụrụ ya nwa oge
Àtụ Footer World Indoor Champions 400m Women
Kemi Adeosun (amụrụ 9 Maachị 1967) bụbu onye minista na-ahụ maka ego na Naijiria bụrụkwa onye bụbu onye isi oche Board of African Export – Import Bank (AfreximBank)
A mụrụ ya na 1967 na London, England site na nne na nna Nigeria, ha abụọ si Ogun State
Kemi nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Economics na Mahadum East London yana nzere Postgraduate na njikwa ego ọha na mahadum nke London
Ọ ruru eru dị ka onye Akaụntụ Chartered na Institute of Chartered Accountants na England na Wales na 1994

Kemi Adeosun malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye enyemaka ndekọ ego na British Telecom, London, site na 1989 ruo 1990, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gawa ra Goodman Jones, London, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nyocha site na 1990 ruo 1993

Kemi wee bụrụ onye njikwa nke Nyocha Ime na London Underground, London na Prism Consulting site na 1994 ruo 2000 tupu ọ banye PricewaterhouseCoopers, London dị ka onye isi njikwa site na 2000 ruo 2002
Na 2002, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Chapel Hill Denham Management ma mesịa bụrụ Onye isi Nchịkwa na 2010
Ka ya na Quo Vadis Partnership rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi Nchịkwa site na 2010 ruo 2011, a họpụtara ya Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ego na steeti Ogun na 2011
Kemi jigidere ọrụ a site na 2011 ruo 2015
Ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọrụ Gọvanọ Ibikunle Amosun na -ewu, bụ nke tụgharịrị akụ na ụba steeti ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Adeosun Kemi dịka minista na-ahụ maka ego na Naịjirịa
N'ime ọgbakọ izugbe nke Afreximbank nke dị n'Abuja iji mee ncheta afọ iri abụọ na ise, a họpụtara Adeosun onyeisi oche nke ụlọ akụ ahụ
Kemi Adeosun nọchiri onyeisi oche na-apụ apụ bụ Ndagijimana Uzziel, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego na mba Rwanda
Na 7 Julaị 2018, akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria bụ Premium Times boro ebubo na Kemi Adeosun nwetara akwụkwọ ikike NYSC ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị iji bata n'ọkwa ọchịchị

N'ụbọchị 9 Julaị, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọha na eze NYSC Adeyemi Adenike wepụtara nkwupụta nke gosipụtara na Adeosun ziri ezi nyefere arịrịọ maka asambodo, ma kwukwa na nyocha ka na-aga n'ihu iji nyochaa nkwenye nke arịrịọ asambodo
N'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba 2018, Adeosun gbara arụkwaghịm dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego n'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara onyeisiala n'ihi asịrị eboro NYSC satificate forgery
Kemi Adeosun bụ onye na-abụghị onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ọrụ ya niile, o sonye na pati na-achị Naijiria, All Progressives Congress (APC), na 5 Mee 2018
Àtụ Finance Ministers of Nigeria
Kemi Adesoye bụ a onye Naijiria n'iede ihe n'huenyo, kasị mara amara na-ede na oké ihe nkiri The Figurine
Ọ deela ọtụtụ usoro nke usoro onyonyo Tinsel
Adesoye, onye sitere na Kwara, amụrụ ma zụlite ya n'isi obodo steeti Kaduna nke ugwu
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
Adesoye tolitere na -ekiri ihe nkiri, nke kpụrụ n'ụdị dị iche iche dịka ihe ọchị, ihe ọchị, ọdịda anyanwụ, ihe nkiri na ncha
O nwetara nnabata na mahadum ka ọ mụọ Architecture
Ebe Adesoye ka na -agụ akwụkwọ, agụmagụ ya maka ide ihe tolitere mgbe ọ sụrụ ngọngọ n'akwụkwọ akpọrọ ' Elements of Script Writing ' nke Irwin R
Blacker dere, n'ọbaakwụkwọ sayensị ụlọ akwụkwọ ya; n'oge a, ọ maghị na edemede ihe nkiri bụ aka ọrụ
O mechara gaa n'ihu n'ubi ya wee nweta nzere masta na Federal University of Technology, Minna, Niger Steeti
N'oge mmalite nke ide ihe, o chere ihe ịma aka ihu n'ihi na ụlọ akwụkwọ edemede adịghị na Nigeria n'oge ahụ, yana enweghị agbamume sitere n'aka ndị mmadụ
Agbanyeghị, mgbe ọ matasịrị ịhụnanya o nwere maka ide ederede, Adesoye malitere ịmụ edemede site na ịntanetị wee mechaa, wee gaa nkuzi edemede na New York Film Academy na United States
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Adesoye rụrụ ọrụ na redio afọ ise, na -ede ihe n'akụkụ
O dere edemede mbụ ya na 1998
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na IFBA International Film na Broadcast Academy, ebe ọ mụtara maka ọrụ MNet kwadoro nke akpọrọ ' Ntuziaka Ọhụrụ '
Ulọ ọrụ ahụ na -achọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, wee ziga ya na obere edemede, akpọrọ ' The Special Gele '
E mechara họrọ edemede a, ya na mmadụ anọ ndị ikpeazụ na ọkara ikpeazụ
Agbanyeghị na o merighị asọmpi ahụ, ọ nwetara agbamume ọ chọrọ iji gaa n'ihu
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ banyere maka mbipụta ọzọ nke otu asọmpi ahụ wee merie, ebe edegharịrị ya ka ọ bụrụ obere ihe nkiri; ọ gbara asọmpi n'afọ na -eso ya wee merie ọzọ
Ihe oru ngo a kpọrọ New Directions nyere Adesoye ohere izute ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka Amaka Igwe nwụrụ anwụ na ndị ọzọ na -emepụta ihe nkiri
N'ikpeazụ, Adesoye banyere n'ụgbọ maka usoro ahụike DStv - Doctors Quarters
Ọ gara n'ihu na -enweta ọrụ ndị ọ na -adịkarị, ruo mgbe ọ zutere Kunle Afolayan, onye ọ dere ihe nkiri na -atọ ụtọ The Figurine
A tọhapụrụ Figurine ahụ na nnukwu otuto dị ukwuu wee merie nnukwu onyinye, gụnyere ise Africa Movie Academy Awards

Nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma nke The Figurine tinyere Adesoye n'ime otu n'edemedee ndị na -achọkarị n'ihe nkiri Nollywood; ọ malitere ide maka usoro onyonyo dị ka Edge of Paradise, Tinsel, Hotel Majestic, na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Egbanwe ekwentị mkparị na -atọ ọchị
Ekwentị
Kemi Adetiba bụ music video director na Naijiria, dairektọ na-ahụ maka fim, nakwa onyonyo nke aka ọrụ ya na-apụta ihe na Channel O, MTV Base, Soundcity TV, BET na Netflix
Amuru ya na Lagos ka ọnwa Jenụwarị dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị asatọ n'afọ 1980, Nne ya bụ Mayen Adetiba bụ onye injinịa na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri di iche iche
Kemi Adetiba bidoro njem ya n'ime mgbasa ozi dị ka nwatakịrị ebe ọ mere ihe mgbaza ozi azụmahịa nke ndị OMO bụ ncha eji asa akwa na ihe ndị ọzọ
Nke a bụ igbaso nzọ ụkwụ nna ya bụ Dele Adetiba
Kemi bidoro ọrụ eji mara ya dịka onye na-akọwapụta ihe n'igwea redio nke Rhythm 937 FM , ebe ọ bụ olu na-ekwupụta okwu n'ihe akụkọ wuru ewu a kpọrọ Soul'd Out na Sunday at Seaside
Adetiba bidoro itinye aha ya na nchikọta egwu na ntanetị n'ihe di iche iche dika Spotify na Soundcloud site n'aha ọ kpọrọ onwe ya bụ 'hule'

Kemi Adetiba malitere ịgbanwe ọrụ ya site na ịbụ olu na-ekwu okwu na redio wee bụrụ ihu ana ahụ anya n'onyonyo televishọn site na- ikwado ma gosipụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Mnet, nke gụnyere Studio 53, Ọnwụnwa Naịjirịa nke ya na Ikponmwosa Osakioduwa gosipụtara
Kemi bụkwa onye na-eweta ihe nkiri na Soundcity TV ma kwado Maltina Dance All ugboro atọ n'usoro

Ka ọtụtụ afọ ịnọ nke ọma n’ihu igwe foto gachara, Adetiba debara aha ya na New York Film Academy iji mụọ nke ọma etu esi anọ n'ihu igwe foto , taa ọrụ aka ya dika dairektọ juru mpaghara Afirica nakwa ngafe Africa
Mkpirikpi ihe nkiri nke Kemi Adetiba mepụtara akpọrọ Bloodied Ocean gosiri n'afọ 2009 na Pan African Film Festival na National Black Arts Festival

N'ọnwa Septemba n'ụbọchi asatọ n'afọ 2016, ihe nkiri mbụ Kemi Adetiba gosipụtara The Wedding Party '(a Nigerian Rom-com film) gosipụtara n'abalị na Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF),na mmeghe fim nke a kpọrọ City-to-City Spotlight
N'afọ 2017 ọ nọ na-egosi ihe nkiri ahụ a kpọrọ 'King Women' ebe ọ gbara nne ya Mayen Adetiba ajụjụ ọnụ
Ndị ọzọ so na 'King Women' gụnyere Chigul, Taiwo Ajai-Lycett, TY Bello na Tara Durotoye

Ụfọdụ ọrụ aka ya nwetara ihe onyinye di iche iche, dika vidio egwu 'Ekundayo' nke ụmụ nwaanyị kacha mma bụ nke TY Bello gụrụ na Soundcity TV Music Video Awards', Vidio nke ụmụ nwaanyị kacha mma na egwu 'Today na Today' bụ nke Omawumi gụrụ n'afọ 2010 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
Ọrụ kachasị ọhụrụ nke Adetiba bụ rụrụ bụ n'egwu 'onye' nke Waje tiri ebe ọgosiri Tiwa Savage, Olamide's 'Anifowose', 'Sitting on the Throne' nakwa egwu Bez's R&B a kpọrọ 'Say'
A họpụtara Kemi maka Onye Nchịkwa Egwu kacha mma na The Headies n' afọ 2014
Ọ nwetakwara ihe onyinye nke ndi City People Entertainment direktọ egwu kacha mma n'afọ 2015 nakwa ihe nrite HNWOTYmaka nwaanyị kacha nepụta ihe nkiri na fim nakwa onyonyo n' afọ 2017
Kemi 'Lala' Akindoju bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
Ọ meriri ihe nturu ugo nke Africa Magic trailbrailzer maka ọrụ ya na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Dazzling Mirage
A mụrụ Akindoju na 8 Maachị 1987 n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Ondo Steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queens College, Lagos
Mgbe o nwetasịrị ule West Africa Examinations Council, ọ gara n'ihu gụọ mkpuchi na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ natakwara nzere masta na mahadum Pan-Atlantic, na-amụ mgbasa ozi na nkwukọrịta
Ọ lụrụ Chef Fregz na Septemba 2018 wee mụọ nwa nwoke na February 2021
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na 2005 site na ime ihe nkiri a na-ele mgbe a n'eme ya tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe nkiri

Ọ meriri ihe nturu ugo nke Africa Magic trailbrailzer maka ọrụ ya na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Dazzling Mirage

Ọ bụ nwa afọ Ondo Steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queens College, Lagos
Mgbe o nwetasịrị ule West Africa Examinations Council, ọ gara n'ihu gụọ mkpuchi na Mahadum Lagos

Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na 2005 site na ime ihe nkiri a na-ele mgbe a n'eme ya tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe nkiri
Olukemi Nelson (amuru ya n'ụbọchị 9 nke ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1956 - 17 Ọnwa asaa 2022) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Insurance Social Trust Fund (NSTIF)
A mụrụ Nelson na Legọs na 9 nke ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1956 wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Anglican Girls Grammar School, Ijebu-Ode maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ndị nọọsụ na Mahadum College Hospital Ibadan ebe ọ ruru eru idebanye aha dịka
ka onye nọọsụ na midwgịaha
O nwetara MBA na Financial Management na Diploma na Law na ￼￼Mahadum Ojo dị na Legọs Steeti
N'ime 1980s, Nelson sonyeere National Republican Convention (NRC) nke na-emebi emebi ugbu a n'oge ọchịchị General Ibrahim Babangida
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa sinetọ maka ￼ Legọs West Senatorial district na 1992 ma Bola Ahmed Tinubu meriri ya na ntuliaka
N'afọ 1998, n'oge ọchịchị General Abacha, ọ zọọrọ ọkwa ọchịchị n'Ikeja Federal Constituency n'ụlọ omebe iwu
Oge a, dịka onye otu UNCP
O meriri ntuliaka ahụ mana onwu General Abacha mebiri ya

N'afọ 1999, ọ sonyeere Alliance for Democracy (AD) site na 1999 ruo 2003, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna ￼￼ Legọs steeti na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ibelata ịda ogbenye n'oge ọchịchị Bola Ahmed Tinubu wee jee ozi dịka onye isi ụmụ nwanyị Legọs Steeti Chapter nke All Progressives Congress (APC) ma emesịa bụrụ onye isi ụmụ nwanyị South West nke APC
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị na-eje ozi na Legọs Steeti Governor's Advisory Council (GAC)
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Operations of Nigeria Social Insurance Trust Fund (NSITF) ma bụrụ onye isi na mbụ Ministry of Establishment, Training and Job Creation
Ọ lụrụ Adeyemi Nelson, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Federal Ministry of Internal Affairs lara ezumike nka
Ha lụrụ n'afọ 1987 ma mụọ ụmụ atọ
A maara ya maka ụdị ntutu isi ya dị ala na ngwa isi ya pụrụ iche
Kemi Omololu-Olunloyo (amụrụ Olukemi Omololu-Olunloyo, na 6 August 1964) o bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye na-ede blọgụ, na onye na-eme ihe ike megide ime ihe ike égbè, na onye mgbasa ozi ọha naeze

A muru ya nke ọma n'ime obodo ntanetị nke Naijiria, ọkachasị maka ikwu okwu na esemokwu dị ukwuu banyere isiokwu ndị nwere mmetụta uche dị elu, dị ka ngagharị iwe End SARS na 2020 na ọnwụ nke nwa akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe ya si Lagos
Omololu-Olunloyo enwetala nkatọ dị ukwuu maka nkwupụta dị iche iche o kwuru banyere ndụ ya na ọrụ ya; dịka ọtụtụ n'ime nkwupụta ndị dị otú ahụ egosila na ọ bụ ụgha ma ọ bụ chepụtara echepụta
Omololu-Olunloyo bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu gọvanọ Oyo Steeti bụ Victor Omololu Olunloyo na nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ iri
O biri afọ iri na anọ na Naịjirịa, afọ iri abụọ na United States, na afọ ise na Canada tupu ọ laghachi Naịjirịa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ obere oge dị ka onye nta akụkọ egwu na Nigerian Tribune
Mgbe ọ nọ na Canada, Omololu-Olunloyo nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike megidere ime ihe ike égbè
N'afọ 2014, o wepụtara aha na foto nke ụmụ nwoke rịọrọ mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ kpughee onwe ha na soshal midia
N'afọ 2014, o so na emadụ atọ kachasị ahọpụtara na Social Media Awards Africa's Social Media Influencer of the Year
'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, ndị ọrụ si Canada Border Services Agency jidere Omololu-Olunloyo n'ụlọ ya dị na Toronto
Mgbe ekpebiri ya na ọ ga-agba ọsọ ndụ mgbe a na-emezighị visa ya maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, a kpọchiri ya na Vanier Centre for Women ruo ụbọchị asaa tupu a chụga ya na Naịjirịa
Na 16 February 2018, Isaiah Ogedegbe gwara Kemi Omololu-Olunloyo ka o dee akuko nke oma iji gbanaro nsogbu

Ekenedilichukwu Ugochukwu Eric Nwenweh, (amuru Febụwarị 28,1985) Ken Erics Ugo ma ọ bụ naanị Ken Erics bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo na Naịjirịa, onye edemede, onye na -emepụta ihe na onye egwu oge ụfọdụ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Ugo na fim 'The Illiterate' ya na Tonto Dikeh na Yul Edochie
Ọ bụ onye Anambra steeti

A mụrụ Ken Erics na Kano State, Northwest Naịjirịa na 28 Febrụwarị 1985 ọ bụkwa nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ asaa nke Chukwu Chukwuemeka Nwenweh na Grace Ifeyinwa Nwenweh ha abụọ bụ ndị Enugwu-Ukwu na Anambra State, Southeast Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye Igbo
Erics nwere agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya na Binta Mustapha Science Nursery and Primary School, Kano, na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Dennis Memorial Grammar School (DMGS) Onitsha, Anambra Steeti
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, Erics gosipụtara oke mmasị na nka, nke a mere aji nabata ya na mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe Awka, Anambra Steeti, ebe ọ gụchara nweta asambodo na Theater Arts
Ọ ji nzere masta na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na feem

Na 2001, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ afọ mbụ na Mahadum, Erics nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya, na Chris Ubani duziri 'ihe nkiri' direct-to-dvd 'Holy Prostitute', ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ dị ka dibia bekee, na naanị ihe nkiri atọ
Ọ gara n'ihu gụchaa na Mahadum wee malite ịga nyocha ma tinye ọtụtụ ọrụ cameo ndị ọzọ na fim ụlọ
Agbanyeghị, ihe ngosi 2012 nke 'Ugo' na ihe nkiri 'The Illiterate' mere ka ndị mmadụ hụ ya n'anya wee mepere ya ohere ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa
Dị ka osi bụrụ onye edemede, Erics bu ụzọ bipụtara ọrụ 'Cell 2' nke enwetala nlebara anya ma ejiri ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum Naịjirịa maka imepụta ihe nkiri na ebumnuche agụmakwụkwọ
Dị ka osi bụrụ onye abụ na onye na -akụ egwu na onye na kpọ ụbọ na onye n'pita ahụigodo oge ụfọdụ, Erics, e nwe bu ọ la ndi egwu nke ya, etinyela aka na imepụta ọtụtụ ezigbo egwu dị na ihe nkiri
Ọ na esokwa ndị ama ama n'eme ihe nkiri dị ka; Ngozi Ezeocha,Yul Edochie,Desmond eliot,Chiwetalu Agu,Regina Daniels na ndị ọzọ
Na 2014, Erics meriri nturu ugo maka Onye na-akwado na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na City People Entertainment Award, yana onye ndu kachasị mma na Afrifimo Awards na United States
Na 2015, ọ gara n'ihu nweta nturu ugo onye ndu kacha mma na City People Entertainment Award
Na 2017, Erics meriri Nrite City People Entertainment Awards 2017 nke Onye Neme ihe nkiri Kachasị mma na afọ a hụrụ ya maka Golden Movie Awards na 2018 maka Onye Na-akwado N'eme ihe nkiri Kachasị mma
N'ọnwa Disemba 2018, Ken Erics wepụtara egwu mbụ ya Inozikwa Omee
O nwetara ndị na -akwado ya na -eto otu mpụta mbụ ya
Ụda egwu na ọmarịcha ọnụ abụ ha na -egosi na Ken Erics agaghị aga ebe ọ bụla n'oge adịghị anya
N'ọnwa Maachị 2019, Ken Erics kwuputara na ya agaghị aga n'ihu na nwunye ya, Onyi Adada
Dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri si kwuo, ọ ghọrọ ihe dị mkpa ịhapụ alụmdi na nwunye ya mgbe ihe gbanwere
Otú ọ dị, o gosipụtara obi ụtọ maka ịkwụsị njikọ ahụ
Ọrụ Fim

Ejije Amankiri
Kenneth Kay Gardner (amụrụ na Septemba 27, 1949 na Ogden, Utah) bụ onye Amerịka na-agba bọọlụ basketball lara ezumike nká
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịgba bọọlụ maka klọb French AS Berck, nke ọ meriri French National Championship na 1973 na 1974
Gardner gara n'ihu na-egwuri egwu maka Nice BC nke LNB (French National Basketball League) na Utah Stars nke ABA
A kpọrọ Gardner ugboro abụọ onye egwuregwu Amerịka kachasị mma na France n'oge ọrụ afọ ise ọ rụrụ n'ebe ahụ, n'oge ọ na-enweta akara 228 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ihe 6,012 ọ na-arụ ọrụ ka nọ n'elu 100 n'etiti ndị na-agba bọọlụ oge niile na French league
LGardner gbara bọọlụ maka Mahadum Utah na kọleji ma nọrọ n'elu iri na akara ọ bụla na egwuregwu ọ bụla na ise kachasị na rebounds ọ bụla n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Gardner bụ otu n'ime naanị mmadụ abụọ a họpụtara n'otu n'otu na Western Athletic Conference All-conference basketball team na 1971
Gardner bụkwa onye nke abụọ na-eme ngagharị iwe dị ka Junior na 1970
A kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu kachasị mma nke 1970 Utah Classic mgbe ọ duru Utes na isi iri abụọ na ise na rebounds iri abụọ na mmeri e meriri Mahadum Washington na egwuregwu mmeri
Ken Ugwu Nnamani (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1948) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ onye isi oche nke Seneti nke Naijiria site n'afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2007
Onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu site na Enugwu East Ogige ndị omeiwu nke Enugwu Steeti n'afọ 2003 ma jee ozi na Seneti ruo afọ 2007
A mụrụ Ken Nnamani n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1948 na Enugwu
O nwere nzere BBA na MBA na Mahadum Ohio dị na Athens, Ohio ma rụọ ọrụ maka Du Pont De Nemours International na Geneva na Nova Chemicals International dị ka onye isi ahịa ma mesịa bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ
Ọ bụ onye isi ndụmọdụ, Maredec Limited
A họpụtara Ken Nnamani ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Enugwu East n'afọ 2003
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Federal Character & Governmental Affairs na onye otu nke kọmitii na Nhazi onwe, Federal Capital Territory and Appropriation & Finance
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Seneti nke Naịjirịa site na onwa Eprel 5 nke afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2007, na-ewere ọkwa a mgbe Adolphus Wabara gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi ebubo nrụrụ aka

N'ikwu okwu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2006, Nnamani kwuru na 'N'ala nwere ọdịbendị dị iche iche na okpukpe dị iche iche dị ka Naịjirịa, ntuli aka a pụrụ ịtụkwasị obi na-enye ndị otu dị iche iche nke mba ahụ ohere ịga n'ihu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji kwalite ọdịmma nke mmadụ niile
Nhọrọ 2007 bụ ntuli aka kachasị mkpa na Naịjirịa
Ntuli aka afọ 2007 na Naịjirịa nwere isi ihe iji mee ka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya sie ike na Naịjarịa
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2008, a malitere Ken Nnamani Center for Leadership and Development na Abuja
Ebumnuche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ime ka ọ dịkwuo mfe idu ndú na mmepe dị mma na mgbanwe n'Afrika
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Jun n'afọ 2009, Ken Nnamani gosipụtara nchegbu banyere ọganihu maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya zuru oke na Naịjirịa
Naịjirịa enweghị ndị nọ n'etiti, ya mere ọ bụghị ihe ijuanya na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya anyị adịghị ike ma nwee ike ịgbanwe

The King’s Diary, The Value of Nothing series, Packages in Brown Skin

Website wwwkennwadiogbucom
Ken Nwadiogbu (onye amara aha ya dịka KenArt ) bụ onye nka dị iche iche amụrụ na Naịjirịa
Ọ na-akpọ usoro ya 'contemporealism' - ngwakọta nke ihe eserese na ihe a kpụrụ akpụ na nka ọgbara ọhụrụ
Na 2019, enwetara Ken Nwadiogbu ihe onyinye nke 'The Future Awards Afrịka Ndị Guardian Life kwuru na ọ bụ ọkachamma na mmadụ puru iche na 2019”
Kenechukwu Nwadiogbu amaliteghị ịbụ omenkà
A mụrụ ya na oge ndị nne na nna ka na-ahọrọ ụmụ ha ihe ha ga-abụ na ọdịnihu ma na ahụtakwa ngalaba sayensị dịka nke kacha were baa uru, Nwadiogbu chọrọ ịmụ injinịa obodo
Agbanyeghị, na Nwadiogbu dị afọ iri na asaa ọ na-achọ ịgbanwe dịka ọ na-achọpụta nka n'ụzọ ịhụnanya na oke mmasị
Ka ọ na-azulite na eserese ya, owuwu ya n'etiti obere ndị nke ya na kwa agbamume ndị enyi ya kpalitere ị mee karịa na mbụ
Nwadiogbu gara Mahadum nke Legọọsụu, ebe ọ gụrụ Ịnjịnịa maka obodo na gburugburu ebe obibi
Njem nka ya bidoro na mahadum a
Na agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị usoro ọmụmụ, nke a kwalitere mmụọ ya ị bụ onye nka ọgbara ọhụrụ ihe ndị mmadụ na amasị na Naịjirịa
Dika na mkparịta ụka ya na Juxtapoz Magazin,, Nwadiogbu na-azaghachi na kwaaji nke usoro ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ụwa
Site na usoro ime ikpu ihe ka o dika nke ezigbo ya, o na-akpu ihe nke na-atu ndi mmadu na anya nke ukwuu
N’amamihe, ihe osise ya na-egosipụtakarị ihe osise a na-adịghị ahụkebe, nke ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị na-elegharị anya, n' akwụkwọ ahụ dọwara adọwa, na-ebuli ndị Afrịka na gburugburu ụwa

Okwu ndị a siri ike dịka ịha nhatanha nwoke na nwanyị, ọdịnala Afrịka, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụwa, Ike ndị ojii, na nso nso a mpụ e ji mma eme bịakwutere mkparịta ụka ahụ site na usorọ ihe ịtụ anya O ji unyi, pensụl, na akiliki arụ ọrụ, Nwadiogbu na-ezube inweta nghọta miri emi site na nka ya, nke gafere ihe ọ chọrọ ka ahụ n'ime isiokwu eserese ya dị iche iche
Mmekọrịta mmadụ kpalitere nka ya iji were na-ajụ na agbagha kwado mmekọrịta mmadụ na nsogbu ndị ọzọ na uwa
Ọ na-ahụta nka ya dị ka nzaghachi nke ọha mmadụ na kwa otu ụzọ isi kpalie ndị mmadụ iji tụleghachi usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze ha
Site n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na CNN, Ọrụ Nwadiogbu kachasị ọhụrụ bụ nka maka òtù #MeToo zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ọ nwere omiiko gbasara ya, ọ rụchara ya n'ime 24 awa
N'oru #MeToo, ekechiri ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ na naịlọn, otu nwere nkụda mmụọ, o were hapụzia ya na ihe ya na chi ya kpatara; nke ọzọ na-ewe iwe ma kpebisie ike na o ga-akwapu ihe mgbochi ahụ
Ọ bụ ihe mmetụta obi, na icheba echiche ime ịnye ụmụ agbọghọ Afrịka onu okwu
'Achọrọ m nwa agbọghọ Afrịka ka ọ dị ka nwa agbọghọ nke abụọ (na eserese) na-asị, 'Achọrọ m ikwuputa okwu
Achọrọ m iji olu m kpọrọ ihe
Achọrọ m ikwusi ike onye m bụ
Sir Kenneth Aphunezi Olisa OBE FRSA FBCS (amụrụ na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa iri n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise n'otu(13 Ọktoba 1951) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ ebere nke Britain
Ọ bụ onye mbụ nwere ihe nketa Lord-Lieutenant nke Greater London
O guzobere ma duzie ụlọ akụ na-ere ahịa teknụzụ nke AIM depụtara Interregnum ma ugbu a na-eduga ndị mmekọ mweghachi
Ken Olisa bụ nna ukwu gara aga nke Ụlọ ọrụ na-efe ofufe nke ndị teknụzụ ozi ma rụọ ọrụ ma na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ bọọdụ nke ndị ọrụ ebere, agụmakwụkwọ na ndị na-achịkwa
Sir Kenneth na nwunye ya nyere Olisa Library na Fitzwilliam College, Cambridge

A mụrụ ya na Nottingham na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise n'otu (1951) site n'aka nna Naijiria na nne Britain, Olisa gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nottinghan High Pavement Grammar School na Fitzwilliam College, Cambridge, ebe o nwere agụmakwụkwọ ma mụọ sayensị okike na mgbe ahụ Social, Political and Management Sciences
Ọrụ teknụzụ ya malitere na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa (1970s) na IBM
Olisa lụrụ Julia Sherwood na Cambridge na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa na isii (1976)
Na IBM, o nwere ọrụ dị iche iche tupu ọ banye Wang Laboratories na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ n'otu (1981)

Mgbe ọ gachara oge dị ka onye nduzi ahịa maka Europe, VP nke Ịre ahịa US na mgbe ahụ nke Ahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ nke dị na Boston, a họpụtara ya dị ka Senior VP na onye isi njikwa nke Europe, Africa na Middle East (EAME) nke dị na Brussels
Ọ duziri ndị otu nke weghachiri ọrụ EAME ka ọ baa uru, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịzụta njikwa na-enweghị isi nke mere ka ọ pụọ na afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu na abụọ (1992)
Olisa wee guzobe Interregnum, ụlọ akụ na-ere ahịa teknụzụ, na-eduga ya site na uto mbụ ya, ịbanye na ịpụ site na njikọ aka ya na BDO Stoy Hayward, AIM IPO na afọ puku abụọ (2000)
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ndụmọdụ na, na onye nduzi nke, uDatecom, nke e mesịrị resị Barry Diller's USA Interactive na afọ puku abụọ na atọ (2003)
Olisa lara ezumike nká na Interregnum na puku abụọ na isii (2006) ma ugbu a na-agba ọsọ ndị mmekọ mweghachi
Olisa nwere nnukwu ahụmịhe ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze n'akụkụ abụọ nke Atlantic

Ọ bụ onye isi ojii mbụ a mụrụ na Britain na-eje ozi na bọọdụ nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze UK (Reuters) ma bụrụkwa onye bụbu onye nduzi na-abụghị onye isi nke Thomson Reuters (ebe ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Audit), ọ bụkwa onye bụbu ndị nduzi na onye isi oche nke Institute of Directors
Ọ bụ onye nduzi na onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ịkwụ ụgwọ nke onye mmepe ngwanrọ kachasị na Canada, Open Text Corporation

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na-abụghị onye isi nke Ụgwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ Eurasian Natural Resources Corporation (ENRC) site na afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007) na nke a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'ihi nchegbu ọchịchị mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị o chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'Ndị Soviet karịa obodo' iji kọwaa ụzọ e si mesoo ya na Sir Richard Sykes
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na bọọdụ nke, ma ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ nke, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwe onwe ha na ndị ọhụrụ gụnyere onye ndụmọdụ gọọmentị ụlọ ọrụ UK Independent Audit
Olisa bụkwa Onye isi oche nke otu Thebes ma ọ bụghị maka uru Shaw Trust

N'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu (2009), The Sunday Times kpọrọ ya Ọ bụghị maka Uru onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke afọ, na afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii (2016) a họpụtara ya dị ka onye mbụ na Ndị isi ojii Britain kacha emetụta ike 10
Na ọnwa iri na otu

n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (Nọvemba 2017), Olisa nọchiri Adedotun Sulaiman dị ka Onye isi oche nke Interswitch na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2018) ọ sonyeere Board nke Huawei (UK) na-agba arụkwaghịm na ọnwa atọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ (Machị 2022}
Na ọnwa mbu na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na atọ (Jenụwarị 2023), a họpụtara Olisa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke BusinessLDN (nke a maara dị ka London First) mgbe Paul Drechsler lara ezumike nká

A họpụtara Olisa dị ka onye isi nke Order of the British Empire na afọ puku abụọ na iri (2010) Nkwanyere ụbọchị ọmụmụ maka ọrụ maka ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi na London, onye isi nke Ordin of St John na puku abụọ na iri na asaa (2017) na Knight Bachelor na afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ (2018) Nkwanyere Afọ Ọhụrụ maka ọrụ maka azụmahịa na philanthropy
A họpụtara Olisa ka ọ bụrụ Lord-Lieutenant nke Greater London na abalị iri abụọ na ọnwa ise, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (29 Mee 2015)
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ (2018), Mahadum Kingston na Mahadum Nottingham Trent nyere ya nzere doctorate
Ọ natara nzere doctorate ọzọ na Mahadum Worcester na afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteolu (2019)

Olisa bụ Freeman nke Obodo London; Onye isi oche nke Thames Reach, ọrụ ebere na-arụ ọrụ iji chebe ma weghachite ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi na London; Onye guzobere na Onye isi oche ya na Ntọala Powerlist (nke bụ Ntọala Aleto ugbu a); Onye ibe nke British Computer Society kemgbe afọ puku abụọ na isii (2006); Onye ndu nke Royal Society of Arts; Life Fellow nke Institute of Directors; na, na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (2021), a họpụtara ya dị elu Bailiff na onye na-achọ ebe nsọ nke Westminster Abbey
N'ọrụ ahụ, ọ sonyere na Coron na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (2023)

Olisa bụkwa onye nkwado nke ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere, gụnyere School-Home Support (SHS), ọrụ ebere na-enyere ụmụaka na ndị na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma aka imeri ihe mgbochi maka agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ịda ogbenye, mmetọ n'ụlọ, na nsogbu ụlọ; Fore, ọrụ ebere nke na-akwado atụmatụ maka ọrụ ebere ndị ọzọ; na Black Cultural Archives
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri 'iteolu (2019), a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke ntorobia London

Nhọpụta ndị ọ họpụtara n'oge gara aga gụnyere ije ozi dị ka Nna-ukwu nke ụlọ ọrụ na-efe ofufe nke ndị teknụzụ ozi, Director nke Thomson Reuters Foundation, onye otu Ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ụmụ nwanyị; Gọvanọ nke Peabody Trust ruo afọ iri; onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke West Lambeth NHS Trust; na onye na-amalite ọrụ ugboro abụọ nke mbụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ Kọmishọna ọrụ nzi ozi, site na afọ puku abụọ na otu ruo na afọ puku abụọ na anọ (2001 ruo 2004), yana dịka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ụkpụrụ ụlọ omebe iwu nọọrọ onwe ya, ahụ na-ahụ maka ijikwa mmefu ego, ịkwụ ụgwọ na ụgwọ ezumike nká nke ndị otu ndị omebe iwu
Na abalị iri na iteolu n'ọnwa atọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteolu (19 Machị 2019), Olisa kelere Queen Elizabeth nke Abụọ na Duchess nke Cambridge na mmeghe nke Ụlọ Bush e mezigharịrị ọhụrụ
Na abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (17 Mee 2021), Olisa ghọrọ Onye kotima dị elu na onye na-achọ ebe nsọ na Westminster Abbey na-anọchi Sir Roy Strong
N'ọnwa iri n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (Ọktoba afọ 2021), a họpụtara Olisa dị ka onye nnọchi anya nsọpụrụ nke Ụlọ nsọ dị n'ime
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke Prince of Wales's Charitable Fund
Ọ bụ onye nkwado nke Ụbọchị uwe ogologo ọkpa uhie, ọrụ ebere nke na-eme ka a mara banyere ọrịa colorectal kansa
