Ken Oosterbroek (14 Febụwarị 1962 - 18 Eprel 1994) bụ onye nta akụkọ foto South Africa na onye otu Bang-Bang Club
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka The Star na Johannesburg, nke bụ nnukwu akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị na South Africa
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite foto maka ọrụ ya
Oosterbroek na mbụ gbalịrị ịmalite foto ya, na-aga site na akwụkwọ gaa na akwụkwọ na-anwa inweta ọrụ dabere na foto ọ were n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'oge ọ na-eje ozi agha na ndịda Angola
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na 1989, o nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya, merie Ilford Award (South African Press Photographer of the Year)
N'izo aka na nke a, o dere, sị
Mgbe ahụ n'ụtụtụ ụdị ihe efu a ma ọ bụ mmetụta ọ dị ugbu a ma ọ bụghị ihe dị mkpa ọzọ
Enwere m ya, ọ bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ dị na ndekọ ma ugbu a isi m enweghị ihe mgbaru ọsọ otu echiche
Ugbu a enwere m ike ikwe ka ọ daa
Enwere onye ga-enye m oghere iji hapụ ya ka ọ daa? BUT, nye m ezumike iji gbaa ezigbo ihe
Ezi, ihe na-eme, ndụ
Ọrụ dị mkpa
Ihe iji mee ka adrenaline dị elu ma kpọnwụọ anya, ụbụrụ na-agbagharị na ohere na ikike maka foto ike
Abụ m onye na-ese foto
Mee ka m tọhapụ
A ga-akpọ ya South African Press Photographer of the Year ọzọ site na 1991
N'ọnwa ọgost nke afọ ahụ ọ bụ onye isi na-ese foto na The Star

Ndị otu National Peacekeeping Force (NPKF) nke South Africa gbara Oosterbroek égbè ma gbuo ya na Thokoza Township, ihe dị ka kilomita ịrị abụọ na ise (16 mi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Johannesburg, na 18 Eprel, ụbọchị itoolu tupu ntuli aka 27 Eprel 1994 na South Africa, ntuli aka agbụrụ mbụ nke mba ahụ

Ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese foto na-ekpuchi esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị na-ahụ maka udo na African National Congress mgbe ndị na-eme udo meghere égbè ma gbaa Oosterbroek na onye otu Bang-Bang Club Greg Marinovich égbè
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1995, South Africa malitere nyocha ọnwa iri na ise banyere ọnwụ Oosterbroek
N'agbanyeghị akaebe dị ukwuu na artilistics na-egosi na ọ bụ naanị ndị na-ahụ maka udo dị nso iji gbaa ya égbè ma gbuo ya, onye ọkà ikpe kpebiri na ọ dịghị onye a ga-ahụ maka ọnwụ Oosterbroek
Otú ọ dị, na Jenụwarị 1999, onye na-ese foto Greg Marinovich, ezigbo enyi Oosterbrook, nwere ohere izute otu n'ime ndị na-eme udo na-alụ ọgụ na Thokoza n'ụbọchị ọnwụ Ooster broek, Brian Mkhize

Ọ bụ ezie na Mkhize kwuru na mbụ na ọ ga-abụrịrị na ọ bụ ndị na-akwado Inkatha na-agbapụ site na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ, na 14 Febụwarị 1999, o kwuru na n'ihi egwu na ụjọ, ndị na-ahụ maka udo ejirila obi ọjọọ malite ịgba égbè
O kwuru, sị 'Echere m, n'ebe ụfọdụ, n'ụzọ ụfọdụ
Echere m n'ebe ọ bụla, otu n'ime anyị, mgbọ nke gburu nwanne gị nwoke bụ nke sitere n'aka anyị
Kevin Carter dere banyere Ken Oosterbroek n'akwụkwọ ozi igbu onwe ya, '[] Agara m isonyere Ken ma ọ bụrụ na enwere m ihu ọma'
E dekọrọ ndụ na foto Oosterbroek na The Invisible Line Ndụ na foto Ken Oosterbrook site na Mike Nicol (Kwela Books & Random House 1998)
A họpụtara Oosterbroek ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese foto South African Press nke Afọ ugboro atọ ma nweta ihe nrite nke abụọ na General News nke World Press Photo na 1992
Oosterbroek lụrụ onye nta akụkọ Monica Oosterbrook (née Nicolson), site na 1991 ruo ọnwụ ya
O nwere otu nwa nwanyị, aha ya bụ Tabitha (amụrụ n'afọ 1989), site na mmekọrịta gara aga
David Kenneth Popejoy (amụrụ na 15 Febụwarị n'afọ 1972) bụ onye America lara ezumike nká na-atụpu hama
O sonyere na 1996 Olympic Games ya na 1997 World Championships n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
O sonyeere ezigbo enyi ya Kevin McMahon, onye sonyere na 1996 Olympics na 2000 Olympic Games
Ihe kacha mma ọ tụrụ bụ mita 7426, nke o nwetara na ọnwa June n'afọ 1996 na Atlanta
Kenule Beeson 'Ken' Saro-Wiwa (10 Ọktoba 1941 ruo 10 Nọvemba 1995) bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe ngosi telivishọn, na onye na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi

Ken Saro-Wiwa bụ onye otu ndị Ogoni, agbụrụ pere mpe na Naịjirịa nke ala nna ya bụ, AlaOgoni, na Niger Delta, lekwasịrị anya metụta nchọpụta mmanụ ala kemgbe afọ 1950 ma nwee nnukwu mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi site na ọtụtụ iri afọ nke ịtụfu ihe mkpofu mmanụ ala

Na mbido dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere otu nke ya, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche, nke Movement for the Survival of the Ogoni People (MOSOP), Saro-Wiwa duziri mkpọsa na-enweghị ihe ike megide mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi nke ala na mmiri nke Ogoniland site na ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ mba dị iche iche, ọkachasị ụlọ ọrụ Royal Dutch Shell
Ọ katọrọ gọọmentị Naijiria maka enweghị mmasị itinye iwu metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala mba ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ógbè ahụ

N'oge ọ na-eme ngaharị na-abụghị nke ime ihe ike, ụlọ ikpe ndị agha pụrụ iche kpere ya ikpe maka ebubo na ọ na-eduzi ogbugbu ndị isi Ogoni na nzukọ na-akwado gọọmentị, ma kwụgbuo ya na 1995 site n'aka ọchịchị aka ike nke General Sani Abacha
Ogbugbu ya kpasuru iwe mba ụwa ma mee ka a kwụsị Naịjirịa na Commonwealth of Nations ruo ihe karịrị afọ atọ
A mụrụ Kenule Saro-Wiwa na Bori, nso Port-Harcourt, Naijiria n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Ọktoba 1941
Ọ bụ nwa Chief Jim Wiwa, onye na-elekọta ọhịa nke nwere ọkwa na usoro ndị isi ọchịchị ala Naijiria, na nwunye ya nke atọ Widu
Ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Saro-Wiwa mgbe Agha Obodo Naịjirịa gasịrị
Ọ lụrụ Maria Saro Wiwa
Obodo nna ya bụ obodo Bane, AlaOgoni, nke ndị bi na ya na-asụ asụsụ Khana nke bụ olundị asụsụ Ogoni
Ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ Anglican mgbe ọ bụ nwata ma mesịa gosipụta onwe ya na ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ magburu onwe ya na akwụkwọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Native Authority dị na Bori, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Government College Umuahia
Nwa akwụkwọ pụrụ iche, ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu tennis table ma nweta ihe nrite ụlọ akwụkwọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bekee
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ Bekee na Mahadum Ibadan
Na Ibadan, ọ banyere n'ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ na ọdịbendị, ọ meriri ihe nrite ngalaba na 1963 na 1965 ma rụọ ọrụ nke otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ndị otu a na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ngosi ha na Kano, Benin, Ilorin na Lagos ma soro otu ihe nkiri Nottingham Playhouse rụkọọ ọrụ nke gụnyere onye na-eto eto Judi Dench
Ọ ghọrọ onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Lagos ma mesịa na Mahadum Naịjiria, Nsukka
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi akwụkwọ edemede Afrịka na Nsukka mgbe agha obodo malitere, ọ kwadoro Gọọmentị etiti ma hapụ mpaghara ahụ gaa n'obodo ya na Bori
Na njem ya na Port-Harcourt, ọ hụrụ ìgwè ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-alaghachi n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'ihe na-ewute ịhụ'
Ụbọchị atọ mgbe ọ bịarutere Bonny, ọ danyere n'aka ndị agha gọọmentị etiti
Ya na ezinụlọ ya wee nọrọ na Bonny, ọ laghachiri Lagos wee were ọnọdụ na Mahadum Lagos nke na-adịteghị aka ka a kpọhachiri ya na Bonny
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkwa obodo maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Bonny dị na Niger Delta
N'oge Agha Obodo Naịjirịa, o mere onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndú Ogoni raara onwe ya nye ihe ọchịchị etiti
Ọ sochiri ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkwa na nhọpụta dị ka onye kọmishọna na Rivers State ochie

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya a kacha mara amara, Sozaboy A Novel in Rotten English (1985), na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwa okorobịa obodo na-amaghị nke a kpọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye agha n'oge Agha Obodo Naịjirịa nke 1967 ruo 1970, ma na-eme ka nrụrụ aka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkwado na ọchịchị ndị agha Naịjiria nke oge ahụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ agha ya, On a Darkling Plain (1989), na-edekọ ahụmahụ ya n'oge agha ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego na-eme nke ọma na onye na-emepụta ihe ngosi telivishọn
Usoro telivishọn ya na-atọ ọchị, Basi & Company, bụ ihe a ma ama nke ukwuu, nke na ndị na-ege ntị ruru nde iri atọ
Na mbido nke afọ 1970, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna mpaghara nke agụmakwụkwọ na Rivers State Cabinet
Mana a chụpụrụ ya na 1973 n'ihi nkwado ya maka nnwere onwe Ogoni
Na ngwụcha afọ 1970, o guzobere ọtụtụ azụmaahịa na-aga nke ọma na ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ, ma n'ime afọ 1980 o lekwasịrị anya na edemede ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ na mmepụta ihe ngosi telivishọn
N'afọ 1977, ọ banyere n'ọgbọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-azọ ọkwa dị ka onye na-anọchite anya Ogoni na Nzukọ Iwu
Ọ meriri na ntuli aka ahụ n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ya na enyi ya Edwards Kobani nwere esemokwu

A kwụsịrị ọrụ akọnuche ya n'afọ 1987 mgbe ọ batara na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ebe onye ọchịchị aka ike ọhụrụ bụ Ibrahim Babangida họpụtara ya iji nyere aka na mgbanwe mba ahụ gaa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi na o chere na atụmatụ Babangida maka ịlaghachi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ ihe na-enweghị isi
E gosipụtara mmetụta ya ziri ezi n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ebe Babangida hapụrụ igosipụta ike
N'afọ 1993, Babangida kagburu ntuli aka nke Naịjirịa nke ga-enyefe ike nye gọọmentị ndị nkịtị, ke kpatara ọgba aghara obodo ma mesịa manye ya ịpụ, ọ dịkarịa ala n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro, n'otu afọ ahụ

Ọrụ Saro-Wiwa gụnyere ọrụ ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi TV na edemede agụmagụ Ọrụ mbụ ya site na 1970 ruo 1980 bụ ihe ngosi nkwutọ nke na-egosipụta ọdịdị na-emegide ọha mmadụ Naijiria 269 Mana ihe odide ya ndị ọzọ sitere na mkpali nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka gburugburu ebe obibi na ikpe ziri ezi karịa nkwutọ
Transistor Radio, otu n'ime egwuregwu ya a ma ama E dere maka revue n'oge ọ nọ na mahadum Ibadan ma ọ ka na-emetụta mmụọ mkpali ndị Naijiria nke ọma ma mee ka ọ bụrụ usoro telivishọn
[citation needed] Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mkpali mmụọ site na egwuregwu ahụ
N'afọ 1972, e mepụtara ụdị redio nke egwuregwu ahụ ma n'afọ 1985, o mepụtara Basi and Company, ihe ngosi nke egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ gụnyere egwuregwu ahụ na Four Farcical Plays na Basi and Company Four Television Plays
Basi and Company, nke Transistor Radio, gbara na telivishọn site na 1985 ruo 1990

Ihe ngosi ntọ ọchị, ihe ngosi ahụ na-akọ akụkọ ndụ obodo ma bụrụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Basi, onye nwere ọgụgụ isi na onye maara ihe na-achọ ụzọ iji mezuo ebumnuche ya nke inweta ọtụtụ nde nke na-ejedebe mgbe mbọ niile n'aghọ ọrụ efu
[citation needed]
N'afọ 1985, e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Biafran Civil War Sozaboy
E dere asụsụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ n'asụsụ Bekee na-abụghị nke a ma ama ma ọ bụ ihe ọ kpọrọ 'Bekee Rere ure', asụsụ ngwakọta nke pidgin bekee, Bekee ọkọlọtọ na Bekee ngwakọta
N'afọ 1990, ọ malitere itinye ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na ikike mmadụ na ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi, ọkachasị n'ala Ogoni
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ so na Movement for the Survival of the Ogoni People (MOSOP), nke kwadoro ikike nke ndị Ogoni

Ogoni Bill of Rights, nke MOSOP dere, setịpụrụ ihe ndị otu ahụ chọrọ, gụnyere mmụba nnwere onwe maka ndị Ogoni, òkè ziri ezi nke ego a na-enweta site na nchọpụta mmanụ, na idozi mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi na ala Ogoni
Karịsịa, MOSOP lụrụ ọgụ megide mmebi nke ala Ogoni site na nke Royal Dutch Shell
N'afọ 1992, gọọmentị ndị agha Naijiria tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọtụtụ ọnwa, n'enweghị ikpe ekpere ya
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Unrepresented Nations and Peoples Organization bụ (UNPO) na aha ichafụ General Assembly site na 1993 ruo 1995
UNPO bụ òtù mba ụwa, nke na-adịghị eme ihe ike, na nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya (nke MOSOP bụ onye otu ya)

Ndị otu ya bụ ụmụ amaala, ndị ka nta, na mpaghara ndị a na-amaghị nke ọma ma ọ bụ ndị bi na ya bụ ndị sonyeere iji chebe ma kwalite ikike mmadụ na ọdịbendị ha, iji chekwaa gburugburu ha na ịchọta ngwọta na-enweghị ihe ike maka esemokwu na-emetụta ha
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 1993, MOSOP haziri ngagharị udo nke ihe dị ka ndị Ogoni Narị puku atọ karịa ọkara nke ndị Ogoni site na obodo Ogoni anọ, na-adọta uche mba ụwa na nsogbu ndị ha
N'otu afọ ahụ, gọọmentị Naijiria weghaara mpaghara ahụ n'ụzọ agha
Ndị ọchịchị Naijiria jidere ya ọzọ ma jide ya na June 1993 mana a tọhapụrụ ya mgbe otu ọnwa gasịrị
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1994, e ji obi ọjọọ gbuo ndị isi Ogoni anọ (ndị niile nọ n'akụkụ nkewa n'ime MOSOP maka atụmatụ)
A machibidoro Saro-Wiwa ịbanye Ogoniland n'ụbọchị ogbugbu ahụ, mana e jidere ya ma boo ya ebubo ịkpali ha
Ọ gọnahụrụ ebubo ahụ mana a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ihe karịrị otu afọ tupu a chọpụta na ikpe mara ya ma maa ya ikpe ọnwụ site n'ụlọ ikpe a kpọrọ aha pụrụ iche
Otu ihe ahụ mere ndị isi MOSOP asatọ ndị ọzọ, tinyere Saro-Wiwa, bụ ndị a maara dị ka Ogoni itoolu
Amsterdam kpọrọ okporo ámá aha Saro-Wiwa, Ken Saro-Viwastraat
Ọ bụ nwa ya nwanyị Noo Saro-Wiwa na-egosi ya ma Ben Arogundade na-agụpụ̀ta ya
Saro-Wiwa na nwunye ya bụ Maria nwere ụmụ ise, ndị ya na nne ha bị na United Kingdom ebe nna ha nọgidere na Naịjirịa
Ha gụnyere ndị, Ken Wiwa na Noo Saro-Wiwa, ma ndị nta akụkọ ma ndị edemede, na ejima Noo Zina Saro-Viwa, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Na mgbakwunye, Saro-Wiwa nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ bụ (Singto na Adele) nke nwanyị ọzọ mụtaara ya
O nwekwara nwa nwoke ọzọ, bụ Kwame Saro-Wiwa, onye dị naanị otu afọ mgbe e gburu nna ya site na nkwugbu
Jacobus Hermanus Pieters Geers, nke a maara dịka Kendell Geers, bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe Geers bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brussels, Belgium
A mụrụ Kendell Geers na Leondale, obodo na-arụ ọrụ na East Rand na mpụga Johannesburg, South Africa, n'ime ezinụlọ Afrikaans n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ ghọtara na 'agụmakwụkwọ ya, omume ọma, ụkpụrụ ezinụlọ ya, okpukpe ya na ndụ ya n'ozuzu ya ejiriwo nlezianya wuo ya' iji kpochapụ onwe ya dị ka omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ gbapụrụ n'ụlọ na nna na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè iji sonye n'òtù na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Gọọmentị apartheid nwere iwu nke ịmanye ụmụ okorobịa ọcha site na afọ iri na isii na ịjụ pụtara ma ọ bụ ndụ n'ala ọzọ ma ọ bụ mkpọrọ afọ isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị nkịtị

Nanị ụzọ ị ga-esi kwụsị ịbanye n'òtù ndị agha nchebe South Africa bụ ịga n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ ya mere na 1984, na njedebe nke afọ ikpeazụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Queens, Geers tinyere akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Johannesburg iji zere ịbanye n'ọrụ
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ nka, ọ zutere onye na-ese ihe ibe ya bụ Neil Goedhals na 1986 ha guzobere otu Performance Art KOOS na Marcel van Heerden, Gys de Villiers, Megan Kruskal na Velile Nxazonke
KOOS bụrụ abụ Post Punk Industrial Music Ballads dabere na uri mkpesa Afrikaans nke ndị na-ede uri dị ka Ryk Hattingh na Chris can Wyk
Ọ bụ ezie na e tinyere ha na abọm nchịkọta Voëlvry ma mee ya na Die Eerste Afrikaanse Rockfees, Koos mere naanị otu egwu nke njem Voëlvry Movement, na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
KOOS kwụsịrị na 1990 mgbe Neil Goedhals gburu onwe ya na 16 August 1990

Na Mahadum Wits Geers ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe ike na-arụ ọrụ na National Union of South African Students na End Conscription Campaign na 1988 bụ otu n'ime ụmụ okorobịa 143 jụrụ n'ihu ọha ije ozi na South African Defense Force ma chee ikpe mkpọrọ afọ isii dị ka nsonaazụ kpọmkwem ya mere ọ hapụrụ South Africa wee gaa biri n'ala ọzọ dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ na United Kingdom na site n'ebe ahụ New York ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nke onye na-ese ihe Richard Prince maka afọ 1989

Onye nlekọta Clive Kellner kọwara oge 1988 - 2000 nke ọrụ Geers dị ka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mana onye na-ese ihe adịghị amasị akara a n'ihi na ndị na-ese ihe na-ekwupụta onye ha kwadoro adịghị mma karịa ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ

Kama ikwupụta ihe o kwenyere na ya, ọ na-ahọrọ ịmepụta nka nke na-egosipụta mgbagwoju anya nke omume nke na-akpọ onye na-ekiri ya ka o chee ihe ha kwenyere na ya ihu na n'ụzọ dị otú a enwere mkparịta ụka na mgbanwe

Ọ na-ezo aka na nke a dị ka TerroRealism nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'ndị na-ese ihe tolitere na mba ndị agha, mgbanwe, esemokwu, mpụ na mgbukpọ agbụrụ kewara ekewaa ọrụ dịka ụkpụrụ dị iche iche nke ụkpụrụ mara mma
N'ọnọdụ ụlọ ngosi dị jụụ nke ụlọ nsọ cube ọcha, e tinyere ọrụ ha na Ụkpụrụ Eziokwu nke na-achọ imebi obi ụtọ onye na-ekiri ya karịa imeju ya

Geers na-etinye ọrụ ya gburugburu oke ahụmịhe dị ka obi ụtọ, egwu, ọchịchọ, ịhụnanya, ịma mma, mmekọahụ, ime ihe ike na ọnwụ n'ihi na o kwenyere na ahụmịhe ndị a dị oke egwu karịrị ikike anyị igosipụta n'okwu
Ihe ọmụma, egwu na echiche nke ahụmịhe ahụ bụ isi n'ọtụtụ ọdịbendị gburugburu ụwa
A na-adọta ya na ihe mgbochi ndị na-achịkwa ndụ anyị n'ihi na ha karịrị ikike anyị ịchịkwa, n'agbanyeghị onye anyị chere na anyị bụ, ọgaranya, ogbenye, amaghị akwụkwọ, gụrụ akwụkwọ
Ihe furu efu bụ okwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke onye na-ese ihe Geers chepụtara iji mee ka omume ya nke iji ihe ndị dị ugbu a, ihe oyiyi ma ọ bụ ihe
Okwu a bụ ngagharị iwe megide okwu ahụ bụ Found Object nke Marcel Duchamp mere ka ọ mara

Ọrụ mbụ ya nwere mmetụta site n'echiche ndị e gosipụtara na nzaghachi ya na Albie Sachs na echiche na 'The Struggle is a Weapon of Art' Mmetụta siri ike site n'echiche nke Léopold Sédar Senghor Geers jiri ahụmịhe ya dị ka onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ iji gbaa ajụjụ maka ịgụ ihe osise echiche site n'echiche Afro-Centric

Mgbe ọ na-ede banyere African Conceptualism maka ihe ngosi 'Global conceptualism points of origin, 1950s-1980s' na Queens Museum, Okwui Enwezor dere 'Na nka Afrịka, ihe abụọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbe niile ọrụ na echiche nke ọrụ ahụ
Ndị a abụghị usoro nnwere onwe
Otu chọrọ nke ọzọ na nke ọzọ
Nkọwapụta nke echiche ndị Igbo ga-akọwapụta mmekọrịta a ebe enwere ihe guzo nke a pụrụ ịhụ, enwere ihe ọzọ guzo n'akụkụ ya nke a na-apụghị ịhụ ma nke na-esonyere ihe ahụ

Na ntọala ihe onwunwe ya, nka Afrịka bụ ihe ejidere, mana n'ihe ọ pụtara na ebumnuche ya, ọ bụ ihe mgbagwoju anya na-emegide ihe na mmegide nghọta, nke ọtụtụ ụzọ isi gosipụta echiche ebe okwu ma ọ bụ nkwurịta okwu ọnụ na-eji akpọrọ ihe nke ukwuu
'Self Portrait' bụ ọrụ mara mma nke e kere na 1995 nke nwere ihe na-enweghị ihe karịrị karama biya Heineken gbajiri agbaji
Akara ahụ ka dị na iko ahụ gbajiri agbaji ma gụọ 'Imported from Holland'
The Superior Quality
' Geers kwenyere na ihe ọ bụla karịrị ngụkọta nke akụkụ anụ ahụ ya ma kama ọ bụ ngosipụta nke echiche, na ihe osise nke onye mere ya na onye na-azụ ya
karama mmanya Dutch gbajiri agbaji na-anọchite anya ụkpụrụ, na omume nke ndị Boers, kwenyesiri ike na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụ usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ziri ezi
N'ịjụ ndị nna nna ya na echiche ọchịchị aka ike ha, Geers na-agbaji karama biya ahụ n'ụzọ ihe atụ iji tọhapụ onwe ya
Dị ka ndị nna nna ya bụ ndị Boers, a na-ebubata biya Heineken na South Africa

E gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na New York na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ 'Simunye' ('Anyị Bụ Otu) n'afọ 1996 ma mee ka ọ nọrọ n'ime ụgbọ ibu nke TWA Flight 800 nke gbawara ka ọ na-ebili na 17 Julaị 1996 ya mere Geers gbanwere ihe mbụ ahụ pụrụ iche n'ime mbipụta nke 12, jiri onwe ya tụnyere ngwugwu biya isii abụọ
Geers na-akọwa ọrụ ahụ 'Ọtụtụ ndị na-eche na m họọrọ Heineken n'ihi na enwere m mmasị na biya na karịa nke ahụ, ṅụọ Heineken ma aghaghị m idozi ha
Njirimara dị nnọọ mgbagwoju anya, ọkachasị ma ọ bụrụ na ị bụ onye ọcha Afrịka na ịkpọ onwe onye asị bụ akụkụ nke ihe nketa ọdịbendị gị
N'afọ 1990, mgbe a tọhapụrụ Mandela ma wepụ iwu Apartheid, njirimara anyị dị ka ndị Saụt Afrịka dị mkpa
Dị ka onye Afrịka, ana m ewere onwe m dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị mmụọ ma na-akwanyere ndị nna nna m ùgwù, mana ndị nna nna ahụ bụ ndị Dutch

karama biya ahụ gbajiri agbaji na-ekwu maka njirimara dị ka ime ihe ike, onwe ya dị ka gbajiri agbaji, mmụọ karama ahụ nwere na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè na ihe niile fọdụrụ bụ ihe mkpofu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme' Holland Cotter's The New York Times review kwuru 'N'oge ọ bụla, nka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enyefe ụdị epiphany ọ kwesiri otu echiche nke na-ezipụ ripples a na-atụghị anya ya
Nke a bụ ikpe na otu ihe nke onye na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ Kendell Geers na ihe ngosi a na-akpali akpali
Naanị ihe odide akwụkwọ nka maka Marcel Duchamp's Conceptual joke 'Air of Paris' n'akụkụ foto akụkọ nke ndị uwe ojii na-enye onye mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu oxygen
N'ihu nyocha eziokwu a dị mfe, egwuregwu agụmakwụkwọ Duchamp na-ada n'enweghị isi
N'ịgbaso izu ike ya ogologo afọ na 2001/2002 ọrụ ya na-enwewanye akụkụ ime mmụọ nke Alchemy, Kabbalah, Esoterism, Animism, Tarot na Tantra na-emetụta, ebe ọ na-ejigide nkwa ya na Activism
O mechara kọwaa evolushọn a dị ka 'AniMystikAktivist'
Ụfọdụ ndị akọwapụtala mgbanwe ahụ n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi dị ka oge uri
N'ebe a, Geers bufere omume ọkụ ya n'ime ọnọdụ post-colonial na-arịwanye elu n'ụwa niile, na-atụ aro isiokwu zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka iyi ọha egwu, ime mmụọ, na ọnwụ

Dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ, a pụrụ ikwu na ndụ na ọrụ onye na-ese ihe bụ ebe nchekwa dị ndụ nke mejupụtara ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, foto, akwụkwọ ozi, na ederede edemede nke na-eje ozi dị ka isi iyi nke mkpali ma na-anọchite anya ịga n'ihu nke ọrụ ya
Geers haziri ihe ngosi mbụ ya na 1990 mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Vrye Weekblad
E chepụtara ọrụ a dị ka ihe ngosi akwụkwọ akụkọ nke a kpọrọ ndị na-ese ihe ka ha mepụta ọrụ nka kpọmkwem maka etiti peeji abụọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu
E bipụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na 14 Disemba 1990

Kendell Geers sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa na afọ abụọ gụnyere Johannesburg Biennale (1995, 1997), Havana Biennale (1994), Istanbul Biennale (2003), Taipei Biennale (2000) Lyon Biennale (2005) Venice Biennale (1993, 2007, 2011, 2017, 2019) Dakar Biennial (2018) Shanghai Biennale (2016) Sao Paolo Biennial (2010) Carnegie International (1999) na Documenta (2002 na 2017)

A kpọrọ ihe ngosi mbụ ya “Irrespektiv” ma gaa na 2007 site na BPS22 (Charleroi Belgium) ruo SMAK (Gent Belgium), BALTIC Centre for Contemporary Art (Newcastle), Musée d'art contemporain de Lyon (Lyon France), DA2 Domus Artium (Salamanca, Spain) na MART (Trento, Italy)
Okwui Enwezor haziri ihe ngosi nke abụọ na 2013 na Haus der Kunst (Munich Germany)
Àtụ Authority control (arts)
Kendem, ma ọ bụ Bokwa-Kendem, bụ obere asụsụ Southern Bantoid nke ezinụlọ Mamfe
A na-asụ ya but asusu n'obodo atọ dị na Cameroon, Kendem, Kekpoti na Bokwa
Kenetswe Norah Mosenogi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si North West

Onye otu African National Congress, ọ bụ onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka mmepe akụ na ụba, gburugburu ebe obibi, nchekwa na njem nleta na onye otu North West Provincial Legislature kemgbe Mee 2019
Mosenogi jere ozi dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke African National Congress Youth League site na 2011 ruo 2013
Mosenogi nwetara nzere masta na nchịkwa azụmahịa na North-West University Business School
O nwekwara diplọma post-graduate na nlekota na nyocha site na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye nchịkwa ụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum South Africa
Mosenogi bụ onye isi otu African National Congress Youth League
A họpụtara ya na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mba na 2008
Ọ bụkwa onye kansụl na onye otu kọmitii onye isi obodo maka mmepe akụ na ụba nke Tlokwe Local Municipality, nke dị gburugburu Potchefstroom, ruo na ntuli aka ime obodo nke Mee 2011
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, a họpụtara Mosenogi ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ndị ntorobịa ANC
Ọ nọchiri Steven Nogbeni ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a gbasara usoro nduzi nke league maka oge ahụ na Machị 2013
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị jere ozi na nduzi mba nke league maka oge ahụ
A họpụtara Thandi Moraka dị ka onye nọchiri ya na Septemba 2015
Tupu ntuli aka na 8 Mee 2019, e debere Mosenogi na nke iri na abụọ na ndepụta mpaghara nke ANC nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa maka ndị omeiwu North West Provincial
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 22 Mee 2019
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, a họpụtara Mosenogi dị ka MEC maka mmepe akụ na ụba, gburugburu ebe obibi, nchekwa na njem nleta e guzobere ọhụrụ na kansụl ndị isi nke Job Mokgoro duziri
Ọ malitere ọrụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Àtụ Members of the North West Provincial Legislature

Kenkey (nke a makwaara dị ka kɔmi, optim, kooboo ma ọ bụ dorkunu) bụ nri a na-eri nke yiri achịcha sourdough sitere na mpaghara Ga na Fante bi na West Africa, nke a na-ejikarị ose na azụ e siri esi ma ọ bụ ofe, stew
A na-emepụta Kenkey site n'itinye mkpụrụ ọka n'ime mmiri ruo ihe dị ka otu izu, tupu a kpụọ ha ma tinye ha mmiri n'ime ntụ ọka
A na-ekwe ka ntụ ọka ahụ gbaa ụka ruo ụbọchị anọ ruo otu izu, tupu esi nri
Mpaghara ebe a na-eri kenkey bụ Ghana, ọwụwa anyanwụ Côte d'Ivoire, Togo, ọdịda anyanwụ Benin, Guyana, na Jamaica
A na-ejikarị ọka (ọka), dị ka sadza na ugali eme ya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka kɔmi (nke a na-akpọ kormi) site na Gas ma ọ bụ dokono site na ndị Akan na Ghana
A makwaara ya na Jamaica dị ka dokunoo, dokono, dokunu, drawers na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, na tie-a-leaf
Na Mexico, e nwere nsụgharị a na-akpọ 'Tamale'
A pụkwara ịchọta Kenkey n'ógbè dị n'ebe ugwu Ghana nke a na-akpọ isi obodo ya Tamale
Na Guyana, a na-akpọ ya konkee
Na Trinidad a na-akpọ ya 'paime' (nke a na-ekwupụta pay-me) ma dị iche n'ihi na o nweghị plantain mana ọ nwere ike ịgụnye pumpkin na akị bekee

Na nri nke Caribbean, a na-eji ọka, plantain, unere na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, poteto na-atọ ụtọ (Asante na Jamaican version, nke sitere na Asante version) ma ọ bụ cassava, nke a na-ekpuchi na akwụkwọ unere
Nri a sitere na omenala nri ndị Afrịka
N'adịghị ka ugali, ime kenkey na-agụnye ịhapụ ọka ka ọ gbaa ụka tupu esi nri
Ya mere, ịkwadebe na-ewe ụbọchị ole na ole iji mee ka ntụ ọka ahụ gbaa ụka
A na-agwakọta nri ọka na ọka ma tinye mmiri ruo mgbe a ga-enweta ntụ ọka dị nro ma na-agbanwe agbanwe
A na-ekpuchi ya ma hapụ ya n'ebe na-ekpo ọkụ ka ọ gbasaa
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị, a na-esi kenkey, na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ unere, mkpo ọka, ma ọ bụ foil, ma na-esi ya
E nwere ọtụtụ nsụgharị nke kenkey, dị ka Ga na Fante kenkey
Ga kenkey bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Ghana
Ice kenkey bụ nri e ji kenkey gwakọta na mmiri, shuga, mmiri ara ehi, na ice mee
Àtụ DumplingsÀtụ African cuisine
Kenn ma ọ bụ KENN nwere ike na-ezo aka
Kennedy Ohene Agyapong (amụrụ June16,1960) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego Ghana nke na-anọchite anya Assin Central na nzuko omeiwu maka New Patriotic Party
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na 2000 na oche nke Assin North
Ọ nọgidere n'oche ya na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2004 na 2008
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya n'oche ọhụrụ nke Assin Central ma họpụta ya ọzọ n'afọ 2016
Ọ nọgidekwara n'oche ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2020
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nchebe na Interior nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu ugbu a
A mụrụ Ohene Agyapong na 16 June 1960 ma si Assin Dompim na Central Region nke Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Adisadel College na Central Region
Agyapong nwere GCE A Level ma hapụ Mahadum Fordham, New York, USA
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ọchụnta ego, onye nduzi nke Assin Farms, Supercare Group of Companies na Hollywood Shopping Centre
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ iri abụọ na abụọ

Kennedy Agyapong ka na-anọgide na-abụ otu n'ime ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enwetụbeghị ntuli aka Ọrụ ọgụgụ isi ya na ntuli aka 2016 butere mmeri nke Nana Addo Dankwah Akufo-AddoO nyekwara aka nke ukwuu na mmeri nke ọtụtụ ndị omeiwu NPP dịka KT Hammond na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Kennedy Agyapong bụ onye isi oche kọmitii nkwurịta okwu na nzuko omeiwu, n'okpuru onyeisi oche Nana Akufo-Addo ugbu a

Agyapong ṅụrụ iyi igbu onwe ya ma ọ bụrụ na gọọmentị Akufo-Addo ejighi nwanne onye bụbu onye isi ala John Mahama, Ibrahim, maka ụfọdụ ọrụ nrụrụ aka nke, dị ka Agyapong si kwuo, mere ka steeti ahụ tụfuo ego
Otu ihe atụ o kwuru, bụ enweghị ịkwụ ụtụ isi site n'aka Ibrahim Mahama ihe karịrị otu afọ mgbe nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye isi ala nke Republic of Ghana
Mgbalị nke Agyapong n'onwe ya n'okwu ahụ iji mee ka ndị mgbasa ozi mara ya dugara na nyocha nke Ibrahim Mahama na nkwekọrịta nke Ibrahim Maham iji kwụọ ụtụ isi ahụ
Omume a mere ka Kennedy Agyapong nweta otuto site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị Ghana

Mwakpo Agyapong na-apụtaghị ìhè na Kọmishọna Electoral nke Ghana Charlotte Osei maka, o kwuru na, ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ maka ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye isi Kọmishọna Elektụrụla (EC) wetara ya nkatọ site n'aka ndị isi dị iche iche gụnyere ndị nne eze nwanyị na ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ yana ndị ọzọ so na ndị omeiwu

N'afọ 2018, mgbe e jidere onye isi oche nke Ghana Football Association Kwasi Nyantakyi, o kwuru na a ga-akwụsị onye nta akụkọ na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka Anas Aremeyaw Anas tupu ya amalite inyocha ndị mmadụ nọ na 'ọnụ ụlọ ihi ụra ha'
Ọ na-eyi Anas egwu ugboro ugboro ma kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ na ndị nta akụkọ n'enweghị ókèala katọọ ya na mba ụwa
O kwuru na usoro Anas 'zighị ezi'
N'ikwu okwu na Adom FM na 4 June 2018, ọ kpọrọ Anas 'onye na-emegbu mmadụ, onye na-apụnara mmadụ ihe', mere ka a na-ebipụ ya akpịrị ma kwuo na a ga-akwụgbu ya
Ọ rịọkwara maka 'ịbọ ọbọ' megide onye nta akụkọ ibe Anas, Ahmed Hussein-Suale, na-ekwu 'Ọ bụrụ na ọ bịa ebe a, tie ya ihe
Ihe ọ bụla ga-eme, m ga-akwụ ụgwọ
' E mechara gbuo Hussein-Suale
Na July 2018, a na-enyocha ya maka nlelị nke nzuko omeiwu

Ekwenyere na ọ bụ onye Ghana mbụ nwere nde Rolls-Royce ¢8Ekwenyere na ọ nwekwara ụgbọ elu nkeonwe, oku na-egbuke egbuke maka nyocha site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ Customs Excise and Preventive Service gbasara akụ na ụba ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche maka Kọmitii Nchebe na Interior; ọ bụkwa onye otu Kọmitii Ikpe na onye otu Kọمitii Mmefu Ego Pụrụ Iche
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst
19ʌ 'Kennedy Agyapong kwetara na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ nwụọ n'ọnwa gara aga
legitloadedcom
E nwetara ya na 21 Julaị 2020

Kennedy Okonkwo // (na-ege ntị)( amụrụ na abalị iri na abuọ, n'ime ọnwa iri, na afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asaa na asaa )(1977) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ọrụ ebere, na onye ọch'ụnta ego na-ahụ maka ụlọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Nedcomoaks Limited
Kennedy si Ojoto, Anambra State
A mụrụ Kennedy ma zụlitekwa ya na Lagos, Naịjirịa, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
Kennedy gara Mahadum Ibadan, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (BSc) na Psychology na Mahadum Lagos State, ebe ọ natara nzere ukwu ogo na Business Administration
N'afọ 2007, Kennedy guzobere Nedcomoaks Limited, ụlọ ọrụ Ezigbo ala na ụlọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Kennedy Okonkwo Mmemme maka Nka na ụzụ Ndị ochụ nta-ego
Kennedy bụ onye na-akwado iko Oba nke obodo Eti Osa
Kennedy lụrụ nwunye aha ya bụ Ichechi Okonkwo
Ya na nwunye ya na ụmụ ya bi na Lagos, Naịjirịa
Kennedy Osei (amụrụ na 21 Ọktoba na afọ 1966) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti nke lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 800
O meriri ọla nchara na 1991 All-Africa Games
O mekwara asọmupi na World Championships na afọ 1993 na afọ1997 yana World Indoor Championships na 1993, na-eru na ọkara ikpeazụ n'oge ọ bụla
Kenneth Noel Corbett Bray FRS bụ prọfesọ emeritus na Mahadum Cambridge
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke combushon na oku site na 1981 ruo 1986
Kenneth Browne bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn
A mụrụ ya na Hempstead, New York ma bírí ọtụtụ afọ na Snow Hill, Maryland tupu ọ laghachi New York City iji chụsoo Master Degree ya
Browne gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Salisbury na 2005 na Bachelor of Science na Biology na Bachelor of Arts na Studio Art
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Pratt Institute na Brooklyn
Ọrụ ya n'ụbọchị bụ dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ nnabata na Pratt Institute
Kenneth Browne egosila n'ọtụtụ ébé na United States ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị juried
Ọrụ ya abụwo ihe ngosi na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ n'ịntanetị nke Saatchi Gallery, na Brooklyn Art Studios, ọkachasị Yashar Galleries
O gosikwara na Reeves Gallery na Chelsea, Manhattan
A kpọrọ Browne ka ọ sonye na 2008 Biennial Contemporary American Realism na Fort Wayne Museum of Art
O merìrì 'nke kachasị mma na ngosi' na Figurative Expo 2011 nké Infinity Art Gallery

Kenneth Onwuka Dike (n'ubọchi nke iri na asaa nke onwa Disemba n'afọ1917 ̊ruo ubọchi nke iri abuọ na isii nke Ọktoba n'afọ 1983) ọ bụ onye nkuzi Naijiria, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na osote onye isi mbụ nke kọleji mba ahụ bu onye Naijiria, Mahadum Ibadan N'oge agha obodo Naijiria, ọ kwagara Mahadum Harvard
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Ibadan nke na-achịkwa ederede nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjirịa ruo n'afọ 1970
A na-eto ya na 'ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịmepụta ọgbọ nke ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Afrịka ndi nwere ike ịkọwa akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke ha n'enweghị mmetụta nke Eurocentric'
A mụrụ Dike na Awka, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Fourah Bay College, Sierra Leone nakwa Mahadum Durham maka nzere BSc ya, Mahadum Aberdeen maka nzere MA ya, na King's College London maka nzere PhD ya
N'ime afọ 1960, dị ka onye otu ngalaba akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Mahadum Ibadan, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ n'ịkwalite idu ndú Afrịka nke ọrụ ndị ọkà mmụta e bipụtara na Afrịka

Dị ka onye isi nke kọmitii nhazi nke Nzukọ Mba Nile nke Mbụ nke Africanists na Ghana n'afo 1963, ọ chọrọ nyocha siri ike nke na-abụghị nke ndị na-achị achị, mbipụta nke nyocha n'asụsụ dị iche iche gụnyere ụmụ amaala na ndị mba ọzọ, iji mee ka ndị nwa afo na-asụ asusụ na ndị mmadụ mara akụkọ ihe mere eme, ka ha lee akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke Africa site na anya nkịtị
Ọ bụ onye nduzi mbụ nke ụlọ akwukwọ mba uwa nke Ibadan
N'afọ 1965, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke mahadum njiko ke aku na-uba nkiti
Ebere Nwaubani na-ekwu na Dike bụ onye ọkà mmụta nke oge a nke mbụ na-akwado akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa
Akwụkwọ ya bụ ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka
A kọwaala Dike dị ka onye Afrịka mbụ nwetara PhD na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Na Mahadum Koleji nke Ibadan, ọ buuru prọfesọ Africa mbụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye isi nke ngalaba akụkọ ihe mere mere eme
O guzobere Ebe nchekwa obodo Naijiria, ma nye aka na ntọala nke otu ihe mere eme nke Naijiria
Akwụkwọ ya bụ Azụmahịa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime Naija Delta 1830-1885 o kwuru maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị akụ na ụba nke narị afọ nke iri na iteghete na Naija Delta
O lekwasịrị anya n'ihe ndị dị n'ime Afrịka, ọkachasị usoro nchebe nke ndị Delta na-eme megide ịbanye n'ime alaeze ukwu
Dike nyere aka mepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ Ibadan nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka ma kwalite ojiji nke ihe akaebe ọnụ site n'aka ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke Africa
Dike bụkwa onye isi oche mbụ nke ASUTECH putara nke(Anambra State University of Technology, ugbu a bu Nnamdi Azikiwe University)
Ya na nwunye ya, Ona nwere ụmụ ise
Kenneth Nkosi (a mụrụ na 19 June 1973) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
O gosipụtara Aap na ihe nkiri afọ 2005 Tsotsi (2005)
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri White Wedding (2009) na Otelo Burning (2011), yana Mad Buddies (2012) na Five Fingers for Marseilles (2017)
Na Julaị 2011, ya na Rapulana Seiphemo, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Paradise Stop obere ihe nkiri na Rapulina Seiphemo

Kenneth Obinna Okolie (a mụrụ na Febụwarị 21, 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nlereanya nke Naijiria bụ onye e chiri Mr Nigeria n'afọ 2010 nakwa n'afọ 2015 meriri City People Movie Award for Best Supporting Actor of the Year (English) na City People Entertainment Awards
Okolie bụ nwa afọ Ihiala na Anambra steeti bụ mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa nke ndị igbo nke Naịjirịa bi na ya
Okolie bụ nwa mbụ nne na nna ya mụrụ ma nwee ụmụnne atọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BSc
na Mahadum Valley View nke mba Ghana

Okolie tupu ọ banye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa malitere dịka onye nlereanya n'afọ 2006, nke ọ kọwara dịka ihe ndabara ka ọ na-akpọrọ enyi ya gaa nyocha maka ndị nlereanya ma ọ dịghị mgbe o bu n'obi isonye na usoro nyocha ahụ mana ndị na-eduzi nyocha ahụ manyere ya inyocha nke a, ọ nabatara arịrịọ ha ma nyochaa
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na nyocha ahụ ma họrọ ya wee malite ọrụ ya dịka onye nlereanya
N'afọ 2010, afọ anọ ka ọ malitesịrị ọrụ ngosi uwe ya, Okolie sonyere na asọmpi nwoke Mr Nigeria wee merie
Okolie mgbe o meriri asọmpi ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na asọmpi Mister World wee pụta dịka onye nke abụọ
Okolie malitere na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011
Okolie kọwara ọrụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka ihe ndabara yana ọ dịghị mgbe o bu n'obi ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Okolie meriri na City People Movie Award for Best Supporting Actor of the Year (English) na City People Entertainment Awards
Okolie lụrụ Nwaka Jessica n'afọ 2017 ma n'afọ 2019 ha mụrụ nwa mbụ ha
N'afọ 2012, Okolie gara Owerri nke bụ isi obodo Imo steeti maka ebumnuche nke ịgba ihe nkiri ya na onye ọrụ ibe Nollywood; Nkiru Sylvanus

A kọrọ na n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Disemba, a tọọrọ Okolie na Nkiru Sylvanus na ihe mgbapụta nke ~ 100,000,000 (Otu narị nde naira) nke bụ kwa ọnụego mgbanwe n'afọ 2012 ruru $ 640,000 (Narị isii na puku iri anọ US dollar) ka ndị jidere ha chọrọ iji tọhapụ ha
Na Disemba 21, 2012 na 10 30pm n'ụbọchị nke isii kemgbe ha tọọrọ Okolie na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nkiru Sylvanus ka a tọhapụrụ ma nwetaghachi nnwere onwe
Ọ dịghị mgbe ndị mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa kọrọ ego a kwụrụ maka ntọhapụ ha
Kenneth Okonkwo (amụrụ ya na ụbọchị nke isii na Nọvemba, n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Nigeria, na-eme ihe nkiri amara maka ọrụ ya na nkiri Living in Bondage dị ka Andy nwa Okeke
Amụrụ Okonkwo na Nsukka Enugu State
N'afọ 2013, ọ meriri nturu ugo nke African Movie Academy Award na ngosiputa puru iche nke enyere ndi kwubara ihe nkiri nke Nollywood
Na afọ 2015, ndị nhazi City People Entertainment Awards nyere ya ihe nrịba ama pụrụ iche maka ntinye aka ya na uto ntụrụndụ na Nigeria

Kenneth Slowik (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye America na-eme violin, onye na-eme ihe nkiri violin, na onye nduzi, onye na'ahụ maka nchịkọta ngwá egwu na National Museum of American History na onye nduji nka nke Smithsonian Chamber Music Society
O nwere mmasị na egwu na organology site na nwata

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Chicago, Chicago Musical College, Peabody Conservatory, Salzburg Mozarteum na, dị ka Fulbright Scholar, Vienna Hochschule für Musik, nke (n'etiti ndị ọzọ) Howard Mayer Brown, Nikolaus Harnoncourt, Antonio Janigro, Edward Lowinsky, na Frederik Prausnitz duziri

Slowik bu ụzọ guzobe aha ya n'ụwa niile dịka onye na-eme violin na onye na-akpọ viola da gamba site na ọrụ ya na Smithsonian Chamber Players, Castle Trio, Smithson String Quartet, Axelrod Quartet, na Anner Bylsma's L'Archibudelli
Onye nduzi nke Smithsonian Chamber Orchestra kemgbe 1988, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Santa Fe Bach Festival na 1998, ma duzie Santa Fe Pro Musica Chamber Orchestra site na 1999 ruo 2004
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú na / ma ọ bụ onye nduzi na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere National Symphony, Baltimore, Vancouver, na Quebec Symphonies, Filharmonia Sudecka, Pleven Philharmonic, na Cleveland Orchestra

Mmekọrịta ya na egwu nka nke narị afọ nke 20 gụnyere ọtụtụ oge na Ralph Shapey's Contemporary Chamber Players na ndị otu ntọala na Chicago Museum of Contemporary Art's resident ensemble 'Twittering Machine'

Ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ narị kọntaktị ya na ndị otu SCMS ma mee ihe karịrị iri isii, na-egosi ya dị ka onye nduzi, onye na-eme cello, onye na'egwuregwu ịgba chaa chaa, onye na na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-akpọ keyboard maka egwu sitere na Baroque (Marais, Corelli, Bach) site na Classical (Haydn, Boccherini, Beethoven, Schubert) na Romantic (Mendelssohn, Gade, Spohr) ruo mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ (Schönberg, Mahler, Richard Strauss)

N'ime ndị a, ọtụtụ n'ime ha enwetala ihe nrite mba ụwa, gụnyere Diapason d'Or na Choc nke France, 'British Music Retailers' Award for Excellence, 'Premio Internazionale del Disco Antonio Vivaldi nke Ịtali, nhọpụta GRAMMY® abụọ, na ọtụtụ 'Record of the Month' na 'Recard of the Year'
A notable scholar and educator slowik has presented lectures and seminars throughout the United States
His articles on music and performance practice have appeared in several scholarly journals his annotations for recordings and concert programs are frequently cited as models in their field
N'afọ 2011, ọ natara onyinye Smithsonian Secretary's Distinguished Research Lecture Award

Slowik na-eje ozi na ngalaba nke L'Académie Internationale du Domaine Forget na Quebec na Mahadum Maryland; ọ bụ onye nduzi nka nke Baroque Performance Institute na Oberlin College Conservatory kemgbe 1993
Kenneth Victor Young (1933-2017) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkuzi, na ónyé na-ese onyinyo
A na-ejikọta ya na Washington Color School art movement
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Smithsonian Institution dị ka onye na-ese ihe ngosi ruo afọ 35
A mụrụ Kenneth Victor Young na Disemba 12, 1933 na Louisville, Kentucky, n'ime ezinụlọ ndị Africa America
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Louisville iji mụọ imewe na physics, na-esote ọmụmụ ọzọ na Mahadum Indiana na Mahadim Hawai'i
Mgbè ọ na-aga Mahadum Louisville, ọ zutere nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya Sam Gilliam, yana G
Caliman Coxe, na Bob Thompson
N'afọ 1950, Young jere ozi na United States Navy
Young rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè na DuPont chemical na Louisville, wee kwaga na 1964 na Washington DC
maka ọrụ ọhụrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ngosi na Smithsonian Institution
Ọ bụ ónyé mbụ Black na-eme ihe ngosi na Smithsonian Institution
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'uhuruchi dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe màkà United States Information Agency
O nwèrè ike ime njem n'oge a nke ọrụ ya; na-eleta Egypt, Italy, na ebe dị iche iche n'Africa
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Smithsonian Institution, ọ nọ na ọrụ n'akụkụ Jacob Kainen ma ha ghọrọ ndị enyi
N'ikpeazụ, ọ zutere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Washington Color School, ikekwe site na Kainen ma ọ bụ na njikọ nkịtị
E nwere ụbọchị ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha maka mgbè Young malitere ọrụ ise ihe ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1960, ọ raara onwé ya nye ise ihe
Ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya bụ, Ken Young Recent Paintings (1974) na Corcoran Gallery of Art
Ihe osise Young bụ ihe na-enweghị atụ ma na-egosipụtakarị ọtụtụ akara ịsa ahụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Ihe osise ya bụrụ ibu na ihe osise acrylic, na-egbuke egbuke ma na-acha odo odo
A na-ezo aka na ụfọdụ n'ime utu aha nke ihe osise ya na egwu jazz
Ọ kụziri nka na Corcoran School of the Arts and Design, na Duke Ellington School of the Art
Young nwụrụ na Machị 12, 2017 na Washington, DC
E liri ya na Arlington National Cemetery
A na-etinye ọrụ Young na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze, gụnyere National Gallery of Art, Corcoran Gallery of Art، na Smithsonian American Art Museum
Ọrụ Young bụbu akụkụ nke nchịkọta nka nke Johnson Publishing Company, ụlọ ọrụ nne na nnà nke magazin Ebony na Jet
Nchịkọta ihe osise nke ụlọ ọrụ Johnson Publishing Company nwèrè ihe osise 75 nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America nke a kwụnyere n'ọfịs, mana n'ihi akụnụba, ihe osise ahụ gàrà ire ere na Jenụwarị 2020

Andrew Kehinde “Kenny” Adeleke (amuru Febụwarị 10, 1983) bu onye ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama n’egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria nke gbagoro egwuregwu iri na abuo na NBA, Europe, Asia, na Latin America
Na 2006 – 07 ọ bụ onye nkwughachi kachasị na Israel Basketball Premier League
Amụrụ ya na Lagos, Nigeria, Adeleke tolitere na Brooklyn, New York Ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ basketball na tennis na Paul Robeson High School na Brooklyn, New York
N'oge nke obere Adeleke ọ nwetara akara iri na itoolu na nkwụghachi iri na abụọ
Inwe egwuregwu breakout meriri Benjamin Cardozo wee nweta isi iri na asatọ na nkwụghachi 14
Na-etikwa ụlọ ọrụ ike Abraham Lincoln na-agba ọsọ oge na-enye akara 25 na nkwụghachi 12
Paul Robeson High School mechara tufuo Abraham Lincoln na PSAL playoffs quarterfinals na oge gafere, ebe ọ meriri isi 25 na nkwụghachi 13 ọzọ
Dị ka onye agadi họọrọ no7 obere n'ihu na mba site na ESPNcom, mmezu gụnyere 14 isi na 14 rebounds na Adidas ABCD Camp, nke gụnyere mba kasị mma player
Ndị ama ama bụ Eddy Curry, Kwame Brown, Mo Williams, Ben Gordon
Na-enwetakwa ihe nrite All Star MVP na ogige Five Star All Star a ma ama jiri isi iri abụọ na abụọ na nkwụghachi iri na abụọ
Ndị so na ya gụnyere Carmelo Anthony na Sebastian Telfair, yana ogige Ịkpọ òkù Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na-enweta isi 19 na nkwụghachi 8
Ọ gbara 19 isi na nkwụghachi 13 dị ka onye isi na-emeri onye ọkpụkpọ PSAL nke afọ dịka onye isi
Na-eduga otu ya na ọkwa mba nke Nọmba #18 na USA Today
O sonye na New York vs Chicago Windy City kpakpando nke nwere ndị egwuregwu kacha mma n'obodo ọ bụla
Ọ gbatara ihe ndekọ dị elu 26 yana mgbagha 8
Adeleke kwadoro na Mahadum DePaul, n'elu Boston College, Providence College, New Mexico, University of Massachusetts, na Hofstra University
Ka emechara mebie nkwa ya ka ọ nọrọ nso n'ụlọ na-aga Hofstra

Dị ka onye ọhụrụ na Hofstra ọ meriri CAA Rookie nke afọ, gụnyere egwuregwu ndị a ma ama megide Syracuse na-enweta isi 20 na 9 rebounds, megide Kent State 25 isi na 11 rebounds, na na asọmpi ogbako na-akpasu George Mason iwe 23 isi na 10 rebounds
Dị ka a sophomore ọ bụ nkezi 161 isi gụnyere 11 rebounds dị ka a nke abụọ otu niile CAA nhọrọ ama egwuregwu gụnyere 18 isi na 9 rebounds megide Gonzaga na 24 isi 19 rebounds vs
Manhattan na 19 isi 21 rebounds megide Sweet iri na isii so na UNC Wilmington
Dị ka a obere, ọ bụ a mbụ otu niile CAA nhọrọ, ama egwuregwu gụnyere 20 isi 10 rebounds na 4 blocks megide St
John nakwa 27 isi na 15 rebounds megide VCU

O mechara gafere na Hartford dị ka onye isi na nkezi 207 isi na nkwụghachi 13 na-agwụcha nke abụọ na mba ahụ na Paul Millsap, dị ka ndị otu mbụ American East nhọrọ, gụnyere ihe ndekọ ndekọ 8 ugboro player nke izu
Ndị egwuregwu ama ama na-egwuri egwu na American East bụ Mahadum Hartford Vin Baker, Mahadum Drexel Malik Rose, Mahadum Hofstra Craig Speedy Claxton na onye ọkpụkpọ NBA n'ọdịnihu JJ Barea
Mgbe emechara ya na usoro 2006 NBA, ndị New York Knicks bịanyere aka na ya ka ọ kpọọ na ndị otu egwuregwu Summer na Las Vegas na Summer nke 2006
N'ime oge izizi 2006 NBA, ọ na Seattle SuperSonics gbara 2 egwuregwu 2 site na 2 – 2 n'efu na nkeji 2 megide Los Angeles Lakers tupu ahapụ ya
Adeleke gara n'ihu na-egwu egwu na Israel wee kpọọ Hapoel Galil Elyon, ebe ọ na-eso NBA veteran Omri Casspi na-agba ọsọ n'ogo 16 na mgbagha 10
Inwe oge na-aga nke ọma ma na-eduga otu egwuregwu Israel na nlọghachi na 2006–07
Ọ meriri isi 28 na mgbagha 9 na isi 22 na mgbagha 12 n'egwuregwu megide ụlọ ike Europe na Jerusalem
Na-enwetakwa isi 19 na nkwụghachi 11 megide Maccabi Tel Aviv, na nkwụghachi 22 na nkwụghachi 12 na playoff tụfuru na ọkara ikpeazụ Maccabi Tel Aviv
Adeleke bịanyere aka na Seattle SuperSonics maka Njikọ Summer 2007
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ na Italytali maka NSB Napoli yana na Turkey maka Hacettepe Üniversitesi
Na Jenụwarị 11, 2013, Springfield Armor enwetara Adeleke
Na Jenụwarị 27, 2015, bịanyere aka na ya Trotamundos de Carabobo nke Venezuela
Na Mee 14, 2015, ọ bịanyere aka na Atenienses de Manatí nke Puerto Rican Baloncesto Superior Nacional
Na October 2015,bịanyere aka na ya Club Atlético Goes, otu ụlọ ọrụ Uruguayan
Oge 2016–17, Adeleke malitere na Final Gençlik nke Turkish Basketball First League pụtara na egwuregwu 19
Nkezi isi 14 na nkwụghachi 14, nkezi nlọghachi kachasị elu n'oge ahụ na asọmpi European

Na mbido Machị 2017, ọ bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọgbakọ Hekmeh BC nke Lebanon na-enweta isi 20 na nkwụghachi 17 megide onye mmeri Lebanon Al Riyadi Club BeirutKpọpụta njehie The opening tag is malformed or has a bad name
Na 2017, ya na Fuerza Regia nke Mexico LNBP gbara egwuregwu 11

Blige na 'Love No Limit'

N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2001 ya na magazin Sister 2 Sister, Greene kpughere na ya bụ nwoke na nwanyị na na na ọ na-arịa ọrịa AIDS

Kente (Akan kente ma ọ bụ nwetoma; Ewe ; Dagbani Chinchini) na-ezo aka na akwa Ghana, nke e ji ákwà e ji aka rụọ, ákwà silk na ogho mee
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị eze na-eyi ákwà ahụ n'ụdị toga n'etiti agbụrụ dị ka Ashanti na Ewe
Ndị eze nwanyị, ndị eze nwanyị na ndị inyom nke Dagbon na-eyi ya
N'oge Ghana nke oge a, iyi ákwà kente abụrụla ihe a na-ahụkarị iji cheta oge pụrụ iche, na ụdị kente a na-achọsi ike nke ndị ọkachamara na-akpa ákwà na-eduzi
N'ihi na a na-ewu ewu nke uwe ejiji kente, kente print, nke bụ ụdị nke a na-emepụta ọtụtụ, na-ewu ewu na West
N'ụwa niile, a na-eji mbipụta ahụ na nhazi nke izu ohi agụmakwụkwọ na emume ngụsị akwụkwọ

Ọrụ Davis na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti njirimara, asụsụ, na ịme akara ihe atụ
Davis na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi site na eserese gaa na eserese gaa na ihe ọkpụkpụ gaa na arụmọrụ

Bekee Kenya bụ asụsụ Bekee nke ọtụtụ obodo na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na Kenya na-asụ, yana n'etiti ụfọdụ ndị Kenya na mba ndị ọzọ
Asụsụ ahụ nwere ihe ndị pụrụ iche na ya nke sitere na asụsụ Bantu, dị ka Swahili
Ewebatara asụsụ Bekee na Kenya yana mba United Kingdom na-achị Kenya na 1895, bụ́ mgbe e hiwere East Africa Protectorate tupu ọ ghọọ ọchịchị na 1920
E hiwere Swahili dị ka asụsụ azụmahịa n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ụsọ oké osimiri Swahili na ụsọ oké osimiri Swahili n'ebe ahụ
oge nke ọchịchị, ma jirikwa ya na agụmakwụkwọ
Ndị Britain belatara mmetụta Swahili ma mee ka Bekee bụrụ usoro nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Kenya
A ka na-eji bekee eme ihe mgbe Kenya nwechara onwe ya na 12 Disemba 1963
Asụsụ gọọmentị Kenya bụ Bekee na Swahili, nke a na-amatakwa nke ikpeazụ dị ka asụsụ obodo
Ọ bụ ezie na a naghị eji Bekee eme ihe dị ka asụsụ ndị ọzọ na Kenya, ọ bụ asụsụ mbụ a na-asụ na mpaghara dịka mgbasa ozi, gọọmentị na ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ihi nke a, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị Kenya niile nwere mmụta mmụta maara ụfọdụ ọkwa Bekee
Asụsụ Ogbi nke Kenya (English KSL, Swahili LAK) bụ asụsụ ogbi nke ndị ogbi na Kenya na Somalia na-eji
Ihe karịrị ọkara nke ndị ntị chiri 600,000 nke Kenya na-eji ya eme ihe
E nwere ụfọdụ ọdịiche dị n'etiti Kisumu (ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Kenya), Mombasa (ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Kenya) na Somalia
(Lee Asụsụ Ogbi nke Somalia)

Tinyere Asụsụ Ogbi nke Kenya, e jiwo ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ akụzi ihe na Kenya Asụsụ ogbi nke Belgium (n’otu ụlọ akwụkwọ naanị), Asụsụ ogbi nke Britain (n’otu ụlọ akwụkwọ naanị), Asụsụ Ogbi nke America, KIE Signed English, na ọbụna Asụsụ ogbi nke Korea
O yikarịrị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a na-eji ụdị KSL n'agbanyeghị
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka dị site na mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ntuzi aka American Sign Language
Otú ọ dị, a na-eji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka nke Britain mee ihe n'afọ ndị mbụ
Kenyang (Nyang, Banyang, Manyang) bụ asụsụ a kacha asu na otu asụsụ Mamfe
A na-asụ ya na ngalaba Manyu na Meme nke mpaghara ndida odida nke Cameroon
A maara ndị na-asụ Kenyang na Cameroon dị ka ndị Bayangi (Bayangui) ma a na-akpọ ha Bayangi (Dị Bayayangui)

E nwere asụsụ atọ dị mkpa nke Kenyang Lower Kenyang, nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Eyumojock na Mamfe Central subdivisions, Upper Kenyang, nke a na-asụ na Upper Banyang subdivision na Kitwii, nke a-asụ na ngalaba Meme
Asụsụ Upper Kenyang na Lower Kenyang nwere njikọ chiri anya karịa Kitwii
Aha dị iche iche nke Kitwii gụnyere, Kicwe, Twii, Bakoni, Northern Balong, Upper Balong na Manyeman
A na-edepụta fonemes nke Kenyang na tebụlu ndị dị n'okpuru ebe a, na-ede akwukwo akuko ha n'akara aka akuku
Enwere ike ịmegharị ụdaume niile na Kenyang

Kenza Allaoui (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1999) bụ onye Morocco a mụrụ na France nke na agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti maka otu egwuregwu Féminine nke Nkewa 2 VGA Saint-Maur na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
A mụrụ Allaoui na Vitry-sur-Seine
Allaoui agbaala bọọlụ maka US Orléans, Troyes AC na Saint Maur na France
Allaoui mere nke mbụ ya na Morocco na 30 Nọvemba 2020
Kenza Fourati (Arabic) bụ ihe nlereanya onye Tunisia
A mụrụ Fourati na Lille, France, n'abalị ọnwa 13 Mee afọ 1987
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara obodo ya bụ Tunisia mgbe ọ dị ọnwa abụọ, na-etolite n'obodo La Marsa dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na Tunisia
Nne Fourati, Dora Bouchoucha, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Tunisia, nna ya, Kamel Fourati, bụ radiologist na Tunisia
Nna nna ya, Mohamed Fourati, bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka obi na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ịwa ahụ obi na Tunisia
Nne nne ya, Michèle Roly, bụ onye France na nwa afọ Lille na ugwu France
Fourati nwere nwanne nwanyị nke ọ tọrọ, Maleke Fourati, onye bụ onye na-achọ PhD na Development Economics na UNSW Business School, na mba Australia
Fourati gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị French na Tunisia wee malite ime ihe ngosi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara Paris, iji mụọ na Mahadum Paris-Sorbonne
Fourati gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor na Literature na Fine Arts n'afọ 2008
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara London iji mụọ ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum Kingston, London ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe ngosi
Fourati gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na Film / Cinema / Video Studies n'afọ 2010
Fourati ekwuola na ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye nduzi kemgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ na-amụ ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy kemgbe afọ 2011
Fourati na-asụ Arabic, Bekee, French na 'obere Italian'
O nwere ụmụ amaala France na Tunisia abụọ
N'afọ 2002, Fourati mechara bụrụ onye nke atọ na asọmpi Elite Model Look mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise wee bịanye aka na Elite Model Management
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ magazin mba ụwa, dị ka Vogue Paris, Elle, Marie Claire, L'officiel Voyage, Grazia, na GQ
Fourati agagharịla n'okporo ụzọ maka nnukwu ụlọ ejiji, gụnyere Armani, Céline, Gianfranco Ferré, Jean Paul Gaultier, Stella McCartney, Tommy Hilfiger, Valentino na Vivienne Westwood
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bi na mba ọzọ n'oge ahụ, Fourati sonyere na izu anọ nke Tunisia Jasmine Revolution nke kwaturu Onye isi ala Zine El Abidine Ben Ali
Mgbanwe ahụ nke malitere n'abalị 18 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, ruru n'ókè site na mwepụ nke Ben Ali na ezinụlọ ya na 14 Jenụwarị 2011
Fourati katọrọ ọnọdụ gọọmentị France weere, na-ekwu, sị
Fourati ebiela na Tunisia, France, United Kingdom na United States
Ọ bi na New York ugbu a
N'oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'afọ 2011, Fourati jiri ahụmahụ ya nke ibi na France tụnyere United States
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, Fourati lụrụ Ayman Mohyeldin, onye nta akụkọ telivishọn maka NBC News, n'ememe nzuzo na steeti Georgia
O kesara foto site n'ụbọchị agbamakwụkwọ ya na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Fourati yi uwe ivory bridal burnous n'elu obere uwe Balenciaga maka emume ahụ na Marietta, Georgia
Maka foto ndị e sere na Savannah, Georgia, Fourati yi uwe ejiji Houghton 'Moss' Gown
Àtụ 2010–2019 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit
Kera bụ asụsụ East Chadic nke mmadụ 45,000 na Owuwa anyanwu Chad na mmadụ 6,000 na North Cameroon na-asụ
Joseph Greenberg kpọrọ ya 'Tuburi', aha ya na Tupuri ekerita
Na Cameroon, ndị obere, ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na ndị gbasasịrị agbasa na-asụ Kera na ngalaba ndịda nke Mayo-Danay (Wina commune) na Diamaré (Ndoukoula district) na mpaghara North
A na-asụkarị ya na Chad
Na Cameroon, ndi isi otu dị nso n'ókè, n'ebe ndịda Viri
E nwere ihe dị ka ndị ọkà okwu 6,000 na Cameroon
Kera bụ asụsụ na-eji okwu mbido eme ihe
Ọ na-eji naanị akara ikpe dị n'ókè
Akara uda olu na chaatị eji eme ihe sitere na International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA)
Mkpụrụedemede Kera bụ, gụnyere allophones
Mana enwere ike ịkọwa ya dị ka
Kera nwere nkwekọrịta ụdaume
Na Kera, a chọrọ ọtụtụ okwu ka ha nwee naanị ụdaume dị elu ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị ụdaume dị elu
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, okwu nwere ike ịnwe ụdaume ọ bụla i ə u ma ọ bụ nke ọ bụla n'ime ụdaume e a o, mana okwu ndị nwere ha abụọ, dịka okwu nwere i na o, machibidoro iwu
Àtụ Languages of CameroonÀtụ East Chadic languages
Kermit Oliver (amụrụ n'afọ 1943) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke gụrụ akwụkwọ ma rụọ ọrụ na Houston tupu ọ kwaga Waco, Texas

Ọrụ ya gosipụtara ihe nketa Texas ya na mmasị ya na akụkọ ifo, okpukpe, na akụkọ ihe méré eme Oliver jikọtara ihe ndị dị n'oge a na nke ógè ochie, na-akpata ụdị ọ na-akpọ ihe nnọchianya Ihe osise ya na-emepụta ụwa ndị dị mgbagwoju anya, nke nwéré ihe osise dị iche iche nke ndị mmadụ na anụmanụ bi na ya ma tinye ya n'usoro dị iche iche
A kpọrọ Oliver ónyé na-ese ihe abụọ nke Texas State na 2017 site na Texas Commission on the Arts
E tinyere ihe osise ya, nkè a na-akpọ Tobias, na ngosi mmeghe nke 2016 na Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture na Washington, DC
N'afọ 2013, a kwanyeere Oliver ugwu na Lifetime Achievement Award nké mbụ site na Art League Houston
A mụrụ Oliver na Refugio, Texas, ebe nna ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-azụ ehi n'ugbo ehi

Mgbè ọ dị afọ 6 ma ọ bụ 7, nkà ya maka ịdọrọ ehi, ịnyịnya, na osisi na anụmanụ ndịda Texas pụtara ìhè Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na 1960 Oliver debanyere áhà na Mahadum Texas Southern na Houston, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke ónyé na-ese ihe, Dr
John T
Biggers

Ọ lụrụ nwa akwụkwọ nka ibe ya, Katie Washington, n'afọ 1962 Mgbè ọ nọ na Mahadum Texas Southern, ọ bụ onye natara Jesse Jones Art Scholarship, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1967 na Bachelor of Fine Arts na nzere mmụta nka
N'afọ 1968, Oliver malitere ịkụzi nka na Mahadum Texas Southern, ọ kụzikwaara na Art League nke Houston n'oge a; Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya, o kpebiri ịghara ịchụso nkuzi dị ka ọrụ
Kern arc bụ ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ikuku nké sitere na ezinụlọ nke ice crystal halos
Ọ bụ okirikiri zuru okè na nke na-adịghị ike gburu-gburu zenith, n'adịghị ka okirikiri okirikiri na-emetụta yá nà nkè a na-ahụkarị, nké bụ naanị okirikiri
A na-akpọ oghere Kern aha HFA
Kern na Netherlands, ónyé mbụ kọrọ ya na ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1895
Kemgbe ahụ, a kọọrọ ya ugboro isii
A na-emepụta ya site na ụzarị na-abanye n'elu ihu nkè kristal dị larịị ma na-apụ site na ihu dị nso
Igwe ụzarị ụzarị na-enwe n'ime n'akụkụ ihu na-agbadata na 60 ° na ihu ọpụpụ
N'akụkụ triangular hexagonal crystals nwèrè ihu atọ dị mkpụmkpụ karịa ndị ọzọ na-enye ohere ka oghere Kern mee
Foto mbụ nke oghere Kern bụ nke Marko Mikkilä sere na nso Vuokatti Ski Resort, Sotkamo, Finland n'ubochi irí na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2007
Foto ndị ahụ dị n'ìhè anyanwụ sitere n'ikuku mmiri nke ice crystals nke snowguns mepụtara
Na Vuokatti Ski Resort ihe dị ka otu narị snowguns nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ n'otu ógè
Okpomọkụ bụ -15 ruo -18 °C na mbara igwe doro ányá na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ikuku adịghị
A na-eji igwefoto Nikon D70 na Nikon FM na Sigma 8mm EX F4, Sigma 15mm EX F28 anya
A chịkọtakwara ụfọdụ ihe nlele nke ice crystals, na-akwado ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ntọala triangular ha
E bipụtara foto Mikkilä na mbụ na Tähdet ja avaruus-magazine 1/2008
Ọ bụ URSA, òtù Finnish nkè nkà mmụta mbárá igwe, bipụtara magazin ahụ
Kerry Lee bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke Afrikaans nke nwere ụda Modern Country
A mụrụ Lee n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1989 na Durban
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya 'Vou Jou Arms Om My' nke Anton Botha dekọrọ n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2009, ọ gụrụ egwu nke isiokwu gbasara 'Love & Mortar' na DSTV channel 182, nke egwu isiokwu ya bụ 'Street Rods Africa' n'afọ 2010 sochiri
N'afọ 2012, Lee wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ 'Met Ringe en Woorde'
Egwu a kporo ọkụ na ụlọ ọrụ redio na South Africa
N'afọ 2013, Lee na Hugo Ludik, onye guzobere otu South Africa ADAM na onye nduzi nke Muse Productions, wepụtara egwu abụọ bụ 'Shut Up en Soen My' & 'Kaalvoet Boerseun'
Lee na ndị na-ede egwu Vaughn Gardiner na Roux Cloete wepụtara abọm 'Dans in die Reën'
A họpụtara Lee maka Ghoema Music Awards abụọ n'afọ 2017 Best Country Album, na Publi'cs Favourite Female Artist
Kerry McNamara (Ọgọst 1940 na Kuruman rụo ụbọchị irí na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2017 na Swakopmund) bụ ónyé Namibia bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ónyé na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
A mụrụ McNamara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1940 na Kuruman na mpaghara Northern Cape nke South Africa
N'afọ 1965, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town wee kwaga South-West Africa n'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị
Ọrụ owuwu mbụ ya bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị teknụzụ dị na Ongwediva, nke e mechara kpọwa Ongwediva Training College
O guzobere Kerry McNamara na Associates na 1977, ụlọ ọrụ na 1988 nke a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Kerry McNamar Architects

N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ McNamara, o nyèrè áká n'ihe dị ka 1,170 architectural designs, nke a maara nkè ọma bụ Oshakati Open Market, ụlọ dị na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ nke Namibia, ụlọ ọrụ injinia nke Mahadum sayensị na teknụzụ, ngosipụta nkè Hoba meteorite dị nso na Grootfontein, na Rössing Foundation Adult Education Centre na Windhoek
Ọ natara nkwanye ùgwù màkà 'ihe ọhụrụ ọ na-emepụta ebe ọha na eze', yana dịka 'ónyé na-etinye ụkpụrụ na ala ụlọ Namibia'
Ónyé ọrụ ibe ya Natanael Araseb kọwara ya dị ka 'ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe owuwu nke na-eme atụmatụ ọbọdọ ogologo ógè tupu e chepụta echiche ahụ'
N'afọ 2010 ọ natara 'Lifetime Achievement Award' site na ụlọ ọrụ Namibia Chamber of Architects
Kerry McNamara bụ onye a ma ámá na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akpali atụmatụ udo nke Namibia 435, otu ndị na-agba mbọ màkà mmejuputa mkpebi nke UN Security Council Resolution nọmba nké narị anọ na iri atọ na ise nke kpọrọ maka nnwere onwe nke Namibia na iwepụ ọchịchị ndị ọcha

Ọfịs nke The Namibian, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akatọ ndị South Africa bi na South-West Africa ma na-akwado ndị SWAPO na-emegbu emegbu n'oge ahụ, ka a gbazitere ya n'aka ya, n'agbanyeghị na ndị agha na-akwado ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na-agba ọkụ ugboro ugboro
McNamara sokwa Niko Bessinger, ónyé isi ojii na-ewu ụlọ na ónyé isi SWAPO a ma ama, na-arụkọ ọrụ, na-amara na mmekọrịta a ga-efu ya ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta site na steeti na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
McNamara nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2017 n'ụlọ ezumike nká ya na Swakopmund
Ọ lụrụ Shelagh McNamara; di na nwunye ahụ nwéré ụmụ nwoke atọ na nwa nwanyị
Kesra (Arabic) maọbụ Aghrum aquran na Kabylia, maọbụ Arekhsas na Aures, bụ achịcha ọdịnala Algeria nke e ji semolina (ọka wit maọbụ mgbe ụfọdụ ọka bali) mee
A na-esikarị ya n'elu tajine dị larịị n'elu okpomọkụ dị elu
Enwere ike iri achịcha a na-ekpo ọkụ maọbụ na-ajụ oyi, n'onwe ya maọbụ gbasaa (na bọta, jam, mmanụ aṅụ, wdg), tinye ya ma ọ bụrụ na etinye ya na mmanụ oliv, tinyere tajine, wdg
Enwere ike iji mmiri ara ehi (leben) maọbụ mmiri ara ehi a gwakọtara agwakọta (raib) wee nye ya
A na-eji semolina, mmanụ maọbụ bọta a gbazere agbaze, nnu, na mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ, ikekwe, dabere na mpaghara, ihe iko achịcha, mkpụrụ nigella, mmiri okooko osisi, osisi oroma, wdg
A na-eme Kesra n'ebe nile na Obodo Algeria, a na-akpọ ya khobz el ftir na Algiers, Kuglturum n tajin na Kabylia, na arekhsas maọbụ arekhsis na mpaghara Aurès
Pancake ọdịnaala nwere ọtụtụ ụdị na North Afrika, Scipio Emilian kọwara site na Appian Massinissa na-eri ya mgbe agha megide ndị Carthage gasịrị
Aha kesra sitere na mgbọrọgwụ Arabic nke pụtara 'ịgbaji', ma eleghị anya n'ihi na a na-agbaji patty siri ike (agbaji) site n'aka ka ọ bụrụ iberibe kama iji mma wee bepụ ya
Keteke ( Akan Train ) bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Ghana 2017 nke Peter Sedufia dere, duziri ma mepụta ya
Edebere ihe nkiri a na 1980, mgbe Atswei di ime ( Lydia Forson ) na di ya Boi ( Adjetey Anang ) na-agbalị iru obodo Atswei ka o nwee ike ịmụ nwa
Naanị ebe ụgbọ njem a ga enweta bụ naanị ụgbọ oloko nke hapụrụ ha, wee mee ha ịchọ ụgbọ njem ọzọ ga-ebuga ha na njem na-enweghị atụmatụ site na ime obodo Ghana
Keteke nọchitere Ghana na mmemme Khouribja Africa na Morocco, Disemba 2018 ebe ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo Jury Special Mention Prize
Ketepa bụ ụdị tii na Kenya
Aha ahụ sitere na Kenya Tea Packers
Ketepa bụ ụlọ ọrụ tii kachasị na Kenya, ọ na-eme tii kemgbe 1978, ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Kericho mana iwu nyere Ketepa ikike mbupụ bụ naanị n'afọ 1992
Otu mkpọsa mgbasa ozi na-achọ ịgbanwe 'oge tii' ka ọ bụrụ 'oge Ketepa'
Ketepa meriri Superbrands East Africa award n'afọ 2007
Ketu bụ obodo dị na Lagos, Naịjirịa
Ọ dị nso na Mile 12
Ebe ahụ nwere alaka nke Foursquare Gospel Church
Agboyi-Ketu Local Council Development Area (LCDA) bụ otu n'ime mpaghara ọchịchị iri ise na asaa nke Steeti Lagos, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Alapere
Ọ bụbu gọmentị Lagos State, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, onye jere ozi site na Mee 29, na afọ 1999 ruo Mee 29, na afọ 2007 guzobere gọmentị ime obodo
Ọ na-ekerịta ókèala ya na Ikosi-Isheri Local Council Development Area (LCDA), Kosofe Local Government na Ikorodu West Local Council Development Zone (LCDA)
Kevin Eddie Lewis Betsy (amụrụ na 20 Machị n'afọ 1978) bụ onye nkuzi bọọlụ na onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu League Two Crawley Town
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Working mana ọ gara n'ihu na-eme onwe ya aha na Fulham ebe ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke ndị otu nwetara nkwalite na 1999 na 2001 nke mere ka klọb ahụ bụrụ otu Premier League
Ọ pụtara otu ugboro n'ọkwa kachasị elu nke bọọlụ bọọlụ England, na-aghọ onye ọkpụkpọ Seychelles mbụ na-egwu na Premier League
O wee nọrọ oge na AFC Bournemouth, Hull City, na Barnsley tupu ọ banye na nke ikpeazụ na nkwekọrịta na-adịgide adịgide na 2002
Betsy mere egwuregwu league 94, gbaa goolu 15 n'ime afọ abụọ ya na Tykes tupu ọ kwaga Hartlepool United
Oge ya na Pool dị mkpụmkpụ wee gaa Oldham Athletic na Wycombe Wanderers
N'afọ 2007, ọ bịanyere aka na Bristol City ma mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ na Yeovil Town na Walsall
Otu afọ mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na City, ọ gara Southend United ọzọ tupu ọ laghachi Wycombe mgbe ọ gbazitere ego
N'afọ 2012, ọ bịanyere aka na Woking
N'agbanyeghị na a mụrụ ya n'England, Betsy ruru eru ịnọchite anya Seychelles site na nne na nna ya ochie wee nweta akara mbụ ya na 2011
Betsy malitere ọrụ ya na Woking, na-anọchite anya England na ọkwa ọkachamara ma bụrụ onye a na-akpọ Conference Player of the Year na 1998

Na Septemba 1998, Fulham bịanyere aka na Betsy maka ego £ 80,000, nke nwere ike ịrị elu ruo £ 125,000, na onye njikwa Kevin Keegan na-akọwa ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu kachasị mma ọ hụtụrụla n'oge ọ dị afọ
[citation dị mkpa] O mere nke mbụ ya na Anfield megide Liverpool na League Cup wee nọrọ afọ atọ na Fulham
Naanị ihe Betsy gbara mbọ maka Fulham bịara na mmeri ha meriri na 1998 na Division Two megide Millwall
Ọ pụtara na league ise n'oge Fulham's 2000/01 oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a kwalite ha na Premier League
Ọ pụtara otu ugboro na Premiership maka Fulham n'okpuru Jean Tigana n'egwuregwu megide Manchester United na Old Trafford Ọ gbazinyere ego na AFC Bournemouth na Hull City
Na 1 Machị n'afọ 2002, Betsy sonyeere Barnsley na mgbazinye otu ọnwa
Mgbe ọ pụtara ugboro ise, Barnsley bịanyere aka na Betsy maka ego £ 200,000 na 28 Machị 2002
Ọ pụtara karịrị egwuregwu 90 maka klọb ahụ ma gbaa goolu iri na asaa ma bụrụ onye kacha gbaa goolu n'afọ 2002 na goolu iri n'otu site n'etiti etiti
[citation needed] Betsy nwere obere oge mgbazinye na Hartlepool United n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2004, na-apụta ugboro isii ma gbaa otu ugboro
Na 8 Septemba n'afọ 2004, ọ bịanyere aka na Oldham Athletic na nkwekọrịta ruo na ngwụcha oge ahụ, mgbe nkwekọrịta Barnsley ya kwụsịrị site na nkwekọ abụọ
Na Oldham, ọ gbara goolu ise ma bụrụ onye isi otu nke meriri Manchester City na FA Cup
Mgbe ọ jụrụ onyinye Oldham maka nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ, Betsy kwagara Wycombe Wanderers na July 2005, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Betsy bụ onye na-anọkarị na ndị otu Wycombe n'oge oge 2005 na 2006
Ọ bụkwa onye na-agba goolu mgbe niile maka klọb ahụ, ọkachasị site na hat-trick megide Mansfield Town na Septemba 2005 na Eprel 2006
Ndị ọkachamara ibe ya kwanyeere Betsy ùgwù site n'ịkpọ ya aha na Professional Footballers' Association (PFA) 'Team Of The Year' maka League Two ma nyere Wycombe aka iru play-offs
Na Jenụwarị 2007, a mara ọkwa na League One Bristol City bịanyere aka na Betsy maka ego £ 200,000
Ọ nọ mgbe niile n'ime obodo na-enyere Robins aka inweta nkwalite na Championship, na-agba otu ugboro na usoro megide Northampton
Betsy sonyeere Yeovil Town na mgbazinye ego n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2007
Ọ laghachiri na Bristol City na 7 Nọvemba ebe Yeovil enweghị ike ịgbatị ego ahụ, ebe ọ gbara otu ugboro maka Yeovil megide Swansea City
Ọ jụrụ nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego na Cheltenham Town na Nọvemba 2007
Na 31 Jenụwarị n'afọ 2008, Betsy sonyeere Walsall maka oge fọdụrụnụ na mgbazinye ego
Betsy bịanyere aka na Southend United na 7 August 2008, na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Na 1 Septemba n'afọ 2009, Betsy bịanyere aka na Wycombe Wanderers na mgbazinye ego ruo 2 Jenụwarị 2010
Na 15 Jenụwarị 2010, mgbe mgbazinye ego gara nke ọma, Betsy bịanyere aka na Wycombe ruo mgbe ọ gwụchara oge ahụ, ebe a tọhapụrụ ya na Southend
Betsy duziri ndị otu ahụ na enyemaka asatọ, na-agba goolu ise ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara (OWWSA) Wycombe Supporters Player of the year
Na Mee 2010, Betsy kwetara nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ọhụrụ na klọb ahụ
Betsy bụ onye na-eme ihe mgbe niile n'akụkụ nkwalite Wycombe na 2010, mana ọ chọtara ohere ndị otu mbụ na 2011-12, wee hapụ klọb ahụ site na nkwekọrịta ha abụọ na 20 Disemba 2011
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2012, Betsy laghachiri Woking dị ka onye nweere onwe ya ruo na ngwụcha oge 2011 na 2012
Mgbe ọ batara ọzọ, o nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ime otu ahụ ma n'egwuregwu nke anọ ya, ọ meriri penalties abụọ n'ime nkeji ise
Ọ gara n'ihu merie n'asọmpi Conference South na Woking ebe ọ meriri Maidenhead United n'ebe dịpụrụ adịpụ
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma na ngwụcha oge 2011, Betsy bịanyere aka maka oge ọzọ na Woking
Na June 2014, Betsy bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ otu afọ
Ọ nọgidere na Woking ruo na ngwụcha oge 2014 na 15 tupu o kpebie ịkwụsị ịgba bọọlụ ka o wee nwee ike ilekwasị anya n'ọrụ nkuzi ya

Betsy bụ onye Seychelles ma, mgbe ọ jụrụ ohere igwu egwu maka otu mba Seychelles n'afọ 2005, a kpọrọ ya n'ikpeazụ n'ime ndị otu ahụ wee mee nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa megide otu egwuregwu French na-eleta na 3 June 2011, na-agba bọọlụ ugboro abụọ na mmeri enyi na enyi
A kpọrọ Betsy ka ọ bịa n'òtù Seychelles maka asọmpi bọọlụ na 2011 Indian Ocean Island Games
Ọ malitere egwuregwu ise niile nke Seychelles na asọmupi ahụ, na-agba goolu na ngwụcha megide Mauritius, nke mechara 1-1
Betsy gbara bọọlụ ọzọ n'ọgụ penalty nke Seychelles meriri n'ụzọ anọ
N'afọ 2016, a họtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke England na-erubeghị afọ iri na ise, ebe ọ bụbu onye zụrụ ndị otu ndị ntorobịa na Fulham
Ebe ọ gara n'ihu iduzi U16 na U17 squads, a họtara Betsy ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke England U18s na 24 Septemba n'afọ 2020
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, a họpụtara Betsy ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Arsenal U23s

N'otu oge ya na Arsenal U23, Betsy kpọọrọ ha site na njedebe nke 10 na 2020 n'okpuru Steve Bould ruo na njedebe nke atọ, ka ọ na-etinye n'ọrụ 'ụdị egwuregwu na-adabere na njikwa' ma na-eji usoro dị iche iche, ọkachasị ọdịiche dị na 3-5-2 na 4-3-3
Na 6 June n'afo 2022, a mara ọkwa Betsy dị ka onye njikwa ọhụrụ nke EFL League Two club Crawley Town na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ mbụ
N'afọ 2010, Betsy nọ na-amụ maka BA Honours Degree na Professional Sports Writing and Broadcasting na Mahadum Staffordshire
Kevin Carter (n'ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1960 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1994) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto na onye otu Bang-Bang Club
Ọ bụ onye natara n'afọ 1994 nke Pulitzer Prize maka foto ya nke na-egosi ụnwụ nri nke afọ 1993 na Sudan
O gburu onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ
E gosipụtara akụkọ ya n'akwụkwọ The Bang Bang Club, nke Greg Marinovich na João Silva dere ma bipụta na 2000
A mụrụ Kevin Carter na Johannesburg, South Africa, ma tolite na mpaghara ndị ọcha
Ógè ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-ahụ mgbe ọtụtụ ndị uwe ojii na-awakpo iji jide ndị isi ojii bi na mpaghara ahụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
O mechara kwuo na ọ jụrụ otú nne na nna ya, ezinụlọ Katọlik, 'nwere onwe', nwere ike isi bụrụ ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'lackadaisical' banyere ịlụ ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Carter kwụsịrị ọmụmụ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ere ọgwụ ma banye n'òtù ndị agha
Iji gbanahụ ndị agha, ọ debara aha ya na Air Force nke ọ jere ozi afọ anọ
N'afọ 1980, ọ hụrụ ka a na-akparị onye ojii na-eje ozi n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Carter gbachitere nwoke ahụ, nke mere ka ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ tie ya ihe
Ógè ahụ, ọ lara n'enweghị ezumike, na-anwa ibido ndụ ọhụrụ dị ka onye na-egwu egwu na redio aha ya bụ 'David'
Otú ọ dị, nke a siri ike karịa ka ọ tụrụ anya ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o kpebiri ije ozi ndị ọzọ ọ chọrọ n'ọrụ agha
Mgbe ọ hụrụ bọmbụ Church Street na Pretoria n'afọ 1983, o kpebiri ịghọ onye na-ese foto na onye nta akụkọ
Carter amalitela ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto egwuregwu na ngwụcha izu n'afọ 1983
N'afọ 1984, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg Star, wee gaa n'ihu na-ekpughe obi ọjọọ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Carter bụ onye izizi sere foto nke ndị isi ojii Afrịka gburu na South Africa n'etiti afọ 1980
Carter mechara kwuo màkà ihe oyiyi ndị ahụ 'Ihe ha na-eme wụrụ m akpata oyi n'ahụ
Ma ógè ahụ, ndị mmadụ malitere ikwu banyere foto ndị ahụ
mgbe ahụ enwere m mmetụta na ikekwe omume m adịghị njọ
Ịbụ onye akaebe maka ihe jọgburu onwe ya abụghịrịrị ihe ọjọọ ime

N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1993, Robert Hadley nke UN Operation Lifeline Sudan nyere João Silva ohere ịga Sudan ma kọọ màkà ụnwụ nri na South Sudan na-etinye aka na ndị nnupụisi na agha obodo nke mpaghara ahụ
Silva gwara Carter, onye chere na ọ bụ ohere ịgbasa ọrụ onwe ya na iji ọrụ dị ka ụzọ isi dozie nsogbu onwe onye
Operation Lifeline Sudan anọwo na-enwe nsogbu ego, UN kwenyere na ịkpọsa ụnwụ nri na mkpa mpaghara ahụ ga-enyere òtù enyemaka aka ịkwado ego
Silva na Carter enweghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma na-achọ naanị ịse foto
Ógè ha gbachara ụgbọ elu na Nairobi, ha abụọ chọpụtara na ọgụ ọhụrụ na Sudan ga-amanye ha ichere n'obodo ahụ ruo mgbe ebighi ebi
N'oge a, Carter mere njem ụbọchị na UN na Juba na ndịda Sudan iji were foto ụgbọ mmiri nwere enyemaka nri banyere mpaghara ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, UN natara ikike site n'aka otu ndị nnupụisi iji ụgbọ elu enyemaka nri na Ayod
Hadley kpọrọ Silva na Carter ka ha soro ya gaa ebe ahụ
N'otu oge na Ayod, Silva na Carter kewara iji gbaa foto nke ndị ụnwụ nri metụtara, na-atụle n'etiti onwe ha ọnọdụ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ ha na-ahụ
Silva chọtara ndị agha nnupụisi nwere ike ịkpọga ya n'aka onye ọchịchị
Carter sonyeere ya
Otu n'ime ndị agha ahụ, onye na-adịghị asụ Bekee, nwere mmasị na elekere aka Carter
Carter nyere ya elekere dị ọnụ ala dị ka onyinye
Ndị agha ahụ jere ozi dị ka ndị nche ha
Carter gbara ihe oyiyi nke ihe yiri ka ọ bụ obere nwa agbọghọ, dara n'ala site na agụụ, ebe ugo zoro n'ala dị nso
Ọ gwara Silva na ọnọdụ ọ na-ese foto wụrụ ya akpata oyi n'ahụ, ma chụpụ ugo ahụ
Ógè nkeji ole na ole gasịrị, Carter na Silva banyere ntakịrị ụgbọelu UN wee hapụ Ayod gaa Kongor
E rere ya na The New York Times, foto ahụ pụtara izizi n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1993, ma jikọta ya n'ụwa niile
Ọtụtụ narị mmadụ kpọtụụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ iji jụọ ọdịnihu nwa agbọghọ ahụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwuru na dị ka Carter si kwuo, 'ọ gbakeere nke ọma iji maliteghachi njem ya mgbe a chụpụrụ ugo ahụ' mana a maghị ma ọ bịarutere ụlọ ọrụ nri UN
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1994, foto ahụ ritere ihe nrite Pulitzer maka foto foto
N'afọ 2011, nna nwa ahụ kpughere na nwa ahụ bụ n'ezie nwa nwoke, Kong Nyong, ma ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nri nke UN lekọtara ya
Nyong nwụrụ afọ anọ tupu, n'ihe dị ka afọ 2007, n'ihi 'ọrịa,' dị ka ezinụlọ ya si kwuo
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1994, Carter sere foto nke ndị Afrikaner Weerstandsbeweging atọ a gbagburu n'oge mwakpo ha na Bophuthatswana tupu ntuli aka South Africa
N'ọkara ihe omume ahụ, Carter enweghị ihe nkiri, mana ọ ka nwetara foto zuru ezu iji nye akwụkwọ akụkọ gburugburu ụwa
Eamonn McCabe nke The Guardian kwuru, sị 'Ọ bụ foto nke mere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ peeji ọ bụla n'ihu n'ụwa, otu ezigbo foto nke mkpọsa ahụ dum

N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994, Carter ji ụgbọala gaa Parkmore dị nso na Field and Study Centre, ebe ọ na-egwuri egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ma nwụọ site n'itinye otu nsọtụ nke oghere na paịpụ ụgbọala ya ma na-agba ọsọ na nsọtụ nke ọzọ na windo n'akụkụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsí carbon monoxide mgbe ọ dị afọ 33
Akụkụ nke akwụkwọ igbu onwe Carter na-agụ, sị
Egwu 1996 'Kevin Carter' nke ndị otu egwu Manic Street Preachers, sitere na abọm nke anọ ha Everything Must Go, sitere na ndụ Carter na igbu onwe ya
Richey Edwards dere okwu ndị ahụ obere oge tupu ya apụọ
Onye isi n'akwụkwọ House of Leaves, Will Navidson, bụ onye na-ese foto nke obi amamikpe na-ata ahụhụ maka inweta Pulitzer Prize maka foto nke nwa agbọghọ Sudan agụụ na-agụ ma ọ naghị enyere ya aka

Abọm 2001 Poets and Madmen, nke ndị otu egwu egwu Savatage nke America, sitere na ndụ na ọnwụ Kevin Carter
In the 2010 film The Bang Bang Club, Carter was played by Taylor Kitsch
Kevin Hanssen, bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye egwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Mind Games, Mugabe na The Telling Room
N'afọ 1994, o nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Industrial Psychology na UNISA, South Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Over the Edge Theatre Company
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu 'A Man Like You' nke e mere n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ihe nkiri Zimbabwe
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'ọtụtụ ememme mba ụwa
Kevin Liles (amụrụ na Febụwarị 27, 1968, na Baltimore, Maryland, United States) bụ onye isi ndekọ America na ónyé nchoputa na ónyé isi oche nke 300 Entertainment
N'afọ 2020, Billboard Magazine nabatara Kevin dị ka R&B / Hip-Hop Executive of the Year màkà mbọ ọ na-agba na ihe ịga nke ọma nke Megan Thee Stallion
Liles tolitere na nso Baltimore, Maryland, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Woodlawn High School
Ọ bụ nne ya, Alberta Fennoy, onye na-ahụ màkà ego, na nna nna Jerome Fennoy، onye na-eduzi ụgbọ okporo ígwè, zụlitere ya, tinyere ụmụnne atọ
Ọ gara Mahadum Morgan State, na-amụ injinia na agụmakwụkwọ injinia eletrik site na NASA, mànà ọ hapụrụ mmemme ahụ tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu
Liles malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka ónyé otu ndị DJ nke Baltimore, Numarx
N'afọ 1986, otu ahụ so dee 'Girl You Know It's True,' nke Numarx dèrè na mbụ mànà o mechara bụrụ nnukwu egwu mbụ maka Milli Vanilli
Liles bụ ónyé isi oche nke Def Jam Recordings na osote onye isi oche of The Island Def Jam Music Group site na 1999 ruo 2004

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nkè Warner Music Group, na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru ónyé ya na Island Def Jam Lyor Cohen tupu ọ kwụsị dị ka osota onye isi oche ya nke Warner Music group iji chụsoo ọrụ ọchụnta ego na Septemba 2009
Ọrụ enyemaka Liles gụnyere ije ozi dị ka ónyé isi oche màkà New Yorkers For Children Gala na ihe okike ya na ntinye aka na-aga n'ihu na Kevin Liles for a Better Baltimore Foundation
Liles lụrụ Erika Liles
