Kevin Lamar McCall Jr
(amụrụ na Julaị 25, 1985) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-eti egwu
A maara ya nke ọma màkà mmekọrịta ya na ónyé na-agụ egwu ibe ya bụ Chris Brown, onye ọ bịanyere aka na RCA Records na 2012
E gosipụtara ya na egwu Brown n'otu afọ ahụ 'Strip', nke ruru n'ọkwa 37 na Hot 100
Ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ na 2014 ma bụrụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya ugbu a
A mụrụ Kevin Lamar McCall Jr
na Los Angeles, California, na July 25, 1985
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Carson, California
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-egwu bọọlụ n'ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata na kọleji na Mahadum Washington State, ọ na-enwe mmasị na egwu mgbè niile
Kevin malitere ịbụ abụ n'ime ndị ukwe chọọchị, ma mesịa kụziere onwé ya ịkpọ piano
McCall nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, gụnyere otu ya na ihe nlereanya Eva Marcille
E jidere McCall n'ụlọ ikpe dị na Fulton County, Georgia, na Nọvemba 2019 mgbè ya na ndị uwe ojii sere okwu n'ihu ka a nụ màkà nwa ya nwanyị na Eva Marcille, onye dị afọ ise n'oge ahụ
A na-ekwu na McCall banyere n'ụlọ ikpe dị n'etiti Atlanta wee malite iji okwu mkparị na ndị uwe ojii mgbè ndị nche gwara ya na ekweghị ka ọ banye
E mechara boo ya ebubo mpụ anọ igbochi onye ọrụ mmanye iwu, iyi egwu iyi ọha egwu, omume aghara aghara na mwakpo dị mfe yana otu mpụ maka mmebi mpụ nke abụọ na ihe onwunwe
Kevin McDaid bụ onye Britain na -agụpụta ụda okwu a mụrụ na Maachị 7, 1984
Amụrụ ya na Naịjirịa wee zụlite na Newcastle n'elu Tyne, England
A kacha mara ya nke ọma dị ka onye otu ndị otu nwata nwoke Britain bụ V, nke ya na ndị otu anọ ọzọ sonyere na 2003
Ndị otu ahụ nwere mmasị na eserese eserese atọ na 2004, tupu ha etisasị na February 2005, ihe na -erughi otu afọ mgbe ebipụtara nke mbụ ha
Ọ bụzi onye na -azụ onwe ya
N'August 2005, ekpughere ya na The Sun ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ogologo oge onye otu Westlife Mark Feehily
Di na nwunye ahụ kpuchiri ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ Attitude na Disemba 2007
Ha kwere onwe ha nkwa na Jenụwarị 28, 2010, mana ha kewara
Kevin Okyere bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na Ghana
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Springfield Energy- ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ dị ijeri dollar
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2008

A mụrụ ya na 1980 na ezinụlọ Ashanti bara ọgaranya n'agbanyeghị na o sitere na ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya, ọ na-erere onye na-akwado football mmiri mmiri oyi na Kumasi sports stadiumỌ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị opoku ware, emesia ọ gawara USA maka ịga n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ na ndekọ ego na mahadum George Mason dị na vergina
Gọọmentị Ghana nyere ụlọ ọrụ Kevin Springfield ihe mgbochi ahụ, nke a maara dị ka West Cape Three Points Block 2, na 2016 mgbe Kosmos hapụrụ ya
Ọzọkwa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye ndú na mbupụ ngwaahịa ndị a nụchara anụcha na mba ndị agbata obi dị ka Mali na Burkina Faso na mmanụ ala Naijiria
E nyere ya na 2019 Emy Africa Awards dị ka 'Nwoke nke Afọ' maka ngalaba mmanụ na gas
Kevin J
Patel (amụrụ na Septemba 23, 2000) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi nke ihu igwe na onye na-ahazi obodo
Patel ekerịtala ahụmịhe ya n'ihu ọha dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe nke a chọpụtara na ọ nwere nsogbu iku ume
Ọ bụkwa onye nguzobe na onye isi nchịkwa nke OneUpAction, otu mba ụwa na-enweghị uru na-enweghị ego nke dị na US nke na-akwado ndị ntorobịa a chụpụrụ achụpụ site n'inye ha ihe onwunwKevin J
Patel (amụrụ na Septemba 23, 2000) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi nke ihu igwe na onye na-ahazi obodo
Patel ekerịtala ahụmịhe ya n'ihu ọha dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe nke a chọpụtara na ọ nwere nsogbu iku ume
Ọ bụkwa onye nguzobe na onye isi nchịkwa nke OneUpAction, otu mba ụwa na-enweghị uru na-enweghị ego nke dị na US nke na-akwado ndị ntorobịa a chụpụrụ achụpụ site n'inye ha ihe onwunwe iji mep
Kevin J
Patel na nna ya, nne ya, na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bi na Los Angeles, California
Ọ tolitere na South Central Los-Angeles
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Carver Middle School, ebe ọ malitere ịgbachitere ya
Ọ gara Santee Education Complex, ebe ọ malitere klọb gburugburu ebe obibi mbụ
N'afọ 2019, o sonyere na Youth Climate Strike LA
Ọ bụ onye ndu na Fridays for Future Southern California
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, Patel na-amalite afọ nke abụọ ya na Mahadum Loyola Marymount ebe ọ na-amụ gbasara sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 2021, o sonyere na kọmitii 'Taking Action for People and the Planet'
N'afọ 2012, Patel so obodo ya rụọ ọrụ, na-akụziri ndị ọgbọ ya banyere enweghị nhata nri n'ime South Los Angeles na Carver Middle School
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ 2013, a chọpụtara na obi ya na-akụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma n'ihi ikuku na-adịghị nke ọma na Los Angeles

N'afọ 2019, o guzobere OneUpAction International ma site n'ọrụ ya, ya na obodo ya jikọrọ aka mepụta Youth Climate Commission mbụ na Los Angeles County na mgbalị iji mee ka olu ndị ntorobịa na nsogbu ihu igwe dịkwuo elu
Patel bụ onye nnọchi anya United Nations Togetherband maka ebumnuche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke ịrị na atọ na nke ịrị na anọ (Sustainable Develop Goals 13 & 14)
Ọ bụkwa onye National Geographic Young Explorer
Patel na-eje ozi na Youthtopia World Circle of Youth Council, Climate Power Advisory Council, World Economic Forum's 1 Trillion trees US
Stakeholder Council, na Intersectional Environmentalist Council
OneUpAction bụ òtù na-eme ihe ike nke ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi nke Patel guzobere na 2019 na-arụ ọrụ iji nye ndị na-akwado ndị ntorobịa ihe onwunwe
Dwane Marshall Weir II (amụrụ na Julaị 12, 1990) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta hip hop / R&B na ónyé na-ede egwu, nke a maara dị ka Key Wane
Wane emeela màkà ndị na-ese ihe dịka Big Sean, Jazmine Sullivan, Beyoncé, Drake, Jhene Aiko, Wale, Lil Wayne, Young Jeezy, Juicy J, Ariana Grande, Logic, Ty Dolla Sign na Meek Mill na ndị ọzọ

A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịmepụta Drake's 'All Me', Beyoncé's 'Partition', Jazmine Sullivan's 'Let It Burn' & 'Insecure', Meek Mill's 'Amen', Big Sean's 'Guap', 'Beware', 'IDFWU' na ọtụtụ abọm ya gụnyere Hall of Fame, Dark Sky Paradise, na Twenty 88
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na otu, Wane malitere ịkpọ piano na ụka na Sọnde mbụ ọ bụla, na mbụ na-akụziri onwé ya abụ tupu nne ya anụ ya ma tinye aka na mmụta ya
Ọ gwara XXL, o nyèrè m iwu ka m jiri keyboard Yamaha a si na katalọgụ JCPenney
E zigara ya n'ụlọ, amalitere m na-eti ya
Mgbè ahụ, amalitere m ịnara nkụzi piano, na ihe m mụtara site na nkụzi piano m, m ga-ejikọta nke ahụ na ịkụ, ọ bụkwa n'ezie ihe m hụrụ n'anya ime, nwoke
Anaghị m eme ọtụtụ ihe n'ihi na m na-eweta ihe mgbè niile
' Na Disemba 2012, Key Wane gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tennessee State na nzèrè na Musical Arts na Sciences
N'afọ 2002, Wane malitere ịkụ aka n'ụlọ nne ya
Ónyé zutere rapper Big Sean na klas nke 8 site n'aka nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya ónyé gwara Wane ka ọ kpọọ nkụ màkà Sean
Big Sean was friends with Wane's older brother and cousin at their high school, Cass Technical High School in Detroit
Around the same time Wane started taking record production seriously, and begun sending him beats periodically
During mid-2010 before his junior year of college, Wane first became known after producing 'Memories' by Big Sean, from his third mixtape Finally Famous Vol
3 BIG
In 2011, Wane produced and co-wrote Tyga's 'Drink the Night Away' featuring The Game and Mario, 'Don't Wake Me Up' and 'Hypnotized', all of which featured on his mixtape Black Thoughts Vol
In November 2011, Warner/Chappell and Big Sean signed Wane to a co-publishing deal

James Foye III, ónyé a maara nke ọma dị ka KEYZBABY, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na-ede egwu, onye injinia ọdịyo na onye injinịa ndekọ si Buffalo, New York
Ọ bụ otu ọkara nké The Upperclassmen, otu mmepụta na Ayo the Producer
KEYZBABY esorowo ndị na-ese ihe dịka Chris Brown, Bryson Tiller, K Michelle, Wiz Khalifa, Diddy na Rick Ross rụọ ọrụ
Keziah Jones (amụrụ Olufemi Sanyaolu na 10 Jenụwarị 1968) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede abụ ma na-akpọ egwu guitar
Ọ na-akọwa ụdị egwu ya dị ka 'Blufunk', nke bụ ngwakọta n'etiti ihe ndị na-adịghị mma na ụda funk siri ike
A pụkwara iwere mgbọrọgwụ ya na Naijiria na egwu Yoruba na egwu mkpụrụ obi dị ka mmetụta dị ukwuu na ụda ya
A maara ya maka ụdị egwu guitar ya dị iche iche, gụnyere usoro aka nri ya nke yiri usoro ịkụ aka nke onye na-akpọ egwu bass
Olufemi Sanyaolu aka
Keziah Jones bụ nwa Oshodolamu Sanyaolu; Onye isi ndị Yoruba na onye nrụpụta ihe na-aga nke ọma na Abiola Sanyaolu

A mụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 1968, Jones nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na nnukwu ezinụlọ na akụkụ Naijiria na obodo LagosSite na nwata ọ nọ na-akwado ịgbaso nzọụkwụ nna ya na nchegbu ezinụlọ na a na-atụ anya ka ọ nweta ọrụ agụmakwụkwọYa mere, nna ya debara aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na London wee hapụ Naijiria mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na England
Jones biri ndụ bohemia ruo ọtụtụ afọ kama nke a tụrụ anya ya
'Lose all time, love your mind, free your soul!' bụ okwu sitere na egwu ya Free Your Soul
N'ịga site na London gaa Paris ma laghachi ọzọ na-esonyere naanị guitar ya, Jones na-eto eto nwetara aha dị ka onye egwu nwere nkà na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ụdị 'funk siri ike' pụrụ iche

N'afọ 1990, mgbe ọ na-agba bọs na London's Portobello Road, onye na-ede egwu na onye bụbu onye na-egwu keyboard maka Sailor na Culture Club chọpụtara Keziah, Phil Pickett na-agbanwe ngwa ngwa n'ime njikwa oge niile nke onye na-ese ihe
Pickett bịanyere aka na Jones na nkwekọrịta ide egwu ogologo oge na Hit & Run Music Publishing (foto Billboard 1990) onye isi ya, Dave Massey, dekọrọ egwu Jones mgbe ọ nọ na Chrysalis Music
Massey nọgidere na-etinye aka na ọrụ Keziah ruo afọ asatọ sochirinụ
Mgbe obere oge ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọdachi na Capitol Records na US, na 1992, Pickett bịanyere aka na Keziah na akara Delabel nke Emmanuel de Buretel maka abọm mbụ ya Blufunk Is a Fact
Ndekọ na London na onye mmepụta Kevin Armstrong, gụnyere na ihe ịga nke ọma zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ọrụ ahụ bụ egwu mbụ nke Keziah 'Rhythm Is Love'
Jones na-ekwu na ahụmahụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Paris ya dị ka ihe dị ukwuu maka ọrụ ya na-eto eto ugbu a na akụkọ ndụ ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Jones edekọwo abọm ise na otu DVD dị ndụ

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ememme n'ụwa niile n'agbata afọ 2009 na 2012, na ngwụcha afọ 2012 Keziah Jones laghachiri na Lagos na-akwadebe idekọ abọm studio ọhụrụ ya maka ntọhapụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na Because Music na 2013
Keziah na-ekwukarị Fela Kuti, Miles Davis na Jimi Hendrix dị ka mmetụta dị mkpa
Keziah Jones na-ese, na-ese ma na-ede uri
Keziah lụrụ onye na-agụ egwu Anglo-Nigerian bụ Akure Wall n'afọ 1994
Ha kewara na 1996
Na 14 Jenụwarị 2012 Keziah lụrụ Hauwa Mukan, ha kewara na Disemba 2013

Kgomotso Christopher (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1979) bụ onye mba South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eji olu ya aguputa ederede nke a maara nke ọma maka oge ya na Isidingo dị ka Katlego Sibeko tupu ọ banye na Scandal dị ka Yvonne 'YV' Langa Ọ bụkwa olu ya k' ana- anu n' usoro nzaghachi igwe MTN ma na-eje ozi onye n'abụghị onye isi oche na Naledi Theatre Awards Board of Directors
Kgomotso nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na iwu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Cape Town
E nyere ya onyinye nrite Jules Kramer maka ihe osise mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2004, ọ nwetara nzere agumakwo n' na Theatre Arts na Mahadum Columbia dị na New York City
Ọ nọgidere na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na US na UK ruo afọ 2008
Kgomotso pụtara dịka onye ọbịa na usoro telivishọn Madam & Eve, SOS, Backstage, na Moferefere Lenyalong
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri nke Romeo & Juliet, Midsummer Night's Dream, Hamlet na Dr
Faustus
Na Nọvemba 15, 2018 Kgomotso kpughere na Instagram na ọ bụ olu n'aza usoro igwe okwu MTN's Interactive Voice Response system
Kgomotso lụrụ Calvin Christopher
Kgopedi Oa Namane Lilokoe bụ onye ama ama na redio South Africa si Tembisa
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụbu maka Midday News na Africa Watch na ụlọ ọrụ redio azụmahịa kachasị ukwuu na South Africa, Metro FM
Ọ kwadokwara Africa Digest, mmemme ihe omume kwa ụbọchị nke na-ebido site na elekere ise nke uhuruchi,wee ruo na elekere asato na Channel Africa Radio
Na June 2016, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye ga- akwado 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Kgosiemang bụ aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Khabi, nke a sụgharịrị Kabie (site na Chinese 卡别), bụ asụsụ Southern Loloish nke Yunnan, China
A na-asụ Kabie na Jiangcheng Hani na Yi Autonomous County, Mojiang Hani Autonomoum County, na Lüchun County
A na-enye ndepụta okwu Khabi nke e depụtaghachiri site na iji orthography Hani nke dabeere na Rom na Minta (n'afọ 2013) na Luo & Minta (n'afọ 2016)

Khabonina Qubeka (amụrụ 22 Jenụwarị 1981 ) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa, onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, onye na-agba egwu, onye na-eme egwuahụ̀ bụ Choreography, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye bụ ọbụ abụ

Na 2017, ọ meritere onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Mmemme awọd ihe nkiri nke Boston International Film Festival Awards ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Florida Film Festival nakwa ezi ome kacha mma nke AMAA bụ Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ọrụ ngosiputa agwa ya dị ka 'Dora' na Dora's Peace
N'afọ, 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ngosiputa agwa dị ka onye otu omempụ Nina Zamdela na SABC 3 soap opera bụ Isidingo
Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi BET Fix My Love ma amara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka Maxine na ihe ngosi ritere awọdụ nke South Africa bụ The Wild
Dị ka onye bụ ọkachamara n'egwu dị iche iche, ọ kwadola ma bụrụ onye ikpe n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ịgba egwu telivishọn - SABC 1dika Dance Your Butt Off, eTV's Step Up or Step Out
O mekwara ihe nturu ugo The Channel O Music Video Awards
Qubeka, onye egwuregwu yoga na-anụ ọkụ n'obi , mepụtara ma kwado ihe ngosi ahụike ya na nkwudosike nke ahụ nke a na-akpọ Gym e'Kasi maka eTV na Open View HD

N'afọ 2018, o bidoro nchepụta Afro Yoga nke ya na Hong Kong wee nweta ihe nrite Mahadum City nke nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke ọkachamara nkepụta maka ụwa site n'aka onye isi Mahadum City Mr Wilson Lam na YogaRaj n'onwe ya

Qubeka buru ụzọ wee bụrụ onye a ma ama na ngosipụta agwa dị ka Doobsie na soapie SABC 2 ' Muvhango ', site na 2006 ruo 2007 (ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke atọ gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ mgbe Lindiwe Chibi na Khanyi Mbau gasịrị )
O mere ọrụ TV ndị ọzọ dị iche iche n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, sonyere na usoro ihe nkiri SABC bụ For Sale (2007), The Lab (2008) na soapie eTV 'bụ Rhythm City', na 2009
Ka ọdị ruo afọ 2010, ọ malitere na telenọvela M-Net bụ The Wild, yana na-egosi na ihe ngosi The Mating Game na Erfsondes

N'afọ 2014, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi ahụike ya na ụdị ndụ ya na OpenView HD 's eKasi+ channel, nke a na-akpọ Gym e'Kasi (mee egwuregwu nkwudosike ahụ n'ụlọ), nke bụ ime nhọrọ nri na mmega ahụ ziri ezi na ntụsara ahụ nke ụlọ na agbataobi gị
Ọ mekwara ihe mkpali ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ihawu Lesizwe, nke SABC
Na 2017, ọ meritere Indie Spirit Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Boston International Film Festival
O nwetara ihe nrite maka igosipụta agwa dị ka Dora na fim ahụ, bụ Dora's Peace
Dị ka o si kwuo, itinye aka na fim ahụ mere ka ọ na-ahụ ndị akwụna n'ụzọ dị iche
E gosikwara ihe nkiri a na Orlando Film Festival na Beijing International Film Festival
Na 2017, a kọrọ na ọ na-eme ihe ngosi agwa dị ka Nina Zamdela na usoro telivishọn , bụ Isidingo
N'otu afọ ahụ, a kọkwara na ọ na-ewepụta ihe nkiri ọhụrụ, aha ya bụ She is King
N'onwa Ọctoba 2017, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye nnabata nke mmemme South Africa ọhụrụ, nke gbadoro ụkwụ na ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri, Qubeka bụkwa onye na-agba egwu na onye na-akwado ahụike
Ọ na-eji mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na-akwalite ụdị ndụ dị mma na ọdịdị ahụ
Khabonina na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama nke bụ Generations the Legacy dị ka Oby Abudu na dị ka nwunye Vuyo Dabula bụ Kumkani Phakade
Na 2010, Qubeka dere ma wepụta afere egwu ma bụ albọm mbụ ya akpọrọ Gama Lahko, n'okpuru akara egwu nke ya bụ Khabodacious Moves Music
Ndekọ ahụ nwere egwu iri na abụọ, ma gụnye otu egwu 'Gama Lakho' na 'Bring your Body'
Egwu abụọ a nwetara vidiyo egwu, nke Qubeka mepụtara
N'afọ 2013, o wepụtara egwu rap akpọrọ, 'Wax It (Wax On Wax Off)' nke kesara na 2018
Qubeka mụrụ nwa mbụ ya, nwanyị, n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018
Khadidjatou Fall, nke a na-akpọkarị Khadi Fall (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1948)ọ bụ onye Senegal na-ede akwụkwọ na onye bụbu onye ozi gọọmentị
O si n'ezinụlọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nke na-asụ asụsụ Wolof
Ekele n'otu akụkụ maka mbọ ha, ọ gara ụfọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị mma nke Senegal nke kwadebere ya maka ọmụmụ na Europe
O nwetara PhD ya na Mahadum Strasbourg ma nọrọ oge na Germany n'afọ ndị nke afọ 1990
Ọ bụ prọfesọ zuru oke nke German na Mahadum Dakar
O deela akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ ma n'afọ 2000 ọ bụ onye ozi na gọọmentị Senegal
Khadija Ben Arfa (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Machị 28, 1949 na Machị 9, 2017) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri

Khadija Bukar Abba-Ibrahim (amuru 6 Jenuarị 1967) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụrụkwa onye otu All Progressives Congress nke ulo Ndị Nnọchiteanya maka Damatura/Gujba/Gulani/Tarmuwa na steeti Yobe
N'afọ 2016, onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018 ọ meriri nwa ya nwoke ka ọ nweta tiketi nke pati ya ịzọ ọkwa Ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya gọọmenti etiti

Na Jenụwarị 9, 2019 Abba-Ibrahim kwuputara arụkwaghịm ya na ndị omebe iwu gọọmentị etiti ka o lekwasị anya na mkpọsa ya maka ịzọ ọkwaỤlọ ndị nnọchiteanya gọọmenti etiti maka mpaghara ya bụ nke ọ meriri
Khadija Ibrahim lụrụ Sinetọ Bukar Abba Ibrahim onye bụbu aka na-achị Yobe steeti na onye bụbu Sinetọ
A mụrụ ya na ezinụlọ Waziri Ibrahim Ọ gara Kaduna Capital School, Kaduna, Nigeria n'etiti 1972 na 1977
Na 1978, ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen's College, Lagos
Na 1980, ọ gara Headington School, Oxford, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1983
N'afọ 1986, Abba Ibrahim nwetara diploma na Business and Finance na Padworth College, Reading, UK
Na 1989, ọ natara akara ugo mmụta BSc ya na Business Studies na Sociology sitere na Roehampton Institute for Higher Educatio n, onye mmekọ nke Mahadum Surrey

Obere oge tupu ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum na 1989, ọ rụru ọrụ na Abbey National Building Temple Fortune, North Finchley, UK, ebe ọ na-etinye aka n'ịzụta na ire ihe onwunwe na ijikwa akaụntụ Mortgage nke ndị ahịa di iche iche
Na 1991, ya na Hatton Cross Heathrow, UK rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ime ka ndị ahịa jiri ọrụ ibu nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ebupụ na Middle East na Asia
Ọ hapụrụ na otu afọ ahụ banye Kaguin Nigeria Limited dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ahịa
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ire ọka na ngwaahịa mmanụ na mpaghara ECOWAS
Na 1992, a họpụtara ya onye njikwa, OURS Insurance Brokerage, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka akaụntụ nzuzo na nke gọọmentị
Mgbe ọ nwetara ahụmahụ zuru oke, Abba Ibrahim hiwere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, ZAFACA Nigeria Limited na 1996
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka CEO / Onye isi nchịkwa site na mmalite ruo 2004
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-etinye aka na ọrụ nkwekọrịta gọọmentị na nke onwe, ihe kacha echegbu ya bụ akụrụngwa nke kọmputa, ngwa nchekwa, ngwaike, wdg
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara Khadija Bukar Abba Ibrahim Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka njem na ike, Yobe State
Ọrụ bụ isi ya bụ ilekọta mbunye ọkụ n'ime ime obodo na netwọk ụgbọ njem na steeti ahụ
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya Resident Commissioner, Nicon Insurance, Yobe State
N'afọ 2016, onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Abba Ibrahim emewokwa akara
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu ugboro atọ, na-anọchite anya Damaturu, Gujba, Gulani na Tarmuwa Federal Constituency nke Yobe State, a họpụtara ya na 2007 na mbụ wee họpụta ya ọzọ na 2011 na 2015
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ụlọomeiwu nke anọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya, ọ jere ozi n'ọrụ dị iche iche

Site na 2007 ruo 2008, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ maka mmepe ime obodo; n'agbata 2008 na 2010, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Nkwukọrịta; site na 2010 ruo 2011, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Rural Privatization na Commercialisation
Ọ bụkwa onye so na kọmitii ụlọ na-ahụ maka ọkụ, akụrụngwa mmiri, ime ime, ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị, itinye ego, wdg
Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite

Ndị a gụnyere, Thisday Woman Distinction Award, 2012, Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Inspirational Leadership Forum (SATBILA) Award, 2010, Distinguished Leadership Award nke The Rotary Club nke Maiduguri City, 2016 n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Khadija El-Mardi (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1991) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Morocco
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke dị n'etiti na afọ 2016 Summer Olympics Ọ meriri Dariga Shakimova na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Morocco na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics, Otú ọ dị, ọ hapụrụ asọmpi ahụ n'ihi ihe gbasara ahụike
Khadija Er-Rmichi (Arabic; amụrụ na 16 Septemba 1989) bụ onye Morocco ọkachamara na agba bọọlụ nke na agba dịka onye na edebe goolu maka AS FAR na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Er-Rmichi gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2018 Iso ntozu Iko Ụmụ nwanyị Afrika (agba nke mbụ)
Dị ka Agha
Khadija Oussat bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na edebe goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Morocco
Oussat agbaala bọọlụ maka CA Khénifra na Morocco
Oussat gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu na 8 Maachị 2008 n'ụlọ enyi 0–6 furu efu
Khadija Salum Ally Al-Qassmy (Amụrụ n'ọnwa April 5, 1958) bụ onye omeiwu na National Assembly of Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu Civic United Front
Site n'afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1990 ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Ministry of Education nke Zanzibar
Ewezuga ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, ọ bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya kemgbe afọ 1991
Khadja Nin (amụrụ na 27 June, na afọ 1959) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu na Burundi
A mụrụ Nin na Burundi, ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ezinụlọ mmadụ asatọ
Nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ
Ọ mụrụ egwu mgbe ọ dị obere dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị
Site na olu abụ ya pụrụ iche, mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-eduzi ndị na-agụ egwú na Bujumbura choir ma rụọ ọrụ na katidral dị n'ógbè ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ Burundi gaa Zaire na afọ 1975 wee lụọ di na 1978
N'afọ 1980, ya na nwa ya nwoke dị afọ abụọ kwagara Belgium
N'afọ 1985, ọ nwetara nkwekọrịta na BMG
Abọm nke abụọ ya, nke e wepụtara na afọ 1994 nke akpọrọ Ya Pili, bụ nke a nabatara nke ọma
Ọganihu ya bịara na afo 1996 na abọm ya a ma ama Sambolera, nke a bụrụ na Swahili, Kirundi, na French
N'afọ 1997, ọ gụrụ egwu 'Sailing' na duet ya na Montserrat Caballé na album Friends For Life
O ji ngwakọta dị n'etiti rhythms Africa na pop nke oge a mee ihe nke ọma iji mepụta ụdị egwu nke ya pụrụ iche
Otu n'ime egwu ya kachasị ewu ewu bụ Sina Mali, Sina Deni, nsụgharị nke egwu Stevie Wonder bụ Free
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya na afo 1992, bụrụ ya na Swahili
Mana a mara ya nke ọma na mba France na afọ 1995 na ụda Sambolera mali, aha nke abọm nke abụọ, Ya Pili (nke abụọ)
Abọm nke atọ bụ nchịkọta nke utu aha ochie na ọhụrụ
Jeanne Moreau na-eme ihe nkiri na-egosi egwu ya Mama, ebe ọ na-ekwu maka nne ya, na abọm nke anọ ya Ya
Ihe odide nke abọm a dị na Swahili ma ọ bụ Kirundi (maka abụ nke aha Mama)
Abọm ahụ gụnyekwara mkpuchi nke otu egwu nke onye egwu Gabon bụ Pierre Akendengué, Africa Obota, na aha Stevie Wonder, Free nke ọ gbanwere aha Sina mali, sina deni (Abụghị m ọgaranya ma ọ bụ ụgwọ)
Akụkụ ọzọ na-asọpụrụ Nelson Mandela, otu abụ na-akpọ maka ibelata mmachibido iwu a tụrụ na Burundi
Na Jenụwarị na afọ 2000, ọ bụrụ abụ na AccorHotels Arena (n'oge ahụ Palais Omnisports de Paris-Bercy) ya na Sting na Cheb Mami
Ọ lụrụ di ọzọ na afọ 2006 na onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala Belgian Jacky Ickx, ha wee biri na Monaco
N'alụmdi na nwunye a, ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke nke bi na Belgium ugbu a

N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe na Cannes Film Festival, n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Cate Blanchett, n'akụkụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Léa Seydoux na Kristen Stewart, onye nduzi Ava DuVernay, onye na-eme egwuregwu Chang Chen na ndị nduzi Robert Guédiguian, Denis Villeneuve na Andrey Zvyagintsev
Khadra Haji Ismail Geid (Somali , Somali ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
N'afọ 2011 ọ ghọrọ onye isi obodo Gabiley City, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo na Somaliland
Ọ bụ taa osote onye isi obodo Gabiley
Geid sonyeere Peace, Unity, and Development Party na-achị n'afọ 2002
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, Minista Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime Obodo kwadoro ya dị ka onye isi obodo nke Gabiley District
Geid bụ onye isi obodo nke asaa kemgbe 1991 na nwanyị mbụ jere ozi na ikike a na mpaghara Somaliland
Tupu a họpụta ya n'ọkwa ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ anọ dị ka onye otu kansụl na afọ isii dị ka osote onye isi obodo
E wepụrụ Geid n'ọfịs site na ntuli aka nke enweghị ntụkwasị obi na kansụl obodo Gabiley na 13 2012 wee họpụta ya ọzọ dịka osote onye isi obodo

Khairat Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe (a mụrụ 1962) hoputara Senator maka Abuja Federal Capital Territory constituency, Naijiriana mmalite nke Naijiria Fourth Republic, na-agba ọsọ na nchịkwa nke ndị Democratic Party (PDP)
O nwere ọkwá site na May 1999 ruo May 2003
A mụrụ Khairat na Ilorin na April 1962
Ọ mụtara iwu na Mahadum nke Buckingham
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị oche ndi okaiwu Senate a họpụtara ya na kọmitii na Environment, Health, Women Affairs (onyeisi oche), Federal ihe, Tourism & Culture na Federal Isi Obodo Ókèala
Ọ bụ onye otu Panel Panel on Review of Customs and Excise
Khairat bụ onye na-agbasoro ndị omempụ maka oche oche Senate na 2003, mana ọ furu na primaries
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ na nkwado ya gara aga maka ịkwaga imeri President Olusegun Obasanjo
Na Jenụwarị 2003, ọ mara ọkwa na ọ na-akwagara ndị All Naijiria People Party (ANPP) n'ihi mmeso ọjọọ ndị PDP mere
Na August 2005, afọ isii mgbe alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe mụrụ nwa mbụ ya, nwa nwoke, n'otu ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Miami, Florida na USA
Ọ dị afọ 46
Nna nke nwa ọhụrụ ahụ, Colonel Lawan Gwadabe, bụbu onye isi agha nke Niger State
N'ihe December 2011, Senator Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe bụ onyeisi oche nke Senators Forum,bụ nke ndị mbụ na-eje ozi na ndị isi na-ekerịta ha ihe ọmụma na ahụmahụ
Àtụ Nigerian Senators of the 4th National Assembly
Àtụ Nigeria-politician-stub

Khaled Ben Slimane (amụrụ n'afọ 1951 na Sousse) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ikpu ite ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Tunisia

Khaled Ben Slimane gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ihe gbasara ceramics na Institut Technologique d'Art, d'Architecture et d'Urbanisme na Tunis n'afọ 1977, wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Escuela Massana de Barcelona tupu ọ laghachi Tunisia n'afọ 1979
Khaled Ben Slimane gara India, Iran na Pakistan n'etiti 1975 na 1976, ma biri na Tokyo site na 1982 ruo 1983, ebe ya na ndị na-emepụta ite na Japan rụkọtara ọrụ
N'ọrụ ya, Khaled Ben Slimane na-agwakọta nka Islam na ụdị ịma mma nke ọdịda anyanwụ
Khaled Bouzid (Arabic) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Khaled Mohamed El Nabawy (Arabic; a mụrụ na Septemba 12, 1966) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri nke na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri, ékwuǹkà na telivishọn
A mụrụ ya na Mansoura, Egypt, onye nduzi Youssef Chahine mere ka ọ mara ihe nkiri n'afọ 1994, na ihe nkiri ya Al Mohager

E nyere El Nabawy All African Film Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri a, ma merie Horus Award maka onye kachasị akwado Al Maseer, site na Cairo National Festival for Egyptian Cinema
El Nabawy gara Institute of Performing Arts
Ọ bi na Cairo, Egypt
Ọrụ ya na Hollywood gụnyere Mullah, onye ndụmọdụ mbụ nke Saladin, nke Ghassan Massoud gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Kingdom of Heaven
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ Hamed, onye ọkà mmụta sayensị Iraq na ihe nkiri Fair Game
El Nabawy bụ onye nkwado dị elu nke mgbanwe ọchịchị Egypt nke afọ 2011 ma na mgbasa ozi ma, mgbe ụfọdụ, na-eme ngagharị iwe n'okporo ámá
Khaled Habib El-Kebich (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 24, 1970 na Tiaret, Algeria) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Algeria, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-ede ma na-eme ụdị egwu nke bụ ma nke omenala ma nke oge a

O mepụtara ngwakọta egwu nke onwe ya nke ọ na-agwakọta ụdị egwu dị iche iche yana egwu sitere n'ụwa niile ma mepụta ụdị egwu na-akpali akpali na nke pụrụ iche nke na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ ma na-adọta mmasị
Enwere ike ịkọwa egwu ya dị ka nke nwere mmetụta nke funk, jazz, reggae, blues, Latin rhythms yana egwu ọdịnala sitere n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ụwa
Otu ihe ahụ na-emetụta ngwakọta nke ngwá egwú na ihe niile sitere na ịgbà ọdịnala ruo ụda eletrọniki

Foursan Al Hoggar nke Kamal Laham duziri nke Samira Hadjdjilani / EPTV Algerian Television mepụtara na ihe nkiri 'El Hanachia' nke Boualem Aissaoui mepụtara site na CADC (Centre Algerian du développement du cinema)
Site na ụda ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-enweghị isi, egwu ihe nkiri na akara Khaled El Kebich bụ nke oge a na ụda mmetụta uche nke na-eme ka ọrụ ihe nkiri dị mma ka ọ na-agbaso àgwà egwu

Eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụdị ya sitere na egwu Algeria agwakọtara ya na ntụziaka egwu dị iche iche n'otu akụkụ n'ihi na o dere ma soro ọtụtụ ndị agbụrụ dị iche iche rụọ ọrụ, dị ka Down By Law si Italy, New Phases si South Africa, Aquarius si France, Hada Raïna si Sweden, na ndị ọzọ

O sonyekwara na nnukwu ememme ndị Europe dịka Falun Folkmusik Festival, Roskilde Festival, ArtGenda Festival, Stockholm Water Festival, Re Orient Festival, Folk o Folk Festival, Verlden i Norden Festival, 550 Fatih Istanbul Festival na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Khalid Abdalla (Arabic خالد عبدالله; Egyptian Arabic pronunciation [Khālid 'Abd Allāh]; a mụrụ na 26 Ọktoba 1980) bụ onye Egypt British na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agbachitere mmadụ
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ụwa niile mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri United 93 nke a họpụtara na 2006 Academy Award na BAFTA
N'ịbụ nke Paul Greengrass dere ma duzie, ọ na-akọ ihe ndị mere na United Airlines Flight 93, nke e weghaara dịka akụkụ nke mwakpo 11 Septemba
Abdalla mere Ziad Jarrah, onye na-anya ụgbọelu na onye ndú nke ndị ohi anọ nọ n'ụgbọelu ahụ
Ọ pụtara dịka Amir na The Kite Runner ma soro Matt Damon mee ihe na Green Zone, ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya na onye nduzi Paul Greengrass
Abdalla pụtara dịka onwe ya na ihe ngosi Jehane Noujaim banyere mgbanwe Egypt nke afọ 2011, The Square, nke meriri Audience Award na Sundance Festival n'afọ 2013
Abdalla nọ na bọọdụ nke National Student Drama Festival

N'afọ 2011, Abdalla ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Mosireen ('Anyị Na-ekwusi ike') Collective na Cairo otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-ahụ maka mgbanwe na ndị na'ịgba mbọ iji kwado mgbasa ozi ụmụ amaala gafee Ijipt n'ihi ọdịda Mubarak
Ọnwa atọ mgbe ọ malitere, Mosireen ghọrọ ọwa YouTube na-enweghị uru na Egypt n'oge niile, na n'ụwa niile n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2012
A mụrụ Abdalla na Glasgow, Scotland, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Ijipt, a zụlitere ya na London
Nna Abdalla na nna nna ya bụ ndị a ma ama na-emegide ọchịchị n'Ijipt
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị dọkịta kwagara UK tupu a mụọ ya

Abdalla gụrụ akwụkwọ na King's College School, ụlọ akwụkwọ kwụụrụ onwe ya maka ụmụ nwoke na Wimbledon na South West London na ụmụ klas ya gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ben Barnes na onye na-atọ ọchị Tom Basden
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ banyere n'ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na-aga nke ọma

N'afọ 1998, ọ duziri mmepụta nke Frank McGuinness dere Someone Who'll Watch Over Me, nke mechara nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na Edinburgh Festival ma nweta kpakpando ise na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Scotsman, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi kachasị nta natara otuto a
N'afọ 2003, Abdalla rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Christopher Marlowe's Tamburlaine the Great na Rose Theatre
Nke a bụ mmepụta mbụ nke Peter Hall's Canon's Mouth Theatre Company nke 'ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eto eto na-achọ ịchọpụta olu ọhụrụ maka nnukwu ihe nkiri ihe atụ nke Renaissance'
Ọrụ ihuenyo mbụ Abdalla bụ n'afọ 2005 nke Spooks nke akpọrọ Infiltration of a New Threat
N'afọ 2006, Abdalla mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Hollywood na United 93, ihe nkiri banyere mwakpo nke 11 Septemba, ma nweta otuto dị egwu maka ngosipụta ya nke Ziad Jarrah
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ihe nkiri The Kite Runner
N'ịkwadebe maka ọrụ ahụ, ọ nọrọ oge na Kabul na-amụta Dari Persian na kite-efe efe
Ọ pụtara dị ka Freddy na Green Zone na Matt Damon na onye nduzi Paul Greengrass
N'afọ 2009, Abdalla mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri Egypt nwere onwe ya In the Last Days of the City, nke Tamer El Said duziri
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010, e nyere Abdalla onyinye pụrụ iche maka ihe ọ rụzuru na ihe nkiri na Cairo International Film Festival
N'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ na ihe nkiri East to West, nke a makwaara dịka The River Flows Westward
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara dị ka Muhammad XII nke Granada na ihe nkiri Assassin's Creed
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa na Abdalla ga-egosipụta onye mmekọ Princess Diana, Dodi Fayed, na oge nke ise nke The Crown
Na Jenụwarị - Febụwarị 2011, Abdalla so na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na Tahrir Square na Cairo, Egypt na nnukwu ngagharị iwe megide ọchịchị Hosni Mubarak
Ọ pụtakwara na Wolf Blitzer na CNN na 9 Febụwarị 2011 na Anderson Cooper iji gosipụta echiche ya banyere ngagharị iwe ahụ
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'Ijipt
N'afọ 2011, Abdalla ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Mosireen Collective na Cairo otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-agba mbọ na-akwado mgbasa ozi ụmụ amaala gafee Ijipt n'ihi ọdịda Mubarak
Mosireen na-eme ihe nkiri nke mgbanwe na-aga n'ihu, na-ebipụta vidiyo ndị na-agbagha akụkọ mgbasa ozi steeti, na-enye ọzụzụ na ngwá ọrụ na ngosipụta ma nwee ọbá akwụkwọ dị ukwuu nke ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ dị ọnwa atọ, Mosireen ghọrọ ọwa YouTube na-enweghị uru na Egypt n'oge niile, na n'ụwa niile n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2012
N'ọnwa Septemba 2011, Abdalla lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị ogologo oge, Cressida Trew

Brian Ouko Omollo, (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1990) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Khaligraph Jones ma na-akpọkarị ya Papa Jones, bụ onye Kenya na-eti egwu nke a maara maka egwu ya 'Mazishi' na 'Yego'O weputara abọm izizi ya zuru oke nke akpọrọ Testimony 1990 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2018
A mụrụ Jones ma zụlite ya na Kayole, agbata obi dị na Nairobi, Kenya
Nne ya nyere ya aha Ouko Robert iji kwanyere onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya nwụrụ anwụ bụ Dr
Robert Ouko, onye e gburu na ụbọchị 13 n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 1990
Khaligraph malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementịrị
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya nke ọma n'afọ 2008 na ọrụ a na-akpọ 'Words And Pictures'
O meriri Channel O Music Video Awards Emcee Afrịka n'afọ 2009, asọmpi a na-ahụ anya nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na mba ụwa n'otu ntabi anya
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya nke akpọrọ 'Testimony 1990'
E chiri ya 'Ọ kacha mma n'egwu rap nke afọ' na nke ise Annual African Muzik Magazine Awards 2018 (Afrimma) nke emere na House of Blues na Dallas, Texas na 2018
A kpọrọ ya onye egwu Hip Hop kacha mma na Soundcity MVP Awards na Jenụwarị 2020
Emume a mere na Eko Convention Center dị na Lagos, Naijiria
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya maka BET Awards
Nhọpụta ya bụ maka Best International Flow category
Ọ na-emegide Nasty C nke South Afrịka, DJonga nke Brazil, Kaaris nke Ivorian na onye mmeri, grime rapper Stormzy si UK
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, a kpọrọ ya onye egwu East African Rapper of the Year na MTN Uganda
N'afọ 2021, Khaligraph sonyere Odibets, ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ egwuregwu n'okpuru atụmatụ Odimtaani ha iji malite 'OdiNare' rap challenge
Khalik Allah (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Amerịka na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto
'Ọ na-akwado foto anya nke ndị mmadụ nọ n'okporo ámá na-ese foto ihu ha ruo ọtụtụ sekọnd ka ha na-eme ka ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ igwefoto kwụ otu ebe
' Khalik bi na Long Island ma bụrụ onye otu Magnum Photos
A mụrụ Khalik na Brookhaven, New York
Nne ya bụ onye Jamaika na nna ya bụ onye Iran
Ọ tolitere na Suffolk, Long Island, New York, mana ọ kwagara n'etiti Queens na Harlem n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Nne na nna ya zutere na mahadum dị na Bristol, England
Ọ bụ nwa amaala abụọ nke Jamaika na Amerịka
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu na igwefoto vidiyo Hi-8
O were afọ anọ iji mee ya
Khalik malitere ise foto n'afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020 ọ ghọrọ onye otu Magnum Photos

N'ịbụ nke The Village Voice kọwara dị ka 'ahụmahụ ị na-agbanye karịa nyocha etinografik ị na-ekiri, Khalik Allah's hour-long non-narrative street-life doc Field Niggas guzo dị ka ụdị ihe osise obodo kachasị dị ịrịba ama
Ndị na-ekwu maka ya bụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka, na-enwe ịda ogbenye, enweghị ebe obibi, ịṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ, na iyi egwu site n'aka ndị uwe ojii; ndị nwere 'agụụ iji nụ olu ha'
A na-egosikwa ndị uwe ojii
A na-ewere aha ihe nkiri ahụ site na 'Message to the Grass Roots', okwu ihu ọha nke onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ bụ Malcolm X kwuru n'afọ 1963, 'na-eto mmụọ nnupụisi n'etiti ndị ohu nọ n'èzí'
E mere ihe nkiri ahụ n'oge ọkọchị afọ 2014, jiri igwefoto aka mee ihe nkiri
Ewezuga ihe nkiri, ọ na-agụnye ihe nkiri nlekota nke nkụchi nke Eric Garner yana ụda nke ndị na-eti mkpu site na ndị otu afọ 1950s
Khalik wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'efu na YouTube na Vimeo n'afọ 2015 maka obere oge, tupu ewepụ ya na arịrịọ nke True / False Film Festival ka o wee nwee ike igosi ebe ahụ
Kemgbe ahụ, egosila ya na mmemme ihe nkiri na sekit kọleji na US na Yuropu
Khalil Morsy (21 Septemba 1946 - 5 Ọgọst 2014) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe ọ dị afọ 68
A kpọgara Morsi n'ụlọ ọgwụ Salam dị n'obodo Cairo, Egypt n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Cairo dị nso na Nasr City
Khamuram Bishnoi (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye India na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Kripashankar Patel Bishnoi sokwa ya nwee mmekọrịta
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, afọ 2013, e nyere ya nwoke pụrụ iche nke India maka ọgụ ya megide mmetọ plastik
N'afọ 2017, Adarsh ​​Navjyoti Vikas Sansthan, onye enyemaka nke obodo Bishnoi, haziri mkpọsa mmata sitere na Ramlila Maidan ruo Jantar Mantar nke Khamuram na Rana Ram Bishnoi duziri
N'ime njem a, ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ gburugburu mba ụwa na mba 250 sonyere
Khanya Mkangisa (amụrụ n'abali iri abuo na ato nke onwa Machị 1988), bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama Isidingo, Shattered, Step Up to a Start Up na Harvest
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn na onye na-ese ihe nkiri DJ
A makwaara ya maka YoTv
A mụrụ ya na 13 Machị 1988 na Peddie, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na AFDA, The School for the Creative Economy
Ya na onye na-eti egwu, J Molley bụ onye dị afọ iri karịa ya ebe asịrị malitere n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2019
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ sonyeere telivishọn wee bụrụ onye na-egosi Yo YV
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na mmepụta ihe ruo afọ atọ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara igosi ihe ngosi sayensị agụmakwụkwọ akpọrọ Knock Knock
N'afọ 2004, ọ pụtara na telivishọn mbụ ya na usoro MthunziniCom
O mechara gaa n'ihu na The Lab1 dị ka 'Refilwe' na Ugugu noAndile
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi ịgba egwu 'Shield Teen'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara nkwado na ihe ngosi a ma ama Zone 14 na 2011 na Intersexions na 2012
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2013, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Zabalaza ma rụọ ọrụ 'Mpilo'
N'afọ 2019, o mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu DJ ma mee ihe nkiri na Jozi to Quilox weekend festival na Lagos, Nigeria
N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara nke mbụ na soapie a ma ama bụ Muvhango na ọrụ 'Mbali'
Khanyisile Mbau (amụrụ 15 Ọktoba 1985), onye amara aha ya dị ka Khanyi Mbau, bụ onye ome ihe nkiri South Afrika, onye ọbịa telivishọn na onye ọrụ nka

Nzụlite ya na Soweto, Mbau tolitere bụrụ onye ama ama wee bụrụ aha njirimara dịka Doobsie nke abụọ na SABC 2 soap opera Muvhango (2004–2005); dị ka Mbali na SABC 1 soap opera Mzansi na SABC 1 nke obere usoro bụ After Nine
Dịka mgbe 2018, ọ bụ onye ọbịa nke ihe nkiri ntụrụndụ SABC nke atọ bụ The Scoop, The Big Secret on BET Africa ma gosiputa dị ka Tshidi na Mzansi Magic's Abomama
A mụrụ Khanyisile Mbau n'abali iri na ịse nke ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 1985
Nne ya, Lynette Sisi Mbau, rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ego nke ego ezumike nka na Barclays Bank
Nna ya, Menzi Mcunu, alụghị nne ya n'oge ahụ n'ihi na di na nwunye ahụ na-akpa
Mcunu enweghị ihe njide aka ọ bụla n'aka gbasara nwata ahụ mana ọ kpọrọ ya aha Khanyisile, onye na-eweta ìhè
Mbau zawara aha nna nne ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya Lynette hapụrụ Khanyi nye nne na nna ya na Mofolo, Soweto wee laghachi n'ọrụ, ma hapụ nne nne ya ka ọ na-azụ ya
Nne na nna Mbau bụ ndị ọdịda anyanwụ nke ukwuu n'ụdị ejiji ha na ka ha si ahụ ụwa
Mbau siri, “Gladys (nne nne ya) ga-aapịa gi ụtarị gi ma i daa iwu
O ji ihe ndozi na nlebara anya na nkọwa nke Obi Buckingham Mbau n'ịhụnanya kpọrọ ya 'Queen of England' [
N'afọ 2004, Mbau nọchiri onye na-eme ihe nkiri Lindiwe Chibi n'ọrụ Doobsie na Muvhango mgbe enyi ya nwoke Dan Mokoena gbagburu Chibi
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ, a kọrọ na ọ na-etinye oge dị ukwuu na-eme orir na ọṅụṅụ na ọ pụta ìhè na Sunday tabloids
Na 2006 Mbau sonyeere usoro ihe nkiri ejije SABC 1 kpu ọkụ n'ọnụ bụ Mzansi, na oge nke abụọ ya, dịka Mbali
SABC 1 emeharịghị ihe ngosi ahụ maka oge nke atọ
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2007 Mbau rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Zee na SABC 1 mini-series After 9
Na 2012 ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na oge nke abụọ nke SABC 1 's Turn It Out
O gosikwara na DStv Vuzu documentary, A bụ m, wee gosi Sindisiwe Sibeko na DStv's Mzansi Magic mini-series Like Father Like Son
N'ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 2012, Mbau wepụtara akụkọ ndụ ya Bitch, Biko! Abụ m Khanyi Mbau, nke onye odeakụkọ Lesley Mofokeng dere
N'afọ 2013 Mbau pụtara na usoro ihe onyonyo docu-reality Reality Check na Etv
N'otu afọ ahụ, Mbau malitere ihiwe ihe ngosi okwu nke ya na OpenView HD channel eKasi+, akpọrọ Katch It With Khanyi
Emegharịrị ihe ngosi ahụ maka oge nke abụọ na ngwụcha afọ 2014
Ọ ruru nọmba nke mbụ na òkè ndị na-ege ntị maka ihe ngosi okwu, gafere oke nke SABC 2's Motswako

Katch It With Khanyi nke aruputara nwere ọgọ nlele nke ndị na-ekiri ya pụtara puku asaa na iri asatọ na ise 7, nke ruru ogo otu nde na puku isii na iri isii na itoolu n'izu mbụ nke ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2014
N'ime oge nke abụọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nkiri South Africa na ihe nkiri TV 2015
Na 2014, Mbau gbara asọmpi na oge nke asaa nke Strictly Come Dancing
N'ime izu asaa ya na onye mmekọ Quintus Jansen enwetaghị votu zuru oke iji nọgide na asọmpi ahụ, ewepụrụ ya
Enwere esemokwu mbụ na soshal midia ka ndị na-akwado Mbau kwuputara mmechuihu ha ma na-agbagha maka izi ezi nke usoro ịtụ vootu
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015, MTV Africa malitere ịlụ ọgụ egbugbere ọnụ, Mbau welatara ihe nrite ahụ ụlọ
N'ọnwa Epril nke afọ 2015, Mbau wetere ọrụ nkwado nke 'Pinky' na telenovela nke mbụ Etv, Ash to Ashes
Na Nọvemba 2015, a họpụtara ya maka 'Akaụntụ Instagram Kachasị Mma' na Channel24 Online Awards, nke na-akwanyere ndị egwu obodo, ndị àmà ama na ndị ọha na eze nwere ọnụnọ dị ike na ntanetị ugwu

N'onwa Maachị nke afọ 2016, Mbau nwetara ọrụ dị ka Palesa Simalane n'usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn ama ama Umlilo ; agwa ahụ bụ onye ọka iwu steeti kloset lezibianu nke batara n'alụmdi na nwunye nke amụrụ ọtụtụ nwanyị nke naanị ebumnuche ya bụ ịmụ ụmụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016, Mbau wetara ihe ngosi onyonyo ọhụrụ na SABC 3 akpọrọ The Weekend Edition tinyere redio na onye ọbịa TV bụ Phat Joe
Duo ahụ kwadoro ihe ngosi obibi ndụ n'ụtụtụ izu ụka, nke emere na Cape Town
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2017, Mbau pụtara na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri ọhụrụ akpọrọ The Scoop nke ekesara na SABC 3 dịka akụkụ nke usoro akụkọ nke channel ahụ
N'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2017, Channelu BET Africa kwuputara usoro eziokwu nke akụkụ iri na atọ ọhụrụ akpọrọ The Big Secret, nke Mbau kwadoro
N'ime usoro a, ọ na-enweta ndị sonyere ka ha kwuputa ihe nzuzo ha kachasị njọ
Ihe ngosi a malitere n'ikuku n'abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba , 2017 wee jiri akụkụ abụọ nke njikọta ọnụ mechie

N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2018, Mbau sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa ihe nkiri TV kaacha ekiri,bụ Uzalo, na SABC 1, na-egosi ọrụ dị ka go-getter Dinekile aka Lady Die bụ onye na-ere ahịa ma na-achọ ibi ndụ dịka nwa nwanne nna ya bụ MaNgcobo
N'ịbụ onye nọọrọ obere oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka obere mpụ ma mara ụzọ ya gburugburu ụwa, ọ nwetachabeghị ihe ọ chọrọ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, Mbau kwuputara nlọghachi ya na ihe ngosi maka oge nke ise ya
N'ọnwa Epril 2018, Mzansi Magic wepụtara ụzọ usoro ọzọ maka usoro ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ha, Abomama, nke na-enyocha ma na-agbagha echiche nke okwukwe na mmehie
Mbau narị dị ka onye isi ndu n'egosipụta dị ka Tshidi, onye na-achọ nsokwunyere bụbu eze nwanyị ghetto ghọrọ nwunye nke lụrụ dọkịta a ma ama nke Leroy Gopal gosiputara
Ihe ngosi a nwere nruputa nke ndi nkiri ihe karịrị otu nde, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi nke atọ a kacha elele na DSTV
Na 2016, Mbau ghọrọ onye ọbịa nke ihe ngosi redio na Metro FM,Whose Show is it anyway, tinyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Somizi Mhlongo na Ntombi Ngcobo
Ihe ngosi a malitere na mba N'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 2016, wee Megide ruo mgbe ọ bịara na njedebe na ngbanwe nke nguzoharị ọwa ngosi ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Zaza, nwunye trophy nye Bheki (Simo Magwaza), nne ụmụ abụọ, na onye nwe ụlọ ahịa akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Emere ihe onyonyo a site na ọnụọgụ ndị na-emebi i igbe wee gaa n'ihu na nnata ụlọ ọrụ karịrị R7 nde n'ime izu nke atọ ya na sekyutt sinima
N'onwa Ọktoba 2016, Johannesburg Film Festival kpọrọ Mbau n'etiti mmadụ iri kacha bụ ndị South Africa ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, nke ọganihu nke Hapiness is a Four-letter Word wetara

N'afọ 2017, Mbau malitere imepụta ihe nkiri nke atọ ya na enyemaka nke onye na-emepụ ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ntọọchị bụ Leon Schuster, Frank and Fearless, bụ nke edobere maka mwepụta sinima na 2018
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, Mbau kwuputara mwepụta nke gin nke ya akpọrọ I Am Khanyi - Millennial Shimmer Gin

Khanyisa Patricia Jaceni (amụrụ (1995-10-03) n'abalị abụọ nke onwa Ọktoba afọ 1995), bụ onye mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta South Africa na onye na-edekọ egwu nke a maara dị ka Khanyisa, ọ nwetara nkwado site na ọdịnaya TikTok ya ma mesịa malite ọrụ egwu ya na ngwụcha afọ 2021

Onye àgwà ya na-emetụta a mgbasa ozi TikTok nke nwere ihe karịrị otu nde na ụma na ihe karịrị nde iri atọ na asaa na TikTok na okwu ya a ma ama bụ BOTTOM LINE!!, ọ so n'ime ndị na-emepụta ọdịnaya ole na ole a kwadoro na otu ahụ
[citation needed]
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'afọ̀ 2021, ọ bụ akụkụ nke JazziDisciples, Maazị JazziQ, guzobere ya, ha abụọ wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Ungangi Bambi'
Ha gara n'ihu wepụta ihe mere ka ọ bụrụ egwu ọganihu nke Khanyisa na Lady Du, egwu akpọrọ 'Bheka Mina Ngedwa', a na-akpọkwa ya 'Amapiano rising star'
O mechara wepụta EP n'onwa Nọvemba afọ 2021 nke akpọrọ 'Soft'
Khanyisile Litchfield-Tshabalala bụ onye bụbu onye isi ndị agha mmiri mba South Africa
O mechara bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Economic Freedom Fighters
A mụrụ ya na Soweto ma mesịa sonye na Umkhonto we Sizwe na Angola
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke Cape Town na nzere nsọpụrụ na criminology

Ọ sonyeere ndị agha mmiri South Africa na 1 Eprel, na afọ 1997 wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ e buliri n'ọkwa Rear Admiral (Junior Grade) mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ nke Director Fleet Force Human Resources na Fleet Command na 1 Jenụwarị na afọ 2004
O mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm mgbe ụlọ ikpe ndị agha mara ya ikpe maka ịkọ akụkọ aghụghọ banyere izu ohi laptọọpụ
A chọtabeghị laptọọpụ furu efu ma ọ gọnahụrụ na ọ chepụtara ohi ahụ
Ọ banyere na ndị omeiwu dị ka onye otu EFF na-esote ntuli aka nke afọ 2014
Na 3 Juun, na afọ 2015 ọ sonyeere United Democratic Movement (UDM), ma nye ya ọrụ ozugbo dị ka onye nhazi mba
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke UDM
Na ngwụcha Septemba na afọ 2016, ọ hapụrụ UDM, na-ekwu na ọ chọrọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ, mana ndị na-akọwa ihe na-ekwu ete ya na Holomisa sere okwu
Khary Randolph (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1979, na Boston, Massachusetts) bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ ọchị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro dị ka Starborn, Charismagic, Tech Jacket, Mosaic, na Excellence; na maka ndị nkwusa dị ka Marvel Comics, Epic Comics, DC Comics, Aspen Comics, Image Comics, na Boom! Studios
A mụrụ ya na Boston, Randloph tolitere na Brooklyn, New York
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Bleeding Cool, Randolph tụlere mmetụta ya na-etolite
'Anọ m na-abanye mgbe niile na ihe na-atọ ọchị - ihe nkiri, egwuregwu vidiyo, katoon/anime
Escapism bụ aha egwuregwu ahụ mgbe ị bi na mpaghara m tolitere
Ọbụna mgbe m bụ nwata, a na m enyocha ihe mgbe niile ma na-agbalị ịmepụta ụzọ m ga-esi eme ha n'ụzọ dị iche
Abụghị m onye na-agụ akwụkwọ ọchị na mbụ
Amaara m Marvel na DC mana ha ejikọtaghị m n'ezie ruo mgbe m dị afọ iri na ụma
Akwụkwọ egwu mbụ m hụrụ n'anya bụ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles na m tụgharịrị n'akwụkwọ ndị ahụ ruo mgbe ha na-ada n'ụzọ nkịtị
Akwụkwọ niile mara mma nke afọ 80 ka m ga-achọpụta ọtụtụ ihe, ka oge na-aga
Otú ọ dị, ezigbo mgbanwe maka m bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri
Nkà na ụkpụrụ mmepụta na akwụkwọ ndị mbụ ahụ, kpọmkwem agba, kụrụ m ihe dị ka tọn brik
Youngblood, Cyberforce, WildCATS, Spawn - Ọ dị ka ihe ọ bụla m hụburu, dị ka ihe na-esote ọkwa n'ezie
Na gbakwunyere, ụzọ Ọkachamara si kpuchie ndị okike ahụ laa azụ na mmalite 90s mere ka ha yie ka ezigbo kpakpando nkume
Ọ gwụla mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Achọrọ m ndụ ahụ'
Ọrụ mbụ o bipụtara bụ na Spider-Man Legend of the Spider-Clan #5, nke Marvel bipụtara na 2003
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa na mbipụta 2006 nke Big Apple Comic Con's National Comic Book, Art, Toy & Sci-Fi Expo
Randolph gosipụtara kaadị na Chaotic Trading Card Game, nke ewepụtara na 2007

Randolph rụrụ ọrụ na We Are Robin, nke malitere na June 2015, ya na onye edemede Lee Bermejo na onye na-ese ihe Rob Haynes, nke kọwara ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na Gotham City bụ ndị na-ewere uwe Robin
Site na 2013 ruo 2015 o mepụtara mkpuchi maka DC Comics 'Batman Beyond Universe
N'afọ 2016, Randolph mepụtara mkpuchi maka Black Mask Studios 'Black
N'afọ 2019, ya na onye edemede Brandon Thomas malitere usoro nke onye okike nwere Excellence na Image Comics / Skybound Entertainment
Ọkachasị, nke ndị na-acha ọcha kere kpamkpam, bụ banyere otu nzuzo nke ndị dibịa anwansi ojii
A maara Randolph maka ụdị nka ya dị ike nke na-egosi mmetụta sitere na manga na hip hop
Khauhelo Deborah Raditapole bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-African si Lesotho
A mụrụ Raditapole na Maseru na abalị asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1938
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lesotho, mana ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ọgwụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike Lvov (Lvov Medical School) nke dị na Ukraine, wee gụchaa akwụkwọ úkwú ya na mba Amerika
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi dị na Tanzania ruo afọ iri ka a machibidoro ya ịbanye Lesotho
Ọ laghachiri Lesotho n'afọ 1987 na oku nke onye isi odeakwụkwọ ahụike Tom Thabane kpọrọ ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka onye nnọchiteanya mpaghara Mabote n'afọ 1993 site na òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Basotho Congress Party (BCP)
Na mbụ, emere ya osota Minista nke Ahụike ma mechaa mee ya Minista n'ahụ maka ihe ndị ọnatarachí nke ala ahụ
Mgbe a kpọfere ya na Ministri ọzọ n'afọ 1996, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dịka onye minista, nke mere ya onye nke mbụ mere ụdị ihe a na Lesotho
Dika minista, Ọ mere ka O doo anya bụ atụmatụ maka ịchịkwa ọrịa AIDS n'afọ 1994
A na-ekwunyekwara ya na O mere ka ọrụ Jordan Basin pụta ìhè, nke mechara ghọrọ ọrụ Metolong Dam
A mụrụ Raditapole na Maseru na abalị asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1938, nye nna ya bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Basutoland High School n'afọ 1959 na Lesotho, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị elu na Soviet Union
O nwetara ihe nrite ịgụ agụmakwụkwọ n'efu, nke o ji nweta nzere bachelọ ya na ọmụmụ ọgwụ na Lvov Medical School site n'afọ 1962 ruo n'afọ 1967 wee gụọ ma nweta nzere Mastas ya na mba Amerika
A machibidoro ya ịbanye na Lesotho na nkwupụta na a zụrụ ya imepụta ogbunigweYa na ndị ọrụ ibe ya ndị ọzọ bụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ gbalata na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ nke ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi dị na Tanzania
Onye isi odeakwụkwọ ahụike n'oge ahụ, Thomas Thabane, onye gara n'ihu bụrụ praịm minista nke Lesotho, kpọrọ ya ịbịa na mba ahụ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'afọ 1981, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Lesotho Pharmaceutical Corporation
Na ngwụcha ọchịchị mberede n'afọ 1992, a họpụtara Dr
Raditapole ka o soro na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mba nke Basotho Congress Party (BCP) na nnọkọ mbụ nke otu ahụ
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nnọchiteanya Mabote n'afọ 1993 site na BCP ma nọgide na oche ahụ ruo 1998
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Ahụike n'okpuru ọchịchị Mokhehle
A kpọfere ya site na Ministri Ahụike gaa na Ministry n'ahụ maka Ọnatarachi mba (Ministry of Natural resources)n'afọ 1995
Ọ nọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista n'ahụ maka Ọnatarachi mba n'afọ 1996 mgbe a gbanwere ọnọdụ ozi ya
O nweghị afọ ojuju maka nkea, o wee gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka onye ozi, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe na Lesotho
Mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm, a gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọzọ na nwanyị mbụ ga-abụ Praịm Minista nke Lesotho, mana òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya enwetaghị ọtụtụ vootu na ntuli aka ndị na-esonụ
N'afọ 2003, ya na onye isi otu ahụ bụ Qhobela nwere esemokwu na nzukọ òtù ahụ ọ haziri ekwesighi ekwesị
Okwu ahụ pụrụ ụlọ ikpe, Qhobela emerie ya n'ikpe ahụ
Mana ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye ndú nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ na nnọkọ kwa afọ ha mere na abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2004
Raditapole, dị ka Minista nke Ahụike, kọwapụtara atụmatụ maka ịchịkwa ọrịa mmịnwụ n'afọ1994, ọrịa na-efe efe nke yiri egwu ikpochapụ ọtụtụ ụmụ amaala nke mba ahụ
A na-ekwukwa na ọ rụrụ ọrụ Jordan basin nke ghọrọ Metolong Dam
Ọrụ ahụ mere ka mmiri dị ọcha banye na Basotho
O jere ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-African site na Lesotho na 2004
Khayo (Xaayo) bụ zi asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Luhya nke Kenya na-asụ
Àtụ Narrow Bantu languages
Khazri (Azerbaijani ) bụ aha ikuku oyi na-ekpo ọkụ n'ébé ugwu nke Oké Osimiri Caspian nke na-efegharị gafee Absheron Peninsula n'afọ niile, ọkachasị na Baku
Khazri bụ ifufe na-efe n'ụsọ oké osimiri na otu n'ime ifufe ndị na-efe na mpaghara ahụ
Ọsọ nke khazri na-eru 40 m / s (140 km / h; 89 mph; 78 ) mgbé ụfọdụ
Ọ na-emebi ụfọdụ ngalaba akụ na ụba
Otú ọ dị, ifufe na-enye okpomọkụ dị jụụ n'oge ọkọchị
Ifufe Khazri na-emegide Gilavar, ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ sitere N'ébé ndịda, nkè a na-enwekarị mmetụta n'ogè ọkọchị
Khelifa Belkacem (1907 na November 4, 1951) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Algeria
A mụrụ Khelifa Belkacem na 1907 na Koléa Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Staouéli nke dị nso na Algiers na 1911
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ọ ghọrọ onye na-enweghị nna
N'afọ 1935, ọ kwagara Algiers nke nwere aha ndị a ma ama nke chaâbi chanson dị ka El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka
Ọ mụtara ọrụ egwu n'okporo ámá Staouéli

Ọ chọrọ ịsọ mpi na ndị dike nke oge ahụ El Hadj Menouar, Hadj Bouchiba, Hadj M'rizek ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma site na ịmalite otu ìgwè ndị na-eto eto iji mee ka ememe ezinụlọ dị gburugburu Algiers dị ndụ
Iji banye n'etiti chaâbi ọ hapụrụ Staouéli iji wụnye na Casbah ebe ọrụ na-adịghị efu ma ebe ọha na eze siri ike
Ndị mejupụtara òtù egwú ya bụ Moh Saghir Laama na oud, Belkaïd Abdelghani na violin alto, Mohamed Zerbout na darbuka, Hadj Omar na tar na Kaddour Cherchali, Mouloud Bahri na Ali Bousbia na banjos
Ụbọchị mgbede na gburugburu ebe Chartres, ma ọ bụ kọfị 'Ismailia' square Lavigerie (nke dị ugbu a Benbadis) na 1940s, n'oge ọnwa dị nsọ nke Ramadan, bụ ndị a ma ama
Nkwado, ịnụ ọkụ n'obi, na-agbasi mbọ ike
O nwere olu na-atọ ụtọ na 'Istikhbar' ya (mgbasa egwu) bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu
Ọ chere ụdị 'bit siah wah' ihu na-enweghị ihe mgbagwoju anya na ihe ndị ọzọ siri ike
Ịmata nkà nke Chaabi metụtara ndị na-agụ egwú a ma ama dị ka Dahmane El Harrachi ma ọ bụ Hsissen

Ọ hapụrụ ihe ndekọ telivishọn nke egwu Saki Baki (nke ụlọ ihe nkiri French mere na 1940s ma bụrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dịka El Hachemi Guerouabi nabatara) nke televishọn Algeria na-ezipụ site n'oge ruo n'oge
Redio na-agbasa egwu ọ kọwara dị ka 'Messaad dhek ennhar jani bachar' (nke onye na-ede uri Abdelouahab), 'Daâni are menne lem Helti' (nke ndị na-ede egwu Benali) na 'El bez ghebli'
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 4, 1951, site na mgbọ mgbe ọgụ gasịrị na Casbah, nso ụlọ ya, rue Darfour, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na anọ
E liri ya n'ebe ili ozu nke Sidi M'hamed n'akụkụ Kaddour Cherchali onye na-akpọ banjo nke so n'òtù egwú ya

Khelifi Ahmed (n'asụsụ Arabic خليفي أحمد) (Biskra, Algeria, 1921 na 18 Machị 2012) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye isi egwu Algeria a kpọrọ Bedouin
A mụrụ ya dị ka Ahmed Al-Abbas Benaissa (na Arabic أحمد العباس بن) na Sidi Khaled, obere obodo dị nso na Biskra (Algeria) na nne na nna ya bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Koran ma bụọ abụ n'òtù ukwe okpukpe nke Rahmania
Nwanne nna ya El Hadj Benkhelifa gbara ya ume ka ọ bụọ abụ ọdịnala Sahara na uri ma were aha nna ya, nke sitere n'ebo Ouled Benkhelifa
O mechara gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Khelifi ma nwee ndekọ mbụ ya dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1950, ọ nwetara nnukwu aha na Algeria, ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama dị ka aha pan-Arab a makwara ya na mba ụwa, ọkachasị na France ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke ọtụtụ ihe nrite
Khes (Punjabi Shahmukhi کھیس, ) (Punjab ịkpọ okwu ) bụ ákwà mkpuchi ogho dị nro na mpaghara India; ọ bụ ákwù Damask a na-eji eme akwa akwa na mkpuchi oyi
A na-ejikarị aka akwa akwa akwa akwa na akwa akwa
Khes dị ka uwe bụ uwe dị mfe nke ndị ikom na Pakistan na n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ India na-eyi iji kpuchie elu ahụ

Khes bụ ákwà dị mkpa na mpaghara ndị fọdụrụ n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ ahụ n'ebe nile site n'aka ndị Kraịst Punjab, mpaghara a ma ama maka mmepụta ya ma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ama ọ bụghị naanị maka mmepụta nke Khes kamakwa ọtụtụ ákwà owuwe ihe ubi ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị na ụdị nke ụra site akụkọ na narị afọ nke 19 na nke 20
Khes bụ ihe ntụsara ahụ a na-eji n'ihe ndina, a pụkwara iji ya mee ihe dị ka ihe mkpuchi
Khes bụ ákwà siri ike e ji akwa mee n'elu akwa aka
Ịkpa akwa Khes bụ nkà akwa ọdịnala metụtara ime obodo Punjab
Ọrụ nke ịkpa na ákwà nwere ihe dị mkpa n'omenala n'ime ime obodo
Ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ime obodo na-akpa khes
Ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'obodo nta Punjab anọwo na-akpa khes dị ka akụkụ nke trousseau agbamakwụkwọ ha ruo ọtụtụ afọ
A na-akpa akwa nke khes abụọ abụọ ma dụkọta ya ọnụ
Akụkụ Khes sitere n'obodo nke ìhè nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ka ndị ọzọ Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, buru ibu ma dị na nha ruru 6 site na 9 feet (275 site na 18 m)
Khesi bụ ụdị dị iche iche nke khes, maka iji mee ihe n'ime ákwà
A na-eji ogho eme ọtụtụ khes, mana e nwekwara ụdị ogho na silk
A na-amata ụdị Khes site na usoro dị iche iche na mmalite
N'ụzọ bụ isi, Khes dị mfe ma ọ bụ na geometrical atụmatụ, gụnyere ịlele ụkpụrụ (charkhana, chequered) na diamond ụkpụrụ
Ugboro ole a na-eji ụdị ihe eji eme ihe eme ihe emeela ka a na-akpọ khes Mgbe ndị mmadụ dị ka Azụmaahịa ụfọdụ dị ka ụdị ákwà tartan (okwu a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka akwa Scottish)
Dabba khes bụ ụkpụrụ nwere square ndị e ji eriri e ji agba mee
Khes si Rampur Steeti bụ onye a ma ama maka ogho ya dị elu na ihe pụrụ iche, nke a na-ejikọta ọnụ, nke na-enwekarị eriri ọla edo na ókèala dị iche iche
Khes patpatti nwere akara ntụle na-acha ọcha na nke na-acha ọbara ọbara, ebe khes tukridaar bụ aha maka ntụle na nke na'acha anụnụ anụnụ
Khesbaf weaving bụ okwu maka ịmepụta ụkpụrụ diagonal
Mmepụta na India na-ewere ọnọdụ na mpaghara Malwa na ndịda India Punjab
Ebe ndị ọzọ dị na India gụnyere Rampur, Uttar Pradesh
Mmepụta na Pakistan na-ewere ọnọdụ na South Pakistani Punjab (n'obodo Bahawalpur, Multan, na n'obodo nta ndị dị n'ọzara Cholistan) na Sindh (n' obodo Naserpur, Sehwan Sharif, na Thatta)
Khobz Mbesses (Arabic) bụ achịcha nke ndi Obodo Algeria nke a na-ejikarị semolina maọbụ ntụ ọka eme
Khobz (Arabic), khobz el-dâr (Arabic, kwa 'khobz eddar', achịcha ụlọ), maobu matloua (Arabic) bụ ụdị achịcha Maghrebi na-eko achịcha nke a na-eme n'ime achịcha dị gburugburu ma dịtụ larịị
A na-emekarị ya n'ụlọ, a na-ejikarị ntụ ọka ọcha agwakọta ya na ntụ ọka wit maọbụ ntụ ọka semolina
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-etinye ya na mkpụrụ anise

Ụdị ọkụ a na-esi, nke a makwaara dịka , nke a maara dịka khobz el koucha (Arabic) maọbụ matloua el koucha, dị ihe dịka sentimita n'obosara, a na-akwadebe ya n'ụlọ ma kpọga ya n'ọkụ ọha ka a na-eme ya; ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme achịcha ka a na ya
A na-esi ụdị dị arọ karị, Khobz al-tajin (Arabic), n'ime ite ụrọ a na-akpọ tajine
Asụsụ Khoi /ˈkweɪ / bụ asụsụ kachasị n'ime ezinụlọ asụsụ ndị na-abụghị asụsụ Bantu nkè sitere ná Southern Africa
Á na-ewere há dị kà alaka nkè ezinụlọ asụsụ Khoisan, a makwaara ha dị kà Central Khoisan n'ọnọdụ ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie ná á jụrụ Khoisan ugbu a dị ka ezinụlọ, a na-ejigide aha ahụ dị ka okwu dị mfe
Asụsụ Khoi kachasị ọtụtụ ná nkè á maara nkè ọma bụ Khoikhoi (Nama / Damara) nkè Namibia
A na-ahụkarị ndị fọdụrụ n'ezinụlọ ahụ ná Ọzara Kalahari nkè Botswana
Asụsụ ndị ahụ yiri nke ọma nkè na nkwurịta okwu ziri ezi ga-ekwe omume n'etiti Khoikhoi na asụsụ Botswana
Asụsụ Khoi bụ asụsụ Khoisan mbụ ndị Europe na-achị ala ahụ màrà mà bụrụ ndị á mà ama maka ịpị ha, ọ bụ ezie ná ndị á abụghị ndị sara mbara dị kà ezinụlọ asụsụ Khoisan ndị ọzọ
E nwere alaka abụọ bụ isi nkè ezinụlọ ahụ, Khoikhoi nkè Namibia ná South Africa, ná TshuhuhuhuāKhwe nkè Botswana ná Zimbabwe
Ewezuga Nama, há nọ n'okpuru nrụgide site ná asụsụ Mba mà ọ bụ mpaghara dịka Tswana

Tom Güldemann kwenyere ná ndị ọrụ ugbo na-azụ anụ ụlọ na-asụ asụsụ KhoeʹKwadi banyere Botswana nkè oge a ìhè na dị kà afọ 2000 gara aga site n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ (ya bụ, site ná ntụziaka nkè Sandawe nkè oge a), ebe há nwere ike inweta ọrụ ugbo site ná ndị Bantu na-agbasawanye, n'oge Kalahari dị mmá màkà ọrụ ugbo
Ndị ńnà ńnà nkè Kwadi (mà eleghị anya Damara) gara n'ihu n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, ébé ndị biri ná Kalahari na-amụta ndị na-asụ asụsụ Juu
Yá mere, ezinụlọ Khoe n'onwe yá nwèrè mmetụta Juu

Ndị mbịarambịa á bụ ndị ńnà ńnà nkè ndị Kalahari n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ (Alaka Ọwụwa Anyanwụ TshuhuhuhuāKhwe n'asụsụ), ebe ndị agbata obi Juu (ma ọ bụ ma eleghị anya ndị agbata obi Kxʼa n'ozuzu) ná ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ ndị kwagara Khoe bụ ndị ńnà ochie nkè alaka Western TshuāKhwa
Nchịkọta nke ndị Kalahari mechara mee ka a nabata akụ ná ụba na-achụ nta na-achịkọta mà chebe ndị Kalahar ka ndị ọrụ ugbo Bantu ghara ịmịkọrọ mgbè há gbasara n'ebe ndịda
Ndị Khoe ndị gara n'ihu ná ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nọgidere na-azụ anụ ma ghọọ ndị Khoekhoe
Há ná ndị na-asụ asụsụ Tuu na-agwakọta nkè ukwuu, na-amịkọrọ akụkụ nkè asụsụ ha
Nkè á emeela kà Tuu na Kx'a substrata dị n'asụsụ Khoekhoe
Mgbasawanye nkè ndị Nama n'ime Namibia ná mmụba ha nkè ndị ahịa dịka Damara ná Haiʹom mere na narị afọ nke iri ná isii ná mgbe e mesịrị, n'ihe dị Kà oge ndị Europe na-emekọrịta ìhè ná ọchịchị
Ónyé ikwu kacha nso nkè ezinụlọ Khoe nwere ike ịbụ asụsụ Kwadi nkè Angola
Á na-akpọ ìgwè a buru ibu, nkè e mezigharịrị nnọchiaha ná ụfọdụ ókwú ndị bụ isi, KhoeʹKwadi
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ná Kwadi enweghị ìhè akaebe, ọ na-esiri ike ikwu okwu ndị a na-ahụkarị ná nkè nwere ike ịbụ mgbazinye ego
E wezụga nkè ahụ, ónyé ikwu kacha nso nwere ike ịbụ onye Sandawe nọpụrụ iche; usoro nnọchiaha Sandawe yiri nkè KhoeńKwadi, mànà enweghị njikọ zuru ezu màkà nkwekọrịta ụda mgbè niile iji rụọ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, mmekọrịta ahụ nwere ụfọdụ uru amụma, dịka ọmụmaatụ mà ọ bụrụ ná á na-eburu mgbochi ụdaume azụ, nkè na-arụ ọrụ n'asụsụ Khoe mà ọ bụghị ná Sandawe, n'uche
Nchịkọta asụsụ nwere ike depụta otu ma ọ bụ iri abụọ asụsụ Khoe
N'ihi ná ọtụtụ n'ime há bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ, enwere ọkwa nkè subjectivity na-ekewa há
Ịgụta ụyọkọ asụsụ ọ bụla dị kà ọtụ na-ebute asụsụ Khoe itoolu
Á na-ejikọta ọtụtụ aha ná asụsụ Tshuhuhuhušhwe, ọkachasị ná ụyọkọ Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Ndị á nwere ike ịbụ ebe, agbụrụ mà ọ bụ áhà totem, mgbè mgbè na-enweghị data ọ bụla a pụrụ ịmata asụsụ
Ihe atụ gụnyere Masasi, Badza, Didi, na Dzhiki
Ọ gaghị ekwe omume ugbu a ikwu asụsụ ndị kwekọrọ ná áhà ndị a kpọtụrụ áhà n'akwụkwọ anthropological, ọ bụ ezie ná ihe kà ọtụtụ n'ime há ga-abụ Shua mà ọ bụ Tshua
N'ọtụtụ asụsụ Kalahari Khoe nkè Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, ụda alveolar ná palatal efuola, mà ọ bụ na-efu efu
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, asụsụ ugwu nkè Kua enwekwaghị ụda olu, mana asụsụ ndịda na-ejigide ha
Na Tsʼixa, mgbanwe ahụ emeela kà e nwee okpukpu abụọ ná mkpọtụ palatal vs plosives palatal

Asụsụ Khoekhoe /ˈkɔɪkɔɪ/ (Khoekhoegowab), nkè á makwaara site ná okwuy agbụrụ Nama (Namagowab) /ˈnɑːmə/, Damara, mà ọ bụ Nama / Damara na n'oge gara aga dị kà Hottentot,[lower-alpha 2] bụ asụsụ kachasị n'asụsụ ndị na-abụghị Bantu nkè Southern Africa nkè na-eji ụdaume click eme ìhè nkè ukwuu mat yá mere á na-ekewa dị kay Khoisan, otú á ghọtara ugbu a dị kà ìhè mgbé ochie
Ọ bụ nkè ezinụlọ asụsụ Khoe, á na-asụkwa yá nà Namibia, Botswana, nà South Africa karịsịa site n'agbụrụ atọ Namakhoen, ːNūkhoen, na Haiːomkhoen
Ndị Haiom, ndị na-asụ asụsụ Juu, mechara kwaga Khoekhoe
Áhà màkà ndị na-ekwu ókwú, Khoekhoen, sitere na ókwú khoe 'onye', ná reduplication ná suffix -n iji gosipụta ọtụtụ n'ozuzu
Georg Friedrich Wreede bụ ónyé Europe mbụ mụrụ asụsụ ahụ, mgbé ọ bịarutere nà São Hui!gaeb (mgbe e mesịrị Cape Town) ná 1659
Khoekhoe bụ asụsụ mba na Namibia
Na Namibia na South Africa, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nkè gọọmentị na-emepụta mà na-agbasa mmemme redio ná Khoekhoegowab
Á na-eme atụmatụ ná ọ bụ naanị ìhè dị ka mmadụ 167,000 na-asụ asụsụ Khoekhoegowab kà dị n'Africa, nkè na-eme ka ọ bụrụ asụsụ dị n'ihe ize ndụ
N'afọ 2019, Mahadum Cape Town gbara usoro ọmụmụ dị mkpirikpi na-akụzi asụsụ ahụ, ná 21 Septemba 2020 malitere Khoi ná San Center ọhụrụ ya
Á na-eme atụmatụ ná á ga-ewepụta usoro mmụta ná afọ ndị na-abịanụ
Ndị ọkà mmụta nkè oge á na-ahụkarị asụsụ atọ
Há dị ichè ichè nkè ná enwere ike iwere ha dị ka asụsụ abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ dị iche iche
[citation needed]
E nwere àgwà ụdaume ise, nkè á na-ahụ dị k/a/ //i e a o u/ e a o /u// na imi //ĩ ã ũ//
//u// bụ nke gybara gburugburu nkè ukwuu, //o// naanị obere
/a/ bụ naanị ụdaume nwere allophony a ma ama; a na-akpọ ya [ə] tupu /i/ ma ọ bụ /u/
Á kọwaala Nama dị kà nkè nwere ụda atọ ma ọ bụ anọ, /á, ā, à/ ma ọ bụ /a̋, á, à, ː, nke nwere ike ịpụta na mora ọ bụla (mkpụrụedemede na ụdaolu imi ikpeazụ)
Ụda dị elu dị elu mgbe ọ na-apụta na otu n'ime ụdaume dị elu (//í ú//) ma ọ bụ na imi (//ń ḿ//) karịa na ụdaume dị n'etiti ma /é á ó/ dị ala (/é á ó/)
Ụda ndị ahụ na-agwakọta n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nkeke 'ụda ụda' (ụda okwu), nkè nwere ụdị sandhi ná gburugburu ụfọdụ
Egwú ndị kachasị mkpa, nay ntinye ha na ụdị sandhi bụ ndị a
N'ime ahịrịokwu, okwu okwu okwu na-enweta nrụgide dị ukwuu karịa okwu ụtọ asụsụ
N'ime otu okwu, mkpụrụedemede mbụ na-enweta nrụgide kachasị
Mkpụrụ ókwú ndị na-esote na-enweta obere nrụgide mà na-asụwanye ngwa ngwa

Beach (1938) kọrọ na ndị Khoekhoe nkè oge ahụ nwere velar lateral ejective affricate, [k??], nghọta nkịtị ma ọ bụ allophone nke //kxʼ// n'asụsụ nwere ịpị
Ụda a anaghịzi apụta ná Khoekhoe mana ọ dị na nwa nwanne yá Korana
N'e/t/iti ụdaume, á na-ak/p/ọ /p/ [β] ná /t/ a na- akpọ [ɾ]
Usoro africate na-achọsi ike, a pụkwara inyocha ya na fonemically dị ka nkwụsị aspirated; na Korana metụtara ha bụ [th, kh]
Mkpịsị aka bụ ụdaume abụọ
Pịa ọ bụla nwere otu n'ime isi articulations anọ ma ọ bụ 'influxes' nay otu n'etiti ise nkè abụọ articulations mà ọ bụ effluxes'

Ọchịchọ na mkpọtụ aspirated na-adịkarị mfe mana ọ bụ 'raspier' karịa mkpọtụ imi aspirated, na ụda na-eru nso ch nkè Scottish loch
Mkpịsị aka ndị a na-eme n'olu enweghị olu n'ụzọ doro anya n'ihi njide tupu ntọhapụ, a na-edekwa ha dị ka ụda olu na-enweghị olu na orthography ọdịnala

Akụkụ imi anaghị anụ n'ọnọdụ mbụ; akụkụ imi na-enweghị olu nke mkpọtụ aspirated na-esikwa ike ịnụ mgbe ọ na-anọghị n'etiti ụdaume, yabụ na ntị ndị mba ọzọ, ọ nwere ike ịdị ka ụdị dị ogologo mà ọ bụ obere mkpọtụ nkè mkpọtụ contour
Tindall na-ekwu ná ndị na-amụ ìhè ná Europe na-akpọkarị mkpọtụ n'akụkụ site ná itinye ire na ezé n'akụkụ nakwa nya nkwekọrịta a ' siri ike mà bụrụ nke na-abụghị nke ntị'
Kama nke ahụ, ndị Namaqua ji ire kpuchie ọnụ ha niile mà mepụta ụda 'dị anya azụ n'ọnụ dị ka o kwere mee'
Okwu mgbọrọgwụ okwyu nwere abụọ mà ọ bụ na-adịkarịghị atọ, n'ụdị CVCV(C), CVV(C), ma ọ bụ CVN(C)
(A chọrọ ụdaume mbụ) Mkpụrụ okwu dị n'etiti nwere ike ịbụ naanị w r m n (w bụ b~p na r bụ d~t), ebe ụdaume ikpeazụ (C) nwere ike ịbụ nanị p, s, ts
Mora ọ bụla na-ebu ụda, mana nkè abụọ nwere ike ịbụ naanị elu ma ọ bụ nke dị n'etiti, maka ụda isii 'melodies' HH, MH, LH, HM, MM, LM
Usoro ụdaume ọnụ na CVV bụ //ii ee aa oo uu ai [əi] ae ao au [əu] oa oe ui/ aa oo uu ai [əi] ae ao au [əu] oa oe ui/

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa njem nleta na Trade and Investment Limpopo, Chief Information Officer maka Limpopo Provincial Department of Local Government and Housing, na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere onye isi ala nke Limpopo
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum nke South Africa na Chief Operating Officer na State Information Technology Agency (SITA)
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, Minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze bụ Lynne Brown họpụtara ya na Board of Denel, n'ọrụ onye na-abụghị onye nduzi
Ntshavheni bụ onye otu African National Congress Youth League's National Executive Committee (NEC)
Ọ bụ onye na-ekere òkè na ọtụtụ ihe metụtara ọdịmma nke ndị ntorobịa na obodo

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ , Ntshavheni bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụọ na abụọ a họpụtara na otu ANC National Task Team, nke e nyere ọrụ iwughachi ihe owuwu nke ANC Youth League (ANCYL) site na alaka, mpaghara na mpaghara
Mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na Mee 2019, Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmepe Obere Azụmaahịa
Mgbe ọnwụ nke Minista nọ n'ọchịchị Atụmatụ, Nlekota na Nnyocha, Jackson Mthembu, na Jenụwarị 2021, a họpụtara Ntshavheni dị ka onye nọchiri ya
N'oge mgbanwe nke kansụl na 5 Ọgọstụ 2021, onye isi ala Ramaphosa kwupụtara na Minista nke nkwukọrịta na teknụzụ dijitalụ Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams na Ntshavheni ga-agbanwere ọkwa ndị minista

Olumba ndị a bụ Kombe (Tukombe), Cenga (Tocenga), Tsinga (Tutsingo), Bundum, Njo (Tonjo), Ngoro (Tu Ngoro), Mbere (Tumvele) na ikekwe Leti / Mengisa na Mbwasa

Nakia Shine Coleman (amụrụ n'October 17, 1980), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Kia Shine, bụ onye America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Memphis, Tennessee
A maara ya nke ọma màkà egwu izizi ya 'Krispy', nke bụkwa egwu izizi site na abọm izizi ya na 2007 Due Season
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị rapper ibe ya rụkọrọ ọrụ, dị ka Mike Jones, Yo Gotti, Nelly, Jim Jones, na ndị ọzọ
Kia Shine bụ onye isi oche, ya na onye na-eti egwu Jack Frost, nke Rap Hustlaz
Kia Shine meriri Southern Entertainment Award (SEA) na 2008 màkà ónyé na-ese ihe kachasị mma n'okpuru ala ebe ọ rere ihe karịrị 200,000 albums na akara onwe ya, Rap Hustlaz

Otu egwu ya nke afọ 2007 'WOW' bụ kpaliri 'wow' na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta HellaDoge, ebe ndị otu nwèrè ike inweta Dogecoin maka ịme post na inye 'wows' (dị ka 'dị ka' na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ndị ọzọ)

Otu gosipụtara Maino & Young Dro na samples akụkụ nke Jay-Z si 'Swagga Like Us'
Ọ bụ Kurt Williams duziri vidiyo egwu ahụ ma bụrụ New Joint of the Day na 106 & Park July 3
Kia Shine wepụtara 'Newmonia' site na iTunes
Otu na-egosi ónyé na-eti egwu Atlanta Yung Sean
Ọ bụkwa Kia Shine & Yung Sean dere ma mepụta egwu ahụ
Vidio ahụ bụ Dre Cannonz, Enyi Kia Shine, Newmonia gosipụtara na 106 na Park na 7 Ọgọst 2011
A na-akpọ ndị Kibaku otu n'ime agbụrụ kachasị nwee obi ike n'Afrika
Ha dị ugbu a na Chibok mpaghara nke bụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Borno Steeti na Naịjirịa
Ha bụ otu n'ime agbụrụ ikpeazụ na Naịjirịa nke ndị Britain na-achị
Ndị Kibaku bụ agbụrụ na ọdịbendị nke Babir / Bura, Kanuri, Kilba, Margi, Shuwa, na Fulani
Ha si n'alaeze Kanem-Bornu kwaga ugwu Chibok mgbe alaeze ahụ na-achọ ịda
Otú ọ dị, jihad nke ndị Alakụba na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na mwakpo ohu mekwara ka ọtụtụ agbụrụ gbadaa n'ugwu ahụ
Agbụrụ dị ka Pulai / Warga ndị si Viyu Kithla (nke bụzi Biu) na Kwanda ndị si Konduga, Tstitihil si Maiva, Karagu si Birnin Ngazargamu na ebe ndị ọzọ mechara mepụta ndị Kibaku
Alaeze Ukwu Borno dara n'udo n'aka ndị Britain na 1904
Agbanyeghị, e nwere agbụrụ ụfọdụ jụrụ ịbụ ndị ọchịchị Britain na-achị
Otu n'ime agbụrụ ndị a bụ ndị Kibaku bi na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Borno ma na-akpata ọgba aghara na usoro akụ na ụba nke gọọmentị Britain site na igbochi ụzọ azụmahịa site na Maiduguri ruo Yola
Ya mere, na 1906, gọọmentị Britain kpebiri imeri ndị Kibaku
Gọọmentị Britain nyere Lieutenant Chapman na Chaytor ọrụ nke iwepụ ndị Kibaku n'ikpere ha
Nhọpụta ha dabere na ihe ịga nke ọma ha n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na mwakpo ndị Britain wakporo Gujba na Borno na mwakpo Britain wakporo Kano na afo 1903
Dị ka a tụrụ anya ya, a kọrọ na ndị ikom abụọ ahụ zụrụ ihe dị ka ndị ikom 170 nke gụnyere ndị agha ụkwụ na ndị agha na-agba ịnyịnya
E nwekwara akụkọ banyere ndị Afrịka bu égbè, égbè na ihe ndị ọzọ bara uru
Otú ọ dị, ndị Kibaku bụ ndị na-eguzogide ịbanye Borno na Adamawa guzogidere ndị agha Britain ruo ụbọchị asaa
Nke a manyere Gọmentị Britain ịrịọ ha arịrịọ maka ịnabata ọchịchị Britain n'udo nke bụkwa mgbalị efu

N'ikpeazụ, gọmentị Britain were ọrụ nke ndị na-enye ha ihe ọmụma abụọ, Jatau na Mai Maina, bụ ndị sikwa n'ala Kibaku na nhọpụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na atụmatụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain na mpaghara Borno Jatau dị ka onyeisi ndị ya na Mai Maina dị ka onyeisi Damboa
Dị ka a tụrụ anya ya, ha abụọ kpughere ihe nzuzo nke ndị Kibaku ma merie ha na 1907
Kibuka, nke a makwaara dịka Kibuuka، bụ onye otu balubaale maọbụ pantheon nke chi n'okpukpe nke ndị Baganda, ndị bi na Uganda nke oge a
A na-eche na ọ bụ chi agha

Kibuka na-enyekarị ndị eze Baganda ndụmọdụ n'oge agha, ọrịa, nakwa ọdachi ndị ọzọ dịka ọnwụ Dịka ụfọdụ akwụkwọ si kwuo, Kibuka, dịka nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Mukasa, bụ onye na-anwụ anwụ ma ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa chi
Kibuka bụ nwanne nwoke obere nke Mukasa, chi nke ọganihu, ọmụmụ, na owuwe ihe ubi
Ha abụọ bụ ụmụ Wanema, na ụmụ ụmụ Musisii, onye e gosipụtara dịka onye na-egosipụta ala ọma jijiji ahụ
Dịka otu akụkọ ifo si kwuo, nna ya, Wanema, zigara Kibuka, iji nyere otu n'ime ndị eze Baganda, Nakibinge, aka, onye nọ n'etiti agha ya na ndị Bunyoro
Kibuka nyere aka chepụta atụmatụ iji merie ha, ọrụ ya bụ ịwakpo ndị agha Bunyoro site na igwe ojii
Mmeri dị nso maka ndị agha Baganda
Otu ụbọchị, ndị agha kpọtara ndị a dọọrọ n'agha n'ogige ha nʼagbanyeghị na Wanema na Kibuka dọrọ ha aka ná ntị ka ha ghara ime otú ahụ
Otu n'ime ndị a a dọọrọ n'agha bụ nwanyị nke mechara gbapụ ma kọọrọ ndị agha Bunyoro ihe ọ hụrụ nʼogige ahụ, gụnyere ọnọdụ Kibuka n'oge mwakpo
N'echi ya, ndị agha Bunyoro lụsoro ndị ndịda Baganda agha na nchọpụta nke ebe Kibuka nọ, otu n'ime ndị na-agba ụta gbayere akụ nke merụrụ Kibuk ahụ n'obi
E nwere ọtụtụ nsụgharị banyere ihe mere ọzọ
N'otu nsụgharị, Kibuka debere onwe ya n'elu osisi dị na Mbale Hill, Mpigi wee nwụọ n'ebe ahụ, ghọọ chi
N'ụdị ọzọ, ndị agha Bunyoro weghaara ọta ya ma mesịa nweta abumọnụ nke ọrịa na-efe efe
N'ihi ya, ndị agha weghachiri ọta ahụ n'aka Eze Nakibinge, onye liri ozu na ihe onwunwe Kibuka ma wuo ụlọ nsọ iji sọpụrụ ya
Kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ chi agha
N'otu nsụgharị ọzọ, a hụghị ozu Kibuka

Kick Against Indiscipline, nke a maara dị ka KAI, bụ otu mmanye iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke gọọmentị Lagos Steeti guzobere na Nọvemba 2003 iji nyochaa ma mee ka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi dị na steeti ahụ

E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji kwado iwu gọọmentị steeti n'ozuzu ya n'ihe gbasara 'Agha megide enweghị ịdọ aka na ntị', mkpọsa megide enweghị ịdọ aka na ntị nke ọchịchị agha Major General Mohammadu Buhari mepụtara na 1984
