A mụrụ Bebey na Paris, France
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị Cameroon
Francis Bebey, nna ya, bụ onye nta akụkọ, onye edemede na onye egwu
Ọrụ ya mepụtara ọnọdụ ọdịbendị maka ụmụ ya nke gbara ha ume na edemede na egwu
Ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ ghọrọ ndị n'eti egwu
Bebey gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lille III ma mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, o dere edemede PhD na 'danse na litterature nke ndị edemede sahelian na bantou'
O mechara nweta nzere Masters na Management na Paris Business School ESCP
N'afọ 1993, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Planete Jeunes a Bayard Press magazine maka ndị na-eto eto na-agụ akwụkwọ Africa na French
Ọ bụkwa Editor-in-Chief Planet Enfants, akwụkwọ akụkọ emebere ndị na-eto eto na-agụ akwụkwọ
Site n'afọ 2006 ruo n'afọ 2009, ọ mepụtara ihe omume kwa ụbọchị na Radio France International aha ya bụ 'reines d'Afrique' (Africa's Queens)
N'afọ 2016, o dere 'mon royaume pour une guitare' (my kingdom for a Guitar) nke bụ akwụkwọ dabere na ndụ nne na nna ya na ndụ onye egwu nke nna ya bụ Francis Bebey
Otu òtù nzuzo na-arụ ọrụ na obodo Welsh nke Kidwelly dinara ụmụaka n'ike ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ ruo mgbe e jidere ndị omekome ya n'afọ 2010
Onye ndu ya, Colin Batley, na-atụ egwu ma na-amanye ụmụaka na-enweghị ike inwe mmekọahụ site na iyi egwu
A mara Batley, ụmụnwanyị atọ, na nwoke nke abụọ ikpe maka mpụ mmekọahụ ụmụaka n'afọ 2011 ma tụọ ha mkpọrọ
Okpukpe ahụ na-emegbu ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-enweghị ike, na-eji omume anwansi na akwụkwọ dị ka ụzọ isi kwado mmetọ ya na iji ụbụrụ ndị ọ metụtara
Ọ bụ Colin Batley duziri ya, nwunye ya na ụmụnwanyị atọ ndị ọzọ na-eduzi ya
Mmegbu mmekọahụ ya megide ụmụaka were ọtụtụ iri afọ ma buru ụzọ mee ya na London, mgbe ahụ na Kidwelly na South Wales
Ndị otu ise ahụ gara ikpe hapụrụ London maka otu okporo ámá Kidwelly n'afọ ndị 1990
Onye ndu ahụ, Colin Batley, bu ụzọ soro Shelly Millar, nne nwanyị Batley bụ Jacqueline Marling na ndị mmekọ ha
A mara Batley na ụmụnwanyị atọ n'ime ụmụnwanyị anọ a na-ebo ebubo maka mpụ mmekọahụ
Colin Batley na ụmụnwanyị anọ a na-ebo ebubo gosipụtara ndị otu ha na egbugbu 'anya Ijipt' oge ochie nke Horus, chi nwere isi ugo na ogwe aka ha na site n'ịchịkUpọta ihe okpukpe Egypt oge ochie
Okpukpe ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ụmụaka na-enweghị nsogbu, na-amanye ha ka ha mee emume mmalite nke biri na mmekọahụ na okenye
A na-emenye ụmụaka egwu isonye na iyi egwu igbu ọchụ

Otu nwa agbọghọ gbara akaebe na mgbe emume a gasịrị (nke malitere na Batley na-ekwusa banyere anwansi ma mechie mmekọahụ), a manyere ya mgbe niile ka ya na Colin Batley nwee mmekọahụ n'ụlọ ya na ndị bịara abịa na oriri na nkwari nke Setan

N'anya mmiri, ọ gbara akaebe 'M mere ya n'ihi na Colin gwara m' Otu onye a tara ahụhụ kọwara 'Colin maara otu esi eji gị eme ihe, iji mee ka ị kwenye ihe ọ bụla o kwuru' Ụmụaka na-erube isi n'ihe ọ chọrọ maka mmekọahụ n'ihi 'egwu iwe chi' Batley nwere nkịta Rottweiler nke 'na-eme ihe ọjọọ nye onye ọ bụla'
A na-ebutekarị mmetọ mmekọahụ ahụ site na emume Setan nke a na-agụpụta amaokwu sitere n'akwụkwọ onye mgbaasị Aleister Crowley The Book of the Law, The Book of Magick, na Equinox of the Gods
Otu emume gosipụtara ebe ịchụàjà nwere achịcha nnu, iko mmanya na-acha uhie uhie, na ihe nsure ọkụ na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ná ngwụsị nke emume ndị a nke Setan, ndị otu 'ghọrọ skyclad', nke pụtara na ha na-eyipụ uwe ma nwee mmekọahụ
Otu onye agbata obi, John Wheatland, kwuru na mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ubi ya, ọ hụrụ otu nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ụma ya 'nke a na-eme ka ọ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri' onye jụrụ ya ma ọ chọrọ mmekọahụ
O kwukwara na ọ na-anụ ka onye a na-ebe ákwá kwa abalị
Aleister Crowley, onye akwụkwọ ya bụ isi iyi nke nkwenkwe okpukpe ahụ, bụ onye Bekee na-eme anwansi na onye dibịa anwansi nke nwụrụ n'afọ 1947
O dere The Book of the Law na Cairo n'afọ 1904
O yiri ka ụlọ onye otu ọ bụla nwere ụdị laminated nke ya

Ikpe ahụ nụrụ na akwụkwọ a nwere 'ọnọdụ na isiokwu na-echegbu onwe ya' banyere mmekọahụ, gụnyere nkwupụta 'Ka a na-eleda ụmụnwanyị niile dị ọcha anya', 'Mmekọahụ na onye ọ bụla abụghị naanị ihe kwere omume kama a ga-agba ya ume
A ga-enwe mmasị n'ịgba akwụna' na 'Ụfọdụ n'ime njikọ kachasị mma na nke na-adịgide adịgide amalitela site na ndina n'ike
E hiwere Rom n'elu ya
Onye ọka ikpe Paul Thomas QC dụrụ akwụkwọ ahụ ọdụ dị ka 'akwụkwọ na-enweghị isi'
Nwa Colin Batley bụ Damian nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 1 nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ kwụgidere onwe ya na mberede n'oge mmekọahụ
O mere ihe nkiri ihe mberede ahụ na ekwentị mkpanaaka ya
A gwara nyocha na a hụrụ ya gba ọtọ ma kwụgbuo ya
Otu onye agbata obi kwuru na nna Damian (Colin Batley) 'na-achị ọchị ma na-akpa ọchị dị ka ọ naghị echegbu onwe ya n'ụwa' n'ụbọchị olili ozu ahụ, nke 'ọ dịghị onye nkịtị nwere ike ịghọta'

Dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Cult Information Centre bụ Ian Haworth si kwuo, òtù nzuzo Kidwelly na-edina mmadụ n'ike nwere njirimara ndị a na-ahụkarị n'okpukpe, nke ọ 'nụrụ kwa afọ n'ime afọ iri atọ na abụọ m rụrụ ọrụ oge niile n'ọhịa a'
O mere atụmatụ na UK nwere òtù nzuzo 500 ruo 1,000, ndị a na-arụ ọrụ 'n'obodo ukwu' na 'n'ime ime obodo dị jụụ'
Haworth gbakwụnyere na ndị isi òtù nzuzo na-akụda ndị mmadụ, mgbe ụfọdụ n'ime ụbọchị atọ ma ọ bụ anọ, na usoro gụnyere ịnapụ ha nri na ụra
O kwuru na nke a 'yiri ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na ndị nwere uche dị mma'
Mmadụ ise e metọrọ gbara akaebe n'ụlọ ikpe na a dọtara ha ma ọ bụ kpọta ha n'ụlọ ndị òtù nzuzo ebe e metọrọ ha n'ụzọ mmekọahụ nakwa na e nwere ndị ọzọ e metọrọghị ihe ọ bụla banyere mmetọ ha
Otu nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ise nke nyere ihe akaebe kọwara na a na-ekerịta ya dị ka 'ihe egwuregwu mmekọahụ' n'etiti ndị òtù nzuzo

Batley dinara onye nke abụọ n'ike mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwanyị dị afọ iri na otu ma gbaa akaebe 'Mmekọahụ ya bụ ule ma ọ bụrụ na agafeghị m ga-aga Abis' Onye nke atọ gbara akaebe na Batley dinara ya n'ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu ma ọ bụ iri na abụọ ma manyere ya inwe mmekọahụ na igwefoto mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Ndị a tara ahụhụ kwuru na mmetọ nke òtù nzuzo ahụ 'abụwo njem dị egwu maka onye ọ bụla n'ime anyị'
Annabelle Forest (aha njirimara), nwa nwanyị nke onye otu okpukpe Jacqueline Marling, nyere akaebe nke nyere aka maa ndị mmegbu ise ikpe
A manyere ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ka ọ na-ekiri ihe omume mmekọahụ nke nne ya Jacqueline Marling na Colin Batley
Mgbe Forest dị afọ iri na otu, Colin Batley dinara ya n'ike
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, a manyere ya ka ya na Marling nwee mmekọahụ, nke ghọrọ ihe a na-amanye Forest isonye na ya mgbe niile
A manyere ya ka ya na nwoke nke abụọ tọrọ ya nwee mmekọrịta
Forest kwuru 'Abụ m nwa akwụkwọ n'ehihie na ohu mmekọahụ n'abalị,' nke 'dị njọ nke na n'otu oge agbalịrị m igbu onwe m

' Ọnwa atọ mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa Batley, onye dị afọ iri na asatọ, a manyere Forest ịgba akwụna, ya na ụmụnwoke ruru otu puku na narị asatọ na-enwe mmekọahụ, ebe òtù nzuzo ahụ na-enweta ego niile ọ na-enweta
O kwuru na n'ime ọtụtụ afọ ọ na-emegbu ma na-erigbu ya 'Ọtụtụ ndị leghaara anya, ọtụtụ ndị leghaara ihe ịrịba ama anya
Ọ na-eju m anya na anyị biri n'ime obere ụzọ ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ ma ọ dịghị otu onye hụrụ ihe ọ bụla nyere ha nchegbu

Forest kọwara ahụmahụ ya n'akwụkwọ ya The Devil on the Doorstep My Escape From a Satanic Sex Cult, nke o dere iji mee ka 'ndị ọzọ malite ịṅa ntị n'obodo ha bi na ya' n'ihi na 'e nwere ụmụaka a na-emegbu emegbu n'ebe niile]
N'afọ 2010, mmadụ abụọ toro eto, otu nwoke na otu nwanyị, kọọrọ ndị uwe ojii mmetọ nke òtù nzuzo ahụ nke mere ka e jide ndị otu ahụ n'otu afọ ahụ

Onye isi nyocha Richard Lewis kwuru na nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii Dyfed-Powys 'bụ nyocha dị ogologo ma dị mgbagwoju anya nke metụtara otu nzuzo' nke mere 'mmetọ ụmụaka n'usoro na ogologo oge' bụ ndị 'gosipụtara obi ike dị ukwuu' site n'ịkọ ya
Mark Bergmanski, Detective Chief Inspector, kwetara 'ọ bụ nyocha dị mgbagwoju anya ma dị mgbagwoju anya'
Kọmitii na-ahụ maka nchekwa ụmụaka na Carmarthenshire County Council katọrọ ndị niile na-eme 'mmetọ ụmụaka n'usoro, nzuzo na ogologo oge'
Onye isi òtù nzuzo ahụ, Colin Batley, ụmụnwanyị atọ, na nwoke nke abụọ, natara ikpe mkpọrọ ruru afọ iri atọ na isii, na ohere nke Colin Batley ịnọgide n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka ndụ
A mara ha ikpe na ebubo iri anọ na asaa gụnyere ndina n'ike na mpụ mmekọahụ ndị ọzọ megide ụmụaka mgbe ikpe izu ise gasịrị n'ọnwa Febụwarị nakwa n'ọnwa Machị nke afọ 2011
A tọhapụrụ nwanyị nke anọ mgbe ọ na-eche otu ebubo nke omume rụrụ arụ ụmụaka

Onye isi nke ngalaba ikpe dị mgbagwoju anya nke Welsh na Crown Prosecution Service kwuru, 'ndị niile a mara ikpe taa bụ ndị ikpe mara maka mpụ dị egwu, ya mere ọ bụkwa ihe ziri ezi na ha enwetala ikpe dị ogologo oge
Ndị ọka ikpe tụlere maka ụbọchị anọ zuru ezu, na ọkara ụbọchị abụọ, ma nye ha ndụmọdụ, n'ihi ọnọdụ nhụjuanya nke mmejọ ahụ
Ndị a na-ebo ebubo agọnahụla ịdị adị nke òtù nzuzo ahụ maka ikpe ahụ dum
Kikelomo Longe nke a makwaara dị ka Kike bụ kọmishọna na-ahụ maka [Ụlọ Ọrụ]] Ahịa na Itinye Ego, Ogun Steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego na Mahadum Lagos UNILAG wee jírí ogo Bsc
na Akụntịnị klas nke abụọ n'elu wee guchaa
Longe bụbu onye isi nke mmekọrịta ndị ọchụnta ego na nchịkwa ego n'otu Njikọ aka Isi obodo Ndi Afrika (ACA)
Ọ banyere n'ọgbakọ ahụ na 1999, ma mesịa ruo n'ọkwa osote onye isi ọchịchị
Ọ bụ osote onye isi ọchịchị nke Njikọ aka Isi obodo Ndị Afrika
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa, inye ego na mmekọrịta ndị ọchụnta ego
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Deloitte dị ka onye na- azụ akwụkwọ nyocha wee nweta ihe nrite nke mba ugboro abụọ n'ule ntozu wee tozuo dị ka onye na- akwụ ụgwọ ego
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere otu Oke Ime Ihe na Ntukwasi Obi (V&T) dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa ego

Kiki Mordi onye a mụrụ ka ọnwa Ọgọst dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'afọ 1991 bụ onye Nigerian b onye ama ama dika onye nta akụkọ, onye na-agputa mab egosipta ihe n'onyonyo, onye na-eme fim nakwa onye na-ede ederede
N’afọ 2016, ọ nwetara ihe onyinye dika onye aka r ya ka pta ihe n'ihe ndi ana-akwapta n;igwe Redio (South-South) n'emume akpọrọ Nigerian Broadcasters Merit Awards
A mụrụ Mordi na Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria nye nne na nna ya bụ ndị Nigeria
ka nna ya nwụsịrị, ọ bara University of Nigeria, Nsukka iji maka dibia oyibo mana emechara ọ kwụsị agụmakwụkwọ n'ihi sitere n'aka otu onye nkuzi ya
Mordi dika anyị kwuru na mbụ bụ onye ntaakụkọ si Naịjirịa, onye mgbasa ozi, onye na-eme fim na onye na-ede ederede

N’afọ 2017, ọ bidoro agha n;igwe ikuku ya bụ 'online' ibuso ndi uwe ojii na-eme mpụ na aghụghọ banyere ina ego ngarị, o bidoro ibuso ha agha a mgbe ndi uwe ojii wakporo ya enyi ya nwoke n'ụlọ ya ma bo ha ebubo na ha ndi otu nzuzo
N'afọ 2015, ahọpụtara ya dika otu na ndi na-eto eto kacha egosipụta nakwa akọwapụta ihe na onyonyo nakwa redio na mmeme ndi Nigerian Broadcastters Merit Awards
N’afọ 2016, ọnwetara ihe onyinye maka onye kacha akọwaputa ihe na redio (South South)na mmeme ndị Nigerian Broadcastters Merit Awards
A hoputara ya maka nke akpọrọ 'on air personality Female' na mmeme Scream All Youth Awards
Ka ọnwa Novemba di na mkpụrụ ụbọchi atọ n'afọ 2019, ahọpụtara ya maka Future Awards Africa maka onyinye ịchụ nta akụkọ
N’afọ 2019, ọ wepụtara ma kwado ihe nkiri akụkọ akpọrọ “Life at the Bay” na Lagos, Nigeria
Ka ọnwa Mee dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na asaa n'afọ 2019, ndi 'Real time International Film Festival' họpụtara ihe nkiri fim a bụ 'life at bay bụ nke Nora Awolowo haziri
Ka ọnwa Ọktọba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị isii n'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ihe nkiri ahụ bụ 'life at bay' ka ọ gosipụta na Africa International Film Festival ( AFRIFF) n'afọ 2019
Ha gosipụtara otu ndi nkuzi nwoke na Mahadum si edina ụmụ akwụkwọ ha ndi nke nwaanyi iji mee ka ha gafee n'ule Mahadum ndi a bụ University of Lagos and University of Ghana
Boniface Igbeneghu nke Mahadum nke Lagos, Dr
Ransford Gyampo na Dr
Paul Kwame Butakor nke Mahadum nke Ghana bụ ndị nkuzi a gosipụtara na vidio na-akpa ụdị agwa a
Boniface Igbeneghu bụ nnukwu onye nkuzi na ngalaba na-akuzi nka, ise ihe, ikpụ ihe na Mahadum nke Lagos Ọ bụkwa onye isi pastọ na Foursquare Gospel Church in Nigeria, Dr
Ransford Gyampo bụ onye otu Prọfesọ nke nke 'Political Science na Mahadum Ghana na Dr
Paul Kwame Butakor bụ onye nke na-akuzi na 'College of Education dikwa na Mahadum Ghana
Mordi, onye nke kpara agwa dika nwata nwaanyi di afọ iri na asaa na-achọ ibata Mahadum kwuru na o were ya ndi otu ya ọnwa iteolu iji mezuo nyocha a
N'ihi ihe mkpughe emere Mahadum nke Lagos kwụsịrị Dr
Boniface Igbeneghu ọrụ ebe ndị Foursquare Gospel Church siri ya rituo n'ọkwa dịka Pastọ rịdata
Mahadum nke Lagos mechiri otu ọnụ ụlọ akpọrọ 'Cold room 'egosiri na vidio ahụ bụ ebe ndi nkuzi Mahadum na-anọ enye ụmụ akwụkwọ mmekpa ahụ
Otu onye Nigeria na-eti egwu bụ Adekunle Gold na Nwunye ya bụ Simi kelere Mordi maka akụkọ ihe a na-eme na Mahadum o gosiri
Onye bụbu onye osote onye isi ala Nigeria, Atiku Abubakar na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Sinati <a , kpọrọ oku ka gọọmentị Nigeria leba anya n'ụdị agwa na-eme na Mahadum Nigeria
Nke a butere ịchụ n'ọrụ achụrụ Dr Samuel Oladipo, onye nkuzi na Ngalaba Economics, Mahadum
nke Lagos
N’abalị iteolu nke ọnwa Ọktoba n’afọ 2019, ndị Nigerian senate zara oku ụmụ Nigeria site na-igụpụta iwu na-amachi ndi nkuzi idina ụmụ akwụkwọ iji nye ha akara ngafe n'ule
Nkiruka 'Kiki' Omeili bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria, nke a ma ama maka ọrụ ya dị ka Lovette na ịhe nkiri TV a nakpọ Lekki Wives
A makwaara ya maka ọrụ ya na ịhe nkiri dị ka Blessing na ịhe oyoyo a kpọrọ 2015 crime caper, Gbomo Gbomo Express na Gideon Okeke
A mụrụ Omeili na Lagos, ọ bụkwa nwa nke abụọ n’ime ụmụ anọ Charles na Maureen Omeili mụrụ
O bu onye Igbo si Nimo na Anambra State
Nna ya Charles bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ First Bank Nigeria ma la ezumike nká dịka onye isi njikwa, ebe nne ya bụ Maureen bụ onye njikwa nke ụlọ mkpọrọ na Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria
Omeili bidoro ime ịhe nkiri stage plays site n ’ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
Nke a gara n'ihu mgbe ọ banyere mahadum mgbe ọsoyere otu ndi na eme ịhe egwuriegwu ma soro me ihe ejije dị iche iche yana isonye n'ọtụtụ asọmpi ejije
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwetara nzere dibia oyibo na mahadum , University of Lagos
N'afọ 2011, Omeili soro ndi e nyochara ma nweta ọrụ Debbie na ịhe oyoy TV 'Behind the Smile'

N’afọ 2012, ya na onye isi ‘’ Behind the Smile ’’, Tunde Olaoye, jikọrọ aka wee pụta n’ihe nkiri sinima izizi ya okporo “Married but living single” ebe ya na Funke Akindele, Joseph Benjamin, Femi Brainard na Joke Silva rụkọrọ ọrụ
Omeili enweela ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro TV gụnyere 'The Valley Between', 'NESREA Watch', 'Lekki Wives' na 'Gidi Culture'
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ọ na-arụ, na 2011 Omeili bido emume etemegwu na oyoyo 'Dance 234', bụ ihe nkiri ntụrụndụ ndị Koga
Omeili na-akwadokwa ngalaba ahụike na Smooth FM nke ụtụtụ Satọdee ngosipụta akpọrọ 'Balancing Life' ma dee ọtụtụ akụkọ na blọọgụ n'ịntanetị
Kiki Omeili a nakpokwa 'emcees' na eme ihe omume dị iche iche dika ịkwuputara ndị olu-oru okwu gụnyere LG na ịhe omume MTN gbasara asumumpị ball uwa nke 2009
Na Ọgọstụ 2013, ekwuputara na a ga-ebido Lekki Wives maka oge nke abụọ wee megharịrị nkwekọrịta ha na Omeili were iji weghachi ọrụ ya dị ka Lovette
Na mbido afọ 2016, ọsoro mee ka ịhe nkiri oyoyo wuruewu a na - akpọ Couple of Days, ebe ọ na-egosipụta àgwà Joke, nwetara nlele dị ebube site na ndị nkatọ
Na Mee 2016, Iterum obere ihe nkiri nke Stanlee Ohikhuare duziri na nke Kiki Omeili na Paul Utomi na-egosi na 69th Annual Cannes Film Festival
Na May 31, 2016, Omeili mere ihe nkiri izizi ya mge O mwepụta ịhe nkiri perempe nke a nakpọ Unprotected
N’ọnwa Juunu nke afọ 2018, Omeili bidoro mepụta ihe nkiri nkiri zuru ezu nke izizi ya bụ Run, nke Uche Chukwu duziri
Emepụtara ihe nkiri Run na cinemas na Ọgọstụ 23 2019 nke ndị soro mee ya bu Owen Gee, Rotimi Salami, Kelechi Udegbe, na Greg Ojefua
A họpụtakwara ya bu ịhe nkiri wee gosị ya na Silicon Valley International Film Festival dị na California na Slum International Film Festival dị na Kenya
Ọ natara onyinye na Toronto International Nollywood Film Festival dị na Canada
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2012, Omeili nwetara onyinye maka 'Best Actress (Supporting role in an English language film)' na 17th African Film Awards (nke a na-akpọbu Afro Hollywood Awards) na London

N’ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, Omeili so na ndị edepụtara afa fa na Top 25 New Faces of Nollywood na akwụkwọ akụkọ Nigerian Entertainment Today (NET), Ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ asiri 'Sun' dekwara ya dịka otu n'ime kpakpando kachasị ọsọsọ na Nollywood na mbido 2014
A hoputara Omeili dika 'TV Actress of the Year' nke ndị Exquisite Lady of the Year (ELOY) Award na November 2014
A hoputara ya maka ịhe ọmere na n’usoro ihe nkiri oyonyo ‘Lekki Wives’
N’ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2015, Omeili ritere nturuugo maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na ịhe nkiri - Sting, di na 2015 Global Icons Academy Movie Awards (GIAMA), nke emere na USA
Na onwa Julai 2016, Omeili ritere nturu ugo maka onye kacha kwado ihe nkịrị n’aho na 2016 City People Entertainment Awards na Lagos, Nigeria
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2016, a họpụtara Omeili maka Onye Nduzi Nwanyị Kachasị Mma na ịhe nkiri pere mpe na Berlin 2016 - Film Fest International Awards maka ọrụ ya na ịhe nkiri, Deluded
Omeili, ka ekpughere dị ka onye nnọchi anya na 2017 Realtime film festival iji kwanyere ya ugwu na ọrụ ọ na arụ na ihe nkiri nke Nigeria
Na 2018, Omeili nwetara onyinye kacha mma maka nwayị rụrụ orụ ka ọye nkwado na World Music and Independent Film Festival, nke emere na Caribbean Islands maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 3Some
N’otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtakwara ya maka Best Actress na Realtime film festival
Omeili etinyela aka na ọrụ enyemaka na Project Pink Blue
O bu ụzo na ije mmuta maka ọria kansa esi na ya na ayo ego ịji enyere ndi otu na akwado ndị na arịa orị cancer site na mgbasa ozi na ihe omume
Kikomando bụ nri ndị Mba Uganda nke chapati na agwa Mejupụtara
Ọ bụ ụdịdi nri nke rolex
E mepụtara nri a na mbido afọ 2000
Aha ahụ bụ kikomando, bụ onye na-agụ egwu Ugandan, Bobi Wine, chepụtara ya, onye bụrụ abụ banyere nri ahụ n'ime abụ ya
Ndị Uganda na-ekwu na iri kikomando ga-eme ka onye na-eri nri sie ike dị ka Arnold Schwarzenegger na ihe nkiri ya, Commando
A na-eme Kikomando site n'ịkpụbi iberibe chapati Ugandan, nke dị iche na chapati India n'ihi na a na-eji ntụ ọka niile eme ya kama ntụ ọka wit zuru oke, na agwa e siri esi
Na mgbakwunye na agwa e siri esi, ụdị ndị ọzọ nke kikomando nwere ube bekee, anụ, ofe, ọkụkọ, ma ọ bụ imeju agbakwunyere na ha
A na-eri nri a ma n'ụlọ nri dị n'okporo ámá ma n'ebe oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị elu na mba ahụ
Ọ na-ewu ewu ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum nọọ n'ihi na ọ dị ọnụ ala dị ka nri oriri

Kikuyu ma ọ bụ Gikuyu (Gikuyu Gikuyu ) bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Gikuyuyu (Agikuyuyu) nke Kenya na-asụ
A na-asụ Kikuyu n'ógbè dị n'etiti Nyeri na Nairobi
Ndị Kikuyu na-ejikarị ugwu ndị gbara ha gburugburu na Central Kenya amata ala ha nke ha na-akpọ K__ssw____ssw____sw____ssw____sswa____sw__
Asụsụ Gikuyu yiri ndị agbata obi ya gbara ya gburugburu, Meru na Embu
Kikuyu nwere isi okwu anọ nwere nghọta
E kewara mpaghara Central Province n'akụkụ ọdịnala ọdịnala nke olu olu ndị a, nke bụ Kĩrĩnaga, Mũrang'a, Nyeri na Kiambu
Kikuyu si na Kĩrĩnyaga nwere isi olumba abụọ - Ndia na Gichugu ndị na-asụ asụsụ Kĩndia na Gĩgĩcũgũ
Gicugus na Ndias enweghị ụda 'ch' ma ọ bụ 'sh', na ha ga-eji ụda 's' kama, ya mere ịkpọpụta 'Gĩcũgũ' dị iche na 'Gĩchũgũ'
Iji nụ ka a na-asụ Ndia, mmadụ kwesịrị ịnọ na Kerugoya, obodo kacha ibu na Kîrînaga
Obodo ndị ọzọ maka Ndia, ebe a na-asụ ụdị olumba 'dị ọcha' dị na mpaghara tii nke Kagumo, Baricho, Kagio, na ugwu Kangaita
N'ala ala ugwu ahụ bụ Kutus, nke bụ obodo na-eme mkpọtụ nke nwere ọtụtụ mmetụta sitere na olumba ndị ọzọ nke na ọ na-esiri ike ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti ha
Olumba a juru ebe niile na mpaghara osikapa nke Mwea
Kilishi bụ ụdị jerky nke malitere na Ala Hausa kpọmkwem na Bauchi State nke Nigeria
Ọ bụ ụdị suya kpọrọ nkụ, nke e ji anụ ehi, atụrụ ma ọ bụ ewu mee
Nke mbụ, wepụ ọkpụkpụ site na anụ ehi, atụrụ ma ọ bụ ewu, nke ọ bụla n'ime uru ahụ ahọpụtara na-ebibi n'ime mpempe akwụkwọ nke otu mita ma ọ bụ obere maka ịcha ngwa
A na-anakọta anụ ndị a kpọrọ nkụ ma debe ha maka usoro ọzọ
A na-akwadebe ihe e ji ahụekere mee, nke a na-akpọ labu, site na iji mmiri mee ka ọ dị nro
A na-agbakwunye ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, nnu, alibasa a eburu ebi ma agwakọta, na mgbe ụfọdụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị ka mmanụ aṅụ maka ụtọ
Ụzọ e si agbakwunye ụtọ bụ site na nkwụ date
A na-etinyezi 'akpa' anụ ndị a kpọrọ nkụ otu otu n'ime ihe a na-etinye na labu iji kpuchie ha, tupu a hapụ ha ka ha kpọọ ruo ọtụtụ awa
Mgbe ọ gwụsịrị, a na-esi anụ ahụ n'elu eriri waya
Kilishi sitere n'akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa na akụkụ ugwu nke Cameroon
A mụrụ Kilishi n'ihi mkpa, iji chekwa anụ ruo ogologo oge ka anụ ahụ na-adịghị mma na-enye protein zuru ezu maka ndị ahịa na-agafe Sahara maka azụmahịa
Enwere ike idebe Kilishi ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa n'enweghị mgbanwe dị ukwuu na ụtọ ya
Kim Berman (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Berman nwetara BFA na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand tupu ọ gaa MFA ya na Mahadim Tufts
Ọ kụziri na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston site na 1988 rụọ 1992, ma na-enyere áká n'ọmụmụ ihe site n'ọtụtụ ihe fọdụrụ na 1990s
Ka ógè na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ọ laghachiri South Africa, ebe ọ na-etinye aka na mmepe nke ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ
Ugbu a ọ bụ ónyé nduzi nke Artist Proof Studio na Newtown, Johannesburg, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi dị elu na ngalaba nka nke Technikon na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Mahadụ nke Johannesburg

Otu ihe osise 1999 nke Berman na mezzotint, drypoint, na ihe osise na akwụkwọ, nke akpọrọ Playing Cards of the Truth Commission, a Incomplete Deck, bụ nke National Museum of African Art, dị ka akwụkwọ ndị na-ese ihe nke afọ 1997 Emandulo Re-Creation, nke o nyéré áká na ya dị ka ónyé otu Artist Proof Studio
Mbipụta 2001, Break the Silence, dị na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art
Kim Donaldson (a mụrụ n'afọ 1952 na Southern Rhodesia ) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe bụ onye ọkachamara na-ese ndị mmadụ na anụ ọhịa nke Africa
N'ịbụ onye nọrọ na nwata ya n'ugbo dị 150,000-acre (610 km2) n'ihe bụ Rhodesia, Donaldson nọ n'ọnọdụ zuru oke iji zụlite ma zụlite mmasị ya na anụ ọhịa na ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Ihe osise Donaldson na-edekọ nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na gburugburu ebe obibi na-eche kọntinent ahụ ihu
Ụdị ihe osise ya gụnyere ọtụtụ usoro gụnyere eziokwu na impressionism
Ọrụ ya na pastel bụ nke a kacha mara amara n'ime ọrụ ya; Otú ọ dị, ọrụ ndị na-adịbeghị anya na mmanụ na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta ahụwokwa nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'etiti ndị nchịkọta n'ụwa niile
Ojiji o ji ihe osise dịgasị iche iche na ọdịdị na-enye echiche na e sere ọrụ ndị ahụ site na iji aja uhie nke Africa
E gosipụtara Donaldson n'akwụkwọ anọ
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi o mere naanị ya na ihe ngosi otu na Europe na Amerịka, ma ree ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa
Mmasị Donaldson nwere maka anụ ọhịa nke Africa mere ka o dee akwụkwọ 'Africa, An Artist's Journal' na-akọwa njem ya na ahụmịhe ya nke na-enye ya ihe osise mara mma ya
Akwụkwọ Donaldson were ya ihe karịrị afọ anọ na ọnwa isii iji mezue
O chepụtara, dee ma gosipụta akwụkwọ ahụ n'onwe ya; ọ ghọrọ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na mba ise ma bụrụ nke Victoria & Albert Museum Book Award kelere nke ukwuu maka imepụta
Kim Suzanne Engelbrecht (a mụrụ na 20 June 1980) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Lolly de Klerk na ihe nkiri Isidingo, Sgt
Noma Banks na ihe ngosi TV Syfy Dominion na Marlize DeVoe na ihe ngosi CW The Flash
O gosipụtara mmemme telivishọn ndị ntorobịa a na-akpọ Take5 n'afọ ndi 1990
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Engelbrecht dị na Johannesburg
Kim nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri South Africa Bunny Chow, nke John Barker duziri

O nwetara nnukwu ezumike mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ mgbe ọ nwetara ọrụ Sara na mmepụta ndị Ịtali, Sarahsara, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri abụọ nke ndị Sudan nke na-egwu mmiri site na Isle nke Capri gaa Napoli na Ịtali
Engelbrecht pụtara dịka Marlize DeVoe na oge nke anọ (2017-2018) nke The Flash
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Kyle Zeeman nke Sunday Times, o kwuru, sị
'Ọ bụ ihe ịtụnanya na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Grant Gustin (onye na-eme The Flash) na Neil Sandilands, onye bụkwa onye South Africa
Ana m abịa n'ime ihe ngosi nke kachasị ukwuu na netwọk ya ma na-anọ n'oge nke anọ ya
O nwere nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya na nke ahụ na-abịa na nnukwu nrụgide
Aghọtara m na ọ bụ nnukwu ihe ngosi
Na ọ bụ nnukwu ihe (maka South Africa) ma a chọrọ m ime nke ọma

Kim Il-Sung (1912-1994) al è un politic statiunitens, 1º President dai North Korea

Kimberly Noel Kardashian (nke bụbu West; amụrụ Ọktoba 21, 1980) bụ agwa mgbasa ozi America, onye na-elekọta mmadụ, na nwanyị ọchụnta ego O buru ụzọ nweta nlebara anya mgbasa ozi dị ka enyi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Paris Hilton, mana ọ natara ọkwa ka ukwuu mgbe teepu mmekọahụ Kim Kardashian, Superstar, gbara na 2003 ya na enyi ya nwoke bụ Ray J, ka ewepụtara na 2007 Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, ya na ezinụlọ ya malitere ịpụta na E! Usoro ihe onyonyo n'ezie Idogide ndị Kardashians (2007–2021) Ọganiihu ya butere nguzobe nke usoro ntụgharị Kourtney na Kim Take New York (2011–2012), Kourtney na Kim Take Miami (2009 – 2013), na Hulu's The Kardashians (2022)
Kim Karin Polese (amuru na Nọvemba 13, 1961) bu onye ọchụnta ego nke Silicon Valley na onye isi teknụzụ
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke CrowdSmart Inc, ụlọ ọrụ ngwaahịa ngwanrọ
Polese na-eje ozi na bọọdụ nke Long-Ter Stock Exchange ma bụrụ onye otu ngalaba ngalaba na Mahadum California
Ruo 2015, Polese bụ onye isi oche nke ClearStreet Inc, ụlọ ọrụ nke ngwaahịa ya na-enyere ndị ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ha aka ibelata mmefu ahụike ha
Onye na-akwado amụma ọha iji bulie ikike imepụta ihe ọhụrụ nke America, a kpọrọ Polese aha na Board Advisory Innovation nke President Obama na 2011
The Board eduzi ọmụmụ Ngalaba Azụmahịa nke US aku na uba asọmpi, na-ebuga a akụkọ na-atụ aro na Congress na January 2012
Na ọnwa nke ise na afọ 2012, a kpọrọ Polese aha na San Francisco Business Journal ' s ndepụta nke 'Ụmụ nwanyị Kachasị Mma'
Polese bụ onye nnata nke 2010 National Center for Women & Technology Innovator Award
Ná mmalite ọrụ ya, na 1997, o mere ndepụta magazin Time nke 'Ndị America 25 Kasị Mma'
Na 2018, Polese pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ Silicon Valley The Untold Story
Polese nwetara nzere BA na biophysics na 1984 site na Mahadum California, Berkeley wee mụọ sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Washington
Enyere ya nzere Doctorate na Business na Economics sitere na Mahadum California State na 2011
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ibe na Centre maka Innovation Innovation nke Mahadum Carnegie Mellon

Na mgbakwunye na ijere CrowdSmart ozi dị ka onyeisi oche, Polese bụ Aspen Institute Crown Fellow ma na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ bọọdụ, gụnyere Silicon Valley Leadership Group, TechNet, Mahadum California President Board on Science and Innovation, UC Berkeley's College of Engineering, na Long Now Foundation, Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọchịchị Ọha na California na Global Security Institute
Polese jere ozi na bọọdụ Technorati, Inc
site na 2004 ruo 2006
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na onye na-etinye ego n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ mmalite
Na mbụ, Polese jere ozi dị ka CEO nke SpikeSource Inc, nke mepụtara ngwanrọ iji megharịa njikwa ngwa mepere emepe
Emebere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2003 na ụlọ ọrụ VC Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers wee malite ngwaahịa mbụ ya na Eprel 2005
Ụlọ ọrụ Black Duck nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Nọvemba 2010
Tupu SpikeSource, Polese mebere Marimba Inc, onye ọsụ ụzọ njikwa ngwanrọ dabere na ịntanetị
Ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi ala na onye isi ruo 2000, na-eduga Marimba na uru
Ọ bụ onyeisi oche site na 2000 ruo 2004, mgbe e rere Marimba na BMC Software maka $239M
Tupu ịmalite Marimba, Polese nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ asaa na Sun Microsystems ma bụrụ onye njikwa ngwaahịa ntọala maka Java mgbe ọ malitere na 1995
Ọ metụtakwara mgbanwe nke aha ime ya nke 'Oak' na 'Java'
Tupu ịbanye na Sun, Polese rụrụ ọrụ na sistemu ọkachamara na IntelliCorp Inc, na-enyere ụlọ ọrụ Fortune 500 aka itinye ọgụgụ isi mmadụ iji dozie nsogbu azụmahịa siri ike
A mụrụ Sajet na Naijiria ma zụlite ya na Australia site na afọ anọ, ọ bụ nwa amaala Netherlands

O nwere nzere doctorate na ọmụmụ liberal studies site na Mahadum Georgetown, nzere masta na akụkọ ihe mere mgbe chie site na Bryn Mawr College, nzere masters na nchịkwa azụmaahịa, na nzere bachelọ na akụkọ ihe mere mgbe ochie na Mahadụ Melbourne, na diplọma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ ihe ngosi nka na Mahadwa Deakin
Malite na Eprel 1, 2013, Sajet jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Smithsonian's National Portrait Gallery na Washington DC
Ọrụ a na-esote oge ọ bụ onye isi na onye isi oche nke Historical Society nke Pennsylvania
Tupu ọrụ ahụ, ọ bụ osote onye nduzi nke Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts ma nọrọ oge dị ka onye nlekọta na onye nduzi na ụlọ ngosi nka abụọ nke Australia
Kim Schmahmann (amụrụ n'afọ 1955 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke bi na Cambridge, Massachusetts ugbu a
Ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Brickbottom Artists Building na Somerville, Massachusetts
Ihe osise ya na-ejikọta nka echiche na nka dị mma, na-eji esemokwu dị n'etiti echiche na ọrụ iji gosipụta esemokwu nke na-ebilite n'etiti ndị mmadụ na ọha mmadụ

Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya na-ekwu maka njikwa na ịkpa ókè nke ọ hụrụ mgbe ọ na-etolite na South Africa, mba nke usoro mmegbu na-achịkwa site na ọchịchị ya n'oge gara aga site na ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọrụ ya nke a ma ama, 'Bureau of Bureaucracy,' na-egosi na Smithsonian Renwick Gallery na Washington, DC
Ọrụ a were afọ isii (site na 1993 ruo 1999) iji mepụta na MIT Hobby Shop na Cambridge
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, a kpọrọ Bureau of Bureaucracy otu n'ime 'Ihe ise dị na Smithsonian Museums nke I na-aghaghi ịhụ' site na Association of Registrars and Collection Specialists (ARCS)
Ọrụ ya nke akpọrọ 'Apart-Hate A People Divider,' bụ nke Museum of Arts & Design na New York City nwetara
Akụkụ ahụ apụtala na ihe ngosi MAD nke Re Collection nke David Revere McFadden haziri, yana ihe ngosi Global Africa Project nke Lowery Stokes Sims na Leslie King-Hammond haziri
Akụkụ Apart-Hate na-egosipụta otu ọha mmadụ si emepụta usoro nke na-ekewa ndị mmadụ nwere ịkpọasị
Judith Dobrzynski, na-ede maka The New York Times, kọwara ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'ntụgharị uche na ịkpa ókè'
Ọrụ nke emepụtara na mgbe na-adịbeghị anya, nke akpọrọ 'Belabeled' nke Peabody Essex Museum (PEM) nwetara na Salem MA, bụ maka ike nke akara iji kpụzie njirimara
Akara ndị a na-egosi na ndị mmadụ na-etinye onwe ha na ndị ọzọ na-enye atụmanya na ohere dị nta
N'ịchọpụta etu akara si dị mkpa, ọrụ a na-akpọ ndị na-ekiri ka ha maa aka ma chee echiche banyere mkpebi ikpe ha
Kim Syster, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-agba egwu na onye nlereanya
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri SABC1 When We Were Black dịka 'Rachael'
Mgbe ahụ na 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Nikki' na oge nke anọ nke SABC2 parliamentary drama serial 90 Plein Street
Mgbe iwu ewu ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ihe nkiri kykNET Suidooster ma rụọ ọrụ dịka 'Shahieda Williams'
O mechara weghachite ọrụ ahụ na oge nke atọ
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri egwu nke kykNET Sterlopers na ọrụ 'Kim McKenzie' na 2016
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere usoro abụọ ọzọ dị ka 'Angel' na miniseries Universal TV Cape Town, na mgbe ahụ dị ka 'Nicolene 'Nikki' September' na kykNET miniseries Fluiters
N'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Bianca Prins' na oge nke isii nke usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 Erfsondes
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na oge nke iri na anọ na nke iri na ise nke ihe nkiri kykNET a kpọrọ Binnelanders dika 'Dr
Jax Davids'
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Sonja Landman' na ihe nkiri ọzọ kykNET Spoorloos
N'afọ 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Wilhelmina' na ihe nkiri Ekstra Medium
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na usoro abụọ na SABC2 telenovela Die Sentrum na ọrụ 'Rochelle Williams' na ihe nkiri ihe omimi nke kykNET & kie Skemerdans na ọrụ 'Chanel Adonis'
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-agba egwú na-arụ ọrụ maka otu egwuregwu rugby nke Cape Town 'The Stormers'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka; The Gamechangers, Sonskyn Beperk na Nul is nie Ник
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri egwu akụkọ sayensị Hollywood Deep Blue Sea 2 nke Darin Scott duziri
Kimanaueze, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Na Kumanauezi ma ọ bụ Na kimanauze Kia-Tumbī Ndala, bụ dike ọdịbendị na akụkọ ifo Ambundu maọbụ Mbundu nke ndị ya bi na Angola ugbu a
E nwere ike iji aha Kueimanaze na-arụtụaka dịka dike lụrụ nwa nwanyị nke Anyanwụ na Ọnwa, maọbụ kwa nna nke dike ahụ
Kimanaueze nke obere bụ nna onye dike ọdịbendị Ambundu ọzọ, Sudika-mbambi, na nwanne ya nwoke, Kabundungdulu
A naghị egosi Kueimanaze nke okenye n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na akụkọ ọdịnala Ambundu
Otú ọ dị, a maara na ọ bụ anụ ọhịa nwere ọtụtụ isi, Makishi, gburu ya mgbe Kimanaueze nke obere na-apụ maka azụmahịa
Ka oge na-aga, Sudika-mbambi ga-egbu Makishi iji bọọ ụbọ nna nna ya
A na-egosi Kimanaueze nke obere dịka onye nwere oké ọchịchọ, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ n'ihi omume ya mgbe ọ chọrọ ịlụ ada anyanwụ na ọnwa

Kimathi Donkor (amụrụ na afo 1965) bụ onye na-ese ihe na London nke oge a nke Ghana, Anglo-Jewish na ihe nketa ezinụlọ Jamaica nke ihe osise ya na-egosi 'ahụ na mkpụrụ obi diasporiki nke Afrịka dị ka ebe ndị dike na ọnwụ, ike na adịghị ike
akụkọ ifo na ihe'

Dị ka onye nkatọ nka Coline Milliard si kwuo, ọrụ Donkor bụ ezigbo cornucopias nke ntụgharị na nka ọdịda anyanwụ, ihe omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na akụkọ ndụ nke onye na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Donkor na Bournemouth, England, n'afọ 1965
O kwuru banyere nzụlite ya 'A mụrụ m na UK site n'aka nne Anglo-Jewish na nna Ghana, mana nne na nna m nakweere bụ ndị si Jamaika na UK zụlitere m
Anyị biri ruo oge na Zambia, Etiti Afrịka, ebe nna m nakweere na-arụ ọrụ dị ka veti
Agụsịchara m akwụkwọ na ọdịda anyanwụ England, wee kwaga London, ebe m mechara biri
Ka ọ dịgodị, nne na nna m na-azụ m agbaala alụkwaghịm ma lụọ ndị ọzọ, ya mere ọdịiche ezinụlọ mụbara n'ezie, dịka ndị Zambia sonyekwara na pati ahụ
Ndụ smörgåsbord a mere ka echiche mbụ nke ihe ịtụnanya, na mgbe ụfọdụ na-ewe iwe, mgbagwoju anya nke njirimara na akụkọ ihe mere eme, nke, echere m, gosipụtara na ọrụ nka m
N'ụzọ ziri ezi n'ihi na abụ m onye akaebe dị omimi maka ọtụtụ ngafe na ngafe ọzọ nke akụkọ, ihe oyiyi na njem si gburugburu ụwa

Donkor nwetara diplọma Art Foundation site na Bournemouth na Poole College of Arts sochiri nzere BA (Hons) na nka na Goldsmiths College, University of London, na nzere masta na nka na Camberwell College of Arts
O nwetara PhD ya na Chelsea College of Arts n'afọ 2016
O sonyekwara na atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ obodo dịka Black History for Action N'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye natara Derek Hill Foundation Scholarship maka British School na Rome

Kimba (Tsikimba; ma ọ bụ asụsụ Kambari II) bụ asụsụ Kainji nke Naijiria nke ndị Kambari na-asụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, e nwere 100,000 ndị na-asụ asụsụ ala
E nwere asụsụ atọ Kimba, Gaushi (Agaushi) na Wənci (Ngwunci)
Roger Blench na-ewere Gaushi na Wənci (Ngwunci) dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
Asụsụ Kimba nwere olumba atọ Auna, Yumu na Wara
A na-asụ asụsụ Ashɛ (Gaushi, Agaushi) na Garafini, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Kainji
Asụsụ Ngwunci nwere olumba abụọ Agwara (tsu-saweni) na Rofia (tsu-ɓwəshi)

Kimberly Bryant (amuru ya na abalị iri anọ na onwa nke mbu na afọ, 1967) o bu onye injinia eletriki nke America nke rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba biotechnology na Genentech, Novartis Vaccines, Diagnostics, na Merck
Na 2011, Bryant turu ntuala Black Girls Code, otu ụlọ ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nke n'elekwasị anya n'inye nkà na teknụzụ na mmemme kọmputa nye ụmụ agbọghọ Africa-American
Mgbe o guzobechara Black Girls Code, e depụtara Bryant dị ka otu n'ime '25 Most Influential African-Americans In Technology' site Business Insider
A mụrụ ma zụlite Kimberly Bryant na Memphis, Tennessee na abalị iri anọ na onwa nke mbu na afọ, 1967, site n'aka otu nne naanị ya n'etiti Civil Rights Movement
Ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'nwa agbọghọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi,' na-eme nke ọma na mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ nwetara akwụkwọ mmụta ịga Mahadum Vanderbilt na 1985, ebe o mere atụmatụ ịghọ onye injinia obodo

N'ịbụ onye teknụzụ dị ka microchip, kọmputa nkeonwe na ekwentị mkpanaaka dọọrọ mmasị ya, ọ gbanwere isi ya wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na Electrical Engineering na ụmụntakịrị na sayensị Kọmputa na mgbakọ na mwepụ na 1989
Ná mmalite ọrụ ya, Bryant nwere ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ eletrik Westinghouse Electric na DuPont
Mgbe e mesịrị, Bryant ga-akwaga na biotechnology na mgbe e mesịrị na ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Pfizer, Merck, na Genentech na Novartis
Bryant tọrọ ntọala Black Girl Code na 2011 mgbe nwa ya nwanyị kwusịrị mmasị n'ịmụ mmemme kọmputa
N'ịchọ ihe ọmụmụ dị na mpaghara Bay, ọ chọpụtara na ọ dịghị nke dabara adaba maka nwa ya nwanyị
Ụmụ nwoke na-ewerekarị ha, ọ naghị adịkarị kwa ka ụmụ agbọghọ Africa ndị America ndị ọzọ bịara
N'ịbụ onye e kewapụrụ onwe ya n'oge ọ na-amụ ihe na ịrụ ọrụ, ọ chọrọ ebe ka mma maka nwa ya nwanyị
Bryant na-atụ anya na mbọ a ga-eme ka ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto, karịsịa ndị si n'ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta, nọgide na-etinye aka na STEM ma nwekwuo mmata n'ime ubi
Ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America na-erughị 3% nke ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ na Black Girls Code na-alụ ọgụ iji gbanwee ma melite pasent a ka mma
Koodu umunwanyi ojii na-akuziri ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'afọ akwụkwọ mmemme kọmputa na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ ma n'oge okpomọkụ
Otu anaghị akwụ ụgwọ dabere na San Francisco nwere ebumnuche ịkụziri otu nde ụmụ agbọghọ ojii ka ha nweta koodu site na 2040
Nzukọ a azụlarị ụmụ agbọghọ 3,000 n'isi iri na ise n'obodo ukwu dị na United States na mba ọzọ, gụnyere otu isi na Johannesburg, South Africa
Na ọnwa asaá na afọr 2017 Bryant tinyere aka n'ịjụ onyinye Uber $ 125,000 nke ọ weere dị ka 'ihe na-adịghị mma'
Onyinye a sochiri ebubo nke iyi egwu mmekọahụ na Uber
Bryant kwukwara na ọjụjụ ya, na e nyere Girls Who Code ugboro iri ego enyere na koodu umunwanyi ojii
Na ọnwa nke abụọ na afor 2018 koodu umunwanyi ojii rukoro ọrụ ya na onye na asọmpi na Uber Lyft - ka Bryant tụlere ụkpụrụ ha ka ọ dabara nke ọma na nke ya
Bryant bụ onye na-eche echiche na mpaghara nsonye na teknụzụ, ma kwuo okwu na isiokwu na ihe omume ndị dị ka TedX Kansas City, TedX San Francisco, Platform Summit, Big Ideas Festival, na SXSW

Mgbe ọkụ arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ n'oge okpomọkụ 2021, ya na ndị ọrụ na-ezo aka na 'okwu gbasara ọdịbendị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya [na nzukọ ahụ]' ndị isi oche maka Black Girls Code chụpụrụ Bryant na abalị iri abụo na atọ na ọnwa nke iri abuo na afọ, 2021 site n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi ma tinye ya nkwusioru, ebe 'a na-enyocha ebubo siri ike nke adịghị mma n'ebe ọrụ

Bryant na-eje ozi na National Champions Board maka National Girls Collaborative Project, otu ọrụ ebere nke ọhụụ ya bụ ịkpọkọta òtù dị iche iche n'ofe United States na-agba mbọ ịkụziri na ịgba ụmụ agbọghọ ume ịchụso ọrụ na STEM

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na bọọdụ nke National Center for Women & Information Technology (NCWIT) K-12 Alliance, otu raara onwe ya nye ịmepụta ohere ịnweta agụmakwụkwọ mgbakọ na mwepụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ ebe niile
N'afọ 2012, Bryant nwetara ihe nrite Jefferson a ma ama maka ọrụ obodo maka ọrụ ya iji kwado obodo Bay Area na Black Girls Code
Na afọ 2013, a matara Bryant dị ka onye mmeri nke White House maka mgbanwe na ntinye teknụzụ

N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dika otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụo na ise Kasị mma na Africa-American na teknụzụ site na Business Insider, nyere ya ihie nrite ana akpo 'Phara-Aspen Education Fellowship', ma gụọ ya aha bụ ' The Root 100 na Power 100 lists'
Na afọ 2014, Bryant bụ onye natara ihie nrite ana akpo ' 's American Ingenuity Award for Social Progress'
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị meriri ihe nrite ụmụ nwanyị POLITICO na-achị
Na afọ 2019, Bryant bụ otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ n'ime mmadụ iri isii na ise n'ofe iri na atọ iji gosipụta ọrụ ha na onyinye ihie ọhụrụ na mmekọrịta ihie ọhụrụ nke iri abụọ na abụọ nke KPMG wetara
Enyere ya ihe nrite SXSW Interactive 'Festival Hall of Fame'
Bryant bụ onye isi okwu na afọ 2021 SXSW EDU
Kimberly Dowdell, AIA, sitere na Detroit, Michigan, Kim bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Chicago, onye na-emepe ụlọ, na onye nkuzi
Dowdell bụ onye isi ugbu a n'ọfịs HOK na Chicago, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala nke 2019 ruo 2020 nke National Organization of Minority Architects (NOMA)
Na Jụn 15, 2022, a họpụtara Dowdell dị ka osote onye isi oche mbụ na onye isi oche a họpụtara nke American Institute of Architects
Ọ ga-abụ onye isi oche nke otu narị nke American Institute of Architects na nwanyị ojii mbụ ga-eje ozi na ọrụ ahụ
Dowdell tolitere na Detroit
Dowdell nwetara nzere Bachelor of Architecture na Mahadum Cornell n'afọ 2006 na Master ya na Public Administration na Mahadim Harvard n'afọ 2015
Mgbe ọ nọ na Cornell n'afọ 2005, Dowdell guzobere Social Economic Environmental Design (SEED) Network
Mgbe Cornell gasịrị, Dowdell rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs HOK na New York na 2008 tupu ọ gbanwee iji lekwasị anya na ụlọ na 2011
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard na 2015, Dowdell rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ụlọ na Mweghachi Detroit ma na 2016 gaa na-arụ ọrụ na Century Partners na mmelite ziri ezi nke obodo ahụ
N'agbata afọ 2016 na 2019, Dowdell kụziri ihe owuwu na atụmatụ obodo na Mahadum Michigan
Dị ka onye isi na HOK, Dowdell malitere mmemme HOK IMPACT ma soro onyeisi oche nke Diversity Advisory gafee ụlọ ọrụ HOK niile zuru ụwa ọnụ
Kimi Djabaté (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 20, na afọ 1975 na Tabato, Guinea-Bissau) bụ onye Bissau-Guinean Afro-beat/blues musician
Dabere na Lisbon, Portugal, ọ na-aga n'ihu ịbụ otu n'ime njikọ nke oge a na usoro egwu Ndịda Anyanwụ Afrika nke na-agbatị azụ n'oge ọtụtụ narị afọ
A mụrụ Djabaté n'ezinụlọ dara ogbenye ma nwee ọganihu n'egwú n'ógbè a maara dị ka etiti maka egwu, ịgba egwu, na nka ndị ọzọ
Mmasị ya n'egwú malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ mgbe ọ malitere ịkpọ balafon, African xylophone, na-amụta ngwa ngwa ngwá egwú ọdịnala ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ọ na-erubeghị afọ iri na ụma, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ya gaa n'obodo Sonako dị nso iji mụọ kora
Nke a nyeere ya aka n'ọdịnihu site n'ịzụlite ikike ịkpọ ụbọ akwara ya
Nkà ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú ghọrọ ihe karịrị ihe ntụrụndụ nwata maka Djabaté ka a chọrọ ka ọ na-egwuri egwu na ememe obodo iji nyere aka nye ego ezinụlọ
Nke a ghọrọ isi iyi nke esemokwu maka Djabaté na ezinụlọ ya
Nne na nna ya na nwanne nna ya manyere ya ime ihe megide ọchịchọ ya nke wepụrụ ọtụtụ oge ezumike ndị ntorobịa ndị ọzọ ọ nọ na ya
Nne na nna Djabaté yana nwanne nna ya, site na ịmanye ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ, nyere nwa okorobịa ahụ ọzụzụ magburu onwe ya na egwu Mandingo ọdịnala

Otú ọ dị, Djabaté nwekwara mmasị n'ụdị egwu ndị Afrịka a ma ama dị ka ụdị egwu egwu gumbé, Afrobeat nke Naijiria, morna nke Cape Verde, ka anyị ghara ịkpọ aha jazz na blues ọdịda anyanwụ, nke niile metụtara egwu ya
Mgbe ọ gachara Europe na ndị egwu na ịgba egwu nke Guinea-Bissau, Djabaté biri na Lisbon, Portugal
Ọ bi na Europe kemgbe ahụ, ma ọ ka na-etinye onwe ya n'egwú o tolitere na Guinea-Bissau
Na Europe, Djabaté sooro ndị omenkà dị iche iche rụkọọ ọrụ, gụnyere Mory Kanté na Waldemar Bastos
N'afọ 2005, Djabaté wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Teriké, nke ọ wepụtara n'onwe ya
A tọhapụrụ Djabaté nke abụọ solo album, Karam, na Julaị 28, na afọ 2009 n'okpuru akara, Cumbancha
Otu diski a, abọm abụ iri na ise nwere isiokwu nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; nhụjuanya nke ndị Afrịka; ọgụ megide ịda ogbenye; nnwere onwe; ikike ụmụ nwanyị; na ịhụnanya

Kiné Kirama Fall[lower-alpha 1] bụ aha njirimara nke onye Senegal na-ede uri (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1934) onye bipụtara mpịakọta abụọ nke amaokwu asụsụ French ya n'afọ ndị afọ nke 1970, mgbe enweghị ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ na mba Senegal
A maara ya maka àgwà ihe omimi nke egwu ya, nke na-egosipụta ịhụnanya maka okike na nke Chineke
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1934 n'obodo Rufisque dị nso na Dakar
Ọ gụghị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma ọ bịara n'oge ịgụ akwụkwọ na French
Nke a nwere ike ịtọhapụ ya na mgbakọ ndị Europe ma nye aka na Senegal na ọrụ ya, dị ka onye na-ede uri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Leopold Senghor si kwuo
Fall nwere nkwanye ùgwù site na nkwado o nwere site n'aka Onye isi ala Senghor, onye dere mmeghe nke akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke uri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị uri ya ma zute ya, onye na-ede uri bụ Birago Diop nwere mmasị na ọrụ ya ma gbaa ya ume
Na mbido afọ 1970 Fall na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 1973, ọ gwara onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ na abụ ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ egwu ịbụ abụ nke ụwa, oké osimiri, eluigwe, mana karịa Chineke niile
Isiokwu ya họọrọ ya, o kwuru isiokwu kachasị nke 'ọdịdị, Chineke na ahụmịhe mmadụ'
Senghor chere na ọrụ ya gosipụtara 'njikọ nke ime mmụọ na agụụ mmekọahụ nke Afrịka'
Onye nkatọ ọzọ na-ekwu banyere 'ịdị ọhụrụ, akụ na ụba, na ime mmụọ' ọ na-eweta na edemede banyere ịhụnanya, mmekpa ahụ, okwukwe na okike

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ na Senegal bụ ndị pụtara n'afọ ndị sochirinụ nnwere onwe n'afọ 1960 mana ọ nọgidere ruo oge ụfọdụ ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye a maghị ya na mba ụwa
Fall kwuru na ọ na-abụ abụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị niile nke Afrịka
uri ya nwere ụda nke ọdịnala mpaghara nke okwu ọnụ, nke doro anya na abụ otuto, ma na-ekwughachi asụsụ Wolof ya
King's College, Lagos (KCOB) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na steeti Lagos, Naijiria
E hiwere ya n'abali iri abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1909 na Lagos Island, n'akụkụ Tafawa Balewa Square, nke ọ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ iri bidoro ya
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-anabata naanị ụmụ akwụkwọ nwoke

Ọ bụ ezie na n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, a nabatara ụmụ akwụkwọ HSC (A-Level equivalent) ndị nwanyị tupu e guzobe Ụlọ akwụkwọ Queen's College Lagos, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ nwanne nwanyị nke King's College
King's College na-eduzi ule West African School Certificate nakwa National Examinations Council
N'afọ 1908, onye Naijiria na-anọchite anya onye nduzi agụmakwụkwọ na Lagos, Henry Rawlingson Carr dụrụ Gọvanọ Walter Egerton ọdụ na atụmatụ zuru ezu nke agụmakwụkwọ
Atụmatụ na aro Carr bụ ihe ndabere maka ịmepụta King's College
Carr mere ka ndị London Board of Education kwenye na ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke King's College agaghị agbakọta kama ọ ga-agbakwunye atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ ya nke ndị ozi ala ọzọ
N'ihi ya, ụfọdụ ndị edemede na-ewere Henry Carr dị ka 'onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke King's College'
Na 20 Septemba 1909 King's School (dị ka a na-akpọ ya n'oge ahụ) malitere
E nwere ụmụ akwụkwọ ọsụ ụzọ iri nke gụnyere JC
Vaughan, Isaac Ladipo Oluwole, Frank Macaulay, Herbert Mills (site na Gold Coast), OA
Omololu na Moses King
Oluwole bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ
E wuru ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ma nye ya ihe ndị dị na ya na ọnụahịa £ 10,001
O nwere ụlọ nzukọ iji nabata ụmụ akwụkwọ narị atọ, ụlọ
, ụasatọl
Nkà ihe ọmụma nke King's School bụ

'inye ndị ntorobịa nke ógbè ahụ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu karịa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị dị ugbu a nyere, ịkwadebe ha maka ule agụmakwụkwọ nke Mahadum London na inye ndị chọrọ iru eru maka ndụ ọkachamara ma ọ bụ ịbanye na Gọọmentị ma ọ bụ ọrụ azụmahịa bara uru'
Ndị ọrụ kọleji ahụ nwere ndị Europe atọ (onye isi na-enye ntụziaka na Asụsụ Bekee, Literature na Latin, Mathematical na Science Master) na ndị nkuzi Afrịka abụọ
Site n'oge ruo n'oge, ndị otu Ngalaba Mmụta na-arụ ọrụ dị ka nkuzi nke klas mgbede
Gọọmentị nyere agụmakwụkwọ atọ na ihe ngosi atọ kwa afọ dabere na uru
Ndị na-erite uru na agụmakwụkwọ ahụ nwere ikike ịnata agụmakwụkwọ n'efu na onyinye gọọmentị nke pound isii kwa afọ

N'aka nke ọzọ, ndị nwere ihe ngosi na-enweta agụmakwụkwọ n'efu; ọ bụ naanị ihe ngosi Hussey Charity nke a na-eme na kọleji ka e guzobere maka ụmụ akwụkwọ dara ogbenye site na itinye ego nke ụlọ nke Hussey Charité
Nkezi nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abịa na njedebe nke 1910 bụ iri na isii
Nke a rịrị elu ruo iri isii na asaa ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1914
N'afọ 1926, e bipụtara The Development of the Education Department, 1882X 1925
ria, maka afọ 1926' kpughere eziokwu na-adọrọ mmasị banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

Ọ na-agụ, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ, '1909 bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị maka mmeghe nke King's College dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị n'okpuru onyeisi nke Maazị Lomax onye sitere na Ngalaba Nnyocha, onye ndị ọkachamara Europe abụọ nyeere aka
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwoke nọ na mpịakọta ahụ bụ iri na otu
N'afọ 1909, a họpụtara Maazị Hyde-Johnson ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ King's College, mana ọnwa itoolu ka e mesịrị, ọ nọchiri Maazị Rowden dị ka onye nduzi agụmakwụkwọ'
Na onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ nke kọleji ahụ bụ Maazị Lomax bụ mkpughe dị ịrịba ama, nke dị ịrịba amị n'ihi na echiche zuru oke bụ mgbe niile na Maazị Hyde-Johnson bụ onye nwere ọnọdụ ahụ
Ruo 1954 mgbe edere mbipụta mbụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpirikpi nke kọleji ahụ, akụkọ ifo a ma ama bụ na Maazị Hyde-Johnson bụ onye isi mbụ nke King's College
Ewezuga ụmụ akwụkwọ ntọala ole na ole dị ndụ, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ dịghị Old Boy ọ bụla nụrụ banyere Maazị Lomax; aha onye ọsụ ụzọ a dị n'ụzọ na-adọrọ mmasị
A na-enye nghọta banyere ndụ na KC
n'afọ ndị mbụ ya site na isiokwu FS
Scruby nke dị na 24 Febụwarị 1924 na Mermaid nke akpọrọ 'Further Glimpse of the Past'
E nwere ụlọ anọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ aha ya bụ ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ
Ụlọ Hyde-Johnson (red), Ụlọ Panes (blue), Ụlọ Mckee-Wright (yellow) na Ụlọ Harman (green)
Ọ nwere aka iri na klas ọ bụla (dị ka nke 2017), Ha bụ A, Alpha, C, D, E, F, G, H, J na K
King's College Lagos na-eji mkpụrụedemede Grik Alpha kama mkpụrụedemede B dị ka aka nke abụọ nke klas ha
N'ihi ihe mgbochi nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, e kewara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-aga n'ime ala nke Federal School for Arts and Sciences (FSAS) na Victoria Island

(Nchịkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ka nọ n'okpuru nchịkwa nke otu onye isi ma mesịa nọrọ n'okpuru njikwa nke Federal Ministry of Education) Nke a pụtara na klas ndị okenye nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ (klas 1 ruo 3) nọ ugbu a na Victoria Island 'Annex,' dị ka a maara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, King's College, Lagos nwere obere ụlọ akwụkwọ
A na-ekewa ndị okenye ugbu a dị ka ndị a A na-ahụ ụmụ nwoke SS1 ruo SS3 na Main Camp (Tafawa Balewa Square), ebe a na-ahụ JSS1 ruo ụmụ nwoke JSS2 na ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbakwunye (Victoria Island)
Onye bụbu PKC, Otunba 'Dele Olapeju, malitere ọrụ na Jenụwarị, 2010 wee kwụsị ọrụ na Nọvemba, 2015
Ọ kpọgara ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị okenye site na mgbakwunye gaa na isi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Taa, King's College na-eyi ejiji ọhụrụ
O wuola ọtụtụ ihe owuwu ma na isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ma na ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbakwunye

Nsonaazụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ dị ugbu a n'ịntanetị, ebe ndị nne na nna na ndị na-elekọta ha nwere ike ịgbaso ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na nke ndị ọzọ na-arụ n'ụmụ akwụkwọ site na iji nkọwa nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ nyere ha

Kennedy Ombima (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1987), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ King Kaka na Rabbit, bụ onye na-eti egwu na Kenya
Kaka zutere Jorma Taccone, onye otu The Lonely Island na Febụwarị 2011 mgbe Taccone gara Nairobi, Kenya dị ka akụkụ nke njem ya maka AFAR Magazine's 'Spin the Globe'
Sungura na Taccone rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta vidiyo rap nke nwere ihe karịrị otu nde mmadụ na-ele ya
Taccone mechara dee edemede maka AFAR Magazine na-edekọ ahụmahụ ya na Sungura
N'afọ 2012, Rabbit malitere akara ejiji nke ya akpọrọ Niko Kwa Jam Nakam
Site na abọm ya nwere egwu iri na asaa bụ Tales of Kaka Sungura Sunguuch, Kaka kwuru na ọ lekwasịrị anya naanị n'ịkwalite abọm ahụ yana ịme nanị vidiyo ole na ole
Enweghị m ike ime abọm ọzọ ruo na ngwụcha afọ na-abịa
Ana m enye ihe niile m mgbe m na-achịkọta abọm, nke ahụ bụ ihe mere m ji banye n'ọrụ abọm ọzọ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, o wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka egwu ya 'Adisia'

Ewezuga ọrụ egwu ya na-aga nke ọma, Kaka bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego ma na mbido Septemba 2015 ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmiri ya dị ọcha nke a maara dị ka Kaka Empire's Majik Water na-eji aha egwu ya dị ka aha ọrụ nke a ga-eji nke ngwaahịa ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Nana Owiti ugbu a, ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
A mụrụ ya na Kikwit n'ime Democratic Republic of the Congo
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Lubumbashi n`afọ 1977, Eze Kester sonyeere otu egwu Viva La Musica

Mgbe o nwetasịrị ihe ịga nke ọma na ọtụtụ egwu a ma ama, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwu Africa kachasị ewu na ewu na 1980s wee mepụta otu egwu nke ya, nke a na-akpọ 'Victoria Eleison', n`ọnwa Disemba 24, 1982
Emeneya Djo Kester bụ onye ọhụrụ na egwu ya
Ọ bụ onye egwu mbụ na mpaghara ndịda Sahara nke Africa iji malite mmemme egwu na ojiji nke (synthesizers) na abọm ya akpọrọ Nzinzi nke rere ọtụtụ nde n'ụwa niile n`afọ 1987
A na-eto ya maka iwebata egwu Afrịka nye ndị na-ege ntị mba ụwa n'ihi ojiji ọ na-eji ngwá egwu ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka mmemme egwu ma ọ bụ synthesizer na njikọ ya na Rhythm na Blues
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke ihe ịga nke ọma na egwu ndị a ma ama, N`afọ 1993 ọ wepụtara Every Body nke Sonodisc kesara
Ahụ ọ bụla nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na mba ụwa
N'afọ 1997, mgbe afọ asaa gachara, Eze Kester laghachiri Congo
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ 80,000 gara egwu mbụ mgbe ọ lọtara, nke bụ ihe ndekọ dị ka mgbasa ozi Congo si kwuo
Ọtụtụ ndị nyocha na-ewere Emeneya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu kachasị ukwuu n'Afrịka
O nwere ihe karịrị otu puku abụ na otuto ya ma rụọ ọrụ na kọntinent niile
Ọ malitere LA SAPE movement ma kwalite ndị na-emepụta ihe dị ka Gianni Versace, Masatomo, JM Weston wdg
Emeneya bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri 'Les habits neufs du Gouverneur'
Mmasị ya na ihe ọhụrụ ya abụghị naanị na egwu, Eze Kester Emeneya bụ onye na-akwado ndị Afrịka na onye na-alụ ọgụ maka ikike obodo
Ọ jụrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa ma wepụta abụ na-akwado Nelson Mandela mgbe ọ na-eto ihe kpatara ya na mmụọ ya na album ya Succes Fous
N'oge njem ikpeazụ ya na United States mgbe ọ na-eme ihe na Los Angeles n`afọ 2007, ọ toro US maka inwe ọganihu dị ịrịba ama na ikpe ziri ezi na agbụrụ
Emeneya tinyere aka na ọrụ ebere site na ntọala ya
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere oke ịda ogbenye na kọntinent ahụ ma chọọ ijide n'aka na gọọmentị dị iche iche dị n'Afrịka mere mgbalị zuru ezu iji melite ndụ ọha na eze nke ụmụ amaala ha
Nnukwu onye na-akwado Barack Obama, Bill Clinton, John F
Kennedy, Dwight Eisenhower, Franklin Roosevelt na Abraham Lincoln
Emeneya etoola Onye isi ala Obama n'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ ya maka ịbụ onye na-akwado ndị ogbenye
Emeneya mere egwu na Kinshasa n'afọ 2009 iji nyere aka mee emume ncheta Obama dị ka onye isi ojii mbụ nke US
Enyi nke United States, Ọ nyeere US Embassy na Kinshasa aka ime ememe July 4 ọtụtụ ugboro, ọkachasị n'oge onye nnọchi anya US Aubrey Hooks
Eze Kester Emeneya kelere Onye isi ala Bush maka mbọ HIV na ịba ya n'Africa
O wepụtara abọm ya Le Jour Le Plus Long D-Day (The Longest Day) n`afọ 2007 iji too mwakpo US nke Normandy n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na France
A na-akpọ otu n'ime ụmụ ya Franklin Roosevelt
Site n'afọ 1991 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na mba Paris n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2014, Eze Kester Emeneya na ezinụlọ ya biri na France
Emeneya olili ozu bụ nke kachasị ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Congo ma gbasaa ya na ọwa niile dị na Congo na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa
N'ọnwa April 6, 2014 Popu Francis nabatara ezinụlọ Emeneya na Vatican City iji kwupụta nkwado ya
N`ọnwa Machị 2, 2014, Onye isi ala Joseph Kabila nyere Emeneya ihe nrite nke onye isi ala mgbe ọ nwụsịrị maka ọrụ ya na onyinye pụrụ iche nye mba Congo na egwu
Nke a bụ ihe nrite kachasị elu nke onye isi ala Congo nyere
A na-enye onyinye ahụ site na iwu onye isi ala
Mahadum Birmingham na United Kingdom nyekwara Eze Kester Emeneya utu aha nke Ambassador of Peace mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n`onwa Febụwarị 21, 2015

N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2014, otu egwu ụtụ e mere n'obodo ya bụ Kikwit kwụsịrị na ọdachi, ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ iri anọ nọ n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ tụfuru ndụ ha n'ọgba aghara na-esote ọdịda ike
Chief Sunday Adeniyi Adegeye MFR (amụrụ na 22 Septemba 1946), nke a maara dịka Eze Sunny Adé, bụ onye na-agụ egwu jùjú na Naijiria, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-akpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
A na-ewere ya ka otu n'ime ndị egwu egwu pop mbụ nke Afrịka iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụwa niile, a na-akpọkwa ya otu n'etiti ndị egwu kachasị emetụta oge niile
Sunny Adé guzobere òtù nkwado nke ya na 1967, nke a mechara mara dị ka African Beats

Mgbe o nwetasịrị ihe ịga nke ọma mba na Naịjirịa n'oge afọ 1970 ma guzobe akara nke onwe ya, Sunny Adé bịanyere aka na Island Records na 1982 wee nweta ihe ịga nke mbụ na mba ụwa na albums Juju Music (1982) na Synchro System (1983); nke ikpeazụ mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta Grammy, nke mbụ maka onye na-ese ihe na Naịjaria
Abọm ya nke afọ 1998 bụ Odu nwetakwara nhọpụta Grammy
Sunny Adé na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onyeisi oche nke Musical Copyright Society of Nigeria
A mụrụ Sunny Adé na Osogbo n'ezinụlọ eze Naijiria si Ondo na Akure, si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ Omoba nke ndị Yoruba
Nna ya bụ onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na chọọchị, ebe nne ya, Maria Adegeye (née Adesida), bụ onye na'azụ ahịa

Dị ka onye so n'ezinụlọ Adesida, ndị ikwu nne ya gụnyere nna ya Oba Adesida I (onye chịrị Akure ruo afọ 60) ma mesịa gụnye nwa nwanne ya na nwa nwanne Adé, Oba Adebiyi Adegboye Adesida Afunbiowo nke Abụọ, onye jere ozi dị ka eze Akure
Sunny Adé hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ grammar na Ondo City n'okpuru nkwupụta nke ịga Mahadum Lagos
Ọ bụ ya mere na Lagos ka ọrụ egwu ya malitere
Ụda egwu Sunny Adé agbanweela site na mmalite
Ọrụ ya malitere na Moses Olaiya's Federal Rhythm Dandies, otu egwu dị elu
Ọ hapụrụ iji guzobe otu egwu ọhụrụ, The Green Spots, n'afọ 1967
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, n'ihi ihe dị iche iche sitere na mgbanwe na egwu ya na nchegbu azụmahịa, ndị otu Sunny Adé gbanwere aha ya ọtụtụ ugboro, nke mbụ na African Beats na Golden Mercury
Eze Sunny Ade nwere mmetụta sie n'aka onye ọsụ ụzọ Juju Tunde Nightingale ma gbaziri ihe ejiji site na ụdị juju ya 'So wa mbe'
O guzobere King Sunny Ade Foundation, otu nzukọ nke gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ nka, ụlọ ndekọ ọkaibe, na ụlọ maka ndị na-eto eto na-eti egwu
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nleta na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife na onye natara Order of the Federal Republic
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria mbụ a họpụtara maka Grammys
Mgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri nke ihe ịga nke ọma na obodo ya Naịjirịa gasịrị, Sunny Adé natara otuto dị ukwuu na Europe na North America na 1982
Ntọhapụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Juju Music na njem ya na-eso ya bụ 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu ndị nkatọ (ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ndị na-azụ ahịa) nabatara n'ebe niile'

A kọwara Sunny Adé na The New York Times dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị isi egwu dị egwu n'ụwa', na Record dị ka 'mpu ikuku dị ọcha, ịma jijiji dị mma anyị ga-enwe maka oge ụfọdụ na-abịa' na Trouser Press dị ka 'onye n'ime ihe egwu kachasị mma na nke dị mkpa n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa'
Ihe ngosi nke Sunny Adé gosipụtara site na egwu kachasị elu, nke gosipụtara site n'ikike ya nke guitar, na ịgba egwu nke ọma
Abọm ya ọzọ, Syncro System (1983), nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, mere ka a họpụta ya na Grammy Award mbụ ya n'ụdị egwu agbụrụ / ọdịnala, ya mere na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ Naijiria họpụtara na Grammy

N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2017, Eze Sunny Ade kwupụtara na ọ ga-alaghachi n'ọkwa na London n'akụkụ onye na-asọmpi ya Ebenezer Obey maka nlọghachi egwu nke isiokwu ya bụ A Night 2 Remember with the Legends
N'afọ 2017, minista ozi nke Naijiria bụ Lai Mohammed họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya maka mkpọsa 'Change Begins With Me'
Egwú Sunny Adé bụ, n'etiti ngwá egwú ndị ọzọ, drum na-ekwu okwu - ngwá egwú sitere na mgbọrọgwụ Yoruba ya, guitar na ngwa ya pụrụ iche na egwu jùjú
Egwú ya dị n'ọdịnala ochie nke ịbụ abụ abụ ('ewi' na Yoruba) na N'ihi ya, egwu Sunny Adé bụ ihe ndekọ nke ọdịnala ndị ya maka ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu
Sunny Adé webatara guitar pedal steel na egwu pop nke Naijiria
O webatara ojiji nke synthesizers, clarinet, vibraphone, tenor guitar n'ime egwu jùjú dị ka dub na wah-wah guitar licks
Sunny Adé kwuru na o jiri ngwá egwú ndị a mee ihe ọ bụghị dị ka mgbalị imepụta ihe ọhụrụ, kama dị ka ihe na-anọchi anya ngwá egwú jùjú ọdịnala nke siri ike ịchọta na / ma ọ bụ na-abaghị uru maka njem
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, agbakwunyere guitar ígwè pedal na repertoire ya dị ka ụda yiri violin Africa
Sunny Adé na ndị otu ya mepụtara ụda ya pụrụ iche na ngwá ọrụ ya nke ọ na-ejikarị eme ihe dị ka abụ mmeghe n'oge mmemme
A na-eji ụbọ akwara eletrik eme ụda ahụ nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka akụkụ a na-akụ akụ na ịgbà na-ekwu okwu nke na-ada ka abụ ndị Gris na-asụ asịrị
Mgbe ọnwụ Bob Marley gasịrị, Island Records malitere ịchọ onye ọzọ na-ese ihe n'ụwa nke atọ iji tinye na nkwekọrịta ya, ebe Arista Records ka bịanyere aka na Fela Kuti
Onye na-emepụta Martin Meissonnier mere ka Chris Blackwell mara King Sunny Adé, nke dugara na ntọhapụ nke Juju Music na 1982
Robert Palmer na-azọrọ na ọ dọtara uche Eze Sunny Adé n'àgwàetiti ahụ, ihe ọmụma ya sitere na ndụ ya na Malta na 60s na-ege ntị na African Radio na Armed Forces Radio
Sunny Adé nwetara ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ya na abọm a ma n'oge na-adịghị anya a kpọrọ ya 'Bob Marley nke Afrịka'
Sunny Adé ekwuola na ọjụjụ ya ịhapụ Island ka ọ tinye aka n'ihe ndị o dere ma mee ka egwu ya bụrụ nke Europe na nke America bụ ihe mere Island ji kpebie ile anya n'ebe ọzọ
Sunny Ade esorowo ndị isi na-ese ihe dịka Manu Dibango (Wakafrika) na Stevie Wonder (onye na-akpọ harmonica na Aura), yana ndị na-ese egwu Naijiria dị ka Wasiu Alabi Pasuma na Bola Abimbola
Oge dị mkpirikpi nke Sunny Adé na Island Records meghere ọnụ ụzọ maka ndị egwu egwu ụwa ndị ọzọ dị ka Senegalese Youssou N'Dour, Mali's Salif Keita na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1987, Sunny Adé laghachiri n'ihe ngosi mba ụwa mgbe Rykodisc wepụtara ndekọ nke egwu egwu ọ mere na Seattle
N'oge na-adịghị anya, o were onye njikwa America, Andrew Frankel, n'ọrụ, onye kwurịtara nkwekọrịta ndekọ atọ ọzọ na akara ndekọ Mesa (nkewa nke Paradise Group) na America
Otu n'ime abọm ndị a bụ Odu nke 1988, nchịkọta nke egwu ọdịnala Yoruba, nke a họpụtara ya maka Grammy Award nke abụọ wee si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ onye Afrịka mbụ a họpụtara ugboro abụọ maka Grammy

Ewezuga ịbụ onye egwu mba ụwa, Sunny Adé bụkwa onye a ma ama n'obodo ya Naijiria, na-elekọta ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, na-emepụta otu na-enweghị uru a na-akpọ King Sunny Ade Foundation, ma na-arụ ọrụ na Musical Copyright Society of Nigeria
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, egwu hip hop yiri ka ọ na-ejide mgbasa ozi elektrọnik na Naijiria na nnukwu ikuku
Ka o sina dị, mmepụta egwu Sunny Adé anọgidewo na-akpali nnukwu ọgbọ nke ndị egwu Naijiria ndị ọzọ, ndị kwenyere na nnukwu egwu egwu nke Sunny Adée na onye nwụrụ anwụ Fela Kuti maara maka ya
Onye na-agụ egwú Lagbaja bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwu nke egwu Sunny Adé kpaliri

N'afọ 2008, a nabatara onyinye ya na egwu ụwa; ka e nyere ya onyinye maka onyinye ya pụtara ìhè na egwu ụwa na International Reggae na World Music Awards nke emere na Apollo Theater na Harlem, New York
Na mbido njem ọzọ nke United States na Canada, Sunny Adé, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Onye isi oche na mba ya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ na-eleta egwu na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo na Ile-Ife
N'ọnwa Julaị nke otu afọ ahụ, a kpọbatara Eze Sunny Adé n'ime Afrop Hall of Fame, na Brooklyn African Festival na United States
Ọ raara onyinye ahụ nye Michael Jackson
N'afọ 1980, Sunny Adé rụrụ ọrụ ụfọdụ na Hollywood
E gosipụtara egwu ya na ihe nkiri 1983 Breathless, nke Richard Gere na-eme, na ihe nkiri 1986 One More Saturday Night, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri Robert Altman nke 1987 OC
na Stiggs
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Nollywood ole na ole na mbido afọ 2000
Sunny Adé enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye n'oge ọrụ ya
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2016 ọ ghọrọ onye natara onyinye AFRIMA
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016, a kpọbatara ya n'ụlọ nzukọ Hard Rock Cafe
A nabatara ya na Headies Hall of Fame na The Headies 2020 na Febụwarị 2021
King of Boys bụ ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpụ nke Naijiria nke afọ 2018 nke Kemi Adetiba mebere ma duzie ya
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke abụọ Kemi Adetiba duziri nke sochiri The Wedding party
o wehachitekwara njikọta n'etiti Adetiba na Adesua Etomi na Sola Sobowale, mgbe ha rụsịrị ọrụ ọnụ na orụ mmalite ya, The Wedding Party
Ndị ọzọ Sonyere gụnyere Paul Sambo, Osas Ajibade, Toni Tones, Sani Muazu, Demola Adedoyin na Akin Lewis
King of Boys na- akọ akụkọ Alhaja Eniola Salami (nke Sola Sobowale na- mere), nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịmma nke nwere ntụanya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ọdị̀nihu
Ọ tinyere uchu na mmụọ n'ihe gbasara ọchịchị nke bụghachiịri ihe ịma aka n'ihu nyere ihe niile gbara ya gburugburu n'ihi ogo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na-eto eto
Iji pụta na nke a , ntụkwasị obi bụụrụ ya ihe mgbagwoju anya, n'ihe n'amaghị onye ọ ga-ele anya n'ezie, nke a mekwara ya enwéghị mmụọ ebere
Edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri iri kachasị na 2018
Na nyocha nke Pulse Nigeria, Ayomide Tayo dere; 'Maka ebumnuche ya niile imepụta ọmarịcha ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, King of Boys
Ọbụlagodi na oge ihuenyo belatara, ihe nkiri ahụ etozuchaghị ịkọ akụkọ ndụ na oge nke onye omekome '
King of Boys nwetara nde puku narị naira abụọ ka izu asaa gachara na sinima na nde puku narị naịra abụọ na iri anọ na ise n'ozuzu ya
Ihe na-esote bụ, The Return of the King pụtara n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2021 naanị na Netflix dị ka usoro nwere oke akụkụ asaa
Eze ụmụ nwoke Nlaghachite nke Eze bụ usoro ihe nkiri nwere akụkụ asaa naanị
Ọ pụtara n' afọ 2021, ọ bụ Kemi Adetiba duziri ya
Ewepụtara ya na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2021
Ọ pụtara naanị na Netflix dị ka usoro nke ihe nkiri maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mpụ nke Naijiria nke 2018, akpọrọ Eze nke Ụmụ nwoke
Sola Sobowale na Toni Tones rụzigharịrị ọrụ ha dị ka Eniola Salami na Reminisce, Illbliss, Akin Lewis, Osas Ighodaro na Keppy Ekpenyong gosipụtakwa ọrụ ha na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ndị ọzọ soo mee ihe nkiri nke a gụnyere Nse Ikpe-Etim, Richard Mofe Damijo, Efa Iwara, Deyemi Okanlawon na Charly Boy
Usoro a gosipụtara Eniola Salami mgbe ọ lọtara ka ọ nọsịrị afọ ise n'ebe ọgbagara ọsọ
Ọ nweghị afọ ojuju na echiche n'atụmanya nke mmalite ndụ ọhụrụ, ọ malitere ma ga ghachi ngwa ngwa, na-achọ imezi aha ya site na onye ama ama n'eme ihe ọjọọ
Ọ chekwara na oga eme bụrụ onye ezigbo mmadụ nke na etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ziri ezi
Ma'na oge nke a ọchọrọ ọkwa dị elu karịa nke ọchọrọ na mbụ
Àtụ Episode table
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020, ekwuputara na Netflix kwadoro mmepụta nke King of Boys 2 dị ka usoro nke ihe nkiri ime mpụ nke emere n' afọ 2018 site n'aka Kemi Adetiba
E kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ ga- egosi ndị ochie soro n' agba nke mbụ ya na ndị ọhụrụ
E mebere ya mbụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri mana emechara mee ya ka ọdị n' ụdị usoro ihe nyonyo, televishọn
E wepụtara obere ihe ngosi nkeji anọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020
E ji ọnwa atọ wee mee ihe nkiri nke a nke kwụsịrị na ụbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2020
E wepụtara ya n'ozụzụ oke ya na Mọnde, mbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2021
E wepụtara ya naanị na Netflix n'mbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst, n'afọ 2021
Toni Tones jiri usoro ime ihe maka ọrụ ya ka ọwere dị ka Eniola na-eto eto
Ọ ga mụọ asụsụ Yoruba n'ihi ọkwu ya na ihe nkiri nke a dị n'asụsụ ahụ
Ọ bụ Dele Adetiba kụziiri ya ihe nke a
Sola Sobowale nwetara otuto nke ukwuu maka ime ihe nkiri nke ahụ

Na ntụle nke edere na Pulse Nigeria, Precious Nwogu dere Nlọghachi nke Eze' gosipụtara nkwa ya ma gbasie mbọ ike site na nkọwa nke na ezuchaghị oke, nke n'adịghịcha mma na nke ndị soo mee ihe nkiri nke a na adịghịcha oke ụtọ

Isi atụmatụ na-eso asọmpi ịzọ ọchịchị gọvanọ na ọgụ ike nke Eniola na Randles mere ka ihe nkiri nke a doo anya, dị ọhụrụ ma nye aka akụkọ ihe a na egosi di ụtọ na ntị na anya n'usoro ihe omume asaa nile nke ihe nkir ahụ' Onye nyocha maka Culture Custodian kwuru na akụkọ nke dị n'okirikiri Dapo Banjo na ezinụlọ ya dị ogologo ma “karịa akarịa” ebe ụzọ esi wedata akụkọ maka Makanaki dị ka onye ọjọ ala adịghị mma

Onye nyocha ahụ kwubiri na 'N'ikpeazụ, nchere nke echere ka Nlaghachi nke Eze pụta kwesịrị ekwesị!' N' akụkọ ọzọ, onye nyocha sitere n'akụkọ KemiFilani toro Adetiba maka iji ọkụ, onyinyo na iji akụkụ dị iche iche see foto

O kwukwara na 'N'ikpeazụ, ihe ndị a na egosipụta oke ụda ihe nkiri KOB dara; Ana m enye Nlaghachi nke Eze akara narị pasentị' Onye nyocha nke Pulse Nigeria kwuru na Nlaghachi nke Eze ' jiri oke ọkụ dị elu wepụ ya ihe omimi' Otu onye nyocha nke kwuru na ihe nkiri a juputara n' akụkọ nke dị oke ogologo dị ka ọ na -adịkarị na ejiji Nollywood
Onye nyocha maka toro ime ihe nkiri ahụ, na ekwupụta na onweghị 'ihe na -emebiga ihe ókè ma ọ bụ ihe na -adịghị mma' na ya ewepụ Titi Kuti na Charly Boy
Onye nyocha ahụ nyekwara KOB otuto maka isiokwu na mkparịta ụka mana o nyere ọkwa dị ala maka egwu ejiri mee ihe nkiri ahụ, ihe ụfọdụ anya n'ahụ na mmetụta ụda
Michael Joseph Jackson (Önwa asatọ 29, 1958 — Önwa isii 25, 2009) bụ onye Amerikạ na-agụ egwú burukwa onye na-agba egwu
N'ịbụ onye a ghọtara dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu kacha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge niile, ọ bụ onye isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke azụmahịa ngosi na otu n'ime akara ngosi omenala nke narị afọ nke 20
Nke asaa n'ime ezinụlọ nke nwere ụmụaka itoolu, ya na ụmụnne ya bụrụ abụ site na afọ isii wee malite ọrụ ọkachamara na iri na otu na Jackson nke ise, otu ìgwè ya na ụmụnne ya ndị tọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ ka bụ onye otu (rue 1984), ọ malitere ọrụ naanị ya na 1971
Ise n'ime egwu solo ya ewepụtara n'oge ndụ ya so na ọba egwu kacha ewu ewu n'ụwa Off Wall (1979), Thriller (1982), Bad (1987), Dangerous (1991) na HIStory (1995)
Na 1980s, ọ ghọrọ onye isi na egwu pop
A na-eme eserese egwu ya, nnukwu oke na ihe ọhụrụ, dị ka obere ihe nkiri, ọkachasị maka aha Beat It, Billie Jean, Thriller, Bad ma ọ bụ Mpụ dị nro
Ọ kwalitere ọtụtụ usoro ịgba egwu, gụnyere njem ọnwa, nke ghọrọ mbinye aka ya
N'ịbụ onye jikọtara mkpụrụ obi, funk, pop na ụdị egwu egwu, ụdị olu ya na ụdị egwu ya na-aga n'ihu na-emetụta ọtụtụ ndị na-ese hip-hop, pop na r'n'b nke oge a
Aha ya bụ 'Eze Pop', Michael Jackson mebiri ọtụtụ ndekọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ
N'ihe karịrị nde ndekọ 500 rere n'ụwa niileNote 2, ọ nọ n'etiti ndị na-ere ndekọ atọ kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile
N'ịre ahịa nke nde 70 nde, Thriller ka bụ ọba egwu kacha ere na akụkọ egwu wee nweta asambodo platinum ugboro 34 na United States
A maara Michael jackson n'ọhịo ụda maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe mbụ na-eji usoro ahịrị ma ọ bụ usoro nhazi ahịrị
(audio Systeme)

Ọ na-ekerekwa òkè n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere, karịsịa na ọrụ USA maka Africa na Heal The World Foundation (1992), nke e mepụtara na-esochi njem nlegharị anya ụwa dị ize ndụ, ma na-enye aka n'oge ọrụ ya n'ọgụ megide agụụ, obi ọjọọ anụmanụ na mmetọ ụmụaka

Otú ọ dị, akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ndụ onwe ya na-emebi aha ọha ya, karịsịa site n'ọtụtụ nzaghachi ya na ịwa ahụ ịchọ mma, ụdị ndụ ya weere dị ka eccentric, na ọbụna karịa site na mkpesa abụọ maka mmetọ mmekọahụ nke nwatakịrị, na 1993 na 2003, n Otú ọ dị
, na-akpata enweghị ikpe ụlọikpe
Alụmdi na nwunye ya abụọ na ụmụ ya atọ bụkwa ihe esemokwu
Ka ọ na-akwado maka usoro egwu nke a bụ nke a ga-eme na London, Michael Jackson nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 50 site na ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè
E mechara mara onye dibia bekee, bụ́ Conrad Murray ikpe maka igbu mmadụ

Kingdom Bank Africa Limited (KBAL) bụ ụlọ akụ dị na Botswana nke e guzobere n'afọ ndị 1990A mechiri emechi na n'afọ 2015 mgbe achọpụtara; na ụlọ akụ etiti Botswana enweghị ego chọpụtara na ụgwọ ya karịrị akụ ya ihe ruru nde $17 wee wepụrụ akwụkwọ ikike ya
Kingfisher (Todiramphus chloris) bụ kingfisher dị n'etiti nke sitere na ezinụlọ sub Halcyoninae, ndị na egbu azụ n'osisi
A makwaara ya dị ka onye na-akụ azụ̀ na-acha ọcha, kingfisher ojii ma ọ bụ mangroveonye na-akụ azụ̀
O nwere ọtụtụ ebe sitere na Oké Osimiri Uhie gafee ndịda Eshia ruo Polynesia
E kewapụrụ ọtụtụ ụdịdị na ụdịdị otu site na ụdị a gụnyere Pasifik onye na-akụ azụ̀ islet onye na-akụ azụ̀، Torresian onye na-akụ azụ̀, Mariana onye na-akụ azụ̀
Onye France na-amụ banyere ọtụtụ mmadụ bụ Georges-Louis Leclerc, Comte de Buffon kọwara onye na egbu azụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na Histoire Naturelle des Oiseaux na 1780
E gosipụtakwara nnụnụ ahụ na efere aka na acha odo odo nke François-Nicolas Martinet sere na Planches Enluminées D'Histoire Naturelle
E mepụtara nke a n'okpuru nlekọta nke Edme-Louis Daubenton iji soro ederede Buffon
Ma nkọwa efere ma ọ bụ nkọwa Buffon gụnyere aha sayensị mana na 1783 onye Dutch na ahụ maka ihe okike Pieter Boddaert chepụtara aha abụọ Alcedo chloris na katalọgụ ya nke Planches Enluminées
Ụdị obodo ahụ bụ agwaetiti Buru n'ime Indonesia
Ọ bụ onye France na awa ahụ na onye na-ahụ maka ihe okike bụ René Lesson webatara ụdị Todiramphus dị ugbu a n'afọ 1827
Okwu a na akpọ chloris bụ Latin nke oge a maka 'akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ' ma ọ bụ 'akwụkwọ ndụ'
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdịdị n'ụdị ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na agwaetiti site na Oké Osimiri Uhie ruo Polynesia
onye na-akụ azụ̀ nwere olu dị 23 ruo 25 cm (91 ruo 98 in) n'ogologo nke nwoke dị 51 ruo 90 g (18 ruo 32 oz), ebe nke nwanyị dị 54-100 g (19-35 oz )
Ọ dịgasị iche site na acha anụnụ anụnụ ruo akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ n'elu ebe akụkụ dị n'okpuru nwere ike ịdị ọcha ma ọ bụ buff
Enwere olu ọcha gburugburu olu, na-enye nnụnụ aha ya
Agbụrụ ụfọdụ nwere akara ọcha ma ọ bụ buff n'elu anya ebe ndị ọzọ nwere ntụpọ ọcha n'etiti anya na ọnụ
Enwere ike inwe akara ojii site na anya
Nnukwu ọnụ ahụ bụ oji na ntọala odo odo na ala ala
Ụmụ nwanyị na-adịkarị akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ karịa ụmụ nwoke
Nnụnụ ndị na-etozubeghị eto na-adịghị mma karịa ndị okenye nwere akara ojii n'olu na ara
Ọ nwere oku dịgasị iche iche nke dịgasịgasị iche na mpaghara
Ọkpụkpọ a na ahụkarị bụ ụda, siri ike na nke igwe 'kee-kee-kee' nke a na-ekwughachi ọtụtụ ugboro
A na-ahụkarị ya n'ebe ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, ọkachasị n'ọzara mangrove
Ọ na ebikwa n'ala ugbo, ọhịa mepere emepe, ala ahịhịa na ogige
N'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ebe ọ dị, ọkachasị n'àgwàetiti, a pụrụ ịhụ ya n'ime ime obodo, na aga n'ime ọhịa ma ọ bụ n'ime ugwu
Nnụnụ na anọkarị n'elu waya, nkume ma ọ bụ alaka ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Ụdị nke na-apụta n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na Eurasian/Afrika bụ T
abyssinica nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrika, nke a na-ahụ na mpaghara mangroves na Eritrea ma dekọọ ya na Sudan na Somalia
N'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ n'Arebia bụ agbụrụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ T

kalbaensis nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 55 ma ọ bụ karịa; ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na a na-ejedebe ha na Khor Kalba na United Arab Emirates, mana ịzụlite emeela n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Khor Shinas na Oman
Ụdị ndị ọzọ na-apụta na mpaghara gburugburu ụsọ oké osimiri nke India na Bangladesh na Andaman na Nicobar Agwaetiti
Na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia na Indonesia, ụdị ahụ zuru ebe niile ma bụrụ ihe a na-ahụkarị, na eme n'ime ime obodo na mpaghara ụfọdụ

Obere crabs na shrimps bụ nri kachasị amasị n'ógbè ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri mana a na-eri ọtụtụ anụmanụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere ụmụ ahụhụ (gụnyere ụmụ ahụhụ, cicadas, ụmụ ahụhụ mkpisi ahụhụ, igurube, ụkpara na urukurubụba), ududo, earthworms, ejula, frogs, ngwere, obere agwọ, obere azụ, na mgbe ụfọdụ obere nnụnụ na òké
Onye na-akụ azụ̀ na-anọ n'olu na-anọkarị n'otu ebe ruo ogologo oge na-echere anụ oriri
Mgbe ọ hụrụ ihe ọ na-agbadata iji jide ya wee fepụ laghachi n'ebe a na-etinye ihe ndị buru ibu na alaka ahụ iji merie ha
A na-agbanye ihe ọ bụla a na-apụghị ịgbari agbari dị ka pellet
Alaka bụ oghere, ma ọ bụ oghere osisi sitere n'okike ma ọ bụ ọgba nke nnụnụ n'onwe ha gwuru n'osisi rere ure, akwukwo ahịhịa ma ọ bụ ala
Ha ga ebikwa n'oghere ochie nke osisi nkụ
A na etinye àkwá abụọ ruo ise gbara gburugburu, na-acha ọcha n'ala nke ọgba ahụ n'enweghị ihe eji eme akwụ́
Nne na nna abụọ na ekere òkè n'ịkụ àkwá na inye ụmụ ọkụkọ nri

Kings Tower (nke bụbu Kingsway Tower) bụ ụlọ elu nwere okpukpu iri na ise nke a na-eji eme ihe dị iche iche nke dị na njikọ na Alfred Rewane Road, Ikoyi, Lagos
Ọ bụ ndị South African architects SAOTA mepụtara ya ma Sky View Towers Limited mepụtara ya

Ụlọ ahụ nwere okpukpu iri na abụọ nke oghere ọfịs na-agafe ihe karịrị 14,827 m2 (159,600 sq ft), okpukpu abụọ nke ogige mkpọsa na-ekpuchi ihe dịka 1,545 m2 (16,630 ft) (ngụkọta ebe nke 32,800 m2 (353,000 ft), ala na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala (atọ n'elu ọkwa na otu n'okpuru ọkwa) maka ihe dị ka ụgbọala narị atọ na ịrị anọ na atọ
Ihe owuwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na kọfị

Kingsley Nkemjika Abasili bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Kingsley Abasili
A makwaara ya dị ka onye yiri onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Pete Edochie
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri abụọ a bụ ndị Anambra steeti mana ha abụghị ndị si ofu ezinụlọ
Kingsley bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri gosiputara na ihe nkiri ọtụtụ nke ihe nkiri Nollywood
Kingsley sitere obodo n'Igbo-Ukwu, dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Aguata nke Anambra Steeti na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Amụrụ ya na Makurdi, Benue State, Nigeria
Kingsley Abasili na-eme ncheta ọmụmụ ya na Junu 30th, nke afọ ọ bụla
Kingsley bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri gosiputara na ihe nkiri ọtụtụ nke ihe nkiri Nollywood
O nwere nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa ọha, na mahadum Ebonyi State University, Abakaliki

Na March 25th, 2017 ọ kpọkọtara ya na ndị ọzọ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke Political na Adminstrative Studies- International Relations, (Master's Degree), ngalabaSocial Sciences, University of Port Harcourt, Rivers State
N'afọ 2019, kingsley dọtara ndị mgbasa ozi maka myirịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Pete Edochie
Abasili dị ka pete Edochie nke na-eto eto wee kpọọ ya Onye yiri Pete Edochie na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọma
N'ikpeazụ, Kingsley sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria n'otu afọ wee soro ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood dị ka Gentle Jack, Emmanuel Ehumadu a maara dị ka Labistar, na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na Try Me dị ka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mark Angel's nkenkee nto ọchị yana Dominion Uche na ndị ọzọ

Akpọrọ ya òkù na mmemme Akaraka dị ka ọbịa wee nye ya onyinye nkwanye ùgwù site n'aka Anambra Through a Lens, na 2020 ya na ndị ọzọ natara; Onye ukwu Odeakwụkwọ mgbasa nke Gọvanọ Anambra steeti, Sir James Eze na ndị ọzọ
