Ayogu Kingsley Ifeanyichukwu bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke a maara maka ụdị hyperrealist ya

A mụrụ ya na Enugu, akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, Ayogu malitere inwe mmasị n'ihe gbasara eserese na nka site na nwata, mmasị a mere ka ọ mụọ eserese na Enugu State College of Education (Technical)
Otu onye nnyocha kọwara ọrụ Ayogu dị ka nke nwere 'nkọwa dị egwu, nke yiri oghere' nke na-egosi 'ọnọdụ nwere ọtụtụ mmetụta uche egosipụtara site na anya mmiri, obi nkoropụ na mmekọrịta
A na-amanye onye na-ekiri ihe nkiri ya inwe mmetụta nke njikọ na eserese ndị ahụ
N'otu isiokwu na Guardian Newspaper, a kọwara nka ya dị ka 'ihe dị egwu, nke ga-eme ka ị na-eche na ị nwere ike imetụ ha aka'
Kingsley Ben-Adir (amụrụ na 28 Febụwarị 1986) bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ụlọ ihe nkiri London
N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara dị ka Malcolm X na ihe nkiri Amazon Studios One Night in Miami
A mụrụ Ben-Adir na Gospel Oak, London, England, n'aka nne oji Trinidad na nna ọcha British
Ọ gara William Ellis Skull
na Gospel Oak, Northwest London
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Guildhall School of Music and Drama na 2011
N'afọ 2011, Ben-Adir rụrụ ọrụ na Gillian Slovo's critical acclaimed play The Riots at the Tricycle Theatre N'afọ 2012, O mere Demetrius na A Midsummer Night's Dream na Regent's Park Open Air Theatre
N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Borachio na mmepụta Mark Rylance nke Much Ado About Nothing na Old Vic na London ma rụọkwa ọrụ na God's Property na Soho Theatre

N'afọ 2014, Ben-Adir rụrụ ọrụ n'egwuregwu We Are Proud to Presentation About the Herero of Namibia, nke a maara dị ka Southwest Africa, From the German Sudwestafrika, Between the Years 1884-1915 na Bush Theatre na London
N'afọ 2020, Ben-Adir gosipụtara dị ka Malcolm X na ihe nkiri Amazon Studios One Night in Miami
nke Regina King duziri
Ben-Adir so Eli Goree (Cassius Clay), Leslie Odom Jr
(Sam Cooke), na Aldis Hodge (Jim Brown) mee ihe nkiri
Na Machị 2021, Deadline Hollywood kọrọ na Ben-Adir sonyeere usoro Secret Invasion maka Marvel Studios dị ka onye isi ọjọọ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, Ben-Adir setịpụrụ ka ọ bụrụ Bob Marley na ihe nkiri ya na-enweghị aha nke Reinaldo Marcus Green duziri
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Barbie

Kingsley Ogoro bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria a ma ama, onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na egwu, na onye na-agba egwú n'oge gara aga, nke a maara nke ọma maka ihe nkiri a ma ama Osuofia na London nke 2003 nke ya na Nkem Owoh rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood kemgbe afọ 2003 dịka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Kingsley Sambo (1936–1977) bụ onye Rhodesian na-ete ihe na onye na-ese ihe osise
A mụrụ Sambo na obodi Rusape, ebe ọ biri ruo mgbe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi Cyrene Mission na ngwụsị afọ 1950
Ọ natara ọzụzụ nka n'ebe ahụ n'okpuru Sam Songo na Canon Edward (Ned) Paterson
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na Malawi
N'afọ 1959, ọ laghachiri Cyrene, ebe ọ kụziri nka otu afọ
N'afọ 1960, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe osise maka Daily News na Salisbury, nke nwere ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ n'Afrịka
N'otu oge na Salisbury, ọ sonyeere Frank McEwen's Workshop School, ebe ọ natara ọzụzụ eserese ọzọ
Site na mbido na Salisbury, o gosipụtara na asọmpi kwa afọ na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ McEwen haziri
N'izere nzụlite ozi ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmanụ ma họrọ igosi ihe nkiri obodo
Dị ka onye na-akpọ egwu jazz nke na-akpọ egwu mgbe niile na obodo shebeens, ọ na-egosipụtakarị ọnọdụ nnọkọ obodo mepere emepe
Ihe osise ndị a si n'eziokwu kwụ ọtọ pụọ, e jikwa akara na agba ha tụnyere Oskar Kokoschka
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na Daily News were afọ anọ ruo mgbe a machibidoro akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ iwu
N'afọ 1965, onye bụbu onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Cyrene, Ned Paterson, goro Sambo dị ka onye nkuzi nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ Nyarutsetso na Salisbury
N'ụzọ dị mwute, alụmdi na nwunye dị n'etiti onye ozi ala ọzọ oge ochie na Sambo na-ebi ndụ ngwa ngwa adịteghị aka
Sambo, na-anọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Job Kekana na Rusape, malitere ịse ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị nudes site na iji ihe nlereanya dị ndụ ndị e goro n'ebe ahụ
Paterson, onye ihere, chụrụ Sambo, onye na-enwetụbeghị ọrụ oge niile ọzọ
Site na ngwụcha afọ 1960 gaa n'ihu, Sambo rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa nna ya na Rusape
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị aha ọma site n'ọtụtụ ihe osise dị egwu nke e sere na ụlọ mmanya dị iche iche na mpaghara Salisbury, ọtụtụ ndị na-azụ ahịa White gbakọrọ n'ụlọ ahịa nna ya ịzụta ọrụ ya
N'ihi enyo enyo nke esemokwu nnwere onwe Chimurenga na-aga n'ihu kpatara, a na-enyo Sambo enyo na ọ bụ onye na-ere ahịa
N'ikpeazụ, ndị otu ZANU mebiri ụgbọala egwuregwu ya n'afọ 1977, nke butere ọnwụ ya na mberede
Ihe osise Sambo dị na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe na ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwe

Kingunge Ngombaleño (30 Mee 1930 2 Febụwarị 2018) bụ ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania, Ónyé nwụrụ ná 2 Febụwarị 2018
Á na-ewere Kingunge dị kà ọtụ n'ime ndị enyi na-atachi obi ná àjà màkà nwèrè onwé nkè Tanganyika (Tanzania Mainland), United Republic of Tanzania

Kingunge bụ ónyé ọtú na-arụsi ọrụ ike nà ónyé ndú ná Tanganyika African National Union (Tanu), otú ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nkè lụrụ ọgụ mà nweta nnwere onwé nkè Tanganyika ná Disemba 9, 1961, Kingunge sokwa n'etiti ndị ịsị ná usoro nke isonyere Tanu ná Afro Shiraz Party (ASP) nkè Zanzibar iji guzobe Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na Febụwarị 5, 1977
N'echiche, Kingunge bụ onye Kọmunist nwèrè ịnụ ọkụ n'obi mà nọgide na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi ná echiche ahụ rụọ mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Kingunge bụ Marxian (Marxian Class Theory), ná nsonaazụ nkè ná ọ kwenyeghị n'okpukpe, ọ bụ ezie ná ọ na-akwanyere okpukpe niile ùgwù
Kingunge rụrụ ọrụ ogologo oge ná Gọọmentị Tanzania ná Tanu tupu CCM, otú n'ime ìhè nnọchianya nkè Kingunge bụ ìhè nlereanya yá nkè ịṅụ iyi n'ejighị akwụkwọ Holly ọ bụla, ma Bible mà ọ bụ kor'an
Site n'oge ruo n'oge, Kingunge ṅụrụ iyi site n'iji Íwú Tanzania maka ọkwa gọọmentị niile ọ jere ozi
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ dị kà onyé ịsị nkè CCM gasịrị, NgombaleʹMwiru hapụrụ pati ahụ ná mberede ná 2015
kinshasa bụ obodo kacha ibu na Kongo
Kintu Florence nke a makwaara dị ka Kintu Florence Tumwine (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda

Ọ bụ nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu na-anọchite anya National Resistance Movement na ndị omebe iwu nke itoolu nke Uganda, Kalungu DistrictKintu Florence makwaara dị ka Kintu Florence Tumwine (amụrụ 3 Eprel 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị onye nnọchi anya nzuko omeiwu maka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na nzuko omeiwu nke itoolu nke Uganda, Mpaghara Kalungu
Kintu jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche na-anọchite anya Kalungu District tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ omebe iwu dị ka nwanyị omebe iwu ya wee hapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2016 iji lekwasị anya na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị asọmpi asatọ gosipụtara mmasị ịnọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM) National Vice Chairperson Western Region position
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị gosipụtara mmasị gụnyere onye bụbu ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ndị agha Col (Rtd) Shaban Bantariza, Dr
Emmanuel Diini Kisembo, onye bụbu onye omeiwu Busongora South Boaz Kafunda na ndị ọzọ
O meriri Matayo Kyaligonza na ntuli aka NRM maka ọkwa osote onyeisi oche mgbe ọ họọrọ ụdị nhọpụta site n'ọfịs NRM Electoral Commission na July 20, 2020
Na Machị 2022, a nabatara ya dị ka Onye isi oche Kọmitii Gọọmentị Obodo na Ọrụ Ọha

Florence onye jere ozi dị ka minista nke ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị Obundhingiya Bwa Bwamba maka njem nleta na mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ, gbara arụkwaghịm na 2020 iji lekwasị anya na nkwado udo na mpaghara Rwenzori mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka minisita ọdịbendị ruo afọ atọ
Kintu degaara praịm minista ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akwụkwọ ozi ọ gbara arụkwaghịm
Ọ bụ onye isi oche mpaghara nke Rwenzori Women Peace Forum nke na-elekwasị anya na mpaghara ndị esemokwu agbụrụ metụtara
Margaret Ntambaazi na Janat Nassiwa mere mkpesa megide Kintu na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu
Ha kwuru na Kintu enweghị asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Ordinary na Advanced
Otú ọ dị, Justice Elizabeth Musoke jụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa ntuli aka ahụ n'ihi na enweghị ihe akaebe siri ike iji gosi na e mebiri akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Kintu
Mgbe ha nọ n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu, Caleb Alaka, Samuel Muyizzi, Ben Ikilai, na Julius Galisonga nọchitere anya Ntambaazi na Nassiwa, ebe Geoffrey Kandeebe nọchitere aha Kintu na Electoral Commission
Ntambaazi na Nassiwa kwere nkwa ime mkpesa megide mkpebi ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Kintu ruru eru zuru oke ma dị mma ka a họpụta ya dịka Justice Elizabeth Musoke na-achị

Kipsigis (ma ọ bụ Kipsikii, Kipsikiis) bụ akụkụ nke ụyọkọ oluma Kalenjin nke Kenya,a na-asụkarị ya na mpaghara Kericho na Bomet na Kenya
Ndị Kipsigis bụ ebo kachasị nke Kalenjin na Kenya, na-aza 60% nke ndị na-asụKalenjin
Kipsigis nwere njikọ chiri anya na Nandi, Keiyo (Keyo, Elgeyo), South Tugen (Tuken), na Cherangany
Ndị Maasai gbara ókèala Kipsigis n'ebe ndịda na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ
N'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, a na-asụ Gusii (asụsụ Bantu)
N'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, a na-ahụ ndị Kalenjin ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị Nandi
East site na Kipsigis, n'ime oke ọhịa Mau, na-ebi ụfọdụ ebo Okiek na-asụOkiek bi
Asụsụ Kipsigis nwere ụda ụdaume nwere ogologo abụọ
Mgbe a na-ekwu okwu, otu udaume na-enwe obere ụda nke ụdaume ahụ ebe mbịgharị ụdaume na-egosi ụda ụdaume ahụ tolitere
Ọtụtụ aha ndị a na-asụkarị n'asụsụ Kipsigis na-eji consonant ejedebe mgbe aha nkịtị ji ụdaume mechie, ọ ga-abụ'a' ma ọ bụ 'o'
Aha kwesịrị ekwesị dị ka aha ebe na ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịkwụsị na ụdaume ọ bụla
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, ịkpọpụta ụdaume abụọ apụtaghị ikwughachi ụdaume ahụ kama ọ bụ ịgbatị ụdaume ahụ
Otu ihe dị iche na mkpokọta ahụ na-egosi na 'ee' abụọ
Dị ka o kwesịrị, ụda ụdaume dị ogologo na-agbaso ụdaume Latin

Kira Lynn Harris (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na-agwakọta mgbasa ozi nke bi ma na-akụzi ugbu a na New York City
A mụrụ Kira Lynn Harris na 1963 na Los Angeles, California
Harris nwetara BA ya na Studio Art na Mahadum California na Santa Cruz, wee nwéta MFA ya na Art na California Institute of the Arts na 1998

Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na nke otu na United States, Italy, Canada, na South Africa, Harris arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Studio Museum na Harlem (2002), Center for Photography na Woodstock (2004), St
Mary's College of Maryland (2005), Omi International Art Center, Lower Manhattan Cultural Council, na Delaware Center for Contemporary Art (2006)
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ gallery, gụnyere MoMA PS1, Miami Art Museum, Bruno Marina Gallery, na Delaware Center for the Contemporary Arts
O sonyere na ihe ngosi ndị a Blues for Smoke (MoCA na Whitney Museum), Black Light (White Noise Contemporary Art Museum na Freestyle Studio Museum Harlem)
Her work has been reviewed in The New York Times, Time Out New York, and the Los Angeles Times, among others

Critics have described her work as 'minimal,' making use of installation, drawing, photography, and video to express 'formal concerns of space, light and the phenomenological with issues of individual subjectivity' She has also made use of reflective surfaces like mirror or silver leaf to highlight the architecture of space
Of her work, Harris explains, 'My projects often provide a disorienting encounter for the viewer in my installations I am concerned with destabilization and re-orientation

To achieve this I often create architectural and environmental interventions – by using light and reflective surfaces; by inverting subject and object or figure and ground; and/or by reversing up and down, exterior and interior'
Harris ekwuola na ndị na-ese ihe dị ka James Turrell, Mark Rothko, na ndị na'ese ihe Hudson River School nwere mmetụta n'ọrụ ya
Ọ kọwakwara, sị, 'Ọtụtụ mmasị m n'ìhè sitere na Los Angeles, ebe ìhè dị ebe niile
Ị nwèrè nnukwu mbárá ìgwè ndị a'
O kwukwara na akụkọ sayensị, yana ihe nkírí na obodo dị ka Metropolis na Mad Max dị ka mmetụta
N'afọ 1998, Harris ritere ihe Nríte Lorser Feitelson Emerging Artist
N'afọ 2003, o ritere onyinye mmepụta vidiyo nke Harvestworks
Harris bi ugbu a na New York City, New York ma na-akụziri ma ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji nka
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na Ngalaba nka na egwu na John Jay College, yana akụkụ nkè Faculty Art na Nightingale-Bamford School
Kiran Shah (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1956) bụ onye Kenya-Indian na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi
A mụrụ Shah na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ biri na Kenya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara India
Mgbe ọ bi na India, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ihe nkiri, mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara Feltham, ọ malitere itinye aka na azụmahịa ngosi
Mgbe onye nhazi ihe nkiri Bob Anderson gwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ, ọrụ ya malitere
Shah rụrụ ọrụ Bolum na The People That Time Forgot (1977)
Shah na-enwekarị mgbagwoju anya na Deep Roy; ha abụọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Kenya amụrụ na Nairobi nke sitere na India bụ ndị malitere na ihe nkiri na telivishọn na ngwụsị afọ 1970
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mkpụmkpụ n'ụwa dịka Guinness World Records si kwuo
Ọ pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri iri atọ na otu; na iri atọ na asaa dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ okpukpu abụọ

Ọ nọwo na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-ewu ewu kemgbe, dịka Superman (1978), Superman II (1980), Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981), The Dark Crystal (1982), Return of the Jedi (1983), Legend (1985), Aliens (1986), The Sign of Four (1987), Bullseye! (1990), Braveheart (1995), na Titanic (1997) ebe ọ na-eme ka ụmụaka niile nọ na ihe nkiri ahụ okpukpu abụọ
Ọ pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ onye na-eguzo na The Lord of the Rings na usoro ihe nkiri Hobbit
Ọ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ okpukpu abụọ maka Elijah Wood dịka Frodo, ọ bụ ezie na ọ okpukpu abụọ maka ndị isi hobbits ndị ọzọ niile, ọ bụ naanị ọnụ ọgụgụ okpukpu abụọ nwere ike ịme ihe nkiri

O mere Bilbo Baggins okpukpu abụọ dịka Martin Freeman (na Hobbit An Unexpected Journey, The Hobbit The Desolation of Smaug, na Hobbit The Battle of the Five Armies) na Ian Holm (The Lord of the Rings The Fellowship of the Ring)
Ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-eme ihe nkiri atọ na-eme ihe nkiri Hobbit
Ọrụ ya kachasị pụta ìhè bụ The Chronicles of Narnia The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, ebe ọ rụrụ Ginarrbrik
O gosikwara onye agwaetiti Andaman na ihe nkiri Sherlock Holmes The Sign of Four, na anụ ọhịa ahụ nke si na eserese pụta ma wakpo Natasha Richardson na ihe nkiri afọ 1986 Gothic
Na mgbakwunye na okpukpu abụọ maka Martin Freeman dịka Bilbo na Hobbit An Unexpected Journey, ọ pụtakwara dị ka Goblin Scribe
Shah pụtara dịka onye omimi na Steven Moffat dere 'Listen', ihe omume nke anọ nke usoro nke asatọ nke Doctor Who, yana ihe omume 2 nke usoro 10 dka Emojibot 1 na 'Smile'
Shah pụtara na 2015 Star Wars The Force Awakens, dịka Teedo, obere onye na-eme ihe ike nke na-agagharị na mbara ala Jakku na Luggabeast ya
Na mgbakwunye na ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Kiran bụkwa onye na-ede uri
E bipụtara uri ya na Great Britain na United States, ma dabere na echiche ya, mmetụta ya, na ahụmịhe ya

Kirfi bụ mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Bauchi, Naijiria, na mpaghara Gombe steeti n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Kirfi (ma ọ bụ Kirfin Kasa)
Ahịrị ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke nha nha na latitiudu na ogologo na-agafe LGA
Ọ nwere mpaghara 2,371 km2 na onu ogugu Mmadu nke 147,618 na ngụkọ 2006
Ndị agbụrụ kacha n'ebe ahụ bụ ndị Hausa
A na- asụkwa asụsụ Bure na LGA
Kirikiri Maximum Security Prison bụ ụlọ mkpọrọ dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Apapa, Lagos State, Nigeria
A na-akpọ ya aha ime obodo Kirikiri nke ọ dị na ya
Akụkụ nke Ngalaba Naịjirịa Correctional Service
O nwere ike irite ndị mkpọrọ dị otu puku na ịrị ịse na isii
E guzobere ya na 1955
Paul Chiama nke Leadership dere na 'Nkwupụta nke Kirikiri na-echetara onye Naijiria ọ bụla nke' ụlọ mkpọrọ a
Ka ọ na-erule Febụwarị 1, 1990 e kwụrụ na ọ ga na-erite ndị mkpọrọ narị itoolu na ịrị ise na isii mana ọ nwere ndị mkpọrọ otú pụkụ na narị isii na ịrị anọ na ise n'oge ahu
Na Maachị 2018, United Kingdom kwupụtara na ọ ga-emefu $939,000 iji wuo nku ọhụrụ nke nwere àkwà ndina otu narị na iri na abụọ iji mee ka ọ dịrị ndị mkpọrọ Naijiria mfe ịkwaga site na UK
A na-ejide ụfọdụ ndị mkpọrọ nọ n'ọnụ ọnwụ na Kirikiri
E wuru Ụlọ Mkpọrọ a dị na Kirikiri n'afọ 1955
Na mgbe e wusiri ya, e kwụrụ na ọ ga na-erite ndị mkpọrọ otú pụkụ na ịrị ise na isii
Ka ọ na-erule Febụwarị 12, 2018, pasent ịrị isii na itoolu nke ndị bi n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ bụ ndị mkpọrọ na-echere ikpe dịka data sitere na Ngalaba Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Naịjirịa si kwuo
Ruo n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021 na Kirikiri Maximum Security Prison, a na-enye ndị mkpọrọ nri ₦450 kwa ụbọchị (ihe dị ka US $108 ka ọ na-erule Mee 2022)
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021, Kọmitii Senate na Interior mụbara nri kwa ụbọchị ruo 1000 naira (ihe dị ka $241 na Mee afọ 2022)
Ndị ọrụ nke Ngalaba Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka Correctional Service tụrụ aro ka a kwụọ ụgwọ ₦750 kwa ụbọchị, mana Kọmitii Senate kwuru na ego a 'ezughị oke'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Vanguard na Mee 2022, otu onye mkpọrọ rịọrọ ka a ghara ịmata ya kwuru na nri ndị a na-eri na Kirikiri bụ 'ndị ogbenye na ndị jọgburu onwe ha'
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, site n'aka onye mkpọrọ a na-akpọghị aha, nri ụtụtụ na-agụnye naanị agwa a na-esighị esi kwa ụtụtụ, ụbọchị asaa n'izu

Onye mkpọrọ ahụ a na-akpọghị aha kọwakwara mmụba nke nri a na-enye kwa ụbọchị dị ka 'agha ụgha niile', na-ekwu, ị kwesịrị ịbịa hụ ya iji mara kpọmkwem ihe m na-ekwu maka ya' na 'bịara hụ nri jọgburu onwe ya! Ọ na-akawanye njọ'

Onye mkpọrọ ọzọ a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ maka akụkọ Vanguard nke Mee 2002 kwuru na 'ọbụna nkịta agụụ na-agu ga-ajụ nri ha na-enye anyị', nakwa na ụfọdụ ndị mkpọrọ na-adabere n'inwe ike isi nri n'ime ụlọ mkpọrọ nke ha maka ihe oriri
Enwere ike ịzụta nri ndị mkpọrọ na-esi nri n'ime ụlọ mkpọrọ ha site n'aka onye ọrụ ọdịmma ụlọ mkpọrọ, ụfọdụ ndị mkpọrọ nwekwara stovu kerosene maka isi nri
Onye mkpọrọ ọzọ kwuru na ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ nwere ngalaba 'VIP' dị iche, ebe ndị mkpọrọ nwere onye na-esi nri nke ha, onye na-asa uwe, ndị na-eziga ọrụ na ihe na-enye ọkụ eletrik

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, onye na-ekwuchitere ụlọ mkpọrọ Lagos State gọrọ nkwupụta na ndị mkpọrọ ka na-enweta naanị ₦450 nke nri kwa ụbọchị, na-ekwu, 'enwere nyocha nke nri dịka ekwuru na Iwu Ụlọ Mkpọrọ nke Naịjirịa nke 2019
E nyochara ndokwa mbụ nke ₦450 gaa n'elu mana ejighị m n'aka na o ruru ₦1000
Aghaghị m ịgwa gị na gbasara nri n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, enwere ihe anyị na-eji maka nri ọ bụla maka ndị mkpọrọ

' N'adịghị ka nkwupụta a, onye isi ụlọ mkpọrọ nke rịọrọ ka a ghara ịkpọ aha kwuru na 'ọ dịghị ihe gbanwere n'ihe gbasara inye ndị mkpọrọ nri na mba ahụ' nakwa na 'ọ nweghị ihe gbanwere ebe a n'ihe banyere ogo na oke nri ndị mkpọrọ na-eri
Ọ ka bụ ihe na-eme mgbe niile na ofe egusi, agwa na osikapa
' Onye isi ọrụ ahụ kwukwara na 'naanị ụzọ ndị mkpọrọ si lanarị bụ site n'inye nri nke ha'
Mgbawa tankị Kirikiri bụ mgbawa tankị nke mere na Kirikiri, Apapa, nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke obodo Lagos State, Nigeria, nke dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Lagos Island
A kọrọ na ihe omume ahụ mere na 7 Jenụwarị 2014 mgbe tankị bu ihe dị ka lita pụkụ ịrị atọ na atọ nke mmanụ ụgbọala kụrụ n'ụgbọala ndị a kwụsịrị
Mgbasa mmanụ ụgbọala ahụ kpatara mgbawa nke gburu ihe dị ka mmadụ iri na ise, na-ahapụ ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu
Ụlọ akụ Sterling metụtara, otu Automated Teller Machine, ụgbọala ịrị na otu na ụlọ ahịa ịrị isii gbara ọkụ
Onye na-ekwuchitere National Emergency Management Agency nke South-West Zone, Ibrahim Farinloye kwupụtara ihe merenụ
Kiripi Katembo, nke a makwaara dị ka Kiripi Katembō Siku, (Jụn 20, 1979 ruo Ọgọọst 5, 2015) bụ onye Congo na-ese foto, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe
Ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke Mutotu Productions, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri ya, na onye isi nchịk nke Yango Biennale, nke dị na Kinshasa
A mụrụ Katembo na Jụn 20, afọ 1979, na Goma, Zaire (nke bụ Democratic Republic of the Congo ugbu a)
Ọ gara Académie des Beaux-Arts na Kinshasa
Katembo, onye a ma ama na-ese foto na Congo, bụ onye a maara nke ọma maka usoro ya, Un regard, nke e wepụtara na 2009
Ihe ngosi ahụ jiri usoro foto a na-akpọ mirroring
Na Un regard, Katembo sere foto ndị ọ na-ese site na ijide ihe ha na-ese n'ime mmiri dị n'okporo ámá Kinshasa
Katembo kọwara ebumnuche ya maka Un regard n'ajụjụ ọnụ, 'Foto na-enyekwa ụzọ ịhụ ihe karịrị echiche ka ọ na-emeghe windo abụ na ụwa ọzọ, ụwa m bi na ya
Achọrọ m ka ihe oyiyi ọ bụla kọọ banyere ụmụaka a mụrụ ebe a ndị ga-etolite gburugburu ọdọ mmiri mmiri, na ezinụlọ ndị na-adị ndụ mgbe ndị ọzọ na-aga ibi na mba ọzọ
Nye m, nke a bụ otu ụzọ isi mee mkpọsa maka gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma na iji foto katọọ ihe ndị bi na Kinshasa na-ahụ dị ka akara aka'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2015 ya na Jenny Stevens nke The Guardian, Katembo kọwakwara na ndị Congo, gụnyere ndị Kinshasai, anaghị amasị ka e were foto ahụ, na-ekwu na onye na-ese foto ga-arịọkarị maka ikike
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe mere Kitembo ji jiri ihe ngosi nke ọdọ mmiri mee ihe na Un regard, na-ekwu 'Ọ bụ ya mere m ji malite ịse foto na-atụgharị uche na ọ bụ ụzọ iji dekọọ ndị mmadụ na-eme ndụ ha'
E gosipụtara ọrụ Katembo na Bamako Encounters, Royal Museum for Central Africa, Centre for Fine Arts, Brussels, na TAZ na Ostend, Belgium
Foto sitere na nchịkọta Un regard gosipụtara dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi 'Beauté Congo -1926- 2015 -Congo Kitoko' na Foundation Cartier na Paris n'oge ọnwụ ya na 2015
O mekwara ihe ngosi gọọmentị maka 67th Festival d'Avignon na 2013
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Yebela, otu nka na Kinshasa
Katembo mere ihe nkiri ya nke nkeji asaa na 2008, ihe nkiri dijitalụ dị mkpirikpi, Cardboard Car Film, nke na-enyocha Kinshasa na ndị ya, na ekwentị mkpanaaka
O guzobere Mutotu Productions ma bụrụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'okpuru Katembo, Mutotu Productions mepụtara Atalaku, nke Dieudo Hamadi duziri, nke meriri ihe nkiri kachasị mma na mmemme Cinema du Reel nke Centre Georges Pompidou na 2013
Ya na Hamadi na Divita Wa Lusala jikọrọ aka iduzi ihe nkiri nke afọ 2010, Congo in Four Acts, nke ritere ihe nrite na Africa Movie Academy Awards na Cinéma du Réel film festival na 2010
Katembo rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ osote onye nduzi na 2010 Congolese crime thriller, Viva Riva!, nke Djo Tunda Wa Munga duziri
Katembo bụkwa osote onye nduzi ihe nkiri Canada, War Witch (2012), nke Kim Nguyen duziri
War Witch nwetara nhọpụta maka Best Foreign Language Film category na 85th Academy Awards
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri Katembo na Berlin International Film Festival, Carthage Film Festival, International Documentary Film Festival Amsterdam, na Toronto International Film Festival
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke Yango Biennale, mmemme ihe nkiri nke emere na Kinshasa
Kiripi Katembo nwụrụ site na ịba ụbụrụ na Kinshasa n'Ọgọọst 5, 2015, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii
Kirsten Miller (amụrụ na afo 1973) bụ onye edemede America na onye okike nke usoro akwụkwọ Kiki Strike
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya na usoro, Kiki Strike Inside the Shadow City, pụtara na afo 2006
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ na usoro, The Empress's Tomb, pụtara na October afo 2007
Usoro a na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Kiki Strike, Ananka Fishbein na ndị enyi ha na New York City

N'afọ 2001, ọnụ ụlọ dị n'ihu nke ebe a na-elekọta ndị agadi Manhattan dara iji kpughee ọnụ ụlọ dị n'okpuru ala, na-enye Kirsten echiche maka akwụkwọ mbụ, nke edobere na tunnels na ọnụ ụlọ dị n'okpuru obodo ahụ
O kere Kiki Strike and the Irregulars (aha ya Sherlock Holmes ' Baker Street Irregulars ) iji nyochaa ụzọ nzuzo ndị a
Akwụkwọ nke mbụ n’ime usoro ya ndị ọzọ, Ndị Ebighị Ebi, ka ewepụtara Ọgọst 10, 2010
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke usoro ụmụaka nwere akwụkwọ atọ na Jason Segel aha ya bụ Nightmares!, nke e wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 2014
Kirsten Miller bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City

A na-ahụkwa aha nna ahụ n'etiti ndị Kikuyu na Kenya mana n'ókè dị ala ma e jiri ya tụnyere Uganda ln Lineage
Tụkwasị na nke a, e nwere ebe dị na mpaghara Nyeri nke nwere otu aha ahụ ma ọ dị gburugburu mpaghara Kutus / Kirinyaga
N'oge a, a maghị ma ọ bụrụ na enwere njikọ nna nna n'etiti ndị Uganda na ndị Kenya
Otú ọ dị, a ga-ekwukwa na obodo ndị nwere aha a sitere na Bantu ma enwere data akụkọ ihe mere eme nke na-egosi na e nwere alụmdi na nwunye n'etiti obodo abụọ ahụ tupu na / ma ọ bụ n'oge ọchịchị

Kisra (nke a na-akpọkwa I kissra) bụ achịcha dị nro a na-eme na Obodo Chad, Sudan ya na South Sudan
A na-eji durra maọbụ ọka wit eme ya
E nwere ụdị kisra abụọ dị iche iche mpempe akwụkwọ e siri esi, nke a maara dịka kisra rhaheeefa, nke yiri injera; na ntụ ọka a maara dịka kisra aseeda maọbụ aceda
A na-ejikarị anụ na akwụkwọ nri eme ihe, dịka mullah
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1995, mba Sudan nke a na-ekewaghị n'oge ahụ na-eri ihe dịka 20,000 ruo 30,000 obere ọn (18,000 ruo 27,000 t) nke ntụ ọka sorghum kwa afọ na Obodo kisra

Kitcha (Tigrinya ቂቻ, kitta Amharic ቂጣ), (Oromo 'chachebsa'), bụ achịcha na-enweghị na-eko achịcha nke ndị obodo Etiopia na Eritrea
A na-ejikarị ntụ ọka wit, mmiri, na nnu eme ya
A na-esi ya n'ụdị efere na-ekpo ọkụ ruo mgbe a na-esi otu akụkụ
A na-eburu ya ma sie ya n'akụkụ nke ọzọ
A na-ahụkarị obere ọkụ n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla
Kitcha ga-ewere ọdịdị nke pan ebe a na-esi ya (dị ka pancake, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị njikọ)
A na-eri ya ugboro ugboro na nri a na-akpọ kitcha fit-fit
Kitenge bụ aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Kitfo (Amharic ክትፎ, IPA ), bụ nri ọdịnala ndị obodo Etiopia nke malitere n'etiti ndị Gurage
Ọ na-agụnye anụ ehi a na-egweri egweri, nke a na-etinye na mitmita nkwakọta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke chili) na niter kibbeh (mmanụ a na-eme ka ọ dị ọcha nke e tinyere ahịhịa na ihe na-atọ ụtọ)
Okwu a sitere na mgbọrọgwụ ndị Ethio-Semitic k-t-f, nke pụtara 'ịkpụcha nke ọma; dị gịrịgịrị'
Kitfo siri esi nke dị obere bụ nke a maara dị ka kitfo leb leb
A na-ejikarị Kitfo na-agwakọta ya na cheese dị nro a na-akpọ ayibe ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ a na-esi esi nke a maara dị ka gomen

N'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ndị Etiopia, a na-enye kitfo na injera, achịcha na-atọ ụtọ, nke na-amị amị nke e ji ntụ ọka teff na-agba ụka mee, ọ bụ ezie na na nri ọdịnala Gurage, mmadụ ga-eji kocho, achịcha dị larịị nke e si na osisi ensete mee
Enwere ike iji akwụkwọ ensete mee ihe dị ka ihe ịchọ mma
Ọ bụ ezie na a naghị ele ya anya dị ka nri dị ụtọ, a na-ejikarị kitfo kpọrọ nke ọma
[citation needed]
A na-enye Kitfo n'oge pụrụ iche dị ka ezumike; a na-ejikarị ya eme na 'Nchọta nke Ezi Cross' ma ọ bụ 'Meskel' ezumike a na-eme kwa afọ na Septemba 27 na Etiopia
Oluwatobiloba Daniel Anidugbe, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwuregwu ya bụ Kizz Daniel, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Naijiria
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Woju' na 'Yeba'
Ọ gara site na aha egwu Kiss Daniel tupu ọ gbanwee ya na Mee 2018
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na G-Worldwide Entertainment na 2013, mana ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ na-esote esemokwu nkwekọrịta na ikpe ụlọ ikpeO guzobere akara ndekọ Fly Boy Inc na Nọvemba 2017
Na August 8, na afọ 2022, ndị uwe ojii Tanzania jidere Kizz Daniel na Dar es Salaam n'ihi enweghị ike ịrụ ọrụ
Otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị Tanzania a maara dị ka State of Vybes kwadebere ihe omume
A mụrụ Kizz Daniel Oluwatobiloba Daniel Anidugbe na Abeokuta, na Ogun Steeti, Nigeria
Ọ si n'ógbè gọọmentị ime obodo Abeokuta North
Ọ gara Abeokuta Grammar School ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, na 2013, na nzere na Water Resources Management na Agrometeorology (Water Engineering)
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, o kpebiri ịchụso egwu dị ka ọrụ n'akụkụ ọmụmụ ya
N'ọnwa Mee na afọ 2015, Kizz Daniel wepụtara egwu nke atọ na-esote ya, na vidiyo izu abụọ ka e mesịrị nke a gbara n'ebe dị iche iche n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Afrịka ma AJE FILMS duziri ya
Daniel wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya akpọrọ New Era na Mee 14, na afọ 2016
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị akara mbụ ya G-WorldWide, ọ gara na-ese n'elu mmiri nke onwe ya FLYBOY INC
nke bịanyere aka na ọrụ ọhụrụ abụọ Demmie Vee na Philkeyz na nso nso a
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Kizz Daniel gosipụtara na Demmie Vee single nke akpọrọ 'You Go Wait?'
2018 ji n'aka na ọ bụ afọ dị mma maka onye na-eti egwu WOJU, ọ gosipụtara Wizkid na Hit Song 'FOR YOU' na Davido na egwu ọzọ 'One Ticket' nke kụrụ chaatị n'ime awa 24 nke ntọhapụ ya
N'ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, Kizz Daniel wepụtara abọm Studio nke abụọ ya na nke mbụ ya n'okpuru FlyBoy Inc nke akpọrọ 'No Bad Songz'
Abọm ahụ nwere abụ iri abụọ gụnyere otu tiketi a tọhapụrụ tupu oge eruo nke o gosipụtara Davido
Ihe ndị ọzọ dị na Album ahụ gụnyere Nasty C, Diamond Platiumz, Philkeyz, Demmie Vee, Dj Xclusive, Wretch 32, Diplo na Sarkodie
Abọm ahụ nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị hụrụ egwu n'anya, ọ malitere na No
55 na US iTunes Chart wee bụrụ nọmba 1 na World Album Chart n'ime awa ịrị abụọ na anọ nke ntọhapụ ya
Na 25 June 2020, ọ wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya 'King of Love'
Na Mee ụbọchị nke mbụ, na afọ 2021, ọ nabatara ụmụ atọ, Jamal, Jalil na Jelani, ya na enyi ya nwanyị dị omimi
Kizz mechara kpughee otu o si tụfuo otu n'ime ụmụ atọ ya, Jamal, naanị ụbọchị anọ mgbe amuchara ya ka ọ na-enweta ụlọ elu nwere ọnụ ụlọ abụọ maka Jalil na Jelani
Kjersti Løken Stavrum (amụrụ na 1 Machị 1969) bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Norwegian
Kemgbe Eprel 2013, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Norwegian Press Association
A mụrụ ya na Sarpsborg na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Norway, Stavrum bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Norwegian Aftenposten na 1994
N'afọ 2001, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin ụmụ nwanyị kwa izu Kvinner og Klær
Ọ laghachiri na Aftenposten n'afọ 2005 dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ebipụta kwa izu A-magasinet, ebe ọ nọgidere ruo n'afọ 2012
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, n'oge dị mkpirikpi ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba nkwukọrịta nke Confederation of Norwegian Enterprise (NHO)
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Norwegian Press Association, na-anọchi Per Edgar Kokkvold onye nọ n'ọkwa ahụ kemgbe afọ 1996

N'afọ 2003, Stavrum natara aha Norwegian nke Female Media Leader of the Year (Årets Kushillig medieleder) iji kwado ihe ịga nke ọma ya n'ime ka KK (Kvinner og Klær) magazin ụmụ nwanyị kachasị ewu ewu na Norway
Kjersti Løken Stavrum bụ nwanne nwanyị Karl Petter Løken ma lụọ Gunnar Stavrum, onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Nettavisen

Okwu sinior, n'ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ, nwere ihe dị iche iche dabere na mba
Na Naijiria, iwu mba maka agụmakwụkwọ na-akọwa agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu dị ka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka na-enweta mgbe agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndndrị gasịrị na tupu oge tertiary
Afọ kwesịrị ekwesị maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu na Naịjirịa dị n'agbata afọ iri na otu rue na nke iri na asatọ
A na-atụ anya ka nwa akwụkwọ ahụ dee (West African Examination Council - WAEC) ule na ma ọ bụ National
Kansụl Nnyocha (NECO) na ngwụcha afọ ọmụmụ isii
Nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla ga-amụ sobjecti opekata mpe asatọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ, ma ọ bụ subjecti itoolu ma ọ karịchaa
Ụmụ akwụkwọ niile ga-enye ihe niile dị mkpa nke ana-kpo (4) cross cutting subjects ; nke a gụnyere asụsụ Bekee, General Mathematics, Civic Education na Trade / Entrepreneurship subject

E nwere ebum n' obi dị egwu nke mere ka e nwee agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu na Naịjirịa, nke a gụnyere ime ka usoro mmụta ya dị iche iche iji lekọta ọdịiche dị na talent, ohere, na ọrụ ndị na-emeghe ụmụ akwụkwọ mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndari; na n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Na agụmakwụkwọ United States, onye okenye bụ nwa akwụkwọ nọ n'afọ nke anọ nke ọmụmụ (na-abụkarị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma ọ bụ kọleji / mahadum)
Na United States, akara nke iri na abụọ na-abụkarị afọ nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ nke oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke nwa akwụkwọ ma a na-akpọ ya afọ ikpeazụ nke nwa akwụkwọ
A na-adụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'afọ dị elu ọdụ ka ha malite itinye akwụkwọ kọleji na semester mbụ ma chere mkpebi nnabata ka ọ bịa na semester nke abụọ nke afọ dị elu
Na United States, a maara afọ nke anọ nke mmemme agụmakwụkwọ dị ka afọ dị elu
A na-ahazi ọtụtụ mmemme nzere bachelọ ka emechaa n'ime afọ anọ a
Ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'afọ ikpeazụ ha ga-elekarị anya n'ọrụ ma ọ bụ ohere agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike, ma ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu

A na-eji okwu onye sinior nke kachasi na United States na-atu aka na nwa akwụkwọ nke afọ nke ise nke na-emechabeghị ihe achọrọ maka ngụsị akwụkwọ na ngwụcha afọ nke anọ, ya mere achọrọ ka ọ nọrọ otu afọ ọzọ iji mezue ihe achọrọ

Na mpaghara Ontario, a na-ewere ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na afọ nke atọ na n'elu dị ka ndị okenye, ebe na mpaghara Alberta, ọ bụ naanị akara iri na abụọ ka a na-agụ dị ka ndị agadi ọ bụ ezie na mpaghara abụọ ahụ bụ ndị Canada (n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị bụ naanị akara zomi na abụọ na Alberta)

Na England na Wales, ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'afọ nke asaa Gaba n' ihu (afọ iri na otuma ọ bụ karịa, ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị) na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị bụ ndị okenye; na Scotland, ụmụ akwụkwọ dị n'afọ ha nke ise na karịa bụ ndị okenye
Klas nkwụsi ike nke Turner ma ọ bụ akara nkwụsi elu nke Turner bụ nhazi nke nkwụsi Ike ikuku n'ime ógè dabere na nha nke ọsọ ikuku na radieshon anyanwụ
Klas dị site na otu (nké kachasị sie ike) ruo asaa (nké kachasị kwụsie ike)
Turner chepụtara usoro klas nkwụsi ike nke Turner dị ka mgbanwe nke usoro klas nkwụsị Pasquill
A na-eji tebụl na-esonụ chọpụta klas nkwụsi ike Turner màkà ọsọ ifufe enyéré na radieshon anyanwụ
A na-ekpebi akara radiation site ná ịgbaso usoro (lee eserese) nké na-eburu n'uche mkpuchi igwe ojii, ịdị elu elu elu, na ịdị elu anyanwụ
Klerkegade (n'asụsụ nkịtị
'Clergy Street') bụ okporo ámá dị n'etiti Copenhagen, nke obodo Denmark
Okporo ámá ahụ si na Borgergade n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa kwa Rigensgade n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ, na-agafe Adelgade na Kronprinsessegade n'ụzọ
Klerkegade malitere na atụmatụ 1649 maka New Copenhagen, nnukwu mpaghara nke gụnyere n'obodo ahụ e wusiri ike mgbe a kwụsịrị East Rampart ochie n'oge Gothersgade ugbu a ma wuo nke ọhụrụ n'ebe ugwu
Dabere na atụmatụ ahụ, a ga-akpọ okporo ámá ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ aha ala Danish, ndị eze na ndị ozo nọ n'ọkwá dị elu
Aha Klerkegade nwere njikọ na nke Adelgade ('Nobility Street') na Borgergade ('Burges Street')
Akụkụ ndịda nke okporo ámá ahụ metụtara site na nkatọ ndị mere na Adelgade na Borgergade na 1940s na 50s
E wuru nke 2 maka ndị Freemasons n'etiti 1867 na 1869 na atụmatụ Vilhelm Tvede
Ụlọ ahụ nọchiri ya na Freemasons' Hall na Blegdamsvej na 1927
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, n'afọ ndị 1930, ụlọ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ihe nkiri n'okpuru aha Palæbiografen
N'afọ 1972, Helge Bonnesen gbanwere ụlọ ahụ maka iji ya eme ihe ugbu a dị ka ụlọ nke ngalaba nke Musicology na Mahadum Copenhagen
E wuru No
10 n'otu oge ahụ na otu onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ maka ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo ọzọ, Kjæden ('The Chain'), nke ndị bụbu ndị otu Order of Freemasons guzobere laa azụ na 1776
A gbasaa ụlọ ahụ na 1876 na ọzọ na 1883
Den Wintherfeldtske Stiftelse bụ nke ntọala Trøstens Bolig wuru iji nye ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ ebe obibi dị ọnụ ala
E wuru ụlọ ahụ dị ogologo nke 19 n'ụzọ abụọ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri 13 dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na 1838 na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri isii dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ na 18460
E depụtara ya na 1978
N'ogige dị n'azụ ụlọ ahụ bụ ụlọ nwere okpukpu anọ nke e wuru n'otu oge ahụ dị ka mgbatị ahụ ma bụrụ nke Johann Heinrich Lütthans
Ọ bụ ntọala ọzọ, Den Treschowske Stiftelse wuru ya
Klimaforum09 - People's Climate Summit, nzukọ ihu igwe na-emeghe na nke ọzọ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009, ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri ise bịara

Ndị na-ahụ màkà gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi sitere na mpaghara ụwa nke mgbanwe ihu igwe kacha emetụta gbakọtara na Copenhagen na Klimaforum09 na ndị isi dịka Vandana Shiva, ónyé guzobere Navdanya, Nnimmo Bassey, onyeisi óche nke Friends of the Earth International, na ónyé édémédé Naomi Klein

E mèrè nkwupụta ndị mmadụ site na Klimaforum09 tupu na n'oge People's Climate Summit na-akpọ màkà 'mgbanwe usoro - ọ bụghị mgbanwe ihu igwe' ma nyefee ya na Nzukọ nke iri na ise nke ndị otu United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change n'ubochi irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba

Klimaforum09 mèrè site n'ubochi asaá n'ọnwa Disemba ruo ụbọchị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009 na DGI-byen conference center, nso Copenhagen Central Station, dị ka ihe omume na-emeghe na nke ọzọ n'oge UNFCCC COP15

Nzukọ ahụ nwèrè arụmụka karịrị narị atọ, ihe ngosi, ihe nkiri, kọntaktị na egwuregwu bụ nke netwọk Klimaforum, netwọk sara mbara nke òtù ọha na eze, haziri ma mee site n'enyemaka nke ọtụtụ narị ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo
Klimavichy (Belarusian Клiмавiчы; Russian Климовичи, Klimovichi; Lithuanian ) bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Mogilev, Belarus
Klimavichy dị 124 (7705 mi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Mogilev n'akụkụ Osimiri Kalinica ma bụrụkwa ebe nchịkwa nke Klimavichy District kemgbe 1924
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2009, ndị bi na ya bụ 17,064
Edere ntụaka mbụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme n'afọ 1581 gbasara Mścisław Voivodship nke Grand Duchy nke Lithuania
Enyere ya ọkwa obodo na 1777, yana Coat of Arms na 1781
Pasent 502 bụ ndị Ọtọdọks, pasent 479 ndị Juu na pasent 15 bụ ndị Katọlik
Ndị Nazi Germany weghaara ya n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ n'August 10, 1941, wee tọhapụ ya n'October 1943
Na Jenụwarị 1939, e nwere ndị Juu 1,693 n'ime obodo ahụ
E nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ Yiddish ruo 1938
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Juu bụ ndị ahịa
E gburu ndị Juu anọ na Klimovichi
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1941, e jidere ndị Juu iri na atọ, kpọga ha n'ebe ili ozu ndị Juu iji gwuo olulu
A gbagburu ha n'ebe ahụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
E gburu ya nke abụọ na November 6, 1941
E zigara ụfọdụ ndị Juu ịrụ ọrụ ma kpọkọta ndị Juu fọdụrụ n'ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala dị nso n'ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ
Ndị Germany weere ihe ha bara uru
Mgbe ahụ, a chụpụrụ ndị Juu ahụ n'akụkụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu, na-adịghị anya site n'obodo Dolgaya Gora ma ndị Germany na ndị uwe ojii obodo ahụ gbagburu ha
N'otu ụbọchị ahụ, a gbagburu ndị Juu e zigara ịrụ ọrụ n'otu ebe ahụ
Dị ka ụfọdụ akwụkwọ si kwuo, e gburu ndị Juu dị n'agbata 750 na 900 n'ụbọchị ahụ
Mgbe ogbugbu a gasịrị, ndị Juu 80 nọgidere na-adị ndụ
Ha gbakọtara n'otu ụlọ
Ná ngwụsị nke Nọvemba 1941, a manyere ndị Juu a ije ije na Melovaya Gora, nke dị n’ógbè obodo ahụ dị nso n’Osimiri Lazhbanka, ma gbagbuo
Ụfọdụ n’ime ndị nọ n’ọgbụgba égbè ahụ gbapụrụ agbapụ
N'April 1943, ndị Germany tụrụ ụmụaka ndị si n'ezigbo ụlọ mkpọrọ ma gbagbuo ya n'April 12, 1943
Obodo ahụ na ọkachasị raion ya tara ahụhụ nke ukwuu n'oge ọdachi Chernobyl
[citation needed]
Klopper(s) bụ aha nna nke ndi Dutch
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere

Daniel Boimah Kenney Knero Lapaé Edwards II (amụrụ na Mee 19, 1985), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya Knero Lapé ma ọ bụ naanị kNERO (nke a na-akpọ knee ro la pay), bụ ónyé Liberian hip hop, Afrobeats na-edekọ egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye edemede egwu, onye mmepụta ndekọ, ihe nlereanya, na onye édémédé
A mụrụ kNERO na Monrovia, Liberia ma zụlite ya na Brooklyn, New York
Nna ya bụ Gola na nne ya sitere n'ebo K'pelle
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ anọ nke Sara Léla na Rev
Boimah Lapaé Edwards, ónyé bụ ónyé Liberia kachasị nta na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ America na Liberia, nke dugara ha America
Ọ bụzi ónyé isi oche nke otu na-enweghị uru a na-akpọ 'The Bomi County Association'
a zụlitere kNERO na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye isi ala nke iri abụọ na anọ nke Liberia Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, Uncle bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Magistrate, onye Kọmishọna District na onye nhazi mmepe ọbọdọ màkà Ministry of Internal Affairs, na nwa nwanne nna mbụ Richard B
Devine, onye bụbu Senator nke Liberia
Ha nwere ihu ọma ịgbanahụ Agha Obodo Liberia site na ihe nna ya rụzuru mana ha ka na-ata ahụhụ ọnwụ nke ezinụlọ na ndị enyi

A tọhapụrụ egwu ahụ n'okpuru ndekọ CCAP
N'ihi njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, o mere emume nkwupụta nnwere onwe nke Liberia site n'ịrụ egwu egwu ya 'AFRICA' na Embassy nke Liberia na Washington, DC

Jerome Foster, nké a maara nkè ọma dị ka Knobody, bụ onye America na-emepụta egwu na A&R
Knobody emepụtala ndekọ gafee ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere mkpụrụ obi, R&B, hip hop na rock màkà ọtụtụ ndị na-ese egwu multi-platinum gụnyere Jay-Z, Ne-Yo, Akon, The Game, Big Pun, Mýa na REM
Knobodi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka A&R na SRC Records / Universal
N'ihi nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma Akon nwere mgbe a tọhapụrụ abọm izizi ya, a matara Knobody dị ka World Top 10 A&R
Ya na ónyé na-eti egwu / onye na-emepụta ihe na onye mmekọ ndị ọrụ Hieroglyphics nke na-akpọkwa Knobody ekwesịghị inwe mgbagwoju anya
Hit Quarters kpọrọ Knobody 'World Top 10 A&R' na 2005 n'ihi itinye aka na album Akon nke malitere ọrụ Trouble
N'afọ 2008, e nyere Knobody GRAMMY maka 'Leaving Tonight', onyinye ya na Ne-Yo's Because of You album, nke meriri 2007 GRAMM Y Award màkà Best Contemporary R&B Album
Glen Earl Boothe (amụrụ na Machị 8, 1988), nke a maara dị ka Knxwledge (nke a na-akpọ 'ihe ọmụma'), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na ónyé na-ede egwu nke dị na Los Angeles, California
Kemgbe afọ 2009, o nweela ihe karịrị 100 ntọhapụ site na Bandcamp
N'afọ 2010, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Klouds site na All City
N'afọ 2012, o wepụtara nchịkọta egwu 53 na cassette, nke Leaving Records wepụtara
Abụ ya na-abụkarị ngwakọta nkè ụdị dị íchè íchè, dị ka jazz, mkpụrụ obi, hip hop ochie, na rap nke oge a

N'afọ 2015, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya màkà Stones Throw Records, Hud Dreems, ma mepụta egwu 'Momma' na Kendrick Lamar's junior release, To Pimp a Butterfly, nke gárá n'ihu merie Best Rap Album na 58th kwa afọ Grammy Awards na 2016
Ọrụ ya na AndersonPaak dị ka duo NxWorries enwetala otuto dị egwu
Na Machị 2020 ọ wepụtara 1988, abọm nke abụọ ya màkà Stones Throw
Końskowola (IPA [kɔɲskɔ'vɔla]) bụ ogbè no na South-Eastern ala ana-kpo Poland
Ono n'etiti obodo Puławy na Kurów, obodo no n'ime Poland, ebe miri ogologo (river) ana-kpo Kurówka
Košava (Serbian Cyrillic Кошава, a na-akpọ [kɔ̌ʃa navegador]) bụ ifufe oyi, nke na-efe n'ébé ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke a na-ahụ n'akụkụ ndị dị N'ébé Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Europe na Balkans
Ọ na-amalite na Ugwu Carpathian ma soro Danube n'ébé ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ site na mpaghara Iron Gate ebe ọ na-enweta mmetụta jet, wee gaa Belgrade
Ọ nwere ike ịgbasa ruo n'ébé ugwu dị ka Hungary na n'ébé ndịda dị ka Niš na Sofia
N'ogè oyi, ọ nwèrè ike ime ka okpomọkụ daa ruo -30 °C (-22 )
N'ogè ọkọchị, ọ dị jụụ ma nwee uzuzu
Ọ na-adịgasị íchè n'ehihie, ọ dịkwa ike n'etiti 5 00 nà 10 00 n'ụtụtụ
Košava na-abụkarị mpaghara nrụgide dị ala n'elu Oké Osimiri Adriatic na mpaghara nrụgide siri ike na ndịda Russia
A na-ejikwa aha ahụ eme ihe n'ụzọ ọdịnala n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Bulgaria iji gosipụta ifufe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ ma ọ bụ nke ọwụwa Anyanwụ
E nwèrè ókwú na-ekwu, sị 'Mgbè košava na-afụ, Nišava na-ajụ oyi'
Ọsọ na ọbịbịa nké ifufe Košava belatara site n'afo 1949 ruo afọ 2010
Otu nnyocha ahụ gosiri na Košava na-adịkarị ụbọchị abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ, ihe omume otu ụbọchị bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe

Ifufe Košava na-efegharị mgbè enwèrè nrụgide ikuku dị elu (an anticyclone) n'ébé ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe na / ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ Eshia na nrụgide dị ala (a cyclone) na etiti na / maọ bụ ọdịda ọdịda anyanwụ mpaghara Mediterenian
Otú ọ dị, anticyclone siri ike bụ isi ihe na-akpata ifufe Košava
Košava bụkwa oké ifufe na-efe n'ime oghere
Enwèrè ike ịkọ ọdịnihu Košava n'ụzọ gárá nke ọma site na iji nrụgide dị n'elu ugwu na ọdịiche dị n'etiti okpomọkụ
Ko Yu-chin (Chinese 葛雨琴; amụrụ n'afọ 1939) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Taiwan
Ko gụrụ iwu na Mahadum Soochow tupu ọ gaa Institute of Revolutionary Practice
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Chunghwa Post wee jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Republic of China Postal Workers Union tupu ọ kwaga na Chinese Federation of Labour, dị ka onye isi oche ya
] A họpụtara Ko ka ọ bụrụ ￼￼Omebe iwu Yuan￼￼ dị ka onye nnọchianya nke ndị ọrụ na Kuomintang
Mgbe ￼￼￼Emechara mpaghara ọrụ, a họpụtara Ko ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu Yuan na 1992 na 1995 site na ndepụta ndị otu Kuomintang
O mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Chinese Association for Relief and Ensuing Services, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche nsọpụrụ ya
Kobena Eyi Acquah (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1952) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye na-ede uri na Obodo Ghana
Nchịkọta nke mbido ya bù, The Man Who Died (1984), meriri 1985 British Airways Commonwealth Prize for Poetry
A mụrụ Kobena Eyi Acquah na Winneba na Central Region nke obodo Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke obodo Ghana, Legon, ma mụọ iwu na Ghana Law School
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ndụmọdụ itinye ego n'otu oge ahụ ọ na-achụmwazi ọrụ edemede ya
Ọ rụkwaziri ọrụ na Ghana Book Development Council na Ghana Copyright Board, na 1993 ọ bụkwazi onye isi oche nke Ndi obodo Ghana Association of Writers
Acquah nwere mmetụta nke Atukwei Okai, onye ọ zutere na afo 1971
O mesiri ike mkpa ọ dị ịrụ ọrụ uri n'ihu ọha, nke ọ na-ahụ dịka omenala ọdịnala nke egwu egwu na-aga n'ihu
Ya na otu ihe nkiri a maara dịka The Living Echoes, ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe ngosi dị egwu nke uri ya
Ihe mbụ e bipụtara bụ ihe nkiri nke nhọrọ sitere na The Man Who Died
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ nke 1988, otu ahụ mere Birth and Rebirth na W
Du Bois Memorial Centre for Pan African Culture
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1988, ndị otu ahụ mere emume izizi ha n'ihu ọha, nke akpọrọ 'outdooring', nke Music for a Dream Dance na DuBois Centre
Kobina Nyarko bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe n'oge a na Ghana
A mụrụ ya na March 14, 1972 na Takoradi, Ghana, ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Nyarko na nso nso a na-enyocha ihe nnọchianya nke azụ na eserese ndị na-egosi ọtụtụ obere azụ na nnukwu akwa
Isiokwu 'akara ahịa' a na-eme ka ọrụ ya dị mfe ịmata
A zụrụ Nyarko na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2003 wee nweta BA na Industrial Art
Na Mee 2007, e gosipụtara Kobina Nyarko na ihe ngosi na San Diego Museum of Man, Artists Speak Contemporary art from Ghana and Zimbabwe
A na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe atụ nke ọgbọ nke atọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Ghana, bụ ndị na-egosipụta onwe ha n'efu dị ka ndị na-ese ihe n'ụwa nke oge a, na-enweghị ọdịda n'echiche mgbochi nke nka Afrịka
Kobina Nyarko na nwunye ya na nwa ya nwoke bi na Takoradi ugbu a
Kobine bụ ịgba egwú ọdịnala na emume pụrụ iche maka ndị Lawra nke ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana
A na-akpọkwa ha agbụrụ Dagaaba
A na-eme emume ịgba egwú na emume a kpọrọ aha ya na Septemba na Ọktoba iji gosipụta njedebe nke owuwe ihe ubi na-aga nke ọma
A na-eme ememme Kobine iji kelee chi na ndị nna nna maka oke owuwe ihe ubi n'ihi ya, a maara ya dị ka ememme owuwe ihe ubi na ememe ezinụlọ
N'oge a, ndị òtù obodo bụ ndị mere njem ma ọ bụ biri na mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-adịghị anya, Lawra na-alaghachikarị n'ụlọ iji jikọta ezinụlọ ha ma mee ememe
Kobna Kuttah Holdbrook-Smith MBE (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Ghana na Britain na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya, telivishọn, ihe nkiri na ọrụ olu ya
A mụrụ Holdbrook-Smith na Accra, Ghana
O tolitere na Frimley, Surrey, England, ebe ya na nne ya, Tenu; nna ya, Henry; na nwanne ya nwoke, Kofi bi
Na mbụ, ụjọ tụrụ ya ịmalite ime ihe nkiri n'ihi enweghị nkwenye nke ezinụlọ ya
'Adị m ihe dị ka afọ iri na ise, echere m, 'Ana m eche ma m nwere ike [ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri]'
Adịghị akọtara ya n'ezie nye onye ọ bụla
O yiri ka ọ gaghị ekwe omume
Ya mere, e nwere nyocha dị nwayọ nke [ime ihe nkiri] na mgbe m dị afọ iri na asatọ, ekpebisiri m ike
Ọ gara Guildford School of Acting iji mụọ ihe nkiri, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2000
Holdbrook-Smith malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na telivishọn n'afọ 2002 mgbe ọ na-eme Orlando Figes na Judge John Deed episode 'Everybody's Child'

Kemgbe ahụ, o nweela ọrụ na usoro TV dịka Little Britain, Star Stories (site n'afọ 2006 ruo 2008), Taking the Flak, Sirens, Holby City, Silk, Father Brown, The Last Panthers, Class, Dark Heart na The Split

Onye isi ihe nkiri mbụ ya bịara n'afọ 2005, mgbe o mere Ken na Mustapha Matura's Playboy of the West Indies na Tricycle Theatre O mechara pụta ìhè na oge ha a ma ama nke African-American Season, na-eme ihe nkiri na European premiere nke Walk Hard nke Abram Hill, Fabulation nke Lynn Nottage na Gem of the Ocean nke August Wilson
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ọ kpọtụrụ egwuregwu August Wilson dịka ọkacha mmasị onwe ya

N'afọ 2006, o mere Levee In Ma Rainey's Black Bottom nke August Wilson na Manchester Royal Exchange Theatre, mgbe afọ anọ gasịrị, ọ pụtara dịka Herald Loomis na Joe Turner's Come and Gone nke August Wilson na Young Vic Theatre
Ọ pụtara na Globe n'afọ 2007 na Love's Labours Lost, nke ọ rụkwara mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ na National Theatre of Korea, na Seoul
Holdbrook-Smith nwere ihe nkiri izizi ya na National Theatre n'afọ 2009 ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri anọ n'ebe ahụ (karịsịa na-apụta dịka Mortimer na Edward II)
N'afọ 2015, o mere Laertes n'akụkụ Benedict Cumberbatch na Hamlet na Barbican Theatre
A na-agbasakwa egwuregwu a na sinima n'ụwa niile dịka akụkụ nke National Theatre Live
N'afọ 2016 Holdbrook-Smith na Benedict Cumberbatch rụrụ ọzọ, na nke ugbu a na Marvel's Dr Strange
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Det
Crispus Allen na DC Comics Justice League ma bụrụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Warden Walker na Paddington 2, na dịka Nna Emery na Ghost Stories
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Oliver na The Commuter na Frye / Weasel na Disney's Mary Poppins Returns
Kobna Holdbrook-Smith na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a na egwu Tina dịka Ike Turner na Aldwych Theatre

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Order of the British Empire (MBE) na 2020 Birthday Honours maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri, a makwaara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị United Kingdom kachasị nwee mmetụta nke ihe nketa Africa ma ọ bụ African Caribbean mgbe e tinyere Holdbrook-Smith na mbipụta 2021 nke Powerlist kwa afọ
Koby Maxwell, (amụrụ na 25 Nọvemba 1978, dị ka Maxwell Koby Okwensy) bụ onye egwu Ghana, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nke bi na Washington, DC
na United States ugbu a
Ọ na-ekwu na ebumnuche ya bụ ịnọgide na-enwe eziokwu nke egwu Afrịka, ka ọ na-etinye ụda ndị ọzọ
Na June 2010, ọ ghọrọ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye isi na-emepụta mgbe ọ goro ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri US iji mepụta ihe nkiri Nollywood mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Paparazzi Eye in the Dark
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere imepụta ihe ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ TV North America ABC2 nke a na-akpọ Nollyhot TV nke e gosipụtara na 6 Jenụwarị n'afọ ahụ
Ihe ngosi ahụ na-ejide ihe na-eseta ihe na-eme n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naijiria nke Nollywood maka ndị America na-ege ntị
A na-agbasa Nollyhot TV na DCW 50 na ọwa telivishọn CW na USA
Koby Maxwell Productions na njikọ ya na Lafa Media & Zealmatic Pictures weputara ihe nkiri 2019 akpọrọ The Wrong One
Koby Maxwell bụ nwa nke mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii
Kemgbe ọ bịarutere America n'afọ 2000, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'ebe ndị a ma ama dị ka Kennedy Center na Radio City Music Hall na New York City
Ya na ndị na-agụ egwu nke gụnyere Nancy Wilson, Chaka Khan na Dionne Warwick esorola n'ọkwa ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2006, o mepụtara ihe nkiri reggae ya na Sean Paul, Barrington Levy, Sanchez, Ziggy na Stephen Marley, Bunny Wailer na Salif Keita na Reggae on the River
Maxwell nwetakwara nkwado ọzọ dị ka onye isi na-eme ihe na 21st African World Festival nke Detroit
Kodwo bụ aha enyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Kodwo Eshun (a mụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye edemede nke British-Ghana onye ọkà mmụta na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O nwere ike ịbụ na a maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ya nke 1998 na-egbuke egbuke karịa anyanwụ Adventures in Sonic Fiction

Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na MA na Contemporary Art Theory na Ngalaba nke Visual Cultures na Goldsmiths College, mahadum nke London, na CCC Research Master Program nke Visual Arts Department na HEAD (Geneva School of Art and Design)
A mụrụ Kodwo Eshun ma zụlite ya na mpaghara ugwu nke London
Nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya ama ama na United Kingdom
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị Fante nke Ghana, nwanne ya nwoke nke nta bụ onye edemede na onye nta akụkọ Ekow Eshun
Dị ka onye ntorobịa, Eshun malitere ọmụmụ banyere akwụkwọ ọchị, J
Ballard, na egwu egwu
Dị ka nwanne ya nwoke si kwuo, Eshun nwere nnukwu nsogbu ma nwee mmetụta site na 1979 coup of Ghana nke J
Rawlings mere
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee (BA Hons, MA Hons) na University College, Oxford University, na Romanticism na Modernism MA Hons na Mahadum Southampton
N'akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Kodwo Eshun chepụtara usoro nọmba peeji pụrụ iche, malite na nọmba na-adịghị mma
Na peeji nke -01[-017], o dere, sị
O mechara kọwaa mkpebi ya ịchụso ọrụ mgbasa ozi egwu dị ka omume ofufe nke gụnyere nkwa ịda ogbenye
Ihe odide Eshun na-ekwu maka ọdịbendịsaiba akụkọ sayensị na egwu na-elekwasị anya na ebe echiche ndị a na-ejikọta ya na mba ofesi
O nyewo aka n'ọtụtụ mbipụta, gụnyere The Guardian, The Face, The Wire, i-D, Melody Maker, Spin, Arena, Frieze, CR The New Centennial Review na 032c
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2002, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ mgbasa ozi egwu
Ugbu a, ọ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, ma na-akụzi na Goldsmiths, Mahadum nke London, na Ngalaba nke Omenala Ọhụụ, nke Irit Rogoff hiwere
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ nwere njikọ na Cybernetic Culture Research Unit, otu ndị na-eme nnyocha na Mahadum Warwick

Koffi Dan Kowa (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ nke nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-azụ Sahel SC
A mụrụ Kowa na Accra, Ghana
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị elu na Sahel SC nke Niger, tupu ọ nọrọ oge atọ na Espérance Sportive de Zarzis na Tunisia
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013, Kowa bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na Bidvest Wits bụ ndị na-egwu na South African Premier Soccer League
Kowa bụ onye otu mba Niger
Ọ nọchitere anya otu ahụ na 2012 African Cup of Nations
Koffi Franck Kouao (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian nke na-agba dịka onye na-eche Vizela
Kouao mere nke mbụ ya na Segunda Liga maka Vizela na 28 Jenụwarị 2017 na egwuregwu megide Desportivo das Aves
Ivory Coast U23
Antoine Christophe Agbepa Mumba (13 Julaị, na afọ 1956), nke a maara dịka Koffi Olomidé, bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agba egwu, onye mmepụta, na onye na-ede egwu na Congo
O nwere ọtụtụ ndekọ ọla edo n'ọrụ ya
Ọ bụ onye guzobere 'Quartier Latin International orchestra' na ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ama ama, gụnyere Fally Ipupa na Ferré Gola
A mụrụ Olomide na 13 Julaị, na afọ 1956 na Kisangani, DRC
Nne ya kpọrọ ya Koffi n'ihi na a mụrụ ya na Fraịdee
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti, na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla gbasara egwu
N'oge ọ na-eto eto, Olomide na-abụ abụ ndị a ma ama na okwu nke ya ma gbanwee ụda ruo mgbe onye agbata obi kụziiri ya otu esi akpọ ụbọ
Ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya na ndị nkuzi ya na-akọwakarị ya dịka 'nwa akwụkwọ nwere ọgụgụ isi,' Olomide nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ na Bordeaux, France ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na akụ na ụba azụmaahịa
A kọwakwara na o nwere nzere masta na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Paris
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Congo n'afọ ndị afọ 1970, Koffi sonyeere òtù Papa Wemba, Viva la Musica, na mbụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu, ma mesịa dị ka onye isi na-agụ egwú
N'afọ 1986, o guzobere otu egwu ya a maara dị ka Quartier Latin International, nke mere emume ncheta afọ 20 ya n'afọ 2006
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-eme ma na-edekọ ma na otu ahụ ma n'onwe ya
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, o wuru ndị na-akwado ya na mba ụwa, ọkachasị n'Africa na Europe
Koffi mere ka ụdị Soukous dị nwayọ, nke ọ kpọrọ Tcha Tcho
Egwú ya nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-ese okwu, na-ewere ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a na isiokwu ndị a na-ewere dị ka ihe a machibidoro iwu n'ime ụfọdụ obodo ndị na-agbaso omenala
O sonyekwara na ọrụ egwu salsa Africando

Maka mgbalị ya, Effrakata, nke e wepụtara na afọ 2001, Koffi nwetara onyinye anọ n'otu abalị na Kora Awards kwa afọ na South Africa maka afọ 2002 na 2003, gụnyere onyinye maka Best African Artist, nke ọ meriri na afọ 1998
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ meriri Kora Award maka 'Best African Artist of The Decade'
Nke a guzobere otu n'ime ọtụtụ aha ya, 'Quadra Kora Man'
Abọm Olomide bụ Haut de Gamme Koweït, Rive Gauche edepụtara na 1001 Albums You Must Hear Before You Die
Na Machị, na afọ 2003 Olomide wepụtara 'Affaire D'Etat', abọm CD abụọ nwere egwu iri na asatọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ya nwere otu egwu ahụ, mana okwu dịtụ iche
Olomide bụ akụkụ nke egwu Papa Wemba, na mbido afọ 1980
Ọ zụrụ ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-eti egwu, ụfọdụ n'ime ha ahapụla òtù Quartier Latin ya wee gaa naanị ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị hapụrụ bụ Fele Mudogo, Sam Tshintu, Suzuki 4x4, Soleil Wanga, Bouro Mpela, Fally Ipupa, Montana Kamenga, Ferre Gola

Otú ọ dị, Suzuki 4x4 apụtala ọzọ na nso nso a na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi Quartier Latin, yana ndị ọhụrụ dị ka Cindy Le Coeur, nwanyị na-agụ egwu nwere olu dị elu, nke edere na abụ L'Amour N'existe Pas (Ịhụnanya adịghị adị)

Koffi onye na-akpọkarị onwe ya 'Mopao' nwere ntọhapụ ọhụrụ a maara dị ka La Chicotte a Papa, ebe ọ bụ na ọ pụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na egwu dị ka Lovemycine, Diabolos, Grand Pretre Mere na Soupou, Cle Boa, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Enwere ike iji nkà Koffi tụnyere eze nke African rhumba, Franco Luambo Makiadi, onye hụkwara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-agafe n'aka ya n'oge ya
Taa, Olomde bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'Africa
N'afọ 2012, a na-ekwu na Koffi Olomide wakporo otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ya maka mmetọ na enweghị nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta ma nata ntaramahụhụ ọnwa atọ
N'ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2016, mgbe ọ na-eme njem egwu na Kenya, e mere Olomide ihe nkiri ka ọ na-agagharị n'ihu otu n'ime ndị na-agba egwú ya
A katọrọ ihe omume ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe ma mee ka a kwụsị egwu ahụ ka vidiyo ahụ na-agafe
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ala nna ya, e jidere ya ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Kenya, na-ekwu na ọ bụ maka otu ihe ahụ na-enweghị ntaramahụhụ
E mechara tụọ ya mkpọrọ ụbọchị anọ n'enweghị ikpe ma tọhapụ ya n'enweghị nkọwa
Otú ọ dị, e mechara kpughee na nwunye onye bụbu onye isi ala Congo, Oriakụ Olive Lembe Kabila, bụ onye na-akwado njide ahụ n'ihi njikọ ya maka nchebe ụmụ nwanyị megide ime ihe ike na ndina n'ike
N'afọ 2018, e nyere ya iwu ka ejide onye na-ese foto na Zambia, ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ tupu ejide ya
N'afọ 2019, ụlọ ikpe France mara ya ikpe maka ndina n'ike nke otu n'ime ndị na-agba egwú ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ abụọ n'enweghị onye ọ na-anọ ya, ebe ọ na-agaghị ụlọ ikpe na France
Kofi Adjorlolo (amụrụ na Machị 23, 1956 na Keta ) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe

A họpụtala ya otu ugboro maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Ghana Movie Awards, na ugboro anọ maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ nkwado, na Ghana Movie Awards, Africa Movie Academy Awards, na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Otu n'ime ihe nrite ndị ọ natara bụ International Golden Image award site n'aka onye isi ala Liberia n'oge ahụ bụ Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, na Best Cameo Actor n'afọ 2011 Ghana Movie Awards
Adjorlolo gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ AME Zion na Keta, Ghana wee banye na Keta Senior High Technical School tupu ọ nweta asambodo nke isii ya na Ebenezer Secondary school, Dansoman
Adjorlolo malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye egwu, na-akpọ ngwá egwu gụnyere opi na akụkụ ahụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, ọ gara Naịjirịa ma soro onye egwu Naịjirịa bụ Victor Uwaifo nke Joromi ama ama
Ya na Felix Bell a ma ama na-arụkwa egwu
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, o guzobere otu Osagyefo, ma soro ndị otu Dasebre na-egwu egwu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ obodo na onye na-egosi redio na Ghana Broadcasting Corporation na Peace FM
O nyere aka n'ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ redio okpukpe Channel R, ụlọ ọrụ redio HOT 939FM na Accra kwanyeere ya ùgwù maka afọ iri atọ nke ije ozi na ụlọ ọrụ showbiz
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana n'afọ 2003
Kofi Adu (a mụrụ na Mee 25, 1969), nke a makwaara dịka Agya Koo, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị si Ghana
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Ghana karịrị narị abụọ gụnyere Obaatanpa, Away Bus, Black Star, nakwa Ma Tricki Wo
Adu bụ onye mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana, mana o bi na mpaghara Accra Newtown nke a na-akpọ Asantewaa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-akpụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ

Achọpụtara Adu na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri Ghana na GTV (Ghana National Television) na National Theater na Accra, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị na-eme ka ìgwè mmadụ dị ọkụ tupu e mee ihe nkiri ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008, onye isi ala Ghana n'oge ahụ bụ John Agyekum Kufuor nyere ya National Award
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gara Accra na mbụ ịbụ abụ, Agya Koo egosila n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ghana, iri na ise n'ime ha ka bụ ọkacha mmasị ya

N'izere usoro nkịtị nke ịgụ edemede nke ọma tupu o mee ihe nkiri, ọ gwara onye na-eme ihe ngosi ụtụtụ nke Joy FM bụ Kojo Oppong Nkrumah na ọ bụ ezie na a na-enyekarị ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri edemede izu abụọ tupu ha amalite, akaraka Chineke nyere ya na-enye ya ohere imegharị ihe n'enweghị edemede
Ya na Aboagye Brenya, Lil Win, Kwaku Manu, Mercy Aseidu anọwo na ihe nkiri ịkpọ aha ole na ole
N'ọnwa June afọ 2016, Adu lụrụ Rita Asiedu ọzọ na London, UK mgbe ha chịrị ọwị afọ 4
Ọ lụrụ Victoria Owusu Adomako mana ọ gbara alụkwaghịm
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst

Kofi Antubam (amụrụ n'afọ 1922 - rụọ afọ 1964) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe nke ọrụ nka ya na-egosi akụkụ dị ala nke ndụ obodo na Ghana, atụmatụ ya gụnyere uwe ala dị ka mace onye isi ala na oche onye isi ala nke Kwame Nkrumah ji mee ihe
Antubam malitere iji akara adinkra mee ihe na nka Ghana
Kwame Nkrumah họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe na steeti
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ Ghana's Heritage of Culture
N'afọ 1962, ndị American Society of African Culture gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na New York
A mụrụ Antubam n'afọ 1922 n'ezinụlọ Maame na Nana Mensah
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe Antubam dị obere, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nwanne nna ya kpọọrọ ya gaa Kumasi ịmalite agụmakwụkwọ ya
O mechara nọrọ oge ụfọdụ na Jos, Naịjirịa, nakwa na Adisadel College
Ọ bụ mgbe ọ nọ na Adisadel College ka a gbara ya ume ịzụlite ọrụ aka ya
Onye isi, Nna John Knight tụrụ aro ka gọvanọ, Arnold Hodson nye Antubam na-eto eto ọrụ ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ụrọ
Mgbe nnabata dị mma nke ọrụ a kpụrụ akpụ, ọ nwetara nkwado ịga Achimota College

Na Achimota College, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke onye na-ese ihe na onye nkụzi nka amụrụ na Russia, Herbert Vladimir Meyerowitz, onye nkụzi nke gbara ụmụ akwụkwọ ya ume ka ha nweta ndụ obodo kwa ụbọchị dị ka mkpali na ọ bụghị naanị iṅomi ọdịnala nka Europe
Afọ Antubam na Achimota gụnyere ịmecha ihe ọmụmụ nka na ọrụ aka, ọzụzụ ndị nkụzi na ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ mbụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Antubam kwadoro onwe ya site na nkuzi, ọ rụpụtara ma ree ihe osise ihe atụ
N'agbata afọ 1948 na 1950, o ritere akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Goldsmith College, London
N'afọ ndị 1950, Antubam mepụtara ọrụ nka na ọrụ aka dị iche iche gụnyere Nkrumah's presidential mace na oche, steeti dị iche iche nyere ọrụ enyemaka mural carvings

N'afọ 1963, o bipụtara Ghana's Heritage of Culture, akwụkwọ nke na-ekwu maka onyinye Ghana na ụwa nka na Antubam na-eji eme ihe maka nka mba nke na-anọchite anya akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị Ghana
Kofi Asamoah nke a makwaara dị ka Kofas bụ onye Ghana na-eduzi ihe nkiri, odee, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye isi na onye nduzi okike nke Kofas Media, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri, telivishọn na mgbasa ozi

A mụrụ Kofi na Assin Anyinabrem na mpaghara Central nke Ghana mana ọ tolitere na Takoradi na mpaghara Western nke Ghana ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ elementrị na nke praịmarị na Young Christian Preparatory School
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Mfantsipim School, ebe ọ bụ onye otu arụmụka mba nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Kofi Asamoah malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Ghana, Legon
Ka ọrụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri malitere, ọ gara National Film and Television Institute (NAFTI), ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Film and Television Production na isi na Film Directing
Asamoah sonyeere Ghana Institute of Journalism ebe o nwetara nzere masta na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
O mechara kwaga US ebe ọ gụrụ Filmmaking na New York Film Academy
Kofi malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye nta akụkọ na Skyy Power FM / TV, ebe ọ ghọrọ olu nke ihe ngosi ha
Ọ banyere n'ime ihe nkiri na Kumasi 2009
O dere ma mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 2012 nke akpọrọ 'Boys Kasa' (usoro ihe nkiri ọchị) nke gosipụtara Kalybos mechara gbaa ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana

Asamoah mepụtara ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ghana dị ka Area Boys (2011), Kalybos na China (2015), John na John (2017), Amakye na Dede, ihe nkiri 2016 nke gosipụtara Majid Michel, John Dumelo na Salma Mumin ma merie Best Movie of the Year Award (Ghana) na City People Entertainment Awards 2016
O meriri onye nduzi ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2016 City People Entertainment Awards
Galle Winston Kofi Dawson (1940 - 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke oge a na Ghana
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe osise, ihe a tụrụ atụ, ederede, eserese, mbipụta, na ntinye
Dawson bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na atọ nke onye Ghana na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Wilberforce David Kwami Dawson na Evelyn Esi Dawson
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Mawuli na Ho maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Tupu Mawuli, ọ gara O'Reilly School na Bana Hill Presbyterian Boys Boarding School
Otu n'ime ndị nkuzi nka ya na Mawuli School bụ Grace Kwami Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ Kumasi College of Technology (KCT) iji mụọ diplọma na Civil Engineering
Otú ọ dị, ọ hapụrụ ma sonye na ọkachamara nkuzi Diploma na Fine Art (DFA)
Mgbe Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) BA Art Degree (Painting) malitere n'afọ 1964, Dawson so na ndị otu mbụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ atọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị na KNUST, Dawson gara Slade School of Fine Art na London na British Council 8-month Technical Award
Na Slade, ọ mụtara ma mụta ihe ndị bụ isi nke ise ihe na ákwà yana ibipụta ihuenyo
Dawson bụ onye na-amụ ọrụ n'aka onye Ghana nke oge a na onye na-emepụta ihe nnọchianya mba, Amon Kotei
Na Victoriaburg Press, Kotei kụziiri Dawson ihe osise na usoro nkewa nke agba
Mgbe Dawson lara ezumike nká na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ozi nke Ghana na 2000, o tinyere oge ya n'ọrụ nka ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe mbụ gosipụtara na gallery Nubuke Foundation na 2009
Dawson bụ isiokwu nke nnukwu ihe ngosi na onye na-ese ihe na Ghana bụ Ibrahim Mahama malitere Savannah Centre for Contemporary Art, Tamale
Galle Winston Kofi Dawson In Pursuit of something ːBeautiful, ikekwe[[ nke Bernard Akoi-Jackson Savannah Centre for Contemporary Art, Tamale (2019)
Nutata ihe osise nke GWK Dawsoná Nubuke Foundation, Accra (2009)
World Mini-Print Annual Lessedra Bulgaria (2006)
Emere na Africa Diaspora Conference, UK (2006)
Mmalite Sankofa Dubois Museum, Accra (2005)
7th Triennale Mondial de liestampe obere format Chamalers, France (2005)
Dawson nwụrụ na 2021 mgbe obere oge nke ọrịa gasịrị
Kofi Genfi (amụrụ n'afọ 1993/1994) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye isi azụmaahịa nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Mazzuma na Utopia Technologies ụlọ ọrụ abụọ na mpaghara azụmahịa dijitalụ maka ahịa na-apụta
ọ bụ onye nduzi nke atụmatụ azụmahịa maka Mazzuma
A mụrụ Genfi na Ghana wee gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Presbyterian Boys Senior High School, Legon Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ Business Administration na Mahadum Ashesi

N'afọ 2013, Kofi Genfi guzobere CYST, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ngwanrọ na-ahụ maka Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, na usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ ekwentị usoro iji melite ego nsonye n'ahịa na-apụta site na ngwaahịa flagship ya a na-akpọ Mazzuma ma na-ahazi mpịakọta azụmahịa
Genfi bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Thiel netwọk mmekọrịta guzobere site na teknụzụ billionaire Peter Thiel guzobere na 2015, ọ sonyere na asọmpi International Public Speaking Competition na London

O nyekwara ndụmọdụ, ọrụ injinia, njikwa ọrụ, na nkwado teknụzụ maka United Nations Development Program (UNDP) n'ihe gbasara njikwa mkpofu dị irè ma bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ mmekọrịta plastik zuru ụwa ọnụ
A nabatara Genfi na Forbes 30 Under 30 Technology category
ọ bụ onye mmeri maka nchọpụta afọ 2019 nke afọ Exclusive Men of the Year Africa Awards (EMY Awards) na 2019
Kofi Koduah Sarpong bụ onye isi azụmaahịa na onye ndụmọdụ nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party nke Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke klọb bọọlụ Ghana, Kumasi Asante Kotoko site na 2010 ruo 2013
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na International Cocoa Organisation na London na Ghana Cocoa BoardỌ bụ onye isi ọrụ GNPC dị ka nke 2017
A mụrụ Kofi Sarpong na Nsuta-Beposo na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
O nwetara asambodo GCE Ordinary Level ya na Seventh Day Adventist Secondary School na Bekwai na GCE Advanced Level ya na Sekondi College
A nabatara ya na Mahadum nke Ghana iji chụsoo ọmụmụ na Business Administration
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Science na Business Administration
O nwetara agụmakwụkwọ nke World Bank na 1987 iji mụọ Master of Business Administration na Mahadum Ghana
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ masta ya, e nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ iji nweta Master of Accountancy na Mahadum Glasgow na 1990
Commonwealth Scholarship nyere ya ohere itinye akwụkwọ maka nzere Doctor of Philosophy na Industrial and Business Studies site na Mahadum Warwick na United Kingdom
Kofi Sarpong jikwa Master of Arts in Ministry from the Trinity Theological Seminary, LegonỌ bụkwa onye na-akwụ ụgwọ ego sitere na Association of Chartered Certified Accountants,United Kingdom
Sarpong were ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere onye na-ahụ maka ego aka na 1979 na Meat Marketing Board
N'afọ 1980, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi na-ahụ maka ego na Ghana Food Distribution Corporation
Ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wee bụrụ Chief Accountant na onye isi njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 1990 iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na mpụga Ghana
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana na 1993, Sarpong were ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nke Ghana Cocoa Board
Ọ malitere ọrụ na International Cocoa Organization, London na 1998 ma jee ozi dị ka Onye isi nchịkwa na ngalaba ọrụ ego na 2001
N'afọ 2004, onye isi ala Ghana n'oge ahụ, John Kufuor, họpụtara Sarpong dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa nke Tema Oil Refinery
E mere ya onye isi nchịkwa nke refinery na 2007
Mgbe a họpụtara ọchịchị John Evans Atta-Mills n'ọchịchị n'afọ 2009, a chụpụrụ Sarpong n'ọkwa ahụ

Site na 2010 ruo 2013, Sarpong jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Kumasi Asante Kotoko Sporting clubHe was called by Otumfuo Nana Osei Tutu nke abụọ,Eze obodo AsanteKlọb ahụ meriri aha Ghana Premier League abụọ, yana ndị gbara ọsọ iko FA abụọ
E hiwekwara imekọ ihe ọnụ na ọgbakọ ndị mba ofesi na Sunderland AFC na United Kingdom, TP Mazembe na DR Congo na Petro Luanda na Angola
Mgbe Asante Kotoko gasịrị, Sarpong weghaara ọkwa onye isi oche nke The Global Haulage Group, ụlọ ọrụ Ghana na-azụ ma na-ebupụ cocoa
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke bọọdụ Royal Bank, Ghana na Imperial General Assurance Ltd
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na bọọdụ n'afọ 2016
A họpụtara KK Sarpong ka ọ bụrụ chancellor nke UPSA na Jenụwarị 2022
Na February 2017, Onye isi ala Nana Akufo-Addo, họpụtara Sarpong ka ọ bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Ghana National Petroleum Corporation
Ọ nọchiri Alex Mold onye jere ozi dịka CEO kemgbe 2013
