Jenner na pastọ Brad Johnson tọrọ ntọala California Community Church na 2012
Akpọrọ ya na mbụ Life Change Community Church, nke dị na Agoura Hills, California
Kris Senanu bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa na Safaricom ugbu a
Tupu nke a ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Telkom Digital
Kris bụ onye isi Telco kachasị nta na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ ICT edepụtara
O nyere aka na mmalite nke Access Kenya (nke bụzi Internet Solutions) ma nyere ya aka ịghọ ụlọ ọrụ ICT mbụ edepụtara na Nairobi Securities Exchange
O nyere aka gbasaa nzọụkwụ azụmaahịa ahụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka ma duzie nnweta ya site na Dimension Data na 2014, tupu ọ pụọ dị ka osote onye isi oche ya, na 2016
Kris Senanu bụ nwa nwoke nke agụmakwụkwọ Kwadzo Senanu

Kris Senanu gara USIU-A, na-enweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum na nchịkwa azụmahịa mba ụwa, na-emepe ahịa ahịa na akara ugo mmụta (MBA) na Strategic Managementsitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Mahadum Warwick
Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa ugbu a na Safaricom
N'afọ 2001, o nyere aka guzobe AccessKenya Group, wee bụrụ onye isi ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2005, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa ya
N'afọ 2014, Internet Solutions (IS) nwetara AccessKenya Group, Senanu wee bụrụ osote onye isi oche ya
N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere Telkom Kenya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ
Kris bụkwa Onye isi oche nke United States International University Council

Ndị isi oche ndị ọzọ ọ nwere n'oge gara aga na ugbu a gụnyere Kansụl Na-achị Isi na Kenya Institute of Management, Onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Pan African BTL Africa, nke nwere isi na Ghana, na Mdundo nke bụ ikpo okwu egwu pan African
Kris bụ onye otu Chartered Institute of Marketing na Kenya Institute of Management

Krosbi Mensah (amụrụ na 5 Machị 1947) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana nke jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu nke 4th Republic of Ghana, ọ nọchitere anya Afram Plains North
Ọ bụ onye otu National Democratic Congress
A mụrụ Krosbi Mensah na 5 Maachị 1947 na Eastern Region nke Ghana, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Prince of Peace College wee nweta Asambodo Nkụzi Ọzụzụ (GCE)l
Mensah bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Afram Plains North na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana site na 7 Jenụwarị 1993 ruo 7 Jenụwaị 1997, Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego
Mensah bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke 1st na 2nd parliament nke 4th Republic of Ghana maka Afraim Plains North Constituency, site na Jenụwarị 1993 ruo Jenụwarụ 2001

Ọ gara ụlọ omeiwu mbụ ka e kwupụtachara na ọ meriri na ntuli aka Disemba 1992 Ọ jigidere oche ya ọzọ na ntuli aka 1996 ka ọ nwetasịrị 72% nke mkpokọta ntuli aka, ọ meriri n'oge ntuli aka izugbe Ghana nke December 1996 na tiketi National Democratic Congress maka Afraim Plains North Constituency na Eastern Region nke Ghana Ọ turu vootu 18,832 n'ime votu ziri ezi a tụrụ na-anọchite anya 6170% n'aka ndị mmegide ya Augustine Siaw onye NPP, Amidu Tanko onye PNC, Albert Quarcoo-Zah onye CPP na Krosbi Mensah onye NDC onye nwetara 4,376 votes, 1,684 votes, 1, 1, 1 votu na 0 votu n'otu n'otu
Joseph Tsatsu Agbenu mechara nọchie ya n'afọ 2001
Mensah bụ Onye Kraịst
Ọ bụ nna Betty Krosbi Mensah, onye na-eje ozi kemgbe 2017 dị ka onye omeiwu maka Afram Plains North, otu mpaghara ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu

Krüger, Krueger [ihe odide 1] ma ọ bụ Kruger (na-enweghị umlaut Ü) bụ aha nna nke ndi German sitere na Krüger، nke pụtara onye na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke di na Low German na onye ọkpụite na akuku Central German na Upper German

The last name Krüger with umlaut dots is widespread in Germany with some 155,000 people bearing this last name, whereas the form without umlaut dots is widespread in South Africa with some 65,000 people, in the US with some 20,000 people and in Brazil with some 14000 people
In all other countries both forms have less than 5,000 people bearing it
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
KtbDarija (N'ụzọ nkịtị 'WriteDarija') bụ oru ngo na-achọ ịhazi ederede Darija (Moroccan Arabic), iji kwalite ọnụ ọgụgụ mmuta na ime ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ịmụta maka ndị mba ọzọ
Ọ bụ ọkọlọtọ okpukpu abụọ na-akwado ma mkpụrụedemede Latịn na Abjad
E mepụtakwara usoro nhazi ahụigodo maka ide n'ime mkpụrụedemede ndị a
Kube Cake, nke ndi mmadu makwaara dị ka Kube Toffee, bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke Ghana
Ihe eji eme ihe na nkwadebe gụnyere Akị bekee, shuga, mmiri na mmiri lemon
Mgbe a na-akwadebe ihe nracha ahụ, a na-ebu ụzọ mee ka shuga dị ọkụ ruo mgbe ọ na-acha nchara nchara mgbe ahụ akị bekee a gwakọtara agwakọta, mgbe ahụ, a gbakwunyere lemon iji mee ka ọ dị ụtọ
Wụsa ya n'elu ala dị larịị ma malite ịkpụzi ya ka ọ bụrụ obere ihe na-atọ ụtọ
Kubi Chaza Indi bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akwado mmepe na nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
N'okpuru aha nwa agbọghọ ya, Kubi Chaza, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United Kingdom, na-apụta na Live and Let Die na 1973 dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na-ejere James Bond ozi
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe, ya na di ya na-eme ihe nkiri bụ John Indi malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ịchọ mma
Indi na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo mmepe, ọkachasị n'ihe gbasara okwu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị, ma bụrụkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu Indigenous Business Women's Organisation naZimbabwe
Ndị Indis anọgidewo na-arụ ọrụ na ịme ihe nkiri, John dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, mana Kubi n'akụkụ abụọ nke igwefoto
N'afọ 1989, o mepụtara I Am the Future, ihe nkiri banyere otu nwa agbọghọ (nke Stella Chiweshe mere) nke na-aga nnukwu obodo iji gbanahụ agha nnwere onwe nke Zimbabwe n'ime ime obodo
N'afọ 1993, o mere onye agbata obi nke oge a na Neria, edemede Tsitsi Dangarembga banyere nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na Zimbabwe
Godwin Mawuru duziri ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ, Neria gosipụtara ụda olu nke Oliver Mtukudzi
TryIndi bụ onye otu Women Filmmakers of Zimbabwe
Ọrụ ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-ere ahịa na ụlọ ahịa Oh Cult Voodoo bịara mgbe ọ nọ na UK, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ahụ
Àgwà ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-ere ahịa na-ejere James Bond ozi (nke Roger Moore na-egwu), na-ekpuchi ihe maka ya wee kpọọ Mister Big mgbe Bond hapụrụ ụlọ ahịa ahụ
Mgbe Zimbabwe nwechara nnwere onwe, Indi na di ya John laghachiri n'obodo ahụ

Ugbu a ọ bụ akara ama ama na South Africa

Kubi Chaza Indi bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akwado mmepe na nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
N'okpuru aha nwa agbọghọ ya, Kubi Chaza, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United Kingdom, na-apụta na Live and Let Die na 1973 dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na-ejere James Bond ozi
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe, ya na di ya na-eme ihe nkiri bụ John Indi malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ịchọ mma

Ndị agbụrụ ahụ na-asụzi Hausa
Kubi bụ obodo a maara dị ka onye agbụrụ zaa ma na-asụkwa otu asụsụ

Alhaja Kudirat Abiola (onye amụrụ Kudirat Olayinka Adeyemi), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Kudirat Abiolo (1951 na 4 June 1996), bụ onye Naijiria na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ọ bụ onye egburu mgbe di ya, Moshood Abiola, nọ n'aka Gọọmentị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nwere mmeri na ntuli aka nke e mere na Naịjirịa na afọ 1993, e jidekwara ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ndị ọchịchị na-achị achị kagburu ha n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi
A mụrụ ya na 1951 na Zaria dị na Naịjirịa
Alhaja Kudirat Abiola bụ nwanyị nke abụọ nke di ya lụrụ
N'oge ọnwụ ya, ọ bụ nwunye ya nke okenye
E gburu ya mgbe Gọọmentị Naijiria jidere di ya
E kwenyere na di ya bụ onye mmeri na ntuli aka Naijiria nke e mere na 1993, e jidekwara ya nwa mgbe nta mgbe gọọmentị nke onye ọchịchị aka ike Ibrahim Babangida kagburu ha
Ogbugbu ahụ bụ isiokwu nke nyocha na ikpe ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị
Dị ka akụkọ si kwuo, e nyere iwu ka e gbuo ya ma bụrụ ndị ikom isii bụ ihe mere nke a
Abiola nwụrụ n'ụgbọala ya site na égbè égbè
Onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ya nwụkwara
Onye na-enyere ya aka, onye e mechara boo ebubo na ya na ndị gburu ya na-emekọrịta ihe, nọ n'ụgbọala mana o merụghị ahụ
A gara n'ihu ijide di ya n'eboghị ya ebubo mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọnọdụ a na-enyo enyo obere oge tupu e kwuo na a ga-atọhapụ ya na 7 Julaị 1998
N'oge ọnwụ ya, e mepụtara ọchịchị na-emegide ndị agha 'Radio Democracy' ma ọ dị na Norway
Gọọmentị America, Britain, Sweden, Danish na Norwegian kwadoro ya iji nyere aka kwụsị ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha na Naịjirịa
A gbanwere aha ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi redio ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Radio Kudirat
N'afọ 1998, abaghariri aha otu akụkụ okporo ụzọ dị na New York Kudirat Abiola Corner, n'agbanyeghị mkpesa nke Gọọmentị Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998, Major Hamza Al-Mustapha pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe ya na nwa nwoke nke onye isi ala Abacha gara aga bụ Mohammed, nke e boro ebubo igbu Kudirat Abiola
N'oge ikpe ahụ, onye kwupụtara na ya gburu mmadụ, Sergeant Barnabas Jabila, kwuru na ọ na-erube isi n'iwu sitere n'aka onye isi ya, al-Mustapha
Na 30 June 2012 a mara Hamza Al-Mustapha na Alhaji Lateef Shofolahan ikpe ka a kwụgbuo ha maka ogbugbu Alhaja Kudirat Abiola
Al Mustapha bụ onye isi nchekwa onye isi ala ebe Shofolahan bụ onye na-enyere ya aka
E mechara tọhapụ ha abụọ na mkpegharị ikpe site n'ụlọ ikpe nke dị na Legos
Abiola ka bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ọgụ Naịjirịa maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Afọ iri na itoolu mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, e nwere ngagharị iwe n'akụkụ ili ya
Ihe ngosi, 'The Supreme Price' na-akọwa akụkọ banyere otu Abiola na di ya si kwụọ nnukwu ego na ọchụchọ ha maka Naịjirịa ka mma, nke nwere onwe ya
Onye diri ha bụ Joanna Lipper, onye nkuzi na Mahadum Harvard, bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ ahụ site n'echiche nke nwa ya nwanyị, Hafsat
Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyekwara ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Walter Carrington, onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya US na Naịjirịa, na onye odee nwetara ihe nrite Nobel bụ Wole Soyinka
Àtụ MedalTableTopKudirat Akhigbe (amụrụ na 29 Disemba 1981) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 400
O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 400 mita relay na 2002 na 2006 Commonwealth Games, ma sọọ mpi n'otu n'otu na 2002 n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
Na 2002 African Championships ọ mechara nke ise na mita 400 wee merie ọlaọcha na 4 × 400 mita relay
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 5160 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na Junịị 2001 na Seville
Kudirat Motonmori Olatokunbo nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Kudirat Kekere-Ekun CFR (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1958) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijirịa na onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijirịa
A mụrụ Kekere Ekun na 7 Mee 1958 na London, United Kingdom

N'afọ 1980, ọ nwetara ṅzere bachelọ na Iwu na Mahadum Lagos ma nabata ya na Nigeria Bar ṅa 10 Julaị 1981, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nigerian Law School tupu ọ gaa London School of Economics ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Iwu ṅa Nọvemba 1983
Kudirat sonyeere ndị ọka ikpe nke steetị Lagos dị ka onye isi majie nke abụọ wee rịgoro n'ọkwa onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke steetị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ịpụnara Mmadụ na Ịkụ Ọkụ, Mpaghara II, Ikeja n'etiti Nọvemba 1996 ruo Mee 1999
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe nke Naijiria n'afọ 2004 tupu a họpụta ya dị ka onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijeria n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013
Àtụ Supreme Court of Nigeria
Kudjoe Affutu (a mụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe na igbe ozu ihe atụ na onye na-ewu palanquin
A mụrụ ya na Awutu Bawyiase, Central Region, Ghana nke bụkwa ebe o bị ruo taa
Affutu emeela onwe ya aha na Europe site na isonye na ọrụ nka na ihe ngosi dị iche iche
Site n'afọ 2002 ruo n'afọ 2006, ya na onye na-ese igbe ozu a ma ama na mba ụwa bụ Paa Joe bu ndị a zụrụ azụ na mpaghara Greater Accra
Kemgbe afọ 2007, ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ya n'obodo a mụrụ ya, na-emepụta igbe ozu ihe atụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ maka olili ozu ndị Ghana, ebe ngosi nka na ndị nchịkọta onwe ha
Ya na Ataa Oko rụkọrọ ọrụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ya na di na nwunye na-ese ihe bụ MS
Bastian na Isabelle L, ya na Saâdane Afif na Thomas Demand
Kudzai Chimbaira (13 Ọktoba 1985 - Jenụwarị 2018) bụ onye Sweden-Zimbabwean na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi

O mere nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2005 na obere ihe nkiri Pamvura, n'afọ 2007 ọ natara ihe nrite na Zimbabwe International Film Festival maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na obere ihe nkiri maka ime ka onye isi na ihe nkiri The Return
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ nwetakwara Zimbabwe's National Arts Merit Awards maka ọrụ ya na egwuregwu Anatol

N'afọ 2008, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Silent Words maka Harare International Festival of the Arts, n'otu afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Carthage International Film Festival maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Zimbabwe N'afọ 2008, ọ kwagara Sweden

Na Sweden, ọ malitere ụlọ ihe nkiri Integrationsteatern ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmemme ihe nkiri Cinemafrica, onye isi oche nke atụmatụ dị iche iche Tryck, ma mee ọtụtụ egwuregwu, na ihe nkiri Medan vi lever
Chimbaira nwụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018, ọ dị afọ iri atọ na abụọ
Kudzanai-Violet Hwami nke (amụrụ n' afọ 1993) bụ onye na-ese ihe na mba Zimbabwe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na mba ofesi London, England
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọrita-ahụ, agbụrụ na okike
A mụrụ ya na Gutu, Zimbabwe, ebe ọ bi wee rue afọ iteghete
Site n'afọ iteghete wee ruo n'afọ iri na asaa,ọ bi na mba South Afrika
N'afọ iri na asaa, ọ kwagara mba ofesi London, England
Agụnyere Hwami na Venice Biennale nke afọ 2019
Na afọ 2020, ọ etinyere Hwami na akwụkwọ akụkọ Apollo '40 Under 40 Afrika'
Ọrụ ya gụnyere na mkpokọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ebe ngosi nka Zeitz MOCAA, South Afrika
Ebemsibia
Kudzanai Chiurai (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1981) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe ike
Ihe ndekọ nka ya na-ejikọta iji mgbasa ozi agwakọta nke gụnyere iji eserese, eserese, vidiyo na foto iji dozie ma dozie nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na omenala na Zimbabwe

Kemgbe ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'afọ 2003, e gosipụtara ihe osise ya na Museum of Modern Art na New York City, Museum für Moderne Kunst na Frankfurt, Victoria na Albert Museum na London, na documenta na Kassel, Germany
Forbes depụtara ya n'etiti 'Ndị Afrịka iri na atọ ga-ele anya n'afọ 2013'
N'afọ 2015, Forbes kpọrọ ya aha n'etiti '15 Young African Creatives Rebranding Africa'
Kudzanai abụghị naanị onye na-ese ihe kamakwa onye na-ede uri, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye ọkà ihe ọmụma omenala nke na-ekwu maka ikpe na-ezighị ezi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba Zimbabwe
A maghị Kudzanai dị ka onye na-ese foto, mana ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese foto na-arụkọ ọrụ iji mee ka foto studio dị iche iche

A mụrụ Chiurai n'afọ 1981 na Harare, isi obodo Zimbabwe, mana ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ ya na South Africa ebe ọ ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na Fine Art na Mahadum Pretoria A na-ewerekwa Kudzanai dị ka akụkụ nke ọgbọ 'enweghị ọmụmụ' ebe ọ bụ na a mụrụ ya otu afọ mgbe nnwere onwe nke mba Zimbabwe gasịrị
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya site na eserese ala na ihe osise ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ mba ya Zimbabwe gaa South Africa ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'iji nka dị ka ụdị ọrụ

N'afọ 2004, Chiurai gara n'ala ọzọ mgbe ọ natara iyi egwu njide ya na-esote ihe ngosi ya nke Rau Rau na Agha Zimbabwe, ihe osise abụọ na-ese okwu nke gosipụtara Robert Mugabe dị ka onye mmụọ ọjọọ n'oge a na-ewuli elu maka ntuli aka ukwu nke mba Zimbabwe n'afọ 2008
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara obere ihe nkiri ya bụ Iyeza n'oge afọ 2013 Sundance Film Festival
Kudzanai bụ onye mmeri nke FNB art prize na South Africa
Kudzanai na-eji nwoke na ike dị ka ụdị na usoro n'ọtụtụ ihe osise ya iji gosipụta mgbagwoju anya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa
A na-egosipụtakwa echiche nke nwoke na ike n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi otu ya nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Onye isi ojii', 'Onye ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ' na 'Ịnwụ ịbụ ụmụ nwoke'
Kudzanai na-eji nka egosipụta gburugburu ya dị ka ụlọ ahịa ndị dị na Johannesburg na eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ na-elekwasị anya n'obodo South Africa n'ọtụtụ ihe osise ya
Kudzanai mepụtara otu mpempe akwụkwọ akpọrọ 'Conflict Resolution' nke na-egosi isiokwu nke esemokwu na ime ihe ike, tinyere ụzọ ndị mmadụ si edozi esemokwu ndị a
O jiri foto dijitalụ na mbipụta mepụta mpempe akwụkwọ ndị a akpọrọ 'Mkpebi esemokwu' nke na-ekwu maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa
A na-egosipụta ọrụ vidio Kudzanai na mgbidi na Zukerman Museum nke vidiyo ahụ na-ekwu maka ọdịiche dị n'etiti echiche ọdịda anyanwụ nke Africa na eziokwu nke kọntinent Africa
A na-etinyekwa echiche nke ijikọ ụwa ọnụ n'ime ọrụ nka ya
Kuino, n' akụkọ ọdịnala Africa (Guinea), bụ mmụọ ọjọọ nke nwere obi ya n' ihe onwunwe, nke a na-akpọ sambio
Onye dibịa afa nwere ike ibibi sambio, nke a na-ebute ọnwụ nke mmụọ
Kuiper bụ aha ọrụ nke ndi Dutch nke pụtara cooper
Ụdị mkpụrụ okwu ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere Kuyper, Kuipers, Kuijper, Kuijpers, Kuypers, na De Kuyper
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere
Àtụ Cooper-surname
Thaddis Laphonia 'Kuk' Harrell (/kuːk/ KOOK) bụ ónyé America na-ede egwu, ónyé na-emepụta olu, onye nhazi na injinia
Ọ bụ ónyé otu ndị na-ede egwu nke ya onwe ya, Christopher 'Tricky' Stewart na Terius 'The-Dream' Nash

N'afọ 2011, Kuk Harrell na ónyé mmekọ ya Tricky Stewart sonyeere ndị American Idol nke Fox tinyere ónyé egwu egwu Jimmy Iovine, na-emepụta ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ndị na-asọmpi na-eme na telivishọn ma wepụta ya site na iTunes
2011 gosipụtara nloghachi a na-atụ anya nke Jennifer Lopez na abọm ya LOVE? nke Kuk jere ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu
N'inweta Grammy nke anọ ya maka mmepụta olu nke Rihanna's No
1 Billboard Single 'Only Girl (In the World)', Harrell bụkwa onye na-emepụta olu na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ nke Rihanna na-enweta Grammy 'Umbrella'
Onye na-ede egwu na ónyé injinia na chaatị Beyoncé na-ebute 'Single Ladies (Put A Ring On It) ' site na album I Am
Sasha Obi Ike, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-emepụta olu na injinia nke Diane Warren dere 'I Was Here' site na album 4 nke Beyoncé na 2011
O mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime olu na Mary J
Blige's Platinum album Growing Pains, nke meriri 2008 Grammy maka Best Contemporary R&B Album
Otu egwu mbụ sitere na Growing Pains, 'Just Fine', nwetara nhọpụta Grammy màkà arụmọrụ R&B kachasị mma na 2007
Kuk bụ asụsụ Grassfields Bantu nke Cameroon
Na ngwụcha afọ 1980s na mmalite afọ 1990s, ụfọdụ ndị si n'obodo Kumfutu (nke bụ obodo Kuk) enweghị afọ ojuju n'ochichi Kuk ma guzobe otu Kumfutu Student Association n'ihi ya
Ndị obodo Kumfutu chọrọ ịnwere onwe ha puo na Kuk, ya mere, ha tụpụtara asụsụ 'Kumfutu' ọhụrụ
Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, ndị Kumfutu adighizi emegide ochichi Kuk
Ihe banyere Kumfutu bu ihe atụ nke otú mgbanwe asụsụ na Africa na-ejikọtakari na mkpa maka ọdịiche agbụrụ
Àtụ Grassfields Bantu languages
Kukawa (nke a na-akpọbụ Kuka ) bụ otu n'ime obodo di na ọchịchị ime obodo dị na steeti Borno nke dị na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke dị nso n'ọdọ mmiri Chad
Ewubere obodo ahụ n'afọ 1814 dị ka isi obodo nke Alaeze Ukwu Kanem-Bornu site n'aka onye nkụzi nkè
Ụka Alakuba na onye agha Muhammad al-Amin al-Kanemi mgbe ọdịda nke isi obodo gara aga, Ngazargamu gasịrị
Obodo ahụ nwere nnukwu atụmatụ dị mkpa, ịbụ otu n'ime ọdụ ndịda nke ụzọ ahia trans-Saharan na- aga Tripoli

Onye Jaman na-eme nchọpụta bụ Heinrich Barth gara obodo ahụ n'afọ 1851 onye si Tripoli bịa na-achọ imepe azụmahịa na mba Eropu na inyocha mba Afrịka, ọzọ n'afọ 1892, site n'aka onye nyocha Fransị Parfait-Louis Monteil, onye na-enyocha ókèala dị n'etiti mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke ndi Afrịka kenyere ndị Fransị na ndị Briteni
Onye agha Sudan Rabih az-Zubayr weghaara ma chụọ ya n'obodo ahụ n'afọ 1893 na ndị Britain n'afọ 1902
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, obodo ahụ buru ibu karịa ka ọ dị taa, site n' atụmatụ ọnụnụ ọgụgụruruhihe e dịka puku iri ise- puku iri isii nke ndị ị Briteni merụ na njedebe narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
Obodo ndị dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Kukawa gụnyere Cross Kauwa na Baga, mana o nweghị ebe a na-akpọ Kukawa ma e wezụga ọchịchị ime obodo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọchịchị ime Obodo iri na isii mebere Borno Emirate, steeti ọdịnala dị na Borno Steeti, Naijiria

Na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2015, 'onyeisi oche onye nlekọta anya nke ọnọdu ọchịchị ime Obodo Kukawa, Musa Alhaji Bukar Kukawa', na-ekwuchitere ndị Kukawai a chụgara na Medụgiri na-nsochi ogbugbu Baga n'afọ 2015, 'kpọkuru gọọmenti etiti ka ọ gbalisie ike na ọrụ ndị agha ka ha wee nwere ike ịlaghachi n'ụlọ ha' Ogbugbu mere na Kukawa na Julaị n'afọ 2015
Ndị Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP) jidere ọtụtụ narị ụmụ amaala Kukawa n' ọnwa Ọgọsụtụ n'afọ 2020
Nde mmadụ abụọ nọ na Borno agbapụla n'ụlọ ha n'ime afọ iri gara aga ebe Ọtụtụ ndị bi n'ọnọdụ ọjọọ na Medụgiri

Kuli-kuli na-ezo aka na nri dị nro nke West Africa nke e ji ahụekere mee
Nke mbụ nke ndị Nupe nke NDI West Africa mere
ọ bụ nri na-ewu ewu na obodo Nijiria, Benin, n'ebe ugwu Cameroon na Ghana
A na-erikarị ya naanị ya ma ọ bụ na ngwakọta nke garri nke a makwaara dị ka ntujiakpu, ihe otobiribir na mmiri a na-akpọkarị 'garri ogbugbo'
A na ejika ihe okoko ndi Swiss eri ya na , fura, kamu; mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-agbanye ya na ihe ngwakota
A na-agbakarị ya dị ka ihe eji eme ihe oriranu nama na Kilishi
Kuli-kuli bụ ihe a na-emepụta site na nhazi ahụekere na mmanụ ahụekere
Kuli kuli (nri mkpụrụ osisi / ahụekere) na Ghana dịka ọ dị n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke West Africa bụ nri na-atọ ụtọ
Ihe ndị e ji mee ihe na ọdịdị ndị a na-eji eme ihe abụghị ihe zuru ụwa ọnụ na mba ahụ dum
N'akụkụ ugwu nke mba ahụ karịsịa n'etiti ndị Mole-Dagomba, a na-eme Kuli kuli site na ihe fọdụrụnụ e nwetara site na mkpụrụ osisi n'oge a na-ewepụta mmanụ mkpụrụ osisi
A na-ahụkarị ya na obodo Zongo na Ghana
Iji mee kuli-kuli, a na-esi ahụekere sie ma gwakọta ya n'ime ihe a na-akpọ 'Labu'
A na-agwakọta ya na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, nnu, na mgbe ụfọdụ ose a gwakọtara agwakọta, na mgbe mgbe ụfọdụ shuga
A na-eji mmiri wepụ mmanụ karịrị akarị ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ọdịdị achọrọ (bọl gburugburu, cylinders, wdg)Ọ dị iche iche Ịtinye potash na mmanụ ahụ na-eme ka ebe ọ na-esi mmanụ ahụ
Nke a na-eme ka a na-ewepụta mmanụ site na kuli-kuli ka e wee mepụta mmanụ mmiri karịa mgbe usoro ahụ malitere
Ka a na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-esi ya n'ọkụ, ihe ahụekere ahụekere ahụ na-amalite ịka ike ma sie ike
A na-ewepụ ya na mmanụ ahụ ma hapụ ya ka ọ jụọ oyi ruo mgbe ọ dị njikere iri ya
Ọ na-adị ogologo ndụ ma na-enyekarị ụmụaka dị ka ihe oriri ma ọ bụ na-ere ya na ọdụ ụgbọ ala site n'aka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nye ndị njem agụụ na-agụ
Akụkụ niile nke imepụta na ire mmanụ ahụekere na kuli-kuli ka a na-ewere dị ka 'ọrụ nwanyị'
Ọtụtụ mgbe, ụmụ nwanyị na-achịkwa akụkụ niile nke mmepụta na ahịa kuli-kuli
Ụmụ nwanyị na-akụ ihe ọkụkụ ahụ, wepụ ma nụchaa mmanụ ahụ, sie kuli-kuli, buru ya gaa ahịa, ma ree ya
N'ọtụtụ ọdịbendị, a na-ewere nke a dị ka 'ego (onwe ya) nke o nwetara iji mepụta dịka o chere kwesịrị
N'ụzọ dị iche, nwoke na-akụ ahụekere nwere ike ire ihe ọkụkụ ya niile nke 100 kilogram akpa n'ozuzu
Onye na-ere ahịa ga-ahụ maka njem
Kuli-Kuli nwere protein n'ihi ahụekere e ji mee ya
O nwekwara Magnesium, Phosphorus na Vitamin E
Kulu Abdullahi Sifawa bụ onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara Ụmụ Nwaanyị ugbua na Sokoto Steeti, Naijiria nke Gọvanọ Aminu Tambuwal họpụtara
Dị ka kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụnwaanyị nke Sokoto steeti, Sifawa kwadoro ka e kpee onye ọ bụla a hụrụ na ọ na-emetọ ụmụaka ma ọ bụ nwanyị ikpe
E nyere amụma a na nzukọ ndị nnọchi anya obodo, ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala, ndị nnọchi anya mgbasa ozi, na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa

A mụrụ Kunlé Adeyemi na (1976-04-07)7 Eprel 1976 ma bụrụ onye Naijiria na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-ahụ maka obodo na onye na-eme nchọpụta
Adeyemi bụ onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nke NLÉ, ụlọọrụ ihe owuwu, mmewe na ime obodo, nke dị na Amsterdam, na Netherlands
Adeyemi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos na Nigeria na Mahadum Princeton na New Jersey, United States
Tupu ọ malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na Netherlands, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri na Office for Metropolitan Architecture (OMA)
A mụrụ Adekunle Adeyemi ma zụlite ya na Kaduna, n'ebe bụ ugwu Naịjirịa, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma malite ọrụ mbụ ya na Lagos
Nna ya bụ onye na-ewu ụlọ nke oge a nke malitere otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị mbụ na-ewu ụlọ na Northern Nigeria n'afọ ndị 1970
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Adeyemi nwere ohere imepụta ụlọ mbụ ya, maka enyi nna ya
Adeyemi gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Lagos na Naịjirịa, ma gụchaa nweta nzere bachelọ ya dị ka Best Graduate
N'afọ 2005, Adeyemi nwetara nzere Post-Professional na Princeton University School of Architecture na New Jersey
Na mahadum ahụ, Adeyemi na Peter Eisenman nyochara, ngwa ngwa obodo dị na ọrụ nke akụ na ụba ahịa na obodo ndị na-emepe emepe nke Global South, na-elekwasị anya na Lagos
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Adeyemi rụrụ ọrụ na Lagos, Abuja na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirịa
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Adeyemi sonyeere OMA (The Office for Metropolitan Architecture) na 2002, ebe ọ bụ Senior Associate ma rụọ ọrụ ihe dị ka afọ itoolu n'akụkụ onye guzobere ya Rem Koolhaas
N'ebe ahụ, Adeyemi duziri ọrụ ndị a, n'oge dị iche iche
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Adeyemi na-arụ ọrụ nke ya, imewe na ime obodo nke a na-akpọ NLÉ, nke dị na Amsterdam
NLÉ pụtara 'n'ụlọ' na Yoruba
Site na ụlọ ọrụ ya NLÉ, Adeyemi nwere mmasị n'ihe ndị mejupụtara obodo
Ọ na-elekwasị anya karịsịa n'obodo ndị na-eto ngwa ngwa na mba ndị na-emepe emepe
Adeyemi na-achọ ezi uche na usoro ndị na-ebili na mmepe ngwa ngwa nke obodo ndị ahụ
Ọ na-ahụ ma na-ajụ usoro ndị dị ugbu a n'ime obodo ndị a, ma mepụta ngwọta ọhụrụ sitere na 'ịgụ' nke usoro ndị ahụ
Adeyemi kwenyesiri ike na enwere ọtụtụ ihe ị ga-amụta site n'ụdị ọnọdụ a na-ahụ n'obodo ndị na-emepe ngwa ngwa, ndị nwere ume, dị ka otu n'ime obodo ndị mmadụ bi n'Africa bụ Lagos na Nigeria
NLÉ na-enye ọrụ ndụmọdụ atụmatụ ma na-elekwasị anya na nyocha mmepe obodo, echiche, nhazi ihe okike, ụkpụrụ ụlọ, ngwaahịa na akụrụngwa, nka na ntinye aka omenala obodo
N'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na nso nso a, Adeyemi nwere mmasị karịsịa na obodo mepere emepe, mgbanwe ihu igwe, na iwu
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, Adeyemi duziri NLÉ ihe omume ndị a
Adeyemi nyere ma na-enye nkuzi na ọmụmụ ihe na mahadum na nzukọ na Amsterdam, Zurich, Delft, Guggenheim, ma bipụta ọtụtụ isiokwu banyere ụlọ na ime obodo
Kunle Adejuyigbe (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke ọnwa ọgọstụ 1977) bụ onye n'agba oso nke Naijiria
Adejuyigbe nwetara ihe nrite ọla na mita 4 x 400 n'asọmpi mba ụwa nke 1995, ya na ndị otu egwuregwu Udeme Ekpeyong, Jude Monye na Sunday Bada

Olakunle Joel Adewale (a mụrụ n'abali iri n' ato nke n'ọnwa isee n'afọ 1981) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke hiwere Tender Arts Nigeria n'afọ 2013, otu Ogbako na-elekwasị anya na nkà ọgwụgwọ, nka na ahụike, mmepe talent, ike obodo na itinye aka na obodo site na nka ọhụụ, edemede na nka nke na-abara ụmụaka, ndị ntorobịa, ndị okenye na ndị agadi n' mba uwa niile

N'afọ 2015, ọ zutere onye isi ala mba Amerika buBarack Obama na United States nke ọmatara site n' Mandela Washington Fellowship maka mmetụta ndu n'iji nka meziwanye ndụ ndị mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi ya na n'afọ 2019, ọ natara nkwanye ùgwù mba ụwa na United States dị ka onye isi obodo Cincinnati, John Cranley kwupụtara abali abụọ n' onwa asato dị ka “Kunle Adewale Day' na nkwanye ùgwù maka enyemaka ya na United States na ngalaba abụọ nke Arts na Medicine

A mụrụ Adewale na abali iri Na ato nke onwa asato n' afo 1981 dị ka nwa nke itoolu n'ime ezinụlọ nke ụmụ iri na anọ na Mushin, nke dị na Lagos Steeti ebe ọ gara n'ihu gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na Mushin Mainland Model Primary School tupu ọ gaa St

Joseph Boy's Secondary School, Surulere, Lagos Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Auchi Polytechnic iji mụọ eserese na ngalaba eserese niile ma mesịa nweta nzere bachelọ nke nka na Fine na Applied Arts na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ Nchikota Ohaneze na Mahadum Tulane, New Orleans na 2015 na Arts in Medicine summer intensive na Mahadum Florida
Adewale malitere nka n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri, ihe odide Bible, ihe odide okike ma mesịa gbanwee iji mee ya n'ụzọ ọkachamara

N'afọ 2019, onye isi obodo Cincinnati, onye isi obodo John Cranley kwanyeere ya ùgwù maka onyinye ya na nka na nkà mmụta ọgwụ dị ka August 2, 2019 ka a kpọsara dị ka “Kunle Adewale Day” na Cincinnati, Ohio, USA wee bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na International Artist in Residence of the Eyes of the Artists Foundation
Adewale ebipụtala akwụkwọ abụọ, nke gụnyere ndị a
Emmanuel Olakunle Filani (amụrụ na 8 Septemba 1957) bụ onye nkuzi na onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria

A na-ahụta ọrụ ya nke ọma na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke echiche nke a na-akpọ Onaism; Onaism bụ mmegharị nka nke dabere na njikọta nke atụmatụ, ịchọ mma na ihe ndị dị na ihe osise ọdịnala Yoruba na akwa na ihe osise ọgbara ọhụrụ dị ka eserese
Filani bụkwa onye nkuzi na onye nchịkwa - ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye bụbu onye isi nke Federal College of Education, Osiele, Abeokuta

A mụrụ Filani n'ụbọchị nke asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1957 n'ezinụlọ lụrụ karịa otu nwanyị, nna ya bụ Jacob Ogunmoroti Filani bụ onye obodo Ikole-Ekiti na Ekiti Steeti, ọ bụ onye ọrụ obodo nke na-arụ ọrụ na kansụl gọọmentị obodo ebe nne ya bụ onye nkụzi
Nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1975 mgbe Filani dị afọ iri na asaa
N'ihi ọrụ nna ya, ezinụlọ ahụ bi n'obodo dị iche iche mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Bishop Akinyele Primary School, Ibadan (1967-1969) na St Peter's Primary School, Ikole (1969)
Ọ gara Doherty Memorial Grammar School na Ijero Ekiti ya na nwanne ya nwoke, onye omenkà ibe ya bụ Tolu Filani
Mgbe ọ nọ na Form 2, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nyere klas maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-achọ ọrụ nka ma mesịa goro onye nkụzi nka iji jikwaa klas ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1974 ma rụọ ọrụ obere oge ruo afọ abụọ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ Lafarge Cement na Ewekoro
Site na 1976-1980, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Fine Arts
Na Ife, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ngalaba nke gụnyere Babatunde Lawal, Munio Makuchi, Agbo Folarin na Rowland Abiodun kụziiri ya ihe
Ọ bụ na mahadum ka ọ zutere ụfọdụ ndị omenkà ibe ya dịka Moyo Okediji na Moyo Ogundipe; ha mechara gaa n'ihu ịmepụta Ona art movement na ngwụsị afọ 1980
O nwekwara mmasị na nnwale petro-polystyrene na Ife
O nwetara nzere Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Benin, dịka otu n'ime ihe ọ na-aghaghi imezu maka mmecha nzere ahụ, o mere ihe ngosi agụmakwụkwọ nke akpọrọ 'A Trip to Wonderland'
Ọ zụlitere nkà n'ichepụta ihe na mbipụta
Filani mechara nweta nzere doctoral na Visual Arts na Mahadum nke Ibadan n'afọ 2002
Filani jere ozi dị ka onye kọpa na Kano Teacher's College n'etiti 1980 na 1981
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi nka na St Louis School, Owo na 1981

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ MFA, ọ sonyeere ngalaba nka nke Adeyemi College of Education, Ondo n'afọ 1985, ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye isi ngalaba tupu ọ hapụ kọleji ahụ n'afọ 1992 iji guzobe ngalaba nka ọhụrụ na Federal College of Education, Akoka, Lagos
Mgbe ọ nọ na Adeyemi College, Filani tinyere aka na nhazi nke Ona Group
Ona dị ka echiche nka na-elekwasị anya na ịmegharị na ntụgharị nke ihe ọdịnala na usoro ndị ga-ejedebe na ebe dị elu nke nka na imewe Yoruba nke oge a
O nwere ihe ngosi abụọ n'onwe ya n'oge a - 'Coming on Strong', ihe ngosi nke mbipụta, eserese na August 1989 na 'Salute to Patience' na 1991

N'agbata afọ 1992 na 1997, e gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na ụfọdụ ihe ngosi otu na Lagos, ihe ngosi otu gụnyere, 'Best of Ife' na 1993, 'On and On' na 1993, 'Harvest of Sensation' na 1991 na 'Legacy', ihe ngosi iji kwanyere Irein Wangboje ùgwù na 1996
O nwere ihe ngosi naanị ya na 1997 nke a kpọrọ 'Patterns of Ona'
Ọ bụ onye isi nke School of Technical Education na Provost, Federal College of Education, Osiele-Abeokuta
Ihe osise Filani na-adaba n'okpuru ụdị anọ ngosipụta ihe atụ, ala, ọrụ ndị a na-ekewaghị ekewa na nhazi ndị a na-ekpochapụ kpamkpam
Ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ụfọdụ ihe osise ya bụ iji eserese akara ịchọ mma na ụkpụrụ
Filani lụrụ Celestina Omigie n'afọ 1988, ha na-aga ụlọ ụka Mountain of Fire and Miracles
Kunle Odunlami (amuru n'ubochi 5 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1990) bu onye okachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria, onye na-egwu egwu dịka onye mgbachitere Gokulam Kerala FC

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2014, onye nchịkwa Stephen Keshi, kpọrọ ya òkù ka ọ sonyeere ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naijiria maka otu Asompi Mba Afrịka 2014 ebe ọ malitere egwuregwu ọ bụla wee bụrụ okacha mma nke XI na asọmpi ahụ ma ndị otu nweta nnoro nke atọ

Oyekunle Ayinde 'Kunle' Olukotun bụ onye sayensị kọmputa Naijiria a mụrụ na Britain bụ onye bụ Prọfesọ Cadence Design Systems nke Stanford School of Engineering, Prọfesor nke Injinia Eletrik na Sayensị Kọmputa na Mahadum Stanford na onye nduzi nke Stanford Pervasive Parallelism Lab
A maara Olukotun dị ka 'nna nke multi-core processor', na onye ndú nke Stanford Hydra Chip Multiprocessor research project

Ihe ndị Olukotun rụzuru gụnyere imepụta CPU mbụ nwere ọtụtụ isi, ịmepụta otu chip multiprocessor na multi-threaded processor design, yana ịmepụta CPU na GPUs multicore, teknụzụ ebe nchekwa azụmahịa na ụdị mmemme asụsụ ngalaba
Ihe nchọpụta nke Olukotun gụnyere usoro kọmputa, usoro mmemme na usoro nhazi, asụsụ mpaghara na ndị nchịkọta dị elu
Olukotun gụrụ akwụkwọ na Calvin College, na Grand Rapids, Michigan
O nwetara MS (1987) na PhD (1991) na Mahadum Michigan, na Computer Science na Injinia
Onye ndụmọdụ ya bụ Trevor Mudge
Olukotun sonyeere Ngalaba Injinịa Eletrik nke Stanford na 1991
Mgbe ọ nọ na Stanford, Olukotun ghọrọ onye ndú nke Stanford Hydra chip multiprocessor (CMP) nke mere ka mmepe nke multiprocessors nwee nkwado maka ịkọ nkọ
N'afọ 2000, o guzobere Afara Websystems, ụlọ ọrụ nke mepụtara ma mepụta usoro nhazi dị elu, nke nwere ike dị ala maka usoro sava nwere teknụzụ multiprocessor chip
Sun Microsystems zụrụ Afara n'afọ 2002
Afara multicore processor Niagara, nke Olukotun mepụtara bụ nke Sun nwetara
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na Niagara ugbu a na-enye sava niile dabeere na Oracle SPARC ike ma mepụta ọtụtụ ijeri dollar nke ego
Mgbe ọ nọ na Sun, Olukotun bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe owuwu nke 2005 UltraSPARC T1 processor
Na 2017 Olukotun na Chris Ré guzobere SambaNova Systems
SambaNova Systems na-emepe usoro nhazi nke ọgbọ na-esote iji mee ka mmụta igwe na nyocha data dị ike

Olukotun na-eduga ugbu a na Stanford Pervasive Parallelism Lab, nke na-elekwasị anya n'ime ka kọmputa dị iche iche dị mfe iji, ọ bụkwa onye otu Data Analytics for What's Next (DAWN) Lab, nke nọ na-emepe akụrụngwa maka mmụta igwe
Nnyocha Olukotun na-elekwasị anya na ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa, gburugburu mmemme na usoro nhazi, asụsụ mpaghara, na ndị nchịkọta dị elu
Olukotun na-eduga ọrụ nyocha Stanford Hydra chip multiprocessor (CMP), na-agbanwe kọmputa site n'iweta teknụzụ multi-core nye ndị na-azụ ahịa na usoro kọmputa dị elu
N'etiti afọ ndị 1990, Olukotun na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ ya kwuru na ọtụtụ nhazi kọmputa nwere ike iji ngwaike mee ihe karịa atụmatụ superscalar dị ugbu a
N'afọ 2008, Olukotun laghachiri Stanford, wee guzobe Pervasive Parallelism Laboratory na Stanford mgbe ọ natasịrị US $ 6 nde na ego site n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa

Ọrụ ya na-adịbeghị anya na-elekwasị anya na asụsụ mmemme nke ngalaba nke nwere ike ikwe ka algorithms mee ka ọ dị mfe iji ọtụtụ ụdị ngwaike dị iche iche gụnyere usoro multi-core, nhazi nhazi ndị na-ese onyinyo, na usoro ọnụ ụzọ a na-eme atụmatụ
Olukotun bụkwa onye otu ndị ndụmọdụ nke UDC, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na Naijiria
A họpụtara ya dị ka Fellow nke Association for Computing Machinery na 2006 maka 'onyinye ya na multiprocessors na chip na multi threaded processor design'
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu IEEE na 2008
Olukotun ejirila ọtụtụ okwu sitere na ihe nketa Yoruba ya mee ihe na nyocha ya

Afara, aha ụlọ ọrụ ọ tọrọ ntọala, pụtara 'àkwà mmiri' n'asụsụ Yoruba, ọ gụrụkwa ihe nkesa ya na Stanford Ogun n'aha chi Yoruba nke ígwè na ígwè, egwuregwu na okwu ebe ọ bụ na a na-akpọkarị nnukwu kọmputa nnukwu ígwè
Olukotun na-eduzi Stanford Pervasive Parallelism Lab (PPL) nke na-achọ ịbawanye ojiji nke parallelism na mpaghara ngwa niile
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Data Analytics for What's Next (DAWN) Lab
Olukotun nwere ikike ikike 12 nke US
O bipụtara ihe karịrị akwụkwọ sayensị 150 ma dee akwụkwọ nkuzi abụọ

Oyekunle Opeyemi Oluwaremi (amụrụ na 18 Ọktoba 1988) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi ndị gụnyere, Falling, Family Forever na Tinsel Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ meriri mbipụta nke asaa nke Gulder Ultimate Search na 2010
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na New York Film Academy
Kunle Remi gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy, Los Angeles, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2014
Nke a sochiri ihe nkiri na-amụta ihe nkiri na ntụziaka site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2015
Remi bụ onye na-eso ụzọ nke Kraịst
Remi malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ meriri Gulder Ultimate Search n'afọ 2010
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na Heavy Beauty, nke Grace Edwin Okon mepụtara ma bụrụ nke Stanlee Ohikhuare duziri
Mgbe e mesịrị, o mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, usoro TV, na ihe nkiri, gụnyere Family Forever, Tinsel, Lagos Cougars Reloaded, The Getaway, Falling, na Africa Magic's Forbidden
E gosipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Africa Magic Original Films
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na New York Film Academy, Remi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta TV maka ụlọ ọrụ TV Ịntanetị, Celebville 360
Mpụta mbụ ya bụ ịkọ akụkọ ndụ na mmemme nhọpụta Academy Awards na Beverly Hills, California
N'afọ 2021, ọ ghọrọ onye na-akwado (taskmaster) nke Gulder Ultimate Search
Remi malitere ọrụ ime ihe ngosi ya na ụdị ISIS
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gosipụtara na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi maka ụdị dị ka Airtel, MTN Nigeria, DStv, na Diamond Bank
Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework (GBF) bụ nsonaazụ nke ọgbakọ 2022 United Nations Biodiversity Conference
Aha echere ya abụrụla 'Mkpụrụ n'ime ụdịdị dị iche iche zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Post-2020'
A nabatara GBF site na ọgbakọ nke iri na ise nke otu (COP15) na Nkwekọrịta banyere Diversity Biological na 19 Disemba 2022
A kwalitere ya dị ka 'Agreement Paris for Nature'

Akpọrọ aha Framework ahụ aha obodo abụọ, Kunming, nke echere ka ọ bụrụ obodo nnabata maka COP15 na Ọktọba 2020 mana yigharịrị wee hapụ ọrụ nnabata n'ihi amụma COVID China, yana Montreal, nke bụ oche nke Mgbakọ na Diversity Diversity
Secretariat wee banye na nnabata COP15 ka Kunming kwụsịrị
GBF nwere ebumnuche 4 zuru ụwa ọnụ ('Kunming-Montreal Global Goals for 2050') na ebumnuche 23 ('Kunming-Montreal 2030 Global Targets')
A na-akpọkarị 'Target 3' dị ka ebumnuche '30 site na 30'
Ọ na-aga nke ọma atụmatụ Strategic for Biodiversity 2011-2020 (gụnyere ebumnuche Aichi Biodiversity Targets)
Ọ na-akọwapụta na mba ga-akwụsị inye aka n'ihe omume ndị na-emebi ọzara, dị ka ịkụpụta akụ na ụbara na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ anọ ahụ bụ
Mmejuputa GBF ga-eduga na mmetụta ndị a
Kunu (nke a makwaara dị ka kununzaki) bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ a ma ama a na-aṅụ na Naịjirịa niile, karịsịa n'ebe ugwu
A na-ejikarị ọka dị ka millet ma ọ bụ sorghum eme ya, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike iji ọka mee ya
Dị ka ihe ọṅụṅụ sitere na ọka, Kunu bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Horchata
Ụdị ihe ọṅụṅụ dị iche iche e ji mkpuru oka soghum mee bụ ụcha mmiri ara ehi na-acha nchara nchara, ebe nke e ji ọka na ọka mee na-acha ọcha

A na-eme Kunu site na ibu ụzọ kwe ka mkpụrụ ọka ahụ pulite, wee tinye mkpụrụ ahụ na mmiri ruo ụbọchị ole na ole ma gwakọta ọka ahụ na poteto na-atọ ụtọ na ginger ma ọ bụ ose iji mepụta ihe na-akwọ mụrụmụrụ
A na-ekewazi ihe a n'akụkụ abụọ
A na-etinye otu akụkụ n'ime arịa [nkọwa dị mkpa] ma wụnye mmiri na-esi ísì ụtọ na ya, mgbe ahụ, a na-akpali ya iji nye ngwakọta siri ike
A na-agbakwunye akụkụ nke ọzọ nke paste na ngwakọta a ma na-akpali ya ọzọ
A na-ahapụ ngwakọta ahụ maka otu ụbọchị ma ọ bụ abụọ ka ọka ọka ahụ daa
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, a na-enyocha mkpo na ihe ndị ọzọ dị n'ime ngwakọta ahụ, a na'itinye mmiri a na-edozi maka oriri
Kuo (Koh) bụ asụsụ Mbum nke ndịda Chad na ugwu Cameroon
A na-asụ Kuo, dị ka Kali, n'ebe ndị dịgasị iche iche n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ngalaba Vina (Mbe na mpaghara Ngaoundéré ọwụwa Anyanwụ) na ngalaba Mbere (Meiganga commune) na mpaghara Adamawa
N'ebe owụwa anyanwụ, a na-asụ ya n'akụkụ ugwu nke ngalaba Lom-et-Djerem (Garoua-Boulaï na Bétaré-Oya communes)
Mmadụ 2,975 na-asụ ya
Àtụ Adamawa languagesÀtụ Languages of Cameroon
Kurów bụ village no na South-Eastern ala ana-kpo Poland
Ono n'etiti obodo Puławy na Lublin, obodo no n'ime Poland, ebe miri ogologo (river) ana-kpo Kurówka
Kur Gai Kur (amụrụ na 20 Febụwarị 2000) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti maka klọb Australia Adelaide City
A mụrụ ya na Kenya, Kur na-egwuri egwu maka otu mba South Sudan
A mụrụ Kur dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ South Sudan na Kenya, wee kwaga Australia mgbe ọ dị afọ 2
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ na Modbury Vista site n'afọ 8 ruo 9, tupu ọ banye na mmemme Skillaroos ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
Ọ bịanyere aka na Modbury tupu ọ banye na Croydon Kings na 2020
Ọ gara Adelaide City na 2021, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị elu
Kur mere nke mbụ ya na ndị otu mba South Sudan na mmeri enyi na enyi na Jordan na 31 Jenụwarị 2022
Kuramo Beach bụ ụsọ osimiri ájá dị na Lagos, Naijiria, nke dị n'akụkụ ndịda nke Victoria Island, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Bar Beach na ndịda nke ọdọ mmiri Kuramo Waters
Ọ bụ ebe ọtụtụ ụlọ obibi na ụlọ iwu na-akwadoghị, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-eji maka ntụrụndụ egwu, ụlọ mmanya na ịgba akwụna
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, oke mmiri nke Oké Osimiri Atlantic wakporo Kuramo Beach, na-ebibi ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ndị a ma ma gbuo mmadụ iri na isii
N'echi ya, ndị ọchịchị gọọmentị gbapụrụ n'ógbè ahụ, kwatuo ụlọ ndị fọdụrụnụ wee malite ịbawanye ájá
A na-ekwu na mwakpo oke osimiri a na-eme n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ọ bụla n'ụsọ osimiri, ọ bụ ezie na n'afọ ndị gara aga ọ dịghị onye nwụrụ
Kusasi bụ asụsụ Gur nke a na-asụkarị n'ebe ugwu Ghana, na Burkina Faso
Ihe karịrị mmadụ 150,000 na-asụ ya ma were aha ya n'aka ndị Kusaasi
E nwere ụfọdụ obodo nta nke Kusaasi na Burkina
Kusaal nwere njikọ chiri anya na Mampruli, asụsụ nke Mamprussi, ndị bi na ndịda, na Dagbani
E nwere nnukwu nkewa asụsụ n'etiti Agole, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke osimiri White Volta, na Toende, n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Obodo Agole nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu okwu, naanị nnukwu obodo nke mpaghara ahụ, Bawku, dị na Agole
Nsụgharị Agba Ọhụrụ dị n'asụsụ Agole

Dị ka ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ OtíVolta, ọ tụfuru usoro nkwekọrịta klas dị mgbagwoju anya nke a ka na-ahụ na ihe atụ nke Gurmanche, ma nwee naanị usoro okike, mmadụ / na-abụghị mmadụ
A ka nwere ike ịmata ọdịiche dị n'ụdị aha na ụzọ aha si eme ka otu dị iche iche dị iche iche site na ọtụtụ site na nsonaazụ abụọ
Kusaal na-egosi ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na Gur ebe a na-agwakọta aha na adjective stems n'usoro ahụ, na-esote otu / ọtụtụ njedebe
Nchịkọta okwu dị mfe, dị ka asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Oitizọ ma dị iche na asụsụ Gur ndị na-esighị n'otu
Ọtụtụ ngwaa nwere ụdị mgbanwe ise
A na-ebute ngwaa ahụ ụzọ site na usoro nke ụmụ irighiri ihe na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe na-egosipụta oge, polarity na ọnọdụ
Usoro ngwaa na-ewu ewu ma dị mkpa, dị ka ọ dị n'ọtụtụ asụsụ mba West Afrika

Enwere ike ibelata nnọchiaha ihe n'ụdị site na iwu Kusaal ikpeazụ-mfu ụdaume, na-apụta dị ka otu ụdaume, ma ọ bụ ọbụna efu; ha na-ebute ụdaume dị ala na-ejedebe okwu gara aga, nke bụ ụdị dị ala nke ụdaume ikpeazụ nke okwu ahụ, echekwara n'ihu nnọchiaha enclitic
Ihe onwunwe na Kusaal ejirila nwayọọ nwayọọ mụbaa n'ime afọ ole na ole gara aga

Ụfọdụ enyemaka maka ndị na-amụ ihe sitere n'aka ndị otu di na nwunye Spratt bụ ndị malitere ọmụmụ asụsụ nke asụsụ ahụ ma nwee ike inweta ya na GILLBT (Ghana Institute of Linguistics, Literacy and Bible Translation) na Tamale, Ghana
GILLBT mepụtara ihe ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ, nchịkọta akụkọ ọdịnala na ihe ndị ọzọ
E nwekwara akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu dị mfe nke David na Nancy Spratt chịkọtara site n'otu isi iyi ahụ
Enwekwara edemede abụọ sitere n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na phonology (Musah afo 2010) na syntax (Abubakar afo 2011)
A ga-achọta ọtụtụ ozi ụtọ asụsụ gbasara asụsụ Burkina Faso (Toende) na ọrụ phonological nke Niggli nke edepụtara n'okpuru ebe a
Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Orthography nke asụsụ ahụ dịkwa site na GILLBT
Asụsụ ọzọ sara mbara nke Agolle Kusaal dị n'ịntanetị
Olulu mmiri Kusugu bụ olulu ochie dị na Daura, Naịjirịa
A maara olulu mmiri ahụ maka mmekọrịta ya na akụkọ ifo nke dike Bayajidda meriri agwọ Sarki
Olulu mmiri ahụ na mma agha a na-eche na ọ bụ nke Bayajidda bụzi ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta
Dị ka akụkọ ifo ndị Hausa si kwuo, obodo ndị Hausa ebiela na Central Sudan (ọtụtụ n'ime Northern Nigeria nke oge a na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Niger) ruo ihe karịrị afọ 2000
E kwenyere na Daura bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị Hausa kachasị ukwuu n'oge ahụ
O nwere ndị eze nwanyị dịka ndị isi ọchịchị na-elekọta ihe omume ndị mmadụ
N'oge ọchịchị Eze Nwanyị Daurama, isi iyi mmiri ndị Daura bụ olulu mmiri Kusugu
Mana a na-ekwe ka ndị mmadụ kuru mmiri na ya naanị ụbọchị Fraịdee n'ihi agwọ a ma ama nke bi n'ime olulu mmiri ahụ
Nke ahụ bụ otú ndị mmadụ si nọgide na-agụ agụụ ruo otu ụbọchị mgbe onye e kwenyere na ọ bụ nwa eze Baghdadi, Bayajidda (Abu Yazid) bịara Daura n'ihi na o nweghị ike inweta ocheeze mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị
Ọkpara eze nke bụ dị mgbe ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ otu agadi nwanyị aha ya bụ Ayyana, rịọrọ maka mmiri, mana enyeghị ya nke zuuru ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rịọrọ ka egosị ya olulu mmiri ahụ
A dọrọ ya aka ná ntị banyere agwọ a na-amaghị ama
Ọ gara n'olulu mmiri ma mesịa gbuo agwọ ahụ mgbe ha lụchara ọgụ
Eze nwanyị ahụ lụrụ ya o wee ghọọ Eze
N'ihi na ọ pụghị ịsụ asụsụ Hausa tupu mgbe ahụ, ndị mmadụ malitere ịkpọ ya Bayajidda, nke pụtara na ya aghọtaghị na mbụ
Ọ nwere ụmụ asaa ndị chịrị igidimba asaa nke Hausa nke a na-akpọ Hausa Bakwaị

Olulu mmiri Kusugu ahụ bụ ebe e gburu akatakpo agwọ Sarkis nke onye n'abụchaghị Bayajidda na narị afọ 10 n'ihi na agwọ ahụ na-ekwe ka ndị mmadụ kuru mmiri n'olulu ahụ naanị otu ugboro n'izu, ọkachasị Fraịdee
Kutin bụ onye otu ngalaba Duru nke asụsụ Savanna
Ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria na-asụ asụsụ kwagara Cameroon mgbe e guzobere Gashaka-Gumti National Park
Olumba Paar

A na-asụ Paara (Páárá) n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo Tignère ( ngalaba Faro na Deo, mpaghara Adamaoua), n'etiti obodo ahụ a ekwuru na mbu na ókèala Naijiria site n'ihe dị ka ndị ọkà okwu 15,000
Paara Muura, nke kachasị mkpa di iche iche bụ olumba nke ugwu (Mayo Baléo commune, Faro na Deo mpaghara, Adamaoua ), tinyere Gadjiwan na Aimé, ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Tignère
A na-asụ Zongbi na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Tignère nso Djombi, Ngaoundéré commune, ngalaba Vina, mpaghara Adamaoua
Dan Muura is an isolated dialect in the northeast of Banyo (Banyo commune, Mayo-Banyo department, Adamaoua Region)
Blench (2004) weere ụdị atọ ahụ, Peere, Potopo (Kotopo), na Patapori, dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Boxedkids
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Skate Gal Club
Kuukua kwenyere na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị nke mere ka ọ mee ngagharị iwe nke ukwuu n'okporo ámá Accra
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na UNFPA Ghana iji mee nnọkọ ọgwụgwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ ndị lanarịrị mwakpo mmekọahụ

Nkwupụta Kwụsị JJOO 2030 bụ nkwupụta ọha na eze nke 2021 megide Pyrenees-Barcelona 2030 Winter Olympics
N'ịbụ nke otu ndị obodo kwadoro site n'aka onye nhazi nke usoro SOS Pyrenees haziri, ọ nwere nkwado nke ndị nnọchiteanya nke ime obodo, ugwu, omenala na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke gburubruru ahu
Mgbasa ozi ahụ na-ekwu na ịkwalite ọkwa a n'ihe gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe di ka, okpomọkụ ụwa bụ enweghị ọrụ
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ na-adọ aka ná ntị na ebe ezumike Pyrenees adaberelarị na mmepụta snow aka mere ma ọ gaghị adị irè n'etiti oge
N'ihi ya, ọ ga-abụ ihe mgbe ochie ngwa ngwa
N'ihi ya, nkwupụta ahụ na-akwado iwepụ ọrụ ahụ na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị

N'ịga n'ihu, ọ na-arịọ maka ọwa nke itinye ego iji kwalite mgbanwe nke ụdị mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba ọdịiche dị iche iche nke akụ na ụba, ịlụ ọgụ megide ịkọ nkọ na mbelata nke ndị mmadụ na mpaghara ugwu, yana nchedo nke ebe okike na akuku nke mmasi
Na Febụwarị nke afọ 2022, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị Katalan 150 bipụtara 'Independent Scientific Manifesto na 2030 Winter Olympics candidacy na Pyrenees'
Ha na-ekwu na isi 10 ihe mere ọrụ a ji ghara ikwe omume
A na-ekwusi ike na teknụzụ, gburugburu ebe obibi na ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, dị ka enweghị nghọta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Gọọmentị Pere Aragonès enwebeghị ike ime ka ụmụ amaala nweta akwụkwọ nyocha mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi ruo ugbu a
Nkwupụta ahụ na-ekwukwa na mmụba nke njem nleta ga-enwe mmetụta na-ebibi ihe na ụdị dị iche iche nke ugwu
ihe ọzọkwa bụ, mmetụta akụ na ụba nke mpaghara ahụ ga-abụ nke na-adịghị mma, na-eme ka ndị ọrụ nọgide na-enwe nsogbu
Ihe ọzọkwa bụ, e nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ebe ndị e gwupụtara ihe n'ala na Pyrenees nke nwere ike imebi nke ukwuu
N'ikpeazụ, mmụba nke ihe achọrọ maka ike na mmiri, dị ka mmụba na mmetọ, bụ ihe a na-anabataghị n'ihe gbasara ọnọdụ ihu igwe a kwesiri ime ngwa ngwa
Na June 20, nke afọ 2022, Kọmitii Olympic nke Spain wepụrụ kpamkpam onye na-azọ ọkwa maka 2030 Winter Olympics n'ihi enweghị ike iru nkwekọrịta n'etiti gọọmentị Javier Lambán na Pere Aragonès
Mgbe ha nụrụ akụkọ ahụ, Popular Unity Candidacy na En Comú Podem mere emume maka ịhapụ 'macro-project' a ma chọọ atụmatụ itinye ego ọhụrụ maka Pyrenees
Kwaʼ (Bakwa) bụ obere asụsụ Bamileke nke ndi Cameroon
Àtụ Languages of CameroonÀtụ Grassfields Bantu languages
Kwacoco, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụ kwa-coco, bụ nri nke ndi Obodo Cameroon nke nwere ede dị ọcha (ihe ọkụkụ mgbọrọgwụ sitere na Central na South Amerika) nke a na-ekpuchi ma na-esi ísì ụtọ na akwụkwọ unere
Ọ bụ agbụrụ dị iche iche si obodo Cameroon na-eri ya, ọkachasị ndị Kwe, bụ ndị nri ọdịnasal na-ejikarị kwacoco na banga, nke bụ ofe e ji mkpụrụ osisi nkwụ mee, na azụ a na-ami n’ anwụrụ

A na-akpọ ya kwacoco bible mgbe a na-agwakọta cocoyam na ihe ndị ọzọ dịka spinach, azụ a na-ami n’anwụrụ, mmanụ na-acha ọbara ọbara na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, a pụkwara inye ya na ọtụtụ ofe na ofe ndị ọzọ
Njikọ nke kwacoco na banga bụ nri bụ isi maka obodo ndị dị n'ime ime obodo na Cameroon, ndị na-adabere na abụba na carbohydrates nke nri ndị a na-enye iji bie ndụ
N'oge nsogbu nri ụwa nke afọ 2008, a gbara ndị ọrụ ugbo ume ka ha mepụta ede ndị ọzọ, a gwakwara ndị na-azụ ahịa n'obodo ukwu ka ha kwalite oriri ya karịa nri ndị si mba ọzọ
Kwadjo Agyei Addo (amụrụ n'October 15, 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye otu Nzukọ nke Anọ nke Republic nke anọ na-anọchite anya Fanteakwa North Constituency na Eastern Region nke Ghana

A mụrụ Addo n'ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1951, n'obodo dị n'ógbè ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana nke a na-akpọ Fanteakwa Ọ gara Akrokerri College of Education Site n'ebe ahụ, o nwetara asambodo onye nkuzi A na agụmakwụkwọ
A họpụtara Addo na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ nzuko omeiwu na tiketi nke New Patriotic Party n'oge ntuli aka izugbe Ghana nke December 2004 dịka onye otu Fanteakwa North Constituency
O nwetara vootu 20,867 n'ime vootu puku iri atọ na isii, narị asatọ na iri ise na otu ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 566%
Kwabena Amankwah Asiamah meriri ya na ntuli aka nke 2008 Party's Primaries bụ onye sonyere na ntuliaka General ma merie
A họpụtara Addo dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Fanteakwah North na ndị omeiwu nke anọ nke mba Ghana nke anọ site na Jenụwarị 7, 2005, ruo Jenụwarụ 6, 2009

Na ntuli aka izugbe nke Ghana nke afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Samuael Ofosu-Ampofo nke National Democratic Congress na Gyimah Aikins Nyantakyi nke Convention People's Party Ndị a nwetara vootu 15,678 na vootu 306 n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu vootu ziri ezi Ndị a bụ 425% na 08% n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi
Mpaghara Addo bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara 22 nke New Patriotic Party meriri na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na ntuli aka ahụ
N'ozuzu, New Patriotic Party meriri ngụkọta oche ndị omeiwu 128 na ndị omeiwu nke anọ nke mba Ghana nke anọ

O meela ọtụtụ ọrụ iji kwalite mmepe ime obodo na Ghana, ọkachasị site na igwupụta nnu na dayamọnd

Ya mere, ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara Sunyani West na ndị omeiwu nke atọ nke mba nke anọ nke Ghana
A họpụtara ya na mgbe o nwere vootu pụkụ ịrị na anọ na narị asatọ na ịrị abụọ na atọ n'ime vootu pụkụ ịrị abụọ na asaa na narị asatọ na iri asatọ na isii ziri ezi

N'ozuzu, New Patriotic Party meriri ngụkọta nke narị ndị nnọchiteanya ndị omeiwu n'ime oche narị abụọ na ndị omeiwu nke atọ nke mba nke anọ nke Ghana
