Kwadwo Ani bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na Ghana
A mụrụ Ani na Accra, Ghana, n'afọ 1966
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ghanatta College of Art na Ankle College of Art
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na Ghana na mba ụwa
A na-arụ ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na Alliance Francaise, Ghana; Ghana Broadcasting Corporation; na Ministry of Culture of China
Kwadwo Ani mechara ihe ngosi njem na Europe nke British Royal Overseas League kwadoro n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
N'afọ 2004, Ani meriri ebe obibi na Vermont Studio Center nke Ford Foundation kwadoro
Ọrụ ya na nso nso a na-egosi na Ani-kese, nke asụgharịrị ịbụ 'Big Eye' - Ani n'asụsụ ala ya pụtara Anya

N'ụdị dị iche iche nke ọrụ ya na nso nso a, ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike igosipụta ụwa gbara ya gburugburu site na nnukwu anya mepere emepe, na ịkwụwa aka ọtọ na ezi obi nke naanị nwatakịrị na-enweghị uche nwere
Ọrụ ya na-akpalite ọchị ozugbo, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ egwu
Kwadwo Nkansah (a mụrụ na 15 Eprel 1987) nke a maara dịka Lil Win, bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe, onye egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A mụrụ Kwadwo Nkansah nye Madam Adwoa Afrah na Maazị Kwadwo Boadi Nkansah
Ya na ụmụnne ya isii ndị ọzọ tolitere na Kwaman na mpaghara Ashanti
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nduzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Great Minds International na Kumasi, mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Kwadwo Nkansah si Ahenkro Kwaman, na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Kwadwo enweghị ike ịgụcha ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ kwụsịrị na ọkwa isii ma ọ nweghị ike ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya
O meriri 'Favorite Actor' na mbipụta nke isii nke Ghana Movie Awards (GMAs) kwa afọ n'afọ 2015
Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwanyeere ya ùgwù maka mkpọsa ya megide mbata iwu na-akwadoghị na West Africa
Kwadwo Obeng Junior (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1999) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu Premier league nke Ghana bụ Accra Hearts of Oak
Obeng malitere ọrụ ya na otu ndị otu Aduana Stars nke dị na Dormaa
O mechara gbaa bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu Ghana Division One League bụ Nea Salamina Ghana (nke bụzi Wamanfo Mighty Royals FC) n'afọ 2016-2017
Ọ gbara goolu iri na atọ na goolu atọ na Ghana FA Cup na 2017 gụnyere goolu megide Steadfast FC na agba nke iri na isii na Asante Kotoko na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
O duuru klọb ahụ gaa na njedebe kachasị elu na FA Cup tupu Asante Kotoko emeri ya na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Ọrụ ya megide Kotoko dọtara mmasị site na klọb ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ isiokwu nke mkparịta ụka na oghere mgbasa ozi
Obeng kwagara na Hearts of Oak na Eprel 2018 tupu oge 2018 Ghana Premier League
Na 29 Eprel 2018, Obeng gbara egwu mere asọmpi izizi ya maka obi ka ọ malitechara na egwuregwu 1 – 0 megide ndị iro siri ike Kumasi Asante Kotoko
Ọ gbara nkeji 63 nke egwuregwu ewepụrụ maka Aboubacar Traoré
O nwetara ohere igwu naanị egwuregwu atọ ka a kagburu asọmpi ahụ n'ihi ekpughere Anas Number 12 bụ nke butere ọgbaghara nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Ghana
Oge na-esote, n'oge asọmpi pụrụ iche nke kọmitii GFA 2019, Obeng ghọrọ onye otu mgbe niile na mmalite ahịrị n'okpuru njikwa Kim Grant
Na 31 Maachị 2019, n'oge egwuregwu mbụ nke asọmpi ahụ, Obeng meriri goolu asọmpi mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na-enyere ha aka inweta mmeri 1–0 dị ntakịrị na Dreams FC
Na 14 Eprel 2019, o meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ ọzọ iji nyere obi aka nweta mmeri n'ebe ndị ọkachamara nnwere onwe ma debe ha n'usoro nke iru eru maka asọmpi CAF Champions League
Na ngwụcha asọmpi ahụ, ọ gbara egwuregwu iri na atọ wee nye goolu abụọ ka Hearts debere nke mbụ na otu B wee ruo eruo ọkara nke ikpeazụ
Otu ọ dị, Asante Kotoko chụpụrụ ha n'asọmpị asọmpị-ikpeazụ nke asọmpi
Obeng tụfuru na 2019-20 Ghana Premier League ma gbaa naanị egwuregwu atọ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Emechara kagbuo otu egwuregwu ahụ n'ọkara ruo ọgwụgwụ n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na Ghana
Na 20 Ọktoba 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na mgbakwunye nkwekọrịta afọ 3 iji debe ya na klọb ruo 2023 tupu oge 2020-21
A tụrụ anya na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa karịa mgbe Joseph Esso na Kofi Kordzi gachara
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Obeng bidoro oge ahụ n'ụzọ dị mma site n'ịgba bọọlụ n'egwuregwu Ashanti Gold
Ọ gbara goolu ọzọ na mmeri mbụ nke oge ahụ, iji nyere ha aka imeri Dreams FC n'ụzọ 3 na 0 mgbe ha gachara egwuregwu atọ na-enweghị mmeri
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2021, Obeng gbara bọọlụ n'ime nkeji nke iri asatọ na asaa iji chekwaa ihe maka Hearts n'egwuregwu ụlọ megide Legon Cities
N'ikpeazụ, Obeng gara n'egwuregwu ise ma hapụ egwuregwu abụọ ọzọ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ tupu ọ gbaa bọọlụ n'azụ oge na 25 Eprel na nkeji nke 86 iji nweta Hearts ihe dị mkpa megide Karela United
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu gbaa goolu ise n'egwuregwu iri iji nyere Hearts aka imeri league ma kwụsị afọ iri na abụọ ha
mụọ ụmụ ahụhụ
E mechara jiri ya mee ihe ndabere maka ihe nkiri 1964, Kwaidan, nke Masaki Kobayashi dere
Hearn kwupụtara n'okwu mmeghe ya na mbipụta mbụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ, nke o dere na Jenụwarị 20, 1904, obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya, na a sụgharịrị ọtụtụ n'ime akụkọ ndị a site na ederede ochie nke Japan
Otú ọ dị, otu onye ọrụ ugbo nọ n'ógbè Musashi gwara ya akụkọ Yuki-Onna ('Nwanyị Snow')

Enwere ike ịchọta akụkọ ifo nke Yuki-Onna na Japan niile ma buru Kwaidan ụzọ (gụnyere Glimpses of Unfamiliar Japan), ọ bụ ezie na Hearn amaghị na edere ha na mbụ na nsụgharị ya nke na-emerụ Yuk- Onna bụ nke mbụ
'Riki-Baka' dabeere na ahụmịhe onwe onye nke Hearn

Ọ bụ ezie na o kwughị ya n'okwu mmeghe ya, 'Hi-Mawari' n'etiti akụkọ ikpeazụ dị na mpịakọta ahụ yiri ka ọ bụ ncheta nke ahụmịhe nʼoge ọ dị obere (ya bụ, ịtọ onwe ya iche na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka o bụrụ ndị ọzọ niile, edere ya na onye mbụ ma debe ya ime obodo Wales)
Hearn mụrụ ma dee ọtụtụ ihe gbasara ụmụ ahụhụ
Akụkụ ikpeazụ nke Kwaidan nwere edemede atọ gbasara ụmụ ahụhụ yana njikọ ha na nkwenkwe ndị China na ndị Japan
Kwaku Sintim-Misa amaara ka 'KSM' (a mụrụ n'afọ 1956, na Kumasi) bụ onyeGhana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, ode abụ , odee akwụkwọ ọgụgụauthor
O nwekwara ngosi nke onwe ya na na radio and television
ọ bụkwa ya haziri The KSM Show
A mụrụ KSM nke ise n'ime ụmụnne isii na Disemba 5, 1956, n'obodo Kumasi
Ọ gara UST Primary School, Presbyterian Boys 'Senior High School, na Prempeh College
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị kọleji, ọ natara ọzụzụ pụrụ iche na National Film and Television Institute a ma ama na Accra Ghana
Na-inwe mmasị onye na-echegbu onwe ya maka nyocha miri emi banyere nka na-eme ihe nkiri, KSM hapụrụ Africa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri na iduzi na Trinity College na Connecticut, USA
O mechara nweta Master of Fine Arts na mmepụta ihe nkiri na Mahadum New York
KSM malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ọrụ dị iche iche nke Off-Broadway na Public Theatre

E gosikwara ya na usoro mpụ ndị America a ma ama bụ Law & Order na usoro ihe nkiri Medal of Honor Rag (site n'aka onye nduzi mmeri Tony Award Lloyd Richards)KSM ghọọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ mere ihe nkiri Off-Broadway mbụ mgbe ọ mepụtara Thoughts of a Confused Black Man, ihe ngosi otu onye na-ewu ewu nke welitere ajụjụ ndị na-akpali akpali banyere agbụrụ na United States
N'afọ 1997, n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na ọrụ Amerịka ya, ọ laghachiri Ghana iji mee akara ya dịka onye mba dị mpako na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ laghachiri mba ahụ, KSM ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-eme ihe ngosi redio; ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ ya na Talk Shop mere ka Ghana mara ikike mgbasa ozi maka ịmepụta esemokwu na mkparịta ụka
KSM jiri ụdị ọgụ, esemokwu nke wụrụ ndị na-ege ya ntị akpata oyi n'ahụ n'ikwu okwu mba dị mkpa
Ọ gara n'ihu na-edozi ụdị ya na ihe ngosi Nyame Som Ye De, nke kpaliri ndị Ghana iche echiche karịa okpukpe iji kọwaa ọnọdụ ime mmụọ ha sara mbara
Mgbe o mechara onwe ya aha dịka onye na-ahụ maka redio, KSM mepụtara ihe aghọwo otu n'ime ihe ngosi okwu kachasị ewu ewu na Ghana Thank God It's Friday (TGIF)
TGIF bụ mgbasa ozi mbụ nke ụdị ya iji jikọta okwu siri ike, agụmakwụkwọ na ọchị

Kemgbe mmalite ya, ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara akụkọ na-adọrọ adọrọ site n'aka ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá, ndị isi oche na-agba egwu, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na-asụ ụzọ, ndị na-ese ihe, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-akpali akpali
KSM meriri na nso nso a na Radio na Television Personality Television Entertainment Show Host of the Year (2011) maka ọrụ ya na TGIF
A mụrụ Sintim-Misa nye Rt
Rev
Godfried Kwadwo Sintim-Misa, onye bụbu Moderator nke Presbyterian Church of Ghana, na Mary Oforiwaa Sintim-Misa
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ anọ gụnyere rapper Yaw (Blackway)
A na-ekewa Kwakum (ISO [kwu]) dị ka nke ndị Bantu subgroup A90 (Kaka) nke mpaghara, bantu 'A' asusu ma kpọọ ya kpomkwem A91 site na Guthrie
Dika otu n'ime mmelite kachasị ọhụrụ na usoro nhazi okwa Bantu, asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị na obere ìgwè a bụ Pol (A92a), Pɔmɔ (A92b), Kweso (A92C) na Kakɔ (A93)
Ndị Kwakum na-akpọ onwe ha (na asụsụ ha) dị ka Kwakum ma ọ bụ Bakoum (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụpe ya ka Bakum)
Otú ọ dị, ha na-ekwu na ịkpọpụta 'Bakoum' malitere naanị mgbe ndị Europe rutere na Cameroon, n'agbanyeghi na a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe taa
A na-asụkarị Kwakum na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cameroon, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo Bertoua
Simons & Fennig depụtara Kwakum dị ka nke nwere olumba atọ Til, Beten (ma ọ bụ anuncien, ma ọ bụ Petem), na Baki (ma ọ bụ Mbaki)
Dịka David Hare si kwuo, e nwere mpaghara abụọ but isi ebe a na-asụ Kwakum Dimako na Doumé
Mpaghara Dimako nwere obodo nta asatọ gbara obodo Dimako gburugburu
Mpaghara Doumé nwere obodo nta asatọ gbara obodo Doumé gburugburu
Myirita akwukwo ozi dị n'etiti Kwakum a na-asụ na mpaghara abụọ a bụ 923%
N'ime obodo ndị a bụ obodo abụọ Baktala na Longtimbi
Ndị bi n'ime obodo ndị a na-ewere onwe ha dị ka Kwakum, mana ha na-akpọkwa onwe ha Til
E nwere ọdịiche okwu nke 914% n'etiti Kwakum a na-asụ na mpaghara Dimako na asụsụ a na- asụ n'obodo Til
Enwere obodo anọ nke ndị na-ewere onwe ha ka Mbeten (ọ bụghị Kwakum)
Myirita akwukwo akụkọ dị n'etiti Kwakum nke mpaghara Dimako na obodo Mbeten bụ 813%
Ndị Mbaki bi n'ebe dị anya site na Kwakum na nkwekọrịta okwu bụ naanị 477%
Ya mere, o yighị ka a ga-ewere Mbaki dị ka olumba nke Kwakum

Dị ka ALCAM (2012) si kwuo, ndị Kwakum bi n'ime obodo 8 di na Dimako commune (Haut-Nyong department) na obodo isi ya, gbakwunyere obodo atọ di na Doumé n'ebe ndịda obodo Doumé (ngalaba Haut'Nyong, Eastern Region)
Ha dị ihe dị ka 10,000

Ndị Betán (ma ọ bụ Til), bu ndị bi n'obodo nta atọ dị n'ogbe Dimako (Longtimbi, Kpaktala, na Siafum) si n'ebe ugwu, si n'obodo Mbeten bụ ebe a ka na-asụ Betán - na nso Pol, n'ebe ugwu Bertoua (Pol canton, obodo Bélabo na Diang, ngalaba Lom-et-Djerem, Eastern Region)
N'ikpeazụ, ndị Baki, n'ebe ugwu, bi n'obodo atọ nke Mbaki 1, Mbaki 2 na Mbambo
Kwakum bụ asụsụ ụda olu, Stacey Hare enyochala ya dịka o nwere ụda atọ
François Belliard dechara nyocha mbụ nke Kwakum na 2005
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ a lekwasịrị anya na egwu nke Kwakum, enwere nkọwa dị nkenke banyere fonology na ụtọ asụsụ
E mere ka akwukwo akuko a dị mfe n'ụdị akwụkwọ akpọrọ Parlons Kwakum (Ka anyị kwuo Kwakum) ma bipụta ya na 2007
Ọrụ abụọ nke Belliard dị naanị na French
David Hare dechara edemede MA nke akpọrọ Tense in Kwakum Narrative Discourse na June 2018
Stacey Hare dere usoro mmuta MA ya na Tone na Kwakum (A91) na itinye n'ọrụ orthography
Elisabeth Njantcho Kouagang dekwara akwụkwọ mmuta doctoral nke akpọrọ A grammar of Kwakum na 2018
Ọrụ atọ a dị naanị n'asụsụ Bekee
Enwere ike ịchọta data niile e ji mee ihe maka edemede David Hare na blọọgụ ya
Àtụ Languages of CameroonÀtụ Narrow Bantu languages

Kwama (nke a na-akpọkwa Afan Mao, Amam, Gogwama, Goma, Gwama, Koma nke Asosa, Nokanoka, North Koma, T'wa Kwama, Takwama) bụ asụsụ Koman, nke a na asụ na mpaghara South Benishangul-Gumuz nke Ethiopia, n'akụkụ ókèala Sudan n'etiti Asosa na Gidami
Àtụ Koman languages
Kwame Akoto-Bamfo bụ onye Ghana na-akpụ ihe

Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya n'èzí bụ nke a raara nye maka ncheta nke ndị ihe metụtara n'ahia ohu Transatlantic bụ nke a na-egosi na National Memorial for Peace and Justice nke mepere na 2018 na Montgomery, Alabama
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere ntinye nke isi konkiri otu puku na narị abụọ na-anọchite anya ndị nna nna Ghana na-agba ohu na Accra, isi obodo Ghana
A na-akpọ ya Faux-Reedom, e kpughere ya na 2017
Kwame Brathwaite (amụrụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-eme ihe ike nke a maara maka ịkwalite okwu 'Black is Beautiful' na idepụta ndụ na ọdịbendị na Harlem na Afrịka

Kwame Brathwaite bụ onye na-ese foto, amụrụ ma zụlite ya na New York City, nyére nne na nna si Barbados, bụ ndị kọrọ akụkọ ọdịbendị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke Harlem, Afrịka, na ndị Afrịka bi na mba ofesi
Dị ka nwata nwoke na mbido afọ 1950 ọ debara aha ya na School of Industrial Art (nke bụzi High School of Art and Design)
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Elombe Brath, Brathwaite guzobere African Jazz Art Society and Studios n'afọ 1956 na Grandassa Models n'afọ 1962
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 28, afọ 1962, ya na nwanne ya nwoke Elombe Brath, Brathwaite mere mmemme Naturally '62, nke mbụ n'ime usoro mmemme iji gosipụta naanị ụdị ojii
Ihe ngosi nke afọ 1962 nwere aha The Original African Coiffure and Fashion Extravaganza Designed to Restore Our Racial Pride & Standards
Emere ya na Harlem Purple Manor, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị dị na East 125th Street, o nyere aka mee ka okwu 'Black Is Beautiful' nke e bipụtara na poster nke asọmpi ahụ bụrụ ihe a ma ama
N'afọ ndi 1960, ọrụ ya pụtakwara na New York Amsterdam News, The City Sun, na The Daily Challenge
Ọ na-ese foto egwu nke Stevie Wonder, Bob Marley, James Brown, na Muhammad Ali
N'afọ 2017, a kwanyeere Brathwaite ùgwù na 75th Aperture Gala
Kwande bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na Benue State, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Adikpo
Kwande nwere mpaghara 2,891 km2 yana ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 248,697 na Mgbakọ 2006
ọtụtụ LGA ndị ọzọ gbara ya gburugburu
N'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, ọchịchị obodo Vandeikya, Ushongo LGA dị n'ebe ugwu, yana Katsina-Ala LGA dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ
N'ebe ndịda, Cross River State dị ya na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ yana Republic of Cameroon
Kwande LGA nwekwara oke oke na Takum LGA nke Taraba State n'ọwụwa anyanwụ
O nwere ngalaba kansụl iri na ise mana mpaghara ọdịnala iri na isii
N'ihi ọdịdị ugwu ya na nso nso ugwu ugwu nke Cameroon, Kwande Local Government na-enwekarị ihu igwe oyi nke na-eme ka ọ dị mma maka ndị ahịa na ndị na-etinye ego
Gọọmenti ime obodo nwekwara nnukwu osimiri ndị na-egbo mkpa ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 982002
Kwanja (Konja) bụ asụsụ Mambiloid nke ndi Cameroon
Njanga (Nyanjang) bụ olumba nke dị iche
Àtụ Northern Bantoid languages
Rabi'u Musa Kwankwaso, FNSE, FNIQS (amuru 21 Ọktoba 1956) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke bu Gọvanọ steeti Kano site na 1999 rue 2003 na 2011 rue 2015

Mgbe o meriri nhọpụta ya ọzọ na 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke anọ nke anọ na-enweghị ọrụ agha mbụ site na 2003 ruo 2007, n'okpuru ọchịchị onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo
E mechara họpụta ya na Senate na 2015, na-eje ozi otu okwu n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke All Progressives Congress (APC) na-anọchite anya Kano Central Senatorial District
Ugbua ọ bụ onye isi otu pati New Nigeria Peoples Party n'ala anyị
Kwankwaso nwere nkwado zuru ebe niile na Kano na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria ; a na-ele ya anya dị ka onye na- adọrọ mmasị populist
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ gọvanọ steeti ahụ wee banye n'otu All Progressives Congress (APC) n'afọ 2014
Na 2015, Kwankwaso enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala n'okpuru ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressive Congress, mana Muhammad Buhari meriri
N'afọ 2018, ọ laghachiri na People's Democratic Party (PDP) wee zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala na Atiku Abubakar meriri
Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso A mụrụ na iri abụọ na ọtu Ọktoba 1956 na Kwankwaso, obodo dị na Madobi, na Sunni Muslim Fulani ezinụlọ
Nna ya bụ onye isi obodo

Kwankwaso nwere echichi Sarkin Fulani, Dagacin Kwankwaso; e buliri ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Madobi na aha Majidadin Kano, Hakimin Madobi site n'aka Kano Emirate Council of Emir Ado Bayero CFR, LLD, JP

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kwankwaso, Gwarzo Boarding Senior Praịmarị Skul Wudil Craft Skuul na Kano Technical College tupu ọ gawa Kaduna Polytechnic ebe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ abụọ nke National Diploma, na Higher National Diploma
Kwankwaso bụ onye ndu ụmụ akwụkwọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ ya ma bụrụkwa onye a họpụtara ahọpụta na otu ụmụ akwụkwọ steeti Kano
Ọ gakwara akwụkwọ mmụta postgraduate na United Kingdom site na 1982 ruo 1983 na Middlesex Polytechnic ; na Loughborough University of Technology ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na injinia mmiri na 1985
Ọ gbakwara PhD ya na injinịa mmiri na Mahadum Sharda India, na 2022
Kwankwaso sonyeere Kano State Water Resources and Engineering Construction Agency nke Gọọmenti Kano State na 1975
Ọ jere ozi ebe ahụ afọ iri na asaa n'ọrụ dị iche iche wee gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye isi injinia mmiri
N'afọ 1992, Kwankwaso mere ka ọ bata na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'elu ikpo okwu nke Social Democratic Party (SDP)

Ọ bụ onye otu pati People's Front nke SDP nke Ọchịagha Shehu Yar'adua na-edu na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ ama ama dịka onye isi ya mbụ bụ Senator Magaji Abdullahi, Babagana Kingibe, Atiku Abubakar, Bola Tinubu, Tony Anenih, Chuba Okadigbo, Abdullahi Aliyu Sumaila, Abubakar Koko and Lamidi Adedibu amongst others
N'afọ 1992, a họpụtara Kwankwaso ka ọ bụrụ onye ụlọ omebe iwu na-anọchite anya okpụrụ ọchịchị Madobi na ọchịchị ala etiti
Nhọpụta ya na-esote dị ka osote onye na-ekwuchitere Ụlọ Nzukọ ahụ mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba
N'oge ọgbakọ iwu iwu nke 1995, a họpụtara Kwankwaso ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya si Kano, dịka onye otu People's Democratic Movement nke Yar'adua na-edu
O mechara sonye na Democratic Party of Nigeria (DPN) na mmemme mgbanwe ọchịchị nke General Sani Abacha
Kwankwaso sonyeere PDP na 1998 n'okpuru ikpo okwu People's Democratic Movement na Kano nke Mallam Musa Gwadabe, Senator Hamisu Musa na Alhaji Abdullahi Aliyu Sumaila duziri
N'afọ 1999, ọ zọọrọ ọkwa ọchịchị PDP n'akụkụ Abdullahi Umar Ganduje, Mukthari Zimit, Alhaji Kabiru Rabiu
Ndị Santsi/PSP nọ n'azụ ịzọ ọkwa Abdullahi Umar Ganduje mana Kwankwaso meriri ha na primaries
A họpụtara Kwankwaso maka oge mbụ ya dịka gọvanọ Kano steeti site na 29 Mee 1999 ruo 29 Mee 2003
Oge mbu ya dika Gọvanọ Kano Steeti bụ nnukwu mmemme n'ihi ọtụtụ otu ndị ọzọ na-emegide ọchịchị ya dị elu na mbọ ọ na-akwado ịkwado Onye isi ala Yoruba bụ Olusegun Obasanjo
N'afọ 2003, o meriri nhọpụta ọzọ n'aka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya bụ Malam Ibrahim Shekarau
A họpụtara Kwankwaso ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ gọvanọ Kano steeti nke abụọ site na Mee ụbọchị iri abụọ na iteghete , 2011 ruo ụbọchị iri abụọ na iteghete Mee 2015
N'oge a, ọ malitere imegharị usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Kwankwasiyya iwu okporo ụzọ, ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ na iziga ndị bi na-aga akwụkwọ na mba ọzọ
N'August 2013, Kwankwaso so na ndị gọvanọ asaa hibere otu G-7 n'ime otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Peoples Democratic Party
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, Kwankwaso, ya na ndị G-7 ise, gbahapụrụ n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ, All Progressives Congress (APC)
N'ọnwa Juun 2014, Kwankwaso na Emir Kano Ado Bayero ogologo oge na-ese okwu maka nhọpụta ya nke Waziri ( Vizier ) nke Kano Emirate Council
Na 6 June 2014, Ado Bayero nwụrụ na ọgba aghara dị n'etiti ndị ezinaụlọ
Na 8 June 2014, Sanusi Lamido Sanusi kwụsịtụrụ gọvanọ Central Bank na Dan Majen Kano (Nwa Emir-Maje) pụtara dị ka Emir ọhụrụ nke Kano
Nbanye ya butere ngagharị iwe nke ndị na-akwado Sanusi Ado Bayero nwa Emir na Chiroman Kano (Crown Prince), na ebubo na Kwankwaso kwadoro Sanusi n'ihi ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2015
N'Oktober 2014, Kwankwaso ji nnukwu ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya na Kano zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala APC

Nsonaazụ primary nke onyeisiala mere na Legọs bụ Muhammadu Buhari nwere ntuyeaka 3,430, Kwankwaso nwetara ntuyeaka 974, Atiku Abubakar nwetara vootu 954, Rochas Okorocha nwetara vootu narị anọ na Sam Nda-Isiah nwetara vootu iri
Na-abịa na nke abụọ, Kwankwaso kwadoro onye meriri Muhammadu Buhari
Site n'afọ 2003 ruo 2007, Kwankwaso họpụtara onye minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa n'ọchịchị nke abụọ nke President Olusegun Obasanjo, nọchiri Theophilus Danjuma
N'afọ 2007, Kwankwaso gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa minista ya ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ Kano steeti mana ọ meriri n'ihi na akwụkwọ ọcha gọọmentị boro ya ebubo
Alhaji Ahmed Garba Bichi mechara dochie ya dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ na pati ahụ

Ka ha merichara otu pati ya ịzọ ọkwa ntuliaka 2007, onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya pụrụiche na Somalia na Darfur ; Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua mechara họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Niger Delta Development Commission, ọkwa ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2010
Kwankwaso nọchitere anya Kano Central Senatorial District na Senate nke Nigeria site na Mee 2015 ruo Mee 2019
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, Kwankwaso ya na ndị sinetọ iri na anọ nke APC gbabara na Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018, Kwankwaso zọọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na PDP

N'ime ntuliaka onyeisiala mere na Rivers, n'ime mmadụ iri na abụọ na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala Kwankwaso bụ onye nke anọ n'azụ Atiku Abubakar nwere vootu 1,532, Aminu Tambuwal nwetara vootu 693, Bukola Saraki nwere vootu 317 na Kwankwaso nwere vootu 158
Kwankwaso kwadoro onye meriri Atiku Abubakar ma jụ ịhọpụta ya ọzọ n'ụlọomeiwu sineti, Ibrahim Shekarau nọchiri ya
Kwankwaso gbasiri mbọ ike ka ọgọ ya nwoke Abba Kabir Yusuf pụta dịka gọvanọ na steeti Kano
E mechara kwupụta na ntuliaka ahụ enweghị mmechi maka onye nọ n'ọchịchị Abdullahi Umar Ganduje
Na 22 February 2022, Kwankwaso hibere National Movement ka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ikike ọnụnọ nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ All Progressives Congress na Peoples Democratic Party
Ọ kwadoro New Nigeria Peoples Party dị ka nku ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mmegharị ahụ wee bụrụ onye isi obodo nke pati ahụ na 30 Maachị 2022
Ihe e ji mara oge Kwankwaso nọ n'ọchịchị nwere ọtụtụ ihe a ma ama
N'oge mbụ ọ nọ n'ọchịchị dịka Gọvanọ (1999 ruo 2003), o hiwere Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Kano dị na Wudil, mahadum mbụ na naanị steeti dị na Kano n'oge ahụ
N'oge ọchịchị ya nke abụọ (2011 ruo 2015), Kwankwaso hibere mahadum North West, Kano, mahadum steeti nke abụọ na Kano
O guzobekwara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ mmụta na mmepe mmadụ iri abụọ na isii ma site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a a zụrụ ihe karịrị puku ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị 360,000 ma nyekwa ha ike
Ọ bụ gọvanọ mbụ na Naijiria webatara nri ụlọ akwụkwọ n'efu na uwe maka ụmụ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Nke a mụbara ọnụ ọgụgụ ndebanye aha ụlọ akwụkwọ site na nde 1 na 2011 ruo ihe karịrị nde 3 na 2015 mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ
Mmasị ya maka agụmakwụkwọ mere ka ewebata agụmakwụkwọ n'efu n'ọkwa niile na steeti ahụ wee hụ na e nwetara ihe nkuzi na mmụta zuru oke

O hiwere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị 230 nke nwere kọleji teknụzụ 47, ụlọ akwụkwọ mmụta Islam 44, kọleji China, kọleji French na kọleji izizi ụmụ nwanyị yana kọleji ụmụ nwoke na Damagaran na Niamey jikọrọ aka na gọọmentị Niger Republic
N'ime afọ anọ ọ dị ka gọvanọ Kano steeti, o nyela ihe karịrị puku abụọ na narị isii akwụkwọ mmụta postgraduate na mahadum mba ofesi na mba iri na anọ n'ụwa niile
Nke a bụ mgbakwunye na agụmakwụkwọ mahadum nkeonwe dị na Nigeria

N'akụkụ akụrụngwa maka oge mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Northern Nigeria, a rụrụ àkwà mmiri atọ na-efe efe, 5 A na-arụ okporo ụzọ nwere ọkụ abụọ nke kilomita na mpaghara ọchịchị 44 dị na Kano, ma rụọkwa àkwà mmiri abụọ dị n'okpuru

Kwankwaso malitekwara ikpuchi mmiri mmiri na taịlị ndị na-ejikọta ọnụ na steeti ahụ, gụnyere mkpuchi nke osimiri Jakara nke na-agafe obodo Kano nwere okporo ụzọ abụọ, nke mere ka ọnọdụ gburugburu ebe obibi na ịdị ọcha nke obodo Kano dum dịkwuo mma
Kwankwaso arụkwara ọtụtụ ụlọ na ala n'ọkwa nke mbụ na nke abụọ n'ọchịchị
Obodo atọ nke ọgbara ọhụrụ, Kwankwasiyya, Amana na Bandirawo bụ nke e wuru ihe dị ka narị ụlọ atọ nwere ọrụ dị iche iche a na-erere ọha mmadụ
Ewuola ihe dị ka ụlọ 1500 ma nyekwa ndị obodo dara ogbenye na ndị ọdachi dakwasịrị n'ime obodo n'efu
Ka ọ hapụchara ọkwa gọvanọ, Engr Kwankwaso hibere otu atumatu Kwankwasiyya Development Foundation (KDF) bụ atụmatụ e mere iji nyere ndị obodo Kano steeti na n'ofe Naịjirịa niile aka
Site na ntọala ahụ, Kwankwaso kwadoro ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto ka ha gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ site na enyemaka ego na-aga n'ihu
Nkeji mbụ nke mmadụ 370 ga-erite uru na ntọala ntọala mba ofesi laghachiri na Nigeria na 2021 ka ha mechachara nzere ha nke ọma
Mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta ahụ nwetara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche nke mba na mba dị iche iche dị ka Dangote na Bua, nke sitere na Kwankwasiyya Development Foundation kwadoro
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe mere o ji malite ntọala ahụ, Kwankwaso kwuru na ihe kpatara ya bụ nanị iji kwalite ịgụ na ide na ibelata oke ịda ogbenye na steeti Kano na Naijiria n'ozuzu
Iji kwado ntọala ahụ, Kwankwaso rere ihe onwunwe ya ma nye ego ahụ na ntọala ahụ

Site na ndị KDF, Kwankwaso wepụtakwara ntọhapụ nke ndị mkpọrọ dị 170 nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị iche iche n'ofe Naijiria site n'ịkwụ ụgwọ ha na ịnye ụgbọ njem iji mee ka ha nwee ike iru ebe ha na-aga ma jikọta ezinụlọ ha
Kwankwaso enyekwala ngwa egwuregwu na ego ruru ihe karịrị nde naira 150 nye ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ amateur na steeti dị na Naịjirịa
Nke a bụ akụkụ nke mbọ ya iji kwado uto na mmepe nke egwuregwu mpaghara na Nigeria, mpaghara na-enye ndị ntorobịa ohere ohere n'ofe ụwa

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyekwara ego na ihe oriri nye ndị ogbenye na ndị nọ ná mkpa, gụnyere ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ, ndị nwere nkwarụ, na ụmụ mgbei, na mbọ iji belata ịda ogbenye karịsịa n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na Nigeria
Na 64th ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya na 2020, Kwankwaso mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ ikike ụmụ akwụkwọ 300 nke o wuru na Rano local government, Kano
Ụlọ akwụkwọ a nwere ike anyanwụ ma nwee ụlọ mgbochi ụlọ klaasị isii
Ewubere ụlọ akwụkwọ a site na KDF kwekọrọ n'ọhụụ Kwankwaso na ebumnuche ịkwado agụmakwụkwọ
Na 9 Maachị 2004, onye ọka ikpe Kano steeti ṅụụrụ iyi na kọmitii nyocha mmadụ isii nke nọ n'isi Hon
Justice Ahmed Badamasi ka onyeisi oche ka ọ jụọ ajụjụ maka ọrụ Kwankwaso
Kọmishọna ahụ malitere ịnọdụ na 19 Maachị 2004 wee wepụta akụkọ ya na ka gọọmentị wepụta akwụkwọ ọcha n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2004, mgbe e boro ya ebubo

N'afọ 2015, otu Concerned Kano State Workers and Pensioners otu gbara akwụkwọ n'ụlọọrụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission na-ekwu na Kwankwaso dara iwu Kano State Pension and Gratuity Law nke 2007 ozugbo tupu ọ hapụ ọrụ n'isi mbụ n'afọ 2015
Dịka otu a siri kwuo, Kwankwaso nyere iwu ka e were ego ezumike nka were rụpụta ụlọ mana o were tinye aka n'ọrụ ụlọ iji kenye ndị otu ya ụlọ
N'ikpeazụ, oke ụlọ na ebubo a na-ebo ebubo n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi ruru ihe dị ka ijeri naira iri dị ka otu ndị ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ezumike nka na-ahụ maka steeti Kano nke Concerned

Na 2 Julaị 2015, ọkaikpe Mohammed Yahaya nke ụlọikpe dị elu nke Kano amachibidoro EFCC ijide ma ọ bụ gbochie Kwankwaso na nyocha ya maka ebubo n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi nke ego ezumike nka nke ijeri naira iri mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dịka gọvanọ Kano State
Mana izu abụọ ka e mesịrị na 16 Julaị 2015, otu ọkaikpe ahụ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Kano kagburu iwu mbụ o nyere ma nye EFCC ikpe ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwee ike nyochaa, jide na ikpe Kwankwaso
Justice Muhammed Yahaya nwụkwara Kwankwaso N50,000 maka 'imefusị oge'
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2016, EFCC gọrọ agọ ma gbaghaa nkwupụta nke ikpe nrụrụ aka ọ bụla na-echere na ikpe megide Kwankwaso

Kwankwaso n'onwe ya gọnarịrị ma jụkwa ebubo nrụrụ aka ọ bụla eboro ya, kọwara ya dị ka naanị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ihe ọjọọ na ihe na-abụghị eziokwu bụ nke ndị iro ya na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-akwado iji mebie aha ya na aha ya
Kwankwaso gbara akwụkwọ n'ụlọ ikpe site n'aka onye ọkaiwu ya ka ọ kwụọ ụgwọ maka imebi aha ya

Àtụ Infobox settlementKwara State (Yoruba Ìpínlẹ̀ Kwárà), bụ steeti dị na Western Nigeria, nke dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ site na Kogi State, na ugwu Niger steeti, na steeti Ekiti, Osun na Oyo na ndịda, ebe oke ọdịda anyanwụ ya mejupụtara akụkụ nke oke mba ụwa na Benin Republic Isi obodo ya bụ obodo Ilorin na steeti ahụ nwere mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo iri na isii
N'ime steeti iri atọ na isii nke Nigeria, Kwara bụ nke itoolu kachasị na mpaghara, mana nke isii pere mpe, yana ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ ruru ihe dị ka nde 32 dị ka ọ dị na 2016
Geographically, Kwara steeti kewara n'etiti West Sudanian savanna na ọdịda anyanwụ, na Guinean ọhịa–savanna mosaic ecoregion na ndị ọzọ na steeti
Akụkụ dị mkpa na mpaghara steeti ahụ gụnyere osimiri, ebe Niger na-asọfe n'akụkụ oke ugwu banye n'Ọdọ Mmiri Jeba, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu dịka oke, ebe osimiri Awun, Asa, Aluko na Oyun na-asọfe n'ime ime

N'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke steeti ahụ bụ ngalaba Borgu nke Kainji National Park, nnukwu ogige ntụrụndụ mba nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ isi awọ, kob, hippopotamus, elephant ọhịa Africa, nwa oliv, na anụ ọhịa roan, yana ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ikpeazụ fọdụrụnụ
Ọdụm ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka n'ụwa
N'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ ọdịda anyanwụ, obere akụkụ nke Old Oyo National Park nwere ugo okpueze, ugo mara mma, buffalo Africa, oribi, na enwe patas

Ndị agbụrụ dị iche iche ebiwo na steeti Kwara ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọkachasị ndị Yoruba bi na steeti ahụ dum, mana enwere ndị Nupe dị nta n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, ndị Bariba (Baoton) na Busa (Bokobaru) n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, na obere ndị Fulani na Ilorin, na-agafe steeti ahụ dị ka ndị ọzụzụ atụrụ na-akwagharị akwagharị

N'oge tupu ọchịchị ndị eze, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ógbè nke bụzi steeti Kwara bụ akụkụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Oyo, na akụkụ nke akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke alaeze Borgu nke ndị Bariba, Boko na Bissa, na alaeze Nupe (1531-1835) bi
N'etiti afọ 1800, ndị Fulani jihad weghaara akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ihe bụ ugbu a steeti Kwara ma tinye mpaghara ahụ n'okpuru Gwandu nke Sokoto Caliphate
N'afọ 1890 na 1900, njem ndị Britain weghaara mpaghara ahụ ma tinye ya na Northern Nigeria Protectorate
Northern Nigeria mechara sonye na British Nigeria na 1914, tupu ọ bụrụ na ọ nwere onwe ya dị ka Nigeria na 1960
Na mbụ, steeti Kwara nke oge a bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara Northern Region mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị ruo 1967, mgbe e kewara mpaghara ahụ ma mpaghara ahụ ghọrọ West Central State

N'afọ 1976, a gbanwere aha steeti ahụ ka ọ bụrụ steeti Kwara ma aha ahụ nọgidere ruo n'afọ ndị 1990, mgbe e kewara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ ya iji mepụta akụkụ nke steeti Kogi ma tinye mpaghara Borgu dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ ya n'ime ngalaba Borgu nke steeti Niger
E guzobere steeti Kwara na 27 Mee 1967, mgbe Gọọmentị Ndị Agha nke General Yakubu Gowon kewara mpaghara anọ ahụ mejupụtara Federation of Nigeria na steeti iri na abụọ

Mgbe e kere ya, steeti ahụ bụ mpaghara Ilorin na Kabba nke mpaghara Northern nke oge ahụ ma na mbụ a kpọrọ ya West Central State mana e mechara gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ 'Kwara', aha mpaghara maka Osimiri Niger, n'asụsụ Hausa
Steeti Kwara nwere ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe dị ka tourmaline, tantalite, na ọtụtụ ebe a na-etinye ihe onwunwa n'akụkụ ugwu
Cocoa na Kolanut na mpaghara ndịda Oke - Ero, Ekiti na Isin LGA
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke isi obodo Kwara, Ilorin, na-ekpo ọkụ ma kpọọ nkụ ma nwee mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ, nke dị n'etiti 9903 mm na 1318mm
Obodo a nwere okpomọkụ dịgasị iche iche site na 330C ruo 370C, na ọnwa nke atọ n'afọ, Machị, bụ nke kachasị ọkụ
Okpomọkụ kachasị ala na nke kachasị elu, yana iru mmiri nke isi obodo steeti, na-arị elu n'etiti afọ 1978 na 2017
Ifufe nke na-efe n'ógbè a mejupụtara ma ifufe South-East na North-East
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2006, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Kwarans bụ nde 237, dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Naijiria nke afọ 2006
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ a mejupụtara ihe dị ka 169% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na mba ahụ dabere na mbata maka mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na mmepe akụ na ụba
Ndị isi agbụrụ bụ Yoruba, Nupe, Fulani na Baruba
Asụsụ nke Kwara State nke LGA depụtara
Asụsụ ndị ọzọ a na-asụ na Kwara State gụnyere Busa, Boko, na Sorko
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa na-aghọwanye nsogbu ndị na-esite na adịghị ọcha gburugburu ebe obibi, na steeti Kwara na-arụ ọrụ iji melite gburugburu ebe obibi na ịdị ọcha ya
Na Septemba 22, 2020, gọvanọ steeti Kwara malitere mkpọsa 'Clean Kwara' iji kwụsị nsị na-emeghe ma kwalite ịdị ọcha na steeti ahụ
Gọọmentị steeti na-arụ ọrụ iji dozie okporo ụzọ na ụzọ mmiri niile iji hụ na mmiri na-aga n'efu, na-etinye mgbalị iji hụ na ịdị ọcha nke mmiri, na-ewu ụlọ mposi ma na-eme ka mmiri dị ọcha

Nke a bụkwa iji kwalite Ihe mgbaru ọsọ mmepe na-adịgide adịgide 3 & 6 (n'ozuzu ịnweta mmiri ọṅụṅụ dị nchebe na ọnụ ala na ịnweta ịdị ọcha zuru oke na nke ziri ezi, ịdị ọcha maka mmadụ niile, na ịkwụsị nsị n'èzí site na 2030)
Mkpa a na-etinye na egwuregwu dugara n'iwu ámá egwuregwu, nke a na-akpọ - Kwara State Stadium Complex
Ihe owuwu ndị dị n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ bụ mainbowl, ụlọ egwuregwu dị n'ime ụlọ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ntụrụndụ yana ọdọ mmiri Olympic
A na-anọchite anya steeti ahụ nke ọma ma na bọọlụ ma na basketball
Steeti ahụ bụ ebe obibi nke Kwara United Football Club, ABS FC na Kwara Falcons Basketball Club

Asụsụ Kwasio, nke a makwaara dị ka Ngumba / Mvumbo, Bujeba, na Gyele / Kola, bụ asụsụ ndi Cameroon, nke dị ka ndị 70,000 [aha mkpa] nke ndị Ngumba, Kwasio, Gyele na Mabi na-asụ n'ebe ndịda n'akụkụ oké osimiri na n'ókè ya na Equatorial Guinea
[aha mkpa]
Ndi Kwasio,Gyele na ndi Mabi
Ọtụtụ ndị edemede na-ele Kwasio na asụsụ Gyele / Kola dị iche
Na Ethnologue, asụsụ na-enweta koodu dị iche iche Kwasio nwere koodu ISO 639-3 nmg, ebe Gyele nwere koodu gyi
Ndị Kwasio, Ngumba, na Mabi bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo obodo; ndị Gyele (nke a makwaara dị ka Kola ma ọ bụ Koya) bụ ndị na-achụ nta na-achịkọta ndị Pygmy na-ebi n'oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo
Olumba bụ Kwasio (nke a makwaara dị ka Kwassio, Bisio), Mvumbo (nke amakwara dị ka Ngumba, Ngoumba, Mgoumba, Mekuk), na Mabi (Mabea)
Ndị Gyele na-asụ subdialekt nke Mvumbo na Gyele n'ebe ugwu Giele, Gieli, Gyeli, Bagiele, Bagyele, Bagielli, Bajele, Bajeli, Bogyel, Bogyeli, Bondjiel
N'ebe ndịda, ndị Gyele na-asụ Kola, nke a makwaara dị ka Koya, na ndida, nke a na-akpọkwa Likoya, Bako, Bakola, Bakuele, nke a pụtakwara dị ka Bekoe
A na-ejikwa okwu mkparị maka ndị pygmy, Babinga, mee ihe
Glottolog gbakwunyere Shiwa
Dịka ALCAM (2012) siri kwuo, ndị Kwasio na-abụghị ndị Pygmy na-asụ ụdị asụsụ abụọ, Mvumbo na Mabi, bu ndi nwere nghọta na-agafeghi oke
A na-asụ ha na Ngalaba Océan, mpaghara ndida
Ìgwè Bisio nke ndị Kwasio bi na Equatorial Guinea, yana na Gabon ebe a maara ha n'okpuru aha Shiwo
Kwasio bụ asụsụ kachasị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke asụsụ A80-A90 Bantu
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Mbwa ( Békol) na Bajwe'e, na nke dị anya na Méka na Béti
A na-asụ Mabi, olumba ọdịda anyanwụ karia, n'ụsọ oké osimiri Atlantic gburugburu Kribi, n'etiti ndị na-asụrụ Batanga
A na-asụ Mvumbo ozugbo n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, n'okporo ụzọ si Kribi gaa Lolodorf, n'ime obodo abụọ a, ebe ndị na-ekwu okwu na-agwakọta na ndị na-asụrụ Fang na Ewondo (Beti Fang)
Dị ka ALCAM (2012) siri kwuo, Gyáli na Kola dị ezigbo nso na ibe ha ma na-ebikọ ọnụ n'otu ogige na ebe obibi
N'aka nke ọzọ, ha anaghị enwe mmekọrịta na Baka, ndị Pygmy nke ọwụwa anyanwụ

Enwekwara mmekọrịta asụsụ chiri anya dị n'etiti Bagyáli na otu Meka, ọ bụ ezie na ndị Mabi na ndị Mvumbo na-abụghị ndị Pygmy anaghị amasị ikwere na asụsụ ha, bu, Kwasio, nwere njikọ chiri anya na ụdị asụsụ Pygmy

Ndị Bagyáli na-ebikarị n'ọké ohịa nke ngalaba Océan (Southern Region), gburugburu Kribi, Bipindi na Lolodorf (n'ime obodo Kribi, Akom II, Bip indi, na Lolodorф), a na-eme atụmatụ na ha ruru mmadụ 4,250
A na-ahụkwuazi ndị Bagyáli na Equatorial Guinea
Dị ka asụsụ Niger-Congo ndị ọzọ nke Cameroon, Kwasio bụ asụsụ ụda olu
Dị ka asụsụ Bantu, ọ nwere usoro klas aha
Usoro klas nke aha Kwasio belatara nke nta, ebe ọ nọgidere na-enwe naanị okike 6 (okike bụ njikọta nke otu na ọtụtụ aha)
A na-ejikwa okwu ahụ bụ mee ihe maka ndị pygmies nke mpaghara ókèala Congo nke ugwu Gabon, nke na-asụ asụsụ Ngom

Kwebiha Joyce mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Kwebiha Joy Mama Mission bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị (MP) maka Kyenjojo District na nke asatọ nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Kyenjojo Development Radio
N'oge mmeghe nke National Unity Platform Office na Nọvemba, na afọ 2020 na Kyenjo, Joyce bụ onye ọbịa nsọpụrụ maka ihe omume ahụ
Ọ rịọrọ udo na nkwekọrịta n'oge na mgbe oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2021 gasịrị n'agbanyeghị esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'etiti ndị Uganda n'oge oge ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mgbe oge ndọrọ ndọrọ ya gasịrị

N'afọ 2007, otu afọ mgbe Joyce sonyeere ndị omeiwu nke asatọ nke Uganda dị ka nwanyị onye omeiwu nke Uganda, ọ natara egwu ọnwụ site n'aka ndị na-akwado otu n'ime ndị na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka onye isi oche nke mpaghara Council 5
Joyce kwuru na egwu ọnwụ ya sitere na ebubo na ọ na-eme mkpọsa maka otu n'ime ndị na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka
Egwu ọnwụ ndị a bịakwara na egwu nke ịgba Kyenjo Development Radio ọkụ, ụlọ ọrụ redio nke ọ bụ onye nduzi ya
Ka e mesịrị na nzuko omebe iwu ọzọ, Linda Timbigamba dị afọ 28 meriri onye nọ n'ọkwa, Joyce Kwebiha na 24,922 vootu, maka oche Kyenjojo Woman Member of Parliament na Kwebiha nwetara 20,106 vootu
Miriam Kesiime sochiri ya na 14,123 vootu na Theresa Kabasinguzi bịara n'azụ ya na 11,911
Kwegu (nke a na-akpọkwa Bacha, Koegu, Kwegi, Menja, Nidi) bụ asụsụ Surmic a na asụ na Southwest nke Ethiopia, n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Osimiri Omo
Kweku Adoboli (amụrụ 21 Mee 1980) bụ onye njikwa itinye ego na Ghana na onye bụbu onye ahịa ngwaahịa
A mara ya ikpe maka ịzụrụ ihe na-ezighi ezi ijeri US$2 (£13 ijeri STG) dị ka onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ akụ itinye ego na Switzerland UBS
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na otu UBS Global Synthetic Equities Trading otu na London, ebe ọ na-etinye aka na ihe a ga-emecha mara dị ka 2011 UBS rogue ahia ahia
Mgbe a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ, ọ tụfuru ọtụtụ mkpegharị mkpegharị ikpe ndị UK Home Office kpebiri ịkpọga ya Ghana
A mụrụ Kweku Adoboli na 21 Mee 1980 na Tema, Ghana, n'aka John Adoboli, onye isi ọrụ United Nations
Ọ nọrọ n'afọ ndị mbụ ya na Israel, Syria na Iraq, tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom na 1991
Ọ gara Ackworth School na Pontefract, West Yorkshire, ebe ọ bụ onye isi
N'afọ 2000, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịgụ Chemical Engineering na Mahadum Nottingham, mana ọ gbanwere na e-commerce na ọmụmụ azụmahịa dijitalụ
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke Mahadum nke Nottingham Students' Union
N'etiti afọ 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ọkọchị na ngalaba ọrụ UBS
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nottingham na July 2003
Emmanuel Kwesi Danso Arthur Junior (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1994), onye a maara dịka Kwesi Arthur, bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Tema, Ghana

Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'afọ 2017 site na egwu egwu 'Grind day' nke natara otuto dị ukwuu na akara aka site n'aka ndị rap heavyweights Sarkodie na Medikal N'afọ 2019, EP Live ya nke abụọ site na Nkrumah Krom Vol II nwetara ihe karịrị nde abụọ n'izu mbụ nke ntọhapụ ya
Arthur enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere Rapper nke afọ na Hip Hop Song nke afọ na Vodafone Ghana Music Awards yana nhọpụta Iwu mba ụwa kacha mma nke onye na-ekiri na 2018 BET Awards
Ọ ghọrọ onye egwu Ghana nke abụọ a họpụtara maka ihe nrite hip hop BET Cypher mgbe a họpụtara Sarkodie na 2019
A mụrụ Kwesi Arthur na 18th December, 1994 na Tema
A zụlitere ya na Tema Community 9, ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ ya na nwanne ya nwoke aha ya bụ Dayonthetrack, onye bụkwa onye egwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Temasco n'afọ 2013, atụmatụ Kwesi nke ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ ya iji mụọ Psychology na Iwu na Mahadum Ghana kwụsịrị n'ihi enweghị ego
Nke a mere ka onye na-eti egwu tụlee ọrụ dị ka onye nche na Tema
Ọ bụ ezie na a nabatara ya maka ọrụ nchekwa, Kwesi kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ egwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ obodo kama
N'ebe a, ya na onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ahụ mere nkwekọrịta iji mụta mmepụta egwu na ndekọ n'efu; na mgbanwe, Arthur aghaghị ịrụ ọrụ ndị dị ala gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka ikpochapu na mmezi n'ozuzu

N'afọ 2016, ọ zutere ndị njikwa site na Ground Up Chale, otu mgbasa ozi ọha na eze maka ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na West Africa, ebe o dekọrọ ihe ndekọ egwu ya Grind day na ụlọ ọrụ ha otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị
Kwesi Arthur malitere ide raps mgbe ọ gụsịrị abọm mbụ nke Drake, Thank Me Later
N'afọ 2017, o wepụtara egwu 'Grind Day' site na EP mbụ ya, Live from Nkrumah Krom (2017)
E wepụtara ndekọ ahụ n'okpuru uwe onwe ya ma kwado ya site na otu na-elekọta mmadụ nke a na-akpọ GroundUp Chale
O mechara wepụta remix maka 'Grind Day', nke gosipụtara Sarkodie na Medikal
Kwesi Arthur esorola ọtụtụ ndị egwu Ghana, gụnyere Sarkodie, Medikal, KiDi, Jason E LA, R2Bees, B4bonah, M3dal, Manifest, EL, Stonebwoy, Shatta Wale na onye egwu South Africa Nasty C
A họpụtara ya maka Best International Act n'afọ 2018 BET Awards
Kwesi Arthur bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-aga nke ọma na Ghana, ebe a na-amata egwu ya na mba ụwa ma nye ya onyinye
N'afọ 2020 egwu ya bụ Live From The 233 bụ otu n'ime egwu Afrịka kachasị egwu na ọrụ mgbasa ozi egwu Apple
Kwesi Nii-Lante Boakye (/ˈkweɪsi buːɑːˈtʃiː/ KWAY-see boo-ah-CHEE; a mụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 6, 1999) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ikwupụta Darwin, ezigbo enyi Gumball na nwanne nkuchi ya na Cartoon Network animated series The Amazing World of Gumball na Gossamer na Looney Tunes Show
O mekwara Manny na ihe nkiri Tyler Perry nke afọ 2009 I Can Do Bad All By Myself, ma kwupụta The Passenger na Bravest Warriors
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne nwoke atọ bụkwa ndị na-eme ihe nkiri; Kwame Boateng, na Kofi Siriboe
Ezinụlọ Boakye bụ ndị Ghana
Kwizera Eudia bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Uganda
Onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM), ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke asatọ nke Uganda na-anọchite anya Kisoro District
O nwere asambodo na nzere bachelọ na ndụmọdụ
Ọ nwụrụ na afọ 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 60 site na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nsambya na Kampala
E kwuru na Kwizera nwụrụ mgbe ọ rịasịrị obere ọrịa

Tupu ọnwụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu nke asatọ nke Uganda maka Kisoro District site na afo 2006 ruo na afọ 2011 tupu Sarah Mateke Nyirabashitsi, nwa nwanyị nke Minista Steeti, Philemon Mateke ewere ya dị ka onye omeiwu nke Kisoro District
E liri Kwizera n'ụlọ nna nna ya na R Bugiru Town Council na Kisoro District
Tupu ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwalite ndị mmadụ na Compassion International
Ọ bụ onye otu Executive Board na African Queens na Women Cultural Leaders Network
Eudia, nwere naanị otu nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Michael Kwizera
N'oge nzukọ ndị omeiwu Afrịka na Kenya, ọ gbara ndị isi Afrịka ume ka ha hụ na mmepụta nri dị mma yana nhazi na ahịa
Ịkwụ ụgwọ ka ị na-atụfu (PAYT) (nkè a na-akpọkwa ịtụle ihe mkpofu, ọnụahịa unit, ọnụahịa ọnụego na-agbanwe agbanwe, ma ọ bụ ịkwụ ụgwọ ónyé ọrụ) bụ ihe nlereanya ọnụahịa màkà iwepụ ihe mkpofu ọbọdọ
A na-akwụ ndị ọrụ ụgwọ dabere na ihe mkpofu ole ha na-enye màkà ịnakọta na ọbọdọ ma ọ bụ ọchịchị mpaghara
Ụdị dịgasị ichè ichè dị dabere na mpaghara na ọbọdọ
Enwere ike ịlele ihe mkpofu site na ịdị arọ ma ọ bụ nha, ma ọ bụ site na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke otu, nke a na-achọpụta site na iji ụdị akpa dị ichè ichè, mkpado, akpa ma ọ bụ ọbụna RFID
A na-enyekarị ọrụ màkà ntụgharị ihe mkpofu, dị ka imegharị ihe na composting, n'efu ebe a na-etinye usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ dịka ị na-atụfu

E nwèrè ụdị mmemme ịkwụ ụgwọ-dị ka ị na-atụba - Ọnụahịa zuru ezu ndị ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ màkà ihe mkpofu niile ha chọrọ ịnakọta tupu ógè eruo site na ịzụta mkpado, akpa omenala, ma ọ bụ akpa nha ahọpụtara

A na-enweta akpa ma ọ bụ akpa ndị ọzọ màkà ịzụta ma ọ bụrụ na ónyé ọrụ ahụ gafere ego enyere ikike - Ọnụahịa dịgasị iche iche ndị ọrụ nwere ike ịhọrọ ịgbazite akpa dịgasịgasị iche (ọtụtụ mmemme na-enye ruo ise), ọnụahịa kwekọrọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ nkè ihe mkpofu mepụtara
Ụzọ abụọ kachasị omenala iji kpochapụ ihe mkpofu siri ike nke ọbọdọ bụ usoro ọnụego dị larịị ma ọ bụ ụtụ isi ọbọdọ
Ndị ọrụ niile na-akwụ otu ọnụego ma ọ bụ ụtụ isi n'agbanyeghị oke ihe mkpofu ha na-eweta màkà nnweta
N'okpuru usoro ọnụego dị larịị, ọ nweghị ihe mkpali iji belata ihe mkpofu a na-emepụta
PAYT dabeere na ụkpụrụ abụọ na-eduzi iwu gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi ónyé na-emetọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ụkpụrụ na echiche ọrụ nkekọrịta
Enwere ike kewaa ihe kpatara PAYT n'ime ụdị atọ sara mbara
N'okpuru atụmatụ PAYT, enwere ike iwepụ ụfọdụ ma ọ bụ niile ego nkè njikwa ihe mkpofu site na ụgwọ ụtụ isi ihe onwunwe, na-enye nnwere onwe na njikwa na ego nkè usoro ihe mkpofu obibi
A na-emesozi ọrụ nchịkwa ihe mkpofu dịka ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka ọkụ eletrik ma ọ bụ mmiri nkè a na-akwụ ụgwọ site na unit nke oriri
Ihe omume PAYT bụ ngwá ọrụ dị irè n'ịbawanye nkewa nke ihe mkpofu, imegharị ihe, na ibelata ihe mkpofu
Nsonaazụ ya bụ nnukwu nchekwa ike site na njem, mmụba na mgbake ihe site na imegharị ihe, na mbelata na mmetọ site na ébé a na-ekpofu ahịhịa na incinerators
Ya mèrè, ọ na-ebelata ibu nke ébé a na-ekpofu ahịhịa
Tụkwasị na nkè a, mmemme PAYT na-agbakwa ndị na-emepụta ume ka ha mepụta atụmatụ ndị dị irè karị na usoro ndụ ngwaahịa na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ebe obibi
A na-ekesa ego nchịkọta ihe mkpofu n'ụzọ ziri ezi n'etiti ndị bi na ya, yana n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe mkpofu ónyé ọrụ ọ bụla na-emepụta
Ndị na-agba ịnyịnya n'efu enweghịzi ike ịnwe nkwado màkà omume ha, a na-ekwukwa na PAYT na-akwalite nkwado ọbọdọ
Ezinụlọ ndị na-enweta ego dị ala na-emepụta obere ihe mkpofu ma si otú a na-akwụ ụgwọ mkpofu dị ala
Ịkwụ ụgwọ màkà ihe mkpofu na-akpatakarị ịtụfu ihe n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị (nkè a makwaara dị ka 'ụgbọelu') ma ọ bụ na-enyefe ihe mkpofu ahụ na-enweghị ikikere ma ọ bụ usoro mkpofu iwu na-ekwadoghị
Nnyocha achọpụtala na ọnụahịa otu, nke na-agụnye ịkwụ ụgwọ ọnụahịa a kapịrị ọnụ màkà akpa mkpofu a tụfuru, na-enye aka n'ịtụfu iwu na-akwadoghị

Ọ bụ ezie na ebumnuche nke ọnụahịa otu bụ ịgba ndị mmadụ ume iji ụdị mkpofu ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka imegharị ihe na composting, ndị mmadụ na-agbakarị n'ịkwụsị ihe mkpofu n'ebe ndị a na-enyeghị ikike iji chekwaa ego

Ọbọdọ nta dị na Massachusetts na-ahụkarị mbelata nke ihe mkpofu karịa mmụba nke imegharị ihe, mana a kwenyere na nke a bụ n'ihi na ndị mmadụ na-ebubata ihe mkpofu site na ọbọdọ ndị ọzọ (ebe a na-eche na ọ nweghị nnweta n'efu) gaa n'ụlọ ndị enyi na ndị ikwu
Mgbè enwere mgbanwe na ọrụ ọbọdọ ọ bụla e guzobere, nguzogide ọha na eze bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị

Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Nchebe Gbụrụ-gbúrụ Ébé Obibi nke Massachusetts na-atụ aro ime ka mmemme PAYT bụrụ nke na-enweghị ego site na ibelata ụtụ isi n'otu ógè ahụ dị ka iwebata ụgwọ mkpofu ka ndị bi na ya ghara ịhụ nke ikpeazụ dị ka ọnụahịa ọhụrụ
Ọbọdọ ndị dị n'obodo mepere emepe na-enyekarị nchịkọta n'akụkụ ụzọ ebe obodo ndị dị n'ime ime ọbọdọ na-enye ọrụ nchịkọta
Ma European Union na US Environmental Protection Agency ebipụtala akwụkwọ ntuziaka màkà iwebata PAYT
Ihe omume PAYT na-arụ ọrụ na California, Michigan, New York na Washington na mmalite afọ 1970, ọ bụ ezie na Ọbọdọ San Francisco na-eme ụdị atụmatụ PAYT kemgbe afọ 1932
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2000, ọbọdọ puku isii dị na US (pasenti iri abụọ) na 200 na Canada emejuputawo ụgwọ ndị ọrụ màkà njikwa ihe mkpofu
N'afọ 2002, ndị North America tụfuru nde tọn ịri abụọ na anọ nke ihe mkpofu, ébé ébé obibi ruru nde tọn 95
Ihe omume PAYT mere ka ihe mkpofu ụlọ belata site na 9 - 38% ma mụbaa imegharị ihe site na 6 na 40%
Austria bụ mba mbụ mere ka ịkwụ ụgwọ mkpofu n'otu n'otu na 1945, mana PAYT ejighi ya ruo n'afọ 1980 mgbè usoro dị irè ma dị nchebe dị iji kọwaa ojiji nke ọrụ mkpofu na kọmputa
Ọbọdọ mbụ na Europe iji tinye usoro njirimara eletrọniki na ịkwụ ụgwọ màkà ụgwọ mkpofu bụ Dresden, Germany, n'afọ 2004
Ahụmahụ mbụ na Spain bụ n'afọ 2003
Kemgbe afọ 1991, Iwu Mgbukpọ Europe chọrọ ka a nwetaghachi akụkụ nke ego a na-adịghị ekpuchi site na ego a na'iji ihe eme ihe ọzọ na ụkpụrụ ego ndị na-emetọ ihe
Ụdị PAYT dị na ọbọdọ dị iche iche na Europe niile
Mgbè ewepụtara ya n'afọ 1970s, ọbọdọ narị itoolu na iri ise na anọ (pasenti iri atọ) na Japan emejuputawo mmemme PAYT
Ọbọdọ Taipei na-agba atụmatụ ugbu a ebe ezinụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ na-azụta akpa na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, ma tinye ihe mkpofu na ya
Ngalaba na-ahụ màkà ihe mkpofu ọbọdọ na-anakọta naanị ihe mkpofu etinye n'ime akpa ndị a pụrụ iche
A na-akpọ ya 'Per Bag Trash Collection Fee', atụmatụ a na-agba ume iji nkwakọ ngwaahịa a na-emegharị, ebe ọ bụ na ndị ahụ anaghị achọ akpa pụrụ iche ma na-atụfu n'efu
N'ihi ya, ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe mkpofu nkè Taipei na-agbadata 3508%, na imegharị ihe amụbaala okpukpu 26 site n'afo 1999
A na-etinyekwa PAYT na Korea, Thailand, Vietnam, China, na Republic of China (Taiwan)
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ewebatala ọnụahịa PAYT n'akụkụ ọtụtụ nke Bangalore site na ụlọ ọrụ Wastepicker Hasiru Dala, nke Nalini Shekar guzobere
Nzukọ ahụ gbasoro usoro nkewa nke 2-bin 1-bag, ma na-akwụ ụgwọ dị iche màkà ihe mkpofu nwèrè ike ime compost na ihe mkpofu, ka ọ na-akwụ màkà ihe ndị a ga-emegharị
Ụlọ ndị a na-arụ ọrụ site na usoro ọnụahịa a gosipụtara mbelata dị ịrịba ama na akara mkpofu ha
Randell 'Kydd' Jones bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-agụ egwu na onye na'ede egwu si Austin, Texas
Jones rụrụ na NXNE, The Brooklyn Hip-Hop Festival na Red Bull Sound Select na 2014 mgbè ọ na-emepụta màkà Kirko Bangz na Progression V
N'afọ 2015, ọ wepụtara egwu abụọ Patience na Blink Away na Sean Price; ọ rụkwara na Billboard Hot 100 Fest na Jones Beach Theater

Mgbè Chuck D họpụtara ya n'onwe ya imeghe maka The Hip Hop Gods Tour na Los Angeles na The Novo (nke bụbu Club Nokia), Kydd meghere màkà The Art Of Rap Fest na Lakewood Amphitheatre na Atlanta n'afọ 2016
O wepụtara Sounds in My Head 2 The Righteous Edition ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ na atụmatụ sitere na Skyzoo, Yelawolf, Pac Div, ADd+, Cory Kendrix, Max Frost, GLC & Tank Washington
Jones rụrụ na SXSW na Austin City Limits Festival na 2018 na 2019 na Gary Clark Jr Mgbè ọ tọhapụrụ abọm ya akpọrọ Homecoming yana EP ya na ónyé na-emepụta Insightful of Soulection

Ọ gara n'ihu na nke ahụ site n'ịrụ ọrụ na Blues On The Green n'oge 2020 na 2021 ma soro Round Rock Express rụkọọ ọrụ iji sọpụrụ ónyé Austinite na Negro league baseball legend Willie Wells na Austin Black Senators na Dell Diamond
N'afọ 2022, Kydd wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ ya, Onyx D'Or
Rose Akua Attaa Mensah (amụrụ na 25 Mee 1963) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Kyeiwaa maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Kyeiwaa
Mensah malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu n'òtù African Brothers nke Nana Kwame Ampadu bụ onye onye ịsị ndị ọbu abụ

Kyinkyinga (nke a na-akpọ chin-chin-gá) ma ọ bụ Cincinga (Hausa orthography), bụ anụ e siri esi ma ọ bụ kebab nke a na-ahụkarị ma na-ewu ewu na West Africa ma nwee njikọ na Suya kebab
Kyinkyinga bụ nri Ghanaian Hausa nke ndị ahịa na mpaghara Zango nke obodo na obodo ukwu, ma kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama n'etiti ndị Ghana ndị ọzọ
Ya mere, ọ dị nnọọ ka ma ọ bụ otu ihe na suya kebab na Naịjịrịa na Niger, nke a makwaara dị ka suya, tsinga, cinga, cicinga, cincinga, tsire agashi, cacanga ma ọ bụ tankora n'asụsụ Hausa
A na-akwadebe ya site na ikpuchi anụ ahụ n'ihe nka na-akpọ tankora ma ọ bụ yaji, ngwakọta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke na-adịkarị na nri ndị Hausa

Ọ bụ ngwakọta nke ose na-ekpo ọkụ, ginger a mịrị amị, yabasị a mịrị, ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ, na ntụ ọka ahụekere aṅara n'ọkụ A na-agbanye anụ ahụ n'elu skewer, na-ejikarị yabasị na ose, wee sie ya
A kọwawo ya dị ka nri okporo ámá dị mkpa na Ghana
