Kyla-Rose Smith (amụrụ n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1982) bụ onye South Africa na-akpọ violin, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-agba egwu, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Afropop musical ensemble Freshlyground, na Kolo Novo Movie Band, nnukwu ndị na-eme egwu fusion dabere na egwu nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe
Ọ bụbu onye otu egwu hip hop bụ̀ Tumi and the Volume, na nke egwu ìgweè nke Vuyani Dance Theatre
Ọ hapụrụ Vuyani Dance Theatre n'afọ 2003 mgbe o kpebiri isonyere Freshlyground
Smith tolitere na mpaghara Johannesburg ya na nwanne ya nwoke (Tymon) na nwanne ya nwanyị (Sydelle)
O mechara nweta Ọzụzụ egwu na Mahadum Cape Town
Na awọd Nwanyị Glamour nke afọ na 2011 nke emere n'abalị iri abụọ na ise nke onwa Julaị na Johannesburg, Kyla-Rose Smith so n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asatọ nke ngalaba Glamour nke South Africa sọpụrụ
Glamour kwupụtara Smith na onye otu ya Zolani Mahola dị ka ndị eji aga bụ'The Icons' nke ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na 2011
Kyle Dargan bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri
Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta uri ise
Dargan bụ ugbu onye Prọfeso só akuzi literature na onye enyemaka directọ nke creative writing na American University
A mụrụ Dargan na Newark, New Jersey
Ọ natara BA na Mahadum Virginia na MFA na Mahadim Indiana
Mahadum Georgia Press bipụtara nchịkọta abụ anọ mbụ nke Dargan
Nchịkọta mbụ ya, The Listening (2004), bụ onye natara Cave Canem Poetry Prize n'afọ 2004
Nchịkọta nke abụọ ya, Bouquet of Hungers (2007), nyere ya Hurston/Wright Legacy Award na uri n'afọ 2008
E bipụtara 'Logorrhea Dementia' n'afọ 2010 ma bipụta Honest Engine n'afọ 2015
Akwụkwọ nke ise Dargan, Anagnorisis, (Triquarterly, 2018), meriri Lenore Marshall Poetry Prize site na Academy of American Poets n'afọ 2018
Dargan bụ ugbu onye Prọfeso só akuzi literature na onye enyemaka directọ nke creativector of creaMahadumtAmerican
can University
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin POST NO ILLS
Dargan bi na Washington DC
Kyle Townsend (amuru Septemba 21, 1978) bu onye omekorita America, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ede ihe

Ọ mepụtala egwu maka ndị na-ese ihe egwu egwu dị ka 5-time GRAMMY Onye meriri ihe nrite Celine Dion, onye na-ede abụ onye ahọpụtara oge 10 Academy Award Diane Warren, yana Mary J Blige, Lady Gaga, Jessie J, Andra Day, na onye mmeri Academy Award Jennifer Hudson
Ọrụ ya enwetala nhọpụta 3 Academy Award, yana 3 Grammy Award Nominations
A zụlitere Kyle Townsend na mpaghara Central District nke Seattle Washington na Jackson Street nke akụkọ ihe méré eme
Mpaghara a bụbu ébé óbíbí nke ndị egwu a ma ama Ray Charles, Quincy Jones, na Jimi Hendrix
Ọ bụ nne ya, ónyé bụ ónyé ụkọchukwu ma bụrụkwa ónyé nduzi ukwe na chọọchị ezinụlọ ya gàrà, mere ka ọ mata egwu
Ọ malitere ịpị piano site na ntị mgbe ọ dị afọ isii ma tinye ya dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na chọọchị ya mgbe ọ dị obere afọ asaa
Ndị egwu ụka ndị ọzọ si n'ógbè Seattle ka ukwuu duziri ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ya na onye na-edekọ ozioma nke ritere GRAMMY Award, Reverend Timothy Wright
N'oge ọ na-eto eto, a na-akwụ ya ụgwọ ugboro ugboro ka ọ na-egwuri egwu na agbamakwụkwọ na ihe omume ụka ndị ọzọ na gburugburu ọbọdọ ahụ
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-elekwasị anya na mmepụta n'oge ọ ga-ezute ohere na ụlọ ahịa ngwá ọrụ dị nso na Seattle, ka ọ na-ele ónyé ahịa na-eme egwu na ebe ọrụ keyboard
N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, ọ na-ekwu 'Ọ bụ ezie na abụ m ónyé egwu ndụ m niile, nke ahụ bụ oge m kpebiri ịbụ onye na-emepụta ihe
O mèrè n'otu ntabi anya'
N'ime otu afọ, ọ ga-anọ na Los Angeles na-achụso ọrụ na egwu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kent-Meridian High School
Kyode (Gikyode, Chode) bụ asụsụ Guang nke obodo Ghana
Kyokuhairwa Kyaka Viccy (d
2008), nke a makwara dị ka Vicky Kyaka Kyokuhairi, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke asatọ nke Uganda na-anọchite anya Isingiro District
Ọ bụ onye kansụl mbụ maka Bukanga na mbido afọ 90 ha
Kyokuhairwa meriri ntuli aka afọ 2006 na Isingiro district nwanyị omeiwu no na oche na 94,258 vootu
Onye ya na ya kacha nso bụ Kyokuhairwe Stella Masiko Kafureka nwetara 10,739, ebe Biriwuija Edith Mwebaze nwere 7,571 vootu
N'afọ 2008, Vicky nwụrụ na di na nwunye na mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ mgbe ụgbọ ala ha na ụgbọala Fuso kụrụ na Rubaale n'okporo ụzọ Kabale-Mbarara
A mara ndị ọzọ nwụrụ anwụ dị ka Mathias Mulumba na nwunye ya, Winnie
Kyokuhairwa nọ na nne di ya ma nabata ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Nkozi
Nzukọ omebe iwu ahụ kwụrụ Viccy otuto

nke onye isi ọchịchị, Kabakumba Matsiko, kpaliri, onye kwuru na onye nwụrụ anwụ emeela ka onwe ya dị ka onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike, onye dị ike na onye na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye pati National Resistance Movement na-achị

Ndị omeiwu ndị ọzọ makwara Vicky maka ịbụ onye mmepe na nnukwu onye na-akwalite nke kwenyere na ịdị n'otu ezinụlọ na nkwekọrịta, nwanyị ukwu na onye nwere ike, nnukwu onye omeiwu nke bụ ihe nlereanya maka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị omeiwu na usoro ọtụtụ pati na nwanyị na-ekpe ekpere nke jikọrọ ya na ezinụlọ ya na mpaghara ya
Kyoto bu ama ukwu kárírí ívu mádu na Japan
Mádu jùrù ya nke 1,467,702 (2019)
Kyra Davis (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede akwụkwọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka Just One Night trilogy na Sophie Katz mystery series N'afọ 2013 Anonymous Content họọrọ Davis 'Just One Night trilogy na ebumnuche ịzụlite ya ka ọ bụrụ usoro telivishọn
A mụrụ Davis na Santa Clara, California, n'aka nne onye Juu na-alụbeghị di nke zụlitere Davis site n'enyemaka nke ezinụlọ
Aha ya bụ Kira Argounova, onye isi na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ayn Rand bụ We The Living
Nna ya bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na nne ya bụ onye agbụrụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe, na-enye Davis ihe nketa agwakọta
Davis gara Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising na Fashion Institute of Technology, n'oge ahụ ọ zutere ma lụọ di mbụ ya
Davis mechara gaa Mahadum Golden Gate, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na azụmahịa na ụmụ mmadụ
N'afọ 2001 Davis gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm
Davis malitere ide usoro Sophie Katz n'ihi nrụgide sitere na ịgba alụkwaghịm ma bipụta akwụkwọ mbụ ya site na Red Dress Ink n'afọ 2005
N'afọ 2013, Davis bipụtara Naanị otú abalị trịlogi site na akara dijitalụ nke Simon & Schuster
Davis bi na Los Angeles, California, ya na nwa ya nwoke na di ya, onye nduzi na onye na-ede ihe nkiri Rod Lurie, onye nwere ụmụ abụọ site na mmekọrịta mbụ
O nwere ụmụ abụọ site na Rod, Paige (onye nwere nwamba) na Hunter onye ọ hụrụ n'anya nke ukwuu
Onye bipụtara L'Avenir bụ Joachim Diana Gikupa na onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Denis Lubindi
Ọdịnihu pụtara 'Ọdịnihu'
Laetitia Kimalou Bambara (amụrụ na 30 Machị 1984 na Bordeaux, France) bụ onye France a mụrụ na France na-atụpu hama na-anọchite anya Burkina Faso
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite na ihe nrite kọntinent na mgbakwunye na ịmecha nke anọ na 2007 N'oge okpomọkụ Universiade
Ihe kacha mma ya n'ihe omume ahụ bụ mita 6859 (Sotteville-lès-Rouen, Junnu 2016) bụ ihe ndekọ Burkinabé ugbu a na oge niile nke abụọ kachasị mma n'Afrika
Léonce Ngabo (amụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Burundi
Ngabo gụrụ kemịkalụ, mana ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmasị n'egwú ma dee ihe nkiri maka mmepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na akụkọ ifo
Site na nkwado nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Switzerland, ọ nwetara ọganihu maka ihe nkiri zuru oke
Ngabo bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke International Festival of Cinema and Broadcasting in Burundi (FESTICAB)
O nyekwara aka guzobe East African Film Network (EAFN) na 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka onyeisi oche EAFN
Léonie Banga-Bothy bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Central Africa onye jere ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi nke Central African Republic site na afo 2013 ruo na afọ 2014
Michel Djotodia họpụtara Banga-Bothy dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ na Juun, na afọ 2013
Charles-Armel Doubane nọchiri ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016
Léonie La Fontaine (Ọktoba 2, 1857 -
Febụwarị 26, 1949) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ Beljọm na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme udo
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọgụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ụwa, ọ bụ onye otu Belgian League for the Rights of Women, National Belgian Women Council na Belgian Women's International League for Peace and Freedom

Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Henri La Fontaine, onye ọka iwu mba Belgium na onye isi oche nke International Peace Bureau onye natara Nobel Prize for Peace n'afọ 1913, ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike nhọpụta, na-eguzobe n'afọ 1890 Belgian 'League for the Rights of Women'

N'ebe dị nso na ọrụ Mundaneum, nke Paul Otlet na nwanne ya nwoke Henri La Fontaine malitere na echiche nke akwụkwọ, ọ malitere Office central de documentation féminine na 1909, wee mepụta n'ụlọ ya ọbá akwụkwọ maka Belgian League for the Rights of Women, iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị aka na nhọrọ ọrụ ha
Léonie La Fontaine nwụrụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1949, afọ mgbe iwu na-enye ụmụ nwanyị ohere ịtụ vootu malitere
Léonie na Henri La Fontaine nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu site n'aka nne ha Louise Philips, onye bụ nwanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma, ma mee ka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị n'ụlọ ya
Marie Popelin (1846 1913) bụ nwanyị mbụ na Belgium nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya dị ka Doctor of Laws n'afọ 1888, na Université Libre de Bruxelles
Mary Popelin tinyere akwụkwọ maka nnabata na òtù ndị ọkàiwu nke ga-enye ya ohere ịrịọ ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe Brussels
A jụrụ nke a, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị iwu ma ọ bụ ụkpụrụ doro anya gbochiri nnabata ụmụ nwanyị na ọkàiwu
Mkpesa ya n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe na ụlọ ikpe Cassation enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, mana a kọrọ ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Belgian na mba ọzọ

'Ihe gbasara Popelin' (French L'Affaire Popelin) bụ ihe kpatara ọgụ ụmụ nwanyị na Belgium, ma kpọkọta ndị na-akwado agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Beljọm dị ka Léonie La Fontaine, Henri La Fontain, Hector Denis [fr], Isala Van Diest, Louis Franck, na Marie Popelin
Mgbanwe ahụ mere ka e mepụta Njikọ Belgian maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 1892
N'afọ 1892, Léonie La Fontaine sonyeere Njikọ Belgian maka Ikike nke Ụmụ nwanyị, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye na-elekọta ọrụ ebere
Site n'afọ 1893, Léonie La Fontaine sonyere na mmepụta nke ntinye na Universal Bibliographic Repertory Paul Otlet na Henri La Fontain
N'afọ 1895, ọ sonyeere International Union of Women for Peace, na-etinye aka na pacifism
N'afọ 1924, o guzobere ngalaba Belgium nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Mahadum Women (Université des Femmes), otu French maka ịkwalite ọmụmụ nwoke na nwanyị na Belgium kpọrọ ọbá akwụkwọ ya Bibliothèque Léonie La Fontaine
Onye lolo bụ nwunye onye eze mgbe ụfọdụ
Oge ụfọdụ, ha nwere ike bụrụ onye ga-ekwu ihe ndi mmadụ ga-eme kama kama eze
Thato Madonsela (amuru 30 Jenụwarị 1985), nke amara aha ya nke ọma L-Tido, bụ onye South Africa na-edekọ ihe nkiri hip hop si Alexandra, Johannesburg

A maara ya nke ọma maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe ole na ole nọọrọ onwe ha na mba ahụ iji nweta ọganihu azụmahịa, na-emeri ihe nrite Ọhụrụ Kachasị Mma na Africa na 2010 Channel O Music Video Awards
Ọrụ egwu L-Tido malitere na 2009 mgbe ọ tọhapụrụ onwe ya, na-ere ahịa onwe ya ma na-ekesa mixtape ya City of Gold
[citation needed] ịga nke ọma nke mixtape ahụ dugara na nhọpụta onyinye na mmeri nke Channel O's Most Gifted Newcomer award
Na 30 June 2011, L-Tido wepụtara abọm izizi ya, All or Nothing, nke a sịrị na ọ na-ekpughe ihe niile gbasara njem ya na ihe ọ chọrọ ka kpakpando a na-eto eto ruo ebe ọ nọ
Abọm ahụ gụnyere mmekorita ya na KO si Teargas, onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria Banky W, Tumi si Tumi na Volume, Da LES nke Jozi na Maggz

A nabatara abọm ahụ nke ọma na ọtụtụ egwu na-agafe ọtụtụ chaatị, gụnyere Channel O Weekly Charts, MTV Base African Chart, etv's Club 808 Chart, French music channel Trace TV's Africa Top 10 Chart; na 'We Rollin' na-aghọ nọmba 2 kachasị egwu na mba ahụ dịka chaatị RAM nke mba ahụ si dị (ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke na-ahazi, gbakọọ ma nyochaa egwu kachasị egwu na ụlọ ọrụ redio dị iche iche na mba ahụ), nke mbụ maka egwu hip hop na mba ahụ
L-tido ghọkwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri hip hop mbụ nwere egwu abụọ na Top 10 nke chaatị RAM n'otu oge ahụ
L-Tido na-eduzi ma na-echepụta vidiyo egwu ya niile
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe bụ ndị butere mgbanwe na ọkwa nke vidiyo egwu nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri hip hop na mba ahụ nyere

Lerato Matsotso nke Daily Sun (akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị ukwuu na South Africa) kwuru na ọ bụ, 'Ndị na-ese ihe na SA na-agbanwe site na ịgba egwu egwu egwu na ọdọ mmiri jupụtara na ụmụ agbọghọ na-agba ọtọ na itinye ego na vidiyo na ịpụta nnukwu akụkọ', ma kọwaa ọrụ L-Tido dị ka 'vidiyo egwu nke ga-enye vidiyo mba ụwa ego ha'
L-Tido nwekwara nhọpụta Channel O maka Best Video, nhọpụta Metro FM maka 'We Rollin' nke gosipụtara Teargas 'KO, na nhọpụta South African Music Awards maka Best Hip Hop album na 2012

A tọhapụrụ abọm nke abụọ nke L-Tido All of Me na 8 Nọvemba 2013, site na mmekọrịta ikikere n'etiti onye na-ese ihe na Electromode Music and Business Solutions ma malite na ọnụọgụ 2 na chaatị Hip Hop nke South Africa nke iTunes
Onye na-ese ihe kwuru na abọm ahụ ' sitere na ọnọdụ onwe onye na ọnọdụ ndị enyi m na ezinụlọ m gafere n'afọ gara aga'

A na-ekwu na abọm ahụ nwere ụda hip hop ugbu a, nke jupụtara na ihe nketa Africa nke L-tido, nke a na-abịa n'ụzọ doro anya na ngwá ọrụ nke egwu mbụ ya 'Who You Loving', na nnwale nke onye na-ese egwu kwaito Doc Shebeleza 'Get Getsa' na egwu nke abụọ ya, 'Steve Kekana'

Anụ ehi dị n'etiti L-Tido na onye na-ese egwú hip hop South Africa AKA malitere na 2009 mgbe AKA gara na netwọk mmekọrịta Facebook na-asọpụrụ L-Tido n'ihu ọha, mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu banyere abụ nke na-egosi ndị na-ese hip hop Da LES na Bongani Fassie nke gị
otu Jozi, na Magz
Nke a mere ka ihe nkiri hip hop South Africa banye n'ọgba aghara, ka ndị na-ese ihe malitere ịlụ ọgụ
Anụ ehi hụrụ ka ndị omenkà abụọ na-edekọ egwu diski, bụ nke mere ka esemokwu ọha na eze dị n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na anụ ehi kacha atọ ụtọ na South Africa kwụsị
Anụ anụ ahụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ kwụsị ọrụ rap nke Thato, agbanyeghị na Mee 2013 ndị na-ese ihe tinyere foto na Instagram nke ha na studio ọnụ
Anụ ehi a kwụsịrị'
Ha ewepụtala egwu ọnụ kemgbe ahụ

L-Tido bụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe South Africa bụ akụkụ nke mkpọsa ahụ iji kwalite oge nke abụọ nke ihe nkiri ntorobịa na-emeri MTV Shuga, nke MTV Networks Africa nyere ya na mmekorita ya na MTV Staying Alive Foundation, Partnership for Ọgbọ HIV-Free (HFG) na Gọọmenti Kenya, site n'ịbịakọta ọnụ na ndị na-ese ihe Banky W, Wizkid na Bon-Eye iji mepụta ụda ụda maka oge
Ihe onyonyo egwu a bụ onye ntụzịaka a ma ama nke Africa bụ Clarence Peters na Kenya
Hull (1942-2008) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1942 na McAdams, Mississippi
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na Kosciusko, Mississippi
Ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, ọ malitere ise ihe na ijikọta ihe n'ụlọ ya na ogige ya na 1975
N'etiti ihe ndị a gbakọtara bụ hubcaps, akpụkpọ ụkwụ na akara
Hull nwụrụ n'afọ 2008

Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, e mere mgbalị iji chekwaa saịtị ahụ na ihe ndị ahụ, mana n'agbanyeghị onyinye sitere na American Folklore Society, itinye aka nke Mississippi Arts Commission, na ịmepụta The Friends of LV
ọrụ ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Ụlọ ahụ nọ n'ime mmebi na ónyé nwe ya bụ ihe a na-enyo enyo
N'ime usoro nke ịhazi ónyé nwe ya, ụlọ ahụ dakwasịrị n'ime mmebi ọzọ
Ndị enyi nke LV
sere foto iji dekọọ otú ụlọ na ogige ahụ si pụta mgbè Hull dị ndụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ahụ ka a kwagara n'ụlọ nzukọ ọbọdọ Kosciusko
Foto Vaughn Sills nkè 2001 nkè ubi ya dị na Smithsonian American Art Museum
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke usoro Places for the Spirit, Traditional African American Gardens of the South
Zamenhof[lower-alpha 1] (15 Disemba 1859 - 14 Eprel 1917)[lower -alpha 2] bụ onye na-ahụ maka anya nke biri ọtụtụ ndụ ya na Warsaw
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye okike nke Esperanto, asụsụ enyemaka mba ụwa a na-ejikarị eme ihe
Zamenhof malitere ịmepụta asụsụ Esperanto n'afọ 1873 mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ tolitere na-enwe mmasị n'echiche nke ụwa na-enweghị agha ma kwenyere na nke a nwere ike ime site n'enyemaka nke asụsụ enyemaka mba ụwa ọhụrụ
Asụsụ ga-abụ ngwá ọrụ iji kpọkọta ndị mmadụ ọnụ site na nnọpụiche, ikpe ziri ezi, nkwurịta okwu ziri ezi
O guzobere obodo nke na-aga n'ihu taa n'agbanyeghị Agha Ụwa nke narị afọ nke 20, mgbalị iji gbanwee asụsụ ahụ, na IALs nke oge a (naanị asụsụ ọzọ dịka ya n'oge ahụ bụ Volapük)
Tụkwasị na nke a, Esperanto emeela ka asụsụ ndị ọzọ site na mmekọrịta na ihe okike nke ndị ọrụ ya
N'ihi ihe ọ rụzuru, na nkwado ya maka mkparịta ụka ọdịbendị, UNESCO họọrọ Zamenhof dịka otu n'ime ndị ama ama ya nke afọ 2017, na 100th ncheta ọnwụ ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2019, e nwere opekata mpe nde mmadụ abụọ na-asụ Esperanto, gụnyere ihe dịka 1,000 ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ Esperanto
N'afọ 1879, Zamenhof dere ụtọ asụsụ Yiddish mbụ
E bipụtara ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ afọ ka e mesịrị na magazin Yiddish Lebn un visnshaft E bipụtara ihe odide Russian zuru ezu nke ihe odide a na afọ 1982, na nsụgharị Esperanto nke Adolf Holzhaus, na L
Zamenhof, provo de gramatiko de novjuda lingvo (Mgbalị na ụtọ asụsụ nke asụsụ Neo-Jewish), Helsinki, peeji nke 9ː36
N'ọrụ a, ọ bụghị naanị na ọ na-enye nyocha nke ụtọ asụsụ Yiddish, kamakwa ọ na-atụ aro mgbanwe ya na edemede Latin na ihe ọhụrụ orthographic ndị ọzọ
N'otu oge ahụ, Zamenhof dere ụfọdụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na Yiddish, gụnyere ma eleghị anya nyocha mbụ nke uri Yiddish (lee p
50 na akwụkwọ ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu)
N'afọ 1882, e nwere oke mmegide n'ime Alaeze Ukwu Russia, gụnyere Congress Poland, kpaliri Zamenhof isonye na mmalite nke Zionist movement, Hibbat Zion
Ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ n'afọ 1887, na 1901 bipụtara nkwupụta na Russian n'aha Hillelism, ebe ọ rụrụ ụka na ọrụ Zionist enweghị ike idozi nsogbu nke ndị Juu
Zamenhof na nwunye ya Klara Silbernik zụlitere ụmụ atọ, nwa nwoke, Adam, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Zofia na Lidia
E gburu mmadụ atọ ahụ n'oge Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ
Lidia Zamenhof karịsịa nwere mmasị dị ukwuu na Esperanto, ma dịka okenye ghọrọ onye nkuzi nke asụsụ ahụ, na-agagharị na Europe na America iji kụzie klas na ya
Site na ọbụbụenyi ya na Martha Root, Lidia nabatara Bahá'u'lláh wee ghọọ onye otu okwukwe Bahá'í
Dịka otu n'ime ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta ya, okwukwe Bahá'í na-akụzi na ndị nnọchiteanya nke mba ụwa niile kwesịrị ịhọrọ asụsụ enyemaka ụwa
Nwa nwa Zamenhof, Louis-Christophe Zaleski-Zamenhof (nwa Adam), biri na France site n'afọ 1960 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2019
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, nwa nwanyị Louis-Christophe, Margaret Zaleski-Zamenhof, na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Esperanto movement
L, ma ọ bụ l, bụ mkpụrụedemede iri na abụọ na mkpụrụedemede Latịn, ejiri na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ, mkpụrụedemede nke asụsụ ndị ọzọ ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile
Aha ya na bekee bụ el (akpọrọ /ˈɛl/), plural els
O nwere ike ịbụ na Lamedh si na foto e ji achị ehi ma ọ bụ ihe e ji achụ ehi bịa
Ụfọdụ atụwo aro ndị ọrụ ọzụzụ atụrụ
Na transcription phonetic na phonemic, International Phonetic Alphabet na-eji Ōnlʹ iji nọchite anya alveolar approximant

N'asụsụ bekee, ⟨l⟩ na-anọchi anya fọnịm /l/, nke nwere ike inwe ụkpụrụ ụda dị iche iche, dabere n'olu ọkà okwu, yana ma ọ na-apụta tupu ma ọ bụ mgbe ụdaume gasịrị N'akụkụ akụkụ alveolar (ụda nke nọchiri anya IPA site na obere obere okwu [l]) na-apụta n'ihu ụdaume, dị ka egbugbere ọnụ ma ọ bụ ngwakọta, ebe velarized alveolar lateral approximant (IPA [ɫ]) na-apụta na mgbịrịgba na mmiri ara ehi Ikwupụta nke a anaghị eme n'ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị Europe na-eji ⟨l⟩; ọ bụkwa ihe na-eme ka ịkpọ ⟨l⟩ sie ike nye ndị na-asụ asụsụ na-enweghị ⟨l⟩ ma ọ bụ nwee ụkpụrụ dị iche iche maka ya, dị ka Japanese ma ọ bụ ụfọdụ olumba ndịda nke Chinese Ọnọdụ ahụike ma ọ bụ mgbochi ikwu okwu na-amachibido ịkpọ ⟨l⟩ bụ nke a maara dị ka lambdacism

N'asụsụ Bekee, a na-ekwukarị okwu ndị dị ka ije ma ọ bụ nwere ike (ọ bụ ezie na ọnụnọ ya nwere ike ịgbanwe uru mkpụrụedemede ụdaume bu ya ụzọ), ọ na-ekwukwa okwu ndị dị na nkwụ na abụ ọma; Otú ọ dị, enwere ụfọdụ ọdịiche mpaghara
⟨l⟩ usually represents the sound [l] or some other lateral consonant
Digraphs ndị a na-ahụkarị na-agụnye, nke nwere uru yiri nke Bekee, mana o nwere uru dị iche iche na-enweghị olu alveolar lateral fricative (IPA [ɬ]) na Welsh, ebe ọ nwere ike ịpụta na ọnọdụ mbụ
N'asụsụ Spanish, a na-anọchite anya [ʎ], [j], [ɟ], ma ọ bụ [ʃ], dabere na olumba
A na-ahụkarị akụkụ ọnụ (IPA) n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, a na-anọchite anya ya na Italian, Spanish na Catalan, na Portuguese, na Latvian
N'asụsụ Washo, mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ndị dị ala na-anọchite anya ụda [l], ebe mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ndị kasị elu na-anọchi anya ụda na-enweghị olu, dị ka okpukpu abụọ na Welsh
A na-eji mkpụrụedemede ukwu L dị ka akara ego maka lek Albania na lempira Honduras
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe, ọkachasị n'ihe odide aka, dị ka akara ego maka lira Italian

N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka akara ego maka pound sterling nke Britain (iji belata Latin libra, pound); n'iji ya eme ihe n'oge a, akara pound (£), nke dabeere na ya, ejirila ya mee ihe
Nọmba Roman L na-anọchite anya nọmba 50
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, mkpụrụedemede L na W aghọwo meme ịntanetị, na-eguzo maka mfu na mmeri
A na-ejikarị L eme ihe na omenala a ma ama, na-ezo aka na nkọwa okwu mkparị nke onye nwe ya
Were L, n'otu n'otu, pụtara ịnakwere mmeri a

N'ọtụtụ mkpụrụedemede sans-serif, mkpụrụedemede dị ala, nke edere l, nwere ike isi ike ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti mkpụrụedemede 'anya'; na mkpụrụedemede serif ụfọdụ, enwere ike ịgbagwoju glyph l anya na glyph 1, nọmba otu
Iji zere mgbagwoju anya dị otú ahụ, ụfọdụ mkpụrụedemede kọmputa ọhụrụ (dị ka Trebuchet MS) nwere finial, curve n'aka nri na ala nke mkpụrụedemede dị ala ell
Ụzọ ọzọ iji belata mgbagwoju anya dị otú ahụ - nke a naeji na mgbakọ na mwepụ, akara okporo ụzọ Europe na mgbasa ozi - bụ iji akara l, nke bụ ụdị mkpụrụedemede dị ala nke mkpụrụedemede 'ya'
Na Unicode, akara a bụ U+2113 ℓ SCRIPT SMALL L from the 'letter-like symbols' block
In Japan, for example, this is the symbol for the liter
However, the International System of Units recommends using Unicode symbols U+006C l LOWERCASE L or U+004C L UPPERCASE L for the liter
Ihe ngwọta ọzọ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ahụ na Web typography, na-eji mkpụrụedemede serif maka mkpụrụedemede dị ala ell, dị ka l, na ederede sans-serif
Àtụ Letter other reps

Lagos Deep Offshore Logistics Base (LADOL), nke a na-akpọ LADOL Free Zone, nke a makwaara dị ka LADOL Base ma ọ bụ mbido LFZ, bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla nke ụlọ ọrụ na injinia nke dị n'àgwàetiti dị na Port of Apapa, Lagos, Naijiria
E mere LADOL iji nye nhazi, injinia na ọrụ nkwado ndị ọzọ maka ụlọ ọrụ nyocha mmanụ na gas na mmepụta na-arụ ọrụ na West Africa na gburugburu ya
Onye mmepe LADOL, LiLe, malitere iwu ụlọ ọrụ nhazi na injinia na afọ 2001 wee malite ọrụ zuru oke na afọ 2006
Na Junn, na afọ 2006, a họpụtara LADOL dị ka Free Zone dị ka Iwu Naịjirịa Naịjirị Export Processing Zones Act No

Emechara ya na ọnụahịa nke US $ 150 nde, akụrụngwa mbụ nke LADOL gụnyere ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri 200m, 85m draft, 25-ton / m2 ebe na-ebu ibu dị elu na mgbakwunye 30-ton na njedebe ọ bụla nke nwere ike ịba ihe ruru ụgbọ mmiri isii na ụgbọ mmiri atọ dị arọ; họtel; ụlọ nkwakọba ihe; ụlọ ọrụ; okporo ụzọ; ọgwụgwọ mmiri; na reticulation n'okpuru ala
N'afọ 2015, site na nkwado nke Total Upstream Nigeria Limited, a gbakwunyere LADOL iji tinye ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ US $ 300 nde Floating Production Storage and Offloading (FPSO) nke na-emepụta na njikọta

Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta na njikọta ụgbọ mmiri FPSO - nke SHI-MCI FZE na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a, nke na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ n'etiti Samsung Heavy Industries na onye na-arụ ụgbọ mmiri LADOL, Mega-Construction na Integration FZE - malitere iji mepụta ma jikọta Total Egina FPSO na Naijiria na ọrụ ndị ọzọ yiri ya a na-atụ anya na a ga-arụ n'Africa
Akụkụ ọzọ nke mgbasara LADOL akọwo na ọ gụnyere ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri kpọrọ nkụ nke ga-abụ nke kachasị ukwuu na West Africa ma dọta ihe ruru 100,000 ọrụ kpọmkwem na nke na-apụtaghị ìhè

N'ọnwa Disemba, n'afọ 2015, LADOL meriri ihe nrite maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara Free Zone Integrated Hub Capacity Building Firm maka nyocha mmanụ na gas miri emi, mmepụta na ọrụ injinia site na Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport
Ọzọkwa na afọ 2015, LADOL ritere ihe nrite 5 na fDi Magazine Global Free Zones of the Year Annual Rankings 2015
E nyere ya onye mmeri nke Sub-Saharan African regional free zones award na onye mmeri ya nke nnukwu ndị nwe ụlọ maka Africa
A jara LADOL mma nke ukwuu dị ka mpaghara nweere onwe ya nke afọ
LGBT+ Rights Ghana bụ òtù Ghana nke na-akwado ikike LGBT na Ghana
Òtù ahụ etinyela aka n'ụdị ụfọdụ nke ime ihe ike gụnyere ịmepụta Ghana Gay Blackmail List iji lụso egwu na ịpụnara ndị ikom na-eme enyi nwoke ọgụ
N'afọ 2021, nzukọ ahụ meghere ụlọ ọrụ ya na Accra nke dugara n'iwe ọha na eze na mmegide sitere n'aka òtù ndị na-emegide LGBT na Ghana
Onye isi nchịkwa LGBT+ Rights Ghana bụ Alex Kofi Donkor
E hiwere LGBT+ Rights Ghana n'afọ 2018 dị ka blọọgụ cyber activism

N'afọ 2020, o mepụtara ibe mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta a na-akpọ 'Ghana Gay Blackmail List' iji lụso egwu na ịpụnara ndị nwoke na-eme enyi nwoke site n'ịdepụta ihe omume egwu na inye njikọ maka ndị LGBT a na-emegbu iji nye akụkọ

Alex Kofi Donkor, onye isi nchịkwa nke LGBT+ Rights Ghana kwuru na e mepụtara ibe ahụ mgbe a wakporo ọtụtụ ndị LGBT Ghana, jiri égbè yie ha egwu, ma zuo ha ohi, mana ha enwetaghị enyemaka ọ bụla n'aka ndị uwe ojii
N'afọ 2021, LGBT+ Rights Ghana meghere ọfịs ya na Accra ma kpọọ ụfọdụ ndị nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, ndị ama ama, ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe, na ndị LGBT+ maka ihe omume ahụ nke e bu n'obi ịnakọta ego
Ihe omume a kpatara iwe na mba ahụ dum
Tụkwasị na nke a, e nwere mmegide sitere n'aka òtù ndị na-emegide nwoke idina nwoke nke kpọrọ gọọmentị ka ha mechie nzukọ ahụ ma rịọ Inspector General of Police ka ọ jide ndị niile metụtara nzukọ ahụ
Na nzaghachi, LGBT+ Rights Ghana wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekwusi ike na ndị LGBT nọ na Ghana nwere ikike ikike mmadụ, gụnyere nnwere onwe mkpakọrịta
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị, ndị uwe ojii mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ha
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2021, nzukọ ahụ katọrọ atụmatụ imebi iwu gbasara ikike LGBT na Ghana
Ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị, ndị na-edina nwoke ibe ha, ndị na ndị na-ahụ nwoke ibe ha n'anya, na ndị na'anya ịhapụ ụdị ka chi si kee (LGBT) na Benin na-eche ihe ịma aka iwu na-enweghị ndị bi na ya
Ọ bụ ezie na mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị bụ iwu na Benin, ndị na-edina ụdị onwe ha na-aga n'ihu na-eche mkpagbu zuru oke ihu ma na-adịghị ekwupụta banyere mmekọahụ ha
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ele ha anya dị ka ndị na-emebi ọha mmadụ, a na-akpọkarịkwa ndina ụdị onwe ọrịa ndị ọcha wetara na mba ahụ
Mmekọahụ nwoke na nwoke na nwanyị na nwanyị bụ ihe iwu kwadoro na Benin n'etiti ndị okenye kwenyere na ha karịrị afọ 21
Usoro ntaramahụhụ dị na Benin bụ n'ezie Usoro ntaramahụrụ nke French West Africa nke iwu ndị France na-achị na 6 Mee 1877

Mgbanwe nke afọ 1947 na Iwu nke afọ 1877 setịpụrụ afọ 13 maka mmekọahụ na nwatakịrị nwoke na nwanyị ọ bụla, mana ọ na-ata ntaramahụhụ omume ọ bụla na-adịghị mma ma ọ bụ na-emegide okike ma ọ bụrụ na emere ya na onye nwoke na nwanyị n'okpuru 21 'N'enweghị ajọ mbunobi na ntaramahụjụ siri ike nke paragraf ndị bu ụzọ ma ọ bụ site na Nkebi 332 na 333 nke Iwu a, a ga-ata ahụhụ site n'ụlọ mkpọrọ site na ọnwa isii ruo afọ atọ na 200 ruo 50,000 francs onye ọ bụla na onye na-eme otu omume na-adịghị njọ ma ọ bụ [omume] nke okike n'okpuru 21'

Nkeji edemede 88 nke 1996 Criminal Code of Benin na-agụ 'Onye ọ bụla na-eme omume rụrụ arụ ma ọ bụ omume megide okike na onye ọ bụla nke otu nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị ga-ata ahụhụ site na 1 ruo 3 afọ mkpọrọ na ịkwụ ụgwọ nke 100,000 ruo 500,000 francs'
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị mgbe a tụụrụ akwụkwọ a vootu ka ọ bụrụ iwu
N'ịzaghachi 2008 UNHRC Universal Periodic Review, onye nnọchi anya Benin kwuru, '[n'ihe gbasara] okwu nke ndina ụdị onwe, a naghị eleghara ihe omume ahụ anya mana ọ bụ nke dịpụrụ adịpụ
Ezinụlọ agaghị ekwe ka a kpọga ụmụ ha n'ụlọ ikpe maka mmebi iwu dị otú ahụ, n'ihi ya, ọ dịghị ikpe mpụ e nyere, ọ bụ ezie na iwu nyere ya

' Mana nzaghachi gọọmentị a ezighi ezi n'ihi na Nzukọ Mba nke Benin malitere imezigharị iwu ntaramahụhụ n'afọ 1996, 2001, 2008, na 2010 mana edebeghị iwu ntaramahụrụ nke oge a na-ekwu maka mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Ya mere, naanị iwu dị irè gbasara mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị bụ site na 1949, nke na-esetịpụ afọ nkwenye na-ahaghị nhata maka mmekọrịta nwoke na nwoke
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2013, onye nnọchi anya mba France kpọrọ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke Benin ka ọ bịa nzukọ iji kwurịta nzaghachi gọọmentị Benin na 2012 UNHRC Universal Periodic Review
Benin ajụla aro sitere na steeti na-akpọ Benin ka ọ melite ọnọdụ maka ndị LGBT
Mana na nzukọ nke 4 Machị, Minista ahụ gakwuuru osote onye nduzi ya nke mechara kwuo na 'a ga-edozi ihe ụfọdụ'
Otu n'ime iwu ndị a tụrụ aro n'oge na-adịbeghị anya gbasara mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị bụ iwu ntaramahụhụ sitere n'October 2008, nke a na-emetụbeghị vootu
N'adịghị ka mbido afọ 1996, mbido afọ 2008 nke Iwu Mpụ anaghị agụnye ntaramahụhụ maka mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị n'etiti ndị okenye kwenyere na nzuzo
Enweghị nkwenye nke ikike iwu maka di na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị

Gọọmentị amatala mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị nke ndị otu ndị nnọchi anya mba na Benin site n'inye visa ndị nnọchianya na nnwere onwe ndị nnọchiiche mba na ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị na ndị nnọchi nke mba ọzọ na Benin

Enweghị nchebe iwu megide ịkpa ókè dabere na mmasị mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ njirimara nwoke na nwanyị, ọ bụ ezie na Nkeji edemede 36 nke Iwu Benin na-ekwu 'Onye Benin ọ bụla nwere ọrụ ịkwanyere ndị ikwu ya ùgwù na ịtụle n'enweghị ịkpa ókè ọ bụla; na ịnọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta na ndị ọzọ nke ga-enye ohere ichebe, nkwanye ùgwù, mkparịta ụka na nnagide na udo na ịdị n'otu mba'
Na mbido afọ 2013 e nwere ihe dịka òtù LGBT Benin itoolu na-arụ ọrụ na Cotonou, Porto Novo, na Parakou
N'etiti òtù ndị ahụ bụ Benin Synergie Plus (BESYP); Union for Solidarity, Interraide and Development (USED); Les Amis de Sans Voix; Swallow (the bird) Club of Benin; na Tous Nés Libres et Egaux
Enweghị akụkọ banyere ịkpa ókè ọha na eze ma ọ bụ ime ihe ike dabere na mmasị mmekọahụ mmadụ
Agbanyeghị, akụkọ US State Department ezughi oke
Ndị bi na LGBT na Benin bụ ndị na-emeghe banyere mmasị mmekọahụ ha na-eche ịkpa ókè, iyi egwu, ime ihe ike, na ịpụnara mmadụ ihe ihu

N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, ndị otu LGBT nke Cotonou haziri ihe omume ọha na eze iji kwado Ụbọchị Mba Nile megide Homophobia, Biphobia na Transphobia na Institut Français nke Cotonó nke dọtara ndị na-ege ntị dị iche iche nke mmadụ 200
Ikekwe maka oge mbụ arụmụka ihu na ihu mere ka ndị Benin kwupụta nkwado ha na ajụjụ na nchegbu banyere ndina ụdị onwe na Benin
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwupụta n'ihu ọha dị ka ndị na-edina nwoke ibe ha, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ dị ka ndị homophobic
E mepụtara ibe Facebook, Tous Nés Libres et Egaux, iji kwalite nnagide nke ọdịiche dị iche iche nke mmadụ na iwepụ ụdị ịkpa ókè niile na Benin, ọkachasị homophobia
Isiokwu LGBT dị iche iche dị na akụkọ ifo dị iche iche nke Afrịka, nke bụ isi n'etiti ha bụ anwansi
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke mmụọ ma ọ bụ agbara dị na Haitian na Louisiana Voodoo a na-akpọ loa (ma ọ bụ lwa)
E nwere ike iwere loa ndị a dị ka ezinụlọ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ma ọ bụ dị ka otu ihe nwere akụkụ dị iche iche, na njikọ na mpaghara ụfọdụ nke ndụ
Ụfọdụ lwa nwere njikọ pụrụ iche na anwansi, ofufe ndị nna nna ma ọ bụ ọnwụ dịka Ghedes na Barons
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a na-ejikọkwa na transgenderism ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Ndị a gụnyere Ghede Nibo, mmụọ na-elekọta ndị nwụrụ na nwata

A na-egosipụta ya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nwanyị na-adọkpụ nwanyị ma na-akpali ndị ọ bi na ya inwe mmekọahụ rụrụ arụ nke ụdị ọ bụla, ọkachasị ịhapụ ụdị ka chi si kee ma ọ bụ omume mmekọahụ nwanyị na nwanyị dị n'etiti ụmụnwanyị

Nne na nna Ghede Nibo bụ Baron Samedi na Maman Brigitte; Baron Samidi bụ onye ndú nke Ghedes na Barons ma gosipụta ya dị ka onye na-enwe mmekọahụ abụọ ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ịhapụ ụdị ka chi si kee, na-eyi okpu na uwe elu yana uwe na akpụkpọ ụkwụ ụmụnwanyị
Samedi nwere ọchịchọ maka 'mgbatị na-agbanwe agbanwe' nke na-agafe ókè nwoke na nwanyị ma na-egosikwa agụụ maka mmekọahụ

Ndị isi ndị ọzọ na-egosipụta omume nwoke idina nwoke bụ Baron Lundy na Baron Limba, ndị bụ ndị na-ahụ n'anya ma na-akụzi ụdị ịgba mgba ọtọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ha, kwenyere na ọ na-eme ka ike anwansi dịkwuo ukwuu
Baron Oua Oua, onye na-egosipụtakarị n'akụkụ dị ka nwatakịrị, ndị na-eme Voodoo akpọwo ya baron 'nke nwere njikọ chiri anya na ndina ụdị onwe'
Lua ọzọ, Erzulie, na-ejikọta ya na ịhụnanya, agụụ mmekọahụ na ịma mma
Erzulie nwere ike igosipụta akụkụ ndị metụtara LGBT, gụnyere transgender ma ọ bụ amazonian, na mgbakwunye na ọdịdị nwanyị ọdịnala
Mgbe ha bi na ụmụ nwoke, akụkụ ndị a nwere ike ịkpata omume transgender ma ọ bụ homoerotic, ebe ha nwere ike ịpụta na mmekọahụ nwanyị na nwanyị ma ọ bụ mmetụta na-emegide ụmụnwoke n'ime ụmụnwanyị
A na-ahụ Erzulie Freda dị ka onye na-echebe ụmụnwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ha, a na-ejikọkwa Erzulie Dantor na ụmụnwanyị na-edine nwanyị
Santería na Candomblé bụ okpukpe syncretic sitere na nkwenkwe Yoruba diasporic na Katọlik, nke kachasị na South America, gụnyere Cuba na Brazil
N'otu Cuban Santería 'pataki', ma ọ bụ akụkọ ifo, a ghọgburu chi nwanyị oké osimiri Yemaha na nwa ya nwoke Shango ka ha nwee mmekọahụ
Iji zoo ihere ya n'ihe omume a, ọ chụpụrụ ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ ndị ọzọ, Inle na Abbata, ibi na ala oké osimiri, na mgbakwunye na-ebipụ ire Inle ma mee ka Abbata ntị chiri
N'ihi nnọpụiche na owu ọmụma ha, Inle na Abbata ghọrọ ndị enyi na-anụ ọkụ n'obi ma bụrụ ndị na-ahụ n'anya, nwee ike ikwurịta okwu n'ụzọ siri ike
A na-eji nke a akọwa mmalite nke mmekọahụ, muteness, na ntị chiri na mgbakwunye na ndina ụdị onwe
Lusamba Vanessa Kalala, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka LU KALA, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Congolese-Canada

LU KALA rụrụ ọrụ na Canadian Music Week na AFỌ 2019 ebe ọ rụrụ egwu izizi ya, 'DMCO (Don't Count Me Out) O nwetakwara nnukwu ihe nrite na RBC's Emerging Musician Program, na-enweta $ 10,000 nke oge studio n'etiti ihe nrite ndị ọzọ
'DMCO (a gupu kwala m)' ka Complex kọwara dị ka 'ike'
Otu egwu nke abụọ nke LU KALA, 'Body Knew', bụ nke Unheardgems na Sidedoor toro
Otu egwu ya nke atọ, 'Want You' nwetakwara ezigbo nyocha site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Sidedoor kọwara egwu ya nke afọ 2020 'No Smoke' dị ka 'ihe na-adọrọ mmasị, na-adọta, ma na-enye ike'
La'bi bụ asụsụ omenala nke malite nwoke n'etiti Gbaya Kara, Mbum, na ụfọdụ Sara Laka, na mpaghara nke Touboro dị nso ebe CAR, Chad, na Cameroon zutere
O nweghị ndị na-asụ ya
Ọ nwere njikọ na Mbum, na nnukwu ego mgbazinye sitere na otu ma ọ bụ karịa asụsụ Sara
E nyere ndepụta okwu na Periquet (1915)
Àtụ Adamawa languagesÀtụ Languages of Cameroon
Laila Marrakchi (amụrụ n'afọ 1975 na Casablanca) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri nke a ma ama maka ihe nkiri esemokwu Marock
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na 2005 Cannes Film Festival
Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Alexandre Aja
Ọ tolitere na klas dị elu nke Casablanca nke a na-egosipụta na Marock
LaToya M
Hobbs (amụrụ ma zụlite na Little Rock, Arkansas) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nke a maara nke ọma màkà nnukwu foto ya nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Hobbs kwagara Baltimore, MD mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ ya ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ na Maryland Institute College of Art
Ọ nwetara nkwado maka ihe osise ya na ihe oyiyi ya na afọ 2010, na-enweta ọtụtụ onyinye njem na onyinye na ngwụcha afọ iri abụọ
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka echiche nke ịma mma ojii na ọdịbendị ọdịbendị nke na-elekwasị ányá n'ịbụ nwanyị
Mbidoa M
Hobbs nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Little Rock, Arkansas ruo mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji
Na chọọchị ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ bụrụ abụ n'òtù ukwe ma na-agba egwú liturgical
Hobbs gụrụ ihe ọmụmụ ihe ndị dị ndụ na Mahadum Arkansas ruo mgbè ọ ghọtara na ise ihe bụ ezigbo ọkpụkpọ ya
N'oge ahụ, ọ gbanwere ụzọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mụọ ihe osise studio
Hobbs gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Arkansas na Little Rock na BA na eserese
O mechara nweta MFA ya na studio art eserese na óbíbí akwụkwọ na Mahadum Purdue
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Hobbs kwagara Maryland
Hobbs na-arụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ oge niile na MICA (Maryland Institute College of Art)
Ọ na-ese ma na-emepụta ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ya
N'afọ 2019, o nwèrè ihe ngosi nke onwe ya nke akpọrọ Salt of the Earth II na Baltimore City Hall

E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya na From Baltimore, With Love, ihe ngosi otu na Mary Deacon Opasik, Oletha deVane, Jessica Devilbliss na Brentwood Arts Exchange, Brentwood, MD na 2019, nke Schroeder Cherry haziri
Ọ nwetara nkwado na 2020 dị ka ónyé ikpeazụ na onye mmeri nke Janet & Walter Sondheim Artscape Prize nyéré na Baltimore, MD nke na-abịa na onyinye $ 25,000
N'afọ 2021, e gosipụtara Hobbs na Mequitta Ahuja, Lauren Frances Adams, na Cindy Cheng na ngosi 'All Due Respect' na Baltimore Museum of Art
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe nkírí ise, nke ọ bụla e ji osisi kpụọ nke akpọrọ 'Carving Out Time'
Ihe osise na-eme ihe nkírí nwere mmetụta siri ike na ndụ Hobbs
Elizabeth Catlett nwere mmetụta sịrị ike na Hobbs
A maara Hobbs nke ọma maka ihe osise ya, nke nwere ọdịdị pụrụ iche
Ihe osise ya na ihe osise ya nwere ọdịdị, agba, na ihe osisa siri ike
Hobbs lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Frazier na-akọ na ọ na-ese ihe na eserese site na nwata, ma na-eto nne nne ya Ruby maka ịtọ nnukwu atụmanya maka ihe ọ rụzuru

Mgbe ọ banyere na kọleji mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Frazier gụrụ foto n'okpuru Kathe Kowalski, onye ghọrọ onye nduzi dị mkpa, na-ewebata ya na echiche ụmụ nwanyị, semiotics na ojiji ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke ọma na nke ọjọọ, nke foto

Frazier gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2004 na nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Photography na Graphic Design na Mahadum Edinboro nke Pennsylvania, n'afọ 2007 natara Masters of Fine Art Photography na School of Visual Performing Arts na Mahadụ Syracuse
Mgbe o sonyere n'afọ 2010-11 Whitney Independent Study Program, ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum Yale

Kemgbe afọ 2009, a gụnyere ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi dị iche iche, gụnyere New Museum's The Generational Triennial Younger Than Jesus, MoMA PS1's 'Greater New York 2010, 2011 Incheon Women Artists' Biennale Terra Incognita, n'afọ 2012 Whitney Biennial
Ihe ngosi nka ya, A Haunted Capital, meghere na Brooklyn Museum n'afọ 2013
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'afọ 2009-2010 bụ ndị sonyere na mmemme obibi nke Lower Manhattan Cultural Council
N'afọ 2014, Frazier bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, The Notion of Family, nke natara International Center for Photography Infinity Award

Frazier bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere Art Matters (2010), Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation Award (2011), Theo Westenberger Award nke Creative Capital Foundation (2012), na Gwendolyn Knight & Jacob Lawrence Prize site na Seattle Art Museum (2013)
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Frazier Guggenheim Fellow na Creative Arts

N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ onye TED2015 Fellow na akwụkwọ edemede ya, The Notion of Family, nke Aperture bipụtara n'afọ 2014, nyere ya afọ 2015 Infinity Award for Best Publication site na International Center of Photography (ICP)
N'afọ 2015, e nyere Frazier MacArthur Fellowship, nke ọ zaghachiri na onyinye ahụ bụ 'ịkwado ọrụ m ịbụ ihe akaebe na ọgụ maka ikpe ziri ezi na mgbanwe ọdịbendị'
N'afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa Frazier dị ka otu n'ime ndị Sundance Institute's Art of Nonfiction Fellows
N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ Frazier onye natara Gordon Parks Foundation / Steidl Book Prize
N'afọ 2021, e nyere Frazier Honorary Fellowship nke Royal Photographic Society
Ọrụ foto nke LaToya Ruby Frazier gụnyere ihe oyiyi nke oghere onwe onye, oge nzuzo siri ike na akụkọ nke ikpe na-ezighị ezi agbụrụ na akụ na ụba na Amerịka
Ọrụ ya gụnyere foto ndị enyi na ndị ezinụlọ n'oge nzuzo na ihe atụ nke ikpe na-ezighị ezi

Dị ka Frazier na-akọwa, 'mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ezinụlọ m na onwe m na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'agbata foto onwe onye na ihe ngosi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ghara ịdị mma' Ọtụtụ mgbe ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na nsogbu nke obodo ya Braddock, Pennsylvania nke dara mbà n'ụzọ ego mgbe ọdịda nke ụlọ ọrụ ígwè n'afọ ndị 1970s
Site na foto ojii na nke ọcha, Frazier na-egosipụta ịma mma nke Braddock na otu obodo a si metụta ndụ ezinụlọ ya na ndị ọzọ bi na ya
Foto ya ka na-ese onyinyo nwere mmetụta siri ike na adịghị ike jikọtara ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi na nke onwe ya
E wezụga ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ ya a ma ama Notion of Family, Frazier arụwo ọrụ na nsogbu ndị ọzọ dị ka nsogbu mmiri Flint
Ọrụ a na-egosi ma na-elekwasị anya na nwa agbọghọ na ezinụlọ ya na-ebi ndụ ha kwa ụbọchị n'etiti ọnọdụ mmiri dị mkpa n'ime obodo Flint dị ala
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o nyere foto na ọrụ New York Times, 'Ihe mere America's Black Mothers and Babies nọ na Life-or-Death Crisis'

Primera División, nke a na-akpọkarị Primera División na Spain, yana La Liga na mba ndị na-asụ bekee yana n'ihu ọha dị ka LaLiga Santander maka ebumnuche nkwado, nke emere ka LaLiga, bụ ngalaba egwuregwu bọọlụ kacha elu nke ụmụ nwoke nke usoro egwuregwu bọọlụ Spanish

The Laboratoire des sciences du climat et de l'environnement (LSCE, Laboratory Sciences Climate na Environment) bụ ụlọ nyocha màkà ọmụmụ nkè ihu igwe na ọkachasị mgbanwe ihu igwe

Lacinato kale (UK /ˌlæsɪˈnɑːtoʊ, ˌlæ(t)ʃɪ-/, US /ˌ lɑːsɪ-/) ma ọ bụ, n'asụsụ Italian na mgbe ụfọdụ n'asụsụ Bekee, cavolo nero (/ˌkævəloʊ ˈnɛəroʊ, Ōkɑːv-/, Italian ; n'ụzọ nkịtị 'kọkọbọd ojii') bụ ụdị kale nwere ọdịnala dị ogologo na nri Italian, ọkachasị nke Tuscany
A makwaara ya dị ka Tuscan kale, Italian kale, dinosaur kale, kale, flat back kale, palm kale, ma ọ bụ black Tuscan palm
A na-akụ Lacinato kale na Tuscany kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ihe ọdịnala nke minestrone na ribollita

Lacinato kale na-eto 60 - 90 sentimita (2 ruo 3 ft) n'ogologo ma nwee akwụkwọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na 'ọdịdị dị nro'; a na-akọwa ụtọ ya dị ka 'nke dịtụ ụtọ ma dị nro' karịa curly kale na 'nke dị ntakịrị ilu [na] ala'
A na-akpọ ụdị lacinato mgbe ụfọdụ dinosaur kale n'ihi na akwụkwọ ya nwere ike ịdị ka akpụkpọ dinosaur dị ka ya, ma eleghị anya n'ihi ọdịdị pụrụ iche nke akwụkwọ ya na-echetara ihe ọkụkụ mbụ
N'ihi ụtọ ya, a na-akpọ ya 'onye hụrụ n'anya n'ụwa nri'
Lacinato kale, dị ka ọtụtụ ụdị kale ndị ọzọ, a na-ebu ụzọ na-acha ọcha, wee jiri ihe ndị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ mee ka ọ dị ụtọ; na nri Campanian, a na-agbakwunyekwa anchovies
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na pasta na ofe, mana enwere ike iri ya na salad
Na nri Tuscan, a na-ejikarị lacinato kale eme ihe na ribollita (n'ụzọ nkịtị 'e siri esi'), ofe siri ike, nke nwere obi nke e ji ihe ndị e siri esi maka nri n'ụbọchị gara aga
N'asụsụ Dutch, a na-akpọ ya (dị ka na German) palmkool ma ọ bụ palmkohl, na-arutu aka n'ọdịdị nkwụ yiri nkwụ na akwụkwọ ya na-etolite site na ogwe osisi, karịsịa mgbe a tụfuru akwụkwọ ala
Na Swedish na Finnish, a maara ya dị ka svartkål ma ọ bụ mustakaali, nke pụtara 'kọbish ojii'
Lacinato kale malitere na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na Ịtali
Ụdị a na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị na-elekọta ubi n'ihi ụcha ya na ọdịdị ya, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime osisi nke Thomas Jefferson dere n'ogige ya nke afọ 1777 na Monticello
Osisi ahụ na-eto ruo n'ogo nke ụkwụ abụọ, akwụkwọ ndị na-acha uhie uhie na-abụkarị ihe karịrị 30 cm (1 ft) n'ogologo na 5 - 10 cm (2 - 4 in) n'obosara
A na-ewepụta akwụkwọ ndị yiri eriri site na ala nke ogwe osisi ahụ, na-ahapụ ihe fọdụrụ na osisi ahụ ka ọ dị ka nkwụ
Lactivism (a portmanteau of 'lactation' and 'activism') bụ ozizi ma ọ bụ omume nke ịrụsi ọrụ ike ma ọ bụ itinye aka dị ka ụzọ isi nweta omenala inye nwa ara, mgbe ụfọdụ site na ngosi, mkpesa, etc
nke inye nwa ara
Ndị na-akwado ya, ndị a na-akpọ 'ndị na-eme ihe ike', na-achọ ime ngagharị iwe maka mmebi iwu mba ụwa nke ịzụ ahịa nke mmiri ara ehi site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ

Otu ákàrà nkè lactivism na-ewere bụ nhazi nke 'nurse-in' (egwuregwu na 'sit-in'), nke na-agụnye ụmụ nwanyị na-ezukọta n'ihu ọha iji nye ụmụ ha ara, na-emekarị mkpesa maka ihe omume nke a gwara nne na-enye nwa ara ka ọ kpuchie ma ọ bụ hapụ ebe n'ihi na ọ na-enye nwa ara
N'oge ndị nọọsụ, ndị nne na eyinye uwe nwere akara International Breastfeeding Symbol na ya, iji gosipụta ịdị n'otu ha
Ụdị ọzọ nke lactivism na-arụ ọrụ dị ka nkwado maka ndị nne chọrọ inye nwa ara
Ndị ọrụ na-enye ozi ma na-ekerịta ihe gbasara nọọsụ na-aga nke ọma
Ọtụtụ ndị lactivists na-ahọrọ inye ụmụ ha ara karịa inye nri karama, na-ahụ nke a dị ka ụzọ okike iji nye nri
A na-ekwu na inye nwa ara na-enye ahụmịhe njikọ dị elu karịa nke inye karama nri
Ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ ike ịrụ ụka na inye karama dị ọnụ karịa inye nwa ara n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ọtụtụ ihe, a pụkwara itinye ego a zọpụtara site na inye nwa ara na ihe ndị ọzọ bara uru maka nwa ahụ
Ọtụtụ òtù ahụike na-atụ aro mmiri ara dị ka isi iyi nke nri maka ụmụ ọhụrụ, gụnyere American Academy of Pediatrics, American Medical Association, na World Health Organization
Ladi'Sasha Jones bụ ónyé édémédé na ónyé nlekọta si Harlem
Ugbu a, ọ bụ Sophie Davis Curatorial Fellow for Gender and Racial Parity na Norton Museum of Art
'Ọ nwèrè nhọpụta ndị gara aga na New Museum IdesCity na NYPLIS Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture'
'Ọ na-abịaru ọrụ akwụkwọ ya nso site n'ịrụ ọrụ site na njikọ nke ọdịbendị, nka na ọrụ otu
' O nwere BA
na African American Studies na Temple University na MA
in Arts Politics site na NYU Tisch School of Arts

O nyela onwé ya na ọrụ ahụ na ọrụ ya
Tinyere Laundromat Project, Jones bụ onye guzobere I, Too, Arts Collective, nke bụ otu ndị mmadụ nke ebumnuche ha bụ ịmepụta ébé obibi na ndabere nke ónyé America na-ede uri James Mercer Langston
Ladi Kwali, OON, MBE (c1925– 12 August 1984) bụ onye Naijiria na-akpụite, onye na-ahụ maka ụrọ na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ Ladi Kwali n'obodo Kwali dị na mpaghara Gwari nke Northern Nigeria, ebe ịkpụ ite bụ ọrụ ụmụ amaala n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ mụtara ịkpụ ite mgbe ọ bụ nwata site n'aka nwanne nne ya site n'iji usoro ọdịnala nke ịkwanye
O mere nnukwu ite maka iji mee ihe dị ka ite mmiri, ite eji esi nri, na efere site na ụrọ, nke a na-eti site n'ime ya na osisi dị larịị
A na-eji ụkpụrụ ihe atụ geometric na ụdị ihe atụ chọọ ha mma, gụnyere akpị, ngwere, agụ iyi, chameleons, agwọ, nnụnụ, na azụ
A maara ite ya maka ịma mma nke ọdịdị na ịchọ mma ha, a makwaara ya na mpaghara ya dị ka ọkpụite nwere onyinye na onye a ma ama
Emir nke Abuja, Alhaji Suleiman Barau, nwetara ọtụtụ n'ụlọ ya Michael Cardew hụrụ ha n'afọ 1950
A mụrụ ya na obere obodo Kwali, nke dị ugbu a Kwali Area Council of the Federal Capital Territory, na 1925 (Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme ndị ọzọ na-egosi ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya bụ n'ezie 1920)
O tolitere n'ime ezinụlọ nke na-agbaso ọdịnala nke ụmụ nwanyị ikpu ite
Mallam Mekaniki Kyebese, nwanne Ladi Kwali nke nta, kwuru; 'Ọbụna n'afọ ndị mbụ nke ime ite, Ladi Kwali mara n'ọrụ aka ahu nke ọma ma a na-erekarị ngwa ahịa ya ọbụna tupu e buru ha gaa ahịa
N'ime afọ ọkachamara mbụ ya, ọnọdụ ọdịbendị ọdịnala kpaliri ya imepụta ite ite nke ọdịnala Gbagyi nke metụtara ma mee ka ọ pụta ìhè na okwu onwe onye
Ụzọ o si ele ụrọ anya na-ekwughachi site na ụda mgbakọ na mwepụ, nke a na-eme ka ọ pụta ìhè site na ngosipụta na-aga n'ihu nke symmetry

Michael Cardew, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ite na Ngalaba Azụmahịa na Ụlọ ọrụ na Gọọmentị Naịjirịa na 1951, guzobere Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọzụzụ Ụrọ na Suleja (nke a na-akpọ 'Abuja') n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1952
N'afọ 1954, Ladi Kwali sonyeere Abuja Pottery dị ka nwanyị mbụ ọkpụite ya
N'ebe ahụ, ọ mụtara ịtụ wiil, ịcha, ịgba ọkụ, mmepụta nke saggars, na iji slip, n'ikpeazụ o mechara bụrụ onye nkuzi
O mere efere na ihe ịchọ mma sgraffito, nke gụnyere imikpu arịa na-acha uhie uhie ma ọ bụ na-acha ọcha wee kpoo ihe ịchọ mma ahụ site na akwa ahụ gaa n'okpuru ahụ, na-eji akwa porcupine
Ka ọ na-erule oge Cardew hapụrụ ọrụ ya na 1965, Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ adọtawo ụmụ nwanyị anọ ọzọ si Gwari Halima Audu, Lami Toto, Assibi Iddo, na Kande Ushafa
Ụmụ nwanyị ndị a rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ, nke ha kpọrọ Dakin Gwari (ọnụ ụlọ Gwari), iji aka rụọ nnukwu ite mmiri
Ha ga-eji okpokoro ụgbụ, mkpụrụ siri ike ma ọ bụ okpokoro calabash kpụọ ma kpochapu ihe dị n'ime ite ndị ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, ha gbanwere atụmatụ ọdịnala ha, site n'itinye ha na kaolin ọcha na feldspar slip, nke ga-adọrọ mmasị n'ime ihe ịchọ mma ndị dara mbà n'obi

Mgbe a gbasịrị ite ndị a na-egbuke egbuke celadon glaze, ebe ndị nwere slip ga-apụta na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ n'ụzọ dị iche na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ gbara ọchịchịrị ma ọ bụ ígwè na-acha uhie uhie nke arịa ndị ahụ
N'ihi na a na-egbukepụ ite ndị e ji aka rụọ, ndị a na-achọ mma nke ọma ma na-agba ha ọkụ na ọkụ dị elu, ha na-anọchite anya ngwakọta na-adọrọ mmasị nke Gwari ọdịnala na ite studio nke ọdịda anyanwụ
A na-etinye ite Ladi Kwali dị mkpa n'ime ụrọ nkume, jiri ụkpụrụ ngwere chọọ ya mma ma jiri ọchịchịrị na-egbuke egbuke gbaa ya
Maka ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri na ndị na-anakọta ihe n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, ọchịchịrị ahụ bụ ihe atụ maka ite 'Africanness'

Ọ ga-eme ka ụkpụrụ dị n'elu ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ site n'ịgbagharị obere roulettes nke eriri gbagọrọ agbagọ ma ọ bụ osisi a pịrị apị n'elu ụrọ ahụ, mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka eriri kwụ ọtọ na mgbe ụfọdụ na panel kwụ ọtọ
The osisi roulettes mejupụtara obere cylinders nke osisi siri ike, abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ sentimita ogologo na a ọkara sentimita n'obosara, notched na kwụ ọtọ, oblique, ma ọ bụ yiri ụkpụrụ
A na-edepụta arịa ụrọ na usoro ịchọ mma na oge neolithic
N'ịgbaso usoro ọdịnala mpaghara ahụ, a gbara ha ọkụ n'ọkụ nke ahịhịa akọrọ
Site na ọdịnala ọdịbendị ya, ebe ụmụ nwanyị bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ite, ụrọ Ladi Kwali ghọrọ 'ihe nka'
E gosipụtara ite Ladi Kwali na ngosi mba ụwa nke ite Abuja na 1958, 1959, na 1962, nke Cardew haziri
Na 1961, Kwali mere ihe ngosi na Royal College, Farnham, na Wenford Bridge na Great Britain
O mekwara ngagharị iwe na France na Germany n'oge a
N'afọ 1972, ya na Cardew gara Amerịka
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na London na Berkeley Galleries
A gbanwere aha Abuja Pottery ka ọ bụrụ Ladi Kwali Pottery na mmalite afọ 1980
N'afọ 1954, e gosipụtara ite Kwali na ngosi mba ụwa nke ite Abuja nke Michael Cardew haziri
E nyere Kwali MBE (Member of the Order of the British Empire) na 1963
N'afọ 1977, e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta doctoral na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria
N'afọ 1980, Gọọmentị Naịjirịa (site na Cabinet Office nke Federal Republic of Nigeria) nyere ya akara nke Nigerian National Order of Merit Award (NNOM), nsọpụrụ mba kachasị elu maka agụmakwụkwọ
O nwetakwara nsọpụrụ mba nke Officer of the Order of the Niger (OON) n'afọ 1981
Foto ya pụtara n'azụ naira ịrị abụọ nke Naịjiria
A na-akpọ nnukwu okporo ámá dị na Abuja Ladi Kwali Road
Sheraton Hotel nwere Ladi Kwali Convention Center, nke bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nzukọ kachasị ukwuu na Abuja, nke nwere ụlọ nzukọ iri na ụlọ ịgba bọọlụ anọ
A na-anakọta ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa, dị ka Smithsonian National Museum of African Art, USA, Victoria and Albert Museum, na Aberystwyth University Ceramics Gallery, UK
Ihe ngosi nke 2022 na Two Temple Place Body Vessel Clay, Black Women, Ceramics & Contemporary Art gụnyere Kwali dị ka mmalite maka ịde afọ iri asaa nke ụrọ site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-ese ihe

Ladies of the Lights Michigan Women in the US
Lighthouse Service bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke Patricia Majher nke na'enye nkọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị jere ozi dị ka ndị na -elekọta ụlọ ọkụ Michigan ruo afọ 105

Dị ka osote onye nduzi / onye nlekọta ọhụrụ na Michigan Women's Historical Center na Hall of Fame na 2007, Patricia Majher wuru ihe ngosi njem dabere na edemede 2003 nke bụ South Mystery na Sand Point Lighthouse nke ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ Kathy Mason dere
Ịnụ ọkụ n'obi nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere na Michigan kpaliri Majher ịchịkọta nchọpụta ya n'akwụkwọ, nke Mahadum Michigan Press wepụtara na 2010
E nwere isi ihe ndabere banyere ndị inyom mbụ na-elekọta ụlọ ọkụ, ndị nọn Irish nke St

Anne's convent na County Cork bụ ndị na'elekọta ọkụ ọkụ Youghal n'ime afọ 1190-1542, na nwanyị America mbụ bụ onye na na -elekọta ìhè ọkụ na 1775 na Boston Harbor mgbe Hannah Thomas weere ọrụ di ya na bụ onyeisi ọkụ ka ọ na Akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekpuchi ndụ na ọrụ ndị na -elekọta ìhè nke ụmụ nwanyị Michigan n'otu n'otu ndị jere ozi nʼọkwa ha nafọ 1849-1954

N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ụgwọ ọrụ, ọrụ na ihe isi ike ndị bịara na post ahụ, ma nye ụmụ nwanyị ndị nọ n'ọkwá ahụ n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro, yana ụmụnwaanyị ndị jere ozi na-abụghị nke iwu mgbe di ha na'okpuru enweghị ike
Onye edemede ahụ na-enye nghọta banyere ndụ ezinụlọ maka ndị na'ụlọ ọkụ

Cathy Green maka Michigan Historical Review kwuru akwụkwọ ahụ, 'na-ewepụ ọhụụ ịhụnanya nke ndụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ọkụ, ebe ọ na-echekwa ọ bụghị naanị àgwà prosaic nke ọrụ ahụ kamakwa ọdịdị pụrụ iche nke ọrụ a' Green kwadoro akwụkwọ ahụ maka mmasị ndị na-ege ya ntị karịrị ndị aficionados ọkụ, wee chọpụta nyocha nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke onye ode akwụkwọ na-ewebata isiokwu a
Yak's Corner, akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka n'ịntanetị kee Detroit Free Press na akụkọ Detroit, gosipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ maka mkpuchi 2011 Women'n'Sakịrị
Mlive, aka ịntanetị nke Booth Newspapers, gosipụtakwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke mkpuchi ya nke Michigan's 2011 Coast Guard Festival
Mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ, Majher bụ ọkà okwu maka usoro Bay County Historical Society na ụlọ ọkụ
Ahịa Ladipo nke a makwaara dị ka Ahịa Lidipo Auto Spare Parts bụ ahịa dị na mpaghara Gọọmentị Mushin nke Lagos Steeti
N'oge na-adịghi anya, Ahịa Ladipo bu ebe a na-eme mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nnọkọ mmata ọha na eze n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nọ n'ahịa ahụ
Ahịa ahụ dị na Ladipo Street, Papa Ajao, Mushin, Lagos
Aha ahụ sitere na ebe ọ dị, Ladipo Street
Ahịa Ladipo dị gburugburu Akinwunmi Lane, na Ladipo Street, Papa Ajao, Mushin, Lagos
Ọ bụ site n'ógbè a (Ladipo Street) ka ọ na-enye aha ya ugbu a na-eto eto na gburugburu ụgbọ ala
Ọ na-emeghe kpamkpam mgbe ị na-abịa site na mpaghara dị iche iche na Lagos ma ọ bụ mmegide dị iche iche n'èzí Lagos
Ọ bụ ahịa kachasị ukwuu maka ịzụta akụkụ ụgbọ ala n'Africa dum
Ọ bụ ebe dị mma maka tokunbo (nke a na-amaghị ama) na akụkụ ụgbọ ala ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa, ọtụtụ ndị ahịa na-ebute ahịa ndị a dị ugbu a site na Ghana, Ivory Coast, na mba dị iche iche n'Africa
N'ihi enweghị ezigbo okporo ụzọ na oghere gburugburu ahịa ahụ, Gọmentị Lagos Steeti na 30 June, na afọ 2015 bibiri akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ahịa ahụ nke dugara n'usoro nsogbu n'ime ahịa ahụ
Ladipo Eso nke a maara dịka Ladipoe ma ọ bụ Poe bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa
Na 28 Febụwarị 2017, Ladipoe bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Mavin Records
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na egwu 'Feel Alright' ebe SDC 'Show Dem Camp' gosipụtara ya
O weputara egwu ọhụrụ 'Jaiye' na Machị 2019 tupu ọ hapụ egwu a, 'Know You' nke onye na-agụ egwu Joromi nke Naijiria, Simi
Ọ bụkwa onye otu nnukwu ìgwè Naịjirịa bụ Collectiv3
A mụrụ Ladipoe ma zụlite ya na Lagos
Ọ gara Mahadum nke North Carolina na Pembroke na-amụ ma Biology & Chemistry
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ banyere n'egwú ma soro ndị enyi ya Jeffrey na Kurt guzobe otu Lyrically Equipped Don Jazzy bịanyere aka na Mavin Records n'afọ 2017
Poe bụ onye rapa mbụ bịanyere aka na Mavin Records ebe ọ bụ na ọ gbanwere aha na 2012 site na Mo'Hits
Poe dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya n'okpuru akara 'Man Already' nke Altims mepụtara
Poe sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Slum Village, Lupe na Little Brother
Egwu ya nke afọ 2021, 'Feeling' nke gosipụtara Buju ruru n'ọkwa nke mbụ n'ime chaatị TurnTable Top 50 ugboro atọ
O mere 'Feeling' na mmeghe ngosi nke oge nke isii nke Big Brother Naija
Egwu a, “Feeling’ ghọrọ egwu, ọ kụrụ ọbụna klọb na South Africa ma ka bụ abụ Afrịka kachasị amasị ndị mmadụ na ịntanetị ugbu a

Mgbe a jụrụ ya n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021, otú o si zụlite ọrụ egwu ya na gburugburu ebe obibi egwu rap enweghị ekele, Ladipoe gwara The Guardian Nigeria, na a gwara ya mgbe ọ malitere njem egwu ya na rapping enweghị isi na Nigeria nke ahụ bụ mgbe ọ wepụtara 'Feeling,' egwu o gosipụtara Buju
onye na-agụ egwu ahụ anọgidewo na-atụgharị uche na mgba ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, ọbụlagodi ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ekwu na ihe ịga nke ọma ya sitere n'ekpere Chineke

Okwu lady bụ okwu maka nwa agbọghọ ma ọ bụ nwanyị, nke nwere nkọwa dị iche iche

Na otu oge a na-eji akọwa naanị ụmụ nwanyị nọ na okwá dị elu ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ, nke ya na onye nwe ya hà nhata, ugbu a ọ nwere ike izo aka na nwanyị ọ bụla toro eto, dịka a pụrụ iji nwoke mee ihe maka ụmụ nwoke
Ojiji a na-ejikarị eme ihe bụ mgbe ụfọdụ euphemistic ('nwaanyị nke abalị' maka nwanyị akwụna) ma ọ bụ, na asụsụ American, condescending na adreesị kpọmkwem (nke ya na 'mister' ma ọ bụ 'nwoke')
'Lady' bụkwa aha a na-akpọ na United Kingdom

A na-eji 'Lady' eme ihe na ihu aha ezinụlọ nke nwanyị nwere utu aha nke nobility ma ọ bụ utu aha nsọpụrụ suo jure (na onwe ya), ma ọ bụ nwunye nke onye nwe ala, baronet, Scottish feudal baron, laird, ma ọ bụ knight, yana na ihu Aha mbụ nke nwa nwanyị nke duke, marquess, ma ọ dị ka earl
Okwu a sitere na Old English; akụkụ mbụ nke okwu ahụ bụ ụdị gbanwere nke hlāf, 'achịcha, achịcha', nke a na-ahụkwa na hlāford, 'Onyenwe anyị'

A na-ewere akụkụ nke abụọ ka ọ sitere na mgbọrọgwụ dig-, 'to knead', nke a na-ahụkwa na ntụ ọka; mmepe mmetụta site na onye na-egbu egwe, ma ọ bụ onye na-eme achịcha, ma ọ bụrụ onye na-akpụzi achịcha, ruo na ihe nkịtị, ọ bụ ezi ya na ọ bụghị na uzọ doro anya na a ga-achọpụta ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme, nwere ike iji nke 'Onyenwe anyị' gosipụta ya

Lady Bird Strickland (nke a na-akpọkwa Lady Bird Cleveland ma ọ bụ Ladybird Cleveland) (July 24, 1926 na June 2, 2015) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise nke ihe nketa Africa, Cherokee na Irish, onye ọrụ ya na-egosi ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America, na-elekwasị anya n'akụkụ ndụ site na ịgba ohu na mmegharị ikike ọbọdọ na ntụrụndụ na ọdịbendị nke President Barack Obama
Ọ bụ nne nke ónyé na-ese ejiji Pat Cleveland
A mụrụ Strickland na ịda ogbenye na Cornelia, Georgia, nne ojii na nna Irish-Scottish na ónyé ojii
Nné ya na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ site n'ụlọ ha a na-akpọ Sally's Tea Room, nke ghọrọ ebe a ma ama n'ógbè ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ezinụlọ ya ka dara ogbenye
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii
Ọ malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ dị obérè, na-eji akwụkwọ nwéré eriri site na mbadamba n'ihi na o nweghị akwụkwọ nka
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ Africa America nọ n'akụkụ Georgia nke kewara ekewa nke ukwuu, a naghị agba ya ume ikwupụta onwe ya
Ndị nkụzi ya baara ya mba mgbe e jidere ya ka ọ na-ese ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eji osisi hickory na-eti ya ihe
Mgbè ọ nọ na Harlem, Strickland sooro onye na-egwu saxophon Johnny Johnston nwee mmekọahụ, nke mere ka a mụọ nwá ya nwanyị Pat Cleveland na 1950
Ọ zụlitere nwa ya nwanyị dị ka nne naanị ya na Harlem
N'ime afọ 1960, Strickland tinyere aka na ọrụ nwa ya nwanyị, ọrụ ime ihe ngosi
Strickland rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-eyi uwe nwa ya nwanyị, n'ihi na n'oge ahụ Cleveland erubeghị afọ
Ha abụọ ga-eme njem n'etiti ọrụ ihe ngosi Cleveland na bọs Greyhound ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa n'otu oge
Lady Capulet (onye a mụrụ n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1974) bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ nke a zụlitere n'America, nke a zụrụ na Ireland
Ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya dị mkpirikpi gụnyere naanị agbụrụ atọ na May na June n'afọ 1977
Ọ turu ugo na Irish 1000 Guineas na nke mbụ ya tupu ọ bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Coronation Stakes na nke atọ na Pretty Polly Stakes
Ọ lara ezumike nká site na ịgba ọsọ iji ghọọ broodmare ma nwee mmetụta dị ukwuu dị ka mmiri nke onye isi ịnyịnya El Prado
Lady Capulet bụ 'ogologo, ezigbo ahụ, mara mma' na-acha ntụ ntụ (nke a kọwara na mbụ dị ka 'roan'), nke Claiborne Farm zụlitere na Kentucky
Dị ka nwa otu afọ, a na-enye ya maka ire ere na Keeneland ma ndị nnọchi anya onye nwe Britain bụ Robert Sangster zụrụ ya maka $ 70,000
E zigara ya ka ọ gbaa ọsọ na Europe ebe Vincent O'Brien zụrụ ya na Ireland na Ballydoyle
Nna ya, Sir Ivor bụ nwa ehi a zụlitere n'America nke a zụrụ na Europe wee merie Derby na Washington D C International na 1968 tupu o guzo dị ka nwa ehi na Kentucky
Ndị ọzọ Sir Ivor meriri gụnyere Ivanjica, Cloonlara na Bates Motel
Lady Capulet's dam Cap and Bells bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ na-aga nke ọma
Ụmụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Drone, ịnyịnya na-enweghị mmeri na ịnyịnya na'ịzụlite nke ọma, na Sir Wimborne, onye mmeri nke National Stakes na Royal Lodge Stakes
Ọ sitere na agburu Mistrella (onye a mụrụ na 1907) nke nwere mmetụta na Britain, nke ụmụ ya gụnyere ndị mmeri Oaks Beam na Light Brocade
Enweghị ntozu oke nke pụtara ife, tinyere mmetụta nke nje virus, pụtara na Lady Capulet agbaghị ọsọ dị ka nwa afọ abụọ

Ọnọdụ ala na-adịghị mma gbochiri ọzụzụ ya n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 1977 ma ọ bụghị ruo na 13 Mee ka o mere ka ọ pụta n'egwuregwu mbụ ya na Irish 1000 Guineas karịa otu kilomita na Curragh Racecourse
Site na onye na-agba ịnyịnya nke mbụ Lester Piggott na-ahọrọ ịgba onye mmeri Princess Elizabeth Stakes Lady Mere, Tommy Murphy sonyeere ya
Onye mmeri Athasi Stakes bụ Orchestration malitere ọkacha mmasị n'ihu Bold Fantasy, Lady Mere na Lady North na Lady Capulet na-amalite 16/1 outsider na mpaghara iri na anọ
Mgbe e gbochiri ya na mbido, Lady Capulet gara n'ihu n'èzí otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke kilomita site na njedebe iji soro Bold Fantasy na Nanticious nwee esemokwu tupu ọ pụọ na ndị na-asọmpi ya
O meriri site na ogologo atọ na isi site na Bold Fantasy na Lay Mere na Nanticious (mgbe e mesịrị merie Ribblesdale Stakes) na-ewere ọnọdụ nke anọ
N'ọnwa Juun, e zigara nwa agbọghọ ahụ n'England ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkacha mmasị maka Coronation Stakes nke Piggott nọ n'elu ya
Otú ọ dị, n'oge a, enweghị ahụmịhe ya yiri ka ọ na-egosi ka Orchestration kụrụ ya isi na nke abụọ
Piggott nọkwa n'elu ịnyịnya n'ikpeazụ n'ọnwa ahụ mgbe Lady Capulet malitere ihe kachasị amasị maka Pretty Polly Stakes karịa iri furlongs na Curragh
O nweghị ike imepụta ụdị ya kachasị mma ma mechaa nke atọ, ogologo ise n'azụ onye mmeri Claire's Slipper, na-egosi na ọ baghị uru site na anya na ala dị mma
E mechara chọpụta na ọ na-arịa 'ọrịa ọbara na adirọ mma'
N'afọ 1977, ụlọ ọrụ Timeform nwere onwe ya nyere Lady Capulet ọkwa nke 116, pound iri na asaa n'azụ nwa agbọghọ ha dị afọ atọ Dunfermline
Na Irish Free Handicap maka ụmụaka dị afọ atọ, a guyere ya dị ka onye nke abụọ kachasị mma, otu pound n'azụ Orchestration
Lady Capulet agbaghị ọsọ ọzọ mgbe e merisịrị ya na Pretty Polly ma kwụsị ịgba ọsọ na ngwụcha afọ 1977 iji ghọọ broodmare
Ọ mụrụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ ehi iri na atọ na ndị mmeri anọ n'etiti 1980 na 1996

Rochelle Ryndia Ray (Camden, New Jersey) bụ ónyé America rapper, ónyé na-agụ egwu, ónyé na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Lady Crush A maara ya maka ịbụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị rapper kachasị nta edere na ndekọ vinyl na njedebe nke ógè hip-hop nke Old-school
E gosipụtara Lady Crush na akwụkwọ Clover Hope nke 2021 'The Motherlode 100+ Women Who Made Hip-Hop'
Lady Crush mèrè rap mbụ ya na 1984 mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi redio ọbọdọ niile, na-enweta onye ọbịa na egwu Tim Greene 'The Facts of Life' (Importe/12, SugarScoop Records)
Egwú ahụ mechara nweta nkwanye ùgwù mgbe ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí a ma ama COD, remixed egwu ahụ mepụtara 'The Dub of Life'
A tọhapụrụ 12' a na mbido afọ 1985
Lady Crush kpebiri, ka e mesịrị na 1985 ịmalite ọrụ ya n'onwe ya mgbe ọ hapụsịrị otu ahụ
'MC Perpetrators', a na-akpọ ya ugbu a dị ka ihe ndekọ rap zuru ụwa ọnụ, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe na nke bárá uru, a na-ere ya dị ka $ 610
N'afọ 2018, mgbè ihe karịrị afọ 30 gachara na Hip-Hop, Lady Crush laghachiri mgbe o toro na egwu abụọ Electro hop, Underground hip hop na Dirty rap 'F**k' na 'F**K (The Banga)
'Fifty Shades of F**k' EP sochiri n'oge na-adịghị ányá, na-agwakọta usoro egwu ya gara aga
Zainab Elizabeth Donli, onye a maara dị ka Lady Donli, bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa onye egwu ọzọ na R&B, hip hop bụrụkwa ọzọ na jazz na onye na-agu egwuAfrobeat ya na onye na-ede egwu
A mụrụ Lady Donli na Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ bụ ọdụdụ nwa n’ime ụmụaka isii
Na mbido ndụ ya dika nwata o biri na Abuja na Kaduna, ebe nna ya si
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ kwagara United Kingdom ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta onye Ọkaikpe na Mahadum, nke Surrey
Mmetụta egwu mbụ Donli nwere bụ na Evangelical Church of West Africa bụ ebe ewuzoro otu abụ otuto pụrụiche
Ọ nwekwara mmetụta site na egwu Brenda Fassie, Angelique Kidjo, Aṣa na Brenda Fassie, Angelique Kidjo, Aṣa na Erykah Badu tinyere ndị ọsụ ụzọ na-ewu ewu na egwu pop nke Naịjirịa
Donli so na akụkọ nke egwu amaara maka ịgwakọta ụda sitere n'ọtụtụ egwu dị iche iche, gụnyere Afrobeats, R&B, na soul
O weputara oru ya nke mbu, nke nwere abu egwu iri na abuo Love or War, n’afo 2014
Donli arụọla ọrụ, yana ndi egwu agbara ọhụụ dị ka Adekunle Gold, Nonso Amadi, Tomi Thomas, MI Abaga, Mr Eazi, SDC, Davido, Ayuu, Odunsi the engine, na Tay na ọtutu ndị ọzọ
Na 2018, Donli gbaziri ọtụtụ ọrụ
O jikọtara ọnụ, ya na onye egwu Naijiria bụ Boogey on 'Motion na 'Motion' na ọkaibe MC Terry Tha Rapman na 'Open Letter'
Ya na Mr Eazi rụkọkwara ọrụ na albọm ya ọzọ bu, 'Life is Eazi Vol2', tinyere akara ngosi MI Abaga' A Study on Self Worth Yxng Dxnzl albọm
Na 2019, Donli wepụtara albọm izizi ya, Enjoy Your Life
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta (Lady Gaga) bụ nwanyị n'agụ egwu nke Amerikạ
A mụrụ ya n'abali iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa atọ, afọ1986 na New York City, nọ na New York ime ọbọdọ Amerikạ
Marion Caher Donoghue, Lady Chesham (1903 ruo afọ 1973), bụ onye ama ama na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania n'oge 1950s na 1960s tupu ọ laa ezumike nká n'afọ 1972
A mụrụ Marion Donoghue na Philadelphia
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Daniel Charles Donoghue
Lady Marion Chesham lụrụ di ugboro atọ
Alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya bụ Brook Edwards, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Mary
Mgbe ya na Edwards gbara alụkwaghịm, Marion lụrụ Theobald Walter Somerset Henry Butler, 8th Earl of Carrick wee ghọọ Countess of Carrick
Njikọ a mechakwara na ịgba alụkwaghịm
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 1938, ọ lụrụ John Compton Cavendish, 4th Baron Chesham
Site n'oge a gaa n'ihu, aha ya bụ Lady Chesham
Lady Marion Chesham served with the Auxiliary Territorial Service and the American Red Cross during the Second World War

Following the death of Lord Chesham in 1952, she became a prominent spokesperson for the Capricorn Africa Society - a pressure group based in the British colonies in southern and eastern Africa, which included members from a range of cultural backgrounds
She was a member of the Tanganyika Legislative Council between 1958 and 1962
She then went on to become a member of the Tanzanian National Assembly until the union of Tanganyika with Zanzibar in 1964
Adriana Rimpel, ónyé a maara dịka Lady Midnight, bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-agụ egwú, onye na'ede egwu, ónyé nkụzi na ónyé isi ọbọdọ nke dị na Minneapolis, Minnesota
A mụrụ Rimpel na St
Paul's West Side na Minnesota
Nna ya bụ ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ na nné ya bụ ónyé ọbụ abụ na otu salsa mbụ nke Minnesota, Sabroson
Ọ bụ ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na Donat Believe the Hype, mmemme telivishọn na Twin Cities 'PBS nke ndị ntorobịa POC mepụtara nke nyéré ndị na-eto eto ike ịmepụta ihe
O nwere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Photography site na Minneapolis College of Art and Design ma mụọ Studio Dance ihe karịrị afọ 12
Rimpel bụ asụsụ abụọ ma bụrụ ónyé Afro-Indigenous, Mexican, Haitian, na Aztec
Rimpel nwèrè nzụlite na egwu Afro-Cuban, hip-hop, pop, R&B, na egwu nnwale
Ọ malitere ime egwu dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú na otu Afro-Cubana nke Minneapolis bụ Malamanya n'afọ 2000
Ọ nọrọ na Malamanya ruo afọ anọ ma soro ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka akụkụ nke The Lowertown Line, ndekọ na ajụjụ ọnụ nke TPT Twin Cities PBS
Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu VANDAAM nke ọbọdọ abụọ ahụ
N'afọ 2016, ya na Afrokeys wepụtara egwu ise nke EP n'okpuru aha Parables of Neptune nke gụnyere egwu 'Wax Line'
A kpọrọ Rimpel otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkírí The Local Show to Watch na 2016
A kpọrọ ya Best Twin Cities Vocalist nke 2017 site na City Pages, na # 3 Họrọ ka ọ pịa na 2017 site na Town Pages
Abọm ya, Death Before Mourning, meriri Best Album site na City Pages' Best of the Twin Cities 2020
Lady Skollie (Ónyé amụrụ Laura Windvogel na 1987) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na Cape Town, South Africa, bi na Johannesburg ugbu a
Mmụta nka Lady Skollie malitere mgbè ọ dị obere mgbè nne ya debanyere aha ya na Frank Joubert Art Centre, nke a na-akpọ Peter Clarke Art Centre ugbu a

Ọ gara n'ihu na-enweta BA nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na nka na Dutch Literature na Mahadum Cape Town na 2009 na asambodo na Business Acumen for Artists na Mahadim Cape Town Graduate School of Business na 2014
Skollie hapụrụ ngwa ngwa site na nka ọdịnala wee gaa n'ihu na-akwalite ọrụ ya site na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ọrụ Lady Skollie na-elekwasị anya n'echiche nke okike, ọchịchọ, mmekọahụ nà mmekọahụ, mmekọrịta chiri anya, nà nkwenye nà South Africa
Site na aha nzuzo ya na àgwà nka ya, Lady Skollie, ónyé na-ese ihe chọrọ ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ebe ọ na-ekwurịta ókwú ndị siri ike ikwụ ókwú kpọmkwem
Okwu 'Skollie' bụ okwu akụkọ ihe méré eme nke sitere na ndị Dutch na-achị South Africa
N'akụkọ ihe méré eme, ndị ọcha jiri okwu ahụ mata onye isi ojii ha weere dị ka ónyé a na-apụghị ịtụkwasị obi ma ọ bụ ónyé si n'obodo na-adịghị mma
N'afọ 2020, Lady Skollie so na usoro Netflix izizi nke South Africa 'Queen Sono'
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Safiya Sono, nne Queen Sono
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite nke iri nke FNB Art Prize, ihe nrite nka South African
2020 10th kwa afọ FNB Art Prize
2014 Skattie Celebrates Laura Windvogel, Association for Visual Arts Gallery, Cape Town, South Africa
2015 Vroeg Ryp, Vroeg Vrot nke Lady Skollie, Stevenson Gallery, Johannesburg, South Africa
2015 Jụọ maka ihe ị chọrọ site na Lady Skollie, WorldArt Gallery, Cape Town, South Africa

Yamikani Janet Banda; nke a maara dịka Lady Zamar, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu

A mụrụ ya n'abalị́ iri na iteghete nke afọ 1987 na South Africa ma zụlite ya na Thembisa Ọ na-etinyekarị ihe egwu ụlọ na abụ ya ma na-abụ abụ n'asụsụ Bekee nke na-amasị ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị N'afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na Idols South Africa
Lady Zamar na Junior Taurus zutere na 2011 wee malite njikọ
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, e wepụtara abọm mbụ ha bụ Cotton Candy
Albọm ahụ mepụtara egwu atọ gụnyere; 'Mamelodi', 'Run Away' na 'Pitori'
Na emume nke iri abụọ na abụọ nke South African Music Awards, a họpụtara Cotton Candy maka njikọ /otu nke afọ na Albọm egwu kacha mma
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe e wepụtara ya, ọ mara ọkwa na ọ na-achụso ọrụ n'onwe ya
E wepụtara albọm mbụ ya, King Zamar, na ọnwa Machị afọ 2017
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, albọm ahụ ruru ogo ọla edo, na June afọ 2019,o wetara platinum abụọ
N'afọ 2017, Lady Zamar meriri Song of the Year Award na DStv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards maka egwu ya bu 'Charlotte', nke Prince Kaybee mepụtara
Na 24th South African Music Awards ọ meriri ihe nrite maka Best Dance Album
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye isi na Vivo Nation Festival
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, n'ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe omume emebeere gbasara ụmụ nwanyị tinyekwara na nsonye ndị omenkà ibe ya Mafikizolo na Sho Madjozi
E wepụtara albọm nke abụọ ya bụ Monarch n'abalị́ iri abụọ nke ọnwa June afọ 2019
N'afọ 2019 n' emume nke anọ nke Mzansi Kwaito na House Music Awards , egwu ya bụ 'This is Love' meriri Best house single
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nwere nka n'egwu egwu, ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere awọd SAMA atọ, otu Independent Music Award
Laetitia Heloise Arries bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Tupu a họpụta ya na ndị omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl nke George Local Municipality
Arries bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Arries bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye kansụl PR nke George Local Municipality n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016
A họpụtara Arries ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba na ntuli aka e mere na 8 Mee na afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu
Arries bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu EFF abụọ sitere na George
Onye omeiwu EFF ọzọ bụ Natasha Ntlangwini
Arries jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation n'etiti 27 Juun, na afọ 2019 na 6 Mee, na afọ 2020
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Social Development
Laetitia Ky (a mụrụ n'afọ 1996 n'obodo Abidjan ) bụ onye na-ese ihe sitere na Ivory Coast, onye na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ site na ntutu isi ya
A mụrụ Ky na 1996
O toro na Abidjan; nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị obere
O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Business Administration site na Institut national polytechnique Félix Houphouët-Boigny dị na Yamoussoukro
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ ghọtara na ọ chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na nka na imewe
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ na imewe ejiji, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, a kpaliri ya ịgbanwe ntụziaka site n'ile foto echekwara nke ntutu isi ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Ọ malitere ịmepụta njikọta ọhụrụ ndị a nke ntutu isi na ihe ọkpụkpụ n'afọ 2016
Ụdị akara Ky bụ ịmepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ site na waya, eriri na ntutu isi ya (nke ejiri akwa mee ka ọ dị ogologo n'ime ntutu isi nkịtị ya)
Ọ na-akpọ ụdị a Ky Concept
Ụdị ejiji ndị a na-egosipụta ihe okike ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ọ bụla na-ewe ihe dị n'agbata nkeji iri abụọ na awa isii iji mepụta
Nchịkọta mbụ nke ihe osise ntutu isi ya gụnyere ịfụkọta eriri na ákwà mpempe akwụkwọ nke Africa; n'afọ 2017 ọ kwadoro ụlọ ọrụ 'Ky Braids' mbụ ya iji kụziere ndị ọzọ ụdị nka
Njikọ egwu sochiri ya na Di'Ja, onye o kpuchiri ntụtụ isi ya n'ákwà wax e biri ebi nke sitere na ntutu ụmụ nwanyị HimbaKy malitere akara ejiji ya n'afọ 2018
A na-akpọ ya Kystroy, ọ na-ezube ịbụ onye na-agụnye, na-eji asụsụ dị mma iji kọwaa nha uwe dịka ọmụmaatụ
Ka oge na-aga, ihe ọkpụkpụ Ky ghọrọ ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma na 2017 o jiri ikpo okwu ya na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta mee ka a mara
Akụkụ ahụ gosipụtara nwoke na-ebuli uwe elu nwanyị, nke a kpụrụ site na eriri ya

N'afọ 2017 kwa, o mepụtara otu ihe nke mepụtara uru ahụ buru ibu n'elu ogwe aka ya dị gịrịgịrị - nke a bụ iji mee ka a mara banyere mmegbu, ọkachasị mmebi ọ nwere ike ime n'oge ọ bụ nwata, nke Ky nwere
N'afọ 2019, Ky mepụtara ihe ọhụrụ nke gosipụtara akpa nwa na Fallopian tube ọ bụla 'na-atụgharị nnụnụ' na onye na-ekiri ya
Nke a bụ iji mee ngaghari iwe megide iwu mgbochi ịwepụ afọ ime nke USA
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ Ky dị ka onye nnọchi anya ntutu isi maka ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka

N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa iri abụọ kachasị elu maka On the Rise Côte d'Ivoire mmemme nke L XiaAssociation des Conseils en Lobbying et Affaires Publiques de Côte d' Côte d'Ivory (ACLAP-CI) na-eduzi
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa iri atọ na ise nwere mmetụta na Prix Jeunesse Francophone 3535 n'ụwa na-asụ French
N'afọ sochirinụ, magazin Paper họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime '100 People Taking Over 2019'
Na ngwụcha afọ ahụ, e nyere ya nkwekọrịta n'ihi asọmpi Elite Model nke mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta, na mmekorita ya na TikTok
Laetitia Moma Bassoko (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Cameroon na-egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke Cameroon
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka VBC Chamalières na afọ 2014 ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu mba Cameroon na afọ 2014 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship na Ịtali na afọ 2016 Olympic Games na Rio de Janeiro
Lafarge Africa Plc bụ onye na-emepụta simenti nke nwere isi na Lagos ma kwuo ya na Naịjirịa Stock Exchange
Ọ bụ Holcim Group na-achịkwa ya
N'oge gara aga, azụmaahịa n'okpuru aha Lafarge Wapco Plc, njikọta nke Lafarge na Holcim na njikọta nke akụ Lafarge dị na Naịjirịa na South Africa mere ka aha ahụ gbanwee Lafarge Afrika
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta simenti na Naijiria ma bụrụ nke abụọ n'ihe gbasara olu e mepụtara na afọ 2017
N'afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ngalaba ngwakọta dị njikere
N'afọ 2016, ikike ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere bụ nde tọn simenti 141, nde tọn metric 5 nke ngụkọta na nde tọn 35 nke simenti a gwakọtara
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta ma na-ekesa ngwaahịa site na ngalaba ya ndị metụtara ya gụnyere WAPCO, United Cement Company of Nigeria, Calabar, Ashaka Cement, Lafarge South Africa na Atlas Cement Company

Ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere Ashaka akara Portland limestone cement mepụtara na Gombe Steeti, Elephant na Superset cement mepụtara site na WAPCO, UniCem, Readymix Concrete, ụlọ aggregates, na Lafarge South African ngwaahịa dị ka artevia decorative concrete products, Buildcrete na DuraBuild cement, Dura-Pozz, Fast-Cast, Pozz-Fill, Powercrete Plus na SuperPozz

Ụlọ ọrụ West African Portland Cement malitere ọrụ na afọ 1961 na Ewekoro, e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1959 dị ka njikọ aka n'etiti Blue Circle, United Africa Company Naijiria na gọmentị mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na Nigeria
Blue Circle, nke a mara na mbụ dị ka Associated Portland Cement Manufacturers bụ onye na-eweta simenti kachasị na Naịjirịa

Mana ka ndị na-emepụta ihe n'ógbè ahụ ghara ịla ahịa karịsịa mgbe e nyere ụlọ ọrụ cement nke Naijiria ọrụ na Nkalagu, Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria, Blue Circle sonyere otu njikọ nke gụnyere gọọmentị Western Nigeria iji guzobe ite ọkụ ọhụrụ na Ewekoro
Njikọ ahụ nabatara usoro akọrọ nke isi obodo nke mmepụta simenti ma mepụta Elephant nke simenti Portland
N'afọ 1978, e meghere ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na Shagamu nke mechara mepụta otu nde tọn n'afọ 2003
Mgbe mmepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ ochie na Ewekoro malitere ịda, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wuru ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ma nabata usoro mmiri nke imepụta simenti, e nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ọrụ na afọ 2003 na ikike imepụta nde tọn 132
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, WAPCO aghọwo onye na-emepụta simenti kachasị na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2001, Lafarge nke France nwetara Blue Circle, gụnyere mmasị nke ikpeazụ na WAPCO
Afọ asaa ka e mesịrị, aha ahụ ghọrọ Lafarge Cement WAPCO plc
Lafarge mụbara mmepụta na WAPCO na afọ 2011 site na itinye ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ dị nde 22 na Lakatabu, Ogun State
Tinyere ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wuru ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik iji gbaa ọkụ ọkụ ọhụrụ
N'afọ 2014, Lafarge na Holcim jikọtara ma kpebie ijikọ ụfọdụ azụmahịa ha n'Afrika
A mara ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ Lafarge Africa na Juun, na afọ 2015, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jikọtara WAPCO nke akụ Naịjirịa na akụ South Africa nke Lafarge
N'afọ 2017, Lafarge jikọtara ihe ndị ọzọ na Naịjirịa mgbe Atlas Cement, Port Harcourt na UNICEM nke Calabar jikọtara ya na Lafarge Afrịka
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rere òkè ya na Lafarge South Africa na Caricement n'etiti afọ 2019
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị metụtara Lafarge Africa

Ọ bụ nnukwu obodo na nasarawa steeti
Lafia Emirate Council bụ steeti ọdịnala dị na Northern Nigeria nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ dị n'obodo Lafia, isi obodo steeti Nasarawa ọgbara ọhụrụ
N'ihu Emirate of lafia, e hibere kansụl na 1903 ka ndị Britain nwechara udo nke Alaeze Ukwu Kanem–Bornu

Isa Mustapha Agwai l ghọrọ eze ukwu na 1974, na-achị ruo afọ 45 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2019; ọ lekọtara mgbanwe nke Emirate n'okpuru iwu gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa nke na-edo ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'okpuru ndị isi ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Northern Nigeria

Emir nke lafia na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndú nke usoro Tijaniyyya sufi na North-cenral Nigeria, n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ọ bụ ọnọdụ nke atọ kachasị mkpa nke ndị Alakụba na Naijiria mgbe Emir nke Kano bụ onye ndú ya nke usoro Tiyaniyyah sufi na Naijeria
Lafia nke oge a ma e wezụga ịbụ ebe nchịkwa na agụmakwụkwọ, ọ bụkwa ebe nchịkọta maka mkpụrụ sesame, soybeans, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ahịa maka yam, sorghum, millet, na ogho
E wezụga ọrụ ugbo, ịkpa ogho na ite ágbá bụ ọrụ dị mkpa nke ndị bi n'obodo ahụ
Ịkpa anụ bụkwa ọrụ a ma ama karịsịa n'etiti ndị na-azụ atụrụ Fulani

Bisade Ologunde (na Lagos, 1960) bụ onye Naijiria na-eti egwu afrobeat, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Lágbájá maka ntinye aka ya nke ihe mkpuchi nke na-ekpuchi njirimara ya
O kwenyere na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na egwu
Ologunde nakweere aha Lágbájá (nke pụtara 'Jane Doe' ma ọ bụ 'John Doe' - Onye aha ya, njirimara ya na-ezobe na Yoruba) ka ọ malitere ọrụ ya na mmalite afọ 90
E gosipụtara aha ya na nhọrọ ya nke uwe ogbo - akwa akwa na ihe mkpuchi rọba nke a nakweere ka onye na-ese ihe na-anọchite anya 'nwoke nkịtị' n'ikwekọ na ọdịnala carnival nke ebo Yoruba ya
O guzobere obere egwu mbụ ya na 1991 na Lagos mgbe ọ kụziiri onwe ya ịkpọ saxophone

Site na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ngwá egwu gụnyere congas na ịgba na-ekwu okwu, abọm Lagbaja bụ We Before Me (IndigeDisc / PDSE), nke ewepụtara n'afọ 2000, chọrọ ịkwụwa aka ọtọ n'aka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma gbaa ume ka ha bụrụ òtù ụmụnna na ịdị n'otu

Site na ụda siri ike, nke yiri nke John Coltrane na Pharoah Sanders, ọ na-edepụta abụ nke abụ ndị ahụ, mgbe ụfọdụ na Ego scat-abụ abụ
