O nwere alaka akwụkwọ osisi sitere na mgbọrọgwụ dị n'okpuru ala (nkwunyere shrọb)

Akwụkwọ ya bụ nke nhazi ya n'edochaghị anya dị ka ihe nọ na ncherita ihu ihe dị ka mpe mpe abụọ ruo anọ nke akwụkwọ mpịakọta kwa pinnae; akwụkwọ mpịasụ ya di gburugburu na obosara na elu na-egbuke egbuke na coriaceous, ma nwee ogologo ihe dịka cm itoolu ruo iri abụọ na obosara obosara cm itoolu ruo irí abụọ
Okooko osisi dị obere, na-acha odo odo ma na-acha creme ma ọ bu site na mpia mpia ka osi emepụta ma ọ bụ mpia ọnụ n'akụkụ ala, na-apụtakarị n'ihu akwụkwọ
Mkpụrụ osisi bụ mkpụrụ osisi berri nke na-acha uhie uhie mgbe ọ chara
Ụdị a dị n'akụkụ Angola, a pụkwara ịchọta ya na mba ndị dị n'ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka dị ka mba Tanzania na mba Southern Africa

A na-eji mgbọrọgwụ ya eme ihe n'ọgwụ ọdịnala n'obodo dị iche iche; na Zambia, a na-eji ya agwọ nsogbu ndị metụtara schistosomiasis, gonorhea na afọ ọsịsa, na mpaghara ụfọdụ nke South Africa, a na'eji ya agwọ angina pectoris
Ndị obodo na-eri mkpụrụ osisi ma na-eri ya
Lanre Buraimoh bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke bi na Texas, US
A na-egosipụta 'ihe osise bead' ya na mba ụwa
Ọ natara ọzụzụ nka ya site n'aka nne na nna ya, Chief Jimoh Buraimoh na Alake Buraimoh, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-ese ihe n'oge ndị a maara nke ọma na Naịjirịa na mba ofesi
Ihe osise Lanre Buraimoh sitere na mkpali nke ndị Yoruba nke West Africa, bụ ndị na-etinyekarị bead n'ụdị nka ha na ịchọ okpueze, akpụkpọ ụkwụ na osisi ije nke ndị eze ha mma
Ihe ọhụrụ nke Buraimoh na-eme ka ọdịnala a kwekọọ n'ụdị nka nke oge a nke 'bead painting'

A na-eji ọtụtụ puku obere iko mara mma nke na-egosi ihe ndị Yoruba na ihe nnọchianya, gụnyere ịgba na ndị na-akụ egwu, ihe mkpuchi, ngwere, nkịta ọhịa na nnụnụ Shankofa - nnụnụ akụkọ ifo nke nwere akwa n'ọnụ ya nke a na-egosi na-efe n'ihu mgbe ọ na-ele anya azụ

Àkwá 'na-anọchite anya ihe ọmụma nke oge gara aga nke amamihe dabeere na ya ma na-egosipụtakwa ọdịnihu' Akụkụ Buraimoh na-egosipụtakwa nkwenkwe ọdịnala ndị Yoruba metụtara ịhụnanya, ntụrụndụ na ịdị n'otu
Lanre Towry-Coker FRIBA (a mụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nakwa onye na-elekọta mmadụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ọhaneze yana ngalaba nkeonwe ma bụrụ Kọmishọna mbụ maka ọrụ na ụlọ nke Lagos Steeti
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1944 nye onye injinia obodo Naijiria, onye bụ onye ndụmọdụ atụmatụ nke Prime Minista mbụ nke Malaysia, Tunku Abdul Rahman, na mmalite afọ 1960, Lanre Towry-Coker gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Matthias, Lagos, na Kingston College, Surrey, England, tupu ọ gaa na Architectural Association School of Architecture na Mahadum nke North-East London maka ọzụzụ ụkpụrụ ụlọ ya
O mechara nweta nzere ọzọ na Harvard University Graduate School of Business Administration (OPM)
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ụkpụrụ ụlọ ya, Towry-Coker Associates, na 1976
Onye obodo Lagos (Towry Street na Lagos Island bụ aha ezinụlọ ya) Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-eme atụmatụ ntọala nke isi obodo Abuja, ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya na nnukwu ụlọ na Nigeria
N'afọ 1999, Towry-Coker bụ Kọmishọna mbụ maka ọrụ na ụlọ na Lagos Steeti
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ Housing Policy And The Dynamics Of Housing Delivery In Nigeria Lagos State As Case Study, nke MakeWay Press bipụtara n'afọ 2012
Towry-Coker bụ onye otu nke Nigerian Institute of Architects (FNIA) na onye otu nke Chartered Institute of Arbitrators (ACI)Arb) na UK
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Royal Institute of British Architects, ọ bụ naanị onye Naijiria na otu n'ime ndị na-ewu ụlọ iri atọ ugbu a n'ụwa niile e nyere nsọpụrụ ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Bisi Towry-Coker mana ha ekewago ugbu a
O nwere ụmụ atọ gụnyere nwa nwoke, Olaotan
Towry Coker-Associates
Lanre da Silva (amụrụ 1978) bụ onye na- emepụta ejiji ejiji nke Naijiria dabere na Lagos
Ewepụtara ya n'afọ 2005, akara aha ya na-agụnye uwe mwụda, njikere iyi uwe, ọla na ntutu isi
Nchịkọta Da Silva na-ejikọtakarị akwa ọla, leesi na ụkpụrụ Africa, ebe ọ na-ekwu maka 1940s ma ọ bụ 1800s
Ntuziaka Ejiji Africa na-amata na ọ nwere '
kere onwe ya aha na ejiji dị elu na Nigeria'
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Nigeria, da Silva kwagara United Kingdom ịga n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya
Maka akara ugo mmụta mahadum ya, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Coventry
O nwetara nzere masta na ego na mahadum Leicester
Da Silva lụrụ di na nwunye ma nwee ụmụnne abụọ
Nna ha bụ Sir Leo Babarinde Da Silva, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ gọọmentị Lagos steeti
Na 2011, da Silva gosipụtara nchịkọta ya na New York Fashion Week A na ka akara okomoko nke Afrịka, erela ahịrị uwe ya na ụlọ ahịa 'Concept Spiga 2' Dolce & Gabbana na Milan
N'afọ 2012, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe abụọ jụrụ ka ha sonye na United Nations 'Fashion Development Project' nke na-enyere aka ịkwado ụlọ ọrụ okomoko nke kọntinent ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, e gosipụtara akara ya na magazin L'Uomo Vogue na mbipụta a na-akpọ 'Re-branding Africa'
Na 2012, Italian Vogue dere mpempe akwụkwọ na da Silva, na-ekwu na o nwere '

nnukwu ndị na-eso ụzọ n'Africa, ebe a na-amata atụmatụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ekele maka mgbasa ozi na ndị a ma ama na-akwado ya' Na 2014, a kpọtụrụ ya aha ọzọ na Vogue Italia, bụ ebe onye mmepụta ahụ kwuru banyere izute onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin Franca Sozzani, bụ onye nwetara nchịkọta ya ma chekwaa ya na onye na-ere ahịa ejiji online yooxcom E gosipụtakwala atụmatụ Da Silva na Vogue
Magazin Black and Bilie
A kọwago uwe Da Silva dị ka ihe na-akụda mmụọ n'iji mbipụta ọdịnala ndị Africa eme ihe
A maara ya maka ịtụgharịgharị na imezigharị ụkpụrụ ọdịnala, na-eme ka ha bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke atụmatụ ya
Na 2017, a gwara da Silva ka o mepụta uwe maka 2017 anya akwụkwọ nke Vlisco, onye na-emepụta akwa na akwa Africa
Na 2014, e gosipụtara nchịkọta 'Rock Delight' ya na ihe ngosi ejiji 'Vogue Talents' na Milan, Italy
Onye mmebe ahụ sitere na agba na ahịrị Olumo Rock, ebe ndị njem na-ewu ewu dị na Naijiria

A na-ahụkwa uwe ya na ihe ngosi dị ka 2008 Thisday Africa Rising Festival na London, 2009 Arise Africa Fashion Festival na South Africa, 2009 New York Couture Week na 2011 Arise Magazine Fashion Week na Lagos

N'afọ 2018, da Silva laghachiri na Ememme Ejiji Arise Afrika ebe a kọwara nchịkọta ya dị ka ihe mara mma na nke agba ọla edo nwere agba Supermodel Britain bụ Naomi Campbell meghere ihe nkiri ahụ nke yi otu uwe da Silva
N'ịmepụta ihe ọ kpọrọ ihe ana ehi n’aru art da Silva rụkọrọ ọrụ na onye na-ese ihe bụ Ayoola Gbolahan maka mkpokọta 2017 ya

Ọgaranya na nkọwa, a na-akọwa uwe ndị ahụ dị ka ihe osise nka 'A na-ejikọta nka na ejiji nke ọma na nchịkọta a na ihe oyiyi aka na-atụghị egwu na agba siri ike' N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite Eloy, bụ mmemme Naijiria na-eme mmemme ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2016, onye mmebe mara mma na mkpuchi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria Complete Fashion Magaziini
Mgbe ịmalite dị ka onye mmebe, da Silva chọpụtara na akụrụngwa Naijiria bụ ihe ịma aka
Ọ na-esiri ya ike ịchọta ndị na-akwa akwa na ezigbo zipa
Agbanyeghị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ etoola kemgbe ahụ, yana itinye ego na-esite na gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ
Lagos na-apụta ugbu a dị ka ebe ejiji na mpaghara Afrịka
Lansana Mansaray (a mụrụ n'afọ 1992), nke a na-akpọkarị Barmmy Boy, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Sierra Leone
Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na ihe nkiri Sierra Leone, a maara Mansaray nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ndị a na-eto nke ọma Youth, Charity na Survivors
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1992 na Freetown, Sierra Leone
Mansaray bụ onye guzobere na onye njikwa mmepụta nke WeOwnTV na Freetown Media Center

Ya na WeOwnTV, ọ rụkọtara ọrụ maka ọtụtụ òtù gụnyere Defence for Children International, NOVA Studios (UK), British Council Sierra Leone, UNICEF Sierra Leone, Save the Children Sierra Leone, Well Woman Clinic na Hull UK City of Culture 2017
N'afọ 2010, o duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Youth
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri Charity
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri n'afọ ndị na-abịanụ na ihe nkiri; Ha guzogidere (2011) na Disability is Inability

Ewezuga ha, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa dịka Decisions n'afọ 2011, Girl Rising n'afọ 2013, They Are We n'afọ 2014, na Meet the Africans Many Rivers to Cross n'afọ 2013, ebe nke ikpeazụ meriri Primetime Emmy Award
N'afọ 2014, ọ gara United Kingdom izute ụfọdụ ndị enyi, agbanyeghị, a manyere ya ịgbatị oge ọ nọrọ ọnwa ise n'ihi ntiwapụ Ebola na Sierra Leone
N'afọ 2018, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Survivors, nke dabeere na nsogbu Ebola
E mechara họpụta ya maka Emmy's Best Social Issue Documentary, ebe ọ ghọrọ ihe nkiri West Africa mbụ natara otuto ahụ
Laolu (Olaolu) Senbanjo, nke a makwaara dị ka 'Laolu NYC', bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria, onye na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu / onye na-ede egwu, na onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ
A mụrụ Senbanjo ma zụlite ya na Ilorin, Nigeria site na nne na nna bu ndi Yoruba
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu ebe nne ya bụ onye nọọsụ
O tolitere na-eme ihe nkiri na ukwe nke ụka ya
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, o nwere otu egwu a na-akpọ Light and Fire nke na-abụ agughari egwu etiri eti
Senbanjo gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara iwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Nigeria
N'agbanyeghị na ọ chọrọ ịkwụsị n'afọ nke abụọ, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na 2005

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ afọ ise, jiri afọ atọ ikpeazụ ya rụọ ọrụ na National Human Rights Commission dị ka onye isi ọka iwu na-elekwasị anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Senbanjo gara n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Northern Nigeria na-eleta ụlọ akwụkwọ na obodo nta ka ọ kụziere ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ihe mere ụmụaka ga-eji nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
'Amaara m na ọ bụrụ na m na-achụso ọrụ nka, m ga-ebi n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụfọdụ ndị nọ n'obodo m nwere ike ghara ịgwa m okwu ọzọ,' ka Senbanjo kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na 99U
N'agbanyeghị nke a, na 2010 Senbanjo kwụsịrị ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọka iwu wee malite Laolu Senbanjo Art Gallery na Abuja, Nigeria
Senbanjo kwagara Brooklyn, New York, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013 iji rụọ ọrụ nka ya
Senbanjo emepụtala ụdị nka ya, Afromysterics, nke pụtara ihe omimi nke usoro echiche Afrịka
Ọ na-agụnye isiokwu Afrịka na ọdịnala Afrịka
Ọ na-eji icheku ọkụ na ụkpụrụ dị iche iche mepụta atụmatụ nka dị mgbagwoju anya, nke nwere akụkọ bara ụba nke na-esite n'ihe nketa Yoruba ya ma gosipụta akara na ụkpụrụ Naijiria oge ochie
Senbanjo na-ekwu na mgbọrọgwụ ya na Naijiria bụ isi iyi maka mkpali ọhụ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na a kọwara ntụgharị anya ya dị ka ịkekọrịta 'mmekọrịta ya na Jean-Michel Basquiat na Keith Haring'
O nweela ọrụ site na, ma mepụta mmekọrịta ya na, ndị ama ama na ndị isi gụnyere Nike, abọm Beyonce Lemonade, Grammy Museum, na Smithsonian Institution
Ya na Danielle Brooks (onye na-egwu Tasha Jefferson na usoro Netflix a kpọrọ Orange Is the New Black)
Na June 2015, mantra ọhụrụ Senbanjo ghọrọ 'everything is my canvas' wee malite eserese na ihe niile site na akpụkpọ ụkwụ, na jaket, na ndị mmadụ
O kere Sacred Art of the Ori Ritual, nke ọ na-akọwa ma kọwaa na 11 Septemba 2017 TED talk
N'okwu TED ya, Senbanjo na-ekwu banyere ọrụ ya Dreamscape
Na mbipụta Laolu Senbanjo nke afọ 2018, a kpọrọ Dreamscape, ọ na-egosipụta obi nkoropụ ya na ikpe na-ezighị ezi n'ụwa
Na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ, ọ hụrụ ikpe na ụmụaka ndị chere ihu n'eziokwu siri ike nke ịmanye ịlụ di ma ọ bụ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ha na mahadum
Ihe osise ahụ bụ map uche,' na-amalite ebe ọtụtụ ndụ na-eme, site na nwanyị, iji jikọta njem nke ndụ na ihe niile na-abịa na ahụmịhe ahụ na akụkọ mmalite nke ịbụ onye amụrụ

Ụfọdụ n'ime isiokwu ndị a na-ebipụta gụnyere okpukpe, agha, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, teknụzụ, Egyptology, mmekọahụ, akụ na ụba, mkpofu gburugburu ebe obibi, mgbasa ozi, akụkọ ihe mere eme, egwu, anyaukwu na ọdịdị mmadụ
Dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime nka ya, atụmatụ obi ike na-ejikọta ihe ọ bụla dị na ọrụ ahụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ndị Yoruba ya
Ihe atụ ọzọ nke ụdị nka ya na mmetụta nna nna Yoruba nke a maara nke ọma na-egosi na Beyonce's Lemonade, ebe a na-egosi nka ahụ Senbanjo n'ime album ọhụụ
E gosipụtara Senbanjo na nka ya dị nsọ nke Ori Ritual na vidiyo egwu dị iche iche, gụnyere
A kpọrọ Senbanjo ka ya na ọtụtụ ụdị na-arụkọ ọrụ, gụnyere
Senbanjo bụ onye na-agu egwu ụwa nke na-esite na Fela Kuti, Sade (onye na-abụ abụ), Bob Marley, na King Sunny Adé
Ụdị egwu ya gbanyesiri mkpọrọgwụ ike na ọdịnala Afrobeat na High Life, agwakọtara ya na Afro-Soul na Reggae
Senbanjo na-agwakọta abụ n'asụsụ Yoruba ya ma na-asụgharịkarị abụ ndị Yoruba, ilu na oriki ya n'asụsụ Bekee
Laouali bụ aha nna naNaijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia

Lambo Sandjo Pierre Roger (ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1957 rụo ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2014), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Lapiro de Mbanga, bụ onye Cameroon na-agụ egwu nke ama ama maka ndekọ ya nke 'Pas argent no love' n'afọ 1985 nakwa maka ịtụ ya mkpọrọ na 2008 mgbe ọ katọrọ onye isi ala Cameroon bụ Paul Biya na egwu 'Constitution constipée' ('Constipated Constitution')
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọrụ egwu Lapiro kpọgara ya na mba ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka dị ka Naịjirịa na Benin ebe o dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya nke na-enweghị ọganihu
Ọ laghachiri Cameroon wee kwaga Gabon ngwa ngwa ebe o mere egwu mbụ ya a ma ama 'Pas d'argent, no love' na Haissam Records

Ọ laghachiri n'afọ 1985 na Cameroon, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-edepụta ma na-edekọ ihe Index na Nyocha kọwara dị ka 'ogologo ndepụta nke ederede na-egbu mgbu na ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mba ya na-echegbu onwe ya
' Abụ mbụ ya na nke a bụ 'No Make Erreur'

A na-akpọ ya 'onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara', Mbanga ghọrọ 'ekpere arụsị nke ndị ọrụ a na-emegbu emegbu na ndị echefuru echefu bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ime obodo na ọdụ ụgbọ ala nke Cameroon' na 'onye na-ekwuchitere ndị ntorobịa nke mba ya'
Egwu ndi sonyere n'egwu ya nke oge ahụ gụnyere 'No Make Erreur', 'Surface de Reparation' 'Kop Nie', 'Mimba We', na 'Na You' Gọọmentị Cameroon na-enyocha ya mgbe niile
N'afọ 2008, Mbanga katọrọ onye isi ala Cameroon bụ Paul Biya n'abụ 'Constitution constipée' ('Constipated Constitution')
Abụ ahụ katọrọ mmezigharị a tụrụ aro nke usoro iwu Cameroon, nke mere ka ndị isi ala nwee afọ asaa abụọ

Gọọmentị Cameroon machibidoro 'Constitution constipée' site na ụzọ ụgbọelu, mana ọtụtụ puku ụmụ akwụkwọ Cameroon jiri abụ ahụ dị ka abụ ka ha na-agbakọta ma na-eme ngagharị iwe n'okporo ámá n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2008 na mkpesa megide mgbanwe iwu a tụrụ aro, nke ga-enye Biya ohere ịzọ ọkwa ọhụrụ n'afọ 2011

E jidere Mbanga n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, ma bo ya ebubo na ọ 'na-arụkọ ọrụ na izu ohi, ibibi ihe onwunwe, ịgba ọkụ, igbochi okporo ámá, imebi ihe onwunwe ọha na eze ma ọ bụ nke a na-ahazi, na ịmepụta nzukọ iwu na-akwadoghị'
Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, ndị omeiwu Cameroon nakweere iwu ọhụrụ nke Mbanga wakporo na 'Constitution constipée'
N'ubochí iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2008, Tribunal de Grande Instance (TGI) mara Mbanga ikpe afọ atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ New Bell dị nso na Douala
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009, ọ butere ọrịa typhoid fever ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ nwụọ n'ihi nsogbu ahụ na nsogbu iku ume
Mgbe ndị ọchịchị jụrụ iziga ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ, nwunye ya wetara ọgwụ ndị nyere aka zọpụta ndụ ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, Mbanga kwuru na ya na ndị mkpọrọ ibe ya nwere 'ihe oriri ntaramahụhụ ugboro abụọ n'ụbọchị
N'elekere otu nke ehihie, a na-enye anyị ọka e siri esi ma n'elekere ise nke ehihie, osikapa dị na mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ
Ọ bụ otu ihe ahụ kwa ụbọchị
Ọ dị n'okpuru ihe kachasị mkpa
Freemuse, otu NGO dabeere na Denmark, mere mkpọsa mba ụwa maka ntọhapụ Mbanga

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a jụrụ ya n'afọ 2010 site n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, o kwuru na 'Ọ bụrụ na nwunye m emeghị njem awa anọ ebe a na awa anọ kwa ụbọchị iji nye m nri ma ọ bụrụ na Freemuse ekwuputaghị ikpe m n'ụwa niile, m gaara anwụ ogologo oge gara aga
Na mgbakwunye na mgbasa ozi Freemuse, òtù ndị ọka iwu dị na US bụ Freedom Now lekọtara ikpe Mbanga n'oge niile a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, Kọmitii Ndị edemede n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke International PEN malitekwara mkpọsa iji nyere aka nweta nnwere onwe Mbanga
N'afọ 2011, Otu na-arụ ọrụ na njide aka ike nke United Nations kwupụtara na njide Mbanga bụ mmebi nke nkwekọrịta mba ụwa n'ihi ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'oge a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ, Mbanga rịọrọ ikpe ya ugboro ugboro n'ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2011, ọ jụrụ iji ohere nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nyere ka a tọhapụ ya na mgbapụta
A tọhapụrụ Mbanga n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, otu ụbọchị tupu njedebe nke ikpe ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a ajuru ya n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, Mbanga kọwara ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ dị ka 'rotten' ma kwusi ike na ọ nweghị mgbe ọ gbara ndị na-eto eto ume imebi ma zuo ihe onwunwe ndị ọzọ
'Enwetụbeghị m ụdị ihe ọ bụla
Kama nke ahụ, emere m ihe niile iji gbochie nke ahụ ime
' Ọ kpọrọ ikpe ya 'Kafkaesque', na-ekwu na 'e kpebiri ọdịnihu ya tupu oge eruo,' n'agbanyeghị enweghị ihe akaebe megide ya
N'ubochí iri na ato n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, na Lille, France, Mbanga laghachiri n'ọkwa nke mbụ ya kemgbe a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2011, ọ gbakwara egwu na Lausanne, Brussels, Paris, Barcelona, na ebe dị iche iche na United States, Canada, na Britain
N'afọ 2014, ọrịa kansa gburu Lapiro na Buffalo, New York
Lara George bụ onye Nigerian gospel onye na-etipụta egwu, na-edekwa egwu ma na akwado otiti egwu
A mụrụ Lara George n'ime ezinụlọ Oluwole Bajomo na Lagos State, ngalaba nke Nigeria
Ọ gara Queen's College, Lagos, mecha gaa University of Lagos ebe m nwetara nzere Mastas digiri mu na ogodo chimaobi Architecture
George malitere ọrụ egwu ya na University of Lagos, , ebe ọ sonyeere ndị ukwe ukwe ụka nke campus
O so n’otu egwu Kush,bụ nke ekposagoro nke TY Bello, Dapo Torimiro na Emem Ema so na ya
Album nke izizi ya nke akpọrọ ọkụ bụ Forever In My Heart,ọzọ bụ 'Ijoba Orun' nke ewepụtara n'afọ 2008
The album buteere ya ọtụtụ ihe nrite na nturu ugo
N’afọ 2008, o ritere ihe onyinye Voice of the Year na Nigeria Music Awards
N’afọ 2010, enwetakwara ihe onyinye kacha elu gbara ụmụ nwaanyị olu ya kacha mma na ‘Headies’,Award bụ nke a na-akpọzi ‘Hip-Hop World Awards’ ugbu a na Nigerịa
Ọ nwetakwara nturu ugo na katigory nke a kpọrọ Best African Female Gospel Artiste na 2011 Africa Gospel Music Awards emere na London, UK

Lara George onye nke a kpọrọ Trailblazer of the year, a họpụtara ya , Africa Gospel Music Awards, nke afọ 2016 nke sitere n'otu ndị pan-African Kora Awards dị ka Best Femal Artise West Afrca nakwa Gospel Artiste of the year, Ben TV Awards UK, n'etiti ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ

George agụọla egwu n'ọtụtụ mmeme ama ama ndị nke gụnyere GreenBelt Festival UK (dịka otu nke KUSH), otu n'ime ihe nkiri egwu egwu kachasị ukwuu n'Africa nke ihe dika mmadụ puku nari ise biara yaỤfọdụ ndị biara kọnsatị a gụnyere ndị ama ama dịka Ron Kenoly, Bebe, Cece Winans, Micah Stampley, Don Moen na Mary Mary
Ihe ndi ọzọ egosipụtara bụ Calabar Festival, MTN Music Festival, Festival of Life UK, Festival of Life Canada, nakwa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
George pụtara na BET International dị ka otu n’ime ndị omenkà izizi si Naịjirịa egosiri na mmemme ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu BET Voting Academy ebe ọ rụrụ afọ abụọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe na igwe onyonyo TV nke Airtel TRACE MUSIC Star
Ọ lụrụ Gbenga George, onye ọkaiwu na onye na-achụ nta ego
O nwere umu abuo otu nwoke aha ya bu Adeoba na nwagboghobia aha ya bu Tiaraoluwa ma biri na Alpharetta, Georgia di na Amerika

Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke SoForte Entertainment Distribution Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ izizi ahaziri ahazi maka nhazi na nkesa mmemme na Nigeria, ha na ụlọ ọrụ IAS / TNT ndị oje ozi nakwa ụlọ ọrụ na-esipụta nri a kpọrọ Mr Biggs na Sweet Sensation, nke butere mmepụta ọnụ ụlọ nri narị abụọ na iri ise na Nigeria bụ nke ha na-ekesa ngwa egwu ha
Larbi Doghmi (a mụrụ na 1931 na Rabat, ọ nwụrụ na 28 Ọktoba 1994 na Rabat) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Moroccan na ihe ngosi telivishọn, a makwaara ya maka ụda olu ya nke ihe nkiri Bollywood
Ọ na-enwekwa ihe nkiri mba ụwa dịka The Man Who Wanted to be King, ebe o gosipụtara Ootah
Larbi Zekkal (19 Mee 1934 -17 Septemba 2010) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Larbi Zekkal n'abalị 19 ọnwa Mee, afọ 1934 na Algiers, Algeria
Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 17, 2010 na Algiers, Algeria mgbe ọ dị afọ 76 mgbe o si na veranda ya daa, e lie ya n'ebe ili ozu Sidi Miaohamed
Zekkal malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ ndị 1950 ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị iche iche, ọrụ ya kachasị ama na-abịa na Agha Algiers
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri French bụ Bâton Rouge nke Rachid Bouchareb duziri
O nwekwara ọrụ na Si Mohand U Mhand
Ọrụ ikpeazụ Zekkal rụrụ bụ na ihe nkiri French Outside the Law (Hors-La-Loi), nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2010

Lari Williams (1940 27 ruo Febụwarị 2022) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ede uri, na onye na-ede egwuregwu nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ncha dịka The Village Headmaster, Ripples, na Mirror in the Sun A mụrụ Williams na Naijiria n'afọ 1940
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Ikom, Cross River State, n'ụbọchị 27 Febụwarị 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na otu (81)
Larisa Spasova (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Lark, nnụnụ, onye ụtụtụ, ma ọ bụ (na mba Scandinavia) onye A, bụ onye na-ebili n'isi ụtụtụ ma na-ehi ụra n'isi mgbede
Okwu a metụtara nnụnụ ndị a maara dị ka larks, nke a maara na ha na-abụ abu n'uwa nke ụwa na ngwa ngwa n'ihi nke a ịghọ tupu chi abọọ

'Lark' mmadụ nwere ike ihi ụra site n'ihe dị ka elekere iri nke mgbede ruo elekere isii nke ụtụtụ (ma ọ bụ tupu oge eruo), ọ na-enwekarị mmetụta siri ike ozugbo ha bilitere n'ụtụtụ na ụdị ke amụta site n'ime ụmụ gị Ihe ndị sitere ná nkebi mbụ
N'ihi ya, ha dị mma maka ịrụ ọrụ ụbọchị
Ihe dị iche na lark bụ owl, nke na-etinyekarị n'abali ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ìhè ahụ
Onye a na-akpọ night owl bụ onye na-anọkarị na ụdị àlà úkwú n'azụ oge ma nwee ike ịmụrụ anya n'uhuruchi na n'abalị
Ndị na-eme nchọpụta ejirila okwu ụtụtụ na mgbede kọwaa usoro iheomume abụọ a
Till Roenneberg, onye na-amụ banyere oge ná ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ ezi ntụziaka Munich, emeela ka ihe karịrị mmadụ 200,000 nwee ike ịgba ọsọ
Usoro ihe ndị dị ndụ, gụnyere usoro ụra-mbilite n'ọnwụ na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ, nke na-egosipụta oscillation nke ihe dị ka awa 24 a na-akpọ circadian rhythms
Dị ka Roenneberg si kwuo, nkesa nke rhythms circadian na-aga site na mmalite ruo na njedebe nke oge, n'otu aka ahụ dị ka ịdị elu na-adịgasị iche site na mkpụmkpụ ruo ogologo
Dị ka rhythm circadian na-adabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ awa nke ụra mmadụ chọrọ, Roenneberg na-agbakọ rhythm dabere na etiti oge ụra

Onye na-ehi ụra n'etiti abalị ma bilie n'elekere na ímé ihe ha ga eme ka ndị ọzọ ụra circadian rhythm 8 ya mere nwere otu usoro iheomume ndị mmadụ dị ndụ ebighị dị dịka onye na-ebili n'elekera 1 nke ụtụtụ ma bilie na 7; etiti ụra bụ elekere 4 nke ụtụtụ maka mmadụ abụọ a
Ndị nwere chronotypes mbụ agaghị enwe ike 'ịrahụ ụra', ọbụlagodi na ha anọgidewo na-ehi ụra karịa ka ha na-ezu

Ọ bụ ezie na ha dabara na usoro ọha na eze 'dị ka nnukwu', ọ na-esiri ha ike ime mgbanwe na ọnọdụ ebe 'na-ehi ụra' bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'agbanyeghị na ha na-enwe ume ọhụrụ n'ụtụtụ, ha nwere ike inwe mmetụta na ha na ụdị nnọkọ ọha na eze ụfọdụ (dị ka soirées) nke a na-ahazi maka mgbede, ọbụlagodi na ọtụtụ ụdị ihe omume ọha na eze abụghị
Ndị nwere chronotypes na-aga n'azụ oge ma na-ebili n'azụ azụ

N'ịbụ ndị a manyere ka ha bilie n'oge karịa ka ụda circadian ha na-ekwu, ha nwere okpomọkụ dị ala ma nwee ike ịchọ awa ole ná ndị ruru eru inweta alaeze ndị mbụ Nile nke ụwa na ụdị àlà úkwú ole iji nwee mmetụta nke ịmụrụ anya
Ha enweghị ike ihi ụra n'oge 'larks' nwere ike
Nnyocha e mere n'afọ 2007 nke ihe karịrị mmadụ 55,000 chọpụtara na chronotypes na-agbaso na ímé ihe ọ bụla nke dị ka Azụmaahịa nkesa dị mma, na ụdị ụtụtụ na mgbede dị oke egwu na njedebe dị anya

E nwere nnyocha ndị na-atụ aro ka mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na-ekpebi ma mmadụ bụ onye na-eme ihe ike ma ọ bụ onye na mgbede n'otu ụzọ ahụ ọ na-emetụta àgwà ndị mmadụ n'ebe ikike nọ, omume na-abụghị omenala, yana ịgụ akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri telivishọn ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere ikpe nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na chromosome 2, nke Urs Albrecht na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Mahadum Fribourg na Switzerland chọpụtara na mbido afọ 1990
Mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa ndị mere mmehie aka n'ime ihe nọr ka ébé ihe a na-achịkwa elekere circadian ma chọta ụdị ya n'ezinụlọ ndị gosipụtara ọrịa ụra dị elu
Dị ka ndị nchọpụta si kwuo, ịdị adị ya n'ime ndị mmadụ na-agbanwe usoro ụra ọbụlagodi na oge ahụ na-ekpuchi awa asatọ
Afọ na-emetụtakwa ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge n'ụzọ mmadụ si ghọọ onye ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ onye abalị
A na-akọwa na, site na mmepe, ndị mmadụ na-abụkarị owls abalị n'oge ha dị afọ iri na ụma ka ha na-aghọ larks mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ
Ụmụaka na-abụkarị ndị na-ebili n'oge
Ndị larks nke ụtụtụ na-enwekarị ọganihu n'ọrụ ndị na-amalite n'isi ụtụtụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-emekarị ka ha dị mma maka ụtụtụ gụnyere ọrụ ugbo, iwu ụlọ, na ịrụ ọrụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze
Ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-amalite ịrụ ọrụ n'elekere asaa nke ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ tupu elekere asaa nke abalị
A maara ọrụ ụfọdụ nke ọma maka oge ụtụtụ ha, gụnyere ndị na-eme achịcha, ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, ndị ọrụ ugbo mmiri ara ehi, na ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ
Ndị na-anọchite anya ndị na-ere nri n'ụtụtụ, họtel, ebe ntụrụndụ, na ụlọ ahịa mkpọsa, nke na-emeghe ruo mgbe mgbede gasịrị
Otú ọ dị, larks ụtụtụ nwere ike ịdị mma maka oge mmeghe nke ụlọ ahịa kọfị, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụtụtụ na họtel, ma ọ bụ na-arụkọ ọrụ na akụkọ ụtụtụ maka redio ma ọ bụ telivishọn
Ndị larks nke ụtụtụ nwekwara ike ịrụ ọrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya na ụlọ ọrụ, dị ka ọrụ mberede, njem, nlekọta ahụike, na imepụta ihe
Ọtụtụ nnukwu azụmaahịa na-arụ ọrụ n'uhuruchi ma ọ bụ n'abalị chọrọ ndị ọrụ na ọkwa niile, site na ndị ọrụ mbido ruo ndị njikwa ruo ndị ọrụ nwere nkà, mgbe ọ bụla ha meghere
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgwụ na-ewe ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọrụ n'ọrụ ehihie
Larraine D Segil (née Wolf ; amụrụ June 14, 1947) bụ onye ọchụnta ego amụrụ na South Africa, ọka iwu, onye ndụmọdụ, onye nkuzi, onye ode akwụkwọ, onye otu bọọdụ na onye ọrụ ugbo obodo
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke The Little Farm Company, ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ezinụlọ Los-Angeles nke akpọtụrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Forbes
Segil abụrụla onye na-ekwu okwu na CNN na CNBC e gosipụtakwala ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Fast Company nakwa Bloomberg Business

Segil bụ onye isi oche nke Exceptional Women Awardees Foundation, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke C200 Foundation, nakwa onye bubu osote onye isi oche nke C200 Governing Board, otu zuru ụwa ọnụ nakwa òtù na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ nke ụmụ nwanyị bu ndị isi, nakwa onye so na APCO Worldwide International Advisory Council (IAC)
Ọ bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ na Bọọdụ nke Frontier Communications na mbụ n'ihe ruru afọ iri na atọ nakwa bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Edgecast, ụlọ ọrụ nnyefe ọdịnaya (CDN) nke eresiri Verizon na 2013
Na 2009, a họpụtara Segil na bọọdụ nke World Health Organisation (WHO) Tropical Diseases Group (TDR), na Geneva, Switzerland ebe ọ jere ozi afọ atọ
A mụrụ Segil na South Africa, ha wee kwaga United States na 1974
Ọ gara Kingmead College, na Mahadum Witwatersrand na Johannesburg, South Africa ebe ọ nwetara nzere BA
na Latin na Bekee yana nzere BA
na Latin na Classics
Na United States, Segil nwetara JD
si Southwestern Law School na MBA
site na Presidential Key Executive Programme Pepperdine University
A nabatara ya ka ọ na-eme iwu na steeti California na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States
Na 1970s, Segil malitere ọrụ azụmaahịa America ebe ọ na-ere akụrụngwa eze dị ka onye jị igwe okwu na-ere ahịa

Ọ soro wee tọọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego ma soro di ya, Clive Segil, dọkịta na-agwọ ọrịa ọkpụkpụ, rụọ ọrụ iji guzobe otu n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ nlekọta ngwa ngwa mbụ e nwere na America nke dị nso na ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị na Burbank, California
N'ime 1980s, Segil bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe dị elu na-enye ngwaahịa na ọrụ nye ndị na-aru ọrụ na ikuku na ngwá elektronik n'ụwa nile
Ndepụta ndị ahịa ya gụnyere Lockheed Martin, Hughes Aircraft Company na gọọmentị France na Israel

Na 1987, Segil malitere The Lared Group, ebe Emilio Fontana sonyeere ya n'oge na-adịghị anya na Los Angeles, California, ụlọ ọrụ nyere ndụmọdụ gbasara njikọ aka maka nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na obere ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ụwa
Segil duuru ụlọọrụ 'The Lared Group' afọ iri abụọ na anọ tupu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ a kpọrọ Vantage Partners LLC wee weghaara ya
Na 2003, Segil ghọrọ onye mmekọ zuru oke na onye isi oche nke Vantage Partners, LLC, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka atụmatụ azụmaahịa, ruo 2006
Ọ dụrụ ọdụ maka ịmepụta na njikwa nke njikọ azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ Global 1000 na Fortune 500 dị ka Cisco, Intel, na Synopsys Inc
ma nyekwa ndụmọdụ ka esi enwe mmekọrịta na ụlọ ọrụ mmalite
Na 2007, Segil ghọrọ onye bubu onye mmekọ na Vantage Partners
Segil kụziri nkuzi maka njikọ aka na mmekọrịta nye ndị isi na gburugburu ụwa wee kụziere nkuzi gbasara njikọ aka na California Institute of Technology maka ndị isi maka afọ iri abụọ na anọ

O nyere otutu ndi oru nta akuko, agụmakwụkwọ na odee akwụkwọ, gụnyere na Melanie Haiken isiokwu Innovative Partnering How smart alliances lend a hand to help midmarket growth nke e gosipụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Business 20 na CNN Money
Segil edeela akwụkwọ ise na njikọ aka na ibu onye ndu, nke Random House bipụtara, John Wiley na Sons na AMACOM, na mgbakwunye, o deela akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Penguin Books bipụtara
Na 1991, Segil ghọrọ onye isi nyocha na IC 2 Institute na Mahadum Texas na Austin
Ọ sonyeere Frontier Communications Corporation Board of Directors na Maachị 2005

TDR, Mmemme Pụrụ Iche maka nchọpụta na ọzụzụ, họpụtara Segil ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Strategic Alliance Advisory Group nke UNICEF, United Nations Development Programme, World Bank na World Health Organisation na-akwado site na 2009 ruo 2012
Ihe omume ahụ nyere aka kwalite mgbalị nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere ọrịa na-efe efe nke ịda ogbenye
Segil na-eje ozi na bọọdụ ndị nlekọta nke Southwestern School of Law na Los Angeles, yana na Price Center Entrepreneurial Advisory Board nke Anderson School of Management of UCLA kemgbe 1993

Segil mepụtara ọnọdụ ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu maka ụmụ agbọghọ klas nke itoolu na Kingmead College na Johannesburg ma guzobe onyinye maka ndị ọkachamara ụmụ nwanyị na Southwwest Law School na Pepperdine University Graziadio School of Business and Management
Na 2007, Segil hapụrụ ụlọ oge niile ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche na onye ya na Clive Segil tọrọ ntọala nke The Little Farm Company, ugbo dị na mpụga Los Angeles, California
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta cheese, jams, relishes
N'afọ 2011, Segil dere ma mekwaa otu igbe CD ụmụaka nakwa akwụkwọ etu e sị esi nri ụmụaka n'okpuru aha Rockin' Grandma Music

Na 2012, Segil malitere ịkụzi ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị dị elu, n'afọ 2017 o mepụtara 501C3 Public Charity Foundation nke ọ na-achikwa ugbu nke a na-akpọ Exceptional Women Awardees Foundation dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo
Ọ bụ mmemme ntụzi-aka nke onye otu oge ndụ
N'afọ 2022, otu ahụ karịrị ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị otu narị
Larry Sanger (mù yá na 16 Julaị 1968) bula enyi Jimmy Wales
Ya na nwoke ahu bu nde bidoro Wikipedia
Mbu ha bido Wikipedia, ha nwela encyclopedia nola na Internet, adila kpo Nupedia
Na Maachị 15, 2007, Larry Sanger bidoro encyclopedia ozo ana-kpo Citizendium
Larry Stroman bụ onye America na-ese ihe naañ-atọ ọchị n'akwụkwọ nakwa onye edemede
Mgbe mbụ ọ nwetara nlebara anya na-egosi usoro Epic Comics Alien Legion (vol
2), ọ gara n'ihu gosipụta akwụkwọ Marvel Comics dị iche iche dịka The Uncanny X-Men, X-Factor, Ghost Rider (vol
2) na Punisher, yana ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ, dị ka DC Comics 'Darkstars na Dark Horse Comics' The Mark
O bipụtara obere oge usoro nke onye okike nke a na-akpọ The Tribe with Image Comics na mmalite afọ 1990
Stroman nwere mmasị na akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị site na nwata; ruo mgbe o nwere ike zụta ha n'onwe ya, ọ na-agụ ihe ọchị e nyefere ya n'aka nwanne ya nwoke ma ọ bụ nke ndị enyi ya gbazitere

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'ebumnobi nke ịbụ onye na-ese ihe na-atọ ọchị n'akwụkwọ, mana 'ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ wezugara ya' wee rụọ ọrụ nke mbụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe, tupu ọ kwaga New York City wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise ruo afọ ole na ole
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ọchị, Stroman na-ahọrọ usoro okike Marvel
Iji zere nsogbu na njedebe nke ihe ọchị (n'ihi na ọ na-enwe naanị obere ohere), ọ ga-ese peeji ole na ole ikpeazụ nke akụkọ ọ bụla ozugbo ọ sere peeji nke mbụ, na-ese peeji nke etiti ikpeazụ
Ọrụ mbụ nke Stroman na ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị nke America bụ na 1985, mgbe o gosipụtara akụkọ azụ na First Comics 'American Flagg! # 21–23 na World's Finest Comics # 316–317 maka DC Comics
O gosipụtara Alien Legion (vol
2) #10–20 maka Marvel Comics

Mmekọrịta ya na Alien Legion gara n'ihu na njikwa ọrụ nka na mbipụta iri na asatọ mbụ nke mpịakọta ọzọ nke usoro ahụ, nke malitere na 1987, 1990 obere usoro atọ a kpọrọ Alien Legion On the Edge, na obere usoro ihe nkiri n'afọ 1991 a kpọrọ Alien Legion Tenants of Hell

N'oge a, ọ dọtara akwụkwọ Marvel ndị ọzọ, dị ka Alpha Flight Annual, Cloak and Dagger, What The--?! na Ghost Rider, yana akwụkwọ maka ndị nkwusa ndị ọzọ, dị ka The Mark # 3 maka Dark Horse Comics, na The Law of Dredd # 24 maka Fleetway-Quality

Ọrụ ndị a mgbe ụfọdụ gụnyere ịkekọrịta onyinye nka na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe n'okwu ụfọdụ, dị ka ịse obere peeji nke Uncanny X-Men #273 ma nye ihe atụ maka usoro ntụaka Who's Who in the DC Universe #9, nke e bipụtara na 1991

N'otu afọ ahụ, na-esote akụkọ 'Muir Island Saga' nke gbanwere ọnọdụ nke ezinụlọ akwụkwọ X-Men, usoro X-Factor malitere n'ụzọ ọhụrụ, na ndị ọhụrụ na akụkọ, nke Stroman sonyeere onye edemede Peter David

Na mbụ, a kpọbatara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, e nyere ya X-Factor dị ka ọrụ o ga-aru mgbe niile ma nye ya nkwado ịhazigharị uwe ndị ahụ na ọdịdị zuru oke dịka ọ hụrụ na ọ dị mma
Stroman bụ onye na-ese ihe mgbe niile na usoro ahụ site na mbipụta nke ịrị asaa na otu ruo mbipụta nke ịrị asatọ na otu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ dọtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, dị ka Wolverine, Punisher na Darkstars
N'afọ 1993, Stroman na onye edemede Todd Johnson keputara usoro Image Comics Tribe, nke bụ ihe kachasị ere ahịa nke ndị Africa na ndị America mepụtara n'oge niile
Ahịa maka mbipụta # 1 gafere otu nde akara
Mgbe a kagburu aha ahụ na 'Image shakeup' nke 1994, Stroman na Johnson hiwere Axis Comics iji gaa n'ihu na-ebipụta Tribe, mana ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechiri mgbe ebipụtachara naanị mbipụta itoolu
N'akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi, Stroman hotara mgbanwe na mmekọrịta ya na Johnson, na 'ịba ụba ego mmepụta, enweghị mmasị nke onye okike, na ihe ahịa a na-atụghị anya ya'

Ọrụ Stroman sochirinụ n'afọ ndị 1990 gụnyere igosi WildCATs Covert Action Teams Annual #1 for Jim Lee's Wildstorm Productions/Image, na ọtụtụ utu aha Marvel gụnyere X-Men The Early Years, Excalibur na Heroes Reborn Iron Man

Ọrụ Stroman nke afọ 2000 gụnyere akụkụ dị iche iche nke usoro ntụgharị The Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe, nke gụnyere The Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Teams 2005 na mbipụta abụọ nke akwụkwọ 2007 The Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Update, yana What-If X-Men Rise and Fall of the Shi'Ar Empire, na Black Panther Annual #1 na Reginald Hudlin na Ken Lashley
N'afọ 2008, Stroman na onye ọrụ ya na X-Factor bụ Peter David zukọtara, na-egosi mbipụta nke ịrị atọ na ato wee rue nke ịrị atọ isii na ịrị atọ na asatọ nke mpịakọta atọ nke usoro ahụ
Stroman mechara gosipụta ihe nkiri atọ nke X-Men The Times and Life of Lucas Bishop miniseries, na Thunderbolts #144, ha abụọ n'afọ 2009
Laru (Laro, nakwa Shen ma ọ bụ Sengwe) bụ obere asụsụ Kainji nke Naijiria
O nwere otu olumba Cuba (Shuba)
Ndị ọkà okwu na-aga Busa
E nwere olumba atọ nke Shen, nke a na-asụ n'obodo nta ndị a
Nnukwu obodo nta ndị bụ isi, nke e nyere iwu site na nke kachasị ukwuu ruo nke kachasị nta, bụ Sàːgúnú, Kárábàndéi, Swàʃí, Lúmːà, na Mɔ̀nːáĩ
E nwere ihe na-erughị ndị ọkà okwu 4,000
Lassana bụ aha enyere ma ọ bụ nna nna bụ ntụgharị asụsụ ọzọ nke Al-Hassan, ma nwee ike na-ezo aka
Lassissi bụ aha nna Afrịka
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Adetola Abdullateef Adedimeji (a mụrụ na 1st February 1986) bụ onye na-eme ejije na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria

O malitere iwu ewu site na ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Yewande Adekoya nke afọ 2013 nke akpọrọ Kudi Klepto, ma mee ihe nkiri karịrị otu narị ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kemgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri afọ iri na ise gara aga
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Airtel na Numatville Megacity ugbu a
A mụrụ Lateef Adedimeji na 1st nke February afọ 1986 na Isolo, Lagos State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye Abeokuta Ogun Steeti
Nne ya bụ Kudirat Adedimeji bụ onye ahịa nke si Oyo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Lateef malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Ire Akari Primary School, Isolo, Lagos State, gara Ilamoye Grammar School Okota Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gakwara ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na Onikan Lagos Steeti ebe ọ nwetara ọzụzụ arụmọrụ ya
E mepụtakwara nkà edemede ya na ime ihe nkiri ya na nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO) (Community Life Project)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo, ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mass Communication
Lateef Adedimeji malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2007, wee malite ọrụ ya na ịgba egwu, ma debanye aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwu
Lateef Adedimeji bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede ihe nkiri
Lateef Adedimeji gosipụtara na ọrụ dị iche iche kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mana ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2007 mgbe ọ sonyeere Orisun TV
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma otu NGO họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-enye ihe ọmụma na onye ndụmọdụ n'oge mgbasa ozi HIV / AIDS
Ọrụ ya bụ ịkụziri ọha na eze banyere nsogbu metụtara mmekọahụ na ikike mmadụ site na ịmepụta ọdịnaya vidiyo nke o mere
Ndị Njali maara ya maka ịrụ ọrụ nke onye mmetụta uche nke na-ebe ákwá mgbe mgbe
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ya na aha ndị isi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2016, o meriri na 2016 Best of Nollywood Awards for Best Actor in a Lead Role (Yoruba)
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya maka City People Entertainment Awards maka 2015 Most Promising Actor of the year
Lateef nwere mgbagwoju anya na ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-ewu ewu na Naijiria bụ Odunlade Adekola n'ihi ọdịdị ha na ọchị ha
O nwekwara ohere ịrụ ọrụ na UNICEF n'ihi ike edemede ya
E nyere ya ihu Nollywood na ENigeria Newspaper Night of Honour na 30 Ọktoba 2021
Na 18th December, 2021, Adedimeji lụrụ onye ọlụlụ ya, onye bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri,Oyebade Adebimpe n'ụdị mara mma
Latefa Ahrar (a mụrụ na 12 Nọvemba 1971) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Ahrar na Meknes
Ọ malitere ọrụ telivishọn ya na Bent Lafchouch (Nwa agbọghọ mebiri emebi) site n'aka Abdelatif Ayachi n'afọ 1990
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha na Institut supérieur d'art dramatique et d'animation culturelle (ISADAC) ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1995
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkwago ma nata ọtụtụ onyinye maka arụmọrụ ya
Ahrar kwuru na ọ na-ahọrọ ọrụ siri ike, ma nwee mmasị iso ndị nduzi dị iche iche na-arụ ọrụ iji gbasaa ọrụ nka ya
Site n'afọ 2005 ruo 2008, Ahrar sonyere na njem na Institut du monde arabe na Paris, na egwuregwu La dernière nuit
N'afọ 2008, o mere ihe nkiri abụọ, Une famille empruntée na Les victimes
Nke mbụ bụ ọrụ na-atọ ọchị ebe ọ na-eme enyi nwanyị Mouna Fettou, ebe nke abụọ bụ dịka onye na-elekọta ụlọ nwere ụmụ atọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ịkwa akwa

N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu Eduardo De Filippo bụ Douleur sous clé, nke Abdellatif Firdaous kwadoro na Moroccan Darija, nke Karim Troussi duziri ma soro Hicham Ibrahimi na Henri Thomas nke Compagnie du Jour rụọ ọrụ
Ọ natara egwu ọnwụ maka omume ahụ
Ahrar bụkwa prọfesọ ihe nkiri
Al-Latif (Al-Laṭīf__yue____yue____wue____yure____yue__, nke a na-akpọkwa Al-Lateef) bụ otu n'ime aha Chineke na ndi Islam, nke pụtara 'ezi'
Latif nwekwara ike ịbụ aha nwoke, dị ka ụdị mkpirikpi nke Abdul Latif, nke pụtara 'onye na-ejere Gentle ozi'
Ụdị nwanyị ya bụ Latifa
'Al-Latif' pụtakwara 'The Subtle'
Latifa Bint Alaya El Arfaoui (Arabic), nke a maara nke ọma dịka Latifa (Arabic) bụ onye na-agụ egwú pop na onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Tunisia
A mụrụ Latifa Bint Alaya El Arfaoui na Manouba, Tunisia
N'afọ 1983, obere oge nna ya nwụsịrị, Latifa na ezinụlọ ya gara Ijipt iji zuo ike ma lụọ újú
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere onye na-ede egwu Baligh Hamdi, onye dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ kwaga Ijipt iji baara ọrụ ya uru
Otú ọ dị Latifa chọrọ ilekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ ya, wee laghachi Tunisia iji mechaa ule ikpeazụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'ihi ihe gbasara ego, ọ pụghị ịlaghachi Ijipt, ya mere ọ gara kọleji na Tunisia, na-amụ akwụkwọ Dutch ruo otu afọ na ọkara
Ezinụlọ ya kpebiri ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ya ịga Ijipt, ya mere ọ hapụrụ kọleji na Tunisia wee sonye na Arab Academy of Music na Ijipt, ebe ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya
Ọ na-akwadebe maka nzere masta ya
[mgbe?]
Mgbe ọ nọ na Academy, onye na-ede egwu Mohammed Abdel Wahab chọpụtara ya, onye nụrụ ya na redio

N'oge ahụ, ọ na-abụkarị abụ ogologo Tarab, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ malitere ịgbanwe ụzọ ya na onye na-ede egwu Ammar El Sherei na onye na'ede uri Abdulwahab Muhammed, onye ọ zutere n'oge nleta mbụ ya na Ijipt
Abọm mbụ Latifa sitere n'afọ 1984 bụ n'ụdị Arab
Abọm Mesa Al Jamal ('Evening Of Beauty') mere ka Latifa Bint Alayah Al Arfaoui bụrụ onye ama ama n'Ijipt
Akthar Min Roohi ('More than My Soul') ka a tọhapụrụ n'afọ 1986
Latifa malitere ịbụ abụ pop Arab na egwu Ammar El Sherei na okwu Abdulwahab Muhammed
Abọm ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụwa ndị Arab, na egwu ndị dị mkpirikpi na mgbakwunye nke mmetụta dị iche iche dịka egwu tango
O dekọrọ vidiyo egwu maka egwu egwu 'Ew'ah Tegheer' ('Don't Be Jealous')
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke abọm a nyere Latifa ohere ịzụta ọkara òkè nke ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, La Reine
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na abọm ya niile na vidiyo egwu
N'afọ 1997, Latifa wepụtara abọm Al Ghinwa ('The Song'), nke a na-ewere dịka ihe na-esote 'Akthar Min Roohi' site na abọm gara aga
Latifa wee malite ịme ụdị egwu ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Qasa'ed Fos'ha
Abọm ya ọzọ, 1998's Taloomoni Al Donya ('The World Blames Me'), gosipụtara Latifa na-abụ abụ nke onye na-ede uri Nizar Qabbani dere
Latifa laghachiri n'afọ 1999 na abọm a ma ama, nke a maara n'ụwa Arab dịka Wadeh ('Clear') na mba ụwa dịka Inchallah ('God willing')
Ọ bụ Universal Music France kesara abọm ahụ, ọ bụkwa abọm mbụ Latifa mere n'asụsụ mba ọzọ
Abụ Franco-Arab 'Inchallah' mere Elle Magazine n'elu 5
'Inchallah' ('Chineke dị njikere'), 'Kerehtak' ('M kpọrọ gị asị') na 'Wadeh' ('O doro anya') bụ egwu a ma ama na Arab World

2002 ụdị album Desert Roses na Arabian Rhythms II gosipụtara Latifa na-eme Arab Mawwal na egwu 'Take Me I'm Yours,' ma na-abụ obere akụkụ na Arabic na Bekee na Chris Difford na Glenn Tilbrook nke otu Squeeze
Latifa meriri World Music Award afọ 2004 maka onye na-ere ahịa kacha mma na Middle East na North Africa maka abọm Ma Etrohsh Ba'ed ('Apụla'), nke Alam El Phan (Mazzica TV) mepụtara n'afọ 2003
N'afọ 2004, Latifa mepụtara abọm nke Warner Brothers France kesara, Les Plus Belles Chansons De Latifa ('Latifa's Best Songs')
Ọ bụ ezie na abọm ahụ bụ nchịkọta nke egwu kachasị egwu, o gosipụtakwara egwu Raï ọhụrụ a na-akpọ 'Khalleoni' ('Ka m'), mgbalị mbụ ya na Raï
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, 2006 Latifa bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọzọ na Rotana iji kesaa ndekọ ya gafee Arab World
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2016, Latifa wepụtara egwu ya 'Fresh'
N'afọ 2007 ọ pụtara dịka onwe ya na nke asaa nke Lahazat Harega, nsụgharị Arabic nke ER
N'oge ọrụ ya, Latifa mépụtara ihe karịrị abọm 20 na egwu egwu, na ihe karịrị vidiyo egwu 70
Latifa Akherbach (َBerber languages) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nta akụkọ Moroccan
N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2012, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ nke Abbas El Fassi
Latifa Akherbach malitere ọrụ ya na afọ 1981 dị ka onye nta akụkọ na magazin 'Al Maghrib' na 'La Vie Eco' kwa ụbọchị

N'oge ụfọdụ na ngwụcha afọ 1990 ọ kụziri na 'Higher Institute of Journalism of Rabat' (French Institut Supérieur de Journalisme de Rabat) na afọ 2003, Eze Mohammed VI họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nke 'Higher Institute of Information and Communication' (Franch l'Institut Supérieur de l'Information et de la Communication ISIC), mgbe ahụ na afọ 2007 dị ka onye na-eduzi redio steeti no na Morocco
Akherbach so dee akwụkwọ abụọ na French banyere ikike ụmụ nwanyị; 'Women and Media' (Femmes et médias) na 'umunwaayi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị' (Fommes et politique)
Latifa Habachi (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia bụ onye otu Assembly of the Representatives of the People
A mụrụ Habachi na 13 August 1972 na Tunis n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ iri na abụọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Omrane Superior
O nwere nzere masta na diplọma na sayensị iwu site na Faculty of Law na Tunis
Habachi malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na 1995
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Tunisian Association of Young Lawyers ma wepụta onwe ya na ikpe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O sonyere na ngagharị iwe nke ndị ọka iwu mgbe Mohamed Bouazizi gbasịrị onwe ya
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Disemba afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri ndị agha tọọrọ ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe
Habachi ghọrọ onye otu Islamist mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Constituent Assembly nke Tunisia iji nọchite anya Ennahda maka mpaghara Manouba
O nyere aka dee Iwu Iwu 2014
A họpụtara Habachi ọzọ na Nzukọ nke ndị nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ na 2014, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 42 so na ya
N'afọ 2014, Habachi na Sana Mersni tụrụ aro ka e dezigharịa iwu ahụ iji nye gọọmentị ikike ịhọpụta ndị otu ikpe
Ndị otu Popular Front na ndị otu Democratic Bloc na-emegide ya n'ụzọ siri ike ma mee ka ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe nke Tunisia kpọọ oku maka ọgbaghara, mana vootu 109 nabatara ya
Habachi bụ osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na General Legislation
N'afọ 2016, Habachi sonyere na njikọ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị a na-akpọ 'Ụgbọ Mmiri ụmụ nwanyị maka Gaza', na-achọ njedebe nke mgbochi nke Gaza Strip
Habachi lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwoke atọ
Ọ malitere iyi ákwà mkpuchi ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, mana ọ kwụsịrị ọtụtụ afọ mgbe a machibidoro ya ịrụ ọrụ na di ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ tụọ ya mkpọrọ
Latifa Labida (Arabic) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Morocco N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2012, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ nke Abbas El Fassi

Latifa Labida malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Rabat n'etiti afọ 1973 na afọ 1977, mgbe ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'etiti afọ 1977 na afọ 1985, mgbe ọ gbanwere ọrụ ya wee sonye na Ministry of Economy and Finance na Rabat dị ka 'onye nyocha ego'
Latifa Lakhdar (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1956) bụ onye Tunisia na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Minista nke Ọdịbendị site n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2015 ruo Jenụwarị n'
A mụrụ Lakhdar na Zarzis na 1 Febụwarị 1956
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Mohamed Arkoun na Sorbonne na Paris
Lakhdar bụ Prọfesọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge a na Mahadum Ez-Zitouna site na 1991 ruo 1999 na site na 2000 ruo 2015 na Mahadim Tunis
Lakhdar bụ ọkachamara n'echiche Alakụba ma bipụta ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na Arabic na French, ọkachasị na ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị Alakụba
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-adịghị ekpe okpukpe
O kwuru na nkwenye Alakụba, gụnyere iyi ọha egwu Alakụba bụ akụkụ nke orthodoxy Alakụba
Ọ na-ekwu na 'Echiche jihadist na okpukpe kwesịrị ịchịkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ ihe nlereanya nke na-adịtụghị'
Lakhdar bụ onye guzobere Association tunisienne des femmes démocrates
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu , a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke ikike dị elu maka mmezu nke ebumnuche nke mgbanwe, mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mgbanwe ọchịchị
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Lakhdar ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na nchekwa ihe nketa, dị ka onye nweere onwe ya, n'ọchịchị Praịm Minista Habib Essid
Ya na ndị ọrụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na-ekwurịta okwu n'oge mwakpo Bardo National Museum na 18 Machị 2015 ma mesịa kpughee ihe ncheta na saịtị ahụ
Na 12 Febụwarị 2016, Onye isi ala Béji Caïd Essebsi mere Lakhdar onye isi nke Order of the Republic maka ọrụ ya
Latifat Tijani (amuru 8 Nọvemba 1981) bụ ọnye na- ebuli ike Naijiria
Ọ nwetara ọla edo na mmemme ụmụnwaanyị – 45kg na egwuregwu 2015 nke Africa na Brazzaville, Republic of Congo
Na 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị – 45kg na 2016 Summer Paralympics, ebe o buliri 106kg iji nweta ọla ọcha
Latifi (Persian) bụ obodo dị na Central District nke Larestan County, Fars Province, Iran
N'ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na ya bụ 5,731, n'ime ezinụlọ 1,184
Latifi (Persian; adjective form of Latif (Arabụ ) bụ aha nna ndị Alakụba nke Albania, Dari, Persian, Moroccan na Tajik
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Latitude bu oluwa bekee ana mata mgbe he no na North n'uwa, ma mgbe ono na South
Adi mata latitude-u wo mgbe elewa ma ono n'elu m'ono n'okpuru ihe ana-kpo Prime Meridian, line eji kawasi uwa n'etiti
Ihe no n'elu nwere latitude no na North
Ihe no n'okpuru nwere latitude no na South

Laka nke Lau bụ naanị asụsụ Central Sudanic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa
Ọ kacha nwee njikọ chiri anya na Kabba Laka nke Chad
Ndị Hausa na-ezo aka na ndị Laka nke Lau dị ka Lakawa
E dere asụsụ ahụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'etiti afọ 2010, a na-ezighi ezi dịka asụsụ Mbum tinyere Lau
Lau (Law) bụ asụsụ Jukunoid nke Lau LGA, Taraba State, Nigeria
Ndị na-asụ Lau na-ekwu na asụsụ ha na asusu Jukunoid dị iche iche a na-asụ na Kunini, Bandawa, na Jeshi

Laura Marie-Thérèse Ahtime bụ onye isi nke Seychelles National Bureau of Statistics
Ahtime sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tupu ọ nweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum ọ bụla, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ihe dịka afọ atọ ọ gara Mahadum Botswana, ebe ọ gụrụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ruo afọ anọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara nzere masta na Quantitative Development Economics na Mahadum Warwick, n'okpuru nkwado nke Chevening Scholarship
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Seychelles National Bureau of Statistics ọzọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, e mechara bulie ya n'ọkwa onye isi nchịkwa, wee bụrụ onye isi nchịk n'afọ 010
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na n'ozuzu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ 'na-achịkwa ụmụ nwanyị nke ukwuu'

N'okpuru nduzi Ahtime, Seychelles, nke n'afọ ndị gara aga ahụghị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ka ihe dị mkpa, ejirila ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, site na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na akwụkwọ akụkọ, na mmekọrịta mba ụwa mee ihe nke ukwuu
Ahtime kpaliri Seychelles ịghọ akụkụ nke General Data Dissemination System nke International Monetary Fund, Na ịdebanye aha na Special Data Disseminage Standard nke International Monetario Fund
Ọ bipụtakwara ọnụ ọgụgụ mbụ na atlas nke Seychelles, Ma nyochaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị njem nleta Seychelles
Ahtime bụ onye a họpụtara ahọpụta nke International Statistical Institute
Laura Eji ụra bụ ihe nkiri egwu dị mkpirikpi nke America nke 2020 nke Parker nke ụwa Finn dere, duzie, ma soro mepụta
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Caitlin Stasey na Lew Temple
Ọ ga-emesị bụrụ ihe na-akpali akpali maka ihe nkiri egwu Finn na-eme Smile (2022); ihe na-aga ndị na eme ka n'ihu nke Stasey gosipụtara na ímé ọrụ ya n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi

Laura El-Tantawy (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Britain na Ijipt na-ese foto nke bi na London na Cairo
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto akụkọ n'onwe ya na ọrụ onwe ya
A mụrụ El-Tantawy na England n'aka nne na nna ndị Ijipt ma kwaga Ijipt dị ka nwa ọhụrụ, na-etolite n'etiti ebe ahụ, Saudi Arabia na United States
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya na-ekwu na foto ya ' sitere na ajụjụ gbasara njirimara ya - na-enyocha nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gburugburu ebe obibi metụtara nzụlite ya
' Na Shadow of the Pyramids (2015) bịara site na 'ịlaghachi Ijipt iji chọpụta mgbọrọgwụ ya, ọ banyere n'ihe omume ndị dị mkpa na Tahir Square n'afọ 2011, wee nọrọ na-ese foto ihe omume ahụ dum
Na Shadow of the Pyramids, e depụtara ya maka Deutsche Börse Photography Prize na 2015
N'afọ 2020, El-Tantawy bụ onye mmeri nke W
Eugene Smith ego nye maka m ga-anwụ maka gị
A mụrụ El-Tantawy na Worcestershire, England, na 1980 site na nne na nna Ijipt wee tolite n'etiti Egypt, Saudi Arabia na United States
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Georgia dị na Athens, GA, n'afọ 2002 nwere ogo abụọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nakwa na 2002, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na Milwaukee Journal Sentinel na Sarasota Herald-Tribune
Na 2006, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto nweere onwe ya ka o nwee ike ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ nkeonwe
Ọ mezuru mkpakọrịta nyocha na Mahadum Oxford na 2009, wee nweta MA na nka na omume mgbasa ozi site na Mahadum Westminster, London, na 2011
N'afọ 2015, El-Tantawy bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, In the Shadow of the Pyramids
N'ịbụ nke magazin Burn na-akwado na mkpọsa ego, ọ na-elekwasị anya na Mgbanwe Egypt nke 2011

Creative Review kọwara ya dị ka 'foto ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ihe nkiri okporo ámá nke ìgwè mmadụ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na Kairo n'oge mgbanwe Jenụwarị na Tahrir Square, na-agwakọta na akụkọ ndị akaebe mpaghara, yana foto ezinụlọ ochie site na nwata ya na-etolite n'etiti Egypt, Saudi Arabia na US

E sere ya n'etiti afọ 2005-2014, usoro ahụ bụ ngwakọta na-akpali akpali nke foto, foto, na ihe oyiyi ndị ọzọ dị ike, na-adịghị ahụkebe, na-emetụta ihe ndị na-eme n'oge gara aga, ihe ndị na'ụzọ ziri ezi

' Gerry Badger, na-ahọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ maka ihe fotobuku kacha na Fotobookfestival na Kassel (nke ọ meriri), dere 'Ụdị ya dị egwu dị na ọdịnala kachasị mma nke akwụkwọ mkpesa ndị Japan, ma na-ejide ọgba aghara nke ihe omume ahụ nke ọma ebe ndị mmadụ na-eme ngagharị iwe n'etiti ogige ahụ ebe ndị ọzọ na-anwụ n'okporo ámá ndị gbara ya gburugburu

Na anya mbụ, ihe oyiyi ya na-egbuke egbuke, nke na-adịghị ahụkebe yiri ka ọ dị oke mma, mana mgbe ị banyere ma mụọ usoro ahụ n'ezie, na-aga site na olileanya na obi ụtọ ruo na enweghị olileanya, ike nke ọhụụ ya na-apụta ìhè, a na-ejikọkwa ihe niile na ụkpụrụ mmepụta dị mma na imewe mara mma, ma ọ bụghị nke siri ike
Usoro 'I'll Die for You' ya na-ekwu maka igbu onwe n'etiti ndị ọrụ ugbo India
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ El-Tantawy na-ekwu na foto ya ' sitere na ajụjụ gbasara njirimara ya - na-enyocha nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gburugburu ebe obibi metụtara nzụlite ya'

Laura Hughes nwere ike ịtụ aka na
Laura Hughes Lunde (1886-1966) bụ onye Canada na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị, onye na-ahụ Maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-eme udo
Ọ bụ onye na-eme udo na Toronto n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ (191418)
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha agha ahụ, ọ lụrụ di ma kwaga Chicago, ebe ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọtụtụ ihe gbasara obodo n'oge ndụ ya niile, ọkachasị ịlụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị na maka imeziwanye agụmakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Laura Hughes na Toronto, Canada n'afọ 1886
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke James Laughlin Hughes na Adaline Marean Hughes, ndị nkụzi abụọ a ma ama na ndị na-eme mgbanwe na Toronto
Nna ya bụ onye isi nyocha nke ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Toronto na nne ya bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara mbụ na Toronto
James Hughes kwadoro mmegharị nke njide, megidere ntaramahụhụ anụ ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma bụrụ onye kwere na ịdị ọcha
Ọ kwadoro Alaeze Ukwu Britain, ma malite òtù cadet n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Canada
Nwanne nna ya bụ Sir Sam Hughes, Minista nke Ndị Agha n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ Laura Hughes rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ igwe ihe, wee bipụta akwụkwọ nke kọwara ọnọdụ ọrụ mmegbu ọ hụrụ
Dabere na ahụmịhe ya, ọ gbara mbọ maka mgbanwe na iwu ọrụ
O so guzobe otu Canadian Labour Party
Laura Hughes na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị na-ahụ maka udo n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Nwanne nna ya Sir Sam Hughes 'nyere ya ọkara akụkụ nke ala ahịhịa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-ahapụ mmasị ya n'ọrụ udo
' Ọ jụrụ
Ọ gara nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị na The Hague n'afọ 1915
Na nzukọ a, e guzobere Kọmitii Mba Nile nke Ụmụ nwanyị maka Udo Na-adịgide Adịgide, na onye America Jane Addams dị ka onye isi oche
Ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị Canada jụrụ ịga, na-achọpụta na iguzosi ike n'ihe ha nye Alaeze Ukwu ahụ siri ike karịa njikọ ha na pacifism
Ndị nta akụkọ boro ụmụnwanyị ndị gara ebubo na ha 'dabara n'okpuru mmetụta nke ndị Germany na-akpa nkata na nzukọ udo a na-ekwu na ọ bụ
Mgbe ha si Europe lọta, Hughes na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị sonyeere Toronto Suffrage Association na Women's Social-Democratic League iji guzobe Canadian Women's Peace Party (WPP)
Ndị guzobere WPP bụ Elsie Charlton na Alice Amelia Chown
WPP nwere njikọ na Women't International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF)
Hughes bụ onye nhazi maka alaka Canada nke WILPF
Na ngwụcha Ọktọba 1916, o dere na alaka ICWPP na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mpaghara ọ bụla nke Columbia na-eme ka agha dị ndụ
N'adịghị ka ụmụnwanyị ndị ọzọ na-eme udo, o yiri ka ọ zere iji arụmụka ụmụnwanyị
Hughes dere n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma n'afọ 1916,
Hughes sonyeere ndị otu Independent Labour Party (ILP)
Hughes kwuru okwu n'ihu ọha megide ịdebanye aha n'ime ndị agha mgbe nke a ghọrọ nsogbu n'afọ 1917, SDPC toro ya maka nguzo ya
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị megidere pacifism

Woman's Century zaghachiri na ngwụcha oge okpomọkụ 1917 na akụkọ na Hughes na Harriet Dunlop Prenter, nke akọwapụtara dị ka 'ndị suffragists a ma ama', jikọtara njikọ dị n'etiti ikike ịtụ Votu na ime udo na Ontario
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Jessie Campbell MacIver, si kwuo, 'National Union na Ontario Equal Franchise Association ekwuputala onwe ha ugboro ugboro dị ka ndị na-ajụ kpamkpam ajụjụ ọ bụla nke udo
Akwụkwọ ọ bụla na-ahụ maka udo nke a natara site na Hague na ebe ndị ọzọ ka ndị otu a na-etinye n'ime nkata akwụkwọ mkpofu
Hughes na Prenter yiri ka ha na-etinye aka n'ọgụ iduzi ndị na-ahụ Maka udo ụmụnwanyị na Toronto
N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1917, Laura Hughes lụrụ Erling Lunde nke Chicago, onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche, wee kwaga Chicago
Ka ọ na-erule Nọvemba afọ 1918, ọ bụ nne ọhụrụ
Ọ ga-enwe ụmụnwoke abụọ, Chester na Leif

O setịpụkwara onwe ya ọrụ nke 'ịchọ ezi ọchịchị'

Ọ bụ onye otu 'Big 19' na mbido afọ 1950, otu ndị na-akwado ndị mmadụ nke kpaliri gọọmentị ime obodo ịlụso mpụ a haziri ahazi ọgụ

Laura Ikeji-Kanu (a mụrụ na abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa atọ n'ime Otu puku afọ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na asatọ ( March 15, 1988)) bu onye Naijiria na-eme blọgụ ejiji na onye ọchụnta ego

Na Ọnwa Mee na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa (2017), Akara ntutu Nigeria BK Unique Hair Inc binyere aka na akwụkwọ iwere Laura dịka onye nnọchi anya ika ya na Rita Dominic

Na ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (2018,) ụlọ ahịa dị n'ịntanetị na onye nkwado nke Big Brother Naija season 2 na 3 'Payporte' bịnyere aka na akwụkwọ iwere Laura dị ka onye nnọchianya ika

Na abalị anọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (4 July 2018), weputara isi ísì ya Ezughị oke nke edekọtara erere tupu ụbọchị ewepụtara ya ka ọ kwupụtachara maka orire ya

Agbam nkwụ ha hiiri odu n'obodo ya dị na Nkwerre LGA, steeti Imo na abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa (28 Jenụwarị 2017)
Na ọnwa Julaị na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa (July 2017), di na nwunye a nabakọtara nwa mbụ ha ọnụ, Ryan Kanu, na Texas, United States of America
Na abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Maachị ọfọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (15 Maachị 2018), o jiri Mercedes-Benz ọhụrụ mee ememe ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya

Otu ECOWAS Female Parliamentarians Association (ECOWAS) na ụbọchị Mọnde, abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Mei, na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (Monday May 21, 2018) na Abuja, kwanyere osote onye isi ala Nigeria, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo, nnukwute onte azụmahịa, Alhaji Aliko Dangote nakwa Davido, Don Jazzy, Laura Ikeji na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Laura Elaine Jackson (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 17, 1991) bụ onye bọọlụ na onye nkuzi bọọlụ nke Jamaica nke a mụrụ na England nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti maka otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Jamaica
Jackson bụ ngwaahịa nke Arsenal WFC na Leyton Orient FC
O mere mpụta nke mbụ ya na Watford FC n'afọ 2007
Jackson gara Mahadum Syracuse na Iona College, nke ha abụọ dị na United States
Jackson mere mpụta nke mbụ ya na mmeri enyi na enyi megide Chile na 28 Febụwarị 2019
Laura Jeanne Kelly (amuru Jenụwarị 24, 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America na-eje ozi kemgbe 2019 dị ka gọvanọ nke iri anọ na asatọ nke Kansas
Onye otu Democratic Party, ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara nke iri na asatọ na Kansas Sineti site na 2005 ruo 2019
Kelly zọrọ ọchịchị maka ọkwa gọvanọ na ntuli aka 2018 wee merie onye nnọchiteanya Republican, Kris Kobach
A mụrụ Kelly na New York City site n'ezinụlọ ndị agha na-akwaga mgbe mgbe ma nọrọ na mba ofesi
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bradley, na-enweta nzere bachelọ sayensị na akparamaagwa, yana na Mahadum Indiana, na-enweta Master of Science na ntụrụndụ ọgwụgwọ
Kelly ruburu ọrụ dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke Kansas Recreation and Park Association
A họpụtara Kelly na Kansas Sineti na Nọvemba 2004, e mesịa o jee ozi dị ka Minority Whip
Na 2007, a gwara ya ka ọ jee ozi dị ka onye otu n'ime Ranking Minority nke otú Kansas Ways and Means Committee
Kelly nyere aka guzobe mmemme onyinye dị iche iche maka ọganihu nwata na steeti Kansas
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 2009 Kelly tụlere obere oge maka ịgba ọsọ maka mpaghara ọgbakọ nke abụọ nke Kansas
N'oge nnọkọ omebe iwu 2011–2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnyemaaka onye ndu ntakiri nke Sineti Kansas
Na Disemba 15, 2017, Kelly kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ okwa gọvanọ nke Kansas
Na obere ntuli aka nke Democratic Patị, ọ zọrọ ọchịchị megide onye bụbu onye isi obodo Wichita Carl Brewer na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ Kansas nke Agriculture Josh Svaty
Na Mee 24, 2018, Kelly kwupụtara onye sinetọ Steeti Lynn Rogers dị ka onye ga-abu onye osote ya na ntuli aka ahu
Na August 7, ọ meriri Brewer na Svaty, na-enweta pasent iri ise na otu na ọkara nke votu atụrụ
Onye bụbu Gọvanọ Kansas na onye ode akwụkwọ ahụike na ọrụ mmadụ na United Steeti bu Kathleen Sebelius kwadoro Kelly na ntuli aka ahu
Ndị ọrụ gọọmentị iri abụo na asatọ ugbu a ma ọ bụ ndị bụbu Republican kwadokwara ya, nke gụnyere Gọvanọ Kansas Bill Graves ; onye bụbu onye omebe iwu steeti, Lt
Gọvanọ na sinetọ mba United Steeti Sinetọ Sheila Frahm, Lt
Gov

Gary Sherrer, Commissioner nke mkpuchi ihe onwunweSandy Praeger, onye ịsị nke ụlọ omebe iwu sineti Dick Bond, onye ịsị nke ụlọ omebe iwu sineti Dave Kerr, osote onye ịsị nke ụlọ omebe iwu sineti John Vratil, Onye ịsị nke otu kachasị na sineti Tim Emert na Lana Oleen; ndị sinetọ Barbara Allen, David Wysong, Wint Winter, Jr, Pete Brungardt, Ruth Teichman, Barbara Bollier, Audrey Langworthy, Terrie Huntington, Bob VanCrum, na Alicia Salisbury; Ndị nnọchiteanya JoAnn Pottorff, Ginger Barr, Jim Yonally, Jim Lowther, Fred Lorentz, na onye nnọchiteanya na onyeịsị oche nke Republican Patị Rochelle Chronister; Onye nnọchi anya mba Republican Don Johnston; na ndị nnọchiteanya Joy Koesten na Charles Roth
Graves kwuru, 'Laura Kelly bụ naanị onye Democrat m kwadoro maka ọfịs ọha
Ihe mere m ji eme nke ahụ ugbu a bụ n'ihi na m kwenyere na ọtụtụ ihe dị na steeti Kansas
Amara m Laura kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ
O nwere àgwà niile na ike niile anyị na-achọ iji duzie steeti ahụ n'oge ihe isi ike a na iweghachite steeti ahụ ka ọ dịbu

Laura nwere iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe, amakwaara m na ọ ga-akpọkọta ndị Kansas n'agbanyeghị otu ọ bụla iji dozie nsogbu ndi na-eche anyị n'ihu' Onye bụbu onye omebe iwu Republican steeti Tim Owens bụ onye na-echekwa ego mkpọsa maka onye ndọrọndọrọ onwe onye Kansas Greg Orman, mana ọ rituru n'ọkwa ahụ na October 30 wee kwado Kelly, na-ekwenye na ọ bụ naanị ya nwere ike imeri Kobach
Kelly kọwara ebumnobi nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dika nke ga-agbanwe mmefu ego, agụmakwụkwọ na 'ọdachi' ndị ọzọ nke ọchịchị Sam Brownback
Ọ kọwapụtara onye mmegide ya, onye amatagoro maka enweghị ikike ya na ntuli aka na atụmatụ iwu megide ndị kwabatara, dị ka 'Sam Brownback on steroids'
Na November 6, Kelly meriri onye Patị Republican họpụtaraSecretary of State Kris Kobach, na-enweta ihe fọdụrụ ntakịrị ka ọ bụrụ pasent iri anọ na itoolu nke votu
Na Disemba 23, 2020, Kelly kwupụtara na ọ ga-aputa maka ntuli aka ọzọ na 2022 na mgbasa ozi pọdkastị o mere na Kansas Reflector
A na-ewere Kelly dị ka onye Democrat na -agafeghị oke
Kelly katọrọ nnwale Kansas, nwale mmefu ego nke Kansas, nke onye bu ya ụzọ Sam Brownback nke butere mbelata n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, okporo ụzọ na nchekwa ọha
Ọ ga-amasị ya ịgbanweghari mgbanwe ndị ahụ ma rụtụ aka na mgbe enwere nnukwu ụkọ mmefu ego, ọ gbaliri wee jikọta Patị abụọ ahụ iji wee hazie usoro mmefu ego nke ọma n'etinyeghi ego n'utu isi
N'afọ 2019, Kelly jiri ikike ya wee kwusi nkwado iwu Republican abụọ ga-ebelata ụtụ isi ego steeti na Kansas

O kwuru na steeti ahụ enweghị ike ịnagide mbelata ahụ, nakwa na iwu Republican ahụ ga-ebelata ego ha nwetara rue nde dọla narị abụọ na ịrị anọ na ise n'ime afọ atọ, nke ga-ebute “nsogbu gbasara mmefu ego na-enweghị isi” wee mepụta mperi n'usoro mmefu ego
Mkpebi Kelly, yana ego steeti nwetara karia etu a na-atụ anya, mere ka steeti ahụ malite afọ mmefu ego nke afọ 2020 n'ego karịrị otu ijeri dọla na otu narị nde dọla
Ọ chọrọ iji ụfọdụ n'ime ego nchekwa ahụ wee kwụọ ụgwọ maka usoro ezumike nka steeti
Na nzaghachi nke ọrịa COVID-19 na United States, Kelly, dị ka ndị gọvanọ ndị ọzọ, mere ihe iji kwụsị mgbasa nke nje SARS-CoV-2, nke na-akpata ọrịa coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19)

O kwuputara ọnọdụ mberede na Machị 12 na-esote ọnwụ COVID-19 nke steeti mbụ, wee wepụta mmachibido iwu ụbọchị iri isii ma machibido nnọkọ ọha mmadụ karịrị iri ise yana nkwụsịtụ na mmechi ụlọ ọrụ na Machị 16
Na Machị 18, mgbe ọ na-ekwu maka nsogbu ahụ a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya, Kelly duziri njedebe akwụkwọ nye ndị niile nọ na klaasị K-12 maka afọ akwụkwọ fọdụrụnụ, na-eme Kansas steeti mbụ na-eme nke ahụ
Na Machị 23, iji luso mgbasa nke nje a ọgụ, ọ machibidoro nnọkọ ọha mmadụ karịrị iri

Na Machị 28, n'agbanyeghị ọnwụ na ọrịa na-abawanye, Kelly nyere iwu ka onye ọ bụla “nọrọ n'ụlọ” nke nyere ndị niile bi ebe ahụ iwu ka ha nọrọ n'ụlọ, ewezuga njem maka ọrụ dị mkpa, azụmahịa dị mkpa (dịka njem iji nweta nlekọta ahụike ma ọ bụ ihe oriri), na mmega ahụ n'èzí

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ steeti iri abụọ na anọ enyelarị iwu yiri nke ahụ, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ pasent iri asaa na ise nke ndị Kansas bu ndi iwu yiri nke a sitere na iwu mpaghara metụtalari, ebe ọ bụ na mpaghara iri abụọ na ise na Kansas, nke gụnyere ndị kachasị n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, enweelarị iwu ọnụnọ n'ụlọ

Kelly katọrọ mmeghachi omume nwayọ nke gọọmentị Trump nke oma na nsogbu ahụ yana ọdịda gọọmentị etiti inye Kansas na steeti ndị ọzọ akụrụngwa nchebe zuru oke nke onwe (dị ka ihe mkpuchi, uwe aka na uwe) na ngwa nnwale

Kansas City Star katọrọ mweghachi Kelly nke ọgwụ mgbochi COVID-19 na akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akwa ariri, na-ekwu na 'O dị nnọọ ka Kansas a naghị arụ ọrụ nke ọma, okwu na-emegharị emeghari megide Kelly na nchịkwa ọ na-edu', na-ekwu maka ozi data nke CDC na-egosi nọ Kansas n'akụkụ ala nke ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi

Ndị otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu Kansas, gụnyere onye otu Democrat Sharice Davids, akpọkuola Kelly ka o meekwu ihe iji lebara nlọghachi azụ nke ndị na-azọrọ na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ na-achọ ịkwụ ụgwọ enweghị ọrụ site na mmemme gọọmentị etiti iji nyere ndị bi na ya aka ịrụ ọrụ n'ihi ọrịa ahụ
Na Nọvemba 16, 2020, Kelly megharịrị oku ya maka ndị omebe iwu isonye na ya n'iwepụta iwu maka mkpuchi imi na ọnụ

N'ihi na iwu Kelly na nnọkọ ọha na-emetụta ememe Ista Sunday na ụlọ ụka, Republican-majority Legislative Coordinating Council (LCC), otu ndị isi nke ụlọ omebe iwu Kansas, mere ntuli aka iji wee kagbuo iwu ya n'Eprel 9, 2020, na-ekwusi ike na iwu ahụ mebiri iwu okpukperechi n'efu
Onye isi ọka iwu otu Republican Derek Schmidt megidere iwu Kelly, na-enye akwụkwọ ikike ịkpọ ya mmegide nke iwu steeti Kansas, ma gbaa ndị mmanye iwu ume ka ha ghara ịmanye ya

Kelly kpọrọ nke a 'enweghị ọrụ na-awụ akpata oyi'; n'oge ahụ, enweela ihe karịrị otu puku mmadụ ndị nwere oria COVID-19, yana ọtụtụ ọnwụ COVID-19 enwetara, na Kansas, na n'ime iri na otu achọpụtara ebe e si nweta ha, atọ sitere na nnọkọ okpukpe na nso nso a
Ọ mara mkpebi LCC aka na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu Kansas

N'ịgbaso arụmụka ọnụ ngwa ngwa (nke emere na ịntanetị site na nnọkọ nke emere n'ekwenti Zoom ), Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu steeti ji otu olu weghachite iwu Kelly, na-ekwubi na iwu nchịkwa ya dị irè yana na LCC enweghị ikike ịkwatu ya
Otu izu ka e mesịrị, na n'ikpe dị iche ekpere, Onye ọkà ikpe nke mpaghara Wichita na mba US
John W
Broomes nyere iwu mgbochi obere oge igbochi mmanye nke Kelly nye ụlọ ụka abụọ (otu na Junction City, nke ọzọ na Dodge City )
na-ekwu na mmachi ahụ mebiri nnwere onwe okpukperechi na ikike ikwu okwu

Ikpe ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe Kelly nyechara iwu nchịkwa COVID-19 ọhụrụ nwere obere ihe mgbochi nke malitere ọrụ na Mee 4, 2020, n'okpuru nkwekọrịta nke nyere ndị ụka ohere ịnwe nnukwu ememe ụka ha ebe mmadụ buturu ibu ga-anọ mana ka nọsapụ anọsapụ

Dị ka gọvanọ, Kelly kpaliri ndị omebe iwu Kansas nke otu Republican na-achịkwa ịnakwere mgbasawanye Medicaid n'okpuru Iwu Nlekọta Ọnụ, iji nye mkpuchi nlekọta ahụike nye mmadụ rụrụ otu narị na puku iri ise bu ndi Kansas
Atụmatụ mgbasawanye Medicaid agafeela Ụlọ omebe iwu Kansas na 2017, mana Brownback akwadoghi ya

Na Jenụwarị 2020, mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke mmegide Republican gasịrị, Kelly meriri nkwekọrịta nke pati abụọ ahụ ya na onye isi ndị ọtụ Sineti Republican Jim Denning nke mere Kansas steeti nke iri atọ na asatọ ịnakwere mgbasawanye Medicaid
N'okpuru nkwekọrịta ahụ, na Jenụwarị 1, 2021, agbasawanye mkpuchi Medicaid nye ndị bi na Kansas na-enweta ihe ruru pasent otu narị na iri atọ na asatọ nke ọkwa ịda ogbenye gọọmenti etiti
Na 2021, Kelly kpọrọ oku maka mgbasawanye Medicaid ọzọ, na-atụ aro iji ego enwetara site na nkwado nke wii wii ahụike
Kelly akwadowokwa imezi KanCare ka ọtụtụ ụmụ amaala nwee ike ịnweta mkpuchi ahụike
Kelly jikọtara Ngalaba Ụmụaka na Ọrụ Ezinụlọ na Ngalaba Ịka nká na Ọrụ Nkwarụ wee mee ka ọ buruzie ngalaba nke ọrụ mmadụ

Na Jenụwarị 2020, Kelly kpọrọ oku maka mgbanwe dị ukwuu na Ụlọọgwụ steeti Osawatomie, ụlọ ọgwụ steeti nwere nsogbu ogologo oge nke enyochaworo site n'aka ndị na-ahụ maka gọọmentị etiti gbasara nchekwa, nchekwa, na ọgwụgwọ
Ọ kwadoro atụmatụ maka ego steeti maka ụlọ ọrụ nsogbu ahụike uche na steeti ahụ
Kelly ekwuola na ya ga-achọ ịhụ na a na-akwado ụlọ akwụkwọ Kansas ma lekwasị anya n'ịkwalite arumọrụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ Kansas ka ọ bụrụ asọmpi n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ ga-edozi ụkọ ndị nkuzi na steeti niile ma melite ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị nkuzi
Ọ ga-amasịkwa ya ịgbasa mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ ntakịrị na ịbawanye nhọrọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-agbaso agụmakwụkwọ ka elu
Na ọrụ gọọmentị mbụ ya dị ka gọvanọ, Kelly bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ iwu na-eweghachite nchebe ịkpa ókè ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ steeti ndị bu ndi otu LGBT nke Gọvanọ Sam Brownback kpochapụrụ na 2015

Kelly megidere mmegharị mgbochi ite ime nke Republican na-atụpụta na Kansas Constitution na mbido 2020, na-ekwu na ọ ga-eweghachi Kansas na ' oge ọchịchịrị' N'ime arụmụka jọgburu onwe ya, ụlọ ọrụ steeti enwetaghi votu anọ fọdụrụ nke ga-eme ka okwu ahụ nweta ọnụọgụ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ achọrọ iji tinye ya na ntuli aka steeti
Na Jenụarị 2021, ndị omebe iwu Kansas mere ntuli aka n'akụkụ otu pati iji tinye mmezigharị echere na iwu steeti na ntuli aka nke August 2022
Kelly lụrụ Dọkịta Ted Daughety, ọkachamara n'ọrịa akpa ume na nsogbu ihi ụra, kemgbe 1979
Ha kwagara Topeka na 1986
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ toro eto, Kathleen na Molly Daughety
Kelly bụ onye ụka Katọlik
