Laura Kurgan bụ ónyé South African architect na osote prọfesọ na Columbia University Graduate School of Architecture, Planning and Preservation (GSAPP)
Ọ na-eduzi interdisciplinary Center for Spatial Research na GSAPP, nke o guzobere dị ka Spatial Information Design Lab na 2004
Kemgbe afọ 1995, ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ nkè ya na New York City nkè a na-akpọ Laura Kurgan Design
É nyela ya Rockefeller Fellowship na Graham Foundation Grant
E gosipụtara ọrụ Kurgan na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere ZKM Karlsruhe, Museum of Modern Art, New Museum na Venice Architecture Biennial
N'afọ 2013, MIT Press bipụtara akwụkwọ ya 'Close Up at a Distance Mapping, Technology and Politics'
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha mmetụta nke teknụzụ ọhụụ nkè ógè a gụnyere GPS, mgbasa ozi nke data site na ịntanetị, na Google Earth na eserese mmekọrịta anụ ahụ na nke mebere emepe
Na nyocha Jennifer S
Light nke akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-ekwu na akụkụ kachasị ike nke isi mbido n'akwụkwọ ahụ bụ na ọ 'na-ewebata ndị ọkachamara na-emepụta ihe na ụdị ọhụrụ nkè mgbasa ozi'
E gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na mkparịta ụka ya na Neil Brenner na Mahadum Princeton's School of Architecture n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2013

N'ịbụ nke e kere na Spatial Information Design Lab na Mahadum Columbia na Justice Mapping Center, Million Dollar Blocks bụ ókwú Laura Kurgan na Eric Cadora chepụtara iji kọwaa ego ndị na-atụ ụtụ isi nwéré ike iji mee ka ndị mmadụ nọrọ n'otu obodo
Ọrụ ahụ jiri ozi sitere na usoro ikpe mpụ mepụta map nke gosipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ búrú ibu nke ndị mmadụ a tụrụ mkpọrọ site na mpaghara ole na ole na ọbọdọ ise nke America
N'akwụkwọ édémédé ya na The Atlantic banyere ọrụ ahụ, Kurgan dere 'Nationwide, a na-eme atụmatụ na ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị na-ahapụ ụlọ mkpọrọ ka e jidere n'ime afọ atọ
Ịkwaga n'ihu n'etiti ụlọ mkpọrọ na mpaghara ole na ole a na-ahụ ányà abụghị naanị na ọ na-efu ego na-eme ka ndụ obodo ghara ịdị mma
N'afọ 2008, e gosipụtara onyinyo sitere na ọrụ ahụ, nke akpọrọ 'Architecture and Justice 1', na Museum of Modern Art na New York City maka ihe ngosi Design and the Elastic Mind
Ebe ọ bụ na Museum of Modern Art chịkọtara ọrụ ahụ

N'ime édémédé màkà ihe ngosi nke afọ 2008, n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá, e gosipụtara map Brooklyn site na ọrụ ahụ ọzọ na Museum of Modern Art màkà ihe ngosi ya Scenes for a New Heritage Contemporary Art from the Collection

N'ime katalọgụ màkà ihe ngosi Design and the Elastic Mind, nke ónyé nhazi Paola Antonelli dezigharịrị, ónyé na-akụzi ihe n'ọbọdọ ukwu Peter Hall kwuru na ọrụ ahụ, 'na-enye ụdị ihe atụ ọhụrụ màkà nyocha dị oke egwu'
Emere ya na ndị otu sitere na Spatial Information Design Lab, Pen American Center na Brown Institute for Media Innovation, ọrụ a nyochara nkwupụta n'efu n'ịntanetị na China
Dị ka onye isi nchọpụta, Kurgan duuru ndị otu nchọpụta ya n'inyocha na ịhụ ụzọ ndị ọrụ ịntanetị China na-eji iji nweta ma sonyere n'akụkụ nke weebụ nke a na-egbochi na mbà ahụ
Laura Mattiazzi bụ onye China bụ onye ọru banki
Ọ bi na Melbourne
A mụrụ ya na Mainland China ebe o tolitere ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ mechara gaa RMIT University di na Melbourne, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate na Finance na Economics
Ọ nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ahụmahụ n'ihe gbasara banki na Asia na Ostraliya
Ọ sonyeere National Australia Bank na 1999
Ọ bụ Onye Isi nke Asia Business Development maka National Australia Bank Agribusiness Asia Desk

Laura Nikolich bụ onye na emepụta egwuregwu na onye na eme mmemme nke rụrụ ọrụ maka Parker Brothers na mbido afọ 1980 ebe ọ bụ naanị onye mmepe maka egwuregwu Atari 2600 nke 1982 Spider-Man ma hazie mbipụta ColecoVision nke Frogger II ThreeeDeep!
Laura Nikolich graduated in 1976 with a bachelor's degree in engineering technology from University of South Florida
Real-time programming in assembly language gave her skills useful for the emerging video game industry
Laura Nikolich bụ onye mmemme nke ise e goro na Parker Brothers na 1981 na nke anọ e goro maka mmepe Atari 2600
Nikolich rụrụ ọrụ naanị ya ọnwa isii na egwuregwu mbụ da bere na Spider-Man
Na-arụ ọrụ na njedebe nke usoro ahụ, o mepụtara ya dị ka egwuregwu na-agagharị n'elu, nke siri ike ịme pụta
A tọha pụrụ Spider-Man na 1982, kwalite ya site na mgbasa ozi telivishọn, ọ bụkwa ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe Spider-Man gasịrị, Nikolich mepụ tara egwuregwu Care Bears, nke a na-ewe pụtaghị
A kwụsịrị egwuregwu ahụ n'ihi na, dị ka Nikolich si kwuo, ahịa amaghị ihe ha chọrọ
Nikolich nwere obi ụtọ maka ọrụ ya na Care Bears n'ihi ihe ịma aka ya
Ọrụ ya n'ịchịkwa sprites mere ka ihe osise ahụ dịkwuo ndụ ma na-amasị ndị mmadụ
Laura Nyahuye (a mụrụ ya na Zimbabwe) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Coventry, United Kingdom
Ọ tọrọ ntọala MAOKWO, otu nzukọ nka obodo
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ịchọ mma ahụ
N'afọ 2021, o mere Queen's Baton maka 2022 Commonwealth Games
Laura Samuel (amụrụ na 19 Febụwarị na afọ 1991) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain nke na-asọ mpi na ịwụli elu atọ
O nwere ihe kacha mma nke 1409 (Page Àtụ Fraction/stylescss has no content
ft 2+1⁄2 in) maka ihe omume ahụ, nke na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke atọ n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị Britain
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na 2014 Commonwealth Games nakwa na 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics
A mụrụ ya na Leicester, ọ malitere itinye aka na egwuregwu mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na-enwe mmasị mgbe ndị nkụzi gara hụ ụmụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ sonyeere Leicester Coritanian Athletics Club ma mesịa sonye na otu egwuregwu nke Mahadum Loughborough, mgbe ọ malitere ịmụ ihe n'ebe ahụ
Na mbido Samuel lekwasịrị anya na ihe omume ọsọ ọsọ dị mkpirikpi, mana ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007 ọ malitere ilekwasị anya na ịwụli elu
O meriri na ọzụzụ ahụ na 2007 English Schools Championships ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'afọ sochirinụ

N'afọ 2009, ọ gbanwere na ịwụli elu okpukpu atọ ma nke a mere ka ọ dị elu ozugbo n'ọkwa mba ọ meriri n'ọkwá ụlọ akwụkwọ Bekee, ọ bịara nke anọ asọmupi ndị okenye nke British Athletics, ma setịpụ ihe kacha mma nke 1298 m (42 in)
O meriri n'asọmupi mba kachasị elu na triple jump n'afọ 2010

Ọ gara n'ihu na-asọmupi na asọmpi mba ụwa mbụ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ma bụrụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics, na-etinye ihe ndekọ nke ndị Britain nke 1375 ( 1+1⁄4 in) iji bụrụ nke abụọ n'azụ Dailenys Alcántara kachasị amasị ya
Samuel meriri n'asọmupi Britain nke atọ n'ime ụlọ na n'èzí n'afọ 2011, ma mee nke mbụ ya na IAAF Diamond League circuit, na-etinye nke asaa na London Grand Prix
O ruru ihe kachasị mma ya n'afọ 2012 ma kwughachi ya dị ka onye mmeri UK n'èzí na 2012 na 2013
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na onye nkuzi Aston Moore nke Birchfield Harriers otu n'ime ndị nkuzi na-awụli elu na mba ahụ
Ọ gara n'ime ụlọ na-enweghị onye mmeri na 2014, na-enwe mmeri na London Indoor Games na Botnia Games tupu ọ were aha ime ụlọ nke Britain
Na British Championships n'èzí, Yamilé Aldama kụrụ ya nke abụọ, na-eweta njedebe nke afọ anọ Samuel na ihe omume mba
A họpụtara ha abụọ ka ha nọchite anya England na 2014 Commonwealth Games
Samuel meriri onye obodo ya tọrọ ya na nke ikpeazụ ka Aldama na-amaliteghị asọmupi ahụ na Glasgow
Samuel wụliri akara kachasị mma nke 1409 ( 2+1⁄2 in) -agbakwunye ihe karịrị sentimita iri atọ na afọ anọ ya kacha mma
Nke a mere ka o nweta ihe nrite ọlaọcha na-atụghị anya ya n'azụ Kimberly Williams nke Jamaica
Ọrụ a mere ka ọ bụrụ nke atọ na ndepụta atọ nke ndị Britain na-agba ọsọ atọ mgbe Ashia Hansen na Aldama gasịrị

Laura Wheeler Waring (Ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Mée, 1887 rụo ụbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya nke ndị Africa America ama ama nkè o mèrè n'oge Harlem Renaissance
Ọ kụziri nka ihe karịrị afọ 30 na Mahadum Cheyney na Pennsylvania
A mụrụ Laura Wheeler na Mee 16, 1887, na Hartford, Connecticut, nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii, nke Mary (née Freeman) na Reverend Robert Foster Wheeler

Nné ya bụ nwá nwanyị nkè Amos Noë Freeman, ónyé ụkọchukwu Presbyterian, na Christiana Williams Freeman, bụ ónyé ama ama na ọrụ mgbochi ịgba ohu, gụnyere Underground Railroad na Portland, Maine na Brooklyn, New York
Nna ya bụ pastọ nke Talcott Street Congregational Church, chọọchị ojii mbụ na Connecticut
O sitere n'ezinụlọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ọgbọ ise gàrà aga nke ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji tupu ya

N'afọ 1906, Waring malitere ịkụzi ihe nwa oge na Philadelphia na Cheyney Training School for Teachers (nke e mechara kpọwa Cheyney State Teachers College ma bụrụ nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Mahadum Cheyney)) Ọ kụziri nka na egwu na Cheyney ruo 1914 mgbè ọ gàrà mba ofesi na Europe
Ọrụ ya na Cheyney na-ewe ógè, ebe ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ma na-achọkarị ya ịrụ ọrụ mgbede na Sunday
Nke a hapụrụ ya n'enweghị oge dị ukwuu iji mee nka
1906-1914 bụ afọ dị nwayọ màkà ọrụ nka ya n'ihi nke a
Waring rụrụ ọrụ ogologo oge na-akụzi nka, mgbe ụfọdụ na-etinye oge okpomọkụ na-akụziri ise ihe na Harvard na Columbia maka ego ọzọ
Mgbe ọ na-aga Hartford Public High School, a matara Wheeler maka nkà ya na eserese
O mechara gaa Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts
N'afọ 1914, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, e nyekwara ya A
William Emlen Cresson Memorial Travel Scholarship iji mụọ nka na Louvre na Paris
Waring so n'ime ndị na-ese ihe gosipụtara na ngosi mbụ nke nka ndị Africa America, nke William E
Harmon Foundation mere na 1927
Ọ bụ Harmon Foundation nyere ya ọrụ ka o mee foto nke ndị Africa America a ma ama ma họrọ ụfọdụ ndị metụtara Harlem Renaissance
N'oge na-adịghị anya, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ America, gụnyere Corcoran Gallery na Washington, DC, Brooklyn Museum, na Philadelphia Museum of Art
O nwere foto ugbu a na Smithsonian National Portrait Gallery
N'afọ 1944, asatọ n'ime foto ya gụnyere na Portraits of Outstanding Americans of Negro Origin Isiokwu nke foto ya gụnyere Marian Anderson, WEB DuBois, James Weldon Johnson, na Mary White Ovington
E wezụga ihe ngosi mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na Mahadum Howard na 1949, ekwenyeghị na egosiri ihe osise Waring mere na Paris ma amaghị ebe ha nọ
Na mgbakwunye na eserese, Waring dere ma gosipụta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi ya na ezigbo enyi na onye edemede, Jessie Redmon Fauset
Fauset sonyeere Waring na njem ya niile na France n'oge a
Waring dere akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, 'Dark Algiers and White,' maka magazin The Crisis nke NAACP, e mechara bipụta ya
Laura gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hartford Public High School na 1906 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts na Philadelphia, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1914
Laura Wheeler lụrụ Walter Waring na June 23, 1927
Ọ si Philadelphia ma rụọ ọrụ na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze dị ka onye nkuzi
Mgbe ha lụrụ di na nwunye mbụ, ego dị ụkọ, n'ihi ya, ha yigharịrị njem ezumike ha ruo afọ abụọ
N'afọ 1929, ndị di na nwunye ọhụrụ ahụ gara France, nọrọ ihe karịrị ọnwa abụọ n'ebe ahụ
Ha enweghị ụmụ
A maara Wheeler ka ọ zere mgbasa ozi
Waring nwụrụ na Febụwarị 3, 1948, n'ụlọ ya na Philadelphia mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, Howard University Gallery of Art na Washington, DC
mere ihe ngosi nka iji sọpụrụ ya
E tinyere ọrụ Waring na ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum
Laure Isabelle Kuetey (amụrụ na 6 Machị 1971) bụ onye Benin na-agba ọsọ nke na-ahụ maka 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na ihe omume 200 mita ụmụ nwanyị
O sonyere na ihe omume mita 200 na 1996 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ, na ihe omume 100 mita na 1992 na 2000 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ n'otu n'otu
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụkwa onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ maka Benin na 1996 na 2000 emume mmeghe Olimpik nke okpomọkụ
Lauren B
Davis (née Cargill) bụ onye odee Canada
A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Achịcha Kwa ụbọchị anyị, bụ nke akpọrọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2011 nke The Globe na Mail na The Boston Globe
na The Empty Room, akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara ị alcoholụbiga mmanya ókè
O bi ugbu a na Princeton, New Jersey ya na di ya, Zurich Financial Executive, Ron Davis, na nkịta ha, Bailey (The Rescuepoo)
Amụrụ na Montreal, Quebec, na Septemba 5, 1955, Davis biri na France ihe karịrị afọ iri (1994-2004), ma bi ugbu a na Princeton, New Jersey
Ná mmalite nke ọrụ ya, Davis bụ onye ndụmọdụ Timothy Findley, na Humber College School for Writers, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-abụ onye ndụmọdụ (2007-2009)
Ọ gara aga onye nchịkọta akụkọ European maka nyocha akwụkwọ akụkọ Canada site na 1999 ruo 2002
Davis abụrụla onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji Humber maka ndị ode akwụkwọ na mmemme MFA nke Mahadum Guelph
Ọ kuziri ide akụkọ ifo na WICE (Paris); Mahadum America nke Paris; Nzukọ ndị ode akwụkwọ Geneva; na Nzukọ Ndị Odee nke Mahadum Seattle na Allihies, Ireland
Davis akụzikwarala akwụkwọ gbasara ide na Mahadum Trent, Mahadum Rider, Humber College na The Paris Writers' Workshop
Davis mere mmemme ide obodo na Princeton akpọrọ Sharpening the Quill site na 2006-2018
Akpọrọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Grimoire nke Kensington Market otu n'ime 'akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2018' nke The Globe and Mail depụtara na aha mkpirisi maka ndị otu ndị ode akwụkwọ Canada Fred Kerner Award

Achịcha anyị kwa ụbọchị bụ ogologo aha maka ihe nrite Scotiabank Giller, ma kpọọ ya dị ka otu n'ime 'akwụkwọ kacha mma nke 2011' site na The Globe and Mail, na 'Kachasị Mma nke 2011' nke The Boston Globe ; The Empty Room (2007) ka akpọrọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha mma nke afọ site na Toronto Star, The Globe & Mail, na Winnipeg Free Press; Obodo Radiant (2005) bụ onye ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite akụkọ ifo nke Rogers Writers' Trust
Oge isi ike (2002), ka ahọpụtara maka usoro nkuzi Robert Adams wee kpọọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kacha ere nke afọ site na Amazonca
E mere nkuzi Adams na telivishọn na mmemme TVOntario Imprint
Ọchịchọ a na-emegharịbeghị (2008) bụ ogologo aha maka ReLit Awards
Edepụtakwala akụkọ ifo ya dị mkpụmkpụ maka CBC Literary Awards na ọ bụ onye nnata onyinye abụọ Mid-Career Writer Sustaining sitere na Kansụl Canada maka Arts, na 2000 na 2006
Lauren Beukes (amuru 5 June 1976) bu onye odee akwukwo South Africa, onye odee akwukwo nkenke, odeakụkọ na onye edemede onyonyo
A mụrụ Lauren Beukes na 5 June 1976
O tolitere na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Roedean na Johannesburg, ma nwee MA na Creative Writing na Mahadum Cape Town Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ nweere onwe ya afọ iri, gụnyere afọ abụọ na New York na Chicago
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke The Shining Girls, akwụkwọ akụkọ banyere onye na- egbu oge na-eme njem na onye lanarịrịnụ nke na-atụgharị ịchụ nta

E bipụtara ya na 15 Eprel afọ 2013 site na akara Umuzi nke Random House Struik na South Africa, na 25 Eprel 2013 nke HarperCollins na United Kingdom, na na 4 June 2013 site na Mulholand Books na United Steeti
HarperCollins emeriela ikike mba ụwa nke akwụkwọ ahụ n'ọgụ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ ya na ọtụtụ ndị mbipụta akwụkwọ ọzọ

Ụmụ agbọghọ na-egbuke egbuke meriri The Strand Magazine Critic's Best Novel Award, RT Thriller of the Year, Exclusive Books ' Readers Choice Award, na ihe nrite akwukwo nke South Africa kacha ewu ewu, Mahadum Johannesburg Prize
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya gara aga, Zoo City, onye na-agba ume siri ike banyere mpụ, anwansi, ụlọ ọrụ egwu, ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na mgbapụta e debere na Johannesburg na-atụgharị uche n'afọ 2011 Arthur C
Clarke Award, na 2010 Kitschie Red Tentacle maka akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma

Edepụtara ya nkenke maka onyinye 2010 BSFA maka akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma, onyinye nke afọ 2011 World Fantasy maka akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma, Mahadum 2010 – 2011 nke Johannesburg Creative Writing Prize, M-Net Literary Awards, Nrite Nielsen's Booksellers' Choice Award 2011 na ogologo aha maka South Africa Fiction Prize 2011 na 2012 International Dublin Literary Award
Ihe osise mkpuchi ahụ nwetara onyinye 2010 BSFA maka nka kacha mma

Edepụtakwala akwụkwọ akụkọ a nkenke maka Grand Prix de l'Imaginaire na France maka akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ofesi kacha mma, ntụgharị asụsụ kacha mma nke Laurent Philibert-Caillat na mkpuchi kachasị mma nke Joey Hi-Fi
Onye mmepụta South Afrika, Helena Spring ahọpụtala ikike ihe nkiri
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya bụ Moxyland, akwụkwọ akụkọ cyberpunk nke edobere na Cape Town n'ọdịnihu
Ebu ụzọ bipụta akwụkwọ abụọ a na South Afrika site n'aka Jacana Publishing ma wepụta ya na mba ofesi site n'aka Osprey Publishing 's Angry Robot akara
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo Maverick Extraordinary Women from South Africa's Past (Oshun 2004) bụ ogologo edepụtara maka onyinye 2006 Sunday Times Alan Paton

2008), FAB (Umuzi 2007), African Road New Writing from Southern Africa (New Africa Books 2005), 180 Degrees New Fiction from South African Women Writers (Oshun 2006), na Urban 03 (New Africa Books 2005)
Na July 2014, Beukes bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Broken Monsters, nke edobere na Detroit, Michigan
Dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka Clockwork Zoo, ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu mmepe nke mepụtara usoro ihe nkiri TV nke ọkara elekere mbụ nke South Africa, URBO The Adventures of Pax Afrika
O dekwara ihe ngosi 12 nke ihe nkiri Playhouse Disney, Florrie's Dragons for Wish Films na ihe ngosi nke usoro ihe nkiri Mouk maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta French Millimages
Ọ duziri akwụkwọ akụkọ ogologo ogologo na Miss Gay Western Cape akpọrọ Glitterboys & Ganglands
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị edemede, yana Ben Trovato na Tumiso Tsukudu na pilot nke controversial ZA News, a Spitting Image -style satire show na puppets dabeere na ọrụ nke South Africa cartoonist, Zapiro
Ndị SABC nyere onye na-anya ụgbọelu ahụ ọrụ mana ọ naghị agbasa ozi
A na- emegharị akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, The Shining Girls, na usoro telivishọn nke MRC na Appian Way Productions
Ọ meriri 'Best Columnist Western Cape' na Vodacom Journalist of the Year Awards na 2007 na 2008
Beukes mere ihe ọchị ya na-eji 'All The Pretty Ponies' na-edepụta mpụta mbụ na Vertigo 's Strange Adventures otu-shot
O dekwara 'Alaeze zoro ezo', arc of Fairest (okwu # 8-13), ngbanwe nke Bill Willingham 's Eisner Award -winning Fables series, na akụkọ Durham Red maka 2000 AD ' s
ncheta nke iri anọ pụrụ iche mbipụta
Beukes ebipụtala mkpirisi akụkọ ifo na nchịkọta dị iche iche
Lauren Halsey (b
1987 Los, Angeles, California) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'oge a
Halsey na-eji ihe owuwu na nka ntinye iji gosipụta eziokwu nke ọbọdọ ukwu dị ka South Central, Los Angeles
A mụrụ Halsey na 1987 na Los Angeles, California
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na California Institute of the Arts (CalArts) site na 2008-2012, nwéta BFA, na Mahadum Yale site na 2012-2014, nwéta MFA
Site na 2012-2014, Halsey na ndị ọrụ ibe ya rụkọrọ ọrụ na ọrụ akpọrọ Harlem Postcards, nkè e gosipụtara na The Studio Museum na Harlem, NY
Ọ bụ n'oge a
ka Halsey mechara ihe ngosi thesis ya na California Institute of the Arts wee malite mmemme ahụ na Mahadum Yale
N'afọ 2015, a gụnyere Halsey na United, ngosi na Coney Island Art Walls
N'otu afọ ahụ, a gụnyere ya na ihe ngosi Everything, Everyday na Studio Museum ya na ndị na-ese ihe na Residence Sadie Barnette (nké bụkwa CalArts alum) na Eric Mack
California Institute of Arts nyèrè Lauren Halsey The Beutner Family Award of Excellence in the Arts na 2011
E nyere Halsey Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture scholarship màkà ónyé na-ese ihe na 2014
N'afọ 2014-15, Halsey so na Studio Museum na Harlems Artist-in-Residence program
A matara ya maka ịgbanwe Mezzanine Gallery na ntinye pụrụ iche maka ihe ngosi ya akpọrọ Everything, Everyday
Halsey bụ ónyé natara onyinye Rema Hort Mann Foundation Emerging Artist, 2015
Ọ natara William H
Johnson Price na 2017
N'afọ 2017, e nyekwara ya Edge Award site na Los Angeles Design Festival
N'afọ 2018, Halsey natara $ 100,000 maka Mohn Award iji sọpụrụ nka nka ya
N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Lauren Halsey ónyé mmeri nke Frieze Art, nke ọ ga-enweta $ 25,000, nke Luma Foundation kwadoro, iji mepụta ọrụ ọhụrụ màkà mbipụta na-abịanụ nke Frieise New York art fair
Ọzọkwa na 2019, Halsey natara 2019 Painter and Sculptors Grant site na Joan Mitchell Foundation, New York
N'afọ 2021, Halsey natara onyinye Gwendolyn Knight Road Jacob Lawrence site na Seattle Art Museum
Lauren Liebenberg (amuru 3 August afo 1972) bu onye odee South Afrika amuru na Zimbabwe
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya The Voluptuous Delights of Peanut Butter na Jam bụ onye ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite oroma maka akụkọ ifo na afo 2008
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya sochirinụ, The West Rand Jive Cats Boxing Club na Cry Baby, enwetakwala otuto dị egwu nke mba ụwa
A mụrụ Liebenberg ma zụlite na Rhodesia mana mgbe ọ na-eto eto, hapụrụ Zimbabwe nwere onwe ọhụrụ maka South Africa gbara agbata obi, ebe nna ya rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ọla edo
Ọ gara Brescia House, ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik maka ụmụ agbọghọ na Johannesburg

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum South Afrika, ọ biri na England afọ ụfọdụ, tupu ọ laghachi South Africa, bụ ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Mahadum Witwatersrand na nzere masta na azụmahịa (MBA)
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ ego ma bipụta ya n'ọhịa nke ahịa ego, gụnyere akwụkwọ ntụaka aha ya bụ The Electronic Financial Markets of the Future, nke e bipụtara na afo 2002

Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Voluptuous Delights of Peanut Butter na Jam nke dọtara ahụmahụ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata na Rhodesia n'oge agha Rhodesian Bush, dọtara mmasị dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị nkatọ mgbe e bipụtara ya na afo 2008
The Guardian kọwara ya dị ka 'ihe ịtụnanya doro anya', na-aga n'ihu na-ekwu na 'Rhodesia na-asọpụta, na-eme ka ndụ dịrị n'anya gị
dị ka ụmụaka n'obi ya
ọ bụ ozugbo, ọ naghị adịkarị ikpe ikpe
mara mma, na-ewe iwe na na-akpali akpali iju
na-eru n'okpuru akpụkpọ gị'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Financial Times kọwara ya dị ka 'akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi elegiac [nke] na-ewepụta adịghị ike nke ndị ọcha Africa a
Times kọwara ya dị ka 'mpụta mbụ na-emetụ n'ahụ'
Ndị Independent mekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ a n'usoro
Ewezuga ịbụ onye edepụtara ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Orange maka akụkọ ifo, Liebenberg bụ otu n'ime naanị ụmụ nwanyị atọ a ga-edepụta aha maka ihe nrite mbụ Orange na 2008
N'afọ 2010, edepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ogologo oge maka onyinye akwụkwọ edemede Dublin International

Akwụkwọ akụkọ na-esochi ya, The West Rand Jive Cats Boxing Club, akụkọ na-abịa n'afọ nke edobere na ubi ọla edo nke Johannesburg, ka ebipụtara na afo 2011 ma nwetakwa otuto dị ụtọ sitere n'aka ndị nkatọ
The Guardian kwuru na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere 'ezigbo mmetụta maka ya' wee kọwaa Liebenberg dị ka 'onye ode akwụkwọ mara mma'
The Times kpọrọ ya 'na-akpụ akpụ
[ihe] akụkọ a haziri nke ọma' na Financial Times toro ya dị ka 'nke pụtara ìhè
na-akpali akpali
na-akpali akpali'
Cry Baby akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke atọ na nke kachasị ọhụrụ, satire na suburbia nke oge a nwere isiokwu siri ike nke nwanyị, ka ebipụtara na February afo 2014
Liebenberg lụrụ nwanyị nwere ụmụ abụọ ma biri na Johannesburg, South Africa
Lauretta Ngcobo (13 Septemba na afo 1931 - 3 Nọvemba na afo 2015) bụ onye edemede na onye edemede South Afrikaa
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ala ọzọ n'etiti afo 1963 na afo 1994 - na Swaziland, na Zambia na n'ikpeazụ England, bụ ebe ọ kụziiri ihe ruo afọ 25 - ọ laghachiri na South Africa ma biri na Durban
A kọwawo ihe odide ya n'agbata afọ 1960 na mmalite afo 1990 dị ka nke na-enye 'nghọta dị mkpa n'ime ahụmahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii nke ndị na- akpaghasị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'

Dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ a kacha mara ya nke ọma na ha anwughị (1990), nke e debere na afo 1950 South Africa ma na-akọwa ' mmegbu nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agbasi mbọ ike ịlanarị, na-arụ ọrụ ala ma na-enwe mmetụta nke ùgwù n'okpuru usoro ịkpa ókè agbụrụ mgbe
ndị di ha na-achọ ọrụ n’ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na n’obodo ukwu”
Ada ndị nkuzi Rosa ( née Cele) na Simon Gwina, Lauretta Gladys Nozizwe Duyu Gwina mụrụ na Ixopo, KwaZulu-Natal, ma tolite n'ebe ahụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Seminary Inanda dị nso na Durban wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ sitere na mpaghara ya gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare
Ọ kụziri ihe afọ abụọ, wee were ọrụ na Council for Science and Industrial Research na Pretoria
Na afo 1956 ọ bụ onye so na njem mgbochi ngafe ụmụ nwanyị
Na afo 1957 ọ lụrụ Abednego Bhekabantu Ngcobo, onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Pan Africanist Congress, onye na afo 1961 a mara ikpe na mkpọrọ afọ abụọ n'okpuru Suppression of Communism Act
Na afo 1963, chere njide dị nso, ọ gbapụrụ na obodo ya na ụmụntakịrị ya abụọ, kwaga Swaziland, mesịa Zambia na n'ikpeazụ England, bụ ebe ọ kụziri na ọkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị afọ 25
Emechara họpụta ya osote onye isi wee bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Lark Hall Infant na Lambeth, ndịda London, ebe ọ bụ naanị onye ọrụ ojii

Na 1984 ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke ATCAL ( Association for the Teaching of Caribbean, African, Asian and Associated Literatures), otu mgbasa ozi nke ndị nkuzi na ndị ode akwụkwọ na-akwalite usoro ọmụmụ dị iche iche na usoro agụmakwụkwọ Britain

Ọ nwetakwara oge iji dee akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ, Cross of Gold (1981) na And They didn't Die (1990), bụ nke a kọwara nke ikpeazụ dị ka 'ụzọ na-agbaji n'igosipụta ahụmahụ nke nwanyị ojii nke na-enye isi ya
agwa, Jezile, ime na olu a na-adịghị ahụkebe na akwụkwọ South Africa tupu ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ a

Ọ bụ ihe dị iche iche n'igosipụta mmetụta ọjọọ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na iwu ọdịnala na ndụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa bụ ndị Bantustans nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ' Ntụleghachi ahụ dị na Publishers Weekly kwuru, sị “Ngcobo ji obiọma na ọmịiko na-ede banyere ahụhụ otu nwanyị na-ata, ka ọ na-enye nghọta banyere omenala obodo Bantu, ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke usoro iwu, usoro na ikuku nke ụlọ mkpọrọ ojii, na mmụọ enweghị ike nke ndị a na-emegbu emegbu

Tụkwasị na nke ahụ Ngcobo bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Let It be Told Essays site na Black Women Writers na Britain ( Pluto Press, 1987), nke gụnyere onyinye sitere n'aka Amryl Johnson, Maud Sulter, Agnes Sam, Valerie Bloom, Grace Nichols, Marsha Prescod, Beverley Bryan, Stella Dadzie na Suzanne Scafe

Ngcobo dekwara akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Fikile amụta ka ndị ọzọ (1994), na na afo 2012 deziri akụkọ gbasara akụkọ banyere ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke akpọrọ Prodigal Daughters, bụ nke Neelika Jayawardane nke Africa họpụtara dị ka Akwụkwọ nke Afọ
bụ Obodo
Ngcobo laghachiri na South Africa na ezinụlọ ya na afo 1994, na-esochi ntuli aka nke African National Congress batara n'ọchịchị
Di ya nwụrụ na 1997
Na South Africa ọ kụzikwara ihe ọzọ nwa oge tupu ya aghọọ onye otu ndị omebe iwu KwaZulu-Natal, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ 11 tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na 2008
Ọ bipụtara ọtụtụ akụkọ gbasara agụmakwụkwọ, gaa ọtụtụ ọgbakọ ndị ode akwụkwọ, ma wepụta akwụkwọ na mahadum dị iche iche
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọọgwụ dị na Johannesburg na Tuzdee, 3 Nọvemba 2015, na-esochi ọrịa strok

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times nke South Africa obituary kọwara ya dị ka 'onye edemede na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ nke nyere ụmụ nwanyị adịghị ike olu', ebe Barbara Boswell nke African Gender Institute na Mahadum Cape Town dere, sị 'Ọnwụ Lauretta Ngcobo anapụwo anyị n'ike
nkà mmụta dị ịrịba ama, onye na-alụ ọgụ nnwere onwe, na olu nwanyị'
N'afọ 2006, Ngcobo nwetara ihe nrite akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ndụ nke mmeri nke South Africa Literary Awards
N'afọ 2008, e nyere ya Order nke Ikhamanga maka ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ na ịkwalite nha anya nwoke na nwanyị
Akpọrọ ya aha eThekwini Living Legend na 2012, na na 2014 natara nzere nzere doctorate of Technology in Arts and Design from Durban University of Technology
Akwụkwọ akụkọ
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Maka ụmụaka
Lauritta Onye (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 4 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Paralimpik nke na-asọ mpi ịtụ ihe F40
Ọ sọrọ mpi na 2016 Summer Paralympics na Rio de Janeiro ma rite ọla edo na F40 shot put
Onye bụkwa onye na -eme ihe nkiri, na -eme ihe n'okpuru aha Laury White
A mụrụ Onye na Owerri, na Naijirịa n'afọ 1999
Ọ bụ onye Ikeduru
A mụrụ Onye na ụdị achondroplasia na 125 metres (41 ft) n'ịdị elu
E wepu egwuregwu, Onye nwere ebumnuche ị bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri, ma n'afọ 2015 ọ pụtara na fim Nollywood Lords of Money, ebe ọ pụtara n'okpuru aha Laury White
Onye bidoro egwuregwu n'afọ 2008, mana o nweghị mmetụta na mba ụwa ruo mgbe agbanwere iwu nke nhazi asọmpị Para-Athletics n'afọ 2012
Tupu afọ 2012, a na -ahazi ndị na -eme egwuregwu na-etoghi ogologo n'okpuru iwu F40, nke gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị na-asọmpi n'okpuru 140 cm

N'ịgbalị ịhazigharị n'ọkwa, mkpebi nke afọ 2012 kewpụtara F40 na F41 site na F40, ebe F40 dị ugbu a maka ụmụ nwanyị na -eme egwuregwu nke 125 cm nna ndị dị n'okpuru ya, na -etinye Onye dịka otu n'ime ndị na -eme egwuregwu kachasị elu na klaasị ya
Otu n'ime ndị isi asọmpi mba ụwa mbụ ga -eme mmemme ịtụ ihe maka ndị na -eme egwuregwu ọkwa F40 bụ asọmpi IPC Athletics World nke afọ 2015 e mere na Doha
Onye batara na naanị mmemme e mere maka ndị egwuregwu F40, nke shọtput
Onye gara n'asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa dịka otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasi, ebe o debere ihe ndekọ ụwa nke mita 759 na Tunisia n'ọnwa Maachị mbido afọ
Na Doha, Onye mere nke ọma na ndekọ nke ya site n'ịtụ ihew ruru 772 na mbido mbụ ya
Onye ya na ya kacha asọ nso, Lara Baars nke Nedaland, tụbara ihe kacha mma 680, n'onwe ya bụ ndekọ ndị Yurop, mana ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu mita i ru nke Onye
Ọ bụ sọsọ otu ọla ndị Naịjirịa nwetara n'asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa ahụ

Mgbe ha laghachitere Naịjirịa, Onyeisiala Buhari nabatara ndị egwuregwu Olimpik ahụ kachasị elu na Paralimpik, ma nye ha ego iji nye aka na ọzụzụ ndị egwuregwu maka egwuregwu afọ 2016 na Rio de Janeiro
N'agbanyeghi na Onye na -ekwu na ego a na -abịa, ya onwe ya, na onye nkuzi ya e nwetaghị ego ahụ, kpatara mmetụta ọjọọ na nkwadebe Onye maka Rio
O kwenyere na ọ bụ n'ihi na ya bụ onye egwuregwu nwere nkwarụ mere na ekenyeghị ya ego ahụ
Na nzaghachi, o chọrọ ịpụ na egwuregwu ahụ
N'agbanyeghị ihe isi ike ego, Onye nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Paralimpiks nke afọ 2016, na -ibanye ịtụigwe (T40)
Onye chịrị n'asọmpi a, na -imeri Rima Abdelli nke Tunisia ka o bụrụ ọlaọcha
N'ịbụ onye mbụ na -eme egwuregwu T40 tụbara ihe karịrị mita asatọ, Onye gosiri obi ụtọ site n'ịkwọ ụgbọala o ji a ga ije, na ịgba egwu n'ihu igwe mmadụ Brazil
Mmezu
Law and Disorder in Lagos bụ ihe nkiri Britain nke Louis Theroux mere n'afọ 2010
Theroux na-aga Lagos, obodo kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa, iji nyochaa ọdịdị iwu na usoro na obodo ahụ na-agbasa ngwa ngwa

N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-eso ndị agha gọọmentị na-achịkwa KAI (Kick Against Indiscipline), onye isi otu a ma ama MC Oluomo, na ndị otu ndị na-eto eto a maara dị ka 'Area Boys' bụ ndị na-elekọta mpaghara maka ego

Na 30 Septemba afọ 2015, Kunle 'Mammok' Mamowora, onye nduzi Theroux gburugburu Lagos na Chief Security Officer na MC Oluomo, bụ onye ndị mwakpo a kwenyere na ha bụ ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-asọmpi gbara egbe ma gbuo ya
Lawan Gwadabe (a mụrụ n'afọ 1949) bụ onye nchịkwa ndị agha nke Niger Steeti na Naịjirịa site n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 987 ruo Jọnwa jenụwarị afọ 1992 n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Ibrahim Babangida
E boro ya ebubo na ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịwakpo General Sani Abacha n'afọ 1995, nke a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ, taa ya ahụhụ ma maa ya ikpe maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru
Mgbe Abacha nwụsịrị, a gbaghaara ya na steeti
A mụrụ Gwadabe n'afọ 1949 na Jos, Plateau Steeti, ebe a zụlitere ya
Nna ya bụ onye Alakụba sitere na Fulani
Major Gwadabe tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 27 August 1985, ebe ọ ka laghachiri na 245 Recce Battalion (ebe ọ bụbu onye isi) site na ọmụmụ na US Armour School, Fort Knox
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eto eto e kenyere ọrụ ijide onye isi ala, General Muhammadu Buhari, nke ha rụzuru n'enweghị ihe isi ike, jiri General Ibrahim Babangida dochie ya
Mgbe okpuru ọchịchị ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara Gwadabe ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian National Shipping Line
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya onye isi ala pụrụ iche na onye isi oche nke Sudan Peace Conference (1986–1990) nakwa onye nnọchi anya onye isi ala pụrụ iche maka udo na Angola na mba Mozambique (1989–1990)
Babangida họpụtara Gwabade Gọvanọ nke Niger Steeti na Disemba 1987
N'oge ọchịchị ya, ọ ghaghị ịnagide ọrịa siri ike nke cerebro-spinal meningitis, nke e ji ọgwụ mgbochi mberede merie
Ná mmalite nke Naijiria Third Republic na Jenụwarị 1992, o nyefere onye gọvanọ nkịtị a họpụtara ahọpụta bụ Musa Inuwa
Inuwa bụbu Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ahụike na Niger Steeti, Gwadabe wepụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya ka o wee nwee ike ịzọ ọkwa
A họpụtara Gwadabe ka ọ bụrụ ọchịagha nke ndị nche mba

N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1993, ndị otu ndị nche mba n'okpuru Colonel Gwadabe, ndị isi ndị agha atọ jidere Ernest Shonekan, onye isi ala nkịtị nke Naijiria onye General Ibrahim Babangida họpụtara
Ngagharị iwe ahụ mere ka General Sani Abacha weghara ọchịchị
Gwadabe gara ozi dịka onye isi ndị ọrụ nke ndị agha Gambia, na-anọchi Brigadier Abubakar Dada
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa mgbe ọchịchị Yahya Jammeh nke July 1994 gwụrụ na Gambia, ọ bụ onye isi ndị ọrụ nke General Sani Abacha tupu a họpụta ya dịka ọchịagha nke 23 Armored Brigade na Yola
N'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Machị afọ 1995, e jidere ya maka ebubo na ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịwakpo ọchịchị Abacha, ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ, taa ya ahụhụ ma mesịa maa ya ikpe maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru ya na ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe mgbe Abacha nwụrụ na mberede na June 1998
Ka ọtụtụ afọ gachara, onye isi ndị ọrụ Abacha bụ Lt-Gen
Oladipo Diya kwuru na ọ na-ewere na atụmatụ okpuru ọchịchị ahụ a na-ekwu na ọ dịghị
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 1999, ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Abdulsalami Abubakar gbaghaara Gwadabe na ndị ọzọ a na-ebo ebubo na ha na-eme atụmatụ ịwakpo General Sani Abacha
Na June 2009, Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua nyere Gwadabe nakwa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ mgbaghara zuru oke
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụ onye isi otu Kaduna Discussion Group, ya na onye bụbu onye ọchịchị ndị agha bụ Ibrahim Babangida
Dịka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ MTS First Wireless, na Jenụwarị 2005, Gwadabe boro ebubo na onye isi oche ahụ etinyela aka na ikenye òkè na omume ọjọọ na mbubata ngwá ọrụ nkwukọrịta
Gwadabe so na ndị isi, na 2005, na-agba General Ibrahim Babangida ume ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke afọ 2007
Gwadabe ghọọrọ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere U2 Communications Africa na North Eastern Capital
Ọ ghọọrọ onye isi oche nke Seeds Project Company na onye isi oche nke North Eastern Integrated Oil services Ltd
Mmasị azụmahịa ya gụnyere Mmanụ na Gas, ntụrụndụ na ọrụ ile ọbịa
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2009, a họpụtara Gwabade ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Federal Road Safety Commission (FRSC)
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2009, o kwupụtara na a na-etinye ụgbọ oloko iri abụọ na abụọ na Federal Capital Territory iji nyere ndị ihe mberede metụtara aka
Lawrence Harris bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke amụrụ na Colorado Springs, Colorado na 1937
Ọ gụrụ nka na United States na Europe
A maara Harris màkà ihe osise impressionistic (dị ka Abandoned Ship) na ihe osise abstract (dị ka The Cross)
Ihe osise ya n'ozuzu ya enweghị ụbọchị ma bịanye aka na ya na ya na-agbakọta ya
Ebe ngosi nka Denver so n'ime nchịkọta ọha na eze nwere ọrụ Lawrence Harris
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju ónyé omenkà a ányá na ónyé na-ese ihe n'ala nkè Canada bụ Lawren Harris (1885-1970)
Ihe ndekọ ire ere màkà ihe osise nke Lawrence Harris bụ dollar otu puku na narị na iri asaa

Ihe ndekọ a sitere n'aka Abandoned Ship, irí asaá na abụọ site na irí anọ na asatọ inch mmanụ na-ese on board rere n'ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2007, na Best of the West Auctions (Colorado Springs, Colorado)
Lawrence Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa Nicholas Mukomberanwa, Lawrence (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asupe Laurence) na nna ya rụkọrọ ọrụ site na nwata ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akpụ ihe mgbe ọ na-azụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ọ tụgharịa gaa n'ịkpụ ihe oge niile
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi Europe
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu mana ọ kwụsịrị itinye aka na ọrụ ezinụlọ
Lawrence Mukomberanwa, nwa onye na-akpụ ihe Nicholas, na-ekwu na ọ dịghị akwa ụta mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu n'oge na-adịbeghị anya iji soro nzọụkwụ nna ya
Isiokwu Laurence na-ekwu maka ọdịiche na mmegide
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ọdịiche nke ike n'etiti ịda ogbenye na akụ na ụba
Mukomberanwa bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nke ọgbọ mbụ Shona art sculptors Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Mukomberanwa bụ nwanne Anderson, Tendai, Taguma, Netsai, na Ennica Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa, ha niile bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe
Àtụ The Mukomberanwa Family
Lawrence S
Wittner (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Mee 5, 1941 na Brooklyn, New York) bụ onye America na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke dere ọtụtụ ihe gbasara udo, iwu mba ọzọ, na enweghị nhata akụ na ụba
Ọ gara Columbia College (BA, 1962), Mahadum Wisconsin (MA
na akụkọ ihe mere eme, 1963), na Mahadum Columbia (PhD
na akụkọ akụkọ ihe mere mere eme, n'afọ 1967)
N'ikpeazụ, ọ kụziri na Hampton Institute, na Vassar College, na mahadum ndị Japan
N'afọ 1974, ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum Steeti nke New York na Albany, ebe ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa Prọfesọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme tupu ọ laa ezumike nká n'afọ 2010
Lawretta Ozoh (amụrụ ya na 5 Septemba afọ 1990) bụ onye Naijiria amara amara ọkachamara n'egwuregwu nke ọsọ
Ozoh bụ onye ritere ọla ọcha na 200 mita ma bụrụkwa onye otu nrite ọla edo ahụ emeriri na 4 x 100 mita relay na asọmpi egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke afọ 2012
N'afọ 2012 O ziri na Ozoh bụụ steroid anabolic Stanozolol ma mechaa nye ya iwu mgbochi afọ abụọ na egwuregwu

Layal Mounir Abboud (ArabicÀtụ Lang-ar Àtụ IPA-ar; born 15 May 1982) bụ onye na-ewu ewu Lebanọn, onye na-agu egwu, onye na-agu egwu, onye na-agu egwú, nke kwesịrị ekwesị, onye na-azụ ụmụ nwoke Muslim na onye ọchụnta ego
Laylah Ali (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke oge a maara maka ihe osise nke a na-egosipụta mmekọrịta agbụrụ na-edoghị anya na usoro eserese eserese
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Ali bu n'obi ịbụ onye ọka iwu ma ọ bụ dọkịta
Ali nwetara BA
(English and Studio Art) na Williams College, Williamstown, MA na 1991
O sonyere na Whitney Independent Study Program na Whitney Museum of American Art, New York City na 1992, wee mechaa ebe obibi na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture, Skowhegen, ME na 1993
Ali nwetara MFA
ya na 1994 na Mahadum Washington na St
Louis, MO
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Williamstown, Massachusetts, ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ ugbu a na Williams College
N'ọrụ Ali mbụ, ọ ga-ese ma ọ bụ see ìhè ímé ihe ike
O lekwasịrị anya n'omume karịa ime ìhè ike n'onwe ya
N'ọrụ ya ugbu a, ọ naghị elekwasị anya n'omume ahụ; ọ na-elebara ìhè na-eme tụpụ na mgbe ọ gasịrị anya
Ọrụ ndị ahụ bụ obere ìhè osise gouache na ihe osise na akwụkwọ
A maara yá ka ọ na-akwadebe ọtụtụ ọnwa, na-eme atụmatụ ihe ọ bụla kà ọ ghara inwe ohere màkà mmejọ
Ọrụ Ali dabeere ná ahụmịhe ndụ
Ọ bụ ezie na mmadụ nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe ike ikwu, ọ na-ekwu na ọrụ ya niile nwere ihe ọ pụtara nakwa ná ihe dị n'uche ya karịrị aka ya na akwụkwọ
Banyere ọdịdị arụmọrụ nkè ọrụ ya, Ali na-ekwu, 'Ihe osise ahụ nwere ike ịdị ka usoro ma ọ bụ setịpụrụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na egwuregwu
Echere m na ha dịka ndị mmadụ na ndị mmadụ
Isiokwu nke ihe osise gouache a ma ama nke Ali bụ ihe odide Greenheads e mere iji belata ma ọ bụ wepụ ọdịiche dị iche iche nke okike, ogo, afọ, na n'ụzọ ụfọdụ agbụrụ
Ali mepụtara ihe karịrị 80 n'ime ihe osise ndị a n'agbata afọ 1996 na 2005
Ali wepụtara ihe oyiyi na isiokwu sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ, dị ka ihe oyiyi nke ihe ịrịba ama ngagharị iwe ma ọ bụ ndị isi ụwa na-amakụ, mànà ọ gbanwere akụkọ iji mepụta ihe dị ányá na ihe ọhụrụ
Ali mepụtara ihe odide na ihe oyiyi ka ha bụrụ ndị a kapịrị ọnụ ma bụrụ ndị na-edoghị anya
Ha nwèrè ìhè ọ pụtara site n'aka Ali n'onwe ya mànà onye na-ekiri ya na-eweta ihe odide nkè ha iji kọwaa onyinyo ahụ
Ali mèrè ihe odide ka ha yie mmadụ ma ọ bụghị mmadụ ka e wéé wepụ ha n'ụwa anyị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ha nwèrè ihe ọ pụtara na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma ha dị n'èzí ụwa anyị

Kemgbe afọ 2015, Ali anọwo na-arụ ọrụ n'usoro ihe osise ọ na-akpọ Acephalous, na-egosi ọnụ ọgụgụ ọ na-akọwa dị ka onye maara okike, nwere ike inwe mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ mmekọahụ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha nwere àgwà agbụrụ na ụfọdụ n'etiti ha enweghị isi
'Ha nọ na njem na-adịghị agwụ agwụ, nke kpebisiri ike, njem nwere ọtụtụ akụkụ', ka ọ na-ekwu
'Ọ nwere akụkụ nke ịkwaga n'ike
Laylah Ali esorowo onye na-agba egwú / onye na-eme ihe nkiri Dean Moss na The Kitchen na 2005 na Figures on a Field na 2014 na johnbrown
N'afọ 2002, Museum of Modern Art, New York, nyere Ali ọrụ ịmepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na-enweghị okwu
N'afọ 2020 n'oge ọrịa a, a na-atụ anya na Ali ga-arụcha ọrụ ya na Tamarind Press na New Mexico
Usoro nchekwa nke COVID-19 chọrọ ka ndị nta akụkọ na ndị na-ese ihe gbanwee mmekọrịta ọrụ ha gaa na nke mebere emepe
Kama ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ha, ha rụrụ ọrụ iji jiri ozi ahụ zipụ ọrụ na-aga n'ihu

A na-etinye ọrụ Alias na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze, gụnyere Albright-Knox Art Gallery, Buffalo, NY; Museum of Contemporary Art, Chicago na Walker Art Center, Minneapolis, MN, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Laylah Ali gosipụtara na Venice Biennial (2003) na Whitney Biennial (2007) Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ dị ka ndị a
E nyela Ali ọtụtụ onyinye, ebe obibi na onyinye, gụnyere Joan Mitchell Foundation Painters and Sculptors Grant na 2008, Joan Mitchell Foundation Residency na 2018, na United States Artists Residency
Laylah Ali Othman (amuru Jenụwarị 29, 1986) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-ahụ maka ihe eji arụ ụlọ dịka oche na akwa Ọ bụ onye dere kuki , onye nwe magazin L, na onye na-emepụta Voice of the Youth

A mụrụ Laylah Ali Othman na Yobe State , ma tolitere na Kaduna, ebe o biri na Kaduna State, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nursery na praịmarị na Jijar Kaduna State, ma mesịa gaa Junior & High School Senior na Damaturu
Ọ bụ ugbu a Onye isi oche na onye isi nchịkwa nke Superb rb, & N (Laylah & Nahaar) Interiors na Exterior Décor Nig

Layla Ali othman bụ onye guzobere Laylah Initiative for the Boy and Girl Child Charity Foundation (LIBGC); bụ nzukọ na-elekọta al-Manifī , ma na-enye otu ụmụaka nọ na mkpa ọzụzụ n'efu, dịka Almajiri 'na ụmụaka ndị ọzọ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, site na mmemme telivishọn a na-akpọ Laylah's Way, ebe ọ na-enyere ndị ogbenye na ndị nkịtị aka
ọha, ọ na-eji mmemme a enyere ndị na-enweghị ike ị nweta ndụ ka mma ma ọ bụ ndụ ka mma, site n'inye ha ụlọ zuru oke
O mechara bụrụ onye ngosi nke Voice of the Youth

N'ime mmemme a, ọ na-enye ohere iji mepụta ndụ ka mma maka ndị ọ na-enweghị, ma na-agba ndị mmadụ ume ka ha bụrụ ndị na achu nta ego, na akụziri ha ka ha ga-esi nweta ezigbo ego, na-edozi nsogbu ndị ntorobịa Nigeria chere ha ihu ka ha na-agba mbọ ime ka ha nwee ego
ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndụ ha

na-erizi pụta ihe ndị dị ka ịchọ mma ime ụlọ, ahụike na ụdị ndụ; bụ onye edemede nke Something Deep and Masked
