Angbazo sonyeere GE site na JP Morgan Chase & Co na afọ Puku abụọ na anọ ebe ọ bụ osote onye isi oche, Corporate Treasury and Development
Ọ malitere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye ọrụ ahịa nke GE Commercial & Industrial Finance
Ọ bukwara MD, Industry Client Coverage Team na GE Capital na Puku abụọ na isii tupu e zighachi ya iduzi ọrụ West, East na Central Africa dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ GE na mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ Puku abụọ na iri abụo, Angbazo ghọrọ Chief Executive nke ọrụ azụmahịa GE na Naịjirịa ebe ọ mụbara ego okpukpu abụọ ruo ihe karịrị ijeri $ 1
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ime ka itinye ego nke GE nke ijeri $ 1 maka ịmepụta ọtụtụ mmepụta na ọrụ maka Africa gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ na'ọrụ maka turbines ike na Calabar, Cross River steeti
General Electric bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwenye nwa oge na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa maka ịrụ ọrụ nke usoro ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị warara nke Nigeria
Nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta nke onye isi oche GE Nigeria, Angbazo duziri, ruru Nde $ 45 maka oge nke ọrụ ahụ na Ijeri $ 29 maka akụkụ niile nke oru ngo ahụ

Angbazo mụbara ọrụ GE na Naịjirịa site na ihe dị ka ndị ọrụ Nári abụo ruo Nári ise n'ime afọ atọ, ebe ihe dịka pasent iri itoolu nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ na mba Naijiria na pasenta iri asatọ nke ọkwa ndị isi na nzukọ ahụ
General Electric Nigeria bụkwa nke a họpụtara site na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ, Jobberman dị ka uno olu Naijiria kachasị mma ịrụ ọrụ na afọ Puku abụọ na iri na isii
Angbazo bụ osote prọfesọ nke ego na Mahadum Purdue, Indiana n'etiti Septemba Otu puku na iri itoolu na iri itoolu na abụọ ruo Mee Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na asaa

N'oge a, ọ were ezumike ezumezu Maka otu afọ wee sonye na Fannie Mae, dị ka Director-Housing Finance Research site na Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na ise ruo Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na isii

O dere ọtụtụ edemede nyocha na ego ụlọ ọrụ na ahịa isi obodo bipụtara na Journal of Fixed Income, Journal nke Banking and Finance, European Finance Review, Magazine of Risk and Insurance, na Management Science Journal
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu na Krannert Executive Forum naKrannart School of Management, Mahadum Purdue
Angbazo na-anọdụ ugbu a na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa na Naijiria gụnyere Lagos Business School nke Mahadum Pan-Atlantic, Africa-America Institute na Machịbụrụ Bingham
A họpụtara Angbazo dị ka onye otu Naịjirịa Industrial Policy and Competitiveness Advisory Council nke onyeisi oche, osote onye isi ala Naijiria bụ Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo
Ndị ọchụnta ego ndị ọzọ nọ na kansụl ahụ gụnyere nwoke kachasị baa ọgaranya n'Africa, Aliko Dangote onye bụ osote onyeisi oche ya
A na-atụ anya na kansụl ahụ ga-ebute ụzọ n'ihe omume ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa iji bulie onyinye nke mmepụta ihe na Gross Domestic Product (GDP) nke mba ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Joyce Lin ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ; Saraya, nwa nwanyị na Jonathan, otu nwa nwoke
Ha bi na Abuja
Ọ bụ nwanne Major Gen
Nuhu Bala Angbazo (Ndị agha Naijiria) na Dr
James Ang bazo the (Dan Galadima Eggon)
Leïla Ben Ali (Arabic , née Trabelsi; amụrụ na 14 Ọktoba 1956) bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, onye bụ onye isi ala Tunisia site na 1987 ruo 2011
Ọ lụrụ Ben Ali na 1992
Leïla Ben Ali bụ onye isi oche nke Arab Women Organization na onye isi oche of the Basma Association, otu ọrụ ebere na-arụ ọrụ iji nweta ọrụ maka ndị nwere nkwarụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, Mrs
Ben Ali guzobere SAIDA iji melite nlekọta maka ndị ọrịa kansa na Tunisia
N'oge mgbanwe ọchịchị nke Tunisia na 2010 na11, ya na di ya na ụmụ atọ gbagara mba ọzọ na Saudi Arabia

N'oge ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Tunisia, a kwenyere na ya mere ka onwe ya na ezinụlọ ya baa ọgaranya site na nrụrụ aka na mmefu ego nke gọọmentị iji kwado ndụ okomoko, ihe ndị nyere aka na ngagharị iwe megide ọchịchị Ben Ali na ngwụcha afọ 2010
As of 2011[update] 2011[update] Interpol na-achọ ya na arịrịọ nke ndị ọka ikpe Tunisia maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru na ịkwụ ụgwọ ego
Leïla Trabelsi bụ nwa nwanyị nke Mohamed na Saïda Trabelsi
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị iri
Akwụkwọ 'ike siri ike' nke 2009 nke ndị nta akụkọ France bụ Nicholas Beau na Catherine Graciet chọtara ọpụpụ ya site na nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ere mkpụrụ osisi kpọrọ nkụ ruo First Lady
Tupu ya na Ben Ali lụọ n'afọ 1992, ọ bụ onye na-edozi ntutu na-enweghị agụmakwụkwọ dị mma, na-eme oriri na Paris
Ọ lụrụ Khelil Maaouia afọ atọ
Mgbe ahụ, ya na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, Farid Mokhtar, enyi Praịm Minista nke mere ka ọ mata ọkwa kachasị elu nke ndị Tunisia

Mgbe mmekọrịta ịhụnanya ya na alụmdi na nwunye ya na onye isi ala Tunisia Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, ya na ezinụlọ ya rịgooro n'ọkwá dị elu na azụmaahịa Tunisia wee bụrụ ndị a ma ama maka anyaukwu, ike na obi ọjọọ ha
Leïla Ben Ali na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ikwu ya gbapụrụ Tunisia gaa Saudi Arabia, France, Canada na Qatar na 14 Jenụwarị 2011, mgbe a chụpụrụ Onye isi ala Ben Ali
Leïla Ben Ali na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọrụ ebere na ọrụ enyemaka na ọrụ ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ nke Tunisia
O guzobere Basma Association na 2000 iji nyere aka chekwaa ọrụ maka ndị nwere nkwarụ, ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ kemgbe ahụ
N'okpuru idu ndú ya, njikọ ahụ enyewo ego ego ego, nweta ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ma mepee ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị nkwarụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2010
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyere ọzụzụ teknụzụ n'ọtụtụ ngalaba gụnyere sayensị kọmputa, embroidery, ọkwa nkà, ihe nkiri na egwu
Ọ malitekwara SAIDA, atụmatụ iji melite ọgwụgwọ ọrịa kansa, n'afọ 2010
Ọ na-ekwu okwu ugboro ugboro, na-anọ n'ememe gọọmentị ma na-agụ okwu di ya mgbe ụfọdụ
Ọ na-eso onye isi ala na-eme njem mgbe niile na nleta gọọmentị na mba ndị ọzọ
Ben Ali na-arụkwa ọrụ na SOS
Gammarth na El Karama, nke nyere nlekọta maka ụmụ mgbei ma kwalite ikike mmadụ, n'otu n'otu

Dị ka onye isi oche nke AWO, Leïla Ben Ali guzobere kọmitii ụmụ nwanyị Arab maka Iwu Humanitarian International nke jere ozi iji kwalite iwu enyemaka mba ụwa site na ịbawanye mmata na inye mmemme ọzụzụ maka gọọmentị na òtù ndị ọrụ ebere
O mekwara ka mgbochi ime ihe ike n'ụlọ bụrụ ihe kachasị mkpa nke AWO, ma kpọọ maka nlebara anya ọha na eze na ịkọ akụkọ banyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị n'ụlọ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya na Trends Magazine, o kwusiri ike na mkpa ụmụ nwanyị Arab dị na mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na imeziwanye onyinyo ụmụ nwanyị Arab bụ ebumnuche ya bụ isi dị ka onye isi oche nke AWO
A matara ya maka onyinye ya nye òtù ndị a n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche

N'afọ 2000, a họpụ tara ya dị ka 'Onye Ezinụlọ Ụwa'; n'afọ 2003 a kpọrọ ya 'Onye nke Afọ' na magazin Russia The World of the Woman, maka ọrụ ya iji kwalite ọdịmma ọha na eze na ikike ụmụ nwanyị; ma họrọ ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Arab 50 kachasị emetụta n'ụwa site na Middle East Magazine, akwụkwọ nke dị na London
A jara ya mma maka ọrụ ya na AWO iji mụbaa ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ngalaba na ọkwa niile, yana maka ịbawanye nkwado n'etiti mba Arab na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị
Òtù World Association of Women Entrepreneurs (FCEM) nabatakwara ya maka ọrụ ya n'inye ụmụ nwanyị ike na mmepe akụ na ụba
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-egbuke egbuke maka enweghị afọ ojuju n'ime obodo Tunisian nke na-asọ iwe maka ịrị elu nke ezinụlọ ya na ezinụlọ Trabelsi
Ndị edemede abụọ nke France dere akwụkwọ sara mbara akpọrọ 'La regente de Carthage' na-akọwapụta nrụrụ aka nke Leïla, ezinụlọ ya na ndị ọgọ ya
Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ French Le Monde Diplomatique si kwuo, Leïla Ben Ali na-anọchite anya 'agụụ' nke ezinụlọ onye isi ala
Otu eriri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke America nke WikiLeaks wepụtara kọwara otú onye nnọ chi anya Robert F
Godec si nụkarị 'ụjọ banyere enweghị agụmakwụkwọ ha, ọnọdụ dị ala na oriri pụtara ìhè'
N'oge ngagharị iwe ndị Tunisia na 2010-2011, ndị na-eme nga gharị iwe lekwasịrị anya n'ụlọ ha kwenyere na ọ bụ nke ezinụlọ Trabelsi
Gọọmentị Switzerland kwupụtara na ọ na-eme ka ọtụtụ nde dollar ndị ezinụlọ ya nwere na akaụntụ ụlọ akụ

Na 20 June 2011, a mara Zine El Abidine Ben Ali na Leïla Ben Ali ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ 35 n'enweghị onye na-anọ ya mgbe a chọpụtara na ikpe mara ha maka izu ohi na inwe ego na ọla n'ụzọ iwu na-akwa doghị
Ya na di ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ Nesrine (amụrụ na alụ ghị di; nna ya matara ya, lụrụ Mohammad Sakher El Materi), Halima na Mohamed Zine El Abidine
Di na nwunye ahụ nọkọtara ọnụ ruo 19 Septemba 2019, mgbe onye bụbu onye isi ala nwụrụ na Saudi Arabia

Leïla Jaffel (Arabic ليلى جفال) (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia na-eje ozi dị ka minista ikpe na Bouden Cabinet kemgbe afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu
Ọ bụ Minista nke State Domains na Land Affairs na Mechichi Cabinet
Leïla Mezian Benjelloun bụ dọkịta nke mba Morocca na nwanyị ọchụnta ego na nwunye nke ọgaranya Othman Benjelloun
Ọ bụ ada onye isi ala nke mba Morocco Mohamed Meziane
A mụrụ ya na Valencia ma o tolite na Spain
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike nke Mahadum Madrid
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke BMCE Bank Foundation
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, ọ tọrọ ntọala nke ọhụrụ 1200 m² Museum of Arts and Traditions of Morocco (MATM) nke ọ na-ewu na nkwụsị nke Moulay Youssef Boulevard na Roudani Boulevard na Casablanca
Ụlọ ahụ, nke onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Tarik Oualalou mere, dị mita 26 n'ịdị elu ma kwadoro ya iji kwụọ nde MAD 79
Emechara ụlọ ahụ n'afọ 2018

Ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Alaouite Organisation for the Protection of the Blind and Moroccan Red Cross, osote onye isi oche nke Association of Medical Doctors na Morocco, na onyeisi oche nke Benjelloun-Mezian Foundation
Ọ lụrụ Othman Benjelloun kemgbe afọ 1960, ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ; Dounia, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na Kamal, ọkà mmụta gbasara mmadụ na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
LeRoy Foster (1925-1993) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si Detroit, Michigan
A maara ya nke ọma màkà nnukwu mgbidi ọ sere na mgbidi nke ụlọ ọrụ Detroit, dị ka Life & Times of Frederick Douglass, na Detroit Public Library, na Renaissance City, na Cass Technical High School
O dekwara foto nke ndị ama ama dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ bụ Paul Robeson
A mụrụ Foster na Detroit na úbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Mee, 1925, ma biri ebe ahụ ndụ ya niile, ma e wezụga oge dị mkpirikpi mgbe ọ gụrụ nka na Europe na 1940s
Foster malitere ise ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ma ọ bụ isii, ọ bụkwa nwa akwụkwọ nka pụrụ iche, nke ndị nkuzi na ndị ọgbọ ya matara mgbè ọ dị obérè
Ọ dị mma ruo mgbe m gbara afọ iri na abụọ, ọ chetara, mgbe ahụ hel niile gbapụrụ
Ndị mmụọ ọjọọ na-achịkwa m
otu ụzọ isi chụpụ ndị mmụọ ọjọọ ahụ bụ ise ihe
N'afọ 1939, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na ngosi nke Pen na Palette Club, ebe ọzụzụ na oghere studio maka ndị na-ese ihe ojii nke Detroit Urban League kwadoro
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị otu ahụ
Na Pen na Palette Club, Foster mụụrụ onye na-ese ihe na Hungary bụ Francis de Erdely, onye a ma ama màkà nkà ya n'ise ihe
Foster gara Cass Technical High School ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Cranbrook Academy of Art na Bloomfield Hills

Site n'enyemaka nke ndị nkụzi ya na Cass, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ na Society of Arts and Crafts (nke bụzi College for Creative Studies), ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru onye na-ese ihe Sarkis Sarkisian
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, Foster nọrọ oge na-agụ akwụkwọ na Europe, na Académie de la Grande Chaumière na Paris, na Heatherley School of Fine Art na London
Foster bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya, na dị ka ndị enyi ya si kwuo, ọ na-ekwu okwu banyéré nkwenye mmekọahụ ya, n'agbanyeghị ibu iro megide nwoke idina nwoke n'oge ahụ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na-echeta ya dị ka ihe nlereanya dị mma, na oriri ndị ọ tụbara na ụlọ ọrụ ya na-aga n'ọtụtụ ebe
Ọzọkwa, otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi ya na ndị na-akwado ya bụ Ruth Ellis, ónyé ama ama Detroit LGBT activist
A na-akpọ Foster dị ka nke onwé ya Michelangelo, ndị enyi ya na-ewere ya dị ka ónyé isi nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii na Detroit n'oge ahụ

A bịara mara ya gburugburu obodo ahụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nke nwere nkà n'ahụ mmadụ, onye na-ise ihe osise mara mma, na, ma eleghị anya, onye a ma ama, onye na'ahụ maka ihe osise ọha na eze nke nwere nkwenye na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị ndị Africa America
N'afọ 1958, Foster nyèrè aka chọta, ya na ndị na-ese ihe Charles McGee na Henri Umbaji King, Contemporary Studio na John C
Lodge Expressway

Ụlọ ihe nkiri a ma ama, akụkụ nke netwọk na-eto eto nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii, bụ echiche nke Henri King na Harold Neal, tinyere ndị na-eme ihe nkírí irí na isé ndị ọzọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Society of Arts and Crafts
Oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Society n'okpuru Sarkis Sarkisian jikọtara ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe ojii Detroit na-arụsi ọrụ ike bụ ndị Sarkisian duziri
Ónyé Detroit na ónyé bụbu ónyé na-ese ihe osise nke Michigan Chronicle bụ Telitha Cumi Bowens bụ ónyé LeRoy Foster na-echebe
Foster na-arịa ọrịa shuga na ahụike ya na-akawanye njọ mere ka ọ kpuru ìsì ma tụfuo ụkwụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa akụrụ na Machị 23, 1993, na Grace Hospital na Detroit
N'afọ 2018, onye na-ese ihe na Detroit, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-asọmpi Season 1 Skin Wars Felle Kelsaw mepụtara ihe osise ọha na eze akpọrọ 'LeRoy the King' iji sọpụrụ Foster
Mgbidi ahụ dị 100 mita n'ogologo dị na Market on the Avenue, oghere obodo, na Livernois Avenue gafere Mahadum Detroit Mercy, na nso ebe Foster biribu
LeRoy Woodson Jr
(Amụrụ n'afọ 1944 - Febuwarị 12, 2015) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
Ọ bụ onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin National Geographic na 1970s na 1980s
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin, gụnyere The Washington Post, LIFE, Fortune, na Forbes
Woodson bụ onye ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi maka ọrụ foto Documerica ha
O nwere ọrụ na nchịkọta nke Studio Museum na Harlem, dere akwụkwọ nri akụkụ okporo ụzọ ma guzobe ebe nrụọrụ weebụ MilitaryWeekcom
A mụrụ LeRoy Woodson na California n'afọ 1944

Ọ bụ nwa onye ọrụ mba ofesi nke United States ma tolite na France ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École Pascal Mgbe ọ laghachiri United States, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Florida A&M University High School na Tallahassee, Florida, na 1962
O nwetara nzere na French na Mahadum Wisconsin dị na Madison n'afọ 1966
Ebighị na Washington, DC, maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya, Woodson rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na onye nta akụkọ
O nwere njikọ na Contact Press Images na ụlọ ọrụ foto French Gamma
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na magazin LIFE, National Geographic, The Washington Post, Fortune, Forbes, Businessweek, na Geo magazine
Ọ bụ onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ na National Geographic, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ site n'afọ 1973 ruo afọ 1982
E wezụga ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ ya, ụlọ ọrụ goro Woodson ka ọ na-ese foto ndị ọrụ ha, ndị isi na ụlọ ọrụ ha
Ọ na-agakarị mba ọzọ maka ọrụ foto akụkọ na site n'afọ 1982 ọ gara mba iri anọ
Woodson rụrụ ọrụ na Iraq na Iran
N'ime ọnwa atọ ọ nọrọ na Zimbabwe, o jiri mpịakọta ihe nkiri 400 kpuchie mgbanwe na gọọmentị
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya na-ekpebi ụdị foto o mepụtara, ọ bụghị mgbe niile ka ọ kwenyere n'echiche mbipụta ahụ

Woodson were ọtụtụ foto n'afọ 1972 na-edekọ mmetụta nke mmetọ ụlọ ọrụ na ndụ ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị, na-elekwasị anya na akụkụ ụfọdụ na ndị bi n'ụlọ obibi dị nso na North Birmingham, ụlọ ọrụ US Steel nke Alabama
Usoro a bụ akụkụ nke Documerica, ọrụ foto nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Nchedo Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
A họọrọ ihe oyiyi sitere na usoro ahụ ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi 2013 Searching for the Seventies The Documerica Photography Project
Woodson dere akwụkwọ afọ 1986 nri akụkụ okporo ụzọ, nke gụnyere foto ndị o sere na kọfị ndị dị n'akụkụ ụzọ na United States n'ime otu afọ
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere 100 foto na edemede sitere n'aka ndị edemede dị iche iche banyere nkịta ọkụ New York, nri ụtụtụ Amerịka, Cajun gumbo na donuts
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-akọwa enweghị mmasị ya na McDonald's ma na-atụ aro na nha kachasị mma maka hamburger bụ 'n'ebe dị ihe dị ka ounces ise'
Isiokwu ndị Woodson jidere n'oge ọrụ ya gụnyere Maine lobstermen na Nigeria's Argungu Fishing Festival
O sere foto ndị ama ama dịka onye na-emepụta ejiji André Courrèges, Eddie Murphy maka mkpuchi nke Life, na Susan Sarandon
E ji foto ya nke onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Thaddeus Garrett mee ihe maka mkpuchi nke magazin Black Enterprise na 1981

Ọ sere foto nke ọnwa Ọctoba 9, 1971, nke John Lennon na Yoko Ono na ihe ngosi ya This Is Not Here na Everson Museum of Art Ihe osise ojii na nke ọcha na-ejide di na nwunye ahụ site na prism nke ite mmiri
Woodson sonyere na Footsteps of Champagne Charlie Challenge na 1992

Asọmpi ahụ, nke aha ya bụ onye ahịa Champagne bụ Charles Heidsieck, hụrụ Woodson na onye na-ese foto Ana Esperanza Nance na asọmpi megide ndị otu ise ndị ọzọ n'ọsọ gburugburu ụwa n'efeghị efe ma ọ bụ jiri ụgbọala na-akwọ onwe ha

LeSean Thomas (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975 na South Bronx, New York City ) bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe nkiri telivishọn, onye nduzi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ese akwụkwọ ọchị, onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-ese akụkọ, nke dị na Meguro, Tokyo

Ọrụ ya na nso nso a, ndị a ma ama gụnyere usoro TV Black Dynamite maka Adult Swim, The Legend of Korra maka Nickelodeon, Aaron McGruder's The Boondocks maka Sony Pictures Television, Children of Ether na Crunchyroll, na Netflix anime mbụ usoro Cannon Busters na Yasuke

Onyinye Thomas dị ka onye na-elekọta onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi na oge 1 na 2 nke Adult Swim's animated series The Boondocks, nyere aka mee ka a họpụta ihe ngosi ahụ maka NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Comedy Series ma merie Peabody Award

Mmepụta mbụ ya gụnyere onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, nhazi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro ntanetị nke Showtime bụ WhirlGirl, onye enyemaka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka Lizzie McGuire na onye na-ese akụkọ maka ihe ngosi dị iche iche dị ka Kim Possible na Disney Channel, Ben 10 Alien Force for Cartoon Network, The Batman, Batman The Brave and the Bold na Green Lantern First Flight, yana onye na-elekọta onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri maka Superman / Batman Public Enemies for Warner Bros
LeSean nwetara nkwekọrịta mmepụta mbụ ya na George Jackson's UBO Network, ebe o mepụtara usoro ihe nkiri n'ịntanetị a na-akpọ BattleSeed
Thomas dere, mepụta ma duzie usoro a nke e gosipụtara na New York Anime Film Festival na 2000
O mepụtara BattleSeed mbụ animated trailer nke gosipụtara na ụlọ ihe nkiri dị ka nkwado trailer maka Sci-Fi Channel
Thomas nyekwara mmepe mmepụta maka ihe nkiri UltraViolet
Thomas bụkwa onye na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, na-arụ ọrụ na utu aha ndị dị ka Arkanium, na Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere sketch bible Nervous Breakdowns The Art of LeSean Thomas Vol
O weputara akwụkwọ nka Midnight Marauder The Art of LeSean Thomas Vol
2 na Cannon Busters, akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe osise nke onye okike
N'afọ 2009, Thomas kwagara Seoul, South Korea, na arịrịọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Korea JM Animation ka e were ya n'ime ụlọ dị ka akụkụ nke ndị ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri
E mechara were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese akụkọ / ihe nkiri na Studio Mir maka ọrụ na The Legend of Korra maka Nickelodeon

N'oge na-adịghị anya, Moi Animation studio lere anya iji ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi na ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ nweere onwe ha, na-egosi ya dị ka onye mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri America ka e goro ịrụ ọrụ n'ime ụlọ dị ka ndị ọrụ mmepụta onwe ha na-adịgide adịgide maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na South Korea

E dekọrọ ma gosipụta ihe omume ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Korea ma gosipụta ya na ihe nkiri weebụ ọ mepụtara ma duzie nke a na-akpọ Seoul Sessions, nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Coodie & Chike's Creative Control TV gosipụtara, netwọk TV n'ịntanetị nke gosipụtara mkpuchi nke talent na egwu, ejiji na nka
E mechara kpọọ Thomas ka ọ kwuo okwu na TEDx nke ise kwa afọ na Incheon, South Korea, ebe o kwuru banyere njem ya na mkpa nke 'Successful Failures'
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Thomas ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Black Dynamite maka Adult Swim
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi nlekọta maka Oge nke mbụ na onye nduzi nlekọta na Oge nke abụọ

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, Thomas nwere ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri TV ịtụkọ ego ọha nke a na-akpọ Cannon Busters The Animated Series, dabere na akwụkwọ ọchị nke onye okike ya nke otu aha ahụ, nke gosipụtara mmepụta nke Japanese anime studio Satelight
E nwetara ego nke ọma na December 2014 ma wepụta ya nye ndị na-ege ntị na July 8, 2016

N'ọnwa Ọktọba, Thomas sonyere Crunchyroll maka nkwekọrịta pụrụ iche iji mepụta ihe okike anime mbụ ya Children of Ether, wepụtara na ụlọ ihe nkiri narị atọ, Julaị 26 dị ka akụkụ nke Crunchyroll's Anime Movie Night event
E wepụtara ya n'elu ikpo okwu n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa na Cannon Busters bu nke Netflix zụtara ka Satelight na Japanese anime studio Yumeta Company mepụta ya dị ka obere usoro ihe nkiri iri na abụọ ma bụrụ nke e debere na mbụ maka ntọhapụ na Maachị 2019
Na Julaị 2019, a mara ọkwa na Anime Expo na a kwadoro Cannon Busters maka mmalite na ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Ọgọstụ 2019

Na Nọvemba 8, 2018, Netflix kwupụtara Yasuke, usoro ihe nkiri anime mbụ nke Thomas kere, duzie ma mepụta, nke sitere na mkpali nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke samurai Yasuke nke Africa bụ onye jere ozi Oda Nobunaga na ngwụsị afọ 1500, nke gosipụtara onye na-eme ihe nkiri arọpụtara maka ihe nrite Oscar Lakeith Stanfield (Atlanta, Get Out, Sorry to Bother You na Knives Out) dị ka olu ndu nke Yasuke ma jee ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe n'akụkụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Grammy Award, Flying Lotus, onye mepụtara egwu ahụ ma rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ụlọ ihe nkiri nke ụlọ ihe nkiri Japan, MAPPA na-ahụ maka mmepụta ihe nkiri
A tọhapụrụ Yasuke na Eprel 29, 2021
Na Nọvemba 17, 2021, a họpụtara Yasuke nke Netflix maka Best Main Title na TV show / Limited Series Category na The 12th Hollywood Music in Media Awards
Na Jenụwarị 19, 2022, a họpụtara Yasuke nke Netflix maka Outstanding Animated Series na 53rd NAACP Image Awards

Joseph Athanase Tshamala Kabasele (16 Disemba 1930 na Matadi, Belgian Congo (nke bụzi Democratic Republic of the Congo) - 11 Febụwarị afọ 1983 na Paris, France), nke a maara dị ka Le Grand Kallé, bụ onye Congo na-agụ egwu na onye isi egwu, a na-ewere ya dị ka nna nke egwu Congo nke oge a
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye ndú nke otu egwu, Le Grand Kallé et l'African Jazz, nke o tinyere aka na ọtụtụ egwu ama ama, gụnyere Indépendance Cha Cha
A mụrụ Joseph Athanase Tchamala Kabasele na Matadi, Bas-Congo n'ebe bụ bu Belgian Congo n'oge ahụ, Democratic Republic of Congo nke oge a
O sitere n'ezinụlọ Congo a ma ama, nke gụnyere Kadinal Joseph Malula
Kallé gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee ghọọ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa dị iche iche na isi obodo Belgian Congo, Léopoldville
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1950, na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Opika, Kasabele nwetara ohere ịchụso ọrụ egwu
O sonyeere mmadụ abụọ n'ime ndị na-egwu egwu na Opika records, Georges Doula na Albert Yamba-Yamba, iji mepụta otu a na-akpọ Groupe Doula Georges
N'afọ 1951 Doula na ndị otu ya pụtara na ihe nkiri mgbasa ozi maka ụlọ ọrụ redio Voix de la Concorde, nke na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru akwụkwọ ozi 'OTC'
Iji nweta aha ọjọọ e nwetara site na ihe nkiri ahụ, ndị otu ahụ họọrọ ịhazigharị onwe ha OTC
N'afọ 1953, n'ịbụ onye enweghị nkụda mmụọ na enweghị ọganihu na OTC, o guzobere l'African Jazz, nke ụfọdụ na-ewere dị ka òtù Congolese kachasị mkpa
L'African Jazz bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị ewu ewu n'egwuregwu Rumba nke Africa
N'oge ọ kachasị elu, L'African Jazz gụnyere nnukwu aha dịka onye na-akpọ ụbọ Dr Nico Kasanda, onye na-agụ ụbọ Manu Dibango na ndị na-agụ egwu Tabu Ley Rochereau, Sam Mangwana na Pepe Kalle
N'afọ 1960, o guzobere akara nke ya, Subourboum Jazz, nke bụ ebe Franco Luambo's TPOK Jazz
Grand Kallé bụ onye na-ahụ maka nkwekọrịta dị egwu na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Europe iji hụ na ndekọ dị elu nke egwu egwu ya maka ahịa Francophone
N'etiti afọ 1960, Kallé nwere nnukwu nsogbu mbụ ya mgbe abụọ n'ime ndị ọ na-akwado (Tabu Ley Rochereau na Dr Nico Kasanda) hapụrụ iji guzobe otu nke ha a na-akpọ Africa Fiesta
Kallé enwetaghị onwe ya site na ndaghachi azụ a, na-elekwasị anya n'ịzụlite nkà nke onye na-agụ egwu Pépé Kallé
Dị ka onye ama ama na Belgium Congo, a họọrọ Kallé dị ka onye otu ndị nnọchi anya Congo na 'Round Table Conference' na nnwere onwe Congo n'afọ 1960
O dere ọtụtụ egwu na isiokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọkachasị 'Indépendance Cha Cha' na 'Table Ronde'
Le Grand Kallé nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Paris, France, na 11 Febụwarị n'afọ 1983
E liri ya na Gombe Cemetery na Kinshasa
Kabasele bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ndị na-agụ egwu Africa nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ọ bụ onye egwu mbụ na-agwakọta ụda Cuban na ụda ọdịnala Africa iji mepụta ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Soukous
Ọ bụkwa onye egwu Afrịka mbụ mepụtara akara ndekọ nke ya
A na-akpọ ya 'Nna nke Egwú Congolese'
(Lee peeji ahụ)
Le Grand Kallé et l'African Jazz, nke a na-akpọkarị African Jazz, bụ òtù rumba (soukous) Congolese a ma ama ma nwee mmetụta dị ukwuu site na Democratic Republic of the Congo nke oge a
E hiwere ya na afọ 1953 na Léopoldville (Kinshasa nke oge a) n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị Belgium, Joseph Kabasele Tshamala, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Le Grand Kallé, duziri otu ahụ
Ìgwè ahụ hụrụ ọganihu ya n'etiti afọ 1958 ya na afọ 1962, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ndị otu ya gbara ọsọ ndụ na afọ 1963
A maliteghachiri ya n'oge na-adịghị anya na afọ 1966
African Jazz sitere na ọdịbendị obodo Léopoldville n'ime afọ iri gara aga nke ọchịchị Belgium na Congo
Egwú ya, nke ndị otu ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti n'Afrịka na-eto eto na-akpali, ghọrọ ihe a ma ama n'oge ọ na-aga n'ihu na nnwere onwe dị ka ngosipụta nke obi ike na-arịwanye elu nke mba ahụ
Ụdị egwu ọhụrụ ahụ, nke otu ahụ malitere, jikọtara mmetụta egwu mba ọzọ na ngwá egwu ọdịda anyanwụ na ụda egwu ụmụ amaala
E kere òtù ahụ n'onwe ya na Joseph Kabas Tshele, nke a, nke a maara dị ka Le Grand Kallé, na afọ 1953
Ìgwè ahụ ruru n'ókè nke ihe ịga nke ọma ya n'etiti afọ 1958 na afọ 1962
Na-aga Belgium na afọ 1960 n'oge mkparịta ụka banyere nnwere onwe Congo, African Jazz bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mbụ iwebata egwu ndị Africa na-ewu ewu n'ahịa Europe
Ìgwè ahụ mepụtara egwu 'Indépendance Cha Cha' n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'oge mmalite ya, African Jazz nọgidere na-enwe asọmpi siri ike na ndị ọzọ isi 'rumba orchestra' nke Leopoldville, OK Jazz, nke Franco Luambo Makiadi duziri
Asọmpi ahụ gosipụtara na ịkwaga n'ụdị egwu dị iche iche site n'ìgwè abụọ ahụ nke ga-akọwa ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ nke rumba Congolese nke pụtara n'oge ahụ
African Jazz rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkpọ bata ndị egwu ọhụrụ na ọha na eze Congo
Ndị a gụnyere Nico Kasanda (nke a maara dị ka Docteur Nico) na Tabu Ley Rochereau, ha abụọ ga-aghọ ndị egwu rumba dị mkpa n'onwe ha mgbe etiti afọ 1960 gasịrị
Onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ mmadụ bụ Bob W
White jiri 'ụda dị ọcha, nke cosmopolitan, nke oge a' nke African Jazz site n'etiti afọ 1960 tụnyere 'ụda ọdịnala' nke OK Jazz iji gosipụta arụmaka ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 1963, African Jazz kewara na ndị egwu ya niile hapụrụ iji guzobe otu ọhụrụ, African Fiesta, na-ahapụ Kallé dị ka naanị onye otu African Jazz
N'afọ 1966, Kallé ji otu ndị egwu ọhụrụ wughachi òtù ahụ wee malite njem mba ofesi, mana otu ọhụrụ ahụ kewara na afọ 1967 na ndị egwu hapụrụ iji mepụta otu ọhụrụ
Na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Le Roux Smith Le Roux (1914 rụọ 1963), mgbè ụfọdụ a na-asụgharị LeRoux Smith LeRoux, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri, ónyé mgbasa ozi, ónyé na'enyocha nka na onye na-ere ihe osise, nke a na-ewere dị ka ónyé ọkachamara kachasị mma na mba ahụ mepụtara
Le Roux bụ ónyé a ma ama màkà itinye áká na Great Tate Affair

A mụrụ Le Roux Smith Le Roux na Cape Town, nwa Johannes Anthonie Smith (1886 rụọ 1954), ónyé ntà akụkọ, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-enyocha nka, ónyé sonyeere Ossewabrandwag, otu na-akwado ndị Nazi, n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ wee bụrụ ónyé ndú ya na Cape Province
Nwanne Le Roux Anthonie Smith, bụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, ọkachasị nke ụlọ Dutch Reformed Church
Ha jikọrọ aka mgbè Le Roux sere ihe osise màkà otu n'ime ụlọ ụka dị na Ladismith na 1942
N'afọ 1930, Le Roux na-abanye akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Afrikaans a ma ama na Cape Town, Jan van Riebeeck High School
Le Roux gosipụtara nkà dị elu, na-agwụcha ákàrà ugo mmụta ya na Mahadum nke Cape Town Michaelis School n'okpuru John Wheatley mgbè ọ dị afọ 17
Ọ natara bursary gọọmentị iji mụọ ihe osise mural na Ịtali ma nye ya ọrụ na 1938, ya na nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya Eleanor Esmonde-White, iji mepụta murals màkà South Africa House Mural Room
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ndị omenkà abụọ ahụ natara ọrụ iji nye ihe osise maka Cunard Liner Queen Elizabeth

Mgbè ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ sonyeere New Group of artists ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ na Cape Town na Johannesburg, ọkachasị murals nke Mutual Building na Darling Street, Cape Town, rụchara n'afọ 1942
A na-egosikwa mgbanwe ya na ihe osise ya nke Die vlammende Fez, akwụkwọ nke ónyé na-ede uri Afrikaans bụ ID
du Plessis (1900 rụọ 1981) bipụtara na 1944
N'agbata afọ 1943 na 1949 ọ bụ ónyé nduzi nke Pretoria Art Center na ónyé nlekọta nke Pretoria Arts Collection
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na War Art Advisory Committee ma bụrụ ónyé otu International Art Club, South Africa
A họpụtara John Rothenstein dị ka onye nduzi nke Tate na 1938
A màrà ya aka ịchọta ndị nlekọta dị njikere ịrụ ọrụ màkà ụgwọ ọnwa dị ala nke dollar narị atọ300
Mgbè ọ na-eme njem na South Africa na 1950, ọ zutere Le Roux Smith Le Roux
Le Roux mere ka Rothenstein kwenye na o nwere echiche gbasara agbụrụ nke na-ekwesịghị ekwesị na steeti ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, nakwa na ọ ga-ata ahụhụ maka ndị a
N'ịbụ ónyé nwa okorobịa South Africa ahụ masịrị, Rothenstein nyere ya ọkwa nke Deputy Keeper na Tate
Le Roux Smith Le Roux malitere ozugbo mkpọsa iji chụpụ Rothenstein dị ka onye nduzi
O jiri ohere ya na ihe nchekwa ihe chọta ma wepụ ozi nke ga-etinye ónyé nduzi n'ìhè ọjọọ, n'etiti mmebi iwu ndị ọzọ, na-enye ohere ire Renoir site na Courtauld Fund na-enweghị usoro kwesịrị ekwesị

Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ileghara usoro nka dị mkpa nke Europe ányá dị ka Fauvism, Cubism, Futurism na Surrealism nke kpasuru iwe nke ndị na-anakọta ihe dị ka Douglas Cooper, onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme na ónyé na-anakọtara ọrụ Cubist
Ezigbo enyi Cooper bụ Graham Sutherland, onye na-ese ihe, bụ Trustee nke Tate ma kwado Le Roux
Lord Beaverbrook were Le Roux n'ọrụ, na-anọdụ ala na panel nke ndị ọkàikpe nke ngosi foto Daily Express na 1955
Ndị ọka ikpe ibe ya bụ Graham Sutherland, onye ọkà ihe ọmụma nka Herbert Read na Anthony Blunt, nke e mechara màrà dị ka ónyé otu Cambridge Five

Lea Vivier (amụrụ na 15 Jenụwarị 1992) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro Showmax a kpọrọ Dam (2021) nakwa ngosipụta ya na ihe nkiri The Day We Didn't Meet (2021) and Wonderlus (2017)
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town, South Africa, nye onye nkuzi ihe nkiri Adri Troksie Vivier na onye ọka iwu Pieter De Bruin Vivier, Lea Vivier bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne anọ
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye, Trix Vivier, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn afọ 2019 a kpọrọ Trackers nke sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Deon Meyer
Mgbe ọ nọ na Waterfront Theatre School na-amụ ballet oge ochie, ịgba egwu nke oge a, na ihe nkiri, Vivier gụsịrị otu afọ nke nkuzi Speech and Drama site na Trinity College London
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Jan van Riebeeck High School, Vivier gara obodo Chile, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-asụ Spanish nke ọma
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town na-amụ maka inweta Bachelor of Arts
O mechara gaa Mahadum Rhodes, na Makhanda (Grahamstown), iji mezue akara ugo mmụta ya, okpukpu atọ na English Literature, Drama, na Afrikaans Dutch Studies na 2015
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, nke ụfọdụ n'ime ha gosipụtara na National Arts Festival, ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Vivier malitere na ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Wonderlus, nke Johan Cronje duziri
Ọrụ Vivier dị ka onye na-ere nri a na-akpọghị aha mere ka o nweta ihe nrite Best Actress na Silwerskerm Film Festival na 2017 na nhọpụta maka Best Actress in the Winter Film Awards
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Louisa na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Runner, ebe o ritere ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri mkpirikpa na Five Continents International Film Festival Award na Eprel 2018
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn nke gụnyere Mense Mense, Die Spreeus, Fynskrif, Binnelanders, na The Girl from St Agnes
N'afọ 2021, Vivier weere ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro Showmax Dam na Johan Cronje's The Day We Didn't Meet
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Vivier rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Madeline Evans na M-Netī Legacy, ọ ga-apụta na usoro Netflix na-abịanụ Ludik na Resident Evil Welcome to New Raccoon City
Fim
Telivishọn
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na Five Continents International Film Festival
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Silwerskerm Film Festival
Leadership bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mba Naịjirịa kwa ụbọchị
Emebere ya n'October 2004 site n'aka Sam Nda-Isaiah, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-ere ọgwụ, a na bipụta ya site na Leadership Newspaper Group nke dabeere na Abuja, Nigeria
Na webụsaịtị ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-ekwu, sị “Anyị ga-akwado ọchịchị dị mma
Anyị ga-agbachitere ọdịmma ala Naijiria ọbụna megide ndị isi ya, anyị ga-ebulikwa mkpịsị akwụkwọ anyị elu mgbe niile na-agbachitere ihe ziri ezi
Ndị a bụ ụkpụrụ anyị bu n'obi na-atụle'
Na 9 Jenuarị 2007 ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti iri na abụọ wakporo ụlọ ọrụ ndị ndu wee jide onye isi njikwa Abraham Nda-Isaiah, onye nchịkọta akụkọ Bashir Bello Akko na onye nta akụkọ Abdulazeez Sanni

Ihe kpatara ya bụ akụkọ onye odeakụkọ Danladi Ndayebo dere nke tụlere ụzọ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na pati na-achi People's Democratic Party (PDP) nke butere nhọpụta Umaru Musa Yar'Adua dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala

Na 6 Mai 2008 otu ndị uwe ojii na-adịghi eyi uwe oji sitere na Niger State Command wakporo ụlọ ọrụ Leadership ma jide onye osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Danladi Ndayebo, dịka o doro anya na-enweghị akwụkwọ ikike ọ bụla
Dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ, Prince Charles Dickson si kwuo, ihe kpatara ya bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme kwuru na ọ kparịrị àgwà Senator Isa Mohammed
Leamon Green (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
A mụrụ Green na 1959 n'ọbọdọ Anniston, Alabama

Agụmakwụkwọ ya gụnyere Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum Temple, Philadelphia (1985), Bachelor of Fine Arts site na Cleveland Institute of Art, Ohio (1982) na Studio Arts Degree site na Concord College (1977 rụo 79)
N'afọ 2007, e nyèrè ya ihe nrite Fulbright maka njem gaa Tanzania, ebe ọ biri ma kụzie otu afọ
Ọ bụ ugbu a osote prọfesọ nke ngalaba nka ihe osise na Mahadum Texas Southern dị na Houston

Nwunye ya bụ Susan Wallace, ónyé kụziri akụkọ ihe méré eme na 2015 Art History Bowl Texas State Champions Patrick Smith (Captain), Imran Hyder (Second Chair), Aditya Deshpande (Third Chair), na Leo Gao (Substitute)
A na-edebe ọrụ Green na nchịkọta nke Museum of Fine Arts, Houston

Lean In Women, Work, and the Will to Lead bụ akwụkwọ 2013 na-agba ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha kwado onwe ha n'ọrụ na n'ụlọ, nke onye isi azụmaahịa Sheryl Sandberg na onye edemede mgbasa ozi Nell Scovell dere
Nkọwa nke isiakwụkwọ iri na otu nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ
Ndị nkọwa dị iche iche enyochala Lean In
Na Julaị 2013, akwụkwọ nka nka na nkatọ The Baffler bipụtara otu akụkọ gbasara akwụkwọ na nzukọ ya metụtara LeanInorg

N'ime akụkọ ahụ, Susan Faludi na-arụ ụka na ozi Sandberg nke inye ụmụ nwanyị ike n'ebe ọrụ bụ n'ezie mkpọsa nke ụlọ ọrụ kwadoro; Sandberg na-agba ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha na-ere onwe ha dị ka 'ihe ndị na-ere ahịa' maka ọganihu ọkachamara ma na-akụda ịdị n'otu na iweda mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'usoro n'ebe ọrụ

Edemede a na-ajụkwa nhọpụta nhọrọ nke LeanInorg ji maka ụlọ ọrụ ya 'Platform Partners', ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-ebu ibu site na 'mkpesa EEOC na nso nso a ma ọ bụ na-echere na omume ụlọ ikpe steeti na gọọmentị etiti metụtara ịkpa oke mmekọahụ, iyi egwu mmekọahụ, ịkpa ókè ime ime, nkwalite na-ezighi ezi
atumatu, nchupu na-ezighi ezi, na mmegwara sitere na nwoke na nwanyi megide ndi oru nwanyi'
Zoe Williams na The Guardian zoro aka na Lean In dị ka 'onye nduzi na-eme ka ụmụ nwanyị nwee oké ọchịchọ'
Ọ na-ekwusi ike na ụzọ Sandberg na'ụzọ na na ya na ịkatọ ma na ịkwado omume ndị na - emegide ụmụ nwanyị n'ebe ọrụ
N'oge njem akwụkwọ ya Becoming na 2018, Michelle Obama kwuru Lean In na-agwa ụmụ nwanyị na ị nwere ike ịnwe ya niile
Nope, ọ bụghị n'otu oge
Nke ahụ bụ ụgha
Ọ bụghị mgbe niile ka ọ ga-adabere na ya, n'ihi na ihe aMmekọrịtahụ anaghị arụ ọrụ oge niile
Onye edemede bell hooks dere nyocha dị oke egwu nke akwụkwọ ahụ, nke a na-akpọ 'Dig Deep Beyond Lean In'

hocks na'akpọ ọnọdụ Sandberg 'onye na - nwanyị ụgha' ma kọwaa nguzo ya na nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị n'ebe ọrụ dị ka ihe dị mma nye ndị nwere ike n'obodo ndị ọcha, dị iche na hoks na ngwugwu yiri ka nke ụmụ nwanyị
Hooks na ọ bụla na ụlọ ọrụ na ya chọrọ igwu egwu na nnukwu ìgwè' akwụkwọ na ndị na Sandber, na na mgbasa ozi nwere ikike ịrịgo anyị

Isiokwu ahụ gara n'ihu na-ekwu na Lean In na'eleghara 'ihe mgbochi siri ike nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ya na ndị ọrụ na' na na - ihe kpatara ya bụ na kama mkpọsa 'Lean In' nke na) na 'na-akpali mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ebumnuche ya - inye ụmụ agbọghọ ndụmọdụ banyere otu esi enwe ihe ịga nke ọma n' n-adị irè, Lean Enweghị echiche banyere eziokwu nke intersectionality, nke bụ isiokwu na
Ihe ndị dị n'isiokwu hooks, dị ka agbụrụ, ọkwa, na mmekọahụ, sitere n'ọrụ ya Feminism Is For Everybody

N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ, nko na-akọwa etu esi eme ụmụ nwanyị niile n'otu n'otu; nko kwuru na ụmụ agbọghọ ọcha nwere ihe ùgwù maara na ọnọdụ ha dị iche na nke ụmụnwaanyị ojii / ụmụntakịrị ndị na'acha ọbara ọbara (pg10); ụmụanyị ọcha na ihe nrite nke klas chọrọ nnwere onwe ha na ndị ikom nke ọgbọ ha nwere mmasị karịa ụmụ nwoke na ọha mmadụ (ppg38)
Kathleen Geier tụlere n'isiokwu bụ 'Ụmụ nwanyị ọ nwere nsogbu klaasị?' na nkà ihe ọmụma Sandberg bụ na ọ bụrụ na ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-aga n'ihu n'ọkwa onye ndú na ụmụ nwanyị niile ga-erite uru

Nzaghachi Geier na echiche a bụ 'Enweghị obere ihe mere ị ga-eji nwee okwukwe na ụdị Sandberg 'trickle-down' feminism ga-abara ọha mmadụ uru karịa ka akụ na ụba ya nwere… na nkwalite onwe onye kama imekọ ihe ọnụ na-enye ọtụtụ ndị inyom nọ n'aka ekpe nsogbu' Geier na-adụ ọdụ na nanị ụzọ dị irè na nke na-adịgide adịgide iji kwalite nha anya akụ na ụba bụ site na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mkpokọta; imejuputa mmemme ụfọdụ dị ka nlekọta ụmụaka zuru ụwa ọnụ, ezinụlọ na-akwụ ụgwọ na ezumike ọrịa, na okpu ụdị nke Europe maka oge ọrụ ga-adabara ụmụ nwanyị nọ na klaasị niile

N'otu akwụkwọ akụkọ The Nation ahụ, Judith Warner, onye isi ibe na Center for American Progress na onye edemede, yiri Geier site n'ikwu na nwanyị kwesịrị ilekwasị anya na nsogbu nhazi ọ bụghị mmegharị nke onye ọ bụla
Ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị ịchọta ahụmahụ ndị na-eme ka ha dị n'otu na-echefughị ​​ọdịiche dị na klaasị, agbụrụ, agụmakwụkwọ, na ike nke na-ekewa ha
Warner na-akwadokwa na otu n'ime omume kacha dị irè maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị bụ ọgụ maka mgbanwe n'ebe ọrụ bara uru
Onye ntinye aka nke atọ na akụkọ Mba bụ Heather McGhee, onye isi oche nke Demos

Ọ na-akọwa na usoro azụmahịa nke na-adabere n'ụgwọ akwụkwụ ụgwọ n'aka ndị nọ n'okpuru ọchịchị obodo ha na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị - ụmụ nwanyị nakwa nke ndị mbata, ndị agba agba, na ndị ogbenye - agaghị abụ nwanyị mgbe nwanyị na-agbaji
site na CEO

McGhee kwuru ụfọdụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Demos gbakọtara, nke na-egosi na ọdịiche akwụ ụgwọ nwoke na nwanyị na-ere ahịa na-efu ụmụ nwanyị ihe ruru ijeri $408 n'ụgwọ furu efu kwa afọ, ngụkọta nke ga-arị elu ijeri $381 na mkpokọta site na 2022
ụmụ nwanyị
Tinyere Kathleen Geier, Judith Warner, na Heather McGhee, Nancy Folbre, onye prọfesọ akụ na ụba na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst, tụlere n'isiokwu banyere Lean In n'ihe gbasara intersectionality
Folbre gosipụtara intersectionality dị ka ndị na-esonụ, 'ọ bụ ihe karịrị ụzọ anọ ụzọ nkwụsịtụ, ọ dịghị ọkụ okporo ụzọ na ndị mmadụ na-amaghị mgbe ụzọ na-atụgharị
Ụfọdụ, ụgbọala okomoko SUVs, ga-n'ụzọ zuru okè mma
Ndị ọzọ, na ụkwụ, O yikarịrị ka ọ ga-emerụ ahụ, okike bụ ihe dị mkpa nke njirimara mkpokọta
Otú ahụ ka ọ dịkwa klaasị, agbụrụ, agbụrụ na ụmụ amaala' Folbre na-aga n'ihu na-ekwu na Lean In na-akwado nyocha nke etiti dịka ihe a na-elekwasị anya na ahaghị nhata n'akwụkwọ ahụ dabere na okike
Ọzọkwa, akwụkwọ ahụ na-agwa ndị inyom ole na ole ahọpụtara okwu bụ́ ndị na-achọ ịkwalite ọrụ ha, ọ bụghị ndị na-agbasi mbọ ike ịchọta na ịnọgide na-arụ ọrụ kwụsiri ike
Susan Faludi na-ekwu n'otu akụkọ CNN na a na'awakpo Lean In nke Sandberg maka ihe niile na - ezi ihe kpatara ya
Faludi na-akọwa na ndị na'asọmpi Lean In enweghị ike ịrụ ụka megide Sandberg n'ekwughị banyere ego ya na square footage nke ụlọ ya (1 ijeri na 9,200, n'otu nʼotu)

Faludi na-ekwupụta na nsogbu na 'Lean In' bụ na ọ na'ịhapụ ndị nne na nna naanị ha 'LanIn na - na na N'isiokwu ahụ, Faludi kwuru na imeziwanye ndụ ndị nne na-alụbeghị di chọrọ ihe karịrị igosi ụmụ nwanyị nwere ihe ùgwù otu ha ga-esi gaa n'ihu na ọha mmadụ

Echiche a na-emetụta ndị inyom nke oge a bụ ndị na'arụ ụka maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị iji kwado 'nne' (gụnyere ndị nne na ha na ya) dị ka ahụmahụ na na -enye ike kama ịbụ mmegbu

N'afọ 2015, OR Books bipụtara Lean Out The Struggle for Gender Equality in Tech and Start-up Culture, nke Elissa Shevinsky dezigharịrị, Nke gụnyere ọtụtụ edemede na-eme ihe ndị dị n'elu ma na'akọ ahụmahụ dịgasị iche iche banyere otú ihe mgbochi ụmụ nwanyị na teknụzụ si dị

Na nzaghachi maka ihe ịga nke ọma nke akwụkwọ ahụ, Sandberg tọrọ ntọala LeanInorg (nke a makwaara dị ka Lean In Foundation) n'otu afọ ahụ, e bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ, otu òtù 501 (c) (3) na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ, raara onwe ya nye 'inye ụmụ nwanyị mkpali na-aga n'ihu
na nkwado iji nyere ha aka imezu ebumnuche ha' Nzukọ a na-enye akụrụngwa nkuzi na mmemme na-akwado ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị
Lean Out Mgbalị maka ịha nhatanha nwoke na nwanyị na teknụzụ na omenala mmalite bụ akwụkwọ 2015 nke Elissa Shevinsky dere, onye ọchụnta ego nchekwa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị
Shevinsky dere ya na nzaghachi nye Sheryl Sandberg's Lean In, akwụkwọ ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na'anya na ọ bụ ihe na na - ihe ezi uche na ya n'ahụ ụmụ agbọghọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Inc
depụtara akwụkwọ ahụ dịka otu n'ime akwụkwọ azụmahịa 100 kacha mma nke 2015

Nyocha akwụkwọ akụkọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụwa niile na nkwado ha banyere ọrụ Shevinsky, na Los Angeles Times na-ekwu na 'akwụkwọ a abụghị naanị maka ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ịchọrọ ịpụ n'ọsọ oke wee malite ihe nke ha
Akwụkwọ a jupụtara na akụkọ
Ọ dịkarịa ala otu nyocha na-ekwu na 'ihe odide ndị ahụ na'ikpeazụ na ọdịdị, ozi siri ike, ọkwa nhazi, na oke

N'etiti nkatọ siri ike nke nerd sociology na akụkọ dị mkpa nke micro na macro aggressions, e nwekwara ọtụtụ resumes dị ogologo na-enweghị isi na akwụkwọ ntuziaka enyemaka onwe onye nke ndị isi obodo n'akwụkwọ ahụ

Leanne Manas (amụrụ ná mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1978) bụ nwanyị South Afrịka na-azụ ahịa na onye na-eweta ihe ngosi TV na SABC akachasị mara dị ka arịlịka nke ihe ngosi flagship, Morning Live
Manas nwere akwụkwọ nzere BA (Hons) na bekee na nzikọrịta ozi ya na diplọma na nkuzi okwu na ihe nkiri sitere na Trinity College London
Mmasị ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara ego mere ka ọ gụchaa diploma nke dị elu na Ekọnọmiks Journalism na Mahadum Rhodes
Ọrụ mgbasa ozi Manas malitere n'afọ 2001, ya na-irụ ọrụ eneghị anya na azụ na Essential Business Channel Summit TV
Nke a dịruru ruo n'afọ 2003
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Essential Business Channel Summit TV, ọ malitere ịnabata mmemme SABC 3, nkwalite Azụmaahịa na nlekwasí Azụmaahịa
N'afọ 2004, Manas ghọrọ onye ngosi na mmemme nri ụtụtụ kacha ogologo na South Afrịkaa, SABC 2's Morning Live
Manas rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ redio dịka Radio Algoa, Jacaranda FM, Safm na ọwụwa anyanwụ Coast Radio
UNHCR, United Nations Refugee Agency họpụtara ya onye nnọchi anya ezi obi na ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2019

Tupu isonyere Telkom, ọ bụ otu onyeisi nke Transnet si February 2003 August 2005 na onye isi oche nke Fedics si Jenụwarị 1999 ka Jenụwarị 2003

Ninochka Manoug Kupelian (amụrụ na Nọvemba 14, 1946 na Cairo), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya Lebleba (nke a na-akpọkwa Lubluba), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ngosi ntụrụndụ
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nne nke onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri Feyrouz na onye na-eme ntụrụndụ Nelly
A mụrụ ya na Cairo n'ezinụlọ ndị Ijipt nke ndị Kraịst Armenia
Ọ malitere dị ka nwatakịrị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eṅomi ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu, gụnyere ịpụta na Egyptian National Theater nke Muallem Sadiq kwalitere

E nyere ya ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya site n'aka onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Anwar Wagdi na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu Abo El Seoud El Ebiary na Habeebti Sousou
El Ebiary họọrọ aha Lebleba mgbe ọ hụchara nwa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ọchị, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-agụ egwu Ninochka Kupelian
Lebleba nwetara ohere iso Salah Zulfikar na Borg El Azraa na Fi Saif Lazim Nohib rụọ ọrụ
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Hassan Youssef, mana ha gbara alụkwaghịm

Lebogang Mashile (amụrụ 7 Febụwarị na afo 1979) bụ onye omere South Afrika, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye na-ede uri
Ada nne na nna South Afrika a dọọrọ n'agha, Mashile mụrụ na United States wee laghachi South Afrika n'etiti afo 1990s ka njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
Ọ malitere ịmụ iwu na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum Witwatersrand mana ọ malitere inwe mmasị na nka
Ya na Myesha Jenkins, Ntsiki Mazwai na Napo Masheane, o hiwere otu uri Feela Sistah
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri afo 2004 Hotel Rwanda ma mee n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, gụnyere Threads, nke jikọtara egwu, egwu na uri
Ọ dekọkwara album arụ ọrụ ndụ nke gụnyere egwu na uri, akpọrọ Lebo Mashile Live
O mebere ma kwado mmemme akwụkwọ akụkọ L'Attitude na SABC 1 wee kwado ihe ngosi egwuregwu akpọrọ Drawing the Line na SABC 2
Na afo 2005, o bipụtara nchịkọta abụ mbụ ya, In a Ribbon of Rhythm, nke ọ nwetara onyinye Noma na 2006
Mashile na onye egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede Majola wepụtara EP na afo 2016
Akpọrọ Mashile otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị egwu South Afrika nke afo 2005 site na Cosmopolitan yana otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa kacha elu 100 na South Afrika site na Mail & Guardian na afo 2006, 2007 na afo 2009

N'afọ 2006, The Star kpọrọ ya onye kachasị elu na telivishọn na ndepụta Top 100 ha kwa afọ, na afo 2007 ọ bụ onye nnata nke City Press / Rapport Woman of Prestige Award, ma kpọkwara ya nwanyị nke afọ maka afo 2010 na 2010
Atiya nke Arts and Culture site na magazin Glamour

Akpọrọ Mashile dị ka otu n'ime ndị Top 100 ndị Afrika site na akwụkwọ akụkọ New African na afo 2011 na na afo 2012 ọ meriri ihe nrite onye nnọchi anya Art na mmemme Mbokodo Awards maka South Afrika Women in the Arts
Mashile rụrụ na mmeghe nke nzuko omeiwu na afo 2009
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'ma eleghị anya aha mbụ na-abata n'uche mgbe ọ na-eche maka nwanyị ode akwụkwọ na-eme nnukwu ebili mmiri na oghere uri'
Lebohang Motlomelo bụ onye Mosotho na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe nkiri
O meriri ihe nrite mbụ ya ma ọ bụ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ógbè ahụ na ihe nkiri The Ghost ma nwee nkwado mba ụwa na ihe nkiri ahụ
Leboku ịbụ aha olumba maka Festival' ka amara na ọ bụ ememme New Yam nke ndị Yakaa kwa afọ n'ihi na okwu a bụ asụsụ ndị Yakurr
Ememme iri ji oburu ndi Leboku na obodo ndị na-asụ Yakạ Ugep, Idomi, Ekori, Mkpani na Nko, a na-eme emume mba ụwa na Ugep otu ugboro n’afọ
Obodo nke ọ bụla a kpọtụrụ aha na ọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche na mmemme ahụ nwere ụbọchị dị iche iche ichebe ma ọ bụ wepụta ya maka mmemme n'obodo ha
Ndị a bụ; Lemomor boku, Lelomi boku, Lekoli boku, Lekpanikpani boku na Lekakaa boku
A na-eme nke a iji sọpụrụ chi nwee ụwa na mmụọ nna ochie nke ala dị na Ugep, otu n'ime obodo ise nke Yakurr

Ememme izu atọ bụ nkwusi nke ọtụtụ ihe dinu mmalite nke owuwe ihe ubi ji, oge iji mee ka obi dị chi na ndị nna ochie mma ihe ngosi ọha na eze nke ụmụ agbọghọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, ncheta nke ihe ndị mere ka ha si na ụlọ nna ochie nke Yakurr kwaga
saịtị dị ugbu a, na oge ezumike na kalenda ọdịnala Yakurr (etiti etiti August ruo etiti Septemba)
Kalenda Yakurr na-amalite site na August ruo July
N'oge Leboku, ndị mmadụ na-ezere ọrụ ugbo siri ike ma na-eleta ezinụlọ ha
Leboku bu kwa ka ewebata udo, ezi ahu ike na oganiru
Ọ dị mma
Ememme izu atọ na-amalite na Mblemi
N'ụbọchị a, a na-agbachapụ anya n'owuwe ihe ubi ji ọhụrụ
Ụmụ nwanyị mara mma si n'okporo ụzọ ugbo dị iche iche na otu dị iche iche mechaa were ihe ubi ha mere n'obodo ahụ
Ụbọchị nke abụọ bụ Janenboku, nke a sụgharịrị n'ozọ nkịtị pụtara 'ụbọchị emumme ụmụ nwanyị'
N'ụbọchị a, ndị enyi ha na ndị enyi ha na-enye ụmụ nwanyị onyinye
Ụfọdụ egwu ọdịnala na-emekwa

Ndị njem nlegharị anya n'abalị Janenboku na-eche nhọrọ abụọ ihu - omenala carnival-dị ka ị na-agba egwu na ịgba egwu nke egwu Ekoi iji webata Ledemboku, nke a na-eme na egwuregwu egwuregwu ma ọ bụ Miss Leboku Mma Mma nke oge a, nke a na-eme n'otu
nke Ebe ezumike n'ime obodo
Ụbọchị atọ bụ Ledemboku ma ọ bụ 'ụbọchị ememme ndị nwoke'
Ọ gụnyere mgbanwe ndị nwoke onyinye, ndị nwoke na-agba egwu Ekoi mere, ngagharị nke Obol Lopon na Bi-Inah ya (otu ndị isi ọchịchị), ịgba egwu nke ụmụ agbọghọ Leboku na-eyi ụkwụ na-agba n'ụda nke Ekoi
drum, na ihe ngosi nke Etangala masquerade, nke nanị otu ọpụpụ ya n'afọ bụ n'ụbọchị a
Ekwesiri iburu n'uche na ndi otu Etangala na-anabata ihe nile nwere dika onye isi, onye na-abụghị Ugep, Chief Ig Ekpenyong, Obol Etangala I nke Ugep bụ onye Efik
Mgbe otu ụbọchị ezumike gasịrị, nke na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ Leboku ohere ịzụlite enyi ọhụrụ, nke a maara dị ka Nkokeboi, e nwere Leteboku
Leteboku bụ asọmpi ure dị n'etiti ụmụ agbọghọ Leboku sitere na mpaghara Ugep omenala ọ bụla
Egwu a na-agba egwu, na uda a na-eme n'ụkwụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ na-eyi bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ikiri
Ụbọchị abụọ mgbe Leteboku gasịrị, nke a na-ahụkarị dị ka ụbọchị ezumike, bụ Yekpi
Ọ bụ ụbọchị ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ agbọghọ Leboku mere ngagharịiwe n'obodo ahụ n'ememme kwenyere na ọ ga-eweta udo na ọganihu
Ndị Yeponfawa na-eso ndị Yekpi
Nke a bụ emume edobere naanị maka ndị malite otu Libini, ikowaputa akụkụ nke mbụ nke Leboku
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a na-eme n'abalị, ọ bụkwa ụbọchị ndị na-abụghị ndị mbido na-amụ anya ka ha gee egwu
Mgbe Yeponfawa gasịrị, ụmụ okorobia na ụmụ agbọghọbia na-ekere òkè na egwu na mmemme otu izu site na egwu ha nke a maara dị ka Egbendum (maka ụmụ nwoke) na Oka (maka ụmụ agbọghọ)
Ogbe ọ bụla nwere otu nke ya, nke onye okenye na-eduzi, na-akuziri ha egwu na usoro ịgba egwu
Leboku na-abịa na njedebe na ọpụpụ nke oge Egbendum na Ọka

Lech Wałęsa (múrú yá na Önwa itoolu 29, 1943) bu onye ndọ-ndȯ nké Poland, ndózí ọtú-áhiá, na onyé íjè íwú madu
Onyé íshí, ọ kèrè ya nà onye ozor Solidarność, ọtú-áhiá ndí sovier, nà ȯ nwètèrè onyinye Nobel Peace Prize na afọr 1983, nà ȯ bu Íshí Poland na afọr 1990-95
Ledebouria bụ ụdị ahịhịa nke bulbous perennial nke Africa n'ezinụlọ Asparagus, Asparagaceae, nke ngalaba ezinụlọ nke Scilloideae
Ọtụtụ ndị otu ahụ bụbu akụkụ nke ụdị Scilla
A na-akụ ọtụtụ ụdị site na cacti na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka akwụkwọ ha
Ọtụtụ n'ime ụdị ndị a bụ ndị Madagascar na Africa (ma e wezụga North Africa), mana ole na ole sitere na India, Sri Lanka ma ọ bụ Arabian Peninsula
Aha ụdị nke Ledebouria bụ iji sọpụrụ Carl Friedrich von Ledebour (1786 Xi1851), onye mụrụ maka ọkụkụ ihe nke si German-Estonia

Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmepụta ihe dị ka My Japan, Streetlight with Lips na Porselein

Lefifi Tladi (amụrụ n'ubochí ànó n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1949) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, ónyé na-ede uri, ónyé na'ese ihe na ónyé na-eti egwu
Dị ka onye otu ndị isi ojii na-ahụ màkà ihe ọmụma, a chụpụrụ ya na South Africa n'afọ 1976
Ọ biri na mba ọzọ, ọkachasị na Stockholm, Sweden, rụọ mgbè e wepụrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na 1997 laghachiri South Africa màkà ógè mbụ n'ime ihe karịrị afọ irí abụọ
N'afọ 2021, e nyere ya ihe nrite ndụ site na South African Literary Awards
A mụrụ Lefifi Tladi na 1949 na ọbọdọ Lady Selborne na Pretoria, South Africa
Mmekọrịta ya na ụwa ọdịbendị malitere na 1966 mgbè o guzobere otu klọb ndị ntorobịa a maara dị ka De-Olympia na ọbọdọ Ga-Rankuwa, n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Pretoria
Klọb ahụ kwadoro ọmụmụ ihe, na-agụ uri, ịgba egwú na egwú
Ndị otu ahụ mechara guzobe otu egwu jazz, Malombo Jazz Messengers, nke e mechara kpọwa Dashiki
N'ime afọ ndị 1970 Lefifi malitere itinye aka na Black Consciousness Movement site na ihe omume ọdịnala ya ebe ya na Dashiki rụrụ ọrụ
Dashiki ghọkwara onye na-abịa mgbe niile na nnọkọ ekele jazz nke United States Embassy Tian n'okpuru njikwa Geoff Matlherane Mphakathi
N'afọ 1971, a gbanwere De-Olympia ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ nka, gallery na ebe ngosi nka nkè Black nkè ógè a
Ebumnuche ya bụ igosi nka, ịkpali nyocha, ma gbaa akwụkwọ nke nka Africa ume
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, Lefifi so Motlhabane Mashiangwako, Victor Mkhumbuza, Fikile Magadlela, na Harry Moyaga rụọ ọrụ
Ha hazikwara ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka na ogbako Black na ụfọdụ n'ime mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị isi Black
Nke a bụ nzaghachi màkà nkụda mmụọ nke 'Bantu Educations' nke ndị isi ojii
Mgbè ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike rụọ afọ atọ, ndị ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ manyere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ahụ imechi na 1974
N'afọ 1976, ndị uwe ojii jidere Lefifi ma jide ya màkà isonye na nnupụisi Soweto
E debere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya ihe karịrị ọnwa abụọ tupu a tọhapụ ya na mgbapụta
Mgbè ọ na-apụ na mgbapụta, o kpebiri na ọ gaghị anọ na South Africa n'ihi oke ebubo ọ na-eche ihu wee gbalaga gafee ókèala gaa Botswana
Mgbè ọ nọ na Botswana, ya na ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya guzobere Ngalaba Ọdịbendị Tuka, nhazi ọdịbendị maka ịhazi ihe ngosi otu yana ịkwado mmekọrịta ọrụ na ndị na'ese ihe na South Africa
N'afọ 1977, ha sonyere n'ihe omume otu ọnwa, Festac nke mba ụwa nke nka na ọdịbendị na Lagos, Naịjirịa
Lefifi zutere ónyé nnọchi ányá mbà Sweden mgbè ọ na-eme ihe ngosi na Botswana National Museum na 1980
Nzukọ a mèrè ka Lefifi nata agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ nka na akụkọ nka na Gerlesborg School of Fine Art na Stockholm
Ọ kwagara Stockholm n'afọ sochirinụ
Mgbè ọ nọ na Sweden, Lefifi nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'afọ ahụ, o sonyere n'ihe ngosi 'End White Rule in Black South Africa' nke AIDS kwadoro
N'afọ 1997, Lefifi laghachiri South Africa na nke mbụ ya mgbè e wepụrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

N'afọ 2005, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Aryan Kaganof mere ihe nkiri 'Giant Steps' banyéré ndụ Lefifi Tladi tinyere ndị na-ede uri South Africa Lesego Rampolokeng, Kgafela oa Magogodi, Afurakan, Mac Manaka
Kemgbe afọ 2016 ọ bi na Stockholm ógè niile ma na-aga n'ihu na-egosi ma na-akwado uri na ọrụ nka
Ọ na-enwe mmasị na agụmakwụkwọ ma na-etinye aka na ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nka dị iche iche na South Africa site n'ebe dị ányá
Mmetọ ihe nketa ma ọ bụ ihe mmetọ ihe nketa bụ ihe ndị na-adịgide adịgide na gburugburu ebe a na-emepụta site na ụlọ ọrụ mmetọ ma ọ bụ usoro nwere mmetụta mmetọ mgbe usoro ahụ mechara
Ugboro ndị a na-agụnye mmetọ organic na-adịgide adịgide, ọla dị arọ ma ọ bụ kemịkalụ ndị ọzọ fọdụrụ na gburugburu ogologo oge ka usoro mmepụta ihe ma ọ bụ mmịpụta mepụtara
Ọtụtụ mgbe, ndị a bụ kemịkalụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ma metọọ tupu enwee nghọta zuru ebe niile banyere mmetụta nsi nke ndị na-emerụ emerụ, ma mesịa chịkwaa ma ọ bụ machibido iwu
Ihe mmetọ ndị a ma ama gụnyere mercury, PCBs, Dioxins na kemịkalụ ndị ọzọ na-emetụta ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ebe a na-emetọ ihe nketa gụnyere ebe a na-egwuputa ihe, ogige ntụrụndụ, okporo ụzọ mmiri nke ụlọ ọrụ merụru, na ebe mkpofu ndị ọzọ

Kemịkalụ ndị a na-enwekarị mmetụta karịa na mpaghara mba ndị na-enwe obere ma ọ bụ enweghị nlekota gburugburu ebe obibi ma ọ bụ ụkpụrụ-n'ihi na a na-emepụtakarị kemịkalụ na mpaghara ọhụrụ mgbe amachibidoro ha na ikike ndị a na-achịkwa nke ukwuu
Ọtụtụ mgbe na mba ndị a, enweghi ikike na nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi, ahụike na akụrụngwa obodo iji dozie mmetụta nke mmetọ
Mmetụta nke mmetọ ihe nketa nwere ike ịhụ ọtụtụ afọ ka usoro mmetọ mbụ ahụ gasịrị, ma chọọ mmezigharị gburugburu ebe obibi

Ndị obodo na ndị na-agbachitere gburugburu ebe obibi na-akwadokarị ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na steeti site na omume ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi na nkwado maka nkwado nke ikike mmadụ, dị ka ikike maka gburugburu ebe dị mma
Nkwekọrịta Stockholm na ihe ndị na-emetọ mmiri na-adịgide adịgide bụ otu n'ime usoro mba ụwa maka ịkwado mkpochapụ nke mmetọ organic na-adịgide adịgide dị ka PCBs
Rahul Thakur (born; 22 Feburary 2004) also known as Legend Rahul
Legitng (nke a na-akpọbu Naijcom ) bụ mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na mgbasa ozi Naijiria
A na-ahọrọ ya dị ka akụkọ #1 na ikpo okwu ntụrụndụ yana 7th mkpokọta kachasị eleta na Nigeria site na Alexa Internet
Legitng bụ ihe n
na-ebipụtauko wọ na Facebook nke ndị na-ege ntị na ngalaba 'Media'
Ndị na-ede blọgụ na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na-agụnye Japheth J
Omojuwa, Tolu Ogunlesi, Ogunlowo Joseph, Ibraheem Dooba, Mawuna Koutonin
Legitng na-ewepụtakwa ọdịnaya dabere na akụkọ ndị ọrụ wetara

Leigh Ashton (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1956 na Manchester, England) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye pianist, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-edekọ egwu si Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ Ashton na Manchester, England, na 11 Eprel 1956 wee kwaga South Africa mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ashton bịanyere aka na David Gresham Productions dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na-ede egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Love Me' na Nọvemba 1975
Ashton sooro ụfọdụ ndị egwu kachasị mma na mba ahụ rụọ ọrụ n'oge ahụ nke gụnyere Trevor Rabin, Julian Laxton na Allan Goldswain

N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na 'Colosseum Mighty Music Machine' nke na-aga nke ọma n'akụkụ aha ezinụlọ dị ka Bobby Angel, Bruce Millar, Richard Loring na Sonya Herholdt mana ọ ka nwetara nkwado nke ya
N'afọ 1977, 'Tanya', otu n'ime egwu nke ya, ruru nọmba ịrị na abụọ na chaatị SA dabere na ahịa na-asọmpi na ABBA na Leo Sayer
E wepụtara 'Tanya' na Pye Records n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ na England na Europe
Usoro akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, vidiyo TV, pin up foto na ajụjụ ọnụ redio sochiri ma wepụta egwu nke atọ ya 'Day after Day' abụ ọzọ o dere n'onwe ya

E mechara nye Ashton nkwekọrịta ndekọ na GRC nke Gallo na akara CBS zuru ụwa ọnụ ma mgbe ya na ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ kwurịtara okwu gbanwere GRC iji soro Hilton Rosenthal rụọ ọrụ onye na-emepụta Juluka n'oge ahụ

Ndị na-akwado ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nabatara egwu ya nke anọ na nke ise, 'That Girl' na 'Christmas Song', mana n'ihi nghọtahie dị n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, arụmụka sochiri, ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ hapụrụ egwu ahụ na-enweghị ahịa ma ọ bụ nkwado omume
Tanya, Teenage Lover, Day After Day, That Girl na Auld Lang Syne nọ na YouTube
The Stockley Sisters mechara wepụta otu ụdị nke 'That Boy' na 1977

N'agbata afọ 1978 na afọ 1984, Ashton lekwasịrị anya n'ide egwu ma dee egwu ya kachasị mma n'oge a, nke gụnyere Snowflakes na A Major, Mother, The Park Hobo (nke a na-ewere dị ka nke ya), Give and Take, Nightmare, The Foxtrot, Doubt in My Mind, When You Need a Friend, The Iceman na Keeping It Simple
Keeping It Simple bụkwa aha a tụrụ aro maka abọm ya zuru oke, nke nwere egwu ndị a kpọtụrụ aha na mbụ
Aha ahụ na-emetụta eziokwu ahụ bụ na edere ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ndị a ka a kpọọ ha n'enweghị otu egwu zuru ezu
Ashton abụwo onye otu SAMRO ruo afọ iri anọ
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ dabere na egwu ya iji nweta ihe ọ ga-eri ma họrọ ịrụ ọrụ maka ntụrụndụ
Ọ ka na-eme ihe mgbe niile n'ebe dị iche iche gburugburu Johannesburg, South Africa
'Hụ m n'anya' 1975 'Tanya' 1977 (Rached no 12 on the South African Charts) 'Day After Day' 1977 'That Girl' 1978 'Christmas Song' 1978
Leila Anderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke ọrụ ya na-eme ka ihe nkiri, ihe anya, na ihe ngosi dị mma
Njikọ ya na onye na-ese ihe Dutch Stan Wannet emepụtala ọtụtụ ọrụ ntinye ndụ n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi oge na-adịghị adịte aka na arụmọrụ nke oge a na Mahadum Cape Town
na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ịmata - icw

Ụlọ Ọrụ Nkà
'Dinner for Three' - onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede
Ihe ntinye na arụmọrụ dị ndụ, dị ka akụkụ nke 2012 Infecting the City festival na Cape Town

Leila Afua Djansi (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye America na onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri nke malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'ụlọọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana
A mụrụ Leila Djansi dịka Leila Afua Djansi n'afọ 1981
Nna ya bụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu ebe nne ya bụ onye isi nọọsụ
O tolitere na India na Ghana
Ọ bụ ezie na ime ihe nkiri na ide ihe bụ ihe ntụrụndụ ya, ebumnuche ọrụ ya bụ ịghọ onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa ụmụ nwanyị, atụmatụ nke mechara gbanwee mgbe ọ malitere inwe mmasị na forensics
N'ịkwadebe ịbanye n'ọrụ criminọlọji, mgbanwe ọrụ ọzọ mere mgbe ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana Sam Odoi onye mere ka o kwenye idegara ya edemede
Leila dị afọ iri na itoolu mgbe onye na-emepụta Akwetey Kanyi mere ihe nkiri Babina ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Kabore Primary na JSS, Mawuli School maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị, nke obere na nke sekọndrị niile dị na Ho, na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ihe nkiri ya na National Film and Television School, mana ọ hapụrụ Ghana gaa United States iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ Fịịm Televishọn ya na Savannah College of Art and Design na nka Honors Scholarship
Onye isi oche nke Ghana Library Board Readers club ruo afọ atọ, oge ọ nọrọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere mgbe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi ịma mma mpaghara na 1998
Ọ nwetara ọrụ na Socrates Safo's Movie Africa Productions ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odee na onye na-emepụta ihe
Mgbe ọ nọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, o dere ihe nkiri mbụ nke Ghana Gay na Lesbian rights The Sisterhood, ihe nkiri nke gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana Suzzy Williams
Djansi rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Gama Film Company nke steeti, ebe o dere ma mepụta Legacy of love
Na United States, o guzobere Turning Point Pictures, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe n'onwe ya nke na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

E nyere ihe nkiri mbụ Djansi 2009 worldFest Platinum Award maka ihe nkiri Grass Between My Lips, akụkọ banyere ibi úgwù ụmụ nwanyị na alụmdi na nwunye n'oge, nke e mere n'obodo nta dị n'ebe ugwu GhanaN'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ihe ngosi izizi ya, I Sing of a Well maka ihe nrite ịrị na otu na African Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2011, e nyere Djansi BAFTA / LA Pan African Film Festival Choice Award maka ihe nkiri I Sing of a Well
Na Ghana Movie Awards mbụ na 2011, Djansi's Sinking Sands nwetara onyinye maka 'Best Art Direction', 'Best Costume', 'Best West African Film' na 'Best Picture'
A họpụtara Sinking Sands na ụdị iri na anọ
Nduzi nke atọ nke Djansi, Ties That Bind nwetara Black Reel Awards Nomination na 2012
N'afọ 2016, Leila Djansi duziri Like Cotton Twines nyocha nke omume Trokosi na mba ya bụ Ghana

UNiFEM Ghana, The African Women Development Fund, The Ghana Musicians Association na obodo ndị ọzọ na-eche echiche gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya amatala ọrụ Djansi na onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana

Leila Ghandi ( Arabic ; amụrụ na Julaị 26, 1980, na Casablanca), a na-akpọ ya 'The Moroccan Titouan Lamazou' ma ọ bụ 'Bent Battouta' (Nwa nwanyị Ibn Battuta), bụ onye Morocco na-ese foto na onye nta akụkọ
A mụrụ Leila na Casablanca n'afọ 1980
Ọ bụ nwa Amal Alami na Ali Ghandi, onye bụbu Director General nke Moroccan Association nke ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ nwụrụ na Machị 13, 2010
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ọ banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ Théophile Gautier nke dị na mpaghara Maârif ruo 1991, ụbọchị ọ banyere Lycée Lyautey
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị baccalauréat ya na Lycée Lyautey nke Casablanca na 1998, Leila Ghandi sonyeere n'etiti 1998 na 2002 BEM Management School na Bordeaux ma mụọ azụmahịa mba ụwa
Mgbe e mesịrị, n'afọ 2004, ọ nwetara Master ya na Sciences Po na Strategic Marketing na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Sciences Po, n'agbata afọ 2002 na 2004, o mere mgbanwe na Mahadum Portsmouth wee nweta nzere na European Business and Management
Njem Leila Ghandi na China na 2003
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri mba ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ Franco-Chinese na Beijing dabere na Embassy nke France na China dị ka ọrụ Europe na-ahụ maka ya
N'oge njem ya, ọ na-ezigara ndị ezinụlọ ya ozi ịntanetị mgbe niile iji gwa ha banyere ndụ ọhụrụ ya
Mgbe ọ laghachiri azụ na Morocco, echiche bịara ya iji weta ihe odide ya niile n'ime akwụkwọ
N'ihi ya, ọ bipụtara na Disemba 2006 Chronicles from China nke Le Fennec Editions bipụtara
Okwu mmalite nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Dominique Reynié, onye bụ prọfesọ ya na Sciences Po na Paris
Iji bipụta ọrụ ya, Leila Ghandi nwetara onyinye ego site na Cooperation Service and Cultural Action nke Embassy nke France na Morocco

N'afọ 2008, ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe na 12th International Film Festival Adventure and Discovery na Val-d'Isère N'otu afọ ahụ, o meriri ihe nrite 'Trophy of Success in the Feminine' na Luxembourg Palace, nke odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti maka Urban Policy Fadela Amara nyere
N'afọ 2009, ọ natara ihe nrite edemede maka akwụkwọ ya nke sitere n'aka United States Agency for International Development (USAID)

Kemgbe afọ 2012, o ji aha ya mee ihe omume na 2M TV Voyages avec Leila Ghandi (Njem na Leila Ghandi) nke a na-agbasa kwa ọnwa n'oge kachasị mma maka usoro ihe nkiri Des Histoires et des Hommes (akụkọ ihe mere eme na ụmụ mmadụ)
Ọ bụ usoro ihe nkiri njem nke na-egosipụta ọdịbendị na ndụ nke mba ọ bụla, site na akụkọ mmadụ, ebe ọ na-agbalị iri nri ma soro ndị obodo nọrọ

N'oge njem ya na Palestine na 2013, o zutere ọtụtụ mmadụ nke gụnyere Michel Warschawski, Onye isi ala Mahmoud Abbas ọ gbara ajụjụ ọnụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu awa n'ọfịs ya nke Mukataa na Ramallah

Site na ihe omume a, o meriri n'otu afọ ahụ ihe nrite Anna Lindh Mediterranean Journalist Award TV category, nke Anna Lindh Euro-Mediterranean Foundation haziri maka mkparịta ụka n'etiti ọdịbendị, na-akwalite ndị nta akụkọ nke France 2 na Arte
N'afọ 2013, Leila Ghandi sonyere na ihe nkiri nke Serge Moati 'Méditerranéennes - mille et un combats' [Mediterranean - puku na otu agha], nke a na-agbasa na France 2 na mmemme Infrarouge
Ihe omume ya 'Leila Ghandi na Tunisia' nọ na asọmpi na Monte-Carlo Television Festival na June 2013
Na Jenụwarị 2014, a họpụtara ya na mmadụ iri ise na-eme Morocco site na magazin Jeune Afrique
E gosipụtara usoro ihe omume Voyages avec Leila Ghandi n'ime oge atọ, na site na June 2016 agbasaala ihe omume iri na asatọ
Dị ka TelQuel si kwuo, Leila Ghandi na-enweta ụgwọ ihe dị ka 20 000 dirhams kwa ọnwa (2000 $ USD)
N'oge njem French nke onye na-agụ egwu jazz Dee Dee Bridgewater na 2000, Leila Ghandi so ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu
Percussionist, ọ bụkwa onye otu Brazil 'Batala' nke na-eme n'ọtụtụ ememme
N'agbata ụbọchị nke atọ na ụbọchị nke ise na Mee 2015, ya na ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ, ọ sonyere na mmemme 'Women and Power Leadership in a New World' nke John F
Kennedy School of Government na Mahadum Harvard haziri
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2005, o gosipụtara ụfọdụ ihe atụ gburugburu Abbey nke Saint-Germain-des-Prés na Paris
N'oge njem ya na China, o weere usoro mbụ ya nke a kpọrọ 'Timeless China la Chine d'un autre temps' nke e gosipụtara na Lucernaire Gallery [fr] (Paris) na Jenụwarị / Febụwarị 2006
O gosipụtara otu usoro ahụ na Art Lounge Gallery nke Beirut n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006, n'aha 'Timeless China & spiritual, portraits of Tibet'
Na Jenụwarị 2007, ya na ndị na-ese foto anọ ndị ọzọ sonyere na ngosipụta 'Regards (de)marocains sur le monde' nke emere na Church of the Sacred Heart of Casablanca
N'afọ 2011, Leila Ghandi ritere ihe nrite nke mbụ maka European Union-African Union Professional Photography Competition 'African Beauty in all its states' dị ka onye nnọchi anya North Africa

E gosipụtara foto ya n'isi ụlọ ọrụ nke United Nations Economic Commission for Africa Africa Hall na French Alliance of Addis Ababa n'akụkụ nke 16th AU Summit [fr], nke emere na Jenụwarị 30 na 31, 2011
Na Machị / Eprel 2012, o gosipụtara nchịkọta ya 'Vies à vies' na Art Gallery CDG nke Rabat
Leila Hadioui (a mụrụ n'abalị 16 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1985) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, na onye na-ekwu okwu na telivishọn
A mụrụ Hadioui na Casablanca n'afọ 1985
Nna ya Noureddine Hadioui bụ muezzin nke ụlọ alakụba Hassan nke Abụọ na Casablanca
O nwere mmasị na ejiji site na nwata, na-elekarị mmemme ejiji na telivishọn
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye na-ese onyinyo
Hadioui sooro ndị na-emepụta ihe Morocco na-arụkọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi Caftan afọ 2007
N'afọ 2007, ọ gara njem na Paris, ma mesịa guzobe akara uwe ụmụ nwanyị nke ya
Hadioui bụ ihu Diamantine na GC
N'afọ 2010, Hadioui pụtara na ihe nkiri TV Les Enfants Terribles de Casablanca, nke Abdelkarim Derkaoui duziri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi mmemme ejiji Sabahiyate
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Sara nke Said Naciri duziri
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi ncha, na ihe ngosi telivishọn
Hadioui ekwuola na ọ chọghị ime ihe nkiri ọ bụla na-abụghị Morocco n'ihi na ọ na-achọ ụlọ, na ezumike kachasị ogologo na-abụghị mba ahụ ọ were bụ izu abụọ
Hadioui lụrụ di ma bụrụ nne Ines, amụrụ n'afọ 2005
E gburu nna ya na ọsụ gidigidi Mina afọ 2015
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e mere ọtụtụ profaịlụ Facebook adịgboroja maka ya, nke ọ katọrọ
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, o bulite vidiyo nke nwa ya nwanyị na ịgba egwú ya na nzaghachi maka ọrịa COVID-19, nke dugara n'oké mkpesa
Leila Shenna (Arabic; a mụrụ Morocco) bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara na ihe nkiri karịsịa n'afọ ndị 1970
A na-echetakarị ya na mba ndị na-asụ Bekee maka ọrụ ya dịka nwa agbọghọ Bond na ihe nkiri afọ 1979 Moonraker dịka onye na-elekọta ụgbọ elu ọjọọ

Otú ọ dị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri afọ 1968 Remparts d'argile (nke e wepụtara na mbụ na Ịtali, e mechara wepụta ya na United States n'afọ 1970 n'okpuru aha Ramparts of Clay) nke Jean-Louis Bertucelli duziri, onye mmeri Palme D'or nke 1975 Chronique des années de braise nke Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina duziri, yana ihe nkiri Algeria nke afọ 1982 Vent de sable, nke Lakhdar na-Hamina
E mere ihe nkiri abụọ mbụ na Algeria, nke atọ n'ọzara

ma nwee mmetụta na ihe ịga nke ọma nke klọb ahụ n'oge afọ 1970

A mụrụ Salami na Ibadan n'ezinụlọ Salami na Oyebimpe Oyetunde, nna ya bụ nwanne nwoke nke olubadan Shittu Akintola Oyetunde nwụrụ anwụ
Obodo ezinụlọ ahụ dị n'ógbè Eleta nke Ibadan, n'ihi ya, e nyere ya aha Salami Eleta mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ malitere ịmụ ihe site na ịnara nkuzi koranic mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ma mgbe ọ dị asaa, ọ malitere ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ Alakụba
O mechara gaa Ibadan Boys High School na lisabal grammar schoolAbeokuta
N'afọ 1950, Salami bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ibadan Cooperative Produce Marketing Union ọrụ nke gụnyere nhazi na ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ihe ndị otu ahụ webatara
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, o mechara rụọ ọrụ na UAC N'oge tupu nnwere onwe, Salami sonyeere Mabolaje Alliance nke adegoke aelabu

N'afọ 1954, ọ meriri ntuli aka dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara Ibadan n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke NCNC ] ma n'afọ 1956, ọ gara n'ihu merie ntuli aka n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Ọdịda Anyanwụ, na-emeri onye nọ n'ọkwa, Akintoye
Mgbe Adelabu nwụsịrị na 1958, nsogbu dị n'ime alaka Ibadan NCNC dugara na ọpụpụ Salami na NCNC
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Action Group ma bụrụ onye otu akintola
A họpụtara ya n'ime Ibadan District Council na 1961 ma mesịa họpụta ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Western Nigeria Development Corporation
Mgbe nnupụisi ndị agha nke Jenụwarị 15, 1966, a tụrụ Salami mkpọrọ ọnwa ise tupu ndị agha tọhapụ ya n'oge nnupụis nke July 1966
Salami abụwo onye na-akwado ọtụtụ klọb bọọlụ na-eme egwuregwu kemgbe 1937 mgbe e guzobere otu egwuregwu mbụ na Ibadan, Hercules club
N'afọ 1950, ọ bụ onye otu Ibadan District Football Association, otu nzukọ na-elekọta Ibadan Lions football club
N'oge ọ nọ n'òtù ahụ, ọ bụ onye njikwa otu ọdụm ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche nke njikọ ahụ
Nhọpụta ya na Western Nigeria Sports Council mere ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n'òtù ahụ n'ihi esemokwu nwere ike ime
Mana mgbe ọ nọ na njikọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-eto eto dịka JO
Obi ma kwado ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ n'oge bọọlụ na obodo ahụ ka nọ n'ọkwa na-atọ ụtọ na ndị egwuregwu nwere ọrụ nwa oge ma mgbe ụfọdụ zụta ngwá ọrụ nke ha
N'afọ 1963, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa na Western Nigeria Development Corporation
Na WNDC, o nyere aka malite klọb egwuregwu WNDC nke dị na Ibadan nke e mechara mara dị ka WNDC Shooting Stars, IICC Shooting Stars na 3SC
Tupu 1963, a maara klọb ahụ dị ka Pepsi-Cola FC mgbe ahụ Pepsi- Cola na-achịkwa ya
Ọ na-etinye aka n'ịkpọbata ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu na klọb gụnyere, Jide Johnson, Godwin Etemeke, Muda Lawal
N'afọ ndị 1970, klọb ahụ meriri iko kọntinent
Mmekọrịta ya na klọb ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado ndụ nke kpakpando na-agba égbè
Salami nwere ụlọ ọrụ akwa na Lagos ma bụrụ onye nduzi nke Solel Boneh, Naijiria
