Lemoro bụ asụsụ Kainji Nke Naijiria
Lenin El-Ramly (Ọgọọst 18, 1945 - Febụwarị 7, 2020) bụ onye edemede Egypt nweere onwe ya na onye nduzi ihe nkiri telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ime ihe ọchị, akụkọ ifo na Theatre of the Absurd
A nabatara ya n'Ijipt nakwa mba ofesi maka obi ike ya itinye akara ajụjụ n'ihe nwere ihu abụọ na omume na-adịghị anabata ibe ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ndị Ijipt na mba ndị ọzọ na ụwa ndị Arab
A na-akọwa ihe ngosi ya dị ka ajụjụ existentialist na nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'ime ntọala na-atọ ọchị
A mụrụ El-Ramly n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1945 na Cairo nye ezinụlọ na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nne ya bụ Souad Zuhair
O bipụtara akụkọ mkpirikpi mbụ ya n'afọ 1956 na magazin Sabah El-Kheir
Ma n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, na 1967, ọ malitere ide ihe nkiri n'usoro ihe nkiri maka telivishọn
Na mbido senchiri nke iri abụọ na otu, a ka na-agbasa ọrụ ya site n'oge a
N'afọ 1970, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Theater Critics and Theater Literature na High Institute for Theater Art
N'afọ 1971, El-Ramly na onye nduzi ihe nkiri Salah Abu Seif malitere imekọ ihe ọnụ
N'oge a, o dere The Ostrich and the Peacock, nke na 2002, maka oge mbụ kemgbe afọ irí atọ, enwere ike igosi ọha na eze
Ndị na-enyocha ihe na-ekwu na ihe nkiri a na-amalite mkparịta ụka mmekọahụ nke na-akpọku agụụ mmekọahụ
Dị ka El-Ramly si kwuo, ha aghọtaghị edemede ya
El-Ramly guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya na 1980, nke a na-akpọ Studio 80
Ebumnuche ya bụ itinye ụdị egwuregwu ọzọ n'elu ikpo okwu karịa ka a na-ahụkarị na egwuregwu azụmahịa
Ọrụ ya Bel-Arabi El-Faseeh nke 1991, nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka In Plain Arabic, na-arụ ọrụ na Pan-Arabism
A kọwawo egwuregwu a dị ka ihe ọchị na-enweghị atụ, a kwupụtakwara na ọ bụ Best Theater Play of the Year na Egypt
Site n'aka mba Kuwait ọ natara onyinye Soad Sabbah maka egwuregwu a
Site na mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ ọ natara ndị nkatọ otuto, dịka ọmụmaatụ na Herald Tribune na Time Magazine
E meela ihe nkiri ya n'ụwa ndị Arab, yana mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ dị ka France na Australia
Ọ bụ ezie na a jụrụ In plain Arabic n'oge Carthage Theatre Festival na Tunisia
N'afọ 1993, El-Ramly guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, nke akpọrọ Studio 2000
N'afọ 1994, o degharịrị nke mbụ ya site na 1967 nke o webatara n'oge ahụ n'okpuru aha Al-Erhabi (The Terrorist)
Site na ọnọdụ a, a maara ya nke ọma na mba nke ya nakwa na mba ofesi
A maara ọrụ El-Ramly n'ọtụtụ ebe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ meriri n'oge Vivay Film Festival for Comical Movies na 1987, ma nata Kuwait en Soad Sabbah Award na 1991
N'afọ 2005, e nyere El-Ramly ihe nrite Prince Claus Award site na Netherlands
Ndị ọka ikpe ji 'iji ọchị eme ihe iji kpalie nyocha ọha na eze banyere nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị kpọrọ ihe'
Ruo n'afọ 2005, El-Ramly dere ihe nkiri iri anọ n'asụsụ Arabic nke egosiri n'elu ikpo okwu
A sụgharịrị atọ n'ime ha n'asụsụ Bekee
A sụgharịrị ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ, dị ka The Prisoner site na 2002 nke e mere n'asụsụ Danish
El-Ramly dere ihe nkiri ndị a
Lentheng Helen Mekgwe bụ onye bụbu onye isi obodo nke Ekurhuleni Metropolitan Municipality, South Africa, nọchiri Duma Nkosi

Ọ bụbu ọkà okwu nke Ekurhuleni Metropolitan Council (2001 ruo 2008), onye kansụl n'afọ 1995, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Nigel (TLC), wee jee ozi dị ka ndị kansụl nkịtị site n'afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2001
Leo Antony (Tony) Gleaton (Ọnwa Ọgọọst 4, afọ 1948 - rụọ ọnwa Ọgọọst 14, afọ 2015) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
A mụrụ ya na Detroit, Michigan, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara California mgbe ọ dị afọ 11
Ọ sonyeere ndị agha mmiri mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta kọleji na Mahadum California Los Angeles, ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị na foto
Akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ọrụ ya bụ maka ijide ihe oyiyi nke ndị Afrịka na West (America) na mmetụta ya
A makwaara ya nke ọma maka foto ya nke ndị cowboys ojii
Gleaton nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Palo Alto, CA, n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015 mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo oge na ọrịa kansa ọnụ
A mụrụ Gleaton n'ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti
Nne Gleaton, Geraldine Woodson, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, na nna ya, Leo, onye uwe ojii, kewara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Nne ya wee kwaga ezinụlọ ya na Los Angeles, California
Ọ malitere ọrụ kọleji ya na East Los Angeles Junior College ebe ọ na-egwu bọọlụ
Ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 1967 iji sonye na Marine Corps, na-eje ozi otu njem na Vietnam
N'afọ 1970, ọ laghachiri na US wee debanye aha na UCLA n'okpuru iwu GI, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Gleaton gakwara klas na Mahadum California, Berkeley na Art Center College of Design na Pasadena na agụmakwụkwọ
Gleaton nwetara MFA na Fine Arts Photography na Bard College n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 1977, Gleaton hapụrụ California gaa New York City, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na mmasị na foto ejiji
N'afọ 1980 ọ hapụrụ New York na ụwa nke foto ejiji
N'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, ọ gara gburugburu Texas na Mexico, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ aka ole na ole, gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ na n'ọhịa mmanụ
N'oge ahụ, ọ malitekwara ise foto ndị Afrịka Amerịka n'ebe ndị ahụ
Site n'oge a gaa n'ihu, Gleaton rụrụ ọrụ site na ise foto ndị ojii cowboys, ụmụ amaala Amerịka, ndị Afrịka Amerịka, na ndị Mexico Amerịka
O lekwasịrị anya na South-West nwere ọdịbendị dị iche iche
Gleaton nwere mmasị na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, ọkachasị ndị Afrịka nọ na South-West
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na foto gburugburu ebe obibi ojii na ọcha
Ụfọdụ bụ foto ndị dị nso nke ndị maara na ndị na-amaghị igwefoto, ụfọdụ bụ foto ìgwè, na ụfọdụ ọdịdị ala nke ebe ọ na-ese foto ndị mmadụ
Foto ndị o sere nke ndị mmadụ bụ foto nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị ma ọ bụghị nke a na-eme
Ihe Gleaton lekwasịrị anya bụ agbụrụ
Ọ chọpụtara na nnukwu ngwakọta ọdịbendị dị na South na Central America; ya mere o ji ọtụtụ oge na ume ya nọrọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ chere nyocha ụfọdụ ihu n'ihi ọdịdị ya
O nwere akpụkpọ ahụ na-acha ọcha na anya na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Ọ dị iche na ihe ndị ọ na-ese foto, ya mere ụfọdụ n'ime ha enweghị ahụ iru ala na ọ na-se foto ha
Gleaton gara naanị ya n'ebe ọ na-ese foto, na-eme njem dị mfe ma na-ejikarị bọs eme njem
Ọ na-ejikarị naanị igwefoto ya maka njem ahụ
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke ịnọ gburugburu ụdị ọdịbendị dị iche iche, Gleaton mụtara otu esi enweta ntụkwasị obi nke ndị ọ na-ese foto

Mgbe mbụ ọ malitere ise ndị mmadụ foto na South-West na Central America, ụfọdụ nwere obi erughị ala banyere ya na-ese ha foto, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi ọdịdị ya gụnyere ịdị elu ya nke 6o 4', na ịdị arọ ya nke karịrị pound 300
Ọ mụtara otu esi enweta ntụkwasị obi ha, ma mee ka ha nwee ahụ iru ala iji see ha foto
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ngosi foto ya na Smithsonian nke a na-akpọ Africaī's Legacy na Mexico nke malitere n'afọ ndị 1990s
Ihe ngosi a nwere foto dịka 'Man & Canoe' na 'My Father, My Son'
Ndepụta ngosi Gleaton nwere ederede diary nke e mechara kpọọ 'Oaxaca Diary', nke o dere n'afọ 1988 banyere njem ọ gara na Mexico iji see foto
N'ihe ngosi ahụ, foto Gleatons na ntinye akwụkwọ akụkọ na-eso isiokwu banyere ndị Afrịka nọ na Mexico site na Martinez Montiel, Miriam Jiménez Román, na Palmer
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na asaa, Gleaton nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ọnụ n'ụlọ ya dị na Palo Alto
Nwunye ya nke anọ bụ Lisa (née Ellerbee), onye nkuzi, onye ọ lụrụ n'afọ 2005, hapụrụ ya
Leo Asemota (a mụrụ n'afọ 1967 na Edo State, Nigeria) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na London, England
Asemota na-eji foto, ihe nkiri na vidiyo, arụmọrụ, ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese na ọganihu dị iche iche na ọrụ ya
Spoonman (1999) ihe nkiri banyere ụkpụrụ eziokwu e nyochara site na ndụ nke onye na-adabere na heroin bụ ọrụ mbụ nke Asemota
FiTH WORK (a mụrụ n'afọ 1999) bụ usoro na-aga n'ihu nke ọ na-agbanwe asụsụ maka echiche ya
FiTH bụ acronym nke o mepụtara n'afọ 1999 nke pụtara ahụ ọkụ n'isi
Ọrụ ndị sitere na usoro ahụ bụ ihe pụrụ iche ọ bụghị naanị n'ụdị na ụzọ kamakwa n'ihi na ha adịghị ọtụtụ
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ ọmụmụ foto e mere otu afọ Map of a City (2001)

Asemota malitere ọrụ ahụ na Jenụwarị 1, 2001 na-eme njem n'ụzọ na-enweghi nkwusi n'ofe London City na-achọ bọọdụ arịrịọ Ndịàmà nke ndị uwe ojii obodo ahụ tinyere na arịrịọ maka ndị akaebe maka ọtụtụ mpụ

E bipụtara ihe oyiyi sitere na ọmụmụ ihe ahụ na akwụkwọ nta sere okwu nke London Borough of Camden ma gosipụta ya na mbipụta mbụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ nka Magnet, nke Institute of International Visual Arts (inIVA) bipụtara ma malite na Venice Biennale na 2001
E gosipụtara 'Map of a City' na Justina Barnicke Gallery Toronto Canada na ngosi otu “28 Days Reimagining Black History Month nke Pamela Edmonds na Sally Frater haziri

Site na ọkpụkpọ òkù site n'aka Lisa Goldman, onye nduzi nka nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na-emeri ihe nrite The Red Room, Asemota mepụtara ntinye vidiyo na pọtụfoliyo nke eserese foto nke ndị bi na Hoxton maka mmepụta saịtị Hoxton Story nke mepere na Hoxton Hall, iji ree ihe nkiri na Septemba 10, 2005

Ọzọ kwa, n'afọ 2005, Asemota malitere The Ens Project (2005 - 2019) ọrụ nka nke ndị Edo na Benin na-eme ememme Igue kwa afọ, ịchụpụ ndị Britain a ma mesịa, na-apụnara Alaeze Benin n'oge 1897 Benin Expedition na edemede The Work of Art in the Age of Mechanical Reproduction nke onye Germany na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị Walter Benjamin
E gosipụtara afọ atọ mbụ nke ọrụ ahụ na nyocha Leo Asemota The Ens Project's First Principles na New Art Exchange na 2011
E nyere ihe osise ọhụrụ The Intrinsic Tendency of The Ens Sign maka Sharjah Biennial 14
N'afọ 2017, Asemota sonyere na ihe emume radio a kpọrọ documenta 14 site na June 17 - July 7, 2017
Ihe ngosi ya bụ Intermission Transmission Temporal bụ usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche nwere ọdịnaya nke e dere site n'ụbọchị ruo n'ụbọchị

Ntinye ọkụ neon, akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu egwu, ọrụ na mpempe akwụkwọ na arụmọrụ mejupụtara Asemota's Workbook for Exploring the Sonic Cosmologies of Halim El-Dabh (2018-21) maka nyocha, ngosi na mbipụta ọrụ na onye Ijipt na-ede egwu, ọkà mmụta na onye nkụzi Halim El-Dabh Ihe ngosi “Canine Wisdom for The Barking Dog - The Dog Done Gone Deaf Exploring The Sonic Cosmologies of Halim El-Dabh (2018) e mere na Dakar, Senegal n'oge mbipụta nke iri na atọ nke Dakar Biennale 2018, na “HERE HISTORY BEGANỊchọpụta Re / Verberations nke Halim El-Dabh' (2021) na SAVVY Contemporary Berlin

Ọ bụ SAVVY Contemporary Berlin haziri ọrụ ahụ ma bụrụ nke onye nlekọta Cameroon bụ Bonaventure Soh Bejeng Ndikung, onye nlekọta Ijipt bụ Kamila Metwaly na onye nlekọta Senegal bụ Marie Hélène Pereira haziri
Ihe ngosi mmekorita nke Asemota # 215 ya na onye na-ese ihe na Angola bụ Nastio Mosquito mere na Portikus Frankfurt na 2018
Ihe ngosi a dabere na mkparịta ụka dị n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe abụọ ahụ kemgbe nzukọ mbụ ha n'oge documenta 14 Radio Program na 2017 ma gosipụta ọrụ ha mepụtara kpọmkwem maka Portikus
Oge mmeghe ngosi ahụ bụ site na ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo ọdịda anyanwụ
Nchọpụta Site na Ụkpụrụ nke Phrenology, Literature, Sound na Mgbasa Ozi bụ onyinye Asemota nyere na ngosi 'Ultrasanity On Madness, Psychiatry and Resistance' nke emere na ifa-Galerie Berlin na 2019
Otu n'ime ọrụ ndị dị na ngosi ahụ bụ (ultrasanity anecdotes sound fractions) album eserese nke abụ na isiokwu nke ara
Asemota na onye nlekọta Cameroon bụ Bonaventure Soh Bejeng Ndikung chịkọtara abụ ndị ahụ

Maka mbipụta nke iri na abụọ nke Sonsbeek 20→24 International Contemporary Art Exhibition na Arnhem, Netherlands “Force Times Distance On Labour and its Sonic Ecologies”, Asemota gosipụtara The Sonsbeek Suite (As The Distance Travelled By The Force Acting Is To The Distance Travelled By The Resistance), ọrụ a họpụtara n'ụdị atọ ‘how-hard-and-how-and-and-how-long’ at Walter Books; ‘how-and-and-how-and-how-how-hard’; and ‘how-long-and-how-hard-and-how-far’ na Kröller-Müller Museum
“The Sonsbeek Suite” mechara site na mmasị Asemota nwere n’ebe ndị na-achị, oge yana akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọrụ
Leonard Stanley Nnamdi Ekeh (amụrụ na Febụwarị 22, 1956 na Imo State, Naijiria) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Zinox Group
Ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke Kongacom
A mụrụ Ekeh na Ubomiri Mbaitoli, Imo State n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti nwere ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Nne ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka nri, nna ya bụ onye nọọsụ
Ekeh gara Holy Ghost College, Owerri maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ chọrọ inwe nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ njem na Naịjirịa
O mechara gaa India maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Economics na Mahadum Punjab
Ekeh kwenyere na ịmụ akwụkwọ na India bụ 'oge mgbanwe dị ukwuu na ndụ m n'ihi na achọpụtara m akụ na ụba India bụ ezigbo akụ na ụba'
Ekeh nwetakwara MSc na Risk Management na Mahadum Nottingham
Leo Stan Ekeh bidoro Zinox Technologies Limited n'afọ 2001 ịrụpụta kọmpụta
Ọ hụkwara na na mbido Zinox Kọmputa enweela asambodo WHQL, nke mbụ na Sub-Saharan Africa, ka afọ 5 gachara wee nweta Asambodo NIS ISO 2000 9001 QMS
N'October 2013, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwupụtara mmepụta nke eriri mbadamba kọmputa ya aha ya bụ Zipad
Na Febụwarị 2018, ụlọ ọrụ Ekeh bụ Zinox nwetara Kongacom n'aka ndị nwe ya na-azụta pasent 99 nke ngụkọta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Johannes Stephanus Theron nke a maara dị ka Leo Théron (26 Machị 1926), bụ onye na-ese ihe na windo na-acha odo odo na South Africa nke na-ahụ maka usoro dalles de verre (iji iko na simenti)
A mụrụ Theron na Pretoria, nwa nwoke nke atọ nke minista Dutch Reform, Johannes Stephanus Theron na nwunye ya, Helena Marais Rossouw
Théron gụrụ nka na Mahadum Rhodes na South Africa wee gaa Ecole des Beaux Arts na Académie Julian na Paris
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ malitere itinye aka n'ịmepụta mosaics na windo enyo maka ụlọ ụka ọhụrụ

N'ikpeazụ, ọ bụrụ ọkachamara na usoro a na-akpọ dalles de verre sous beton, usoro na-eji ugegbe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na kọnkịrị, mepụtara na France mgbe agha ụwa nke abụọ gasịrị, nke ọ mepụtara dị ka ụdị pụrụ iche n'oge nleta nloghachi na France na 1964, mgbe ọ mụrụ ọrụ Gabriel Loire na Chartres, nke mere ka ọ mara ụzọ ọ ga-esi gaa na mgbasa ozi
Site na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Pretoria, South Africa, Théron nọrọ afọ iri atọ na ise na-emepụta windo maka ụlọụka otu narị na iri atọ na asaa, ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụlọ obodo, na ụlọ onwe
N'afọ 1978, South African Academy for Arts and Science nyere ya ihe nrite nke nsọpụrụ
Nnukwu ihe a rụzuru na usoro dalles de verre bụ ịmepụta mgbidi windo ma ọ bụ mgbidi nke ìhè, nke nwere ike ibi na mgbidi dum na ụlọ ụka ma ọ bụ ụlọ ndị ọzọ, na-eru site na ala ruo n'uko
Théron ekwuola banyere anwansi nke iko na-acha anụnụ anụnụ dị ka ịmepụta 'prism nke anyị na-ahụ ruo mgbe ebighi ebi'
N'afọ 2000, e meghere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Leo Théron, A Life in Glass, na Sant Fruitós de Bages, ihe dị ka kilomita ịrị ịse na ise site na Barcelona, Catalonia
Ọ gụnyere ihe karịrị ihe oyiyi iri ise nke windo enyo nke Théron mepụtara ma mepụta na South Africa, Italy na Spain
Ihe a na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ nkà liturgical ya, ma ihe atụ ma ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya

A na-egosi ihe osise ndị e ji ugegbe mee na-egosipụta àgwà na àgwà nke ndị senti na ndị mmadụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, na mpempe akwụkwọ nke windo na ndịda Afrịka, yana ọrụ dị mkpa - windo na-egosi Saint Francis - na chọọchị ndị mọnk Franciscan dị nso na Ponticelli na Ịtali
E gosipụtakwara ihe osise aquarelles nke Sant Fruitós de Bages, nke e sere n'oge ọ gara ebe ahụ na 1996, yana ihe osise ọhụrụ sitere na mkpali nke ọrụ okike ya na iko
A họọrọ ihe osise Dove of Peace nke Théron dị ka ihe nnọchianya na mkpuchi CD maka The Millennium Song bụ abụ e dere iji kpọsaa mmalite nke puku afọ nke atọ, nke Michael Greenacre wepụtara
E tinyere windo Dove nke Udo n'ụlọ Greenacre na Sant Fruitós de Bages
A ga-ahụ windo nke Leo Théron na
Leo Tolstoy (September 9, 1828 - Nọvemba 20, 1910) bụ onye odee Russia
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ode akwụkwọ kacha ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya kachasị ama bụ 'Agha na Udo' na 'Anna Karenina', akwụkwọ abụọ kachasị ukwuu nke edere
O dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ, akụkọ, nkwupụta, na edemede ndị nwere mmetụta na Mahatma Gandhi na Vladimir Lenin
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ Onye Kraịst n'ọchịchị mgbe ọ nwesịrị nhụsianya
N'oge a, o dere edemede nkà ihe ọmụma nke nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ndị ndú ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke narị afọ nke 20
Leo Franklin Twiggs (amụrụ na 1934 na St
Stephen, South Carolina) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ mepụtara Ngalaba Fine Art na Mahadum Steeti South Carolina, ebe ọ kụziri site na 1973 ruo 1998
Twiggs nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Claflin na 1956 na nzèrè Master of Arts na Маhadum New York na 1964
N'afọ 1970, Twiggs ghọrọ nwá akwụkwọ Africa America mbụ natara Doctorate of Arts (EdD) na Mahadum Georgia
O gosipụtara ihe karịrị mmadụ iri ise na-egosi n'oge ọrụ ya

Twiggs natara BA summa cum laude ya na Mahadum Claflin, mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Art Institute nke Chicago ma nata MA ya na Machị New York, ebe ya na Hale Woodruff, ónyé a ma ama na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese mgbidi
Ọ natara nzèrè doctorate ya na agụmakwụkwọ nka na Mahadum Georgia
Dị ka prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum Steeti South Carolina, ọ mepụtara Ngalaba nka na IP
Stanback Museum
A họpụtara Twiggs ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ emeritus n'afọ 2000
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri mbụ natara Verner Award (Governorńs Trophy) màkà onyinye dị ịrịba ama na nka na South Carolina
A na-eme ihe osise Twiggs n'ụdị dị iche iche nke usoro batik nke ọ malitere ịnwale na 1964
Usoro ihe osise a na-enye ya ohere ịmepụta echiche efu nke ederede aghụghọ
Isiokwu ọ họọrọ gụnyere ihe oyiyi nke Agha Obodo America, ọkọlọtọ Confederate, egwu Blues, na osimiri
Ọrụ Twiggs na-ekwu maka ọrụ nke ihe ncheta, ihe oyiyi, na ihe oyiyi na ọdịbendị nke South Eastern United States
Leon Botha (ubochí ànó n'ọnwa Juun 1985 rụọ úbọchị isé n'ọnwa Juun 2011) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme egwuregwu diski na South Africa
A maara ya màkà mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na otu hip hop Die Antwoord, yana ịbụ otu n'ime ndị nwere progeria ogologo ógè n'ụwa
A mụrụ Botha na Cape Town, South Africa, ma biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa progeria mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ
O nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla na nka karịa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tygerberg Art Centre, mana ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-ese ógè niile mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na-arụ ọrụ ndị e nyere iwu
N'afọ 2005, a wara Botha ahụ nkè ọma n'obi iji gbochie nkụchi obi n'ihi atherosclerosis metụtara progeria
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi mbụ nke Who Am I? Transgressions, mmekọrịta foto ya na Gordon Clark, na João Ferreira Gallery na Cape Town
Botha kwùrù banyéré ihe ngosi ahụ, 'Abụ m ónyé ime mmụọ, otu gị, n'ụzọ bụ isi
Mgbè ahụ abụ m mmadụ na akụkụ a nke mmadụ bụ ahụ, nke nwéré ọnọdụ
Botha na-etinye áká na deejaying na turntablism n'okpuru áhà DJ SolarizeKpọpụta njehie Invalid tag; refs with no name must have content
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010, Botha nwèrè ọrịa strok
Botha nwụrụ site na nsogbụ nke progeria na Cape Town otu ụbọchị mgbè ọ gachara afọ iri abụọ na isiiKpọpụta njehie Invalid tag; refs with no name must have content
Botha bụ ihe kpaliri otu ihe nkiri Solarize, nkè Marcin Stańczyk, nkè Andrzej Szpindler dere, nke malitere na Warsaw n'ọnwa Eprel 2014 na Teatr Wielki, Polish National Opera
Leon Richard Forrest (Jenụwarị 8, na afọ 1937 na Nọvemba 6, afọ 1997) bụ onye edemede Africa-America nke kụziri na Mahadum Northwestern site na 1973 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya anọ bụ isi jiri akụkọ ifo, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọchị nyochaa 'Forrest County,' ụwa akụkọ ifo nke yiri akụkụ ndịda Chicago ebe Forrest tolitere
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, akwụkwọ akụkọ Washington Post kpọrọ Forrest 'otu n'ime ihe nzuzo kachasị mma nke akụkọ ifo ndị Africa na America nke oge a - na ụtọ a na-enweta
A mụrụ Forrest n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti na Chicago
Nne ya bụ onye Katọlik na New Orleans, ebe ezinụlọ nna ya bụ Baptist
A zụlitere Forrest na nke mbụ
Nne nne ya nwere òkè n'ịzụlite ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Forrest mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị agbụrụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe nrite, mana ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na-adịghị mma ma e wezụga maka ide ihe
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm na 1956; nne ya lụrụ di ọzọ, di na nwunye ahụ meghere ụlọ ahịa mmanya
Forrest gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Wendell Phillips na Hyde Park High School
Ọ gara Wilson Junior College otu afọ, wee gaa klas na Mahadum Roosevelt na Mahadim Chicago tupu ọ kwụsị, hapụ ije ozi dị ka onye ọrụ ozi ọha na eze na ndị agha
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ahụ, ọ laghachiri na Mahadum Chicago wee rụọ ọrụ maka Catholic Interracial Council's Speakers Bureau
N'afọ 1969, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Muhammad Speaks, akwụkwọ akụkọ Nation of Islam
Forrest ga-abụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ikpeazụ na-abụghị onye Alakụba nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, There is a Tree More Ancient than Eden, na afọ 1973, ma tinye okwu mmeghe sitere n'aka Ralph Ellison

Onye nwetara ihe nrite Nobel bụ Toni Morrison jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka There is a Tree More Ancient than Eden, na akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ ọzọ ya The Bloodworth Orphans, na Two Wings to Veil My Face
A maara akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ a dị ka Forest County Trilogy O kwuru na Charlie Parker, Dylan Thomas, William Faulkner, Eugene O'Neill, Ralph Ellison, na okpukpe ndị mụrụ ya bụ ihe mkpali
Ọ sonyeere ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Northwestern na afọ 1973, ma site na afo 1985 ruo na afo 1994, ọ bu onye ịsị ngalaba African-American Studies
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ikpeazụ ya, Divine Days, bụ nke James Joyce ji Ulysses mee
Akwụkwọ akụkọ karịrị 1,100 peeji ogologo, Divine Days kpọrọ 'Agha na Udo nke akwụkwọ edemede African-American' site n'aka onye ọkà mmụta a ma ama na prọfesọ Harvard Henry Louis Gates
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa na Evanston, Illinois mgbe ọ dị afọ 60
Meteor in the Madhouse, e bipụtara usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị jikọtara ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na afọ 2001, nwunye ya di ya Marianne Forrest na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ
Nnyocha Washington Post kwuru na a ga-ewere Meteor na Madhouse dị ka ihe omume dị mkpa na 'ihe ịrịba ama dị mkpa'
N'afọ 2013, a nabatara Forrest n'ime Chicago Literary Hall of Fame
Leon Ernest 'Schuks' Schuster (a mụrụ na 21 Mee 1951) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-atọ ọchị, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na -egosi na onye na-agụ egwu
Schuster dọtara mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
Dịka nwatakịrị, ya na nwanne ya nwoke ga-eme ihe ọchị na ezinụlọ ya ma mee ya ihe nkiri
Ọ kọwara, n'ajụjụ ọnụ afọ 2010 banyere ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Bloemfontein, m na-echeta ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ámá nke Ritz Theatre, na-egwuri egwu ndị cowboys & crooks, nke bụ iwe niile n'oge ahụ
Echetara m ịhụ Laurel na Hardy, Charlie Chaplin na Three Stooges n'anya
Ana m eme ihe mgbe niile, ma na-eme ihe ọchị
M na-eduhie nne m ochie ka m chee na m ji égbè m gbaa onwe m n'ụkwụ
tomato sauce n'ebe niile, m na-eti mkpu dị ka ezì ọhịa
Ịkụ egwu bụ naanị n'ụdị m, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ chere na ọ ga-abụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
mba, ọ bụghị onye na-ese ihe nkiri, ọ bụ naanị onye na-achọ ime ka ndị mmadụ nwee obi ụtọ
Schuster gụrụ maka nzere BA na Mahadum nke Orange Free State, ebe ọ gbara rugby maka otu mbụ
Ọ laghachiri Jim Fouché dịka onye nkuzi ruo afọ abụọ
Schuster malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South African
N'oge ọ nọ na SABC, o mepụtara usoro redio Afrikaans Vrypostige Mikrofoon na Fanus Rautenbach ː nke gụnyere izochi olu ya na igwu egwu ekwentị na ndị na-amaghị
N'afọ 1982, Decibel Records bịakwutere Schuster iji chịkọta usoro egwu egwuregwu nke mere ka ndekọ mbụ ya akpọrọ, Leon Schuster, ebe ọ rere 10,000
Abọm nke abụọ ya, Broekskeur ('trouser-tearing'), rere ihe karịrị 40,000
Nke a sochiri Briekdans na Leon Schuster São 20 Treffers, nke rere ihe karịrị 270,000

Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Schuster, You Must Be Joking!, nke ya na Johan Scholtz na Elmo de Witt jikọrọ aka mepụta, ghọrọ ihe a ma ama n'etiti ndị na-ege ntị South Africa ma mee ka ihe ọzọ You Must be Joking! Ọzọkwa
Na 16 Septemba afọ 2011 a kọrọ na ihe nkiri ọzọ nke Schuster, Mad Buddies, ga-abụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Walt Disney, nke ga-ejikwa nkesa na ahịa nke ihe nkiri ahụ
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'afọ 2012 ma mee ka Schuster na onye na-eme ihe ọchị Kenneth Nkosi
Ọ nwetara nyocha dị njọ, ma nweta R45 nde na ngwụsị izu mbụ site na mmefu ego nke R20 nde
Leonard Marchant RE (ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1929 rụọ úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2000) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, nke a na-enwe mmasị karịsịa dị ka ónyé isi nke mezzotint

A mụrụ Marchant na Cape Town, South Africa, nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke Kathleen (née Cunningham) na Henry Marchant Nnà ya nwụrụ mgbè ọ na-eje ozi na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, mgbè Marchant dị afọ irí na isé; nné ya na ụmụnne ya bụ ndị Katọlik, nné nnè ya na nné nné ya zụlitere ya
Dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ kụziiri onwé ya ise ihe; na 1950, mgbè ọ dị afọ 19, e nyere ya ihe ngosi onwé ya na Argus Gallery na Cape Town, South Africa
N'afọ 1950, Marchant rụrụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ mmiri ahịa wee rute London na obere ego na enweghị kọntaktị
O rughị eru màkà onyinye iji mụọ na UK Ọ kpọrọ Jacob Epstein na ekwentị n'enweghị obi ụtọ wee gaa leta ya na mpempe akwụkwọ nke eserese na ihe osise
Epstein na-agba ume ma nye ya akwụkwọ ozi na-atụ aro na British Council, nke nyéré onyinye iji nye ya ohere ịmụ ọnwa atọ na Saint Martin's School of Art

Na London, Marchant zutere ma lụọ Teressa Trapler N'ịbụ ndị nsogbụ ego na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị manyere ịlaghachi South Africa, ha mechara kwaga na UK mgbè afọ atọ gachara, na 1956; na 1959 Marchant nwetara onyinye iji mụọ ógè niile na Central School of Arts and Crafts
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Central School for Arts and Crafts, Marchant hụrụ mezzotints nké Yōzō Hamaguchi, ónyé na-ese ihe na Japan nke bi na Paris n'oge ahụ
N'oge a, Marchant chọpụtara mezzotint rocker na rocking pole na kọbọd n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ dịghị ónyé maara otú e si eme ya ọzọ n'ihi ya m ga-akụziri onwé m, 'ọ mechara dee, ọ bụ usoro siri ike
Ihe masịrị m n'ezie bụ ọgaranya dị egwu nke ụda olu
Ọ bụ ezie na Marchant nọgidere na-ese ihe n'oge ndụ ya niile, a maara ya nke ọma màkà mezzotints ya
Na mezzotints ya, ọ metụrụ ịdị ukwuu
Marchant bụ nna úkwú, agịga ya na-acha n'ọchịchịrị; kandụl, efere, iko na saucer na-enwu gbaa
Liese Van Der Watt kwuru na a na-eto Marchant màkà mweghachi nke ọrụ ochie a na afọ (19)60s, ọkachasị na Britain
Na 'ihe osise ahụ na-egosi otu ugboro ugboro nke otu klas nke isiokwu, dị ka a ga-asị na nchegbu nke ónyé na-ese ihe na-elekwasị ányá na usoro na ihe ndị a na-egosi
Mana ihe ọzọ abanyewo n'ime mmanụ ndị a - mmetụta nke ebumnuche nzuzu, nke ime anwansi nke na-echetara mmadụ n'ụzọ na-edoghị ányá na nke a na-atụghị ányá ya ọrụ Frida Kahlo
N'afọ 1986, a họpụtara Marchant ka ọ bụrụ ónyé otu Royal Society of Painter-Printmakers, ónyé ya na ya na-egosi mgbè niile

N'afọ 1963, Marchant sonyeere ndị ọrụ nkè Central School of Arts and Crafts na ngalaba Fine Art Etching ebe ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 1983 N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ndị ọzọ gụnyere Royal, Slade, Chelsea, Morley na Winchester, iji gosipụta usoro mezzotint ma gosipụta nkè a na ọrụ nkè ya
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi, Marchant na nwunye ya kwagara Shropshire, ebe ọ gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na mezzotints na eserese E mèrè ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya na London Bankside Gallery na 1998
Leon bụ ego obodo nke Sierra Leone
A na-ekewa ya na 100 cents
Ka ọ na-erule 1 Julaị n'afọ 2022, koodu ISO 4217 bụ SLE n'ihi mgbanwe nke leone ochie (SLL) na ọnụego nke SLL 1000 na SLE 1
A na-eme ka ọdụm dị mkpirikpi dị ka Le nke a na-etinye n'ihu ego ahụ
E webatara ọdụm ahụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1964
Ọ nọchiri anya pound British West Africa na ọnụego nke otu pound pụtara abụọ ọdụm (ya bụ, otu ọdụm putara iri shillings)
Mgbe ewepụtara ya, otu ọdụm ruru ọkara pound sterling ma ọ bụ US $ 140
Leon ahụ bara uru karịa dollar US ruo n'afọ 1980, mgbe ego ahụ malitere ịdaba ngwa ngwa
Afọ ole na ole nke ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa emeela ka ọnụ ahịa ọdụm daa, na dollar US ghọrọ ọnụ ahịa ọtụtụ puku ọdụm malite n'afọ 2000
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa na a ga-ewebata leone ọhụrụ (SLE), nke ruru nde nke SLL
E mechara webata ọdụm ọhụrụ ahụ na Julaị na afọ 2022
Okpukpe leone ochie nọgidere na-abụ ego iwu kwadoro ma gaa n'ihu na-agagharị
Otú ọ dị, ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa na-aga n'ihu na-emebi ike ịzụta nke ọdụm ahụ, nke na-agafe ngwa ngwa kemgbe afọ 2022
As of 5 April 2023[update] na-erule ise , a na-atụle otu dollar US na 21 SLE ma ọ bụ 21,000 SLL, na-eme ka akwụkwọ ozi 20 SLE (nke kachasị elu) baa uru na-erughị US $ 1

Leonie Joubert bụ onye odee sayensị South Afrika na onye ode akwụkwọ ọkachamara na ihu igwe na ndakpọ gburugburu ebe obibi, amụma ike na ihe kpatara obodo ji ahapụ anyị agụụ, dị arọ, na ọrịa (agụụ-oké ibu ịda ogbenye-paradox)
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọrụ ya na-abanye na mpaghara ahụike uche ọha
O jirila akụkụ kachasị mma nke afọ iri abuo na-enyocha isiokwu ndị a site na akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, nkwado nkwurịta okwu na ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị otu obodo, ide ihe na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, na pọdkastị
Leonie Joubert nwere Master's na akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị sitere na Mahadum Stellenbosch yana nzere bachelọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi sitere na Mahadum Rhodes

Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ karịrị akwụkwọ iri, gụnyere Scorched, South Africa mgbanwe ihu igwe (Wits University Press, 2006); Ebe na-esi esi mmiri, ndị mmadụ nọ na mgbanwe ihu igwe (Wits University Press, 2008); Wakporo, mbuso agha ndu South Africa (Wits University Press, 2009) na Oge Agụụ, na-enye obodo South Afrika nri (Picador Africa, 2012)

Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Scorched South Africa's Changing Climate, na-agwakọta eziokwu nke mgbanwe ihu igwe 'na ọchị, akụkọ ihe mere eme, nkọwa doro anya nke ndị mmadụ' na-ebuga ya na 'ihe ịtụnanya onwe onye dị ịtụnanya'
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, Wakporo, mbuso agha ndu nke obodo South Africa, na-edepụta nsonaazụ nke iwebata ahịhịa na anụmanụ na-efe efe na South Afrika
Oge agụụ na-agụ, na-azụ obodo ndịda Africa, bụ nyocha nke agụụ na erighị ihe na-edozi ahụ na ndịda Africa
Enyere Joubert onyinye nkwanye ugwu abụọ Sunday Times Alan Paton Non-Fiction Awards, otu maka Scorched na afo 2007 na nke ọzọ maka wakporo na afo 2010
Alan Paton Award

Leonie bụ afo 2007 Ruth First Fellow ( Mahadum Witwatersrand ), 2009 SAB Environmental Journalist of the Year na ngalaba mgbasa ozi mbipụta, edepụtara na Mail & Guardian 200 Young South Africa You Must Take to Lunch (2008), wee bụrụ ahọpụtara maka 2016 City Press Tafelberg Nonfiction Award
Leonora M
Kearney Barry (13 Ọgọst 1849 – 18 Julaị 1923) mụrụ na County Cork, Ireland, nye John na Honor Granger Kearney
Dị ka nanị nwanyị jide n'ọkwa mba n'ime ndị Knights of Labour, o wetara nlebara anya na ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ site na ntinye aka ya na mmegharị mgbanwe ọrụ
Ọ kwalitekwara ọganihu nke ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ime oge na-esote agha obodo America na mwughachi
Nna Leonora, John Kearney, bụ onye ọrụ ugbo Irish nke kwagara ezinụlọ ya n'ime ime obodo nke Pierrepont, New York, na 1852 iji gbanahụ Nnukwu Ụnwụ
N'afọ 1864, nne Leonora nwụrụ
Mgbe nna ya lụrụ nwanyị tọrọ ya afọ ise ọzọ, Leonora kpebiri ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ ahụ iji gbanahụ esemokwu dị n'etiti ya na nwunye ọhụrụ nna ya, o butere ụzọ ịkpọtụrụ onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị dị nso na Colton, New York, onye ọ natara ntụziaka onwe onye ruo izu isii
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Leonora natara asambodo onye nkuzi ya ma, n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Leonora lụrụ William E
Barry, onye Ireland nke kwagara Canada wee gaa New York, na 30 Nọvemba 1871
Onye na-ese ihe na onye na-eti egwu, ya na nwunye ya kwagara Potsdam, New York, ebe di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ nwa mbụ ha, Marion Frances, na 1873

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị nkuzi dị ụkọ mgbe Agha Obodo gasịrị, mgbe ọ lụsịrị William Barry, ọ zutere ịkpa ókè n'ebe ọrụ ya iwu steeti chọrọ ka ọ hapụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị lụrụ di ugbu a
Nke a manyere ya ịmalite ọrụ aka

Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara ugboro ugboro, gụnyere Haydensville, Massachusetts na Amsterdam New York, ọ mụkwara ụmụ nwoke abụọ, William Standish na 1875 na Charles Joseph na 1880Mgbe di ya nwụrụ n'ọrịa akpa ume, nwa ya nwanyị n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya ka nke ahụ gasịrị, Barry malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa ma ọ chọtara ọrụ ahụ tirin
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta uwe n'Amsterdam ebe ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya chere ọnọdụ siri ike, ogologo awa, na ụgwọ dị ala ihu
Ọ na-ahụkarị onwe ya na-arụ ọrụ ihe karịrị awa 70 n'izu, na ụgwọ dabere na mmepụta, ọ na-eme naanị cents iri na otu n'ụbọchị mbụ ya na naanị cents 65 n'izu mbụ ya

Dịka ụzọ isi mee ihe megide ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ụmụ nwanyị chere ihu na ndị ọrụ, Barry sonyeere ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị mpaghara nke Knights of Labour na 1885, oge ndị otu otu mba ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ ya kacha eluKnights of Labor na mbụ jere ozi dị ka nzukọ nzuzo maka ndị ọrụ uwe Philadelphia mana a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ njikọ nwere ebumnuche nke ịkwalite mgbanwe ọrụ site na ọnọdụ otu
Barry, onye a manyere ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ n'ihi mkpa akụ na ụba, nọchitere anya ezigbo nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nke nzukọ ahụ
Alaka Barry nke Knights nwere ihe dị ka ndị otu 1,500 n'oge a
Ọ bilitere n'ime nzukọ ahụ ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye isi ọrụ, ma ọ bụ onye isi oche, nke alaka ya
N'afọ 1885 ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke District Assembly 65, nke gụnyere alaka iri ise na abụọ na ihe karịrị puku mmadụ itoolu

Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara mgbakọ distrikti na Albany ma jee ozi dị ka otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya distrikti ise na General Assembly of the Knights of Labor na Richmond, Virginia Site na nkwado nke onye ndú mba Knights of Labour, Terence V
Powderly, ndị nnọchite anya mgbakọ a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nke Ngalaba Ọrụ Ụmụ nwanyị e guzobere na nso a

(Nzukọ Ezumezu ahụ mepụtara kọmitii iji chịkọta ozi gbasara ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ, nchọpụta ahụ dugara n'ịmepụta Ngalaba Ọrụ Ụmụ nwanyị nke onye nyocha n'ozuzu ga-eduziỌrụ ya bụ 'ịchọpụta ọnọdụ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị, wuo nzukọ ọhụrụ, ịkpali ụkpụrụ KOL nke ịkwụ ụgwọ nhata maka ọrụ nhata, na itinye ụmụ nwanyị na Knights'
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a kwụrụ ụgwọ ka ọ bụrụ onye nyocha ọrụ na onye nhazi, kamakwa 'naanị nwanyị nwere ọfịs mba n'usoro'
Barry banyere na esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Knights, wee bụrụ onye na-emegide odeakwụkwọ ukwu John Hayes
N'afọ 1888, Hayes weghaara Ngalaba Ụmụ nwanyị ma kpagbuo Barry, nke mere ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n'afọ 1890
Ma mgbalị ya na-aga nke ọma ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị, ọ hapụrụ ihe nketa na-adịgide adịgide maka òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị
Barry nọgidere na-aga n'ihu n'etiti ihe ndọghachi azụ, ọ chọkwara ịchụ onwe ya n'àjà maka ihe ọ kwenyere na ya
N'ezie, 'mgbasa ahụ chọrọ nhọrọ siri ike n'etiti nchegbu ụmụ nwanyị ọdịnala na ọrụ dị mkpa na ndụ ọha na eze'

N'iburu ebumnuche ya n'uche ịtọhapụ 'site na nghọta na-enweghị obi amamikpe nke ọchịchị aka ike na anyaukwu ọtụtụ puku ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala n'obodo anyị buru ibu, ndị, na-ata ahụhụ agụụ, oyi na ụkọ, na-ahapụkarị ma daba n'ime oghere nke omume rụrụ arụ,' otu nwere ike ịghọta mkpali na agụụ mmekọahụ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye

Mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na KOL, o yiri ka ọ laghachiri azụ n'ọrụ ya niile site n'ikwu, 'Ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-ekwe omume, ọ dị m ka ọ dị mkpa ka ụmụ nwanyị mụta ọrụ ọ bụla kama nke ọrụ ụlọ, dịka ekwere m na e bu n'uche ka nwoke bụrụ onye na-enweta achịcha'

Ọ bụ ezie na mmetụta dị otú ahụ yiri ka ọ na-emegide ihe niile ọ na-eme, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ka nkwupụta ya ruo eruo site na ịgbakwunye, 'Ma dịka nke ahụ agaghị ekwe omume n'ọnọdụ dị ugbu a, ekwenyere m na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị inwe ohere ọ bụla iji bụrụ ndị maara nke ọma n'ọrụ ọ bụla ha họọrọ ma ọ bụ hụ onwe ha kacha adaba
' Lake, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ a zụrụ azụ na onye na-enyocha ihe na telegraph editọ nke St
Louis Globe-Democrat, biri na St
Louis
Barry gara n'ihu na-eme njem ma na-ekwu maka òtù ụmụ nwanyị na òtù nnwere onwe, n'etiti òtù mgbanwe ndị ọzọ, mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na St
Louis
Ọ nọgidere na-achọ ịha nhata ọrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị mana n'ụzọ a na-ahazighị nke ọma
Barry jere ozi dị ka ọkà okwu n'ihu ọha n'ihe gbasara mgbanwe, dịka okwu ya nke 1893 gosipụtara n'ihu World's Representative Congress of Women na ngosi Columbian na Chicago na 'The Dignity of Labor'
Barry ejighị akụkụ Akwụkwọ Nsọ akwadoro eme ihe) O gosikwara na ọ dị mkpa maka mkpọsa na-aga nke ọma maka ịhọpụta ụmụ nwanyị na Colorado
Onye na-akwado baseball, Barry na-agakarị Chicago iji nwee egwuregwu

Ka oge na-aga na ndụ a maara dị ka Mother Lake, Barry nwụrụ na 18 Julaị 1923, n'ihi ọrịa kansa ọnụNa 1916 ọ kwagara Minooka, Illinois, wee bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Women's Christian Temperance Union na Catholic Total Abstinence Union of America ebe ọ na-etinyekwa uche dị ukwuu n'ịwulite nkwado ọha na eze maka mmachibido iwu na, mgbe e mesịrị, Volstead Act
Leonora Cohen OBE (née Throp; 15 June 1873 - 4 September 1978) bụ onye British suffragette na trade unionist, na otu n'ime ndị majie mbụ
A maara ya dị ka 'Tower Suffragette' mgbe ọ kụrisịrị igbe ngosi na Tower of London ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nche Emmeline Pankhurst
Ọ dịrị ndụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 105 ma nye aka na nke abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1970s
A mụrụ Cohen Leonora Throp na Hunslet, Leeds na 15 June 1873 na Canova na Jane (née Lamie) Throp
Nna ya, Canova Throp, bụ onye na-ese ihe ma nwụọ na 1879 mgbe Leonora dị afọ 5, mgbe ọ butere ụkwara nta nke ọkpụkpụ azụ, nke hapụrụ nne ya di ya iji zụlite Cohen na ụmụnne ya abụọ
Nne ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa iji kwado ezinụlọ ahụ
Cohen ghọrọ onye na-eri akwụkwọ nri na 1891 nke ọ nọgidere na ndụ ya niile

Ọ mụtara ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ma mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Onye na-azụ ihe, ọ zutere Henry Cohen, onye na-enyere onye na-ere ọla aka na etiti Leeds na nwa nke ndị Juu kwagara, na nso nso a site na Warsaw
Henry bụ enyi nwata mana ezinụlọ abụọ ahụ megidere alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
Nwa mbụ di na nwunye ahụ, Rosetta, nwụrụ n'afọ mbụ ya
N'afọ 1902, Cohen mụrụ nwa ya nwoke Reginald onye dịrị ndụ ruo mgbe o toro
N'ime afọ itoolu sochirinụ, obere ezinụlọ ahụ nwere ndụ udo ka azụmahịa Henry dị ka onye na-ere ọla na-aga nke ọma
Nne Cohen bụ Jane bụ ihe nwere mmetụta na ndụ ya
N'ihi na nne ya bụ onye na-akwa ákwà di ya nwụrụ nke zụlitere ụmụ atọ naanị ya, o doro anya nye Cohen na nne ya nwere ikike ole na ole dị ka nwanyị bi na Britain na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'oge ndụ ya, Cohen kwuru na, 'Ndụ siri ike
Nne m ga-asị 'Leonora, ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ naanị anyị ụmụ nwanyị nwere ihe ha na-ekwu', mana anyị enweghị
Otu nwoke mmanya na-egbu
nwere votu naanị n'ihi na ọ bụ nwoke
E kwere m nkwa na m ga-anwa ịgbanwe ihe'
Cohen ghọtara mgbe ọ dị obere na nne ya ga-emeri nnukwu ihe mgbochi na ndụ ya naanị n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ 'enweghị ike nke nne ya mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe siri ike'
Cohen mere ọtụtụ mkpesa megide gọọmentị
N'afọ 1909, ọ sonyeere Leeds Women's Social and Political Union (WSPU), nke Emmeline Pankhurst guzobere na 1903
Mgbe e mesịrị, Cohen so na 'The Bodyguard' nke Mrs Pankhurst
N'afọ 1911, Cohen sonyeere ngagharị iwe ebe ọ tụbara nkume na windo ụlọ gọọmentị; e jidere ya ma debe ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Holloway ụbọchị asaa
Ọ gbachitere onwe ya n'ụlọ ikpe ma, ọ bụ ezie na a mara ya ikpe, a tọhapụrụ ya
A 'kụkwara ya n'ọnụ ya na aka onye uwe ojii ma kụtuo ya n'okpuru ịnyịnya onye uwe ojii nọ n'elu' na ngagharị iwe nke House of Commons

Ka Cohen malitere ime ihe siri ike dị ka onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, ezinụlọ ya kwadoro nkwado ya mana ndị enyi ya emeghị ya; ọ natara akwụkwọ ozi ịkpọasị na nwa ya nwoke chere mkpagbu ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1913, Cohen mere mkpesa megide gọọmentị site n'iji ígwè na-agbaji ihe ngosi iko nwere akara nke Order of Merit na Jewel House na Tower of London
E jidere Cohen nke ugboro abụọ ma ziga ya na Armley Gaol ebe ọ gara ngagharị iwe agụụ
N'ihi Iwu Cat na Mouse, a tọhapụrụ Cohen n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mgbe ụbọchị ole na ole gasịrị iji kwe ka ọ gbakee site na agụụ nke onwe ya kpatara
Leonora na Henry Cohen wee kwaga Harrogate iji guzobe ụlọ obibi ndị na-eri akwụkwọ nri, ebe ha nyekwara ndị suffragettes na-agba ọsọ n'aka ndị uwe ojii
Ọ natara ihe nrite Agụụụụ 'maka Ike' site na WSPU
N'afọ 1913, Annie Kenney na Flora Drummond mere ndokwa ka ndị nnọchi anya WSPU soro ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị David Lloyd George na Sir Edward Grey kwurịta okwu
Ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ kọwara ụgwọ ọrụ na ọnọdụ ọrụ ha tara ahụhụ na olileanya ha na ntuli aka ga-enyere ụmụ nwanyị aka ịma ọnọdụ ahụ aka n'ụzọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Cohen kọwara na ụmụ nwanyị na-atụ vootu ga-enwe ike ịchọ ụgwọ ọrụ dị elu dịka ụmụ nwoke mere, nke ga-egbochi ụmụ agbọghọ a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala ịbanye n'okporo ámá

Cohen mere onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme achịcha na Norah Duval dị ka nwata nwoke, na-agbanwere ebe mgbe ya na onye na-akwado ọchịchị ibe ya bụ Lilian Lenton na-ebute achịcha iji hapụ ya ka ọ gbapụ n'ụlọ onye na-enyocha nka Frank Rutter na Leeds, nke e ji mee ka ndị na-eme ngagharị agụụ gbakee
Uwe o yi na 1914 Leeds Arts Club Ball nwere akara ndị suffragette na akara nke Women's Social and Political Union
Uwe ahụ bụ nke Leeds Discovery Centre

Cohen ghọrọ onye nhazi distrikti Leeds nke National Union of General and Municipal Workers ma hazie ndị ọrụ na nkwupụta ha gụnyere ọgbaghara ụbọchị atọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Leeds Trades Council
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, Leonora na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri Clarendon Road, Leeds
Ka ọ na-erule 1923, Cohen ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Yorkshire Federation of Trades Councils
N'afọ 1924, a họpụtara Cohen ka ọ bụrụ onye majie; ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara n'oche na JP ruo afọ 25
Na 1928 Birthday Honours, e nyere ya Order of the British Empire maka ịnakwere ọrụ mmekọrịta ya
Cohen lara ezumike nká na Colwyn Bay na ugwu Wales
N'afọ 1970, ọ gara emume mmeghe nke Suffragette Memorial na London, na, n'afọ 1973, ọ laghachiri n'ihe omume Tower of London ya
Ebe ọ bụ na Cohen dị ndụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 105, ọ hụrụ ọganihu nke abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ ndị 1970 ma weghachite Cohen n'anya ọha na eze
Brian Harrison gbara ihe karịrị mmadụ 200 ajụjụ ọnụ, gụnyere Cohen, dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ya Oral Evidence on the Suffragette and Suffragist Movements
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 1974, Cohen tụlere ọrụ ya na nzukọ nke afọ 1911 na ahụmịhe ya banyere njide mbụ ya '[Na nzukọ ahụ] ọ jupụtara
Ndị uwe ojii nọ n'elu ịnyịnya apụọla
Mgbe anyị rutere n'ọnụ ụzọ ámá obí eze, enwere m ike icheta ndị uwe ojii nọ n'elu ịnyịnya n'ebe ahụ nke ọma, ọ bụkwa ebe ahụ ka a kụrụ m
' Cohen kọwara ime ihe ike na nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ na nnọkọ ahụ
N'afọ 1974, ọ pụtara n'ihu Radio Times iji kwalite usoro Shoulder to Shoulder na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị; e sere ya foto na-eyi uwe Holloway na Hunger Strike Medal
Ndị ọkà mmụta mechara nyochaa ndụ Cohen dị ka onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị
Jemal Nath kwuru na a na-ejikọta iri akwụkwọ nri na ụmụ nwanyị
A na-eji usoro nhọpụta na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu mee ihe dị ka ihe atụ

A na-ahụ iri nri Cohen, tinyere ndị ọzọ na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, dị ka ụzọ ụmụ nwanyị ga-esi nọrọ obere oge na kichin n'ihi na ha anaghị akwadebe anụ, ya mere, ha nwere ike iwepụ oge ka ukwuu na-achụso ọdịmma n'èzí ụlọ
N'afọ ndị 1960, Cohen nyere akwụkwọ mkpofu ya, nnukwu akwụkwọ na ihe ncheta ndị ọzọ na Abbey House Museum, Leeds
Ọ bụ ezie na akwụkwọ mkpofu ya enyeghị akụkọ zuru oke banyere oge mkpọsa ya, ọ na-enye nghọta banyere ihe kpaliri ya ịghọ onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị
Akwụkwọ mkpofu ya na-egosikwa na ọ nwere mmasị n'ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a n'ihi na o nwere edemede banyere ọnwụ Nọọsụ Edith Cavell
Nchịkọta ahụ gụnyere ihe osise ya dị ka nwatakịrị site n'aka nna ya
Cohen nọrọ afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya n'ụlọ ndị agadi na-eri akwụkwọ nri
Ọ nwụrụ na 1978, mgbe ọ dị afọ 105
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Times bipụtara akụkọ ọnwụ Cohen
Nke a kpọtụrụ aha OBE ya, ọrụ ya dị ka onye nche nke Mrs Pankhurst, mkpọrọ ya na agụụ ọgbaghara ya na aha ya dị ka 'Tower Suffragette' maka mmebi o mere na ígwè bar na Tower of London
A na-ele ya anya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na mpaghara
Cohen tinyere ihe edeturu na ígwè ahụ ọ tụbara iji kụwaa kọbọd iko ahụ dị na Tower 'Jewel House, Tower of London
Mkpesa m na Gọọmentị maka ịjụ Enfranchise Women, mana ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ata ụmụ nwanyị ndị mkpọrọ ahụhụ - Ọrụ Ọ bụghị Okwu

Ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Cohen n'oge otu narị afọ ya pụtara na North Wales Weekly News
N'ime ya, ọ na-akọwa ihe mere na mgbe ọ sonyeere òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na omume ya ndị sochirinụ
Leonora Okine (amụrụ na Julaị 11, 1981) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọrụ ebere na onye na-ahụ maka nhazi azụmahịa
A mụrụ Leonora na Accra, Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Bishop Joel Primary na JHS
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St Mary's Senior High School, Accra, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ Biological Science na Mahadum Ghana, Legon, ọ gara n'ihu na Accra Business School ebe ọ nwetara MBA na Project Management
N'afọ 2007, ọ gara n'ihu iji mụọ Operations and Project Management na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Leonora malitere site na mpụta ọbịa na usoro telivishọn Ghana, Different Shades of Blue (2007)
N'afọ 2012 ọ nọchiri Matilda Obaseki na ihe nrite TV nke Naijiria, Tinsel (ihe nkiri TV), na-arụ ọrụ dịka Angela Dede
Ọ gosiri dika 'Malaika' na ihe omume asaa nke usoro ihe nkiri MTV, Shuga
O meela ihe nkiri na Marrying the Game, Kpians The Feast of Souls, Love and War, In Line, Beautiful Monster, na Desperation
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Series category, Golden Movie Award Africa (GMAA), 2015
Leopold Albu (1860–1937) bụ onye isi ọla edo
A mụrụ ya na Berlin, Germany
Ọ batara South Africa na afọ 1875 wee biri na Kimberley, Northern Cape ya na nwanne ya nwoke George
Na afọ 1891, ọ kwagara Johannesburg
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mmekọ bi na London, na-esonyere General Mining and Finance Corporation

Shade Omoniyi (amụrụ Folashade Omoniyi; 16 Eprel 1971), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Lepa Shandy, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo Yoruba nke ndị mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa kọwara dị ka “onye ochie na otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba' Omoniyi's sobriquet Lepa Shandy bụ onye ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nwere otu aha

Omoniyi bụ nwa afọ Osogbo na Osun Steeti mana a zụlitere ya na Lagos steeti ebe ọ gara Ire Akari Primary School wee nweta asambodo mbụ ya, wee gaa Isolo Comprehensive High School ebe ọ nwetara ụdị ule nke West African Senior School Certificate Examination
Omoniyi tinyere akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Lagos ma nabata ya ka ọ mụọ Nhazi data ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere BSc
na Nhazi data
Omoniyi malitere n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa n'afọ 1995

Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye nlereanya n'ihi ọdịdị ya dị ntakịrị wee mesịa bụrụ onye na-ese ihe maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Naijiria n'afọ 1996 ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-asụ Bekee
Ọ malitere na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Breaking Point tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Lepa Shandy
Lepa Shandy bụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria nke Bayowa mepụtara ma mesịa bụrụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma nke guzobere ntọala maka ọrụ Omoniyi
Omoniyi mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri anọ na ise na 16 Eprel 2016 ma gosipụta ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya akpọrọ Eri Ife Leyi n'otu ụbọchị ahụ na n'otu ebe ahụ o mere emume ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya
Ndị ọrụ ibe ya na onye bụbu First Lady nke Lagos Steeti, Abimbola Fashola gara ụbọchị ọmụmụ Omoniyi na onye isi ihe nkiri
Omoniyi lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Mbele na-egosi Talking Business Africa ugbu a maka netwọk ahụ
A mụrụ Mbele na Soweto, South Africa ma tolite na Pimville
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum nke Cape Town na nzere masta na ọmụmụ mmepe na mahadum nke dị na London
Mbele malitere ịrụ ọrụ na South African Broadcasting Corporation n'afọ 1999, na-ebili wee bụrụ arịlịka maka mmemme ya News at Ten
N'afọ 2007, Mbele banyere CNBC Africa na mmalite ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi na-ahụ maka azụmahịa nke ọwa ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na CNBC, ọ na-akwado mmemme mgbe niile na ọwa ahụ na mgbakwunye na mkpuchi nke ọtụtụ ihe omume azụmahịa ndị ọzọ, dị ka World Economic Forum
Ha abụọ gosipụtara bido na 6–830am (oge UK) kwa ụbọchị izu obula

Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye na-egosi 'Talking Business Africa' ihe ngosi azụmahịa nke ndụ na-elekwasị anya na ndị ọchụnta ego a ma ama na echiche azụmahịa ha na ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nke Mbele na-enyocha n'akụkụ ha maka aka na ahụmịhe
O gosikwara ndị isi azụmahịa sitere na kọntinent Afrịka
N'afọ 2014, ndị Switzerland na World Economic Forum kpọrọ Mbele onye ndu n'ụwa na-eto eto a họpụtara n'afọ ahụ
Lerato Walaza bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri South Africa nke na-egosi na usoro onyonyo MTV Shuga
Ọ bụ agwa na-emegharị ugboro ugboro bụ onye ka nọ na Shuga mgbe usoro ahụ banyere n'usoro obere abalị iji gosipụta okwu gbasara Coronavirus
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-esere usoro a na akụkọ a ga-esite na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire
Walaza gara Tshwane University Nke Technology ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri
Ọ bịara mara mgbe e nyere ya ọrụ Zamo na usoro nke MTV Shuga
O nwere ọrụ nke nne ma ọ bụ nna nanị ya na-azụ ụmụ na-egosi mgba mgba nke imeziwanye ndụ na ịzụ nwa ọbụna site n'enyemaka nke nne gị
Ọ bụ agwa ugboro ugboro bụ onye nọkwa na usoro nke abụọ
Ọ pụtawo na ihe nkiri 'Letters of Hope' nke egosipụtara na mmemme ihe nkiri Johannesburg na 2019
Ahọpụtara ihe nkiri nke ikpeazụ dị ka ihe nkiri mmeghe maka mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke South Africa nke ise
Na 2019 Walaza na-emezu ebumnuche mmụta MTV site n'ịkparịta ụka ijiji condom na YouTube
Ọ ka nọ na MTV Shuga wee banye na obere usoro akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together- akọwapụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na 20 Eprel 2020
Ọ bụ Tunde Aladese na Nkiru Njoku dere ya wee gbasaa ya rụọ abalị iri asaa - ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere United Nations
Usoro a ga-adabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire na a ga-akọwa akụkọ a na mkparịta ụka ịntanetị n'etiti ndị odide
Lere Paimo, OFR (amụrụ na Nọvemba, 1939) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi
A mụrụ ya na Nọvemba 1939 na Ogbomosho, obodo dị na Oyo Steeti n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa

Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1960 mgbe o sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Oyin Adejobi, otu ihe nkiri nke Pa Oyinade Adejobi guzobere tupu o sonye n'otu ihe ngosi Duro Ladipo ebe ọ gosipụtara na egwuregwu a kpọrọ Obamoro na ọrụ 'Chief Basa'
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Soun Ogunola na-eme ihe nkiri Yoruba nke akpọrọ Ogbori Elemosho nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma Ama
O gosipụtara, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria kemgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na 1963

N'afọ 2005, iji kwado nnukwu onyinye ya nye ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria, Olusegun Obasanjo, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria nyere ya onyinye National Member of the Federal Republic of Nigerian n'akụkụ Zeb Ejiro
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, a kọrọ na ọ nwere ọrịa strok, mana ọ lanarịrị ọrịa strok
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, ọ meriri ihe nrite ego otu nde naira n'ihe ngosi egwuregwu Naijiria, nke a na-akpọ Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
Lere bụ ụyọkọ Olumba Kainji fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ikpochapu nke Naijiria
A kpọrọ ndị agbụrụ ahụ dị 16,000 na 2000, ndị ọ bụ nanị ole na ole n'ime ha na-asụ asụsụ ahụ
Enwere ike ịchọta ndepụta okwu sitere na olumba Takaya n'okpuru njikọ mpụga
